text: Yeye wakabambila ne, Nenye
Ku ndekeelu wa tshipungu tshidibu baleeja ku tulongo twa kumpala twa kanungu aka, padi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga katshiyi tshianyisha mapangadika dîyi aa wôwo adi ajika bukookeshi bwa kwenzeja

Bakadi ha buihi n abo tô ne ku Yisakâ ne Zebuluna ne Nafatale bakatua ne bia kudia ha nyima ha nyama ya mpunda ne ya tumelo ne ya mpunda mikuabo, ne ya ngombe, bintu bia kudia bia bukula ne bia nfigi ne bia tumuma tukese ne bia nvinyo ne bia manyi ne ngombe ne mikoko ya bungi; bualu bua disanka diakadi mu Isalele
Kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete, kanuenji midimu yenu ya buatshiabuatshia to
Nakangata nkambua wenu Abalahama dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, nakamuendesha mu buloba buonso bua Kanâna, nakavudisha bana bandi, nakamufila Isaka

Bakashi benu ne bana benu bakese ne bimuna bienu nebishale mu buloba buakamba Mose dia munemu dia Yadene; nuenu bantu bakole bonso ba dikima nuhite ku mpala kua bana benu bavuale bintu bienu bia nvita, bua kubakuatshisha; tô ne haha Yehowa bana benu dikisha, bu muakunuheye, ne hangatabo kabidi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mubahe; ku nyima nenuhingane ku buloba buenu buakanuha Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, dishiya dia Yadene kudi kuhatuka diba, bua nuenu kubuangata

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kadi tshisamba tshiabuesha nshingu watshi muinshi mua mutshi wa tshikokedi wa mukelenge wa Babulona ne tshiamukuatshila mudimu, nengitabushe bua ba mu tshisamba atshi bashale mu buloba buabo mene; nebabudime, nebashikamemu
Ha buloba nudi ne dikenga; kadi nukoleshe mitshima yenu; nakuhita ba ka buloba bukole
Utuhe tshituha tshia bidia bietu bia buatshia buatshia
Hakabikeye ku lufu, bayidi bandi bakavuluka dî edi diakambeye, bakitabusha malu akadi mafunda ma Mukanda wa Nzambi ne dî diakamba Yesu
Bualu nsongalume wa mu tshimenga atshi uvua mubafuishe bundu, mubuelele muanabu wa bakaji mu nzubu ku bukole
Bena Yuda nebakuatshike buowa, nebikale babuandakanangane, bualu bua Atiopa wakadi ditekemena diabo ne bua Ejipitu wakadi butumbi buabo

Nebashikamemu kabayi ne bualu kubatatshisha, nebibakemu nsubu, nebakune tumuma tua nvinyo mu madimi, nebashikamemu kabayi ne bualu bubatatshisha, hanalumbuluisha bena mutumba n abo badi babanyunguluka ne badi babakengesha; nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa Nzambi wabo
Munyi katuambi ne, Tuenze malu mabi bua kuvuisha malu mimpe bu mudibo batushiminyina ne bu mudi bakuabo bamuangalasha lumu ne, Badi bamba
Ku luseke lua wesete, coudées binunu binai ne nkama itanu mu bule, kuikale bibi bisatu: tshibi tshia Gada, tshibi tshia Ashê ne tshibi tshia Nafatale
Misoko ya Bena Lewi Yosh

Bakambila Bena Benyamina ne, Yai bienu, nualamine mu madimi a tumuma tukese; numone ne halua bana bakashi ba mu Shilo bua kujabo maja, nuluhuke mu madimi a tumuma tukese, ne muntu ne muntu adiangatshile mukashi wandi munkatshi mua bana bakashi ba mu Shilo, aye biandi mu buloba bua Benyamina
Nunku mukelenge Yoasha kakavuluka luse luakamulesha Yehoyada tatu wandi; kadi wakashiha muan andi
Pashishe mutuangaji mumane kufua, neapingane kuabu
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Monai, nembatumine muele wa nvita, tshiole ne tshihuhu; nembavuishe bu mamuma mabi a nfigi adibo kabayi mua kudia bualu bua adi atamba bubi
Sara kusanka wamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu mmunsekeshe
Kadi bikaleye kayi musue kuenza nunku, Umanye biebe, mukelenge, ne katuena tukuatshila nzambi yebe mudimu, katuena tutendelela luhingu lua or luwakuimanyika
Utulombele bua Yehowa Nzambi webe atuleshe nshila utudi ne bua kuendela ne muanda utudi ne bua kuenza
Ba bana ba Bigewai, Utai ne Zabuda; bakadi n abo bakadi balume makumi muanda mutekete
Kubapeshaye bimenga bionsu, kabidi misoku ivua nabi mutumba
Kadi bakuabo bakadi ne tshishi, bakamba ne, Bakunyangila mananashi nunku bua tshinyi
Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu nkadi ne tshia kutangila dilomba adi, mu tshipungu tshia ngondo umwe
Bu tuetu katuyi banengakane bikole, tuvua mua kuikala bamane kuya bapingane ne biakudia misangu ibidi
Shaula wakambila Davidi ne, Mona, muan anyi muan a bute wa bakashi, Melaba, nenkuheye bua ikale mukashi webe; kadi wewe wikale ne dikima dia kuluila Yehowa nvita yandi
Mose wakahingana ku tshidi dilu kabidi, kadi mukuatshishi wandi Yoshua, nsongalume, muana wa balume wa Nuna, kakaluhuka mu Ntenta
Bena Isalele bonso nebalue ne mionshi ku musoko au, nebaukoke mu musulu tô ne hadibo kabayi basanganamu lusoka lukese
Hakunvuabo dî edi, bakabuela mu ntempelo hatshiatshia, bakabanga kuyisha bantu
Hashishe mukelenge Ahashawelosha wakebesha Esetê mukelenge mukashi ne, Yeye udi nganyi, yeye udi hanyi, udi welangana meji mu mutshima wandi bua kuenza nunku

Bituikala badiashile tshioshelu bua kuhambuka ne bua kuhanga kulonda Yehowa, ne bua kufila milambu ya kuoshilahu, ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, Yehowa nkayandi ashikishe bualu

Bana betu, ndi nusengelela bua Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto ne bua dinanga dia Nyuma Muimpe, ne, Nudienzeshe n anyi bikole mu dilomba dienu dia bualu buanyi kudi Nzambi, bua meme mpanduke mu bianza bia bena tshitshu ba mu Yudaya, ne bua dikuatshisha dinyana n adi mu Yelushalema dikale bu mudi basanto basue, ne bua meme nfike kunudi ne disanka bua disua dia Nzambi, ne bua kusangana n enu dikisha
Baamiamine ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu tshidi ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta
Mose wakatuha mikenshi, kadi ngasa ne bulelela biakafuma kudi Yesu Kilisto

Ba mu buloba abu nebase madilu, diku dionso ha buadi: ba mu diku dia tshiota tshia Davidi ha buabo, ne bakashi babo ha buabo; ba mu diku dia tshiota tshia Natana ha buabo, ne bakashi babo ha buabo; ba mu diku dia Bena Lewi ha buabo, ne bakashi babo ha buabo; ba mu diku dia Bena Shimei ha buabo, ne bakashi babo ha buabo; ne ba mu meku onso adi ashala, ba mu diku dionso ha buabo, ne bakashi babo ha buabo
Bakatonkolola makunshi a mabue a Bâla hanshi, bakashimbula nsubu wa Bâla, bakamuvuisha bu diala tô ne ku dituku edi
Bimbi ba misambu: Bana ba Asafa lukama ne makumi anai ne muanda mukulu
Mukelenge wakambila muntu wa Nzambi ne, Uye n anyi kuanyi, wikishe biebe, nenkuhe matabisha ebe
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Badi babakokesha badi bela bibingu, ne dina dianyi ditu diahendibua dinda tô ne dilolo
Butshia muanabute kuambila muakunyende ne: Ngaladi ne tatu butuku ebu
Bantu kabatu batemesha muinda bua kûbuesha munshi mua mushete, batu bauteka ha mesa a muinda, utemene bantu bonso mu nsubu
Kadi biwenza bibi, utshine; bua yeye kena utuala muele wa nvita hatuhu
Nenupingane mu tshipela, batangile ku Mayi manene makunze
Exodus Bakabika mu Elima ne Bena Isalele bonso, bakalua mu tshihela, dina diatshi Sina, hankatshi ha Elima ne Sinai
Yai bienu nuyile dî edi ne, Ndi musue luse, tshiena nsua nyama minshihela; meme tshiakuluila bua kubikila badi bakane, nakuluila bua kubikila badi babi
Nenkusankishe ne tshintu tshionsu tshiwalomba

Kusokoki muntu webe mpala webe; Usemene ha buihi ne muoyo wanyi, ûhikule; Wewe udi mumanye bu mudibo bampenda, Bihendu biakutamba kubanda mutshima wanyi, Bakumpa bintu bia nyongangandu mu bia kudia bianyi; Mesa adibo n au ku mpala kuabo andamuke, alue muba kudibo; Mesu abo ikale ne bileshileshi, hua kâmonyi, Uhumune tshiji tshiebe ham bidi habo, Tshitudilu tshiabo tshilue muaba wa dibutuka; Bualu bua badi bakengesha muntu uwakukuma; Utenteke tshishiku ha mutu ha tshishiku tshidibo n atshi, Mena abo ajimishibue mu mukanda wa muoyo, Kadi meme hanyi ndi ne diakabi, ndi ne dikenga; Nentumbishe dina dia Nzambi ne musambu, Bualu ebu nebusankishe Yehowa ne disanka dihite dia kufila kua ngombe, Bantu bahuekele bakatangila bualu ebu, bakasanka

Bikala tshilumbu tshinuhite bukole, nansha hankatshi ha bashihianganyi, nansha hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu badi badiakuilangana, nansha hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu badi batutangana, mmalu adibo batandangana n au mu misoko yenu; hashishe nenubike, nenuye ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula; nenulue kudi bakuidi, Bena Lewi, ne kudi mulumbuluishi munene wa mu matuku au; nenubakonke, ne bobo nebanukosele tshilumbu
Nudi nukebela kushihela tshinyi
Nuenu nuyishe Bena Isalele mikenji yonso yakabamanyisha Yehowa mukana mua Mose

Bintu biakafileye biakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi, mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu, ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kumusha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Nashona, muana mulume wa Aminadaba

Bena Gibeona bakatumina Yoshua dî ku tshitudilu tshia ku Gilegala, bamba ne, Kukandi tshianza tshiebe kudi bahika bebe nansha, lua biebe kutudi lubilu, utusungile, utukuatshishe, bualu bua bakelenge bonso ba Bena Amole badi bashikama ku mikuna bakadisangisha bua kutuluisha
Kanuena mua kunua luhanza lua Mukelenge ne luhanza lua bademon hohamue; kanuena mua kudisanga ku mesa a Mukelenge ne ku mesa a bademon hohamue
Nenushale bioshelu biabo, nutshibule mabue abo bituha, nuoshe Bashela babo ne kahia; nenutahe mpingu yakasongabo ne tshifuanyikishi tshia nzambi yabo; nenjimishe mena abo mu muaba au
Mu matuku a tatu ebe bakamusangana muikale ne munya, dijingulula dia malu, ne meji, bu meji a nzambi yetu mene
Mvidi Mukulu nkayende kumujika, mu tshibandabanda tshia mu Mowabe, tshidi tshitangilangana ne musoku wa Bete Peyore
Hakabueleye, wakabambila ne, Nudi nutekela mutoyi tshinyi

Nzambi wa Isalele wakasonsola mutshima wa Pula, mukelenge wa Ashû, ne mutshima wa Tigelata pilenesê, mukelenge wa Ashû, ne bobo bakaya n abo, Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe mene mu buhika; bakaya n abo tô ne ku Halaha ne Habo ne Hala ne ku musulu wa Gozana tô ne ku didiku edi

Manyi a Tshijila ne Manananshi Yehowa wakambila Mose kabidi ne, Angata bintu bia manananshi bidi bitambe buimpe myrrhe bujitu bua nshekele nkama itanu, ne cinnamone bujitu bua nshekele nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ne canne aromatique bujitu bua nshekele nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ne nkashia bujitu bua nshekele nkama itanu bu idiho bafila mu tshitendelelu ne tshihiminu tshia manyi a olive

Bua mona, hadi n ebe lukuna, Yehowa; Kadi wewe wakubandisha lusengu luanyi bu lua mbowa, Mesu anyi akumona mulau wakukuata badi hanyi lukuna; Bantu bakane badi bakola bu dibue dia ngashi, Badi bakunyibua mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nebakuame mamuma tô ne mu bununu buabo, bua kuleshabo bantu ne, Yehowa udi muakane
Moshe ne Arone pamue ne bena Izrayele bonsu, kukumbaja bimpe bionsu bivua Mvidi Mukulu muambe bua kuenzela bena Levi
Maweja Nangila mmu kubi wa bantu bende Misangu mikuabu nudi nuela meji ne: Bisamba abi mbitupite bukole
Leya uvua ne mesu bulengu, kadi Rakele uvua ne mpala muimpe, wengelela
Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neabafile mu bianza bienu, neabakengeshe ne makenga makole, tô ne hajiminabo
Yeye wakabambila ne, Kuakushika
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Ya biebe wenze muomumue
Mpindiewu wewe Moshe, ndi nkulongesha musambu, uufunde, ulongeshe bena Izrayele, baumanye, bua padibu bawimba, bajadike ne: meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wabu ndi munkatshi muabu
Kabena mua kuboza mufuba wa mukoku to
Mukelenge Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Ndi ne disanka bua lufu lua bantu babi, anyi
Wa Nzambi udi unvua mei a Nzambi; ebu mbualu bunudi kanui nûnvuila, bua kanuena ba Nzambi
Bakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Isalele, bualu ebu buakulua munyi, bua tshisamba tshimue katshiyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele lelu

Ba mu Mademana bakumana kunyema; Dituku edi mene neatule ku Nobo, Monai, Mukelenge, Yehowa wa misumba, Yeye neatahe bihuka ne tshisui tshia tshiamu tshifike, Yeshaya Lutonga nelutoloke ku tshikuku tshia Yishai, Nyuma wa Yehowa neashikame ham bidi handi, Disanka diandi nedikale mu dinemeka diandi dia Yehowa

Bualu bua bakasangana mu Danyele eu, wakuinyikabo ne, Beleteshasâ, kudi mukelenge, lungenyi luhite bukole, meji, dijingulula dia malu, lungenyi lua kujinguluila bantu bilota, lua kutandula majimbu ne lua kuitaba n alu makonka makole
Bele tshiadi tshia nyama atshi mulu, batshinyukule bua kutshilambula
Ka dina dia musoko diakadi Babela, bualu bua Yehowa wakatompakashaku muaku wa ba ha buloba bonso, ne Yehowa wakabamuangalashaku ha buloba buonso

Biumuka Muena Lewi ku umue wa misoko ya mu Isalele, muakadiye ushikama, bua kubuela ne mutshima wandi wonso mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula, hashishe yeye neanuenzele mudimu mu dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wandi; bu mudi bana babo, Bena Lewi, batu bimana ku mesu kua Yehowa, benza
Hanuhendabo ne hanukengeshabo ne hanushiminyinabo mashimi onso, bua bualu buanyi, nenuikale ne disanka
Yehowa wakulua dî dia Bena Isalele, wakafua Bena Kanâna mu bianza biabo, bakabashiha ne misoko yabo yonso, ne dina dia muaba au diakadi Hôma
Wakela Alona manyi ha mutu handi, wakamujidila
Nebabibale bua babuele mu mîdima mikole
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ambila bena Izrayele bikale bandambula milambu, bayifila amu kudi bantu ba muoyi muimpe
Bobo badi benza nunku bua kuangata tshifulu tshia butumbi tshidi tshisunsuke, kadi tuetu mbua kuangata tshidi katshi tshisunsuke
Ku tshikondo atshi Melodaka baladana, muana wa Baladana, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakatumina Hezikiya mikanda ne bintu, bualu bua yeye wakunvua lumu ne, Hezikiya wakadi ne disama

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Hanasangisha ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele bua kubumusha munkatshi mua bantu muakatangadikabo, hanamuenesha tshijila tshianyi mu bienzedi bindi mbenzela ku mesu kua bisamba bia bantu, hashishe, nebashikame mu buloba buabo buine bunakaha muntu wanyi Yakoba
Kadi Davidi wakashala mu Yelushalema
Mukelenge wakaditshiha kudiye
Ka, mona buimpe ne mutshima mukole bia Nzambi, mutshima mukole kudi bakahona, ne buimpe bua Nzambi kudi wewe, biwananukila mu buimpe buandi; kadi biwahanga kunanukila, wewe neukoshibue kabidi
Nenumanye nsumuinu yonso munyi
Bakamutendekena ne, Kutuambidi bua tuetu kuya mu dina didi kadî ne tshishikidilu
Genesis Abalama wakumuka mu Ejipitu ne mukashi andi ne bintu biandi bionso ne Lota, wakaya mu luseke lua ku Sude
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mutshima wa Palô udi ne tshitshu, yeye udi uhidia kulekela bantu
Kakamuambila ne, Wewe, muntu wa Nzambi, mukelenge udi wamba ne, Uhueke biebe
Atue munu mu mashi awu, aamiamine misangu muanda mutekete ku luseke ludi lumueneka lua tshilamba tshidi tshilembeleja muaba wa tshijila udi Maweja Nangila
Nenkusakidile wewe, Yehowa, munkatshi mua bantu; Bualu bua luse luebe lujalame ludi lunene, lufika tô ne ha mutu ha diulu; Nzambi, wikale mubandishibue ne butumbi ha mutu ha diulu
Udi n anyi lukuna udi ne Tatu wanyi kabidi lukuna
Yone wakalua kunudi mu nshila wa buakane, kanuakamuitabusha; kadi basangishi ba mulambu ne bakashi ba masandi bakamuitabusha
Mulume wandi udi mumanye mua kujadika kudi tshiha kuandi kuonso anyi mei andi onso, anyi udi mua kumusha malu au ne malu a hatuhu
Ha wenza malu mabi, ke haudi usanka
Batuadi aba bakadi ku nseke inai, ku esete ne ku wesete ne ku nôde ne ku Sude
Boshe munyinyi, tshiseba, mashi ne bunyawu
Tangilai, Yehowa udi muena diulu dikuabo didi ku nyima kua diulu, ne muena buloba ne bintu bionso bidimu
Udi ulesha buakane kudi bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila, udi musue kuha benyi bintu bia kudia ne bintu bia kuluata
Nakamona kabidi ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu wakadi
Yeye mene neikale ku mutu kua Bena Gilada bonso
Bakalekela nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo, bakakuatshila Bashela ne mpingu mudimu; tshiji tshia Nzambi tshiakadi kudi Bena Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema bualu bua bobo bakenza bualu ebu bubi
Yakoba wakalua ku Luze eu udi Betele mu buloba bua Kanana, yeye ne bantu bonso bakadiye n abo
Tuetu katuena mua kushiya tshimuna tshietu nansha tshimue
Dituku dia tshitema: Abidane, muana wa Ngideyoni, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Binyamine
Mitshima yabo yakatamba kunyingalala
Pa dibue dimue ufundepu mena a bana basambombu, pa dibue dikuabu mena a bana basambombu, bilondeshile ku diledibua dia muana yonsu

Bakamba kummana kaba kabalê ha buloba, Usangashe muoyo wanyi bu mudi luse luebe lujalame, Yehowa, dî diebe didi dishindame Lulamatu luebe lua bushuwa ludiku tô ne ku bikondo bionso; Bidi bishindama tô ne dituku edi, Bu mikenji yebe kayiyi mikale disanka dianyi, Tshiena mpua mei audi ungambila muoyo kashidi, Meme ndi webe, nusungile, Bantu babi badi bangalamina bua kunshiha, Nakumona kunfudilu kua malu onso makane, Mona mundi munange mikenji yebe
Yeye wakamba ne, Babatijibue mu dina dia Yesu Kilisto
Muntu yonsu udi utshipa tatuende nansha mamuende, badi ne bua kumushipa
Melekisedeke, mukelenge wa Salema, wakalua ne mampa ne nvinyo
Udi ne matshu unvue budi Nyuma wambila ekelesia
Muntu wikale mukoonga tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia mêyi, ke wajadikabu ne badi bamusungula mu musangu mwibîdi
Yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Monai, nakunvua lumu ne, Bintu bia kudia biakashala mu Ejipitu, yai bienu kuakua, nutusumbileku bia kudia, bua tuetu tuhanduke, katufu
Shelumiele, muana mulume wa Shulishadai, mukelenge wa bana ba Shimeona, wakafua bintu dituku ditanu

Bukelenge bua mu diulu kabidi budi bu muntu udi biandi muendi wa mushinga, udi ukeba mabue mimpe a mushinga mukole; hakasanganeye dibue dia mushinga mutambe bukole, wakaya, wakahana bintu biandi bionso, wakadisumba
Nunku manyi akakama

Wakadiluatshisha kuela kua mulau bu muakadiye uluata tshivualu; Wikale biau kudiye bu tshmialu tshidiye udiluatshisha n atshi, Edi nedikale difutu difume kudi Yehowa bua kufuta badi bambanda, Kadi wewe hebe, Yehowa Mukelenge wanyi, Bualu bua ndi muena dikenga ne ndi muhele, Nyaya bu mundidimbi haleheshibuau, Binu bianyi bidi bitekete bualu bua kujila kuanyi kua bidia; Nakulua tshintu tshidibo badiula; Unkuatshishe, Yehowa Nzambi wanyi; Bamanye biabo ne, Etshi tshianza tshiebe; Nansha bobo bangele mulau, kadi wewe unvudishile disanka

Nakuamba dî dianyi musangu umue, tshiena ukudimuna dî kabidi; Hashishe, Yehowa wakitaba kudi Yobo ne dî dihatuke mu nvunde ne, Suika mukaba webe mu tshimono bu muntu mulume; Wewe udi musue kuvuisha kulumbuluisha kuanyi kuakane ne, Kudi tshianana, anyi
Yakoba wakabebesha ne Bakuetu, nuakufuma kudi kunyi
Nudi ne bua kuenza malu â
Newenzele muhika mukashi muomumue
Kadi adi mujikila hankatshi ha malu â abidi: ndi njinga bua kumuka hanu bua kuikala ne Kilisto; bua bualu ebu budi butamba buimpe; kadi kushala mu mubidi mbualu bunudi nutamba kukengela

Mukalu wabo wakadi ku Mahanayima, Bashana mujima, bukelenge buonso bua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, ne misoko yonso ya Yai, idi mu Bashana, misoko makumi asambombo: ne tshituha tshia Gilada ne Ashetalota ne Edelei; misoko ya mu bukelenge bua Oga mu Bashana yakadi ya Maki, muana wa Manashe, ya tshituha tshia bana ba Maki ku meku abo
Elisheba awu uvua muanabu ne Nashone
Abalahama wakateka bana ba mikoko ba mashina muanda mutekete ha buabo
Nukokelangane mu ditshina dia Kilisto
Hezikiya wakamuambila ne, Bakatangila bintu bionso bia mu nsubu wanyi; kakuena tshintu tshimue tshia mu bintu bianyi tshinakahanga kubalesha

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bikala muntu muakane, ne bienzeye malu adi makanangane ne mikenji ne malu adi makane, ne bikaleye kayi mudie munyinyi muelele mpingu ha mikuna, kayi muanze kutangisha mesu andi ku mpingu ya ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele; bikaleye kayi munyange mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi, ne bikaleye kayi mulue hehi ne mukashi mu tshikondo tshia tshijila tshiandi; bikaleye kayi muenzele mukuabo bibi, kadi muhingashile muena dibanza tshieya tshiandi, kayi munyenge bintu ku bukole, kadi muhe bakadi ne nzala bia kudia biandi, ne muluatshishe bakadi butaka bivualu; bikaleye kayi musombeshe mukuabo bintu bua kuheta kasombelu ka ha mutu, kayi mudiangatshile makasa; biumusheye tshianza tshiandi ku malu mabi, biakoseye bilumbu bia hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu anu ne kulumbulula kuakane, bialondeye mikenji yanyi, biatumikileye mei anyi bua kuenzeye bimpe, muntu eu udi muakane, neikale ne muoyo bulelela
Tulekelai kuenda masandi bu muakenda bakuabo babo, bakafua biabo mbombo ibidi ne binunu bisatu dituku dimue
Solomo wakananga Yehowa, wakenda mu mikenji ya Davidi tatu wandi; kadi anu bualu bumue, yeye wakashiha nyama, wakosha musenga wa manananshi ha mutu ha mikuna

Kadi kanudi nyama mikuabo idi mihingishilula bintu mukana anyi idi ne mikono mihanduluke: kamelo, ne nsenji, ne kabundi ka ku mputu; bualu bua nyama ei idi mihingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kayena ne mikono mihanduluke, kayena miakane kunudi
Enza makoha ne muonshi wa bleu ku mibangu ya bilulu idi ituangana, ku tshisumbu ne ku tshisumbu tshia bilulu
Dimukai, bualu bua kanuena bamanye dituku dialua Mukelenge wenu
Yakoba wakahi ngana ku budimi dilolo ne Lea wakaya kumualamina, wakamua mbila ne, Bûdi n abu mbua kulua kundi, bualu bua nakakusumba ku tumuma tua muan anyi
Wewe Moshe, ubueje Urime ne Tumime mu tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi, tshia kuvuala pa kulumbulula
Simona ne bakuabo bakadi n andi bakamulonda ku nyima; bakamusangana, bakamuambila ne, Bantu bonso badi bakukeba

Ne nuenu nudi nûshibua tente munda muandi udi mutu wa makelenge onso ne makokeshi onso, unuakatengudibua munda muandi kabidi ne ditengula didi kadî dienjibua ne bianza mu diumusha dia malu a mubidi wa ha buloba, mu ditengula dia mu Kilisto
Hakatangila kapitene ka masalayi bualu ebu, wakatumbisha Nzambi ne, Bulelela, eu wakadi muntu muakane
Katataka Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, dî diwakambila muntu webe Davidi dijadikibue

Ngombe yakaya mu nshila mululame wa ku Bete shemeshe: yakaya anu mu nshila munene, yenda idila muadi, kayakasesuka ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi; bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete bakayilonda tô ne ku mukalu wa Bete shemeshe
Neatombokele Mukokeshi wa bakokeshi mene mene, kadi nebamutshibule bituha bituha, tshianza tshia muntu katshiyi tshimulenga
Izake kubinyika mena abi a kale, avua Abrahame mubinyike
Hashishe mukuabo wakadi ne tshinfuanyi tshia muntu, wakandenga tshianza ne wakankolesha
Yobo wakadi wenza nunku misangu yonso
Ebu mbualu bukole budi mukelenge ukonka, ne kakuena udi mua kubulesha mukelenge, anu nzambi idi kayiyi mishikame munkatshi mua ba ha buloba

Kadi biamona mudimushi muele wa nvita ulua, kayi wela mpungi, ne bantu kabena badimushibua; bialua muele wa nvita ne biashihau muntu umue wa munkatshi muabo, muntu eu udi ushihibua bua bubi budiye n abu, kadi nendombe mashi andi ku bianza bia mudimushi
Gideona wakatuma ba messager kudi Bena Efelayima ba ku mikuna ne, Luai kuluisha Bena Midiyana, nunyenge mai adi ku mpala kuabo tô ne ku Bete bala ne ku Yadene

Binuahidia kutumikila mei onso a mikenji idi mifunda mu mukanda eu, bua nuenu nutshine dina edi dia butumbi ne ditshina ne, YEHOWA, NZAMBI WENU; hashishe Yehowa neanuenzele masama a kukema ne bana badi banulonda; masama makole neashale kunudi musangu mule ne makenga manene neashale kunudi musangu mule kabidi
Monai, nembanuishe ku muaba unuakabahana; nennuhingashile difutu bua bualu bunuakenza

Kadi dî dia Nzambi diakalua kudi Shemaya, muntu wa Nzambi, ne, Wambile Lehabama, muana wa Solomo, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Benyamina bonso ne bantu badi bashala ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kanuyi bua kuluangana ne bana benu, Bena Isalele: muntu ne muntu ahingane ku nsubu kuandi, bualu ebu buakufuma anu kundi meme
Amen
Kadi bikalabo batusangane bu bantu babi hatuakadi tukeba mua kubingishibua mu Kilisto, Kilisto udi muena mudimu wa bubi, anyi
Balaka wakamushihela ngombe ne mikoko, wakantumina Belâma ne miloho yakadi n andi
Wakabambila ne, Numushe nzambi ya bende idi munkatshi muenu, nuteke mitshima yenu kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele
Yeye wakahingana ku nsubu wandi

Nyeye udi mushikame ha mutu ha mukalu udi utuangasha buloba Nyeye udi uvuisha bakokeshi bu bantu ba hatuhu, Kabena banze kukunyibua musangu mule, kabena banze kumiaminyibua, Wa Tshijila udi ukonka ne, Nenunfuanyikishe kudi nganyi, Bandishai mesu enu kulu, numone bienu
Nenshipe muanabute yonsu wa bena Ejipitu biangatshile kudi muanabute wa mukalenga, uvua mua kupiana bumfumu bua ditunga too ne kudi muanabute wa mukaji mupika udi upelesha bukula
Nakamusangana mubandibue anu bua makonka a mikenshi yabo, kadi dibanda diandi kadiakadi dia mua kumushiha anyi kumuela mu lukanu
Hawafikaku, ukebe Yehu, muana wa Yehoshafata, muana wa Nimishi; ubuele mu nsubu, umujule munkatshi mua bana babo, uye n andi mu nsubu wa munda

Mituutu ne mputa Pikala bantu babidi batandangane, umue utuuta mukuabu bikole ne bisusu, nansha mumuase dibue, pikala uvuabu batuuta mushale mu bulalu usama, kayi mufue, nansha mushale utebuka ne mutshi, wendakana pambelu, mututshianganyi awu neafute amu tshibawu, bua matuku avua mubedi mushale mu bulalu ne bua kumondapisha too ne pumvuaye bimpe
Tuasakidila kudi Nzambi bua kuha kuandi kudi kakui mua kuambibua
Tshibangidilu Yakobe udi uya mu Ejipitu Yakobe kubanga luendu ne bena diende bonsu, kabidi ne bintu bionsu

Nunku tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudi Bena Isalele, yeye wakabahana mu bianza bia Kushana lishatayima, mukelenge wa mu Mesopotamia; Bena Isalele bakakuatshila Kudihana lishatayima mudimu bidimu muanda mukulu
Nunku utume dî lubilu, wambile Davidi ne, Kuladi butuku ebu mu mpata wa mu tshihela, kadi usabuke ku luseke lukuabo; kabajimishi mukelenge ne bantu bonso badi n andi

Halua dituku dia muanda mukulu, yeye neadiangatshile nansha nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi nansha mputu nyunyu ibidi, nealue n ai ku mpala kua Yehowa ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, neayifile mu bianza bia muakuidi, ne muakuidi neayifile bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neafue milambu ya kumubuikidila n ai bubi ku mpala kua Yehowa bualu bua tufina tuandi

Wowo adi mimane ha mutu ha mikuna idi hehi ne nshila, Hehi ne bibuelelu bia musoko, Nuenu bantu, ndi nnuela dî dianyi; Nuenu batshimbakanyi, nuyile mua kumanya budimu; Unvuai, bualu bua nengambe mianda minene; Bualu bua mukana muanyi nemuambe mei malelela; Mei onso a mukana muanyi adi ambibua mu buakane; Buonso buau adi mei a bushuwa kudi muntu udi ujingulula mianda, Nusungule diyisha dianyi, kanusungudi tshiamu tshia argent; Bua meji adi ahita mabue a bilenga bulengele; Meme, meji, ndi nvuisha budimu muaba wanyi wa kushikama, Kutshina Yehowa nkuikala ne malu mabi lukuna
Yesu wakamuandamuna ne, Bu wewe mumanye diha dia Nzambi ne wakukulomba ne, Umpe mai a kunua, wewe wakadi kumulomba ne yeye wakadi kukuha mai a muoyo
Hashishe, yeye udi wamba munda munda ne, Nempingane mu nsubu wanyi unakuluhuka; halueye, udi usangana nsubu hatuhu, mukomba, mulengesha
Hashishe yeye wakamuambila ne, Unvua mei a muntu webe mukashi

Muaba Edi ushala, buludiludi ne tshituha tshia buloba tshijidila Yehowa, coudées binunu dikumi mu bule buau ku luseke lua esete, coudées binunu dikumi mu bule buau ku luseke lua wesete, wikale buloba bua musoko; bintu bidi bidiundamu bikale bia kudia bia bantu badi benza mudimu mu musoko
Bualu bua muele udi utaha bantu banyi ne bakokeshi bonso ba Bena Isalele
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Disu dianyi kadiena dinutangila ne dinanga ne tshiena nnufuila luse; kadi nennuhingashile difutu dia bienzedi bienu bibi, ne nenteke malu enu a bundu ham bidi henu; nenumanye ne, Ndi Yehowa
Kadi Yesu kakaditeka mu bianza biabo, bualu bua yeye wakamanya bantu bonso, ne bua yeye kakadi ne bualu bua muntu amuambile malu a bantu; yeye mene wakadi mumanye malu a munda mua bantu

Nuenu badi bashikame mu Dedana, nyemai lubilu, Bialua bahuodi ba tumuma tua nyinyo kûdi, Kadi nakuhaula bionso bia Esau, nakumushiya hatuhu; Shiya bana bebe ba nshiya, nembalame bua bikale ne muoyo, Bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mona, bikala badi kabayi bahile ne bua kunua luhanza, wewe neuhanduke kuyi mulengeshibue, anyi

Yehowa wakanunkila dihembu dimpe: Yehowa wakamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Tshiena ngela buloba mulau kabidi bualu bua bantu badi ne meji mabi mu mitshima yabo hatshidibo bitende tô ne hakulumpabo, tshiena njimisha bifukibua bionso bidi ne muoyo kabidi bu munakenza diambedi
Wakamuambila ne, Ku Hebelone

Nunku Hazaele wakaya kusangakena n andi, wakaya ne kuha kua bintu biakane bionso bia mu Damaseke bikumbane bujitu buakadi tumelo makumi anai mua kutuala, wakimana ku mesu kuandi, wakamba ne, Muan ebe Benehadada, mukelenge wa Sulia, wakuntuma kûdi bua kukuebesha ne, Meme nensangale ku disama edi, anyi
Ke mu wabu bamujike pabuipi ne muena kuende Sara
Tunkanunuina tua Tela Ei idi ndelanganyi ya tunkanunuina tua Tela
Bitalu bienu, nebabidie kudi nyama ya mibuabua ne nyunyi ya mikanku, muntu kayi mua kuyipata to
Yeye udi ulama mikenshi yandi, utu wikala munda muandi, ne Yeye kabidi utu wikala munda muandi

Ba mu bisamba bionso nebamukuatshile mudimu ne muan andi mulume, muana wa muan andi mulume, tô ne hakumbana tshikondo tshia buloba buandi bua kufuabu; hashishe ba mu bisamba bia bungi ne bakelenge banene nebamuvuishe biandi muhika wabo

Hakashikisha Boaza kudia ne kunua, ne mutshima wandi wakadi usanka, yeye wakabuela nu nsubu, wakaya kulala kundekelu kua bisumbu bia orge, wakabuelamu bitekete bitekete, wakumusha bilulu ku makasa andi, wakalala

Kadi udi utangilatangila mikenshi miakane tshishiki ya budishikaminyi, ne udi ushalamu, kai muikale munvui udi uhua muoyo, kadi muikale muenji wa mudimu udi uwenza, muntu eu neikale ne disanka mu kuenza kuandi
Tuasakidila kudi Nzambi, ne, Nuenu nuakadi bahika ba bubi, kadi nuakatumikila mu mitshima yenu mushindu wa diyisha diakanubueshabomu
Nunku Makanda wa Nzambi udi wamba ne, Nzambi udi uhidia badi badisue, kadi udi uha badi badihuekesha ngasa
Mutuangaji udi ulambula mulambu awu, audile amu muaba wa tshijila mu lubanza lua ntenta wa kusambakena
Yeye wakungambila ne, Mai awakatangila, kudi mukashi wa masandi ushikama, adi bantu ne bisumbu bia bantu, ne bisamba, ne miaku

Itai wakakudimuna mukelenge dî ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ne bu mudi mukelenge wanyi ne muoyo, bulelela, mu miaba yonso idi mukelenge wanyi uya, nansha mu muaba wa lufu nansha mu muaba wa muoyo, muntu wandi neikaleku kabidi
Buonso buabo bakakema bualu bua butumbi bunene bua bukelenge bua Nzambi
Yeye wakasangana ne Bena Yuda ne batendeledi bakane mu nsunagoga, wakasomba ne bakasangakana ngandi mu tshisalu ku dituku ku dituku

Bakatuandamuna dî diabo nunku ne, Tuetu tudi bena mudimu ba Nzambi wa diulu ne buloba; tudi tuasa nsubu wakasabo bidimu bia bungi bimane kuhita, nsubu wakasabo, wakashikishabo kudi mukelenge munene wa Isalele
Bimenga bionso bia bana ba Alona bakuidi biakadi bimenga dikumi ne bisatu ne miaba yabi ya ku matshika
Kadi kakuakadi muntu umue munkatshi muabo wakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Davidi wakaja maja ku mpala kua Yehowa ne bukole buandi buonso: Davidi wakadi ne efoda wa lin musuika mu tshifila tshiandi
Hakafikeyeku, wakasangana tupitene tua masalayi tuonso tushikame hanshi

Mukokeshi ikale ne buloba budi bushala, bukuabo ku lunga luseke ne bukuabo ku luseke lukuabo lua muaba udi usangisha buloba bujidila Nzambi ne buloba bua musoko hohamue; bukuabo buikale ku mpala kua mukalu wa muaba au wa coudées binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu tô ne ku butshika bua buloba bua Isalele ku luseke lua esete, bukuabo buikale ku luseke lua wesete lua muaba au wa coudées binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu tô ne ku butshika bua buloba bua Isalele ku luseke lua wesete; buloba budi buludiludi ne mahianyi a bisamba bia Bena Isalele, buikale buloba bua mukokeshi, ne tshituha tshia buloba tshidibo bajidila Yehowa ne muaba wa tshitendelelu nebikale munkatshi muabu
Nengambe tshinyi kabidi
Ne ditekemena kadiena difuisha bundu, bualu bua luse lua Nzambi luakitshikila mu mitshima yetu kudi Nyuma Muimpe wakafukeye
Kanutshinyi badi bashiha mubidi, kadi kabena bamanye mua kushiha muoyo; kadi nutshine udi mumanye mua kujimisha muoyo ne mubidi kabidi mu Ngena
Mutshi muimpe kawena mumanye mua kukuama mamuma mahi, mutshi mubi kawena mumanye mua kukuama mamuma mimpe
Nenuikale ne milau mu bisaka bienu ne mu malonga anudi nuenzelamu mampa
Kadi bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, wakavuluka Davidi, wakamuha muinda mu Yelushalema bua kuhingisha muan andi wa balume ku nyima kuandi, ne bua kujadikeye Yelushalema
Nudi basue kunfuta bua bualu bunakuenza, anyi kungenzela bunga bualu, anyi
Patshivua tshitalu tshia Sara katshiyi tshianji kujika, Abrahame kuya kudi ndelanganyi ya Ete, kubambila ne: Meme ndi muenyi munkatshi muenu
Kakuakadi muntu wakamanya mua kumukudimuna dî, dituku adi tô tshiendelele muntu kakadi ne bukitu bua kumukonka bualu
Wakamona ngombe muanda mutekete yakadi ne manyi a bungi, yakabanda mu mai, yakadi idia mashinde malehe
Lulengu elu kaluena lusokoma kundi, luteka mu tshibutshilu tshianyi, anyi
Ya biebe kudi baprofete ba tatu ebe ne ba mamu ebe
Kanusangishi tumuma tuonso ludi mu madimi enu, kanuambudi tumuma tuakahona hanshi mu madimi enu, nushiye bintu ebi bia kukuatshisha n abi bahele ne benyi meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bena Izrayele mbena diakalenga Mpindiewu nudikonke bua malu onsu avua menzeke kale, kabayi banji kunulela, katshia Mvidi Mukulu wafuka bantu pa buloba
Katataka bualu budi mu mutshima wanyi bua kuhunga tshihungidi ne Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, bua tshiji tshiandi tshikole tshiumuke kutudi
Yeye wakabambila ne, Kanumbikidi ne Naomi kabidi, numbikile ne Mala, budlu bua Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso wakatamba kuhkengesha

Hakakuna Bena Isalele bintu mu buloba, hashishe Bena Midiyana ne Bena Amaleka ne bantu ba ku esete bakatua kudibo, bakafila kubalesha; bakabatshintshimika, bakahaula bintu biakamena mu buloba, tô ne nakafikabo ku Gaza; kabakashila Bena Isalele tshia kudia, nansha mukoko nansha ngombe nansha mpunda
Yesu ne bayidi bandi bakaya mu misoko ya Kaisalia wa Filipoi; yeye wakakonka bayidi bandi mu nshila ne, Bantu badi hangamba meme ne, Nganyi
Nanku panuafika pabuipi ne ditunga adi bua kudikuata, Yeye neanuipatshile baluishi benu, badi banupita ku bungi ne ku bukole
Tatu wanyi udi utumbishibua mu bualu ebu ne, Nudi nukuama mamuma a bungi; nunku nenuikale bayidi banyi
Nebalue ne tshisumbu tshia bantu bua kukuluisha, nebakukume mabue, nebakukose bituha ne miele ya nvita
Akiyezere, muana wa Amishadayi, ke uvua ulombola bena Dane
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: imanyisha kabidi bena Izrayele ne: Padi muntu ulambula Maweja Nangila nyama wa mulambu wa bobumue, neapeshe Maweja Nangila bidi bimutangila
Bakuabo bakitabusha, bakadisangisha ne Paulo ne Sila; tshisumbu tshinene tshia Bena Gelika bakadi batshina Nzambi ne bakashi ba butumbi ba bungi bakenza nunka kabidi
Minda muanda mutekete ya kahia idi itema ku mpala kua nkuasa wa butumbi, idi Nyuma ya Nzambi muanda mutekete
Mvidi Mukulu akulokeshile dibungi dia mu diulu, akupeshe biakudia bia bungi mu madimi
Tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole tshia malongu onsu atshi tshivua tshia bujitu bua Kilo , bilondeshile tshipimu tshidi muaba wa tshijila
Nufute difutu diende matuku onsu, diba kadiyi dianji kubuela to
Yeye nealuangane ne misoko miasa ne ngumbu ya nvita mihite bukole, ku dikuatshisha dia nzambi wa ba bende
Pashishe, muena Izrayele awu umushe mutu ne mafuta, akosolole munyinyi
Nuikale ne lutulu kabidi, nujadike mitshima yenu, bualu bua dimueneka dia Mukelenge diakulua ha buihi

Netuye ne bimuna bietu kabidi, katuena dishiya nansha mukoko umue ku nyima, bualu bua didi ne bualu bua kutendelela Yehowa Nzambi wetu ne nyama ei; katuena bamanye bintu bidi Yehowa musue anu bakafikaku

Abalahama wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakangata bidia ne mulondo wa mai, wakabika kudi Haga, wakabiteka ha diaha diandi, wakamuha muana, wakabatuma ha bule, wakaya biandi, wakendakana mu tshihela tshia Bê sheba
Mei akamba Ahitofele mu matuku au akadi bu muntu mukonke dî dia Nzambi
Bualu bua nakasua kumanya bimpe tshiakamubandilabo, nakaya n andi ku tshilumbuluidi tshiabo
Nennutuadile kantu ka nuenu kudia
Belâma wakabika, wakahingana kuandi, Balaka wakaya kuandi kabidi

Bualu bua bakadi tshieyemenu tshitekete bu disele kudi ba tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele; hakakukuatabo mu tshianza, wewe wakatshibuka, wakahanda maha abo onso; hakakueyemenabo, wakatshibuka, wakazakasha milemba yabo yonso
Shimei wakadi ne bana ba balume dikumi ne basambombo ne bana ba bakashi basambombo; kadi bana babo kabakadi ne bana ba bungi, ne bobo bonso kabakavulangana ba bungi bu muakenza bana ba Yuda
Kakuakadi muntu wakakufuila luse bua kukuenzela malu â onso a luse; kadi bakakuimasha mu tshisuku, bualu bua bakalengulula muoyo webe mu dituku diakakulelabo
Muntu eu wakasumba muaba ku difutu dia bubi buandi; wakahona mutu munshi, wakahandika hankatshi, mala andi onso akahatuka
Bansongalume dikumi bakadi batuala bintu bia nvita bia Yoaba, bakela Abashaloma munkatshi, bakamuasa, bakamushiha
Ngasa wa Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto ne dinanga dia Nzambi ne buobumue ne Nyuma Muimpe bikale ne buonso buenu
Kadi bubi, bua buobuo bimueneshibue ne, Mbubi, mu kuenzesha kua lufu kundi ku muanda udi muimpe; bua bubi bulue bubi butamba bunene bua mukenshi
Longolola bintu biebe bionso, imana ne malu onso malongolola, wewe wikaleku ne bisumbu biebe bionso bia masalayi biakudisangisha n ebe, ushaleku bua kuenza mundi nkuambila

Aba mbakelenge ba bana ba balume ba Esau bana ba balume ba Elifasa, muan a bute wa Esau, bakadi mukelenge Temana, ne mu kelenge Oma ne mukelenge Sefo ne mukelenge Kanaza ne mukelenge Kola ne mukelenge Gatama ne mukelenge Amaleka, aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Elifasa mu buloba bua Edome, aba mbana ba balume ba Ada
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama inayi ne bisatu
Hakafikabo ku Yelushalema, bakabitabusha kudi bena ekelesia ne kudi bapostolo ne bakulu; Paulo ne Bânaba bakabambila malu onso akenza n abo Nzambi
Dayawesha, Muena Madai, wakadia bukelenge, wakadi ne bidimu bu makumi asambombo ne bibidi
Ashê ikale ne tshituha tshimue tshituangane ne mukalu wa Dana, ku luseke lua esete tô ne ku luseke lua wesete

Bulelela, hakadifudilabo kana ka ngombe, hakambabo ne, Eu nNzambi wetu wakatuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne hakakutatshishabo bikole, wewe mu bunene bua luse luebe kuakabalekela mu tshihela; ditutu diakadi dibalombola mu munya kadiakumuka kudibo, bua kubalombola mu nshila; ne ditutu diakadi ditema kahia butuku bua kubatokeshila nshila wa kuakadibo ne bua kuya kadiakumuka kudibo
Yeye wakadimusha Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima; bualu bua wewe neulue ne Bena Isalele mu buloba bunakabalaya; meme nengikale n ebe
Misoku ya ditunga adi batshidi bayibikila ne: mmisoku ya Yayire

Fundila muanjelo wa ekelesia wa ku Semuna ne, Ndi mumanye dikenga diebe ne buhele buebe kadi wewe udi mubanshi ne bihendu bia badi badiamba ne, Tudi Bena Yuda, ne kabena Bena Yuda; kadi badi nsunagoga wa Satana
Bulelela, ndi nkuambila ne, Kuena uluhukamu tô ne hawafuta dibanza dionso, nasha kakuta kakese kushala
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba mei â
Satana wakahuela munda mua Yudasa, wakadibo babikila ne Isakaliote, yeye wakadi wabo wa ba dikumi ne babidi
Tshikena kumona tshiakamueneka kudi Paulo butuku: Muntu wa ku Makedonia wakadi muimane, umutendekena ne, Lua biebe mu Makedonia, utukuatshishe
Hashishe, Aliyoka wakaya ne Danyele kudi mukelenge lukasa, wakamuambila ne, Nakumona muntu munkatshi mua bantu ba ku Yuda bakabueshabo mu buhika udi mua kujingulula mukelenge tshilota tshiandi
Shaula wakamuela difuma bua kumushiheye; nunku Yonatana wakamanya ne tatu wandi wakamana kusungula bua kushiheye Davidi
Katataka, muan anyi, kutshinyi, nenkuenzele malu onso awakuamba, bualu bua bena musoko bonso badi bamanye ne, Wewe udi mukashi wa kanemu

Hashikishabo kuvuwa tshintu atshi, muakuidi neatangile ne ditoba dia disama kadiyi diandamuke mekala, nansha bikaladi kadiyi ditampakane, tshintu atshi katshiena tshiakane, nebatshioshe mu kahia edi ndisama dia nsudi, bikala disama ku mutu kua muena dibala anyi ku mpala hadi dibala
Yone Ku tshibangidilu Dî diakadiku, Dî diakadi ne Nzambi, Dî diakadi Nzambi
Padiye muenza nanku, bintu bionsu bivua mu nzubu nebishale kabiyi bipie mikiya to
Balombodi ba bena mvita ba mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kumuanyishila bulenga bua mukaji awu

Bu muakufika tshianza tshianyi kudi makelenge akadi ne mpingu, tshiena ngenzela musoko wa Yelushalema ne mpingu yau Kadi halua Mukelenge kushikisha mudimu wandi wonso udiye wenzela mukuna wa Siona ne musoko wa Yelushalema, yeye neakengeshe bienzedi bia mu mutshima wa diambu wa mukelenge wa Ashû, neuhuekeshe butumbi bua kudilesha kuandi
Nanku Balaame kutuuta mpunde tshiakabidi

Bimanu bia munda mua tshitendelelu biakadi bibamba mabaya ku nseke yonso, hanshi tô ne ku madidishi andi, ku madidishi tô ne kulu, ku muaba wa ha mutu ha mushiku wa mbelu wa ku muaba mutambe tshijila tô ne kulu, munda ne ha mbelu
Izake kumukonka ne: Muananyi, wapetshi bimvua mukulombe anu lukasa lukasa nanku mushindu kayi
Buloba ebu bujima nebushale bu tshikulu, ne bu tshintu tshidi tshikemesha bantu; ba mu bisamba ebi nebakuatshile mukelenge wa Babulona mudimu bidimu makumi muanda mutekete
Mose ne Alona bakenza bu muakamba Yehowa, bakenza nunku
Kadi mukelenge wandi wakamuambila ne, Nansha, katuena tuahuka ku musoko wa bende udi kauyi wa Bena Isalele; netuye ku Gibea
Betele uvua ku luseke ludi diba dibuelela, Ayi ku luseke ludi diba dipatukila
Hakajilabo bia kudia, hakatendelelabo Nzambi, hakabatentekeshabo bianza ha mitu habo, bakabatuma
Wakamuambila ne, Ulue n anyi, umone lukunukunu lundi n alu kudi Yehowa
Hashishe, mishikankunde mikuabo yakalua, yakamba ne, Mukelenge, Mukelenge, utunzuluile
Witabushe bua meme nsabuke, utangile buloba buimpe budi dishiya dia Yadene, mukuna au muimpe, ne Lebanona
Ba bana ba Mushi: Mali ne Edê ne Yelimota
Yeye udi wamba ne, Ndi mumumanye, kadi yeye katu walama mikenshi yandi, udi muena mashimi ne bualu bulelela kabuena munda muandi

Tunkanunuina tua Efelayima Bana ba balume ba Efelayima: Shutela, ne Belede muan andi, ne Tahata muan andi, ne Eleada muan andi, ne Tahata muan andi, ne Zabada muan andi, ne Shutela muan andi, ne Ezê, ne Eleada, bakadi bashihibua kudi Bena Gata bakaledibua mu buloba, bualu bua bobo bakatua bua kunyenga bimuna biabo
Bana babo ba mu Kilisto bakatuma Paulo ne Sila lubilu ku Beloya butuku
Bienzabo malu â hatshidi mutshi ne muoyo, nebenze tshinyi humau
Hakamuambuleye, wakaya n andi kudi mamu wandi; yeye wakashikama ha bibelu bia mamu wandi tô ne munda munya, hashishe wakafua
Lote ubamona, kujukaye bua kubakidila
Shaula wakamukeba ku dituku ku dituku, kadi Nzambi kakamufila mu tshianza tshiandi
Difutu dienu nedikale makenga bua malu enu a tshikama, ne nenukenge bualu bua kutendelela kuenu kua mpingu; nenumanye ne, Meme ndi Mukelenge Yehowa
Mukuabo wakamba mei kampanda ne mukuabo wakamba mei kansanga
Mbakumbaji tshiuvua mundombe

Bualu bua dikenga dietu dikese dia tshituha tshihi didi ditamba kutuenzeshela bujitu bua butumbi bua tshiendelele musangu ne musangu; hatudi katui tutangila bintu bidi bimueneka ku mesu, kadi tudi tutangila bintu bidi kabi bimueneka ku mesu; bualu bua bintu bidi bimueneka ku mesu bidi bia tshituha tshihi, kadi bintu bidi kabi bimueneka ku mesu bidi bia tshiendelele
Bobo kabena ba ha buloba, bu mundi meme tshi wa ha buloba
Petelo wakatshinguluka, wakamona muyidi wakadi Yesu munange, ulonda, nguakadi mumueyemene tshianyima mu tshiadi hakadibo badia bidia butuku, nguakamukonka ne, Wakutungila tshitungu nganyi
Wakasokolola masandi andi nunku, wakamuenesha butaka buandi; bua malu â mutshima wanyi wakamuhidia, bu muakahidia mutshima wanyi mukulu andi

Nunku, muana wa muntu, udilongoluele bintu bia luendu lua kuya ku buhika, wenze nunku mu munya ku mesu kuabo; Umuka mu muaba webe bua kuya ku muaba mukuabo ku mesu kuabo; bumue nebelangane meji a muanda eu, nansha bikalabo bena diku dia bantombokedi
Agaga wakalua kudiye ne disanka

Kulondolola Solomo Udi Wangata Bukelenge bua Davidi Davidi wakabikila bantu banene bonso ba mu Isalele, bakadi ku mutu kua bisamba, ne tupitene tua bisumbu bia bantu tuakakuatshila mukelenge mudimu mu milongo yatu, ne tupitene tua bantu tshinunu ne tua bantu lukama, ne bakadi ku mutu kua bintu bionso bia mukelenge ne bimuna biandi ne bia bana bandi ne tuhita ne bena bukitu mu Yelushalema
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha ngombe wa mulambu ne Yehowa neawitabushe bua kubuikidila n au bubi buandi
Bantu bonso bakadi bafume mu buhika bakenza bitandatanda, bakashikama mu bitandatanda; bualu bua Bena Isalele kabakanza kuenza nunku ku matuku a Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, tô ne ku dituku edi
Nunku bantu bakatandangana ne Mose, bakamba ne, Utuhe mai a kunua Mose wakabambila ne, Nudi nutandangana n anyi bualu kai
Bulelela, baprofete bonso, ku Samuele tô ne ku bakamulonda, bungi buabo bakadi bamba, bakamba bua matuku â kabidi
Bena Isalele bakaditshiha kudi Yehowa ne, Biwafila bantu aba mu bianza bietu, netushihe misoko yabo yonso
Bakadi bifukibue bidi ne muoyo binakamona ku muelelu wa musulu wa Kebâ
Nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numuenzele mudimu, nulamate kudiye, nuditshihe kudi dina diandi
Meme nempueke muaba awu bua kuyukila nebe
Yehoyakima wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu dikumi ne tshimue; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Zebida, muana mukashi wa Pedaya wa mu Luma
Muntu udi ubuelela mukaji wa tatuende mu nzubu, udi ufuisha tatuende bundu
Genese Yakoba wakunvua mei a bana ba balume ba Labana bamba ne, Yakoba wakakongolola bintu bionso bia tatu wetu wakadiangatshila bubanji buakadi bua tatu wetu

BADI BUMUKA KU SINAYI BAFIKA KU MIKALU YA MOWABE Bena Izrayele badi bumuka Matuku makumi abidi a ngondu muibidi wa tshidimu tshivua tshilonda tshidimu tshivua bena Izrayele bapatuke mu Ejipitu, divuba kubanda mulu ku ntenta wa kusambakena, uvua ne mushete wa ndondu
Nuleshangane lutulu, nulekelelangane mibi yenu, hikala muntu ne mukuabo tshilumbu; bu muakanubuikidila Mukelenge mibi yenu; nuenu nuenze muomumue kabidi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kadi bikalabo kabayi bangunvuila, nenjule tshisamba atshi, nentshibutule
Kadi, batuile binu pa bule
Bena buloba bakukengeshangana hatuhu, bakunyenga bintu bia bakuabo; bakutatshisha bahele ne bakengi, bakukengesha muntu wa bende wakadi kayi ne bualu
Bualu bua malu onso adi hatuhu bu kuihata kua luhehele
Mukunda wa Nzambi udi wamba tshinyi
Padiku tshipumbishi, udi ufila bukookeshi kudi Minisistila kavulambedi
Kadi Danyele wakahangidisha bualu mu mutshima wandi bua kadinyangi ne bia kudia bia mukelenge ne nvinyo wakadiye unua
Mukanda wa Nzambi wakinshidila malu onso munshi mua bubi, bua kuha bantu badi bitabusha mulayi ku ditabusha dia mu Yesu Kilisto
Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, mukuatshishi wa Mose, umue wa balume bakasunguleye, wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, Mose, ubakande
Yehowa wakahunga n abo tshihungidi, wakabadimusha ne, Kanuena ne bualu bua kutshina nzambi mikuabo, kanuyinaminyi, kanuyikuatshidi mudimu, kanuyifididi milambu ya kuosha ha kahia
Nakumuebesha ne, Wewe udi muana wa nganyi
Kumvuaye lumu lua ne: bena Izrayele badi balonda njila wa ku Atarime
Yeye wakabandamuna ne, Nuenu nubahe bia kudia
Bobo bakamuitaba ne, E, yeye udi ne bukole, ne tangila, muan andi wa bakashi, Lakele, ulualua ne mikoko
Bingikala ngumusha bademon mu dina dia Belezebula, bana benu badi babumusha mu dina dia nganyi
Nenfile ba mu Yuda bonso mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Babulona kabidi, ne yeye neaye n abo mu buhika mu Babulona, neabashihe ne muele wa nvita

Yoshua wakambila Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe ne, Nuvuluke dî diakanuambila Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuha dikisha, neanuhe buloba ebu

Bualu bua tuetu tuakadi bahote diambedi, tuakadi ne buhidia, tuakadi badingishibua, tuakadi tulonda nkuka ne masanka bia mishindu ya bungi; tuakadi tuikala ne lukinu ne mukau; tuakadi tukinyibua, tuakadi tukinangana
Ndi nuambila ne, Halua dituku diadia, bujitu bua dikenga dia musoko au nebutambe bua Sodoma

Moshe ne Arone pamue ne bamfumu dikumi ne babidi ba meku, mfumu umue ku tshisamba umue ku tshisamba, ke bavua babadike bantu balume bonsu, bavua ne bidimu makumi abidi ne pa mutu, bikale ne bukole bua kuenza mudimu mu bisumbu bishilangane bia tshiluilu tshia Izrayele
Tuvua bamane kukuambila ne: Utulekele, tuikale bapika ba bena Ejipitu
Wewe, mukelenge, wakatangila, ekumona, luhingu lunene
Kadi butuku abu mene dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Natana ne, Ya, Wambile muntu wanyi Davidi ne, Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Wewe udi musue kungibakila nsubu wa meme kushikamamu, anyi
Milonda ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole ayi, neyilamakaje makunji onsu adi nunyungulule lupangu
Kabakadi benza tshintu bu etshi mu bukelenge bukuabo to
Eyo, bantu bonso ba mu buloba ebu nebikale ne mudimu wa kubajika; Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Muanda eu neubavuishile lumu lunene mu dituku dindi mmuenesha butumbi buanyi

Davidi wakasungula bansongalume bandi dikumi, wakabatuma kudi Nabala mu Kâmele ne, Yai, numuambike muoyo mu dina dianyi; numuambile nunku, yeye udi ushikama mu bubanji, ne, Ditalala dikale kûdi ne kudi bonso ba mu nsubu webe ne kudi bintu bionso biudi n abi
Hakatshinabo ne, Netuedibue ha mabue, bakela luongo inai mu mai ku tshitaku tshia buatu, bakadi bajinga ne, Buatshiahu
Ku mutu kua mushiku wa mbelu wa tubalu bakuidi bakalongolola, mu ntu ne muntu buludiludi ne nsubu wandi
Kubuejabu dibue dionsu mu disosu dia tshiamu tshia mpawungi

Katataka, Yehowa, wewe udi Nzambi ne wakalaya muntu webe bualu ebu buimpe; katataka uvudishile nsubu wa muntu webe disanka, bua kushaleye ku mpala kuebe tshiendelele; bualu bua tshiudi uvudishile disanka, Yehowa, netshikale ne disanka tshiendelele
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ufunde bionsu bindi mukuambile ebi, bualu ke bidi bijadika ndondu undi mutue nebe ne bena Izrayele bonsu

Hakatshidiye wakula, mukuabo kabidi wakalua, wakamba ne, Hakadi bana bebe ba balume ne bana bebe ba bakashi badia bidia ne banua nvinyo mu nsubu wa mukulu wabo, mena, tshihehele tshikole tshiakafumina ku tshihela, tshiakakuma ku matumba a nsubu anai, nsubu wakuhukila bansongalume, bakafua biabo
Wakenza tshintu tshia kuteka ha mutu ha nsubu ne biseba bia bimpanga bitua mu mai makunze kunzû ne biseba bia nyama ya nkonge bia kuteka ha mutu hatshi
Bantu bakadi ku mutu kua musoko kabakamanya kunakaya anyi malu anakenza; tshiakanza kuambila Bena Yuda anyi bakuidi anyi bantu banene anyi bakadi ku mutu kua musoko anyi benji ba mudimu
Arone kutuuta dikombu pa musulu wa Nile
Kadi muntu wakahidia kumututa

Timote Paulo, mupostolo wa Kilisto Yesu, bua disua dia Nzambi, bu mudi mulayi wa muoyo wa mu Kilisto Yesu, kudi Timote, muan anyi munanga: Ngasa, luse, ditalala bia kudi Nzambi Tatu ne kudi Kilisto Yesu Mukelenge wetu
Badi bamanye muudi ubalama, bualu mu munya udi wenda kumpala kuabu mu divuba, butuku mu tshimunyi tshia kapia
Kings Mukelenge Davidi wakadi muntu mununu, mukoke wa bidimu bia bungi; bakamubikila ne bilulu bia bungi, kadi yeye kakunyua luya

Mu muanda eu nudi bamanye Nyuma wa Nzambi; nyuma yonso udi ujukula ne, Yesu Kilisto wakulua mu mubidi, udi wa kudi Nzambi: ne nyuma yonso udi kai ujukula Yesu, kena wa kudi Nzambi; eu udi nyama wa mufuilakanyi ne Kilisto, unuakunvua lumu luandi ne
Mapangadika aa badi baashintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila
Misangu ya bungi nakadi mbakengesha mu nsunagoga yonso, nakakeba bua kubahendesha Nzambi; bualu bua nakadi n abo lukuna lutambe, nakabakengesha tô ne ku misoko ya bisamba bikuabo
Wakenda mu nshila yonso ya tatu wandi: wakakuatshila mpingu yakasonga tatu wandi mudimu, wakayitendelela
Bualu bua haleba musangu muihi
Nakateka mutshima wanyi ku kumanya ne kujingulula lungenyi ne kusokolola kua malu onso bua meme kumanya buhote bua malu mabi, ne ditshimbakana dia malu a hatuhu
Ndi nuambila ne, Nulombe, nebanuhe; nukebe, nenumone; nukokole, nebanunzuluile
Kadi hakamba hanshi kutoka, Yesu wakadi muimane ku muelelu wa mai; kadi bayidi kabakamumanya ne, NYesu
Nyuma wakabuela munda muanyi hakadiye wakula n anyi ne wakangimanyika kulu
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neabumushe ku mpala kuenu, neabihate ku mesu kuenu: nuenu nenunyenge buloba buabo bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Wakangambila kabidi ne, Muana wa muntu, itabusha mu mutshima webe mei anyi onso andualua kukuambila, ûnvua bimpe mu matshu ebe
Mulombodi wa bena mudimu wa Yozefe kuandamuna ne: Ndi mumvue munuambi amu, mbimpe
Kapitene ka masalayi kakatufila mu bianza bia Yosefe, yeye wakatukuatshisha, tuakashala mu nsubu wa lukanu musangu
Hashishe baminyampala ne bantu bonso bakambila bakuidi ne baprofete ne, Muntu eu kena ne bualu bua kufua, bualu bua yeye wakutuambila dî mu dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu
Katataka, mukelenge wanyi, mesu a Bena Isalele bonso adi kûdi bua wewe kubambila washikama mu nkuasa wa mukelenge wanyi ku nyima kuandi

Wa muanda mutekete wakahongolola luhanza luandi mu luhehele, ne dî dikole diakahatuka mu ntempelo, difuma ku nkuasa wa butumbi, diamba ne, Buakuenjibua; ne miele ya nvula, ne mei, ne mikungulu biakadiku, ne dikanka dinene dia buloba diakadiku; kakuakadi dikanka bu nunku katshia bantu bikala ha buloba, dikanka dia bunene nunku ne dia bukole nunku
Yehowa, wewe udi Nzambi wetu; kuitabushi bua bantu bakuhite bukole
Tshiashadidi mpindiu, bana betu muoyo wen au

Haggai Mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete, mu dituku dia makumi abidi ne dimue dia ngondo, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi muprofete Hagai ne, Ambila Zelubabela, muana wa Shalatiele, gouverneur wa mu Yuda, ne Yoshua, muana wa Yehosadaka, muakuidi munene, ne bantu bonso badi bashale ne, Muntu kai udi mushale munkatshi muenu wakamona nsubu eu mu butumbi buandi diambedi
Matthew Bafalese ne bafundi ba ku Yelushalema bakalua kudi Yesu, bakamuebesha ne, Bayidi bebe badi babengela kutumikila bilele bia bankambua betu tshinyi
Apakashada wakalela Shela; ne Shela wakalela Ebê
Bana ba Sena binunu bisatu ne nkama tshitema ne makumi asatu
Dina dia musoko diakadi Homa
Mutentekedi wakatangila muntu mukuabo ulua lubilu; mutentekedi wakambila mulami wa tshibi ne, Mona muntu mukuabo udi ulua lubilu nkayandi
Midimu yonsu eyi, bayenze anu mushindu umvua meme Maweja Nangila mukuambile
Kamuvua mushindu wa kupita nansha ku dia balume nansha ku dia bakaji

Bakadi ku mutu kua bantu: Palosha, Pahata moaba, Elama, Zatu, Bani, Buni, Azagada, Bebai, Adoniya, Bigewai, Adina, Atê, Hezikiya, Azû, Hodiya, Hashuma, Bezai, Halifa, Anatota, Nobai, Magapiasha, Meshulama, Hezi, Meshezabele, Zadoka, Yadua, Pelataya, Hanana, Anaya, Hoshea, Hananya, Hashuba, Halohesha, Pileha, Shobeka, Lehuma, Hashabena, Mâseya, Ahia, Hanana, Anana, Maluki, Halima ne Bâna
Hakafua Gideona, Bena Isalele bakalukila ku nyima, bakalonda malu a masandi kudi Babala, ne bakavuisha Bâla belita nzambi wabo

Kanudi tshintu tshidifuile: nudi mua kuha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu atshi, yeye atshidie; anyi nudi mua kutshihanyisha muntu wa bende; bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Belâma wakabika ne dinda, wakela tshiseba ha nyima ha mpunda wandi, wakaya ne miloho ya Bena Moaba

Â mmena a bakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Esau ku meku abo ne mu miaba yabo ne ku mena abo mukelenge Timena ne mukelenge Alawa ne mukelenge Yatete ne mukelenge Oholibama ne mukelenge Ela ne mukelenge Pinona, mukelenge Kenaza ne mukelenge Temana ne mukelenge Mibesâ, mukelenge Magadiele ne mukelenge Ilama aba mbakelenge ba Edome, ku miaba yabo mu buloba bua buhianyi buabo Eu udi Esau, nkambua wa Bena Edome
Yakoba wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakangata dibue diakadive musamehu mutu, wakadimanyika bu tshibumba wakela manyi ha mutu hadi

Musoko wakadi tshibuelelu tshia bantu ba bende wakuhuka, wakunzuluka kundi, nengikale ne bintu tente, bualu bua wowo wakubutuka; nunku Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mona, ndi n ebe tshilumbu, wewe musoko wa Tulo, nentume bisamba bia bungi kûdi bua kuluishabi bana benu, bu mudi mai manene alua ne mambuanka
Kadi nuikale badimuke
Kadi nuenu bavua balamate Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, nutshidi bonsu ne muoyi too ne lelu
Kutentekeshi bianza lubilu ha mutu ha muntu; kuikadi ne buobumue ne bantu bakuabo mu malu mabi abo; ulame butoke bua mutshima webe

Bualu bua meme ndi ne bukokeshi ebu, yai bienu, nuvuishe ba bisamba bionso bayidi, nubabatize mu dina dia Tatu ne mu dia Muana ne mu dia Nyuma Muimpe; nubayishe mua kuenza malu onso anakanuambila; ne monai, ndi n enu matuku onso tô ne kunshikidilu kua tshikondo etshi
Yesu wakabalombola tô ne ku muaba wakadi buludiludi ne Betania; wakabisha bianza biandi, wakabasankisha
Kadi bikala muntu kai mumanye mua kukokesha ba mu nsubu wandi, nealame ekelesia wa Nzambi munyi
Muakuidi udi ufila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia wa muntu mukuabo, yeye mene neangate tshiseba tshia mulambu wa kuosha udiye ufila
Yesu wakabambila ne, Nuhe Kaisa bintu bia Kaisa, nuhe Nzambi bintu bia Nzambi
Yeye udi kai ne dinanga udi muikale mu lufu
Ke muakadi tshilota nanku; netulonde dijingulula diatshi ku mpala kua mukelenge

Gideona wakabuela mu nsubu, wakalongolola muana wa mbushi ne mikata ya tshihiminu tshia bukula buakadi kabuyi ne luevene; wakateka munyinyi mu tshisaka ne nsuhu mu luesu, wakalua n abi kudiye muinshi mua mutshi, wakabifila kudiye

Muakuidi neangate umue wa bana balume ba mikoko, neamufile bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne dikoho dia manyi, neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa; yeye neashihe muana mulume wa mukoko kudibo bashihela milambu ya kubindila n ai bubi ne mulambu ya kuosha ha kahia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, mulambu wa disatu buka dia mikenji udi mulambu wa muakuidi bu mudi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, etshi ntshintu tshia tshijila
Bena Yuda bakadisangishaku, bakela Davidi manyi ha mutu bua kumuteka mukelenge wa Bena Yuda
Hakafika bantu ba Davidi kudi Abigayila ku Kâmele, bakamuambila ne, Davidi wakatutuma kûdi bua tuetu kubuangata bu mukashi wandi
Bakadi n anyi bakatangila munya bulelela, kadi kabakajingulula dî dia wakadi wakula n anyi
Kanuena nuenda masandi mu kulonda kuenu kua malu abo a tshinyangu, anyi
Hakabuela Yehu ku tshibi tshia musoko, yeye wakamuebesha ne, Wewe Zimeli, mushihi wa mukelenge webe, ulualua talalâ, anyi
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Manashe nebashikame hehi n andi
Nunku Yehu wakashiha bonso bakashala mu nsubu wa Ahaba mu Yizelele, ne bantu bandi banene bonso, ne balunda bandi bonso ne bakuidi bandi bonso tô ne hakamushiyeye hatuhu
Hakunvua Yesu dî diakambabo, wakambila mukelenge wa nsunagoga ne, Kutshinyi, itabusha anu kuitabusha

Bu Nzambi wa tatu anyi, Nzambi wa Abalahama, ne ditshina dia Isaka kabiyi bikale n anyi, wewe wakadi kuntuma ne bianza bituhu bulelela Nzambi wakutangila dikenga dianyi ne mudimu wa bianza bianyi, ne yeye wakukubela butuku bua lelu

Davidi wakasangisha bana balume ba Alona ne Bena Lewi: ba bana ba Kohata, Uliele mukelenge, ne bana babo lukama ne makumi abidi; ba bana ba Melali, Asaya mukelenge wabo, ne bana babo nkama ibidi ne makumi abidi; ba bana ne bana babo lukama ne makumi asatu; ba bana balume ba Elisafana, Shemaya mukelenge wabo, ne bana babo nkama ibidi; ba bana ba Hebelone, Eliele mukelenge wabo, ne bana babo makumi muanda mukulu; ba bana ba Uziele, Aminadaba mukelenge wabo, ne bana babo lukama ne dikumi ne babidi
Nuenu nuikale balamate kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yehowa nkayandi wakamulombola, kakadi nzambi wa bende kudiye
Pa mukanda wa dîyi mujima, dieela dia tukanda didi dienzeka padibo babiikila dîna ne dîyi dikola
Numanye bienu ne, Yehowa kena munuhe buloba ebu buimpe bu buhianyi bualu bua buakane buenu; bualu bua nudi bantu ba tshitshu
Elisha wakamuebesha ne, Udi musue meme nkuenzele tshinyi
Tshianza tshiakandenga, tshiakantuishisha binu bianyi hanshi ne bianza kabidi
Nudimuke, nutendelela Nzambi; nunku kanuhonyi mu mateyi; mutshima udi musue nunku, kadi mubidi udi mutekete
Bakamba ne, Wakufua
Yakoba wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakangata dibue diakadive musamehu mutu, wakadimanyika bu tshibumba wakela manyi ha mutu hadi
Neikale ne diakalengele, anyi
Biamba dikasa ne, Bualu bua tshiena tshianza, tshiena wa mubidi; bualu ebu kabuena budivuisha ne kadiena dia mubidi
Midimu ya Mulombodi wa Ditunga kayeena ikumbanangana ne bujitu kampanda mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi kansanga to
Nudi nuelangana meshi a tshinyi

Nshobo ya kumudilu yakakuata Yehoyada, mibidi yakakuata Yedaya; misatu yakakuata Halima, mmai yakakuata Seolima, mitanu yakakuata Malakiya, Disambombo yakakuata Miyamina, ya muanda mutekete yakakuata Hakosa, ya muanda mukulu yakakuata Abiya, ya tshitema yakakuata Yeshua, ya dikumi yakakuata Shekanya, ya dikumi ne umue yakakuata Eleyashiba, ya dikumi ne ibidi yakakuata Yakima, ya dikumi ne isatu yakakuata Hupa, ya dikumi ne inai yakakuata Yeshebaba, ya dikumi ne itanu yakakuata Bilega, ya dikumi ne isambombo yakakuata Imê, ya dikumi ne muanda mutekete yakakuata Hezî, ya dikumi ne muanda mukulu yakakuata Hapisese, ya dikumi ne tshitema yakakuata Petahiya, ya makumi abidi yakakuata Yehekezele, ya makumi abidi ne umue yakakuata Yakina, ya makumi abidi ne ibidi yakakuata Gamula, ya makumi abidi ne isatu yakakuata Delaya, ya makumi abidi ne inai yakakuata Mâzaya
Bualu bua muntu udi ne bintu nebamuhe binga; kadi muntu udi kai ne tshintu nebamunyenge tshidiye n atshi
Bakuabo bakamba ne, Tudi tueyeka madimi etu ne madimi a tumuma ne nsubu yetu, bua tusumbe blé bualu bua tshiole tshidiku
Hashala buloba, tshidimu tshia kukuna bintu ne tshidimu tshia kunowa bintu ne tshidimu tshia mashika ne tshidimu tshia luya ne munya ne mîdima kabiena bihanga tshiendelele nansha
Kadi halua tshidimu tshinai, nujidile mamuma onso a mu tshidimu atshi bua kutendelela n au Yehowa
Luai ne ndenalio kunoko, nmutangile
Wewe muenze mundi nkuambila amu, Mvidi Mukulu mukutume kabidi bua kuenza nanku kuena upungila to
Yakobe kubikidisha Leya ne Rakele mu budimi muvuaye ne bimuna biende
Nufile milambu ya ku budisuile, bilondeshile bionsu bidi Maweja Nangila munuenzele
Nempunge n ai tshihungidi tshia ditalala, nengumushe nyama ya luonji mu buloba, bua mikoko ishikame talalâ mu tshihela ne bua ilale tulu muitu
Hakashikisha diabolo mateyi onso, wakamusha tô ne ku tshikondo tshikuabo
Kadi mukashi wa Lota wakatangila ku nyima kuandi, wakakudimuka dibue dia luehu
Mamu wandi wakamulelela diyeka dikese, wakadi ulua n adi ku tshidimu ku tshidimu bakalueye ne bayandi bua kufileye milambu ya ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Bamonyi ba bualu abu bakabamanyisha malu onso akalua kudi wakadi mukuatshike ne bademon, ne malu onso akalua kudi ngulube
Bintu bia kudia kabiakadi mu buloba, bualu bua tshiole tshiakatamba bukole, nunku bantu bonso ba mu Ejipitu ne ba mu buloba bua Kanana bakamba kufua ne nzala
Kubuejaye bana babu bonsu ne Yozefe mu nzubu muende
Bulelela, tshiakalua hakadi Kulaudio mu bukelenge
Bikau bidi bibadibue kudiye bu bisonsa; Tshiseba tshia mu tshiadi tshiandi ne tshia mu difu bidi bu biyoyi bia ngesu; Yeye udi uhunja mai male bua asa be bu mudi mai asaba mu tshivuadi
Nuenu nudi bamanyi banyi ne nakamba ne, Tshiena Kilisto, kadi nakutumibua ku mpala kuandi
Ne mamuma akasamina muoyo webe akasemena kule, ne bintu bionso biakadi bilengele ne bia buneme biakujimina kûdi, ne kabena babisangana kabidi tô tshiendelelele
Bulelela, Muana wa muntu udi uya bu muakasungulabo, kadi mulau neulue kudi wakumutungila tshitungu
Kuitabushi babande mukulu, anu biamubandabo mukana mua bamanyi babidi anyi basatu
Umue udiku udi muimpe; kadi biwasua kubuela mu muoyo, enza mikenshi ya Nzambi
Wewe newenze tshikololo tshia tshiamu tshia or, neufundehu ne, TSHIA TSHIHE A KUDI YEHOWA
Hakatangila Bena Ai ku nyima kuabo, monai, muishi wa musoko ubanda mulu; kabakadi ne bukole bua kunyema luseke elu anyi lukuabo; bakadi banyema ku tshihela bakakudimuna bakadi babalonda
Yeye wakenzaku tshitendelelu, Wakabikila dina dia Yehowa, waka shimikaku ntenta yandi, ne bahika ba Isaka bakimbaku dina dia mai
Bubidi buabo, mulume ne mukashi, bakadi butaka, kabakadi ne bundu

Hakafikeye ha buihi ne tshibuelelu tshia mu musoko, hakadi baluhuka ne muntu mufue, wakadi biandi muana umuehele mulela kudi mamu wandi, mamu wandi wakadi wa mu lufuila; bantu ba bungi ba mu musoko bakadi n andi
Hanatabala, Nzambi, bidi bimpe bua wewe ushihe bantu babi, ne bua Badi bakutombokela ne mei abo mabi, badi n ebe lukuna badi Yehowa, tshiena nkina badi bakukina, anyi
Naomi wakamuambila ne, Muntu au udi wa ha buihi n etu, udi umue wa mu tshiota tshietu
Hanakunvua muadi wabo ne mei â, nakadi ne tshiji tshikole

Biamueneka disama mu nsubu kabidi hashikisheye kumusha mabue ne kukuona munda mua nsubu ne hajinguileye makuabo, muakuidi nealue bua kutangila, ne bikala disama ditampakane mu nsubu, edi ndisama dia nsudi didi mu nsubu, nsubu kena muakane
Tshiena mumanye muntu eu
Bashipe mulume ne mukaji awu
Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Umusha bisabata ku makasa, bualu bua muaba ûdi muimane udi buloba bua tshijila
Matayo Hashishe Nyuma wa Nzambi wakalombola Yesu mu tshihela bua diabolo amuteye

Nukuate mudimu matuku asambombo kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete ndituku dia lumingu dia kuikisha, dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, edi ndituku dia lumingu dia Yehowa mu nsubu yenu yonso
Amen

Yeye udi uha bantu lungenyi, Yehowa udi mumanye meji adi muntu wela ne, Yehowa, disanka didi kudi muntu ûdi wewe ukengesha, bua kumuha biebe ditalala, bua yeye katatshi biandi mu matuku a Bualu bua Yehowa kena wihata bantu bandi, Bualu bua dilumbulula diakane nedihingane kudi badi bakane, Wajuka bua bualu buanyi bua kutantamena bantu babi nganyi
Kadi hûma maminu, yeye neatume bena miele, bualu bua matuku a kunowa akufika
Kenana wakikala ne muoyo bidimu makumi muanda mutekete, wakalela Mahalelela
Kakuena bia kudia, kakuena mai, ne bidia ebi bia tshianana biakututonda
Ku mibangu ya tshilambuilu atshi, unyungululaku mukaba wa tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Wewe neusumbe bahika balume ne bahika bakashi kudi bisamba bia bantu badi hehi n ebe
Muambi uvua udiambila bualu abu nkayende
Kubatekabu kabidi mikaba milengeja ne buanda bukole bua ndanda, busambakaja ne bua miosa ya nyama bufikuluke, bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzuu, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Bualu bua bantu bonso nebikale ne mukenji umue kunudi ne kudi muenyi udi munkatshi muenu ku bikondo bienu bionso: muenyi neikale bu nuenu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Yeshaya muprofete wakadila kudi Yehowa, yeye wakahingisha mundidimbi wakamana kuhueka ku tshibandilu tshia diba tshia Ahaza ku nyima biendedi dikumi
Kadi, bitaku nebikale bia tshiamu tshikunze
Hakamutantamenabo ne hakamuhendabo, yeye wakabanyukuila bilulu, wakabambila ne, Mashi enu ikale ha mitu henu, meme tshiena ne bualu; katataka tô ne tshiendelele nenye kudi bisamba bia bende
Sibekai, Muena Husha wa Bena Zela, wakadi kapitene ka tshisumbu tshia mu ngondo wa muanda mukulu; mu tshisumbu tshiandi muakadi bantu binunu makumi abidi ne binai
Hakatangila dragon ne, Nakuedibua ha buloba, wakakengesha mukashi wakalela muana mulume
Umuandamune ne: Mbia muena mudimu webe Yakobe
Bualu bua matu a ku Kitima nealue kudiye ne nvita, ne mutshima wandi neuneme bujitu
Davidi wakakonka Yehowa ne, Nenye bua kushiha Bena Peleshete aba, anyi
Hakashika argent yonso ya mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ya mu buloba bua Kanana, hashishe Bena Ejipitu bonso bakalua kudi Yosefe, bakamuambila ne, Utuhe bia kudia, netufuile ku mesu kuebe bualu kai
Nanku pikala bena Izrayele bonsu bumvua bualu ebu, nebatshine
Udisungile, utusungile
Amba biebe ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Neumanye mua kudiunda, anyi
Tshiakatemena Yobo, bualu bua yeye wakadingisha, kakabingisha Nzambi
Bu mudi makenga a Kilisto akumbana kutudi, nunku bua Kilisto busambi buetu budi bukumbana kabidi
Bualu bua bu malu a kukema akenjibua munkatshi muenu, menjibue mu Tulo ne mu Sidona, bakadi kukudimuna mitshima yabo kale, baluate bilulu bikayabala, balale mu butue
Yakobe kuya mu Ejipitu ne ndelanganyi yende yonsu
Hakahita matuku makese, muana muakunyi wakasangisha bintu biandi bionso, wakaya mu luendu kule ku luseke lukuabo; wakatangadishaku bintu biandi bionso ku malu mabi akenzenzeye
Muakunyetu wa mukala mmushale kudi tatu
Moshe kuela ndelanganyi ya bena Levi lupemba, wamba ne: Maweja Nangila, udi mupeshe batuangaji, ndelanganyi ya Levi, Urime ne Tumime, bintu bia tshijila, bualu badi bakuitaba muabu muonsu
Yesu wakabambila ne, Balunda ba mubaki wa mukashi badi bamanye mua kudila muadi hatshidi mubaki wa mukashi n abo, anyi
Bakalua kudiye, bakamubisha ku tulu, bakamba ne, Mukelenge, Mukelenge, tudi tufua
Hilama wakumuka mu Tulo bua kumoneye misoko yakamuha Solomo; kayakamusakisha
Mulume wakamba ne, Bua bualu ebu mulume neashiye tatu andi ne mamu andi, nealamate mukashi wandi, bubidi buabo nebikale mubidi umue
Bana ba balume ba Zela: Zimeli ne Etana ne Hemana ne Kalakola ne Dala; buonso buabo batanu
Uteke mabue awu mu mushete
Meme ndi bu wewe, bantu banyi badi bu bantu bebe, tubalu tuanyi tudi bu tubalu tuebe

Hashishe Esetê mukelenge mukashi wakamukudimuna ne, Bingikala musangane luse ku mesu kuebe, mukelenge, biasua mukelenge, basungile muoyo wanyi ku dilomba dianyi ne basungile bantu banyi ku disengelela dianyi; bualu bua didi bahanyibue, meme ne bantu banyi, bua kubutudibua ne bua kushihibua ne bua kujimishibua

Balaame kubenga wamba ne: Balake nansha yeye muntumine tshiamu tshia mpawungi tshionsu, ne tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole tshionsu, tshidiye natshi mu nzubu wende wa bukalenga, tshiena mua kubenga diyi dia Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wanyi, ku kalu nansha kamue to
Muntu yonso wa munkatshi muabo wakadi ne tshilonda tshiandi mu tshianza tshiandi
Bubanji ne Lumu Lunene bia Solomo Bak
Yesu wakamba ne, Malia
Tshibangidilu Diledibua dia Ismayele Sarayi, mukaji wa Abrame, kavua mulele muana to

Nutumikile badi banukokesha, nubakokele; bua bobo badi bikale ne tshitabala bua mioyo yenu, bu bantu balua kubadila Nzambi bintu; bua bobo benze bualu ebu ne disanka, kabai ne manunganyi, bua bualu ebu kabuena bamukuatshisha

Yeye wakadi mumiamina ha buloba buakadi ha mutu ha mabue udi unvua dî dia Nzambi, udi uditabusha lubilu ne disanka; kadi yeye kena ne muji munda muandi, udi ushala tshituha tshihi; halua dikenga anyi lutatu bualu bua dî dia Nzambi, yeye udi ulenduka lubilu
Bakaya mu Kapênuma; dituka dia Lumingu lua Bayuda yeye wakabuela mu nsunagoga, wakabayisha Diyisha diandi diakabakemesha, bualu bua yeye wakabayisha bu muena mei, kakadi bu bafundi
Hashishe mukelenge wa Isalele wakasangisha baprofete bu nkama inai, wakabebesha ne, Nye kuluangana ne Bena Lamota gilada, anyi nshale
Wewe udi bu nganyi mu butumbi ne bunene buebe munkatshi mua mitshi ya mu Edene
Bakumuka mu Pihahilota, bakahita munkatshi mua dishiba dia mai bakaya mu tshihela bakaya luendu lua matuku asatu mu tshihela tshia Etama, bakashikama mu Mala
Nuvuluke Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, nukumbaje meyi ne mikenji biende, bindi nnuambila lelu ebi
Bua bualu ebu mbuakankuatshila Bena Yuda mu ntempelo, bakeba kunshiha
Kadi tushale bua bakaji bakamba, bana ba nshiya, ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu
Kanungu ka Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia mu polovensa ke tshitupa tshifidi tshia ngenyi tshia polovensa

Judges Ebi mbisamba bia bantu biakashiya Yehowa biakateteye n abi Bena Isalele, bonso bakadi kabayi bamanye nvita ya Bena Kanâna; anu bua bikondo bikuabo bia Bena Isalele kumanyabi nvita, bungi buabo kabuakadi bumanye nvita diambedi; â mmena abo: bakelenge batanu ba Bena Peleshete, ne Bena Kanâna bonso ne Bena Sidona, ne Bena Hiwi bakadi bashikama ku mukuna wa Lebanona, ku mukuna wa Bâla hêmona tô ne ku mukalu wa Hamata
Binatendelela mu muaku undi tshî mumanye, nyuma wanyi udi utendelela, kadi meshi anyi kêna wenza bualu

Ne nuenu, bakadi diambedimbedi ba bende ne bena lukuna n andi mu meshi enu bua bienzedi bienu bibi, katataka yeye wakulengeshangana n enu mu mubidi wandi wa ha buloba bualu bua lufu luandi, bua kunuteka ku mesu kuandi bu bantu ba tshijila, badi kabai ne tshilema ne badi kabai mua kubandibua ku mpala kuandi; binuananukila mu ditabusha, bajadikibua ne bashindikibue bikole, ne kanui basesuishibue ku ditekemena dia lumu luimpe lunuakunvua, luakambibua munkatshi mua bifukibua bionso munshi mua diulu; lunakavuishibua, meme Paulo, muena mudimu walu
Isalele udi ushikama biandi talalâ, mpokolo wa Yakoba udi ha nkayandi mu madimi a blé ne a nvinyo mihia mihia: ne matutu andi adi amatshisha dibungi

Bulelela, kabakudia bidia bia kuhita kua Yehowa nunku ku matuku a balumbuluishi bakalumbuluila Bena Isalele nansha mu matuku onso a bakelenge ba Isalele nansha a bakelenge ba Yuda; kadi bakadila Yehowa bidia bia kuhita kua Yehowa mu Yelushalema mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia bukelenge bua Yoshiya
Nunku usangishe bantu badi bashala, utshintshimike musoko, ûnyenga; binanyenga musoko, nebawidike dina dianyi
Wakumukudimuna ne, Tshiakakubikila, muan anyi, ya ulale biebe
Nunku numanye bienu ne, Nenufue ku muele wa nvita, ku tshiole ne ku tshihuhu mu muaba unudi basue kuya bua kushikama
Bakabakengesha bakadi ne bukole, bobo kabakadi ne musambi
Monai nyunyu ya mu diulu, kaitu yakuna maminu, kaitu yahuola, kaitu yasangisha bintu mu mayeba, kadi Tatu wenu udi mu diulu utu waidisha

Tshilota tshiebe ne bikena kumona biwakumona ku mutu webe mu bulalu bidi nunku: Wewe, mukelenge, wakadi welangana meji mu bulalu buebe a malu atshidi ku mpala; yeye au udi usokolola malu masokoka wakukulesha malu atshidi ku mpala
Bidimu bia Malaleyele bidi nkama muanda mukulu makumi tshitema ne bitanu
Bana ba Lâdana, bana ba Bena Gêshona ba Lâdana, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ba Lâdana, Muena Gêshona: Yehieli
Kuamiaminaye Arone, ne ku bilamba biende

Bena Isalele bakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa, bakatendelela Babala ne Bashatelota ne nzambi ya Bena Sulia ne nzambi ya Bena Sidona ne nzambi ya Bena Moaba ne nzambi ya Bena Amona ne nzambi ya Bena Peleshete; bakalekela Yehowa, ka bakamuenzela mudimu
Kadi lumu luandi tuakatamba kumuangalaka; bantu ba bungi bakahia bua kunvua dî diandi, ne bua kubakolesheye ku matekete abo
Yozefe kusumbisha bena Ejipitu ne bena Kenaane biakudia, wela makuta onsu mu mushete wa mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Tatu wa muana wakela dî diandi lukasa ne, Ndi ngitabusha; unkuatshishe, umane mpata yanyi
Mose wakabandisha tshianza tshiandi, wakakuma dibue ne mulangala wandi misangu ibidi, mai a bungi akabuluka, ne bantu bonso bakanua, ne bimuna biabo

Uzole tukoho tusatu bu bilongo bia amande mu ditamba dimue, dihu ne tshilongo dihu ne tshilongo, uzole tukoho tusatu bu bilongo bia amande mu ditamba dikuabo, dihu ne tshilongo dihu ne tshilongo, uzole nunku ku matamba asambombo adi masa ku tshitekelu
Muntu utu wenza bimpe udi wa Nzambi; muntu utu wenza bibi, kena muanze kumona Nzambi
Yoshua wakababikila, wakabambila ne, Bualu kai nuakatudinga ne, Tudi ba kule, nuenu bikale anu munkatshi muetu
Bobo nebangate mashi, nebâmiamine ku mutshi wa ha mutu ha mushiku wa mbelu ne ku biluwa bibidi bia mushiku wa mbelu wa nsubu mudibo bamudîla
Uvuluishe bantu malu â, ubambila bikole ku mesu kua Mukelenge bua bobo kabatandanganyi bualu bua mei adi kâi ne mudimu ne adi ahambuisha bantu badi baunvua

Luka Bualu bua bantu ba bungi bakabanga kufunda malu au akenjibua munkatshi muetu, akatuambilabo kudi bamonyi ne benji badi, nakuelangana meshi munda, Mukelenge Teofilo, ne, Mbimpe bia meme kabidi kukufundila malu au malondolola biakane, bualu bua meme nakualonda bimpe ku tshibangidilu tshiau tô ne katataka; bua wewe umanye ne, Malu akukumanyishabo adi malelela
Mukashi wakimita difu, wakalela muana wa balume, hakamumoneye ne muana muimpe, wakamusokoka ngondo isatu

Bakadi bûle tente ne malu onso adi kâi makane, ne malu mabi, ne kusaminangana kua mioyo, ne lukinu; bakadi bûle tente ne mukau, kushibangana, kutandangana, lubombo, lukuna; bena minunganu, bena bunsonge, bena lukuna ne Nzambi, bena dikamakama, badisu, bafunyifunyi, babangi ba malu mabi mahia mahia, bahidi ba mei a baledi babo, bantu bakadi kabai ne meshi, bakadi kabai balama mei akahungabo, bakadi kabai ne dinanga bu dia bantu, bakadi kabai ne mitshima ya luse
Samuele wakadiunda, Yehowa wakadi n andi; kakalekela nansha dî dimue hanshi diakamuambileye
Tuetu kubutula misoku eyi ne bantu bonsu ba wamu, balume, bakaji ne bana, anu bu mutuvua benze mu ditunga dia Sihone, mukalenga wa Eshebone
Pikala ngombe nansha mpunde wa bende mufuile mu tshiina tshia mayi tshishale buashi, nansha tshiumbula katshiyi tshibuikila, muena tshiina neafute tshibawu

Nenvuishe mei akuhungabo kudi ba mu Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema mei a tshianana mu muaba eu; nembahoneshe ku muele wa nvita mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo ne mu bianza bia badi bakeba mioyo yabo; nenfile bitalu biabo kudi nyunyu ya mulu ne kudi nyama ya ha buloba bu bia kudia biai
Kadi biwatshina mua kuya nkayebe, uye ku tshitudilu ne Pula, muena mudimu webe; wewe neunvue mei adibo bambilangana; hashishe bianza biebe nebikoleshibue bua kuhueka mu tshitudilu
Hakabutuleye bisamba muanda mutekete mu buloba bua Kanâna, wakabaha buloba buabo bu buhianyi tô bidimu bu nkama inai ne makumi atanu
Numanye bienu ne muan etu wa mu Kilisto Timote wakulekedibua mu lukanu; ne bialueye lubilu, nendue n andi kunumona
Mutu webe udi ufuanangana ne mukuna wa Kâmele; nsuki ya ku mutu webe idi bu bintu bikunzubile; mukelenge udi muvuishibue bu muhika bua bulengele buai
Mpunde kuambila Balaame ne: Meme ndi mpunde webe
Umue wabo wakakanka muntu wakadi muluate bilulu bia lin, wakadi umueneka ku mutu kua mai a musulu, ne, Malu â a kukema neashike tshikondo kai
Bakabuela mu nsubu wa Bâla: bakatamba kûsha nsubu wa Bâla tente tô ne kundekelu kuandi
Alona wakalela Nadaba ne Abihu ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ

Ezekiel Wakalua n anyi mu ntempelo, wakidikisha makunshi a ku mbelu, akadi coudées Butshiama bua mushiku wa mbelu buakadi coudées dikumi, tshibi tshia ku luseke ne ku luseke lua mushiku tshiakadi ne butshiama bua coudées itanu
Hakashikishau kumuseka, akamuvula tshikowelu tshikunze, akamuluatshisha bilulu biandi

Mose wakambila Alona ne, Semena ha buihi ne tshioshelu, ufile mulambu webe wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mulambu webe wa kuosha ha kahia, udibuikidile bubi buebe ne bubi bua bantu, ufile mulambu wa bantu kabidi bua kubabuikidila n au bubi buabo bu muakamba Yehowa
Enza tshiamu tshilukibue bu munyingu ne nkanu mai ya tshiamu tshia mitaku ku matumba atshi anai
Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Bundi n abu mbua kukudimusha misangu bungi munyi bua wewe kungambila anu malu malelela mu dina dia Yehowa
Meku onsu a bena Isakare aa avua ne bantu balume

Bua, bu mutudi ne bituha bia bungi mu mubidi umue, ne bituha bionso kabiena ne mudimu muomumue, nunku, tuetu, bantu ba bungi, tudi mubidi umue musangila mu Kilisto, ne kudi muntu ne muntu, tudi tuikalangana bu bituha bia bakuabo

Numbers Yehowa wakambila Mose mu tshihela tshia Sinai mu ngondo wa kumudilu wa tshidimu tshibidi tshiakaluhukabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne, Bena Isalele nebadie bintu bia kuhita kua Yehowa mu tshikondo tshinakasungula

Mose wakabatuma ku nvita, bantu tshinunu ku tshisamba ku tshisamba, Pinehasa, muana mulume wa Eleazâ muakuidi, wakaya n abo ne bintu bikuabo bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne mpungi ya kuela n ai dî dikole mu tshianza tshiandi

Bena Netinima: bana ba Kelosa, bana ba Siaha, bana ba Padona, bana ba Lebana, bana ba Hagaba, bana ba Akuba, bana ba Hagaba, bana ba Shamelai, bana ba Hanana, bana ba Gidela, bana ba Gahâ, bana ba Leaya, bana ba Lesini, bana ba Nekoda, bana ba Gasama, bana ba Uza, bana ba Pasea, bana ba Besai, bana ba Asena, bana ba Meunima, bana ba Nefisima, bana ba Bakâhuka, bana ba Hakufa, bana ba Hâhû, bana ba Baseluta, bana ba Mehida, bana ba Hâsha, bana ba Bâkosa, bana ba Sisela, bana ba Tema, bana ba Nesiya ne bana ba Hatifa
Matuku au bakadi ne muena lukanu wa lumu lunene, dina diandi Balaba
Hakatshiabu bakabika Bena Ashedodo, monai, Dagona wakadi mudishinde mutue mpala hanshi ku mpala kua mushete wa Yehowa
Yesu wakandamuna ne, Dî edi kadiakuluila bua bualu buanyi, diakuluila bua bualu buenu
bua muntu udi ubenga Nzambi kamanyi mua kukokesha, kamanyi mua kukuata bantu mu buteyi

Hakambileye muntu wakadi muluate tshivualu tshia lin ne, Angata kahia kakuabo ka munkatshi mua nkata idi inyunguluka, ku muaba wa hankatshi ha bakeluba, muntu eu wakabuelamu, wakimana hehi ne nkata mukuabo
Bualu mudimu ewu udi mupite bukole
Kayafa nguakaha Bena Yuda lungenyi ne, Mbimpe bia muntu umue kufuila bantu
Wewe ubambile ne, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Nuai bienu, nukuatshike maluvu au, nuluke, nudishinde, kanujuki kabidi, bualu bua muele wa nvita undi ntuma munkatshi muenu
Kadi nuenu ka nuakunvua dî dianyi
