Kadi bakuidi banene ba Nzambi ne bafundi ba bantu bakakeba mua kumushiha; kabakamanya mua kuenza bualu, bua bantu bakadi bamunguile, batelesha mei andi
Hashishe mukelenge wakambila Amasa ne, Umbikidile Bena Yuda bonso, badisangishe kunoko hahita matuku asatu, wewe wikaleku
Yeye wakadi mushikame mu nsubu wa Lewi udia bidia; basangishi ba mulambu ba bungi ne bantu babi bakadi bashikame ne Yesu ne bayidi bandi, bakadi ba bungi, benda bamulonda

Nunku Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua nuenu nuakutamba ba mu bisamba bidi binunyunguluka kutomboka, kanuakulonda mikenji yanyi, kanuakutumikila mei anyi, kadi nuakulonda mikenji mene ya bisamba bidi binunyunguluka, bua muanda eu Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, meme ndi nnubela, meme hanyi, ne nennulumbuluishe ku mpala kua bisamba bikuabo
Ba bungi bakamudingila, kadi mei abo kâkakanangana
bihesa bia bidia bidi bishale, tshintu katshijiminyi
Mu mushete amu utekemu mabue, adi ne mikenji ingakupesha, idi ijadika ndondu
Muaba awu kutuadijabu kuenda buendenda ne bakaji ba bena Mowabe

Bana balume ba bimbi ba misambu bakadisangisha hohamue, bafume ku nseke yonso yakadi minyunguluke Yelushalema ne ku misoko ya Bena Netofa, ne ku Bete gilegala ne ku nseke ya Geba ne Azamaweta; bualu bua bimbi ba misambu bakasa misoko yabo minyunguluke Yelushalema
Bienza muntu bualu bubi budi Yehowa uhidia, kayi mumanye bualu, yeye neahile, neadituadile dihila dia bubi buandi
Bule bua mahuahua abo buakadi coudées itanu: ku lusongo lua dihuahua dimue tô ne dinga kuakadi coudées dikumi
Bayifile kudi bena mabaya ne bibaki ba nsubu ne bahandi ba mabue, ne bua kusumba n ai mabaya ne mabue masonga a kulongolola n au nsubu
Nempe bantu bebe badi bataha mitshi bihiminu bia bukula binunu makumi abidi ne bia orge binunu makumi abidi; ne bihiminu bia nvinyo binunu makumi abidi ne bia manyi binunu makumi abidi
Yeye wakamba ne, Eu mmukete wa dihita dia Yehowa, mukete wa dihitshibua dia Bena Sulia; bualu bua wewe neutahe Bena Sulia bikole mu Afeke, tô ne hawahabutula

Bena Ngilaade bavua basangile kabidi ne meku aa: diku dia bena Iyezere, ndelanganyi ya bena Iyezere; dia bena Eleke, ndelanganyi ya Eleke; dia bena Asriyele, ndelanganyi ya Asriyele; dia bena Shekeme, ndelanganyi ya Shekeme; dia bena Shemida, ndelanganyi ya Shemida; ne dia bena Efere, ndelanganyi ya Efere
Nowa mayi ku makasa, nulale
Numanye ne: musenga awu ntshintu tshienu tshia tshijila
Butumbi bua Yehowa buakumuka ku mbelu kua nsubu, buakimana ha mitu ha bakeluba
Bungi bua bantu bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo, bena nvita ba bukitu, buakadi binunu bibidi ne nkama isambombo
Bena mudimu bakenza mudimu wabo; mudimu wakenda bimpe mu bianza biabo, bakalongolola nsubu wa Nzambi bu muakadiye diambedi, bakamuakasha
Yesu wakamukudimuna ne, Katataka kuena mumanye mua kundonda kunaya, kadi hashishe neundonde
Yeye udi ukukengesha bualu bua wewe udi umutshina, Bubi buebe kabuena bunene, anyi

Hashishe bakulu ba mu musoko wandi nebamubikile, nebasombe n andi; ne himaneye, wamba ne, Tshiena musue kumuangata, hashishe mukashi wa muan abo nealue kudiye ku mesu kua bakulu, neambulule tshisabata ku dikasa diandi, neamutuile lute ku mesu; neamuambile ne, Nebenzele mulume nunku udi uhidia kudiundisha nsubu wa muan abo mulume
Elihu wakadi muindile Yobo ne mei a kumuambila, bualu bua bantu aba bakadi ne bidimu bihite biandi bungi
Yeshaya wakambila Hezikiya ne, Unvue biebe dî dia Yehowa
Eu mmuanda mukuabo kabidi: wakuangata bana bebe ba balume ne bana bebe ba bakashi bawakundelela, wakubafila bu milambu ya kuosha kudibi bua biobi bibadie
Kuinyikaye muana awu dina ne Zebulone

Muakuidi muela manyi ha mutu neangate mashi makuabo a muana wa ngombe, nealue n au mu ntenta wa kusangakena, muakuidi neafue munu wandi mu mashi, neamiamine mashi misangu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua tshilulu tshikudika tshidi hankatshi ha nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Meme nakenza bualu bubi hanakadihuekesha bua nuenu nubandishibue, bualu bua nakanuambila lumu luimpe lua Nzambi tshi ne difutu, anyi
Hatukai mu buloba bua ku node, nyemai, bualu bua nakanutangalasha ku mpehele inai ya diulu, Wewe Siona, nyema, wewe udi mushikame ne muana mukashi wa Babulona
Ndi mbalombela; tshiena ndombela ba ha buloba, ndi ndombela anu bawakumpa; bualu bua bobo badi banyi; bintu bionso bidi bianyi mbiebe, biebe mbianyi kabidi; ndi ntumbishibua munda muabo
Bakimba dina dia mai dikuabo, bakaditandila kabidi

Ebelu Nunku, bana betu ba tshijila, babanyanganyi ba dibikila dia mu diulu, nuelangane meshi bua Mupostolo ne Muakuidi Munene wa dijukula dia ditabusha dietu, Yesu mene; wakadi wa kueyemenyibua kudi wakamuteka mu mudimu, bu muakadi Mose kabidi mu nsubu mua Nzambi muonso

Alona neatentekashe bianza biandi bibidi ha mutu ha mbushi udi ne muoyo, neatondele Bena Isalele mabi yabo ne disambuka diabo dionso dia mikenji ne malu mabi abo onso, neatentekashe malu mabi onso ha mutu ha mbushi, nebamuihate mu tshihela ku tshianza tshia muntu wakasunguleye diambedi, mbushi neatuale bujitu bua mibi yabo mu muaba wa hatuhu, neihate mbushi mu tshihela
Hakikila nyunyu ya bikololo ha bitalu ebi, Abalama wakayihata
Mu tshidimu tshia makumi atanu tshia bukelenge bua Uziya, mukelenge wa Yuda, Pekaya, muana wa Menahema, wakabanga kukokesha Bena Isalele mu Samalea; wakabakokesha bidimu bibidi
Mose mene wakamba ne, Mukelenge Nzambi neanubishile muprofete wa munkatshi mua bana benu, bu muakambisheye meme; nenutumikile mei andi onso anuambileye
Kabakamanya mua kumukuata ku mei ku mesu kua bantu; bakakema bua dî diakakudimuneye, bakahua

Neafue mulambu wandi bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, neumushe dianyi didi dibuikila bintu bia munda ne dianyi dionso didi ha mutu ha bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi didi ha mutu hatu hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne lua tumuma kabidi neabiumushe
Bushuwa, kuena mutufikishe mu ditunga didi ne biakudia bia bungi to
Ku tshikondo atshi Davidi wakadi mu musoko wa lumbu, ne masalayi Bena Peleshete akadi mu Beteleheme

Hashishe dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya mu Tapanehese ne, Angata mabue manene mu bianza biebe, wateke mu tshimama tshia matafuadi a mu tshiendelu tshidi ku tshibuelelu tshia ku nsubu wa Palô udi mu Tapanehese
Bualu bua muntu yonso udi ne bintu, nebamuhe binga, neikale ne bia bungi; kadi muntu yonso udi kai ne tshintu, nebamunyenge tshidiye n atshi

Yesu wakadi ubanda ku Yelushalema, mu nshila yeye wakangata bayidi bandi nkayabo, wakabambila ne, Unvuai, tudi tubanda ku Yelushalema; nebafile Muana wa muntu mu bianza bia bakuidi banene ba Nzambi ne bia bafundi; bobo nebamuhishe ne lufu, nebamufile mu bianza bia bantu ba mu bisamba bia bende, bamuseke, bamukume, bamushihe ku mutshi mutshiamakane; kadi hahita matuku asatu yeye neabishibue
Neampingaje ku mudimu webe

Muntu wakalua, dina diandi Yailo, yeye wakadi mukelenge wa nsunagoga; wakadiela ku makasa a Yesu, wakamutendekena ne, Ulue mu nsubu wanyi; bualu bua wakadi ne muana mukashi umuehele, wakadi bu bidimu dikumi ne bibidi; yeye wakamba kufua
Kadi Mvidi Mukulu mmungambuluishe
Bayidi bakakonkangana ne, Bakulua ne bia kudia kudiye, anyi
Dî edi, Musangu umue mukuabo, didi ditulesha diumusha dia bintu bidi bizakashibua bu bintu bienjibua, bua bintu bidi kabi bizakashibua bishale
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu udi wenda kumpala kuenu
Numuimbile misambu, numuimbile misambu ya kumutumbisha n ai, nuyikilangane bua malu andi onso a kukema
Buonso buetu tuakuangata tshiuwidi tshiandi, ne ngasa ha mutu ha ngasa
Bangate muana mulume wa ngombe ne mulambu wandi wa bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, wewe newangate muana mulume wa ngombe mukuabo bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi

Wakamuluatshisha tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi, wakateka Ulima ne Tumima mu tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi, wakasa tshifulu ku mutu kuandi, wakasuika tshitotolo tshia tshiamu tshia or, tshintu tshia tshijila, ku mpala kua tshifulu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nempe bamanyishi banyi babidi bukole, ne nebambe dî dia Nzambi matuku tshinunu ne nkama ibidi ne makumi asambombo, baluatshisha bilulu bia miosa
Nenulele bana balume ne bana bakashi, kadi bobo kabena benu, bualu bua bobo nebaye mu buluka
Etshi kantshishelele tshiakahatulabo mu kahia, anyi
Dituku dia kabutu, nembasombuele, bua bapete difutu dia buenzayi buabu
Muntu au wakumuka, wakambila Bena Yuda ne, Wakankolesha udi Yesu
Samuele wakambila Yishai ne, Yehowa kena musungule aba

Munkatshi mua tshisamba tshia Gada: Lamota wa mu Gilada ne miaba ya ku matshika, tshimenga tshia kunyemenabo kudi mushihianganyi, ne Mahanayima ne miaba ya ku matshika, Heshebona ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Yazê ne miaba ya ku matshika: bimenga bionso binai
Abimeleke ne bisumbu biakadi n andi bakaya lubilu, bakimana ku tshibi tshia musoko, ne bisumbu bibidi biakaya, biakatantshila bonso bakadi mu tshisuku, bakabashiha
Nyuma wakambila Filipo ne, Ya ha buihi, ulamate ku dikalu edi
Yeye wakalongolola tshibi tshia ku nsubu wa Yehowa
Kadi muntu udi wenza bualu bubi ne mutshima mukole nansha muntu mulela munkatshi muenu nansha muenyi, muntu au udi uhenda Yehowa, nebamumushe munkatshi muabo

Bena nvita nehalue kudiye babatumineye mukenji, nebanyange tshitendelelu ne muaba muasa ne ngumbu ya nvita, nebalekeshe diosha dia mulambu wa kuosha wa buatshia buatshia, nebajadike tshinyangu tshia dibutuka Bua milayi yandi ya lubombo ne mashimi neanyange bantu aba badi bahidia tshihungidi; kadi bantu badi bamanye Nzambi wabo nebatantamane, nebenze malu makole
Petelo wakaya ne Yesu, wakabanga kumubela ne, Nzambi akufue luse, Mukelenge; bualu ebu kabuena bulua kûdi
Meme nembabishile muprofete munkatshi mua bana babo bu wewe; meme nenteke mei anyi onso mukana muandi, ne yeye neabambile mei onso anamuambila
Bualu muoyi wa tshintu udi mu mash atshi
Kadi Abashaloma wakanyema
Yeye wakalua kudi mukelenge Solomo, wakamuenzela mudimu wandi wonso
Yehoyakina wakadia ku mesu kuandi matuku onso a muoyo wandi; mukelenge wakamuha bintu biandi bia buatshia buatshia matuku onso a muoyo wandi

Buakabuluibua kudibo, ne kabakadikuatshila, bobo bine, malu â mudimu, kudi bakanakuatshilau nuenu mudimu, malu mene akanumanyishabo katataka kudi bantu bakanuambila lumu luimpe mu Nyuma Muimpe wakanutuminabo mufume mu diulu; malu adi banjelo basue kutangilatangila
Wewe newasuike bu tshimanyinu ku tshianza tshiebe, ne hankatshi ha makiki
Bakamulelela bana ba balume muanda mutekete ne bana ba bakashi basatu
Mukuabo wakamba dî dikuabo ne mukuabo dî dikuabo
Dîba edi Minisitila kavulambedi udi ufila mukanda wa dilekele dia mudimu dia Bukalenga bunene kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga mu mêba makumi abidi ne anaayi
Yeye wakakonka Yesu ne, Mikenshi kai

Wewe newambile muan ebe wa balume mu matshu, ne muana wa muan ebe wa balume, malu anakuenza mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne bimanyinu bianyi binakuenza munkatshi muabo, bua nuenu numanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Hakatshia butuku banjelo bakenzesha Lota ne, Bika biebe, wangate mukashi webe ne bana bebe bakashi babidi badiku diambedi kanuyi banze kufua mu dikenga dia musoko eu

Nyama ya mu tshihela neyisangakaneku ne nyama mikuabo idi idila, Tshihungulu netshienze disua diatshi, netshiele mayi, Nukebe dî edi mu mukanda wa Yehowa, nudibale; Yeye wakuyelela nshobo, Isaiah Tshihela ne buloba bûme nebikale ne disanka; netshimeneshe bilongo bia bungi, Nukoleshe bianza bidi bitekete, Nuambile badi ne mitshima ikuma lubilu lubilu ne, Mu dituku adi mesu a mufofo matabale, Mu diba adi muntu mulema neatuhike bu ngulungu, Lusenga Tshibebe tshikaleku, ne nshila, Kakuena kuikalamu nyama wa ntambue, Bantu badi Yehowa muhikule nebahingane, Isaiah Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshinai tshia bukokeshi bua mukelenge Hezikiya, Saneheliba, mukelenge wa Ashû, wakalua, wakaluangana ne bena misoko yonso ya ngumbu ya mu Yuda, wakayinyenga

Ahazaya wakakuluka mu tusoso tua mabaya a madidishi a ku nsubu wandi wa kulu wa mu Samalea, wakasama; wakabikila ba messager bandi, wakabambila ne, Yai bienu kudi Bâla zebuba, nzambi wa mu Ekelona, numuebeshe ne, Meme nensangale ku disama edi, anyi
Hakumukabo ku Lefidima ne hakafikabo ku tshihela tshia Sinai, bakashikama mu tshihela, Bena Isalele bakashimika ntenta ku mpala kua mukuna

Zechariah Mu ngondo wa muanda mukulu wa tshidimu tshibidi tshia bukokeshi bua Dayawesha, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Zekâya, muana wa Belekiya, muana wa muprofete Ido, diamba ne, Yehowa wakadi ne batatu benu tshiji tshikole
Bantu aba bakabika, bakatangila ku Sodoma, ne Abalahama wakaya kubashindikila mu nshila

Akisha wakakudimuna baminyampala ba Bena Peleshete ne, Eu ke nDavidi, muntu wa Shaula, mukelenge wa Isalele, wakadi n anyi matuku â, nansha bidimu ebi, undi tshiyi musangane bualu bubi kudiye ku dituku diakalueye tô ne katataka, anyi
Nunku bialenduisha bia kudia muan etu wa mu Kilisto, tshiena ndia munyinyi tô ne tshiendelele, bua tshilenduishi muan etu
Muntu udi wela meshi ne, Ndi mumanye bualu, yeye kena muanze kumanye bu mudiye ne bualu bua kumanya; kadi biananga muntu Nzambi, yeye udi mumanyibue kudi Nzambi
Hakafika bansongalume ba Davidi kudi Nabala, bakamuambila mei au mu dina dia Davidi, bakahuwa
Kadi pikala mulambu awu wa bintu bilamba mu luesu, udi ne bua kuikala bukula busambakaja ne mafuta

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu dituku didiu uhueka mu Muaba wa Bafue nengashishe dilembue dia musulu muadi bualu buau, nenkande misulu yadi, misulu minene neyilekele kuenda; nengashishe Lebanona muadi bualu buau, ne mitshi yonso ya mu mpata neyitekete ne kanyinganyinga bualu buau
Bakalua ne mushete wa Yehowa, wakauteka mu muaba wau mu ntenta wakawashila Davidi
Ubikile Yishai ku tshishihelu, nenkuleshe bualu bûdi ne bua kuenza; wewe newele manyi ha mutu ha undi nkuambila dina diandi

Yeye wakalua mu luseke luonso luakadi ha buihi ne Yadene, wenda wambila bantu bualu bua dibatiza dia kukudimuna kua mitshima bua mibi yabo ijimishibue; bu muakafundabo mu mukanda wa mei a Yeshaya muprofete ne, Nebalandakashe mpongo yonso, Bantu bonso nebamone luhandu lua Nzambi
Baye kuimansha ku mpenga kua tshimenga muaba wa bintu bibi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nengikale ne bantu aba babi badi bantontolola musangu bule munyi
Muntu wakakoleshibua lukasa, wakambula bulalu, wakenda
Yeye udi udia butue bua kahia; mutshima wandi munyanguke ne mashimi wakumusesuisha
Shaula wakabikila bantu, wakababala mu Telaima, bakadi benda hanshi bakadi binunu nkama ibidi; Bena Yuda bakadi binunu dikumi
Biwahidia kubalekela, nentume biula mu buloba buebe
Padi tshibangu atshi tshiondoke, boya bua muaba awu butokoloke, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu ewu mmupie mikiya, bualu disama dia nsudi ndimuenekela mu tshibangu tshia mputa wa kapia
Ndi ngambila bantu bonso dî dinakunuambila ne, Dimukai
Mona, nengihate Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse ku mpala kuebe
Ku luseke lua esete, bule bualu coudées binunu binai ne nkama itanu, kuikale bibi bisatu: tshibi tshia Yosefe, tshibi tshia Benyamina ne tshibi tshia Dana
Nunku muntu eu wakangata malu â onso kudi kunyi

Mudimu wabo wakadi wa kukuatshisha bana ba Alona mu midimu yabo ya mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne mu biendedi ne mu nsubu mikese ne mu kujidila kua bintu bionso ne mu midimu yonso yakenzabo mu nsubu wa Nzambi; ne bua kulongololabo bidia bioshibue ne bukula bua milambu ya bukula bubotesha, nansha bua mikata idi kayiyi ne luevene, nansha bua bidia biakalambabo mu malonga, nansha bua bidia biakinabo mu mai ne bua bihikidi bia mishindu yonso; ne bua kuimanabo lunkelu ku difuku ku dituku bua kusakidilabo Yehowa ne bua kumutumbishabo, ne dilolo kabidi; ne bua kufilabo milambu ya kuosha kudi Yehowa ku matuku a lumingu ne bakabala ngondo ne ku matuku akatuabo bidia bia disanka ku tshikondo tshiau misangu yonso ku mpala kua Yehowa; ne bua bobo balame nsubu wa kusambakena ne muaba wa tshijila, ne bana balume ba Alona, bana babo, mu mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Bakelenge bakabambila kabidi ne, Bobo bikale ne muoyo
Bakabuesha mabue au mu masoso a tshiamu tshia or
Munda muandi mudi musokoka bibutshidibue bionso bia meshi ne bia lungenyi

Bena tshisamba etshi bavua ne mudimu wa kulama bimpe mushete wa ndondu, mesa a tshijila, tshitekelu tshia miendu, bilambuilu, malongu adibu benza nawu mudimu muaba wa tshijila, kabidi ne tshilamba tshidibu balembeleja munda mua nzubu wa tshijila
Ku mesu kuabu tuetu tuvua badimone anu bu tunkenene

Tuakanyenga buloba mu bianza bia bakelenge babidi bakadi dishiya dia Yadene, ku tshibanda tshia Ânona tô ne ku mukuna wa Hêmona; Bena Sidona badi babikila Hêmona ne, Sileona, ne Bena Amole badi babikila Hêmona ne, Senî; misoko yonso ya mu mpata, ne misoko yonso ya mu Gilada, ne ya mu Bashana tô ne ku Saleka ne Edelei, misoko ya bukelenge bua Oga mu Bashana
Palô wakabikila bena meji ne bena muhongo ne bena bilengulengu ba mu Ejipitu, bakenza muomumue ne manga abo

Yeye wakabayisha malu a bungi mu nsumuinu, wakabambila mu diyisha diandi ne, Unvuai, mumiaminyi wakaya kumiamina maminu; hakadiye umiamina, maminu makuabo akamata kukala kua nshila, nyunyu yakalua, yakâzokola
Yeye wakabanda n andi ku nsubu wa kulu, wakamuladika ha bulalu bua muntu wa Nzambi, wakaluhuka, wakinshila tshibi
Hebrews Ditabusha didi dimanya dia malu atudi tutekemena ne didi dijadika dia malu atudi katui bamone
Yeye wakamba ne, Bayiteke bisumbu bibidi ku tshibi tshia ku musoko tô ne dinda

Nakasangana ne, Mukashi udi ne mutshima mufuanangane ne mateyi ne bukuondo ne bianza bidi bu mionshi, yeye udi mutambe lufu bululu; wasankisha Nzambi neahanduke mu bianza biandi; kadi yeye neakuate muntu mubi
Pashishe bena Izrayele bonsu nebashipe nyama wabu awu dilolu
Bilamba bionsu bivua binyungulula lupangu, bivua bia buanda bukole bua ndanda
Nudimuke, kanulengi bintu ebi, bualu nudi mua kupia mikiya

Dishiya dia Yadene ku Yeleko ku esete bakasungula Besê wa mu tshihela tshia mu mpata wa tshisamba tshia Bena Lubena, ne Lamota wa mu Gilada wa mu tshisamba tshia Bena Gada, ne Golana wa mu Bashana wa mu tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe

Hashishe Menahema wakahaula musoko wa Tifesa, wakashiha bantu bakadiku tô ne ku Tîsa; bualu bua bobo kabakunzulula bibi ku mpala kuandi, yeye wakabashiha; bakashi bonso bakadi ne mafu, yeye wakabahanda
Wewe neushimike tshitendelelu bu mudi tshileshilu tshinakukulesha mu mukuna

Hakahitshilabo mu nsubu wa kumudilu ne mu nsubu muibidi, bakafika ku tshibi tshia tshiamu tshia ku mushiku wa mbelu wa nshila wa kuhatuka ku musoko, tshiakadiunzulukila; bakaluhuka; hakayilabo mu musesu umue, muanjelo wakamushîa lukasa
Hashishe Eleyakima, muana wa Hilekiya, ne Shebena secrétaire, ne Yoa, muana wa Asafa, mufundi wa malu a bukelenge, bakahingana kuai Hezikiya ne bilulu biabo bihanda, bakamuambila mei a Labashake
Hakahita matuku abidi, wakumukamu, wakaya mu Galela
Padi mashi a nyama awu masampukile ku tshilamba, tshilamba atshi batshisukuile anu muaba wa tshijila
Chronicles Bana ba balume ba Yuda: Pelese, Heselona ne Kâmi ne Hula ne Shobala
Yeye wakaluhuka, wakadila bikole
Galatia Bana betu, bikala muntu mutulukile ku bualu bubi, nuenu badi ne Nyuma, numuhingishe kudi Nzambi ne mutshima wa kalolo; udimuke biebe, bua wewe buteyi bu
Mukalenga, mpindiewu mbimpe ukebe muntu udi ne lungenyi ne meji, umupe muanzu wa kutangila bena Ejipitu bonsu
Kadi Bena Yuda bakakabila bakashi bimpe bakadi ne butumbi ne bantu banene ba mu musoko, bakabishila Paulo ne Bânaba dikenga, bakabumusha mu luseke luabo
Zebula kena kapita kandi, anyi
Kadi mukashi eu kena wikala ne diboko dikole; mulume wandi kena ujalama ne diboko diandi kadiena ne bukole

Bualu bua baprofete: Bualu bua buloba budi bûle tente ne bena masandi; Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakumona malu a hatuhu Nakumona malu mahite bubi Nunku Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba bua baprofete aba ne, Nunku Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Kanunvu mei a baprofete badi banuambila mei
Buakane mene bua Nzambi bua ku ditabusha dia mu Yesu Kilisto kudi bonso badi bamuitabusha; bualu bua kakuena ditahuluka
Ndi mbikila Nzambi bu mumanyi wa bualu ne mutshima wanyi ne, Nakahidia mua kulua ku Kolinto bua kunusungila ku ditandangana dietu
Badi mwa kumusungula tshia kabidi

Tshiena mua kudimanya nkayanyi; Malu au onso adi muomumue kundi nunku ndi ngamba ne, Biashiha tshihuhu bantu lubilu, Buloba budi bufidibua mu bianza bia bantu babi; Matuku anyi adi ahita luendu lua messager lubilu, Adi ahita bu mudi matu a ntuhu enda, Bingamba ne, Nempue meji adi annyingalasha muoyo, ndi ntshina makenga anyi onso, Nempishibue; Binowa ne neige, wewe neungele mu mutubu wa bintampi kabidi, Bualu bua yeye kena muntu bu meme bua meme kumukudimuna dî, Kakuena musungi hankatshi betu Umushe biandi mulangala wandi kundi, hashishe, nakadi kuakula ne tshia kadi kumutshina, Job Mutshima wanyi wakutondeshibua bua muoyo wanyi; Nengambile Nzambi ne, Kumpishi nansha; Bidi bimpe ku mesu kuebe bua wewe kunkengesha, Wewe udi ne mesu bu a muntu wa ha buloba, anyi

Kanuntendeledi ne mashi a nyama mishiha ne bidia bidi ne luevene hohamue kanushiyi manyi a nyama ya milambu yanyi to ne ku dinda Bintu bia kumudilu binudi nu huola mu madimi, nulue n abi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Neamiamine mayi aa ku ntenta kuvua muntu awu mufuile, ne ku bintu bionsu bidimu, too ne ku bantu bavuamu
Ebeyatâ wakambila Davidi ne, Shaula wakashiha bakuidi ba Yehowa
Bantu bandi bakamuambula mu dikalu bua kuya ku Yelushalema, bakamujika mu lukita lua bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi
Mu dituku adi Yehowa nêle muosa bua kubikila lujiji ludi kunfudilu kua misulu ya mai ya mu Ejipitu, ne lubulubulu ludi mu buloba bua Ashû
Hakashikama Abalama mu buloba bua Kanâna to bidimu dikumi, Salai, mukashi wa Abalama, wakangata Hagâ, Muena Ejipitu, muena mudimu wandi, wakamuha kudi Abalama, mulume wandi, amubake bu mukashi wandi
Kadi balume aba kabakamunvuila; nunku mulume eu wakakuata mukashi wandi muhika, wakamufila kudibo, bakamanyangana n andi, bakamuenzela bibi tô ne ku dinda; bakamba butuku kutshia, bakamulekela
Bena Isalele bakaya ku mpala ku luendu luabo mu tshihela tshia Sinai, ditutu bakimana mu tshihela tshia Palana
Amu bua kutufikisha muaba ewu wa dikenga
Mu matuku au ba mu Bena Yuda nebende hohamue ne ba mu Bena Isalele; nebaluhuke hohamue mu buloba bua ku node, nebafike ku buloba bunakaha bankambua benu bu buhianyi buabo

Hakunvueye lumu ne, Bakukuata Yone, wakaya biandi mu Galela; wakumuka mu Nazaleta, wakalua kushikama mu Kapênuma, musoko eu udi hehi ne dishiba, udi ku mukalu wa Zebuluna ne Nafatale; bua kushikisha dî diakambabo kudi muprofete Yeshaya ne, Buloba bua Zebuluna ne buloba bua Nafatale, Bantu bakadi bashikame mu midima Ku tshikondo atshi Yesu wakabanga kuambila bantu bualu bua Nzambi ne, Kudimunai mitshima yenu; bualu bua bukelenge bua mu diulu budi hehi
Yeye udi muan etu
Bunene bua nsubu wakibakila mukelenge Solomo Yehowa buakadi ne bule bua coudées makumi asambombo, butshiama buandi buakadi coudées makumi abidi, bute buandi bua mulu buakadi coudées makumi asatu

Yoshua Udi Unyenga Buloba Bujima Nunku Yoshua wakanyenga buloba abu buonso, ne buloba bua mikuna ne luseke lujima lua ku Sude, ne buloba buonso bua Goshene, ne bibanda, ne Alabâ, ne buloba bua mikuna ya Isalele ne bibanda biabu; ku mukuna wa Halaka wa ku nshila wa ku Sei tô ne ku Bâla gada wa mu tshibanda tshia Lebanona kuinshi kua mukuna wa Hêmona; wakakuata bakelenge hai bonso, wakabataha, wakabashiha
Bakamanyisha Davidi; nunku yeye wakaya ku dibue dinene, wakashikama mu tshihela tshia Maona

Ndi mua kulesha bantu lungenyi, ndi meji a kukuatshisha n au bantu; Bakelenge badi bakokesha bua bualu buanyi, Bua bualu buanyi bakokeshi badi bakokesha, Ndi munange badi bannanga, Biuma ne butumbi bidi kundi, Mamuma anyi adi ahita or buimpe, mahite or yakulengeshabo mu ditanda buimpe; Ndi ngenda mu nshila wa buakane, bua kuhesha badi bannanga buhianyi bua biuma, Yehowa wakanfuka ku tshibangidilu tshia bufuki buandi, Nakajadikibua ku tshibangidilu tshia bidimu, Hakadi ndondo ya mai kayiyi mianze kuikalaku, nakaledibua; Diambedi mikuna mile kayiyi mianze kujadikibua, Hakadiye kayi muanze kufuka buloba ne madimi abu, Hakashimikeye bia mu diulu, nakadiku
Bena Isalele bakadila Mose matuku makumi asatu mu mpata wa Moaba; nunku matuku a kudila kua Mose akashika
Hakafika Davidi ku mutu kua mukuna kuakadibo batendelela Nzambi, monai, Hushai, Muena Aka, wakalua kusangakena n andi ne tshikowelu tshiandi tshihandika ne buloba mu mutu wandi
Tshisamba kai tshia hanshi ha buloba tshidi bu bantu bebe Bena Isalele
Muntu ne muntu wa munkatshi muabo wakadi mukuate dilonga dia kuoshelamu musenga wa manananshi ku tshianza tshiandi, ne muhuya wa muishi wa ku musenga wa manananshi wakabanda mulu
Bobo bakalua ne bintu biakamba Mose ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bantu bonso bakalua ha buihi, bakimana ku mpala kua Yehowa
Kadi Yesu wakabambila ne, Kanu enu bamanye tshinudi nulomba
Bakahitshisha bana bakalelabo, balume ne bakashi, mu kahia, bakatempa mbuku, bakabandangana buloshi, bakadihanyisha bua kuenzabo malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa, bua kumufuisha n au tshiji

Bikaleye muhele kayi ne bungi bua bintu biwakamubadila, nunku nebamushikike ku mpala kua muakuidi, ne muakuidi neatuangane n andi mushinga, muakuidi neatuangane ne muena kuditshiha mushinga ku bungi bua bintu bidiye n abi
Kadi Palô kena ukunyuila, ne meme nenteke tshianza tshianyi ha Ejipitu, nempatule bantu banyi Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Bena Ejipitu ku dilumbulula dikole

Bobo bakamba ne, Umuke Bobo bakamba ne, Mulumiana eu, wakahatula bua kushikameye kunoko, ne katataka yeye udi musue kuikala bu mulumbuluishi, nenkuenzele bualu bubi budi butamba bualu butudi tubenzela bobo

Moaba wakushikama talalâ, kayi ne ntatu, ku buana buandi tô ne mpindiu, Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, mu matuku alualua nentume basendeki kudiye, nebamusendeke, nebahongolole bintu bidi mu milondo yandi, nebashihe milondo yandi bihese
Nsudi yakamulekela lukasa, wakalengeshibua
Nuenu kanuena bamanye malu atuakenzela, meme ne batatu banyi, bantu ba mu maloba makuabo, anyi
, bu mudi nkanu ya mu muaba wa tshijila
Kadi bobo kabakamanya dî edi, diakadi dibasokoka bua kabadijinguludi; bakatshina mua kumuebesha dî edi
Sheme, nkambua wa Bena Ebê, muan abo ne Yafete, yeye mene wakalela bana
Yeye wakamba ne, Shimishona, Bena Peleshete badi ham bidi hebe
Kadi biamueneka munyinyi wa mubidi mubishe, yeye kena muakane
Musoko eu udi mutuhu, kauyi bantu, kauyi bintu
Yesu wakabambila ne
Hatuakatangila Kupulio, tuakamushîa ku tshianza tshia luboko; tuakasabuka ku Sulia, nakahueka ku Tulo bua bena buatu bakasua kuhatulaku bintu
Nembikile maminu enu bua kuluau, nengakumbashe, ne tshiena ntuma tshiole tshikuabo munkatshi muenu
Rakele uvua ne bana ba balume babidi: ke Yozefe ne Binyamine
Hakadibo kabai banze kuitabusha bualu bua disanka diabo, hakadibo bakema, yeye wakabakonka ne, Nudi ne tshintu tshia kudia kunoko, anyi

Lehuma, mumanyi wa mikenji, ne Shimeshai secrétaire bakafundila Atashasete mukelenge mukanda wa kubanda Bena Yelushalema; hashishe Lehuma, mumanyi wa mikenji, ne Shimeshai secrétaire ne bena mulongo wabo, ne Bena Dina ne Bena Afâsateka ne Bena Tâpela ne Bena Afâseka ne Bena Âkewa ne Bena Babulona ne Bena Shushanaka ne Bena Dahaye ne Bena Elama, ne bisamba bikuabo bia bantu biakalua n abi Osenapâ, muntu munene wa butumbi, wakabateka mu musoko wa Samalea ne mu dishiya dia muamua dia musulu wa Pelata
Wewe kuena mulue kundi munyi
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Nansha tshintu; kadi anji kuitabusha bua meme kuya
Hashishe Yehowa wakangambila ne, Makenga neahatuke mafume ku node; nealue kukuata bonso badi bashikame mu buloba ebu
Hakalua ngondo muibidi ne dituku dia makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete, buloba buakuma Nzambi wakambila Noa ne, Hatuka mu buatu, wewe ne mukashi webe ne bana bebe balume ne bakashi babo
Nebambile bantu bonso ba ha buloba lumu luimpe elu lua bukelenge buanyi, neluikale tshimanyishilu ku bisamba bionso; hashishe, nshikidilu nealue

Hazaele wakabashiha mu nseke yonso ya Isalele: ku Yadene kua ku esete ne buloba buonso bua Gilada ne bua Bena Gada ne bua Bena Lubena ne bua Bena Manashe ne ku Aloê udi mu tshibanda tshia Ânona tô ne ku Gilada ne Bashana
Bakenza nunku, bakabashikika buonso buabo
Wakaya kudi Haga ne yeye wakimita difu, hakatangileye ne, Nakuimita difu, yeye wakalengulula mukelenge wandi mukashi
Bakaya ne ntalanta Wakaya ne mukanda kudi mukelenge wa Isalele, wamba ne, Hawabala mukanda eu, Umanye ne, Nakakutumina muntu wanyi Nâmana, bua wewe kumuondaha disama diandi dia nsudi
Nakadi kuikala bu munakadi tshidiku; Matuku a muoyo wanyi kaena manya manya, anyi
Yeye wakakebulula kakasangana mpingu

Yelemiya wakambila ba mu nsubu wa Lekaba kabidi ne, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Bualu bua nuakutumikila mukenji wa Yonadaba, nkambua wenu, nuakulonda mei andi onso, nuakuenza malu onso akanuambileye; nunku Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Yonadaba, muana wa Lekaba, kena uhanga muana mulume bua kuimaneye ku mpala kuanyi tshiendelele
Bantu aba bonso bakadisangisha mu tshibanda tshia Sidima etshi ntshibanda tshia Dishiba dia Mai a Luehu

Wakalua n anyi mu tshiendelu tshia munda mua ntempelo, ne nakamona nsubu ibidi mu tshiendelu tshia munda, mukuabo ku luseke lua tshibuelelu tshia ku luseke lua node, mushiku wandi wa mbelu mutangilangane ne luseke lua sude; mukuabo ku luseke lua tshibuelelu tshia ku luseke lua sude, mushiku wandi wa mbelu mutangilangane ne luseke lua nôde
Nunku nuenu nudi mubidi wa Kilisto, muntu tshituha tshiau, muntu tshituha tshiau
Mu ngondo wa kumudilu ne ku dituku dia dikumi ne anai dilolo nenudie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene to ne ku dituku dia makumi abidi ne dimue dilolo
Hakatangila bana babo ne Yosefe ne, Tatu wetu wakafua bakambilangana ne, Hashishe Yosefe neikale n etu lukuna, neatusombuele bua malu mabi onso atua kamuenzela

Hakatangila Yoaba ne, Bakela malu ya nvita ku mpala ne ku nyima banjike, yeye wakasungula bena bukitu bonso ba mu Isalele, wakabatahulula, wakela mualu wa nvita kudi Bena Sulia; wakafila bantu bakuabo mu bianza bia Abishai muakuny andi, wakela mualu wa nvita kudi Bena Amona
Bua tudi bamanye anu tshituha tshia malu, tudi tuamba anu tshituha tshia mei a Nzambi; kadi halua dikumbana dia malu onso, malu adi a tshituha neâshikile

Kanungu ka Kabeena mwa kwangata muntu mu Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu: a padiye kayi mweena Kongu; b padiye kayi uleeja ne udi ne dimanya dipiluke dia bidimu dikumi ne bitanu mu mianda ya bukoshi bwa nsambu anyi ya tshidiidi
Nakunvua lumu lua malu mabi anudi nuenzela bantu aba bonso
Nunku miaku idi bu tshimanyinu, kenkudi badi bitabusha, kadi kudi badi kabai bena ditabusha; kadi mayisha a baprofete adi bu tshimanyinu, kenkudi badi kabai bena ditabusha, kadi kudi badi bitabusha
Mukelenge udi Nyuma, ne hadi Nyuma wa Mukelenge hadi budishikaminyi
Pilato wakamukonka ne, Bulelela ntshinyi

Ezekiel Nunku wewe washile baminyampala ba mu Isalele madilu, wamba ne, Wakakolesha muan andi mukuabo, Ba mu bisamba bia bantu bakunvua lumu luandi, Hakatangila mamu andi ne, Nakumuindila Yeye wakendakana munkatshi mua ntambue mikuabo, Wakanyanga nsubu yabo minene, Hashishe ba mu bisamba bia bantu Bakamuteka mu tshikumbi, bamuela nkanu, Mamu webe wakadi bu muonshi, mufuanangane n ebe, Wakasa matamba makole, Kadi bakajula muonshi au ne tshifik a munda, Mpindiu bakamana kûkuna mu tshihela, Kahia kakahatuka mu matamba au, Ezekiel Mu tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete, mu ngondo muitanu ne mu dituku dia dikumi dia ngondo, bakuabo ba munkatshi mua bakulu ba Bena Isalele bakalua kulomba lungenyi kudi Yehowa, bakashikama ku mpala kuanyi
Yeye kabidi wakumusha Mâka, mamu wandi, mu nkuasa wa mukelenge mukashi, bualu bua yeye wakenzela Bashela luhingu lua bundu; Asa wakataha luhingu luandi, wakaluosha kahia hehi ne kasulu ka Kidilona
Bialala mulume ne mukashi wa muan andi, nebabashihe bubidi buabo, bobo bakenza bualu bubi, ne mashi abo neikale ham bidi habo
Akula ne Pisikila ne bena ekelesia ba mu nsubu wabo badi banutumina muoyo wa bungi mu Mukelenge
Bakayila ku luseke lua ku tshibi tshia ku mpokolo wa mai, bakabanda ku tshibandilu tshia ku musoko wa Davidi ha lumbu ba mutu ha nsubu wa Davidi tô ne ku tshibi tshia ku mai ku luseke lua ku esete
Kuasaye tshilambuilu muaba awu, kutshinyika ne: Ele, mmomumue ne Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Izrayele
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Yeye udi ulua ne lumu kabidi
Bobo badi ba ku buloba; bua bualu ebu badi bakula bu ba ku buloba, ne ba ha buloba badi babunvuila

Hakafikabo hakadi tshisumbu tshia bantu, muntu wakalua kudiye, wakamutuila binu hanshi, wakamba ne, Mukelenge ufuile muan anyi wa balume luse, yeye udi ne tshiseke, udi ukenga bikole; misangu ya bungi yeye udi uhona mu kahia ne mu mai
Buhianyi bua Bena Shimeona buakadi munkatshi mua buhianyi bua Bena Yuda, bualu bua tshituha tshia Bena Yuda tshiakabahita bunene: nunku Bena Shimeona bakadi ne buhianyi munkatshi mua buhianyi buabo
Mose wakumuka ku mukuna, wakahueka kudi bantu, wakabidika bantu ne bobo bakuvuwa bilulu biabo
Yesu wakabakonka ne, Nudi bamanye mua kujidisha balunda ba mubaki wa mukashi bia kudia, hatshidi mubaki wa mukashi n abo, anyi
Kutshinyi, ne mutshima webe kauteketshi, bualu bua nshikidilu ya bimunyi ebi bibidi bidi bihatula anu muishi wa kahia, bua tshiji tshikole tshia Lesine ne Bena Sulia ne tshia muana wa Lemalaya

Mose wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Yehowa wakamana kuhikula Besalele, muana mulume wa Uli, muana mulume wa Hû wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, wakamûsha tente ne Nyuma wa Nzambi ne lungenyi lule lua kuenza n alu midimu yonso, ne lua kulongolola n alu mudimu muimpe wa bintu bia or ne bia argent ne bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mudimu wa kusonga mabue ne wa kusonga mabaya ne midimu yonso ya bantu badi ne lungenyi lule

Badi banyana bua dikengela dia bia kudia ne nzala; Badi baka mabeshi a buanji hehi ne mitshi mihi, Badi babihata munkatshi mua bantu bakuabo, Bua nunku badi bashikame mu mpongo, Munkatshi mua bihuka bia mu tshihela badi bela mikunda yabo, Badi bana ba batshimbakanyi ne bana ba badi kabayi bamanyibue, Mpindiu nakulua musambu wabo wa kuimbimba, Badi bandengulula ne dihetu, badi bimana bashilangana n anyi kule, Bualu bua Nzambi wakusulula mulemu wa ku buta buanyi, ne wakunfuisha bundu, Bantu ba tshianana badi babika ku tshianza tshianyi tshia balume; Badi bashiha nshila wanyi, Badi baya ku mpala bu mudibo Malu a buowa adi antshintshimika; Mpindiu mutshima wanyi udi uhumuna kanyinganyinga kau munda muanyi; Butuku budi batubula mifuba yanyi, buyihatula ham bidi hanyi, Ku bukole bua disama dianyi tshivualu tshianyi tshidi tshinyanguka; Yeye wakungela mu bitahikidi, Ndi ndila kûdi ne kuena witaba kundi, Wewe wakakudimuka bu muena lukisu kundi; Wewe udi ungambula mu luhehele, udi ungendeshamu, Bua ndi mumanye ne, Wewe neunfikishe ku lufu, Kadi muntu udi wamba kukuluka kena wolola tshianza tshiandi mulu, anyi
Mutuangaji neatshipishe mukaji, umuambila ne: Pikala mulume mukuabu kayi mukubuelele mu nzubu, wewe kuyi mudinyange, kuyi mudinge bayebe, mayi audi unua aa kakukuenzela bualu to
Hashishe nuye n andi ha bule, numushihe ne mabue
Muntu au kakafua nkayandi bua bualu bubi buakenzeye
Yosefe wakambila bana babo ne, Ndi nnutendekena ne, Semenai ha buihi n anyi
Monai, ndi nnumanyisha dî dia budishikaminyi, bua nuenu kufua ku muele wa nvita, ku tshihuhu ne ku tshiole; nennuvuishe bu tshintu tshidi tshikuatshisha makelenge onso ha buloba buowa
Tudi bamanye ne, Tuakumuka ku lufu, tuakubuela mu muoyo, bualu bua tudi tunanga bana betu
Ha diba adi mene Bafalese bakuabo bakalua, bakamuambila ne, Umuka eku, ya biebe, bualu bua Helode udi musue kukushiha
Yeye wakavila, wakamba ne, Tshiena wabo
Baluishi kabakunubunda kabidi to
Nebambe ne: Maweja Nangila anuele lupemba, anulame
Bualu budi bumanyishibua ne, Mukelenge wetu wakuledibua mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, tshisamba tshivua Mose kai muambile bua bakuidi

Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Bantu kabena mua kulua ku mukuna wa Sinai bualu bua wewe wakamba ne, Ujidike mukuna, ûjidile Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Ya, hueka biebe, wewe neuhingane, wewe ne Alona kadi bakuidi ne bantu kabalu ha buihi nansha, bua Yehowa kabashihi
Bikala tshintu tshikese tshia munyinyi wa tshijila anyi tshia bidia bishale tô ne ku dinda, wewe neutshioshe mu kahia, kabatshidi, bualu bua tshidi tshia tshijila
Mutuangaji alambule nyama wa tshibawu awu, akobolole muena tshibawu bilondeshile mudi mikenji, bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Nuluangane mishiku ne muana wandi wa balume, bua yeye kikadi ne tshiji, Misambu Yehowa, mona mudi bena lukuna banyi basangane nunku
Hakadiye uya ku mpala, wakamona banga balume babidi, bana ba muntu umue, Yakobo muana wa Zebedayo, ne muan abo Yone, bakadi mu buatu ne tatu wabo Zebedayo, balukulula tuhamba tuabo; yeye wakababikila
Yeye wakamubikila
Bualu bila ntshidi mpongolodibua bu mulambu wa bia kunua, ne tshikondo tshia tshimuangi tshianyi tshiafiki
Bana ba Yakobe kufika mu Ejipitu pamue ne bantu bakuabu, bua kusumba ntete ya kuenza bukula, bualu tshiyole tshia nzala tshivua mu ditunga dijima dia Kenaane
Nebanuenzele malu â onso bualu bua dina dianyi, bua bobo kabena bamanye wakuntuma
Kakuena kuikala butuku kabidi; ne kabena bakengela dinkenka dia muinda, nasha munya wa diba; bualu bua Mukelenge Nzambi neabatemene; ne bobo nebakokeshe tshiendelele
Bana ba balume ba Sheshana: Ahalai
Muakuidi munene wakimana munkatshi muabo, wakakonka Yesu ne, Wewe kuena witaba dî
Tudi bamanye kabidi ne, Malu onso adi akuatshishangana bua kumusha diakalengele kudi bantu badi bananga Nzambi, kudi badi babikidibue bu mudi disungula diandi
Bakamutandisha bikole
Kakuena mukashi udi utula difu, kakuena mukashi udi wikala nkumba mu buloba buenu, nenkumbashe bungi bua matuku enu
Nudi mua kudia nyunyu yonso idi miakane
Bua malu â, nuenu balami ba mikoko, unvuai dî dia Yehowa
Natana wakambila Davidi bu muakadi mei â onso, ne bu muakadi tshikena kumona etshi
Kadi dî dia mukelenge diakahita dî dia Yoaba bukole
Kadi Bena Lewi nebenze mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bobo nebadituadile bubi buabo eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele ku bikondo bienu bionso, bobo kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Tshibanda tshia Sidima tshiakadi tshiule tente ne bina bia bitume ne bakelenge ba Sodoma ne Amola bakanyema, bakahonamu, bakuabo bakashala bakanyemena ku mukuna
Bena Ashure nebanukuate mu bupika

Bakateka bitekelu bitanu ku tshianza tshia balume tshia luseke lua nsubu ne bitanu ku tshianza tshia bakashi tshia luseke lua nsubu, bakateka tshiowelu tshinene ku tshianza tshia balume tshia luseke lua nsubu, ku luseke lua ku sude esete
Yeye wakamba nunku bua kubamanyisha bua lufu luafueye n alu
Nuele Asunkulito, Filegone, Hême, Pateloba, Hôma, ne bana betu ba mu Kilisto badi n abo, muoyo
Mu bualu ebu kabidi badi bakeba munkatshi mua balami bua kusangana mulami yonso muikale muntu udibo mua kueyemena
Yeye wakitabusha

Hatuakatata bikole ne tshihuhu, hakatshiabu, bakabanga kuela biakadibo batuala mu buatu mu mai; hakafika dituku disatu, bakela bintu bikuabo bia mu buatu mu mai ne bianza biabo, Diba ne mitoto kabiakatutemena matuku a bungi, tshihuhu tshitambe bukole tshiakatukuata, katuakadi ne ditekemena kabidi ne, Netusungidibue
Bualu bua meme hanyi nengikale kudiye bu lumbu lua kahia lumunyunguluke, ne nengikale butumbi buandi munkatshi muabo

Milambu yabi ya bintu bidibo banua neyikale tshituha tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku muana wa ngombe yonso, ne tshintu tshisatu tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshinai tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku muana wa mukoko yonso, eu udi mulambu unudi nuosha ha kahia ku ngondo ku ngondo tô ne ngondo yonso ya mu tshidimu, Nenufile mulume wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi kudi Yehowa ku mutu kua milambu idibo bafila buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Hakakumbana bidimu makumi anai, muanjelo wakamueneka kudiye mu tshihela tshia mukuna wa Sinai mu ludimi lua kahia luakadi mu katshi
Nunku Davidi wakavudishila Yehowa disanka ku mpala kua bantu bonso; Davidi wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele tatu wetu, wikale ne disanka tshiendelele
Nunku mukelenge wa Edome wakahidia bua Bena Isalele bahite butshika buandi, nunku Bena Isalele bakasesuka kuakadiye
Hakalua tshikondo tshidi bimuna bimita mafu, nakabandisha mesu anyi mu tshiota, nakatangila ne mbushi ya bimpanga yakadi ne matoba yakaya kudi mashina a mbushi akadi ne mihola mihola ne matoba matoba
Meme nakumbula mena, nakunua mai a bende, nengumishe misulu ya Ejipitu munda mua makasa anyi
Ne wewe Kapênuma, nebakubandishe mu diulu, anyi
Nebukadenesâ wakabebesha ne, Edi ndî dia bushuwa, anyi
Bikondo bikuabo ditutu bakimana dilolo tô ne ku dinda, ne hakumuka ditutu ne dinda, bakaya ku luendu, hakumuka ditutu nansha mu munya nansha mu butuku, bakaya ku luendu
Unemeke bakashi ba mu lufuila badi ne lufuila lua bushua
Neushihe bonso ba mu Isalele badi bashala ne muoyo mu kuhumuna eku kua tshiji tshiebe tshikole ham bidi ha Yelushalema, anyi
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Tudi tukusengelela ne, Utuebeshile Nzambi bua tuetu tumanye ne tudi ne diakalengele mu nshila wetu utuaya

Halua dituku dia muanda mute kete, muakuidi neatangile mu mputa, ne bikala mputa kayi mutampakane mu dikoba, ne kayi ubuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale muakane
Nanku panuafika mu ditunga didi Maweja Nangila munupe, divuaye mulaye bankambua benu, bu mudiye mununange, Yeye neanusankishe
Abalahama wakadi ne bidimu lukama hakamulelabo muana wandi mulume Isaka
Arone uvua ne bana ba balume banayi: Nadabe, Abiku, Elazare ne Itamare
Bualu bua nuakafua, ne muoyo wenu udi musokoka ne Kilisto mu Nzambi

Utuheshe dikuatshisha diebe mu nvita yetu ne bena lukuna, Bituikala ne dikuatshisha dia Nzambi, nebenze bienzedi bia bukitu; Psalms Wewe Nzambi, unvua muadi wanyi, Kunfudilu kua buloba ndi nkuela dî dianyi, bualu bua wewe udi tshinyemenu tshianyi, udi tshibunda tshikole ku Witabushe bua meme nshikame bianyi tshiendelele mu nsubu webe wa ntenta; Bualu bua wewe, Nzambi, wakunvua mitshihu yanyi, Nealeheshele mukelenge matuku a muoyo wandi; Neashikame biandi mu nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge tshiendelele ku mpala kua Nzambi; Nunku nengimbe misambu ya kutumbisha n ai dina diebe tshiendelele, Psalms Mutshima Yeye nkayandi udi dibue dianyi ne luhandu luanyi, Nenubunde muntu musangu bule munyi bua kumubetekasha, buonso Bantu aba badi bahunga di diabo anu bua kumutuma hanshi ku muaba Mutshima wanyi, uhuwe biebe talalâ, windile Nzambi nkayandi; Yeye nkayandi udi dibue dianyi ne luhandu luanyi, Luhandu luanyi ne butumbi buanyi bidi kudi Nzambi; Nuenu bantu, numueyemene misangu yonso, Bulelela, bantu bahuekele badi anu muhuya, Kanueyemenyi tshinyangu, kanuikadi ne ditekemena dia hatuhu mu kunyenga kua bintu; Nzambi wakuamba dî diandi musangu umue; ne kudi wewe kabidi, Mukelenge, kudi luse lujalame
Butumbuke buvua ne metre umue
Kadi nenusabuke musulu wa Yardene, bua kusomba mu ditunga adi ne ditalala
Bakalua n andi
Udi unvua, ambe biandi ne, Lua
E, nenanukile bua nuenu mimanye mua kuvuluka malu â misangu yonso hangikala mumane kufua
Wewe wakolola tshianza tshiebe ne buloba buakabanda
Yesu wakamba ne, Bûdi Wamba mbulelela, ndi Mukelenge
Nungoshile ngombe milume ibidi, mukoku wa tshimpanga umue, ne bana ba mikoku muanda mutekete, badi bamane kukumbaja tshidimu tshijima, nyama ayi ishile
Bena Izrayele badi balomba munyinyi Dituku dikuabu bantu benyi ba mishindu yonsu bavua basombe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele kukuatshika lukuka lua munyinyi
Nuvuluke ne: ndi munupeshe dituku dia muanda mutekete bua dikale dia dikisha
Bualu bua Yehowa wakamona dikenga dia Bena Isalele ne diakadi dikole; kabakashala ne bantu mu nsubu anyi ku mbelu, kabakashila Bena Isalele mukuatshishi nansha
Uvua mubuelele mukajanyi mukuabu mu nzubu
Yesu wakimana, wakababikila, wakabakonka ne, Nudi basue meme nuenzele tshinyi
Bualu bua mbu muakafundabo ne, Corinthians Ne meme, bana betu, hanakalua kunudi, tshiakalua ne bulengele bua mei anyi bua meshi, hanakadi nuambila bualu busokoka bua Nzambi
dikuba dia mwaba wa nsombelu, miaba milenga mifuka kudi nzambi, bitupa bia matunga ne bukubi bwa miaba milenga;
Kadi ndi ngamba ne, Kabakunvua, anyi
Bena Isalele bakatshunguluka mu nvita, ne Bena Benyamina bakabanga kubashiha, bantu bu makumi asatu, bamba ne, Bulelela, tudi tubashiha bu mutuakenza diambedi
Nunku nuenu nudi mubidi wa Kilisto, muntu tshituha tshiau, muntu tshituha tshiau
Muntu yonso utu wikala munda muandi katu wenza bibi; muntu yonso utu wenza bibi kena muanze kumumona, kena mumumanye
Badi babingishibua anu hatuhu ku ngasa wandi bualu bua dihikula didi mu Kilisto Yesu
Aba mbantu bakabalabo kudi Mose ne kudi Eleazâ muakuidi, bakabala Bena Isalele mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mutangilangane ne Yeleko
Hakaya Labana bua kukoseye mikoko miosa, Lakele wakiba mpingu ya mu nsubu wa tatu andi
Nulame tshimuna atshi too ne ku dituku dia dikumi ne dinayi dia ngondu ewu
Mikenji eyi kayena dishiya dia Mayi manene, bua nuenu kuamba ne: Muntu wasabuka mayi bua kutuangatshilayi bua tuetu kuyimanya, kuyikumbaja nnganyi
Hakashikisheye kumunuisha mai, yeye wakamba ne, Nensunyine tumelo biebe mai kabidi to ne hukutatu
Yeye wakamba ne, Ditalala didiku, nakulala bua kushihela Yehowa nyama; nudilengeshe, nulue kundi ku tshishihelu
Bana ba balume ba Zebuluna, Selede ne Elona ne Yalele
Mukelenge Agipa udi mumanye bua malu â; ndi muambilau ne dikima; bualu bua ndi ngitabusha ne, Kakuena bualu bumue bua mu malu â budi bumusokome, bua bualu ebu kabuakenjibua mu ditumba dia nsubu
Yoasha wakamuhita bukole misangu isatu, wakasungila misoko ya Bena Isalele
Nuikishe dituku dia kumpala, ne dia muanda mukulu dia tshibilu etshi
Tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, Eliaba muana mulume wa Helona neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Zebuluna
Wakatuma kabidi banga bantu bandi batambe ba diambedi; ba bidime bakabenzela muomumue
Yeye wakabambila ne, Tuyai bietu kukuabo mu minga misoko idi ha buihi, mbambileku bualu bua Nzambi; nakuluila bualu ebu

Nakabatuma kudi Ido, muntu munene, ku muaba wa Kasifaya; nakabambila mei a kuambilabo Ido ne bana babo, Bena Netinima, Bu muakadi tshianza tshimpe tshia Nzambi kutudi, bakahingana ne muntu wa lungenyi, umue wa bana ba Mali, muana wa Lewi, muana wa Isalele; ne Shelebaya ne bana bandi balela ne bana babo dikumi ne muanda mukulu; ne Hashabaya ne bakadi n andi, Yeshaya wa bana balume ba Melali ne bana babo ne bana babo balela makumi abidi; ne Bena Netinima bakajidila Davidi ne miloho bua kuenzabo mudimu wa Bena Lewi, Bena Netinima nkama ibidi ne makumi abidi: mena a buonso buabo akadi matedibue
Ekesode Dikengeshibua dia Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu Â mmena a bana balume ba Isalele bakalua mu Ejipitu, muntu ne muntu ne ba mu nsubu wandi bakalua ne Yakoba
Hakimbabo musambu, bakaluhuka, bakaya ku mukuna wa Oleve
Ne mukashi wakanyema mu tshihela, mudiye ne muaba mumulongoluela kudi Nzambi, bua kumudishaboku matuku tshinunu ne nkama ibidi ne makumi asambombo
Rakele kuamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu mmumbingishe
Yeye wakababala mu Bezeke: Bena Isalele bakadi binunu nkama isatu, ne Bena Yuda bakadi binunu makumi asatu
Kadi kabena mua kuhana madimi adi ku matshika a misoko yabo, ebu mbuhianyi buabo tshiendelele
Kadi Yesu wakababikila wakamba ne, Nuitabushe bua bana bakese kulua kundi, kanubakandi; bualu bua bukelenge bua Nzambi mbua badi bu bana
Mu buloba abu balume bakakamata mabele abo, ne bakalenga bianza biabo ha biadi bia bumama buabo
Kadi biwadimusha muntu au muakane bua kenji biandi bidi, ne bikaleye kayi wenza bibi, yeye neikale ne muoyo bualu bua wakunvua kudimusha kuebe; wewe wakuhandisha muoyo webe
Nulame kabidi mikenji eyi: Kanuteki mu bimuna bienu nyama ya mishindu ibidi mishilangane bua kulelanganayi
Hakunvuabo dî edi, bakatamba kumukema
Munyi kabakutangila muntu mukuabo muhingane bua kutumbisha Nzambi, anu muntu eu wa bende
Zakalai ku mpala kuandi, nuenu bonso ba ha buloba
Yehowa wakatamba kudiundisha Solomo ku mpala kua Bena Isalele bonso, wakamuambika butumbi buakatamba bua bakelenge bonso ba mu Isalele bakadi badianjila ku mpala kuandi
Bakadi ne mabue a mushinga mukole, bakafila mu bibutshilu bia nsubu wa Yehowa mu tshianza tshia Yehiele, Muena Gêshona
Kabeena mwa kwikala nabu popamwe ne bukwabo nansha

Ndi nkusengelela ne, Uvuluke dî diebe diwakambila muntu webe Mose ne, Binuenza malu mabi, nennumuangalashe munkatshi mua ba ha buloba; kadi binuakudimuna mitshima yenu kundi, binuatumikila mikenji yanyi bua kuyenza, binuikala bamuangalashibue kunfudilu kua diulu, nennusangisheku, nennuhingashe ku muaba unakusungula bua kujadikaku dina dianyi
Ere, muanabute wa Yuda, kavua ukumbaja bivua Maweja Nangila musue nansha
Nunku tuakutuma Yuda ne Sila, bobo kabidi nebanuambile mei momumue mukana muabo
Amen
Kanusu malu a ba ha buloba, anyi bintu bia ha buloba
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Yehoyakima ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Bana ba balume bakuabo ba bakuidi bakadi balongolodi ba bintu bia muhuya muimpe
Nzambi wetu kakatukengesha ne musoko eu bua bualu ebu, anyi

Kakunyua Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, lumu elu bualu bua yeye wakatshidi mu Ejipitu kuakanyemeye ku mesu kua mukelenge Solomo; Yalobama wakadi ushikama mu Ejipitu, ne bakatuma dî bua kumubikila , nunku Yalobama ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangisha hamue, bakambila Lehabama ne, Tatu webe wakanemesha mutshi wa tshikokedi wetu bujitu butambe; nunku wewe uheheshe bujitu bua mudimu eu mukole wakatuenzesha tatu webe ne mutshi wa tshikokedi wa bujitu bubi wakatutekeleye, nunku tuetu netukukuatshile mudimu
Hakadibo bela mbila bikole, bakavula bivalu, bakela buloba mulu
Hashishe mukashi wakamba ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Witabushe bua muntu webe ambile mukelenge wandi dî
Udi ukune ne udi umiamina mai badi umue; kadi muntu ne muntu neangate difutu bu mudi mudimu wandi mene
Nentume muele wa nvita ku nyima kuabo, tô ne hanababutula bonso
Nasha kakese
Nunku mu tshikondo atshi nuakadi ne mamuma kai mu malu adi anufuisha bundu katataka
Batumibue binunu badi benda nende
Kakuena mukashi udi utula difu, kakuena mukashi udi wikala nkumba mu buloba buenu, nenkumbashe bungi bua matuku enu
Hashishe Shaula wakabika, wakahueka ku tshihela tshia Zifa, wakadi ne bantu binunu bisatu bakasunguleye munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua kukebeye Davidi mu tshihela tshia Zifa
Kanufiki mu nzubu wanyi bianza bitupu to
Bana betu, muntu ne muntu ashale ne Nzambi mu tshikadilu tshiakadiye n atshi hakabikidibueye
Bu malu a kukema akenjibua munkatshi muenu, menjibue mu Tulo ne mu Sidona, bakadi kukudimuna mitshima yabo kale, bashikame mu bilulu bikayabala ne mu butue

Bualu bua nudi nusakila ne lubese ne diaha ne nudi nutua mikoko mitekete nsengu yenu, tô ne hanuayitangadisha mu miaba mikuabo, nunku nensungile tshisumba tshianyi tshia mikoko, kayena ikala bu tshintu tshia kuhaulabo, nendumbulule tshilumbu tshidi hankatshi ha mukoko ne mukoko

Bu Nzambi wa tatu anyi, Nzambi wa Abalahama, ne ditshina dia Isaka kabiyi bikale n anyi, wewe wakadi kuntuma ne bianza bituhu bulelela Nzambi wakutangila dikenga dianyi ne mudimu wa bianza bianyi, ne yeye wakukubela butuku bua lelu
Kanusu malu a ba ha buloba, anyi bintu bia ha buloba
Vulukai, kanuhu muoyo bu munuakafuisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiji mu tshihela; ku dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu tô ne hanuakafika ku muaba eu, nuakahidia Yehowa
Nuenze kabidi tshibilu ku ndekelu wa tshidimu, panudi nunowa biakudia bikuabu bia mu madimi enu
Ba mu Alaba ne bakokeshi ba mu Kedâ bakakukuatshila mudimu wa bungend a mushinga; bakakuhanyisha bana ba mikoko, bimpanga ne mbushi
Palô wakatuma mundi, wakamona ne, Nansha tshintu tshimue tshia bimuna bia Bena Isalele tshiakafua

Bualu bua muhanyi kena wangata kabidi bintu biakuhaneye, nansha bikala bintu biakuhaneye bitshidi ne muoyo; bualu bua tshiji tshianyi tshikole tshidi tshikuata tshisumbu tshionso tshia bantu katshiena tshikudimuka; kakuena muntu wadikolesha mu bubi wahandisha muoyo wandi
Vudisha nkunyi, temesha kahia kakole, sabisha munyinyi bimpe, lamba mukelekele mutoto, mifuba yoshibue
Nunku yeye wakanyunguluisha mushete wa Yehowa musoko musangu umue; bantu bakalua kabidi ku tshitudilu, bakalalaku
Solomo wakambila Nzambi ne, Wewe wakalesha Davidi tatu wanyi luse lunene lujalame, wakumpuisha mu bukelenge mu muaba wandi

Bakambila Solomo ne, Monaku, Adoniya udi utamba kutshina mukelenge Solomo, bualu bua yeye wakukuata ku nsengu ya ku tshishihelu wamba ne, Mukelenge Solomo adianjile kuditshiha kundi ne, Tshiena nshiha muntu wanyi ku muele wa nvita
Dituku adi nembambile ne, Tshiakunumanya; umukai kundi, nudi benji ba malu mabi
Bakuidi kabakadi mua kubuela mu nsuhu wa Yehowa, bualu bua butumbi bua Yehowa buakûsha nsubu tente
Bikaleye mushihe nansha muana wa balume nansha muana wa bakashi, nebamuenzele nunku bu mudi dilumbulula edi
Tubalu tuakadi Solomo n atu tuakufuma ku Ejipitu: bendi ba mushinga ba mukelenge bakatuangata mu bisumbu, bakafila mushinga ku tshisumbu ne ku tshisumbu
Buendenda mu nzubu ya kutendelela Muena Izrayele yonsu, mulume nansha mukaji, kena mua kuenda tshiendenda mu nzubu ya mvidie ya bena ditunga
Udi ukutahulula kudi bakuabo nganyi
Buhianyi buinai buakadi bua Bena Yisakâ ku meku abo
Arone kusemena pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, kukosa muana wa ngombe muminu bua kudikobolola
Badikebele Musombeshanganyi angate bintu bionso bidiye n abi ku mateyi andi
Mitshima yabo yakabanga kunyingalala, bakamukonka ku muntu ku muntu ne, Meme, anyi
Mu ngondu wa muanda mutekete wa tshidimu tshionsu, nenungenzele tshibilu etshi lumingu lujima
Wakenza mbote ya or makumi atanu, wakatuangasha bilulu ne mbote ai, nunku nsubu wa tshitendelelu wakadi bu nsubu umue

Buludiludi ne muaba wawa wa coudées makumi abidi wakadi mu tshiendelu tshia munda mua ntempelo, ne buludiludi ne nshila mulongolola ne mabue hanshi ne munyunguluke tshiendelu tshia ha mbelu, tshitadikilu tshia nsubu muisatu wa mulu tshiakadi tshitangilangana ne tshia nsubu wakadi buludiludi n andi Ku mpala kua nsubu ei kuakadi nshila, butshiama buandi coudées dikumi, bule buandi coudées lukama; ne mishiku ya mbelu ya nsubu yakatangila ku nshila eu

Davidi wakadi uluata tshilulu tshia lin muimpe, ne Bena Lewi bonso bakadi batuala mushete ne bimbi ba misambu ne Kenaniya, mulombodi wa bimbi ba misambu, bakaluata lin muimpe; Davidi wakadi uluata efoda wa lin kabidi

Mulambu wa dinua tshibalu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Padi muntu kampande muenze bualu bubi mu mpukapuka, mupue muoyi bua kulambula milambu ya tshijila idibu balambula Maweja Nangila, muntu awu, bua kudikobolola udi ne bua kulambula Maweja Nangila mukoku wa tshimpanga kauyi ne bulema

Asahele, muan abo ne Yoaba, wakadi wa bantu aba makumi asatu; ne Elehanana, muana wa Dodo, wa mu Beteleheme, Shama, Muena Haloda, ne Elika, Muena Haloda, Helese, Muena Palati, ne Ila, muana wa Ikeshe, Muena Tekoa, Abiesê, Muena Anatota, ne Mebunai, Muena Husha, Salemona, Muena Ahoa, ne Mahalai, Muena Netofa, Helebe, muana wa Bana, Muena Nefota, ne Itai, muana wa Libai wa mu Gibea wa Bena Benyamina, Benaya, Muena Pilatona, ne Hidai wakafuma ku tusulu tua mu Gâsha, Abi alabona, Muena Âba, ne Asemaweta, Muena Bâhuma, Eliaba, Muena Shâlebona, bana ba Yashena, Yonatana, Shama, Muena Halala, ne Ahiyama, muana wa Shala, Muena Alala, Elifelete, muana wa Ahasabai, muana wa Mâka, ne Eliyama, muana wa Ahitofele, Muena Gilona, ne Heselo Muena Kâmele, ne Pâlai, Muena Âba, Igala, muana wa Natana wa mu Soba, ne Bani, Muena Gada, ne Seleke, Muena Amona, ne Nahalai, Muena Bêlota, batuadi ba ngabu wa Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, ne Ha, Muena Yitela, ne Galeba, Muena Yitela, ne Uliya, Muena Hiti: buonso buabo bakadi bantu makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete

Hashishe, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yeshaya ne, Ya wambile Hezikiya ne, Yehowa Nzambi wa tatu webe Davidi udi wamba ne, Nakunvua kulomba kuebe, nakutangila binsonshi biebe; tangila, nententekashe bidimu dikumi ne bitanu ha mutu ha matuku a muoyo webe

Yeye wakambila mamu wandi ne, Bituha bia argent tshinunu tshimue ne lukama lumue biakibabo kudi, bua wewe wakela bantu mulau bualu buai, wakamba bualu ebu mu matshu anyi; mona, argent ndi n ai, meme nguakayangata
Bakadi batangadike bualu bua dikenga diakajuka bua lufu lua Stefano bakaya tô ne ku Foinike ne ku Kupulio ne ku Antiokia, bambila anu Bena Yuda dî
Bualu bua hatshidi mukau ne kutandangana munkatshi muenu, kanuena nulonda malu a mubidi, anyi
Hashishe wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, bulelela, muntu webe wakunvua lumu ne, Shaula udi ukeba mua kulua ku Kila bua kubutula musoko bualu buanyi
Malia wa ku Magadala wakadiku, ne Malia mukuabo, bakadi bashikame batangile buludiludi bua lukita
Bakakengeshibua bua buakane buabo badi ne disanka, bua bukelenge bua mu diulu budi buabo

Bualu ebu nebuikale mukenji kunudi tshiendelele mu dituku dia dikumi mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete nenujinge mu mitshima yenu, kanuenji mudimu, nansha bantu baledibue mu nsubu yenu nansha benyi badi munkatshi muenu, bualu bua edi ndituku didibo banubuikidila bubi buenu bua kunulengesha nunku nenuikale balengeshibue ku mibi yenu yonso ku mpala kua Yehowa

Kadi hakalua miloho kudi bantu banene ba mu Babulona yakatumabo bua kumuebesha bua malu a kukema akenjibua mu buloba buandi, Nzambi wakamulekela bua kumuteta, bua yeye amanye malu onso akadi munda mua mutshima wandi
Mishikankunde itanu yakadi mihote, minga itanu yakadi ne meshi
Tshisamba ne tshisamba tô ne bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele nebitume bantu tshinunu ku nvita
Ku bintu bionsu binudi nupeta, nundambule meme, Maweja Nangila, tshitupa tshijima
Yeye wakaya mu budimi, wakahumbulula mpumbuluila mu budimi ku nyima kua banowi, ku mpukahuka yeye wakabuela mu tshituha tshia budimi bua Boaza wakadi wa mu tshiota tshia Elimeleke
Bantu bonso ba mu tshikondo atshi bakasangishibua kudi bankambua babo kabidi, ne ba mu tshikondo tshikuabo tshiakabalonda ku nyima kabakamanya Yehowa anyi mudimu munene wakenzeleye Bena Isalele
Nunku bantu banyi nebamanye dina dianyi; nunku nebamanye halua difuku diadia ne, Mmeme Yehowa udi wamba dî edi; ka meme ndiku

Muena lubilu kena mua kunyema, Eu nganyi udi ubika bu musulu wa Nile, Eu udi Ejipitu udi ujuka bu musulu wa Nile, Bandaiku, nuenu tubalu; Bualu bua dituku adi ndituku dia Mukelenge Yehowa wa misumba; Banda ku Gilada, wangateku buanga bua kulaba, Ba mu bisamba bia bantu bakunvua lumu lua bundu buebe, Edi ndî diakambila Yehowa Yelemiya muprofete bualu bua Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, ne, Nealue kubutula buloba bua Ejipitu
Nunku kanuena nuhanga mu tshihedi tshimue; nudi nuindila dimueneka dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto
Bitabusha muntu, malu onso adi mua kumuenzekela
Bakambila Solomo ne, Shimei wakumuka mu Yelushalema, wakaya ku Gata, wakahingana kabidi
Wakimita difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamba ne, Katataka nentumbishe Yehowa, nunku wakidika dina diandi ne, Yuda, ne yeye wakalekela kulela
Kadi netufuile ku mesu kuebe, netujimishe buloba buetu kabidi bualu kai
Bakamuambila ne, Tuakuluila bua kukusuika, ne bua tuetu tukufile mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Baluishi benu nebanubutule
Bakasa nsubu, bakamushikisha bu muakadi mukenji wa Nzambi wa Bena Isalele, ne bu muakadi mukenji wa Kolesha ne Dayawesha ne Atashasete, mukelenge wa Pelasa
Bantu bonso bakamba ne, Netuenze nunku; bua bualu ebu buakadi buimpe ku mesu kuabo
Hakahita diba bu mpola Isatu, mukashi wandi wakabuela, kai mumanye bualu

Bana ba Yuda ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita; bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Yuda binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne binai ne nkama isambombo
Padi muena budimi musue kubupikula, udi ne bua kusakidila tshia bitanu tshimue ku mushinga uvua mutuangaji mulombe
Aba mbana ba Sibiona Aya ne Ana muntu eu Ana wakasangana mishimi yakadi ihatuka mai a kahia mu tshihela, hakadiye udisha nyama ya mpunda ya tatu andi Sibiona
Mu nvita ya ku mpala Yonatana ne muambudi wa ngabu wandi bakashiha balume bu makumi abidi bakadi badisangisha kaba kamue kakadi bu bunene bua tshituha tshia hectare wa buloba
Muntu kahanduludi tshidi tshibumbakanya kudi Nzambi
Netuambe tshinyi
Nakatangila, ne mona, kabalu ka tshitoketoke; ne dina dia wakadi ushikama ha nyima haku diakadi Lufu; ne Muaba wa Bafue wakalonda ku nyima kuandi
Benyi badi munkatshi muenu nebabandile ku mutu kuenu, ne nuenu nenuhuekele

Bika biebe, ujidike bantu, ubambile ne, Nudijidile bua malu a makelela; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi Wamba ne, Tshintu tshia tshijila tshidi munkatshi muenu, nuenu Bena Isalele, nunku kanuena mua kuimana ku mpala kua bena lukuna tô ne hanûmusha tshintu tshia tshijila munkatshi muenu
Nuenu nudi nutangila Muena Shulama bu munudi nutangila maja a bisumbu bibidi bia masalayi bua tshinyi
Bualu bua munda mua Kilisto nkayandi mudi muikale tshiuwidi tshijima tshia Bunzambi mu tshikadilu tshia mubidi

Benyi badi basombe munkatshi muenu matuku makese, nansha benyi bamane kusombamu bidimu bia bungi, balelangane, bapete bikulu mu ditunga dienu, padibu basue kundambula milambu ya mupuya muimpe, balonde bonsu anu mikenji eyi
Nyama ya mpunda ya Kishi, tatu wa Shaula, yakajimina
Nasha nuamba ne mutshi udi muimpe ne mamuma au adi mimpe, nasha nuamba ne mutshi udi mubi ne mamuma au adi mabi; bua mamuma adi amanyisha mudi mutshi wau
Bobo bakamba ne, Wewe kuakuiba bintu bietu, kuakutukengesha tshianana, kuakuangata tshintu ku tshianza tshia muntu
Mukelenge Alada, Muena Kanâna, wakadi ushikama ku luseke lua ku Sude lua buloba bua Kanâna, wakunvua lumu ne, Bena Isalele balualua
Hakatangila Bena Yuda ku nyima, monai, bakadi baluangana ku nyima kuabo ne ku mpala kuabo kabidi; bakadila kudi Yehowa, ne bakuidi bakela mpungi
Nunku Yehowa wakateka nyuma wa kudinga mukana mua baprofete bebe bonso; Yehowa wakamba malu mabi bualu buebe
Nunku Davidi wakabika ne dinda dionso, yeye ne bantu bandi, bua kuhingana ku buloba bua Bena Peleshete
Kadi kanuakatangila kudi wakavuisha muanda eu, kanuakanemeka wakadihangidishila muanda eu kale
Milondo isambombo ya mai misonga ya mabue yakadi nutekela bua mai a kuowa bu mudi tshilele tshia Bena Yuda, mulondo lita makumi tshitema, mulondo lita makumi tshitema
Mu dituku dia dikumi ne anai dia ngondo eu ku dilolo, nebadie mu tshikondo tshiaku, bobo nebenze bu mudi mei onso ne mikenji yonso bia kuhita kua Yehowa

Bualu bua meme nengihate bisamba bia bantu ku mesu kuenu, nendeheshe matshika enu: bantu bakuabo kabena bikale ne lukuka lua buloba buenu, hanuamueneka kudi Yehowa Nzambi wenu misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Muadi newikalemu ne kusumakana menu

Mamu webe wakadi Muena Hiti ne tatu webe wakadi Muena Amole; mukulu ebe wa bakashi wakadi Samalea, wakadi ushikama ne bana bandi ba bakashi ku luseke luebe lua nôde; muakunyi webe wa bakashi wakadi Sodoma, wakadi ushikama ne bana bandi ba bakashi ku luseke luebe lua sude

Bobo bakakudimuna Yoshua dî ne, Bualu bua bakambila bantu bebe bu muakadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muambile muntu wandi Mose bua kunuha buloba buonso, ne bua kushiha bena buloba bonso ku mpala kuenu; nunku tuakatshina bikole bua bualu buenu, ne tuakenza bualu ebu
Kupingaja bia bende Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Muntu yonsu, mulume nansha mukaji, udi wenzela mukuende bibi, neikale ne tshilumbu tshinene kudi Maweja Nangila
Ne kembualu bua kukema nasha; bualu bua Satana mene udi udiandamuna bu muanjelo wa munya
Kadi panuikala basue kusela muanetu wa bakaji, bateke balume bonsu ba muenu panshi
Mu Ejipitu kamuvua nkita anyi
Wewe wambile bantu malu â onso, ubasengelele, ubabele ne bukokeshi buonso
Muntu au kakafua nkayandi bua bualu bubi buakenzeye

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Katshiena tshikala bu tshihungidi tshinakahunga ne batatu babo mu dituku diakabakuata ku tshianza bua kuluhuka n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu; bualu bua bakashiha tshihungidi tshianyi, ne meme nakadi mukelenge wa ha mutu habo
Samuele wakenzela Yehowa mudimu; hakatshidiye muana, wakadi uluata efoda wa lin
Wewe Nzambi wetu, kuakihata bena buloba aba ku mpala kua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, kuakabuha bana ba Abalahama, mulunda webe, tshiendelele, anyi
Mafuta awu, ke adi ajadika ne: badi batuangaji kashidi, bobu ne ndelanganyi yabu yonsu
Nanku, dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu muibidi, Moshe ne Arone kusangisha bantu bonsu

diambedi tshiyi muanji kuya kundi tshiyi mua kuhingana kabidi, Budi buloba budi ne mufitu bu midima mikole, Yobo Hashishe, Sofâ, Muena Namata, wakakudimuna Yobo ne, Katuena ne bua kuitaba kudi muena mei a bungi, anyi

Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, wakabanga kutubala, kadi yeye kakashikisha mudimu eu; tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakahatukila Bena Isalele bua bualu ebu; kabakafunda bungi buabo mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a mukelenge Davidi
Meme ndi ndumbila nunku, tshi usesuka mu nshila; ndi nduangana ne mbata tshî bu muntu udi widikisha
Anyi muntu kai wakadianjila kuha Mukelenge tshintu, ne nebamuhingashiletshi kabidi
Wewe ne ndelanganyi yebe, ndi nnupesha ditunga dimvua mulaye Abrahame ne Izake
Yeye wakabakudimuna ne, Ahu ebu mbualu bua kukema, bua nuenu kanuena bamanye kuakafumeye, yeye wakatabasha mesu anyi
Nembalengeshe ku malu mabi onso akadibo bangenzela; nembabuikidile mibi yabo yonso yakadibo bangenzela ne yakantombokelabo n ai
Biasombesha muntu nansha nyama kai kudi mukuandi, ne biamutahabo mputa anyi biafueye ne muen andi kayiku, yeye nealamate bulelela
Balume bonso ba mu nsubu wandi, baledibue mu nsubu wandi, ne basumbibue ku argent kudi ba bende, bakatengudibua n andi

Yeye wakasa bibumba mu tshihela kabidi, wakimba mena a mai, bualu bua yeye wakadi ne bimuna bia bungi; Wakenza nunku mu bibanda ne mu mpata kabidi; yeye wakadi ne bidime ne balami ba mionshi ya tumuma tukese mu mikuna ne mu maloba mimpe; bualu bua yeye wakananga mudimu wa budimi, Uziya wakadi ne bena nvita ba bungi, bakaya bua kuluangana mu bisumbu biabo bu muakabatahulula Yeiele mufundi ne Mâseya kahita, bakadi mu bianza bia Hananya, kapitene kakuabo ka mukelenge
Ila, muana wa Ikeshe, Muena Tekoa, wakadi kapitene ka tshisumbu tshia mu ngondo muisambombo; mu tshisumbu tshiandi muakadi bantu binunu makumi abidi ne binai
Kadi Asahele wakahidia kusesuka, wakadi anu umulonda
Katuena bamanye mua kuhumbisha malu malelela, anu mua kuakuatshisha

Nudimuke bienu bimpe; bualu bua kanuakatangila tshifuanyikishi tshia muntu dituku diakasomba n enu Yehowa mu Holeba munkatshi mua kahia; kanuonyi mitshima yenu, kanudisongidi luhingu ne tshifuanyikishi tshia muntu nansha mulume nansha mukashi, nansha tshia nyama yonso ya ha buloba, anyi tshia nyunyu yonso idi yenda mu diulu, anyi tshia tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi ha buloba, anyi tshia munyinyi wa mu mai adi muinshi mua buloba; bua hanuabandisha mesu enu mulu, ne hanuatangila diba ne ngondo ne mitoto ne bintu bionso bia mu diulu, kanubitendeledi, kanubienzedi mudimu; ebu mbualu buakaha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu bonso bakuabo badi muinshi mua diulu
Au mmeku a Nafatale, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama mai
Bana balume ba baprofete bakadi ku Betele, bakalua kudi Elisha, bakamuebesha ne, Udi mumanye ne, Yehowa neumushe mukelenge webe ku mutu kuebe lelu, anyi
Kamuena ditshina mu dinanga; kadi dinanga diakane tshishiki didi dihata ditshina, bualu bua ditshina didi ne dikengesha; ne yeye udi utshina kena muanze kuvuishibua muakane tshishiki mu dinanga
Mona, Abinê wakalua kûdi; wewe wakamutuma ne yeye wakamana kuya bua tshinyi
Kadi ndi nuambila ne, Halua dituku dia kulumbulula, bujitu bua dikenga dienu nebutambe bua Tulo ne bua Sidona
Kulama kua Muinda Lew
Bualu bua Yehowa wakakumbamisha bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa Abimeleke, bualu bua Sala, mukashi wa Abalahama

Nsumuinu Nsumuinu ya Solomo, muana Bua bantu bamanye lungenyi ne diyisha, Bua bahete diyisha dia mua kuenza bienzedi bia meji, Bua kuha muntu udi kayi mutantamane mu lungenyi budimu, Muena meji unvue biandi, adiunde mu malu adibo bamuyisha; bua kujingululeye lusumuinu ne tshifuanyikishi, Ditshina dia Yehowa ntshibangidilu tshia lungenyi; Muan anyi, unvue diyisha dia tatu webe, Bualu bua biobi nebikale tshitotolo tshilengele tshia ku mutu webe, Muan anyi, biakuteya bantu babi, kuitabushi nansha
Buonso buabo bakakolesha mitshima yabo, ne bobo bine bakangata bia kudia
Hakumusheye demon, kamama kakakula; bantu bakakema ne, Diambedi kabakanza kutangila bualu nunku mu Isalele
Hakajukeye ku kutendelela kuandi, wakalua kudi bayidi, wakabasangana balale tulu bualu bua kanyinganyinga, wakabebesha ne, Nudi baladile tulu tshinyi
Kadi bintu bikuabo bidi ne mahuahua ne bidi ne mikolo mai bidi bibi kunudi
Bobo bakumuka munkatshi muetu, kadi kabakadi betu mene; bu bobo bikale betu, bakadi kuikala n etu; kadi bakumuka bua bobo bamueneshibue ne, Buonso buabo kabakadi betu mene
Kuasaye mitanda yende pankatshi pa Betele ne Ayi
Mu bunene bua buakane buebe, wewe utu wahita bantu bukole badi badilesha ku mesu kuebe, wewe udi ubatumina tshiji tshiebe, tshidi tshibosha bu bilu

Hashishe Eleyakima, muana wa Hilekiya, ne Shebena ne Yoa bakambila Labashake ne, Tudi tukusengelela ne, Uyikile ne bantu bebe mu muaku wa Bena Sulia, bualu bua tuetu tudi baumanye; kuyikidi n etu mu muaku wa Bena Yuda mu matshu a bantu badi ha lumbu
Musombuedi nkayandi neashihe mushihi wa muntu
Sara uvua musombe mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta, panyima pa bayende
Nunku ndi nusengelela bua nuenu kudia, bualu ebu nduhandu luenu, bualu bua lusuki lua ku mutu kua umue wenu kaluena lujimina
Kadi wewe, muntu wa hatuhu, udi musue kumanya ne, Ditabusha ditahuluka ku kuenza didi diatuka, anyi
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Yalede, Mahalelela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi asatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi

Bukokeshi bua Peka Mu tshidimu tshia makumi atanu ne bibidi tshia bukelenge bua Uziya, mukelenge wa Yuda, Peka, muana wa Lemalaya, wakabanga kukokesha Bena Isalele mu Samalea; wakabakokesha bidimu makumi abidi

Yehowa wakangambila kabidi ne, Nakatangila bantu aba ne mona, badi bantu ba tshitshu; undekele, bua meme neashihe, nenjimishe dina diabo muinshi mua diulu; meme nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshidi tshibahita bunene ne bukole

Yeye neikale bu nyama wa mpunda udi ne luonji munkatshi mua bantu, tshianza tshiandi netshiluishe muntu yonso, ne tshianza tshia muntu yonso netshimuluishe kabidi, yeye neikale mutangilangane ne bana babo bonso Yeye wakidika Yehowa wakamuambila malu au ne, Wewe udi Nzambi udi utangila, bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Nakamana kumona Nzambi, munyi mundi nshala ne muoyo

Yehowa, bunene ne bukole ne butumbi ne kutamba ne bulengele butambe mbiebe; bualu bua bintu bionso bia mu diulu ne bia ha buloba mbiebe; Yehowa, bukelenge mbuebe, ne wewe udi ubandishibua ku mutu kua bionso

Bwa kubweeja bipeta bîmpe, dimanya dipiluke ne mitalu mu ditangila dia bilumbu, badi batapulula bilumbulwidi mu nkongu isatu ya tubadi: tubadi twa lukongu lwa bandumbulula tudibo batangila kudi Kabadi ka kashipi ka mapangadika; tubadi twa lukongu lwa baludiki ba mbulamatadi tulombola kudi Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi, ne Kabadi kimikila Dîyi dikulu
Metushayele kulela Lemeke
Zekâya Nakabanduluka kabidi, nakatangila, ekumona, mukanda muvunga wakadi ubuka

Hashishe bakadisangisha tshisumbu tshia bantu bua kuelangana ne Mose ne Alona, baka tangila ku ntenta wa kusambakena, ne monai, difutu diakamubuikila ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka, Mose ne Alona bakatua ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Nasha kakese; bobo nkayabo badiluile bua kutuluhula
Bualu bua bakuabo bakamba ne, Tuetu ne bana betu balume ne bana betu bakashi tudi ba bungi; tuangate blé bua tuetu kudia, tuikale ne muoyo
Yosefe wakasangana luse ku mesu kuandi, wakamuenzela mudimu, wakamuteka mulami wa nsubu wandi yonso, wakafila bintu bionso biakadiye n abi mu tshianza tshiandi
Bana ba Bigewai, binunu bibidi ne makumi atanu ne basambombo
Misoko ya Yuda Ebu mbuhianyi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Yuda ku meku abo
Nukumbaje bionsu bindi mumane kuambila batuangaji ba bena Levi bua kunumanyisha
Tshiakanuambila malu â ku tshibangidilu, bualu bua nakadi n enu
Bumuka ku mukuna wa Shefere, kuyabu ku Arada
Mikete yabo neyikale bu mukete wa umena ndudi udi kayi uhingana bianza bituhu
Bualu ebu buakalua bubi kudi ba mu nsubu wa Yalobama, bua kubahidiabo ne bua kubajimishabo ha buloba
Mulume kena mua kuvuala bilamba bia mukaji
Ku nyima kua bonso, mukashi wakafua kabidi
Kadi kavua mudimanyishe kudibu nansha
Jeremiah Edi ndî dia kudi Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Fundai mei onso anakukuambila mu mukanda
Muntu wa kumudilu udi mufukibue ne dinfuenkenya dia buloba; muntu muibidi udi muntu wa mu diulu
Nuenu nenuenze mudimu muaba wa tshijila, ne ku tshilambuilu

Tshiendelu tshia munda mua ntempelo tshiakadi ne tshibuelelu tshitangilangane ne tshibuelelu etshi tshia ku luseke lua sude; yeye wakidikisha muaba wa hankatshi ha tshibuelelu ne tshibuelelu, wakadi coudées lukama
bintu bia kudia mu nshila mu bianza bienu, yai bienu kusangakana n abo, nubambile ne, Tuetu tudi bahika benu, nuhunge n etu tshihungidi
Bu muntu eu kai mufume kudi Nzambi, kakadi kumanya mua kuenza bualu
Bakalua ku Kapênuma; hakadiye mu nsubu, wakabakonka ne, Hanuakadi mu nshila, nuakuelangana mpata ya tshinyi
Hushama wakafua ne Hadada, muana mulume wa Bedada, wakashiha Midiyana mu buloba bua Moaba, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi; dina dia musoko wandi diakadi Awita
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke milau ei yonso ham bidi ha bena lukuna ne badi n enu tshiji, bakadi banukengesha
Wakenza mesa a acacia, buludi buau buakadi coudées ibidi, ne butshiama buau buakadi coudée umue, ne bule buau bua mulu coudée umue ne tshituha
Hashishe ditutu diakabuikila ntenta wa kusangakena, ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakûla nsubu tente
Yeye wakihata bena Sodoma mu buloba, wakumusha mpingu yonso yakenza batatu andi
Nzambi kabidi wakamanyishangana n abo ne ku bimanyinu ne ku malu a kukema ne ku bienzedi bia bukole bia bungi ne ku bihedi bia Nyuma Muimpe biakababanyinabo, bu mudi disua diandi
Disanka kûdi, wewe tshisamba, tshidi ne mukelenge muneme, tshidi ne baminyampala batu badia ha diba dikumbane bua kuheta bukole kabuyi bua kukuatshika maluvu
Ndi mbalombela; tshiena ndombela ba ha buloba, ndi ndombela anu bawakumpa; bualu bua bobo badi banyi; bintu bionso bidi bianyi mbiebe, biebe mbianyi kabidi; ndi ntumbishibua munda muabo
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Nansha, mukelenge wetu, bantu bebe bakuluila anu bua kusumbabo bia kudia
Tshimuangi Mvidi Mukulu udi uleja Moshe bukole buende Moshe kuandamuna Maweja Nangila ne: Bena Izrayele kabakuitaba, kabakukumbaja bionsu bindi mbambila to
Nehemiya Matu Akenza Nehemiya bua Kulengesha Bantu Mu dituku adi bakabala mu mukanda wa Mose mu matshu a bantu
Yehowa wakandesha batudi ba biamu banai
Bua difuku adi
Hakamumona bafundi ba Bafalese udia ne bantu babi ne basangishi ba mulambu nunku, bakakonka bayidi bandi ne, Munyi mudiye udia unua ne basangishi ba mulambu ne bantu babi
Uvua mumanye ne: bana badibu mua kupeta ne mukaji awu, nebikale anu ba mukuluende
Samuele wakamba ne, Bulelela, bu muakadi muele webe wa nvita mushiye bakashi kabayi ne bana, nunku mamu webe neikale munkatshi mua bakashi kayi ne bana

Nunku nakatanda n abo, nakabela mulau, nakabakuma, nakatua nsuki yabo, nakabatshihisha kudi Nzambi ne, Kanufidi bana benu bakashi kudi bana babo balume, kanuangatshidi bana benu balume bakashi kudibo, kanudiangatshidibo nuenu kabidi
Yehowa wakabidika mukana mua mpunda, wakambila Belâma ne, Nakuenza tshinyi bua wewe wakunkuma misangu isatu
Nanku muntu uvua mushipangane mu mpukapuka awu, udi mua kunyemena mu tshimue tshia ku bimenga ebi bisatu bua kudipandisha
Bana ba balume ba Lubena, muan a bute wa Isalele Hanoka ne Palu, Heselona ne Kâmi, â mmeku a Lubena
Haluabo n enu ku mpala kua badi ku mutu kua nsunagoga, ne kua balumbuludi, ne kua banfumu, kanutambi kuelangana meshi ne, Netubakudimune dî kai

Nuditangile bienu bimpe, ne tshisumbu tshionso tshiakanutekelabo batangidi Ndi mumanye ne, Hanumuka bianyi, nkashama idi ne luonji neilue munkatshi muenu, neyone tshisumbu tshia mikoko; bantu nebabike munkatshi muenu mene, bambila bantu malu adi kâi malelela bua kukokabo bayidi ku nyima kuabo
Bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mumane kubamanyisha ne: nenuluile bonsu mu tshipela
Bayidi makumi muanda mutekete bakahingana ne disanka, bakamba ne, Mukelenge, bademon mene badi batumikila dî dietu mu dina diebe
Kadi yeye wakabambila ne, Nudi nutangila bintu ebi bionso, anyi
Enza minda muanda mutekete, bualu bua kutemenayi muaba udi ku mpala kua tshitekelu
Yeye wakamba ne, Petelo, ndi nkuambila ne, Tshitala katshî tshianze kusama lelu wewe neuvile misangu isatu ne, Tshiena mumumanye
Buhianyi bisambombo buakadi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Nafatale ku meku abo
Udi ne bukookeshi bwa kufuta mabanza pa tshipaapu tshijima tshia ditunga
Bana ba Shefataya, nkama isatu ne makumi muanda mutekete ne babidi

Bakafila argent yakabalabo mu bianza bia bena mudimu ne mu bianza bia bantu bakadi balama nsubu wa Yehowa; bakahita n ai bena mabaya ne bibaki ba nsubu bakadi benza mudimu wa nsubu wa Yehowa, ne bena tushola ne basongi ba mabue; bakasumba n ai mabaya ne mabue masonga ne bintu bionso bia kulongololabo n abi miaba mishimbuke mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Bayidi bandi bakadi bamane kuya mu musoko bua kusumba bia kudia
Yeye wakangambila ne, Kuteki tshimanyishilu ku mei a buambi bua mu mukanda eu; bualu bua tshikondo tshidi ha buihi
Katataka nudi basue kubuesha Bena Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema bu bahika benu bakashi ne balume; kadi nuenu kanuakenzela Yehowa Nzambi wenu bibi, anyi
Nakadi kusua bua muntu wa munkatshi muenu inshile bibi bia ku biendelu bia mu ntempelo bua nuenu kanutemeshi kahia ha tshioshelu tshianyi tshianana
Dibaya dionsu dikale ne bitaku bibidi
Hashishe Labashake wakimana, wakela dî diandi bikole nu muaku wa Bena Yuda, wakamba ne; Unvuai dî dia mukelenge munene wa Bena Ashû
Maweja Nangila kufuila bena Izrayele luse, kena mubenzele bionsu bivuaye mubakanyine to
Nunku Yoshua wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakasangisha Bena Isalele ku bisamba biabo; bakasungula tshisamba tshia Yuda
Bualu bua ndi mbutula bantu bakane ne bantu babi ba munkatshi muebe, nunku muele wanyi wa nvita neuhatuke mu tshimanga tshiau bua kutaha bantu bonso ba ku luseke lua sude tô ne ku luseke lua node
Nenusombemu

Hakahita mukelenge, yeye wakadila kudi mukelenge, wakamba ne, Muntu webe wakaya munkatshi mua nvita; mona, muntu mukuabo wakalua kundi ne munga muntu, wakangambila ne, Ulame muntu eu; biajimineye, nebalombe muoyo webe ku muoyo wandi, anyi wewe neufute ntalanta wa argent
Mubidi wandi wakabola ne dibungi dia mulu, tô ne hakaleha nsuki yandi bu masala a nyunyu wa mukanku, ne nzadi yakalua bu nzadi ya nyunyu
Bana ba balume ba Lubena, Hanoka ne Palu ne Heselona ne Kâmi
Mukanda wa Nzambi udi wamba ne, Wamuitabusha kena ufuishibua bundu
Nunku bantu bonso ba mu ditunga bakasanka, bakashikama talalâ

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Henza mulumi anyi mukashi bualu bubi budi bantu benza, udi ushiha mukenji wa Yehowa, ne badi bahisha muntu au, nunku yeye neatonde bubi buakenzeye, neahingishe bintu bionso biakangateye, neasangishe tshintu tshia tshitanu ha mutu habi, neabihingishe kudi nfumu wabi wakenzeye bubi
Hashishe Davidi wakajuka, wakakosa tshihesa tshia tshikowelu tshia Shaula mu musokoko
Bakamukuata, bakaluhuka n andi, bakalua n andi mu nsubu wa muakuidi munene
Katuyi banze kudilengesha, tô ne ku dituku edi, bua mulau wakela Yehowa tshisumbu tshia bantu, nuenu nudi basue kuhambuka lelu ne kuhanga kulonda Yehowa, anyi
Hakatangila Yoshua ne Bena Isalele bonso ne balaminyi bakanyenga musoko, ne muishi wa musoko wakabanda mulu, bobo bakakudimuka, bakashiha Bena Ai
Yeye wakalua n anyi mu muaba au, ekumona
Wakamba ne, Kanulengi bantu banyi bedibue manyi ha mutu tshianga, kanuenzedi baprofete banyi bibi

Kadi hakamanya Paulo ne, Bakuabo mBasadoke, bakuabo mBafalese, wakela dî dikole ha tshilumbuluidi ne, Bana betu, Edi bianyi Mufalese, udi muana wa Mufalese; badi bandumbuluishila bua ditekemena ne bua dibika dia befue
Tshisamba tshikuabo netshiluangane ne tshinga, bukelenge bukuabo nebuluangane ne bunga, buloba nebukanke ku nseke ne ku nseke, biole nebikaleku; malu au adi tshibangidilu tshia kanyinganyinga kakole
Abashaloma ne bantu bonso, Bena Isalele, bakabuela mu Yelushalema; Ahitofele wakadi n andi
