Hanuambila bantu ne, Nukebe lungenyi kudi bena lubuku lua muzangu ne kudi bena muhongo badi bakula bu biambi ne badi banungana, bualu kabuena bukuata bantu bua kukeba lungenyi kudi Nzambi wabo, anyi
Nunku, uvuluke bu muwakuangata ne muwakulua; ulame bûdi n abu, ukudimune mutshima webe
Kadi hangakula n ebe, nembulule mukana muebe, ne wewe neubambile dî edi ne, Yehowa Nzambi udi wamba nunku
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Nansha, tshiena nya, bualu ebu bua kungumusha nunku budi butamba bukuabo buwakungenzela bubi

Munkatshi mua bifukibue bidi ne muoyo muakamueneka bintu bu makala a kahia akadi atema, bifuanangane ne bimunyi bitambakane munkatshi mua bifukibua; kahia kakakenka bikole ne nuele ya nvula yakahatuka munkatshi mua kahia

Hemana ne Yedutuna bakadi n abo ne bakuabo bakadi basungudibue bakadi ne mena abo mafunda bua kusakidilabo Yehowa bualu bua luse luandi ludi lujalame tshiendelele; Hemana ne Yedutuna bakadi n abo ne mpungi ne biamu bia kukumakasha bua kulombolabo misambu ne bua kuimbabo n abi misambu ya Nzambi; bana balume ba Yedutuna bakadi ku bibi

Yakoba wakamba ne, Nansha, ndi nkutendekena ne, Biwikala n anyi luse, witabushe matabisha a ku tshianza tshinyi, bualu bua nakumona mpala webe bu muntu udi umona mpala wa Nzambi, ne wewe wakusanka bua bualu buanyi
Kadi bobo bakela mbila kabidi ne, Muntu eu nasha, anu Balaba
Mulami wa nsubu wa lukanu wakafua bonso bakadi mu nsubu wa lukanu mu tshianza tshia Yosefe, malu onso akenzabomu, yeye wakadi bu muenzeshi wau

Bungi bua bantu balume bonsu ba bena Levi, bavua Moshe ne Arone babadike, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambe, bituadije ku bana batekete ba ngondu umue too ne ku bantu bakulumpe, kabidi bilondeshile ku meku abu, bavua
Maweja Nangila kuandamuna Moshe ne: Meme ndi ne bukole bua kukumbaja bionsu abi

Muakuidi nealabe manyi adi ashala mu tshianza tshiandi ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia muntu udiye musue kulengesha ne ku tshiala tshiandi tshia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku muan a dikasa munene wa ku tshianza tshia balume ha mutu ha mashi a mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, manyi adi ashala mu tshianza tshia muakuidi, nêle ha mutu ha muntu udiye musue kulengesha, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi ku mpala kua Yehowa

Bena Lewi banene bakadi Hashebeya ne Shelebaya ne Yeshua, muana wa Kadamiele, ne bana babo bakadi n abo bua kutumbishabo ne bua kusakidilabo Nzambi bu muakadi mukenji wa Davidi, muntu wa Nzambi, muntu mu muaba wandi muntu mu muaba wandi
Kuambilaye Yozefe ne: Mvidi Mukulu wa bukole buonsu uvua mummuenekele ku Kenaane mu musoku wa Luze, mungele lupemba

Festo wakamba ne, Mukelenge Agipa ne bonso badi n etu kunoko, nudi nutangila muntu eu wakabandabo kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Yuda ku mesu kuanyi, ku Yelushalema ne kunoko kabidi, bela mbila ne, Kambimpe bia yeye ikale ne muoyo kabidi

Nakalunuisha Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, ne bahika bandi ne baminyampala bandi ne bantu bandi bonso; bantu ba bisamba bikuabo badi babuelakana n abo; bakelenge bonso ba mu buloba bua Uza, bakelenge bonso ba mu buloba bua Bena Peleshete, ba mu Ashekelona, ba mu Gaza, ha mu Ekelona ne ba mu Ashedodo badi bashale
Kadi hakafikabo ha nsangilu ibidi ya mai, bakatua buatu ku lusenga; mpala wa buatu wakatua ku lusenga, wakashindama, kadi tshitaku tshiabu tshiakabanga kutshibuka bualu bua bukole bua mambuanka
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, elu ndusumuinu kai lunudi n alu mu buloba bua Isalele ne, Matuku adi aleha ne tshikena kumona tshionso tshidi tshihanga kuenza bualu buatshi
Mu Yelushalema, hehi ne tshibuelelu tshia mikoko, mudi mpokolo wa mai a kuowa, udi Bena Yuda babikila ne, Beteseda, wakadi ne bitanda bitanu
Mubidi webe udi bu dibue dia ngashi, ne mabele ebe adi bu ntungu ya ngashi

Bakateka ha mutu handi bubandi buakamabandabo bufunda ne: Eu udi Hashishe, bakakumina diakamue n andi banyengi babidi milonda mu bianza ne ku makasa ku mitshi mitshiamakane, mukuabo ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume, munga ku tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi
Badi ne mudimu wa kulama bimpe bintu bia tshijila menemene
Nenkûmushe mu mudimu webe, nebakutulule ku muaba webe

Yehowa Nzambi wa misumba, utuandamune mitshima yetu kabidi; Psalms Nuimbile Nzambi udi bukole buetu musambu ne dî dikole; Nuambulule mei enu mu musambu, nuakuishe dikasa, Nuele mpungi habala ngondo, Bualu bua eu mmukenji mufundila Bena Isalele, Yeye wakajadikila Yosefe mukenji eu bu tshimanyishilu, Nakatentumuna diaha diandi ku dituala dia bujitu, Wakungela dî hawakadi mu dikenga, nakakuhidisha; Unvuai, nuenu bantu banyi, nennudimushe

Aba mbena bukitu ba munkatshi mua bena nvita: Asahele, muan abo ne Yoaba, Elehanana, muana wa Dodo wa mu Beteleheme, Shamota, Muena Halola, Helese, Muena Pelona, Ila, muana wa Ikishe, Muena Tekoa, Abiezê, Muena Anatota, Sibekai, Muena Husha, Hai, Muena Ahoa, Mahalai, Muena Netofa, Helede, muana wa Bâna, Muena Netofa, Itai, muana wa Libai wa mu Gibea, wa bana ba Benyamina, Benaya, Muena Pilatona, Hulai, wa ku misulu ya Gâsha, Abiele, Muena Âba, Azemaweta, Muena Bahaluma, Eliaba, Muena Shâlabona, bana balume ba Hashema, Muena Gizona, Yonatana, muana wa Shage, Muena Halala, Ahiama, muana wa Sakâ, Muena Halala, Elifala, muana wa Ula, Hefê, Muena Mekelata, Ahiya, Muena Pelona, Heselo, Muena Kâmele, Nâlai, muana wa Ezebai, Yoele, muan abo ne Natana, Mibehâ, muana wa Hageli, Seleke, Muena Amona, Nahalai, Muena Belota, muambudi wa ngabu wa Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, Ila, Muena Yitela, Galeba, Muena Yitela, Uliya, Muena Hiti, Zabada, muana wa Ahalai, Adina, muana wa Shiza, Muena Lubena, mukelenge wa mu Bena Lubena, ne bantu makumi asatu bakadi n andi, Hanuna, muana wa Mâka, ne Yoshafata, Muena Mitena, Uziya, Muena Ashetelata, Shama ne Yiyele, bana ba balume ba Hotama, Muena Aloê, Yediele, muana wa Shimeli, ne Yoha muan abo, Muena Tiso, Eliele, Muena Mahawa, ne Yelibai ne Yoshawia ne bana ba balume ba Elenâma, ne Yitema, Muena Moaba, Eliele ne Obeda ne Yâsiele, Muena Mesobaya
Bualu bantu ba bisamba bikuabu aba, badi mua kutombola ndelanganyi yenu, bua nubenge Maweja Nangila, nutendelele mvidie mikuabu

Wakamba ne, Kanulengi bantu banyi bedibue manyi ha mutu Wakabikila tshiole bua kuluatshi ha buloba abu; Wakatuma muntu bua kudianjileye ku mpala kuabo, Bakasamisha makasa andi ne nkanu yakasuikabo n ai, dî dia Yehowa diakamuteta Mukelenge wakatuma dî bua kumusulula, Wakamuyisha mukelenge ku mutu kua nsubu wandi, Bua kulesheye Isalele kabidi wakabuela mu Ejipitu; Yehowa wakavudisha bantu bandi bua kukumbanabo ba bungi, Wakakudimuna mitshima ya bantu aba bua kuikalabo ne bantu bandi Wakatumaku Mose muntu wandi, Bobo bakabalesha bimanyinu biandi munkatshi muabo, Wakatuma mîdima, wakayosha mufitu mu buloba; ne bakatombokela Wakakudimuna mai a misulu yabo bua kuluau mashi, Buloba buabo huakûla tente ne biula, Wakamba dî diandi, njiji yakalua mu bisumbu bia bungi, Wakabaha mabue a nvula akabalokela bu nvula, Wakashiha mionshi yabo ya nyinyo kabidi, ne mitshi yabo ya nngi, Wakela dî diandi, mikumbi yakalua, Yakadia midioko yonso ya mu buloba buabo, Wakashihesha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba buabo, bana aba mene bakadianjilabo Ka yeye wakaluhula Bena Isalele batuala biabo biamu bia argent ne or; Ba mu Ejipitu bakadi ne disanka hakaya bantu aba; Yeye wakababaluluila ditutu bu tshibuikidi, Bakamulomba ne yeye wakabaha nkuadi, Yeye wakahanda dibue, mai akahumukamu; Bualu bua wakavuluka biandi dî diandi dia tshijila, Wakaluhula bantu bandi ne disanka, Wakabaha maloba a bisamba bia bantu ba bende; Bua kulondabo mei akabambileye; Misambu Tumbishai Yehowa

nenubambile ne, Bualu bua mai a Yadene akahanduluka ku mpala kua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa; hakasabuka mushete Yadene, mai a Yadene akahanduluka; ne mabue au neikale bu tshivulukidi kudi Bena Isalele tshiendelele
Bana balume ba Yawana badi nunku Elisha ne Tâshishi ne Kitima ne Dodamma
Bana betu, dikuatshisha kai didi kudi muatu, biambeye ne, Ndi ne ditabusha, kadi yeye kena ne kuenza
Bubidi buabo bakaya mu mai, Filipo ne muntu mutungula, Filipo wakamubatiza
Mabaya muanda mukulu akadiku ne masoso a tshiamu tshia argent dikumi ne asambombo, masoso abidi ku dibaya ku dibaya

Habuelabo mu bibuelelu bia ku tshiendelu tshia munda, baluate bivualu bia lin; kabikadi ne tshintu tshia miosa ya mikoko ham bidi habo hatshidibo bakuata mudimu munda mua luhangu lua ku tshiendelu tshia munda, anyi mu tshitendelelu mene
Mikuabu itanu, uyilamakaje ne mabaya adi panyima pa muaba wa tshijila luseke ludi diba dibuelela
Kadi bayende kena mumujikidile ne mulume

Hanuatshintshimika musoko musangu mule, hanualuangana n abo bua kûnyenga, kanushihi mitshi ya tumuma ne tusui; nudi mua kudia tumuma atu, kanushihi mitshi, bualu bua mitshi ei idi bu bantu banudi uluangana n abo, anyi
Udi unkonkela meme tshinyi

Mu matuku andi Palô neko, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, wakaya ku musulu wa Pelata bua kuluanganeye ne mukelenge wa Ashû; mukelenge Yoshiya wakaluhuka bua kuluanganeye n andi, Palô neko wakamushiha ku Megido hakamutangileye

Abalama wakangata mukashi wandi Salai, ne Lota, muana wa muan abo, ne bintu biabo bionso, ne bantu bonso bakahetabo mu Halana, bakaya mu nshila wa ku buloba bua Kanâna, bakafika mu buloba bua Kanâna Abalama wakalala mu buloba, wakalua ku Shekeme, kuakadi mutshi wa telebinta wa mu Mole Bena Kanana bakadi mu buloba tshikondo atshi
Hakafumabo ku mutu kua mukuna, bakahingana ku musoko, yeye wakasomba ne Shaula ha mutu ha nsubu
Kadi bituatekemena bitudi katu

Nunku Amenona wakalala hanshi, wakadifuanyisha bu muena disama; hakabuela mukelenge bua kumutangila, Amenona wakambila mukelenge ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Anji kuitabusha bua muan etu Tamâ andambile mikata ibidi ku mesu kuanyi bua meme nyidie anu ku tshianza tshiandi
Dutelonone Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu ya Bena Kanâna Ek
Esau wakamuebesha ne, Tshisumbu atshi tshinene tshmakusangakena n atshi mu nshila ntshia bualu kai
Bualu bua mu bilota bia bungi mudi mei a bungi ahatuka, kadi utshine Nzambi
Ndelanganyi ya Tera, tatuende wa Abrame, wa Nahore ne wa Arane idi nunku: Arane kulela Lote

Aba mbantu bakafuma mu Tele mela, Tele hâsha, Keluba, Adona ne Imê, bobo kabakadi mua kujadika biota biabo ne bankambua babo ne tunkanuniuna tuabo ne, Tudi Bena Isalele: Bana ba Delaya, bana ba Tobiya, bana ba Nekoda nkama isambombo ne makumi anai ne babidi
Aba mbana ba balume ba Bitiya, muana wa bakashi wa Palo, wakabakibua kudi Melede
Maweja Nangila kakuikala nenu to, bualu nudi bamubenge
Kadi dî dia Nzambi diakadiunda, diakavulangana

Bakela luhuishi ha mutu habo, ne bakela mbila, bikale ne binsonshi ne badila muadi, bamba ne, Mulau, mulau, musoko munene, muakadi bonso bakadi ne matu abo ha mai manene bavuishibue babanshi bualu bua mushinga wau mukole
Nakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakajidibua kudi Yehowa, ne malonga â adi majidila kabidi, ne argent ne or bidi bifidibue bu muakadi disua dia mitshima kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu
Nuenu kanuena mua kukukuila mvidie wa tshisamba tshikuabu to
Wakakuata mufofo ku tshianza tshiandi, wakaluhuka n andi mu musoko; hakamutuileye lute mu mesu andi, wakamulenga bianza, wakamukonka ne, Udi umona tshintu, anyi

Kanuntendeledi ne mashi a nyama mishiha ne bidia bidi ne luevene hohamue kanushiyi manyi a nyama ya milambu yanyi to ne ku dinda Bintu bia kumudilu binudi nu huola mu madimi, nulue n abi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Monai, nakanuyisha mei ne mikenji, bu muakangambila Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, bua nuenu kubienza mu buloba bunudi nubuela bua kubuhiana
dipingaja dia beena bilumbu mwabo, diya kusomba mu ditunga dia benda, dipatuka dia mu ditunga diebe, difila dia pasepolo ne viza;
Biakulenduisha disu diebe, waditula, wadimasha; bua wewe kubuela mu muoyo ne disu dimue kudi kutamba bua wewe kuimashibua mu Ngena wa kahia ne mesu abidi
Kadi mukelenge Solomo neavudishibue disanka, ne nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Davidi neajadikibue ku mesu kua Yehowa tshiendelele
Hakashikisha Yehowa kusomba ne Mose ha mukuna wa Sinai, yeye wakamuha mabue abidi akadi ne mikenji mifundahu ne munu wa Nzambi
Nebanutengule, ne bualu ebu nebuikale bu tshimanyinu tshia tshihungidi tshidi hankatshi hetu n ebe
Netudibingishe munyi
Kadi kupangilabu
Kabena banjinguluila to
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Kanudi dianyi dia ngombe anyi dia mukoko anyi dia mbushi
Wakalala tulu muinshi mua mutshi wa genêt: mona, muanjelo wakamulenga tshianza, wakamuambila ne, Juka biebe, udie
Mu diba adi Danyele wakatumbisha Nzambi wa mu diulu
Bantu balume bonsu, too ne bana ba ngondu umue ne pa mutu, bavua
Ne tuetu hetu netuhanduke munyi
Mukelenge wakambila Yoaba ne Abishai ne Itai ne, Kanuenzedi nsongalume Abashaloma bibi bua bualu buanyi
Yeye neakuate ditunga dia Seyire, ditunga dia baluishi bende bena Edome

Meme nakamana kulongolola bintu bia mu nsubu wa Nzambi wanyi ne bukole buonso bundi n abu, or ya bintu bia tshiamu tshia or, ne argent ya bintu bia tshiamu tshia argent, ne tshiamu tshia mitaku tshia bintu bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne tshiamu tshifike tshia bintu bia tshiamu tshifike, ne mitshi ya bintu bia mitshi; ne mabue a onyx ne mabue adibo balengesha n au bintu ne mabue a mishindu yonso ne mabue onso a mushinga mukole ne mabue manene matoke Bualu bukuabo kabidi, bualu bua meme nakateka mutshima wanyi kudi nsubu wa Nzambi wanyi, meme nakafila mu nsubu wa Nzambi wanyi bibutshilu bianyi bia or ne bia argent ku mutu kua bintu binakalongolola bua muaba eu wa tshijila; bu ntalanta ya or ya bintu bia or, ne ya argent ya bintu bia argent ya midimu yonso ya bantu badi ne lungenyi lule
Kakamuambila ne, Wewe, muntu wa Nzambi, mukelenge udi wamba ne, Uhueke biebe

Bantu bakumuka mu buhika bakenza nunku; bakasungula Ezela muakuidi ne bakuabo bakadi ku mutu kua biota bia batatu babo ne buonso buabo ku mena abo bakadi batahuluke, bakashikama mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa dikumi bua kulongolola bualu ebu
Biasua muntu kuhikula tshituha tshia tshintu tshia dikumi, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu hatshi
Bena Kohata bakaya ku mpala batuale bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshijila, ne bakuabo bakashimika nsubu wa tshitendelelu diambedi bobo kabayi banze kulua
Webe munanga udi uhita bakuabo munyi, bua wewe udi utusengelela nunku
Nubidile anu mu nzubu, kanupatuki ne munyinyi pa mbelu

Shaula wakatuma ba messager bua kukuatabo Davidi; kadi hakatangilabo tshisumbu tshia baprofete bamba dî dia Nzambi ne Samuele muimane ku mutu kuabo, Nyuma wa Nzambi wakatulukila ba messager ba Shaula, bobo bakamba dî dia Nzambi kabidi
Bakaya, bakamba bualu bua Nzambi kuonso; Mukelenge wakabenzesha, wakajadika dî ne bimanyinu biakabalonda
Hashishe Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, wakaya, wakamuhonesha, wakamushiha; wakajikibua mu nsubu muandi wa mu tshihela
Petelo wakaya ne Yesu, wakabanga kumubela
Yehu wakabuela mu nsubu wa Bâla ne Yehonadaba, muana wa Lekaba, wakambila batendeledi ba Bâla ne, Nukebe, nutangile ne anu batendeledi ba Bâla badimu, ne kamuikadi bantu ba Yehowa
Butuku Labane kufila muanende wa bakaji Leya kudi Yakobe
Mpindiu nshikidilu wakufika kunudi; nentume tshiji tshianyi bua tshinukengeshe, nennulumbuluishe bu mudi bienzedi bienu; nennuhingashile difutu bua malu enu onso manyanguke

Ndi nsakidila Nzambi; ndi nutamba buonso buenu kuakula miaku; kadi mu ekelesia ndi ntamba kusua kuakula mei atanu ne meshi anyi, bua kuyisha bakuabo kabidi, ku mpala kua kuakula mei lubombo mu muaku udibo kabai bamanye
Wakajadika tshiowelu ku tshianza tshia balume tshia ntempelo ku luseke lua ku sude esete

Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ne muoyo tshiena ne bidia, kadi ndi ne anu dianza tente dia bukula mu mulondo ne manyi tukese mu kasu; tangila, ndi ngangula tutshi tubidi bua meme kudilambila ne muana wanyi, hatuadia, netufue
Hashishe, mukuabo neamuambile ne, Huwa biebe talalâ, bualu bua katuena bamanye mua kutela dina dia Yehowa
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Tshiena ne disanka bua malu enu, tshiena ngitabusha mulambu ku tshianza tshienu
Nuenu kanuena bantu ba Shaula, anyi
Kadi Bena Benyamina kabakunvua dî dia bana babo, Bena Isalele
Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakalua bua kuluangana n andi, wakamusuika nkanu bua kuya n andi ku Babulona
Nunku Solomo wakibaka nsubu, wakamumana
Bayidi bandi bakamuambila ne, Wewe udi utangila bantu ba bungi bakunguila, udi ukenkela nunku tshinyi ne, Wakundenga nganyi
Bena Yebuse bakambila Davidi ne, Wewe kuena ubuela kunoko
Yeye wakabebesha ne, Badi mua kuamba ne, Kilisto udi muana wa Davidi, munyi
Neanyenge nzambi yabo, mpingu yakatulabo, ne malonga abo mimpe a argent ne a or, neaye n abi mu Ejipitu
Yeye wakangata manteke ne mabele ne lukungulu lua ngombe luakalambabo, wakabiteka ku mpala kuabo
Hakafikeye kudi mukelenge, yeye wakamuebesha ne, Mikaya, tuye kuluangana ne Bena Lamota gilada, anyi tushale
Yesu wakamba ne, Malia
Muntu awu, neatuadije kabidi kudijidila
Nanku, Maweja Nangila kuandamuna ne: Tuluka, uye kukeba muanenu Arone mu mitanda
Yosefe wakamona bana ba Efelayima to ne ku bikondo bisatu, bakalela bana ba Mala, muana wa Manashe, ha binu bia Yosefe kabidi
Abimeleke wakaluangana ne bena musoko dituku adi dionso, wakanyenga musoko, wakashiha bantu bonso bakadimu
Hakatshiabu muan a bute wakambila muan a mukala ne, Butuku bua lelu nakulala ne tatu wanyi, tumunuishe nvinyo butuku ebu kabidi, wewe ubuele, ulale bandi, bua tuetu tulelele tatu wetu bana
Kadi kabakumusha bitendelelu bionso biakadi ha mutu ha mikuna ya mu Isalele; kadi mutshima wa Asa wakadi muakane matuku andi onso
Nuakumbula tshina tshia mai hankatshi ha ngumbu ibidi bua kukuatamu mai a mu tshina tshia diambedi
Kadi mayi avuabu nawu mu kabulubulu kujika
Luse luikale kalui ne lubombo
Yeye nkayandi wakahita ku mpala kuabo, wakakukuila hanshi misangu muanda mutekete to ne hakasemeneye ha buihi ne mukulu andi
Bikalabo babakibue kudi balume ba mu tshisamba tshikuabo tshia Bena Isalele, nunku nebanyeme buhianyi buabo ku buhianyi bua batatu etu, nebabusangishe ku buhianyi bua tshisamba tshiakayabo
Malia wa ku Magadala wakadiku, ne Malia mukuabo, bakadi bashikame batangile buludiludi bua lukita

Tshituha tshia buloba tshidi tshishala, butshiama buatshi coudées binunu bitanu, ne bihidi ku mpala kua mukalu wa coudées binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu, tshikale buloba bua malu makuabo bua kuasamu musoko, bua nsubu, bua madimi; musoko wikale munkatshi mua muaba eu
Benaya eu wakadi umue wa bantu aba bakole makumi asatu, wakadi ku mutu kuabo mene; mu tshisumbu tshiandi muakadi muan andi Amizabada
Enzai nunku ne ngombe yenu ne mikoko yenu kabidi, muana neikale ne mamu wandi matuku muanda mutekete, kadi numufile kundi dituku dia muanda mukulu
Nudi basue kulua bayidi bandi, anyi
Yeye wakalekela Mose
Biahana muntu nsubu mu musoko udi munyungulula ne lumbu yeye udi mua kuhikula nsubu diambedi tshidimu tshimue katshiyi tshianze kuhita, tô tshidimu tshijima yeye udi mua kumuhikula
Davidi wakatshina Nzambi dituku adi, wakamba ne, Nenye ne mushete wa Nzambi kuanyi bishi
Nakatangila bahika babanda ha nyima ha tuhalu; nakatangila bakokeshi benda hanshi bu bahika

Nuenu bonso badi ne nyota, Munyi munudi nuidikishila bantu argent bua kusumba tshidi Telejai matshu enu, nulue kundi; Monai, nakamusungula bu mumanyi wanyi kudi bantu, Monai, wewe neubikile tshisamba tshiudi kuyi muanze kumanya, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Muntu mubi alekele kuenda mu nshila wandi mubi, Bualu bua meji anyi kaena meji enu, Bualu bua bu mudi diulu dihita buloba kuikala mulu, Bualu bua bu mudi nvula uloka, ne bu mudi neige ifuma mu diulu, nunku dî didi dihatuka mukana muanyi nedikale muomumue; Bualu bua nenduhuke ne disanka, Mu muaba muakadi meba mutshi wa cyprès neutoloke, Yeshaya Yehowa udi wamba dî edi ne, Udi muvudishibue disanka mmuntu udi wenza muanda eu, Muena tshisamba tshia bende wakalamata kudi Yehowa kambi biandi ne, Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba dî edi ne, Nembahe tshivulukidi ne dina mu nsubu muanyi ne munda mua ngumbu yanyi Bantu ba bende kabidi badi balamata kudi Yehowa nendue ne bantu aba ku mukuna wanyi wa tshijila, bualu bua nebabikile Mukelenge Yehowa, udi usangisha bamuangalashibue ba mu Isalele, Nuenu nyama yonso ya mu mpata, nulue kudia, Batentekedi bandi badi bafofo, Mbua idi ne lumpukusu kabidi, Badi bamba ne, Luai bienu, ndi ndua ne nvinyo, Yeshaya Muntu muakane udi ufua, udi ubuela biandi mu ditalala; Kadi Semenai bienu ha buihi, Nudi nuseka nganyi
Davidi wakambila bantu bonso ne, Tuvudishilai Yehowa Nzambi wetu disanka
Ke mikenji idi itangila bintu bikuate butu, nansha biobi bienza ne miosa ya nyama, nansha bienza ne ndanda, nansha bilamba bikuabu bia pambidi, nansha bienza ne biseba
Yehowa, tudi tutonda mibi yetu ne malu mabi a batatu betu; Kutulenguludi, bualu bua dina diebe; Mukuabo udiku wa munkatshi mua nzambi ya hatuhu ya bantu ba bende udi mua kulokesha nvula, anyi
Kulembelejaye tshilamba mu mushiku wa mbelu wa muaba wa tshijila

Ebi mbintu biakajidilabo n abi tshioshelu mu dituku diakelabo manyi ha mutu hatshi kudi bukelenge ba mu Isalele malonga masalame a argent dikumi ne abidi, ne malonga a ndondo a argent dikumi ne abidi, ne nkutu ya or dikumi ne ibidi; bujitu bua dilonga disalame dimue buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne bua dilonga dia ndondo dimue nshekele makumi muanda mutekete, ne argent yonso ya bintu ebi bionso yakadi nshekele binunu bibidi ne nkama mai bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu; ne nkutu ya or dikumi ne ibidi yakadi miule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, bujitu bua nkutu ne nkutu buakadi nshekele dikumi bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, or yonso ya nkutu ei yakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi abidi; ne mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia wakadi balume ba ngombe dikumi ne babidi, bimpanga dikumi ne bibidi, ne bana balume ba mikoko ba tshidimu tshimue dikumi ne babidi, ne mulambu wabi wa bukula, ne mbushi ya mpumbu ya mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi dikumi ne bibidi; ne mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala wakadi balume ba ngombe makumi abidi ne banai, ne bimpanga makumi asambombo ne mbushi ya mpumbu makumi asambombo ne bana balume ba mikoko makumi asambombo ba tshidimu tshimue
Muhi ka wakateka tshianza tshiandi muinshi mua tshibelu tshia Abalahama, mukelenge wandi, wakaditshiha bua bualu ebu
Kadi, badi basombele mulu, kumonabu bana ba bakaji ba bantu babalengelela

Diabolo kabidi wakaya n andi ku mutu kua mukuna wakadi mule be, wakamulesha makelenge onso a ha buloba ne butumbi buau; wakamuambila ne, Nenkuhe bintu ebi bionso, biwatua binu biebe hanshi, biwankukuila
Nunku mukashi wakabika, wakaya mu nshila wandi, wakadia bidia; mutshima wandi kawakadi unyingalala kabidi
Dilomba diebe didi tshinyi
Nanku wewe Maweja Nangila, utufuile tuetu bena Izrayele luse
Padi muntu musue kupikula tshikuabu tshia ku bidibu balambula Maweja Nangila, muntu awu udi ne bua kusakidila tshia bitanu tshimue ku mushinga udi mutuangaji mulombe
Ebu mbuhianyi bua Bena Benyamina ku mikalu yabo ku meku abo
Pilato wakabakonka kabidi ne, Nengenzele unudi nubikila ne, Mukelenge wa Bena Yuda, tshinyi
Hezikiya wakangata mukanda mu bianza bia ba messager, wakaubala
Nunku umushai bukoya buonso ne divulangana dia malu mabi, nuitabushe dî ne kalolo didi dikunyibua munda muenu, didi dimanye mua kusungila mioyo yenu

Yehowa wakashikisha dî diakambeye; bualu bua meme nakajuka mu muaba wa Davidi tatu wanyi, bua kushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge bua Isalele, muakalaya Yehowa; nakamana kuibakila dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, nsubu
Kolinto Eu musangu muisatu undualua kunudi
Kadi malu akamba Nzambi diambedi mukana mua baprofete bandi bonso ne, Kilisto wanyi neakenge, yeye wakashikisha nunku
Yeye wakamba ne, Nuenu bantu bonso, unvuai
Bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu budi ne lupetu lwakaja kudi Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya bakoshi ba nsambu ne lutumina Bukalenge bunene bwa kulufundabo mu ndongamu wa lupetu mujima wa Mbulamatadi
Yeye wakatshunguluka, wakabatangila, wakabela mulau mu dina dia Yehowa
Bualu ebu nebuikale mu mitshima ya baprofete badi bamba mei a mashimi, badi badidinga mu mitshima yabo, musangu bule bishi
Hakunvuabo dî edi, mitshima yabo yakanyingalala, bakakonka Petelo ne bapostolo bakuabo ne, Bana betu, netuenze tshinyi
Kabena babajinga, kabena babasangisha, kabena babajika, kadi nebikale anu bu tunvi hanshi ha buloba
Abalahama wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakaya ku muaba wakimaneye ku mpala kua Yehowa; wakatangila ku luseke lua Sodoma ne Amola ne Mpata yonso, ne tangilai, muishi wakadi ubanda bu muishi wa tshikutu
Mukelenge Lehabama wakebesha bakulumpe bakadi bimana ne Solomo hakadiye ne muoyo ne, Nuenu nudi nungambilaku lungenyi kai lua kukudimuna bantu aba
Wakamuambila ne, Dina dianyi didi Legona, bualu bua tudi ba bungi
Hahanduluka nsubu, nsubu au kena mumanye mua kuikala

Bena Ejipitu bakatuenzela bibi, bakatukengesha, bakatuenzesha mudimu mukole; ne tuetu tuakadi la kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua betu, ne Yehowa wakulua dî dietu, wakatangila makenga etu ne mudimu wetu ne majitu etu
Mushinga wa muntu udi mutambe wa mukoko misangu bungi munyi
Hashishe, yeye wakangambila ne, Danyele kutshinyi nansha
Padi muntu musue kulambula Maweja Nangila nzubu, mutuangaji neafue mushinga wa nzubu awu
Padi kanyama kamue kafue, kaponena mu mpokolu nansha mu tshiina tshia mayi, mayi awu kaena ne bualu to, adi mimpe
Nunku Tatu wenu wa mu diulu kena musue muana umue wa mu bana aba bakese afue

Chronicles Hakahingana Lehabama ku Yelushalema, yeye wakasangisha Bena Yuda ne Bena Benyamina, bena nvita binunu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu, bua kuluanganabo ne Bena Isalele ne bua kuhingisha bukelenge kudi Lehabama kabidi
Kadi bana balume ba Kola kabakafua
Bakalua lukasa, bakasangana Malia ne Yosefe, ne muana mulale mu tshidilu tshia nyama
Seture, muana wa Mikayele, wa mu tshisamba tshia Ashere
Yeye wakamba ne, Tshinudi nuamba, nennuenzeletshi
Muntu wandi Zimeli, kapitene ka tshituha tshia makalu andi, wakamuelela tshifufu: yeye wakadi mu Tîsa mukuatshike maluvu mu nsubu wa Âsa wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu wandi mu Tîsa
Nanku, jika muena kuebe
Kutua kuanyi kua mikemu kudi kuntonda; Mesu anyi adi mondoke ne tshinyanu bualu bua kanyinganyinga kanyi, Nuenu, benji ba malu mabi bonso, umukai kundi; Yehowa wakunvua kusengelela kuanyi
Bena bilengulengu kabakamanya mua kuimana ku mpala kua Mose bualu bua mputa ya mbalanga, mputa yakadi ham bidi ha bena bilengulengu ne ham bidi ha Bena Ejipitu bonso
Tshianana ndi mua kubashipa
Nanku nennuele lupemba, nenupete bia kudia ne mayi a kunua
Yeye wakangambila ne, Muana wa muntu, ya kudi ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele, ubambile mei andi mbatumina
Amenona wakamuambila ne, Juka, ya biebe
Yeye Mose eu mene wakambila bana ba Isalele ne, Nzambi neanubishile muprofete wa munkatshi mua bana benu, bu muakambisheye meme
Yakoba wakambila bantu bandi ne, Sangishai mabue, bobo bakangata mabue, bakunguisha mushiki wa mabue, bakadia bidia kukala kua mushiki
Yeye wakamba ne, Bakuetu, ndi nnusengelela ne kanuenji bualu bubi nunku
Mukuabo wakataha muntu wa muakuidi munene, wakamukosa ditshu dia tshianza tshia bukole
Hawaseka Nzambi, kakuena muntu udi ukufuisha bundu, anyi
Hashishe baminyampala bakalua kudi Yelemiya, bakamukonka muanda eu, ne yeye wakabambila dî bu muakadi mei onso akamuambila mukelenge
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe wakatuma ba messager bua kuebesha Bâla zebuba, nzambi wa Ekelona, dî bualu bua kakuena Nzambi mu Isalele bua wewe kumuebesha dî, anyi
Hakunvua balunda bandi bualu ebu, bakaya bua kumuangata, bakamba ne, Yeye udi mubale

Hashishe hakajimina bena nvita bonso, hakafuabo munkatshi mua bantu, Yehowa wakangambila ne, Lelu nenuhite ku Ala, butshika bua Moaba: hanualua ba buihi ne Bena Amona, kanubatatshishi, kanuluanganyi n abo; bualu bua tshiena munuhe buloba bua Bena Amona bu buhianyi buenu, bualu bua nakamana kuha bana ba Lota buloba abu bu buhianyi buabo
Nudi balekela bana ba balume ne muoyi bua tshinyi
Bana balume ba Uziele: Mika kahita ne Yishiya muibidi
Kadi muan enu wa ma Kilisto udi ufunda mukuabo ku tshilumbuluidi, ne udi wenza nunku ku mpala kua badi kabai ne ditabusha, anyi
Bungi bua matuku anuakutentekela buloba, matuku makumi anai mene, nebuikale bungi bua bidimu binudi nutuala bujitu bua bubi buenu, nenumanye ne mbualu bukole hangumuka kunudi
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu uvua mutekemene bikole Potifare ewu
Monai mudi Moaba mushimbuke

Lumbu lua ha mbelu, luakadi tshimanu ku nsubu wakadi buludiludi ne tshiendelu tshia ha mbelu, luakadi ne bule bua coudées makumi atanu; bualu bua nsubu wakadi buludiludi ne tshiendelu tshia ha mbelu wakadi anu coudées makumi atanu mu bule; kadi nsubu wakadi buludiludi ne ntempelo wakadi coudées lukama mu bule buandi
Nunku Shaula wakamûmusha kudiye, wakamuteka kapitene ka tshinunu tshia bantu; yeye wakaya ne wakalua ku mpala kua bantu
Nunku nakuvudisha kuamba kuanyi kua lumu luimpe lua Kilisto ku Yelushalema ne ku nseke idi miunyunguluke tô ne ku Iluliko
Nengindile Yehowa udi usokoka mpala wandi kudi bana ba Yakoba, nemmutekemene mene
Hashishe, mukuabo neamuambile ne, Huwa biebe talalâ, bualu bua katuena bamanye mua kutela dina dia Yehowa
Dituku adi bantu ba bungi nebangambile ne, Mukelenge, Mukelenge, katuena bambile bantu bualu buebe mu dina diebe, anyi

Batentekedi bebe badi babandisha mei abo, Bandishai mei enu diatshimue mu kuimba kua misambu, Yehowa wakuvula tshilulu ha diboko diandi dia tshijila Umukai, umukai, nuluhuke mu muaba wawa, Bualu bua kanulubukimu lukasa, Monai, muntu wanyi neikale ne diakalengele, Bu muakadi ba bungi ne dikema bua bualu buandi, Nunku yeye Isaiah Wakuitabusha bualu butuakunvua nganyi
Bakamuitaba ne, Tudi bana babo ne Ahazaya, tuyaya bua kuela bana ba mukelenge ne bana ba mukelenge mukashi muoyo
Samuele wakambila mulambi ne, Lua ne tshituha tshinakukuha, tshinakukuambila ne, Utshiteke
Geshû ne Alama bakanyenga misoko ya bena Yai ne Kenata ne misoko yai yonso bu misoko makumi asambombo
Angata tshimpanga tshimue, ne Alona ne bana bandi balume nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu hatshi
Bena Yuda bakamukeba ku disanka, bakebeshangana ne, Udi hanyi
Bakambula tshihiminu tshia épha ne bakatshibandisha hankatshi ha diulu ne buloba
Nuanji kulala bienu kunoko butuku ebu kabidi, bua meme kumanya dî didi Yehowa ungambila kabidi
Izake kumuebeja ne: Udi nganyi
Mitshi ya olive ibidi idi ha buihi n atshi, umue ku tshianza tshia balume tshia luhanza alu, mukuabo ku tshianza tshialu tshia bakashi
Tuetu netuye hetu
Tangila, ebu buakadi bubi bua muan enu wa bakashi Sodoma; yeye ne bana bandi ba bakashi bakadi ne kudisua ne bia kudia bivule, kabayi bakengela tshintu; kabakakolesha maboko a bahele ne a bakengi
Udi wenza tshinyi mu muaba eu
Hakashikameye mu musoko au musangu mule, dituku dikuabo Abimeleke, mukelenge wa Bena Peleshete, wakatangila ha disoso dia mu nsubu wandi, wakamona ne, Isaka wakadi usaba ne Lebeka, mukashi wandi
Dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Hefesiba
Kena muana wa Malia, anyi

Bakaha bana ba balume ba Gêshoma mu tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe, Golana mu buloba bua Bashana ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Ashetalota ne miaba ya ku mpenge; mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, Kedeshe ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Dabelata ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Lamota ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Anema ne miaba ya ku mpenge; ne mu tshisamba tshia Ashê, Mashala ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Abidona ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Hukoko ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Lehoba ne miaba ya ku mpenge; ne mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale, Kedeshe mu Galela ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Hamona ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Kîyata ayima ne miaba ya ku mpenge
Bakashikama mu milongo, bantu lukama lukama ne bantu makumi atanu makumi atanu
Hashishe Abashaloma wakabikila Yoaba bua kumutumeye kudi mukelenge; kadi yeye wakahidia kulua kudiye; yeye wakamubikila tshiakabidi, kadi yeye wakahidia kulua

Nebabakudimune ne, Bualu bua bobo bakahidia Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu abo, wakafuma n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bakatendelela nzambi mikuabo, bakayitendelela, bakayikuatshila mudimu; nunku yeye wakabatumina makenga â onso
Enza biamu bidi ne mahoka ne tshiamu tshia argent makumi anai ku mabaya makumi abidi, mahoka abidi ku dibaya ne ku dibaya, bualu bua kuelamu tutshi tua tutuhu
Nuakushiha tshihungidi tshianyi, hanuakutentekasha bubi ebu ha mutu ha malu mabi enu onso a tshinyangu
Kuebejaye bena mu Enayime ne: Mukaji mudisombele uvua pa buipi apa ku muelelu wa njila eku, udi penyi
Hakalamuneye tshimanyishilu tshibidi, nakunvua tshifukibue tshibidi tshidi ne muoyo tshiamba ne, Lua
Kanungu ka Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima badi bakookela bamfumu badi kabayi basalayi ba mwaba udibo benzela mudimu ne badi ku dîyi dia minisitila mwimikila mianda ya munda wa ditunga
Lelu nenusabuke musulu wa Yardene
Ebelu Bualu bua Melekisedeke eu, mukelenge wa Salema, muakuidi wa Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu diulu, wakasangakana ne Abalahama hakadiye uhingana ku kushiha kuandi kua bakelenge, ne wakamusankisha
Petelo wakamuandamuna ne, Kilisto wa Nzambi

Kabakanji kutangila bunene buandi ne tshianza tshiandi tshia bukole, ne diboko diandi diolola, ne bimanyinu biandi, ne midimu yandi biakanuenzeleye mu Ejipitu kudi Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, ne ku buloba buandi buonso
Hanuahuola bintu binuakakuna mu buloba, kanuhuodi ku matengu a madimi, kanusangishi bintu bionso, nenushiye bintu ebi bua kukuatshisha n abi bahele ne benyi meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Akana, muana wa Zela, kakenza bualu bubi hakangateye tshintu tshia tshijila, ne mulau kawakakuata tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, anyi
Butshia dinda kubalayaye ne: Nkadi mpingana kudi mfumuanyi
Wakafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ne musenga wa manananshi ha mutu ha mikuna ne ha tukuna ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi yonso
Kadi tshiakuipata bantu bonsu anu tshidimu tshimue to
Bualu bua tshitshu tshiebe ne mutshima webe wa buhidia, wewe udi udibutshila tshishi tô ne ku dituku dia tshishi ne dia dibuluibua dia kulumbulula kuakane kua Nzambi
Hakunvua bayidi dî edi, bakatamba kukema, bakamukonka ne, Ahu udi mumanye mua kusungidibua nganyi
Mushamusha umue kawena uhona hanshi, anu hitabusha Tatu wenu

Wewe udileshe kudibo bu tshifuanyikishi mu midimu mimpe yonso; mu diyisha diebe kaikadi muoneke, wikale mudiholeshe, wikale ne mei malenge adi kâi mua kuhishibua; bua yeye udi ku luseke lua batuhumbishi afuishibue bundu, kai ne mua kuamba dî dibi bualu buetu
Hakadi Petelo mu luhangu, umue wabo wa bakashi benji ba mudimu wa muakuidi munene wakalua; hakamoneye Petelo wota kahia wakamujosha talalâ, wakamuambila ne, Wewe kabidi wakadi ne Yesu, Muena Nazaleta
Katataka nudi bamanye bualu budi bumukanda bua yeye abuluibue mu tshikondo tshiandi tshine
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nembikile muele wa nvita bua kuluangana n andi ha mikuna yanyi yonso; muele wa muntu yonso neukebe kutaha muan abo ne muntu
Bikala bushua bua Nzambi bukumbasha butumbi buandi bualu bua mashimi anyi, munyi mutshidibo bampisha kabidi bu muntu mubi
Muntu yonso udi umulenga tshianza ham bidi handi neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Kadi bua nuenu mimanye ne, Muana wa muntu udi ne bukole hatshidiye ha buloba bua kujimisha mibi yeye wakambila muena kaneke ne , Ndi nkuambila ne, Bika, ambula bulalu buebe, ya ku nsubu kuebe
Wakabuela mu buatu muakadibo, tshihehele tshiakabatama; bobo bakatamba kukema; bualu bua kabakajingulula bualu bua mitanda bimpe; mitshima yabo yakadi mikole

Mu diba adi dî dia Yehowa diakalua mukana mua muprofete Hagai ne, Etshi ntshikondo tshia nuenu bine kushikama mu nsuhu yenu idi ne mabaya malamike munda muai, hatshidi nsubu eu ushala munyanguke, anyi
Bakulu bonso ba mu Isalele bakalua ne bakuidi bakambula mushete
Moshe kutuluka ku mukuna
Udi wimanyika midimu yeenda padiye umutwadila mukanda wa didilekeela dia mudimu wa beena bukalenga bunene
Hatuakahitshilaku ne ditata dikole, tuakafika ku muaba udibo babikila ne, Dilobo Dimpe; musoko wa Lasaya wakadi ha buihi
Bualu bua Bena Kanâna ne bena buloba bonso nebulue lumu elu, nebatunyunguluke, nebajimishe dina dietu ha buloba; ne wewe newenze tshinyi bua dina diebe dinene
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nuambile Bena Isalele ne, Ebi mbintu bidi ne muoyo binudi mua kudia munkatshi mua nyama yonso idi ha buloba
Yakobe udi upeta bubanji Rakele mumane kulela Yozefe, Yakobe kuambila Labane ne: Itaba bua mpingane kuetu, mu ditunga dietu
Bakuabo ba munkatshi mua bena meshi ba Epikuleo ne ba Stoiko ba alua kuelangana n andi mpata
Nunku kudimuna mutshima webe, ulekele bubi buebe ebu, ulombe Nzambi ne bumue neakubuikidile meshi adi munda muebe
Tuetu tudi bana ba kudi Nzambi, udi mumanye Nzambi udi utunvuila; udi kai wa kudi Nzambi kena utunvuila
Hakunvua Yakoba ne, Mu Ejipitu mudi bia kudia, wakatumamu bankambua betu musangu wa kumudilu
Nyama idi ne mikiya ne idi kayiyi ne mikiya, nyunyi, kabidi ne nyama idi ilandala, kubuela mu buatu ne Nowa, mulume ne mukaji, bu muvua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile
Davidi ne Bena Isalele bonso Bakaya ku Yelushalema udi Yebuse mene ; Bena Yebuse, bena buloba bakadiku
Nakashala ku mukuna matuku makumi anai bu munakenza diambedi: Yehowa wakangunvuila musangu eu kabidi; Yehowa kakanushiha
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Ashe nebashikame hehi n andi Pagiele muana mulume wa Okelana neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Ashe
Mahuahua a bakeluba akololodibua tô coudeês makumi abidi; bakeluba bakadi bimana ne makasa abo; mpala yabo yakatangilangana
Tunkanunuina tua Yuda Bana ba balume ba Yuda: Ele ne Ônana ne Shela: muana mukashi wa Shua, Muena Kanâna, wakamulelela aba basatu
Nunku Bena Isalele bakadi babadibua ku kulondolola kuabo; ne monai, badi bafundibue mu mukandu wa bakelenge ba Isalele; bakaya ne Bena Yuda mu buhika ku Babulona bualu bua ditomboka diabo
Kadi Bena Yuda kabakamanya mua kuihata Bena Yebuse ba mu Yelushalema: Bena Yebuse badi bashikama ne Bena Yuda tô ne ku dituku edi
Hashishe mukelenge Hezikiya wakabika hatshiatshia, wakasangisha bantu banene ba mu musoko, wakabanda n abo ku nsubu wa Yehowa
Hakadi bahika bambila Davidi mei â, mutshima wandi wakatamba kusanka bua kuikala muku wa mukelenge
Hashishe tuakabambila mena a bantu bakadi basa nsubu eu
Anu mu buloba bua Goshene muakadi Bena Isalele, mabue a nvula kakadiku
Yesu wakabakonka kabidi ne, Davidi udi umubikila mu Nyuma Muimpe ne, Mukelenge, munyi
Hakimbabo musambu, bakaluhuka, bakaya ku mukuna wa Oleve
Kadi butumbi ne buneme ne ditalala nebikale kudi muntu yonso udi wenza malu mimpe, kudi Muena Yuda diambedi ne kudi Muena Gelika kabidi
Hakadi Yehu ulumbuluisha ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba, yeye wakasangana bantu banene bi Bena Yuda ne bana balume ba bana babo ne Ahazaya bakuatshile Ahazaya mudimu; yeye wakabashiha
Nusungule muntu wa munkatshi muenu, alue biandi kundi
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshimue tshia bukokeshi bua Sedekiya, mu ngondo muinai, ne mu dituku dia tshitema dia mu ngondo eu, bakashimbula tshituha tshia lumbu lua musoko
Yesu wakaya kabidi ku muelelu wa dishiba; tshisumbu tshionso tshia bantu tshiakalua kudiye, yeye wakabayisha
Bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola biai n abi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Bangabanga ne kunuisha mukaji mayi a bululu awu, bua amutue munda, mutuangaji neangate mulambu wa bualu budibu babanda nabu mukaji, udi mukaji awu nawu mu bianza biende, neawele mulu, aunyukule kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Butumbi bua Yehoshafata buakadiundadiunda bikole; yeye wakasa bibumba ne misoko ya bibutshilu mu Yuda

Diambedi kabayi banze kulala tulu, yeye wakabanda kudibo ku musaka wa nsubu; yeye wakambila balume aba ne, Ndi mumanye ne, Yehowa wakanuha buloba, ne buowa buakatukuata bualu buenu ne bena buloba bonso badi batekete teketê ku mpala kuenu
Hashishe, bena mbuku, bena buloshi, Bena Kasada ne bamanyi ba malu a mitoto bakalua ku mpala kuanyi; nakabawila tshilota, kadi kabakamanya mua kummanyisha dijingulula diatshi

Disanka dia Pulima Bena Yuda bakuabo bakadi mu nseke yonso ya mukelenge bakadisangisha hamue, bakaluangana bua kusungilabo mioyo yabo, bakadi ne dikisha bua bena lukuna babo, ne bakashiha bena lukinu babo binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu; kadi kabakahaula bintu biabo
Nudi nudituisha ne, Tudi bana ba bashihi ba baprofete
Monai kabidi

Bualu bua musangu wakamana kuleha unuakadi kuikala bayishi, kadi nudi ne bualu kabidi bua bakuabo banuyishe nuenu mayisha a kumudilu a tshibangidilu tshia mei mamba kudi Nzambi; ne nuakulua bu badi ne mabele bualu, kanuena bu badi ne bia kudia bikole bualu
Angata tshidi tshiebe, uye biebe; mutshima wanyi udi musue kuha eu wa kunshikidilu bu mundi nkuha wewe
Hakakumbana matuku muanda mukulu bua kumutengulabo, bakamuidika ne, Yesu, bu muakamuidikabo kudi muanjelo kabai banze kumuimita

Bialenga muntu tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshibi, nansha mifuba ya nyama udi kayi muakane, nansha mifuba ya ngombe udi kayi muakane, nansha mifuba ya tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi tshidi katshiyi tshiakane, ne bikala bualu ebu busokoka ku mesu kuandi, yeye udi muntu wa bukoya, neahile
Nzambi udi wela meshi bua ngombe, anyi udi wamba nunku anu bua bualu buetu
Nunku bakamana nsubu mu bidimu muanda mutekete
Yeye wakangandamuna ne, Kuena mumanye bintu ebi, anyi
Nebateke dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Lubena ku luseke lua ku sude
Yeye wakabuela muakadiye mu ntenta wandi, ne yeye wakamubuikila mu tshiata
Nakukutumbisha ha buloba, nakushikisha mudimu uwakumpa

Yeye wakahuka kudiye hakadiye mu nshila, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Lua biebe, ndi musue kulala n ebe, yeye kakamanya ne yeye udi ma muen andi Mukashi wakamukonka ne, Neumpe tshinyi hawalua kundi
Wewe wakuluila bua kunvuluisha bua bubi buanyi ne bua kushiha muan anyi
Hashishe muntu wa buhidia neabuluibue, udi Mukelenge Yesu ulua kushiha ne muhuya wa mukana muandi, neamuvuishe bu tshintu tshia tshianana ku dimueneka dia kulua kuandi
Davidi Udi Unyenga Siona Sam

Muntu kena mumanye mushinga wau; Ndondo wa muinshi mua buloba udi wamba ne, Kaena munda muanyi; Kabena bamanye mua kufila tshiamu tshimpe tshia or bua kuaheta; Kabena bamanye mua kuelekesha mushinga wau ne wa or wa ku Ofî, anyi wa mabue a onyx a mushinga mukole, anyi wa dibue dia saphir
Padi muana wa bakaji wa mutuangaji mushale ndumba, udi ufuisha tatuende bundu
Udi musue kudibuesha mu malu bua kudikengesha ne bua kuhona, wewe ne Bena Yuda hebe, bua tshinyi

Yeye wakangambila ne, Eu mmuaba udi bakuidi ne bua kulambila mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji ne mulambu wa kubuikila n au mabi, ne wa kuoshela mulambu wa bia kudia mu nfulu; bua kabahatuki n abi ku tshiendelu tshia ha mbelu bua kuvuisha bantu ba hatuhu bu ba tshijila

Bakuasa bitendelelu bia Bâla ha mutu ha mikuna bua kuoshilahu bana babo balume bu milambu ya kuoshila Bâla mu kahia, muanda undi tshiyi mubambile ne, Enzai, undi tshiyi mutele, undi tshiyi muele meji bua kuenzabo
Mukelenge Kolesha kabidi wakalua ne malonga akadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa akalua n au Nebukadenesâ ku Yelushalema, akadiye muteke mu nsubu wa nzambi wandi
Nuimane mu muaba wa tshijila bu muakatahululabo nsubu ya batatu enu, bana ba mu ditunga, bua muntu ne muntu wa mu nsubu ya batatu enu Bena Lewi ikale ne tshituha tshiandi
Esetê kakanza kumanyisha mukelenge tshisamba tshiandi ne bantu bandi bu muakamuambila Môdekai, bualu bua Esetê wakatumikila dî dia Môdekai bu muakenzeye hakadiye mudiundishibue kudiye

Kadi nuakukudimuka ne nuakuhetula dina dianyi, nuakudihingashila, muntu ne muntu, bahika banuakadi balekele, balume ne bakashi, ne nuakubabuesha mu buhika tshiakabidi bua kuikalabo bahika benu, balume ne bakashi

Tshiole tshinene tshiakadi mu Samalea; bakatshintshimika musoko tô ne hakahanabo mutu wa nyama wa mpunda ku nshekele ya argent makumi muanda mukulu, ne tshituha tshinai tshia bibuelelu bia nyunyu wa nkutshi ku nshekele ya argent itanu
Nusakidile kabidi kilo isambombu ya bukula, busambakaja ne mafuta, kabidi ne maluvu a mvinyo
Muntu musumbishe muanende wa bakaji ku bupika, kabena batekela mukaji awu bu mudibu batekela muntu mulume to
Mutshi udi hankatshi ha mabaya neuhite ku ditumba dimue tô ne ku ditumba dikuabo
Ubambile ne, Monai, mukelenge wa Babulona wakalua ku Yelushalema, wakakuata mukelenge ne baminyampala bakuabo bakadimu, wakaya n abo ku Babulona
Hakamanabo kumujika, Yosefe ne bana babo ne bantu bakaya n andi bua kujika tatu wandi bakahingana mu Ejipitu
Nebabikile dina dia musoko ku dituku adi tô ne tshiendelele ne, Yehowa udi aha

Bualu bua Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Bu munakukuatshila Bena Yelushalema tshifik a munda ne tshiji tshianyi tshikole, nunku nennukuatshile tshiji tshianyi tshikole hanuabuela mu Ejipitu

Nunku wewe Tatenai, gouver neur wa buloba bua dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, ne Shetâ bozenai ne Bena Afâsateka, bena mulongo webe badi dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, kanufiki ha buihi n abo; kanuhumbishi mudimu wa nsubu eu wa Nzambi; gouverneur wa Bena Yuda ne bakulu ba Bena Yuda base nsubu eu wa Nzambi mu muaba wandi
Bikala mulambu wandi wa kuosha muana wa mukoko anyi muana wa mbushi, yeye neafile mulume udi kayi ne tshilema

Tshibukai bituha bituha, nuenu bantu, nukuatshike buowa; Elai tshifufu tshienu, kadi netshiandamuke bualu bua hatuhu; Bualu bua Yehowa wakangambila nunku ne tshianza tshiandi tshikole tshinkuate, wakandimusha bua meme tshiendi mu nshila wa bantu aba, wamba ne, Kutshibikidi ne, Ntshifufu, malu onso adi bantu aba babikila ne, Ntshifufu; kutshinyi malu adibo batshina, ne kuikadi ne buowa
Bobo badi ne meshi amue, ne badi bahesha bukole buabo ne bukokeshi buabo kudi nyama wa luonji

Bonso bakadi badisangisha bakadi binunu makumi anai ne bibidi ne nkama isatu ne makumi asambombo, ha mutu ha bena mudimu babo balume ne bakashi bakadi binunu muanda mutekete ne nkama isatu ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete; bakadi ne bimbi ba misambu balume ne bakashi nkama ibidi

Nebasuike tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ku nkanu yatshi ku nkanu ya efoda ne muonshi wa bleu muhindakasha, tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi netshikale ham bidi ha mukaba muluka bilengele wa efoda, kabasulule tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ku efoda
Ku nyima kuabo Sadoka, muana wa Imê, wakalongolola buludiludi ne nsubu wandi
Nê wakalela Kishi; Kishi wakalela Shaula; Shaula wakalela Yonatana ne Maleki shua ne Abinadaba ne Eshebâla
Utshine Nzambi, utumikile mikenji yandi; ebu mbualu buonso budi muntu ne bua kuenza

Ya, wele mbila ei ku luseke lua node, wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nennusunguile balami badi benza bu mudi mutshima wanyi musue, nebanudishe ne lungenyi ne meji mimpe
balongolola tulasa mu Bulongolodi bwa tulasa mu ditunga dijima budi ne bilongelu bia mbulamatadi ne bilongelu bidikadila bianyisha
Bena nvita binunu makumi asatu ne bisambombo bakadi basangisha n abo mu bikondo biabo mu nsubu ya batatu abo, bualu bua bobo bakadi ne bakashi ba bungi ne bana ba balume ba bungi
Kadi Petelo wakamba ne bulobo ne, Bikala bualu bunkuata bua kufua n ebe, tshiena nkuhidia
Wakenza tshiowelu tshia mai ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mesa atshi ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, wakatshienza ne ndimuenu ya ba kashi bakadi benza mudimu ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Yesu wakabambila ne, Bu Nzambi muikale Tatu wenu, nuakadi kunsua meme; bualu bua nakufuma kudi Nzambi, ndi mulueku; tshiakudivuila, kadi yeye wakuntuma
Mukelenge eu mukashi wakambila mukelenge ne, Mukelenge wikale ne muoyo tshiendelele; mutshima webe kauhampakanyi, mpala webe kandamuki nunku nansha
Nunku Mukelenge wakela mukenshi ne, Badi bambila bakuabo lumu luimpe bikale ne muoyo ku lumu luimpe
Kaleba wakamuha mishimi ya mai yakadi ku mutu ne yakadi kumanda kabidi
Hakadiye uya, bakatangila mu diulu talala; monai, balume babidi bimane ha buihi n abo baluate bilulu bitoke tô; ne bakamba ne, Nuenu Bena Galela, nudi bimane nutangidila mu diulu tshinyi
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bika, uye biebe ku mpala kua bantu, nebabuelemu, nebahiane buloba bunakalaya batatu babo bua kubahabu
Genesis Hashishe Yosefe wakaya, wakambila Palo ne, Tatu wanyi ne bana betu bakulua ku buloba bua Kanâna ne mikoko yabo ne bimuna biabo ne bintu bionso bidibo n abi, mona, badi mu buloba bua Goshene
Kadi meme malaba nengimane pa katongobela ka mukuna, mukuate dikombu dia Mvidi Mukulu mu bianza
Bualu bua hakayabo mu tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bakatangila buloba, bakahangisha mitshima ya Bena Isalele, bua bobo kabayi mu buloba buakabahabo kudi Yehowa
Bualu hua yeye wakututumina tuetu ba mu Babulona dî ne, Buhika ebu nebulehe musangu mule, nunku asai nsubu, nushikamemu, nukune bintu mu madimi, nudie mamuma abi
Edi ndikonka dia Yehowa wa misumba
Kadi tshiena ngitabusha mukashi ayishe, anyi ikale ne bukokeshi ku mutu kua muteme; kadi ikale biandi talala
Enza biebe bakeluba babidi ne or mutudibue, ubateke ku matshika a tshibuikilu tshia mushete
Bualu bua tuetu tudi bamanye ditshina dia Mukelenge, tudi tuitabushisha bantu; kadi tudi tumueneshibua ku mpala kua Nzambi, ne ndi ntekemena ne, Tudi tumueneshibua ku muoyo mukese wenu kabidi

Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua bana ba Alona udi muena nsudi anyi udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi kena mua kudia bintu bia tshijila tô ne hashika disama diandi Muntu yonso udi ulenga mukuabo udi munyanguke bualu bua wakadi mulenge tshitalu anyi wakadi muele bilunu, anyi udi ulenga tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi tshidi mua kumunyanga, anyi ham bidi ha mundi udi munyanguke mu mushindu wonso, muntu udi ulenga bianza ham bidi ha bintu ebi neikale munyanguke tô ne dilolo, kena mua kudia bintu bia tshijila diambedi yeye kayi muanze kuowa mai ha mubidi
kumushilabu Maweja Nangila
Bukole buebe mbupite
Yehowa wa mu diulu wakatangila hanshi hadi bana ha bantu, Buonso buabo bakusesuka mu nshila; buonso buabo bakumana kunyanguka hamue
Bu nuenu bamanye dî edi ne, Ndi musue luse, tshiena nsua nyama minshihela, kanuakadi kuhisha badi kaba
Wakalamika or munda mua nsubu yonso yakadi ha mutu
Yeye wakabika, wakabuikila luhehele, wakambila dishiha ne, Hua, talala talalâ
Musangu muibidi udibu bela mpungi ne bibingu, bena Izrayele badi basombe luseke lua kuinshi kua ntenta wa kusambakena, nebatuadije luendu
Padi tshilumbu pankatshi pa muena Izrayele ne muanabu, nansha ne muenyi udi munkatshi muenu, nutshikose anu pa tshiotshi
Bafalese bakadi ne lukuka lua biuma bakunvua mei â onso, bakamubuidia
Kanuena bamanye ne, Bantu babi kabena bahiana bukelenge bua Nzambi, anyi
Nungambile, ne meme nemuhingishilebi
Wakabakonka ne, Kadi yeye wakuenza bualu bubi kai
Tshiena yeye; kadi tangila, munga ulualua ku nyima kuanyi ngundi tshi ne buakane bua kusulula mionshi ya bisabata biandi
Wakambila muntu wakadi ne tshianza tshiume ne, Bika, imana munkatshi muabo
Bena Awa bakadi bashikama mu misoko tô ne ku Gaza ne Bena Kafetô bakafuma ku Kafetô, bakabashiha, bakashikama mu muaba wabo
Muntu musame wakamuandamuna ne, Mukelenge, havuandululabo mai, tshiena ne muntu wa kumbuesha mu mpokolo; hantshidi nya, munga udi umpita ku mpala
Nunku Davidi wakangata mulondo wa mai ne difuma diakadi ku mutu wa Shaula, bakaya

Kadi biunvua baminyampala lumu lua diyiki dianyi n ebe, ne bialuabo kûdi bua kukuambila ne, Utuambile mei awakuambila mukelenge, ne mei akukuambila mukelenge, kutusokoki bualu, ne katuena tukushiha; mu diba adi wewe ubambile ne, Nakadi nsengelela mukelenge ne kampingashi ku nsubu wa Yonatana bua meme kufuilaku
Wakalua, wakawangata mu tshianza tshia balume tshia yeye wakadi ushikama ha nkuasa wa butumbi
Badi badila badi ne disanka, bua bobo nebasambibue
Nakunvua dî dia wakadi wakula n anyi
Bana ba Lodo ne ba Hadidi ne ba Ono nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi abidi ne umue
Bualu bua nuenu, bena lungenyi, nudi nusanka bua kulesha batshimbakanyi lutulu
Hakalela Sheme Âpakashada, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama itanu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Nenkuvudishile disanka ku dituku ku dituku, Yehowa udi munene, budiye n abu mbua kutumbishibua bikole
Bena Izrayele kulomba bena Ejipitu bilamba ne bintu bienza ne tshiamu tshia mpawungi nansha ne tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole bu muvua Moshe mumane kubambila
Halua Yehowa n enu mu buloba bua Bena Kanâna buakanulayeye ne batatu enu ne hanuheye buloba abu, nuenu nenujidile Yehowa ban a bute bonso ba bantu ne ba nyama kabidi, bana ba balume mbana ba Yehowa
Yeye wakambila bantu ba mu Penuele ne, hanahingana ne ditalala nenshimbule tshibumba etshi
Esâ hadona, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Solomo wakatabala, mona, buakadi tshilota
Juka, endakana mu ditunga, uditangile mu bule ne mu butshiama buadi, bualu nenkupadi

Hakamba diba kuhueka, bakalua ne bantu ba bungi bakadi bakuatshike ne bademon kudiye; wakumusha nyuma mibi ne dî diandi, wakakolesha bena mabedi bonso; bua kushikisha dî diakamba muprofete Yeshaya ne, Yeye wakuangata matekete etu, wakutuala mabedi etu
Bantu ba bungi bakâdisha bivualu biabo mu nshila, bakuabo bakâdisha bisala bia mitshi biakakosabo mu madimi
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Yeye udi ulua ne lumu kabidi

Nakambila Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, mei â onso, nakamuambila ne, Nubueshe nshingu yenu muinshi mua mutshi wa tshikokedi wa mukelenge wa Babulona, numukuatshile ne bantu bandi mudimu bua nuikale ne muoyo
Nunku lala biebe ku luseke lua ku tshianza tshiebe tshia bakashi, nenteke mibi ya Bena Isalele ham bidi hebe
Bantu bonso bakandamuna ne, Mashi andi ikale ham bidi hetu ne ha bana betu
Esawu kuandamuna ne: Dina dia Yakobe ndimukumbane: Bualu mmundimukile be, mmundinge misangu ibidi
Abinê wakayikila ne bakulu ba mu Isalele, wakabambila ne, Mu matuku akashala ku nyima nuenu nuakasua Davidi bua kuikaleye mukelenge ku mutu kuenu
Bakambila Davidi ne, Bena Yabesha gilada bakajika Shaula
Bobo nebakuenzele malu mu lukinu luabo, nebakunyenge bintu bionso biwakuheta ku mudimu webe, nebakushiye butaka kuyi ne bivualu
Yeye neamushihe ku luseke lua tshioshelu lua ku nôde, ku mesu kua Yehowa; ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu
Tshianza tshianyi kabidi netshikale ham bidi ha baprofete badi bamona bikena kumona bidi bidinga bantu ne badi bamba mei a mashimi mu kutempa kuabo kua mbuku
Yesu eu, Nzambi wakamubisha ku lufu, buonso buetu tudi bamanyi ba bualu ebu

Nehemiya Nehemiya Udi Usungula Bakokeshi mu Yelushalema Hakamanabo lumbu ne hakelabo bibi ne hakasungulabo batuadi ba bintu ne bimbi ba misambu ne Bena Lewi, nakasungula muan etu Hanani ne Hananya, mulami wa nsubu wa mukelenge, balami ba Yelushalema, bualu bua Hananya wakadi muntu wa kueyemenyibua, wakatamba bakuabo kutshina Nzambi
Yehu wakamuebesha ne, Udi ne nganyi dî munkatshi muetu

Yeye wakamba ne, Ei nnsengu yakatangadisha Bena Yuda, ne bua muanda eu kakuakadi muntu wakabisha mutu wandi; ne hatudi aba bakulua bua kubakuatshisha buowa, ne bua kukosa hanshi nsengu ya ba mu bisamba bia bantu, biakambula nsengu yabo bua kuluisha n ai ba mu buloba bua Yuda ne bua kutangadisha badimu
Meme Dayawesha, nakela mukenji eu; batumikile mukenji eu ne mitshima yabo yonso

Ecclesiastes Uvuluke Mufuki webe mu matuku a bunsongalume buebe, hadi matuku mabi kayi manze kulua anyi bidimu kabiyi bianze kufika ha buihi, haudi wamba ne, Tshiena n abi disanka; hadi diba, munya, ngondo ne mitoto kabiyi bianze kulua mîdima ne matutu kâyi manze kuhingana haloka nvula; mu matuku adi balami ba nsubu bazakala, bantu hakole nebiname ne bahedi ba manvua nebalekele mudimu bualu bua badi banya banya; batangidi ba ha madidishi kabena bamona bimpe; ne bibi bionso bia ku misesu bidi binshila; tshiona tshia dihela dia manvua tshidi tshitekete; muntu neajuke anu bua muadi wa nyunyu; bana ba bakashi bonso, bimbi ba misambu, nebahungile; bakulumpe nebatshine mikuna; buowa nebubakuate mu nshila; ne mutshi wa amande newele bilongo; ne mpasu mene neamunemene bujitu; dijinga nedimutalale ku muoyo; bualu bua muntu uyaya ku muaba wandi wa tshiendelele; bena madilu badi bendakana mu misesu; diambedi nshinga wa tshiamu tshia argent kayi muanze kusuluka, anyi dilonga dia tshiamu tshia or kadiyi dianze kufua anyi mulondo kauyi muanze kufua ku mpokolo wa mai, anyi nkata kayi muanze kutshibuka ku dina dia mai; nunku mubidi newandamuke dinfuenkenya dia buloba kabidi ne muhuya wa muoyo neuhingane kudi Nzambi wakaufila
Meme Danyele, nkayanyi nakamona tshikena kumona; bantu bakadi n anyi kabakamona tshikena kumona etshi, kadi kuzakala kukole kuakabakuata, bakanyema bua kusokoma
Wakamba ne, Yehowa kena musungule eu
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakambila bantu bandi ne, Nudi bamanye ne, Lamota gilada udi wetu ne tuetu tudi bashikame tshianana, katuena tûnyenga mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Sulia, anyi
Bintu bionsu bivuabu babanyina bena mvita bavua mu mvita bivua nunku: mikoku ne mbuji
Tangilai, matuku alualua amba bantu ne, Bakashi badi nkumba badi ne disanka ne mafu adi kâi manze kulela bana ne mabele adi kâi mâmushe
Hilama wakatumina Solomo ntalanta ya or lukama ne makumi abidi
Nunku bakahungakasha tshihungidi ku Bê sheba, ne Abimeleke ne Pikola, kamanda ka masalayi andi, bakabika, bakahingana ku buloba bua Bena Peleshete

Udi untaha mputa mu miaba yonso, Nakuditelela bilulu bikayabala bindi nduata ham bidi hanyi, nakuladika lusengu Mpala wanyi wakulua mukunzekunzû bualu bua kudila kuanyi, Kadi kakuena bienzedi bia tshimbambila ku bianza bianyi, Wewe buloba, kubuikidi mashi anyi, Kadi mpindiu mene, monai, mumonyi wa bualu buanyi udi mu diulu, Balunda banyi badi bambuidia; bua yeye ajadike buakane bua muntu mu tshilumbu tshiandi ne Nzambi, Bualu bua hahita bidimu bikese, Yobo Muoyo wanyi wakubutuka, matuku anyi adi ahuwa; Bulelela, banseki badi ha buihi n anyi, Mpindiu ungeyeke tshieya, wikale mueyeki wa tshieya bua bualu buetu n ebe, Bualu bua wewe wakubuikila mitshima yabo bua kabikadi ne lungenyi, Muntu udi unyoka balunda bandi bua tshituha tshia bintu, Yeye wakunvuisha bu lusumuinu lua bantu kuelabo, Mesu anyi akulua bitayitayi bualu bua kanyinganyinga, Bantu bakane badi bakema bua muanda eu, Kadi muntu muakane neananukile kuenda mu nshila wandi, Kadi buonso buenu hinganai kabidi ku mei enu a diambedi
Muntu kai udi ukumbana malu â
Nenkutangadishe munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu, nenkumuangalashe munkatshi mua maloba makuabo; nengumushe bukoya budi munda muebe
Bualu bua mukenshi wa Nyuma wa muoyo wa mu Kilisto Yesu wakampikula ku mukenshi wa bubi ne wa lufu

Dî dia muadi wa balami, Mpangu ya mikoko yakadi ne ditalala yakunyanguka Yeye wakulekela tshisokomenu tshiandi bu mudi nyama wa ntambue wenza; Yelemiya Ku tshibangidilu tshia bukokeshi bua Yehoyakima, muana wa Yoshiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, dî edi dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Imana biebe mu tshiendelu tshia mu nsubu wa Yehowa, wambile ba mu misoko yonso ya mu Yuda badi balua kutendelela mu nsubu wa Yehowa mei onso andi nkuambila; kukosolodi dî dimue nansha

Mukalu wa ku luseke lua esete, ubanga ku mukalu wa hankatshi ha Haulana ne Damaseke, ne wa hankatshi ha Gilada ne buloba bua Isalele, wikale musulu wa Yadene; uwidikishe ku butshika bua buloba bua ku luseke lua nôde tô ne ku mai manene a ku luseke lua esete

Bakadi balume, bakashi ne bana, bana bakashi ba mukelenge ne muntu yonso wakadi Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka bansentedi ba masalayi, mushiye mu bianza bia Gedaliya, muana wa Ahikama, muana wa Shefana; Yelemiya muprofete kabidi ne Baluka, muana wa Neliya
Nzambi wanyi, ubavuluke bualu bua bobo bakanyanga buakuidi ne tshihungidi tshia buakuidi ne tshia Bena Lewi

Maweja Nangila udi ulaya Moshe tshiakabidi Pavua Maweja Nangila uyukila ne Moshe mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, uvua mumuambile ne: Ndi Maweja Nangila, ambila mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bionsu bindi mukuambile

Ba mu Benyamina: Eliada, muena bukitu, ne bantu binunu nkama ibidi bakadi ne mata ne ngabu bakadi n andi; ku nyima kuandi Yehozabada ne bantu binunu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu bakadi ne bintu bia nvita bilongolola bakadi n andi

Yehowa Nzambi wetu kakukutuma bua kutuambila ne, Kanuyi ku Ejipitu bua kushikamaku; kadi Baluka, muana wa Neliya, udi ukukabila kutudi, bua kutufila mu bianza bia Bena Kasada, bua batushihe ne bua baye n etu mu buhika ku Babulona
Ndi mumanye mua kukuambila bualu, anyi
Nenye kudiye, kadi yeye kena mua kuhingana kundi
Bidi bihita buakane munkatshi mua bintu binudi nuhuola diambedi, ne maha a munkatshi mua bintu bionso binudi nufila kudi Nzambi, bikale bintu bia bakuidi
Kadi bobo bakamuambila ne, Nansha, netuhingane n ebe kudi bana benu
Yakoba wakalua kudi Isaka tatu andi mu Mamale, musoko wa Kiyata aba eu udi Hebelona Wakadi Abalahama ne Isaka bashikame
Muana wakabika lukasa, wakuenda; bualu bua yeye wakadi wa bidimu dikumi ne bibidi
Bifuanyikishi bia mabue a ngashi biakadi ha biluwa biatshi, ne tshibandilu tshiatshi tshiakadi ne bidiatshilu muanda mukulu
Bualu bua mitu yetu ne bua malu mabi a batatu etu, Yelushalema ne bantu bebe biakulua tshihendu kudi bantu bonso badi batunyunguluke

Biwahidia kulekela bantu banyi, nentumine bisumbu bia tuishi kûdi ne kudi bahika bebe ne kudi bantu bebe ne mu nsubu yenu, nsubu ya Bena Ejipitu neyikale ne bisumbu bia tuishi tente, ne hanshi ha buloba kabidi
Hakalua tshidimu tshia mamuma, wakatuma muntu wandi kudi ba bidime bua kuangata mamuma a mu budimi buandi kudi ba bidime
Ku nyima kua tshihehele buloba buakakanka, kadi Yehowa mene kakadi mu kukanka kua buloba
Ku tshilambuilu tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi, nebabuikileku tshilamba tshifikuluke
Nunku amba mei ebe a buprofete, ubambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai bienu, nembulule nkita yenu, nennuhatule mu nkita yenu, nuenu bantu banyi, nendue n enu mu buloba bua Isalele
Kahia katemene ha tshioshelu ku dituku ne ku dituku, kakajimi nansha
Bakalua ne nsongalume muikale ne muoyo, mitshima yabo yakatamba kusanka
Nenuikale bindile batangila ku njila, kadi bana benu abu kabayi bapingana kabidi to
Kumusokokaye ngondu isatu
Yehowa neavuishe nvula wa buloba buenu bu lufuishi ne nsenga bia mu diulu tô ne hanuajimishibua
Alona udi nganyi bua nuenu nudi numutontolola
Bimenga bionso biakashikama meku a Bena Kohata akashala biakadi dikumi ne miaba yabi ya ku matshika
Wakasumba ne tshiji tshikole
Bena Izrayele mbamfikishe munda, bajule tshiiji tshianyi, bualu neatendelele mvidie ya dishima
Ke mikenji ivua Mvidi Mukulu mungambile
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua kuakuvuluka matuku a buana buebe, kadi wakunfikisha munda ne malu â onso, nunku meme hanyi nenkukengeshe bua bienzedi biebe
Dina dia mukuabo ne, Eliezê, bualu bua Mose wakamba ne, Nzambi wa tatu anyi wakadi mukuatshishi wanyi, wakansungila ku muele wa nvita wa Palô
Yeye wakela bantu nkama isatu difuma diandi, wakabashiha; nunku wakadi ne dina dinene munkatshi mua aba basatu, Yeye kakadi ne dina dia butumbi munkatshi mua aba makumi asatu, anyi
Babidi bakunvua dî dia Yone, bakalonda Yesu, mukuabo wakadi Andele, muan abo ne Simona Petelo
Nenkubutule tshiendelele, ne misoko yebe neyishale kayiyi ne bantu; nunku nenumanye ne, Meme udi Yehowa

Yeye wakungambila ne, Yehowa, undi ngendakana ku mpala kuandi, neatume muanjelo wandi n ebe, neakuendeshe dikasa dimpe, ne wewe newangatshile muan anyi mulume mukashi kudi bana betu ne kudi ba mu nsubu wa tatu wanyi Hashishe, munda muebe nemuikale mutoke ku kuditshiha eku, hawaya kudi bana betu, biahidiabo kukuha mukashi, munda muebe nemuikale mutoke ku kuditshiha eku
Nanku nembutule anu bena Ejipitu
Nudimuke bienu, bua nuenu kanulekedianganyi

Kuhungi tshihungidi ne bena buloba; hendabo masandi ne mpingu yabo, ne hashihelabo nzambi yabo nyama, hakubikilabo bua kudia n abo munyinyi wa nyama mishiha; bua nuenu kanubikidi bana babo ba bakashi kudi bana benu ba balume; ne bana babo ba bakashi badi benda masandi ku mpingu yabo ka benzeshi bana benu ba balume masandi kudi mpingu yabo
Biakuma ngombe muhika mulume anyi muhika mukashi ne nsengu, nebafute mukelenge wabo nshekele makumi asatu ya argent, nebakume ngombe ne mabue
Disu dianyi kadiena dinutangila ne dinanga ne tshiena nnufuila luse; kadi nennuhingashile difutu dia bienzedi bienu bibi, ne nenteke malu enu a bundu ham bidi henu; nenumanye ne, Ndi Yehowa
Hakatshia butuku, wakaluhuka, wakaya mu tshihela; bantu ba bungi bakamukeba, bakalua kudiye, bakakeba kumuhumbisha ne, Kumuki munkatshi muetu

Ku dituku dia makumi abidi ne asatu dia mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete yeye wakatuma bantu kuabo ku nsubu yabo ya ntenta, bakadi ne disanka dinene mu mitshima yabo, bua buimpe buakalesha Yehowa Davidi ne Solomo ne Bena Isalele, bantu bandi
Wakimita difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, yeye wakamba ne Bualu bua Yehowa wakumpa ne meme ndi mubengibue, nunku yeye wakumpa muana eu mukuabo, wakamuidika dina ne, Shimeona
Pa buloba kutoloka bisosa bidi biela nzeba ne mitshi idi ikuama bimuma bia mishindu yonsu
Monai, Muena Kushi wakafika; Muena Kushi wakamba ne, Ndi ne lumu lua kuambila mukelenge, bualu bua Yehowa wakakusombuela lelu kudi bonso bakabika bua kukutombokela
Bakaya kabidi ne ngesu ne bikasu ne bijimishi bia minda ne nkutu ne bintu bionso bia tshiamu tshia mitaku biakenzabo n abi mudimu
Rebeka kuangata kabidi bilamba bia Esawu muanabute bivua mu nzubu, kubivuadika Yakobe, muana muakunyi
Nganyi wakabandila mai a nvula nshila yau, bua kulokesheye nvula ha buloba budi kabuyi ne bantu, bua kukutshisha buloba budi binyanguke ne buatuke, Nvula udi ne tatu wandi, anyi
Hakatumeye bisumbu bia bantu kuabo, wakaya mu mukuna nkayandi bua kutendelela Nzambi; hakabuela diba yeye wakadimu nkayandi
Wakabakonka ne, Kadi nuenu nudi nungamba ne, Meme ndi nganyi
Kadi tuetu, tshisamba tshia Maweja Nangila, nuatufikishi mu tshipela emu bua tshinyi
Miaku eyi kutonda Abrahame bikole, bualu Ismayele uvua kabidi anu muanende

Wakumusha bakuidi batendeledi ba mpingu, bakasungula bakelenge ba Yuda bua kuoshabo musenga wa manananshi mu bitendelelu bia ku mikuna bia mu misoko ya Yuda ne ku miaba yakanyungulula Yelushalema; wakumusha bakuidi bakadi boshela Bâla ne diba ne ngondo ne mitoto ne misumba yonso ya mu diulu manananshi

Kadi bikala tshilamulamu tshitampakane mu dikoba, hakashikisheye kudilesha kudi muakuidi bualu bua kudilengesha, nunku yeye neadileshe kudi muakuidi kabidi, muakuidi neatangile ne bikala tshilamulamu tshitampakane mu dikoba, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane disama edi didi dia nsudi
Nanku, kuajiki

Nyuma wa Yehowa wakamutulukila, yeye wakalumbuluila Bena Isalele; yeye wakaya kuluangana nvita, ne Yehowa wakafila Kushana lishatayima, mukelenge wa mu Mesopotamia, mu tshianza tshiandi; tshianza tshiandi tshiakahita Kushana lishatayima bukole
Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Abalama, wakamba ne, Nempe tunkanunuina biebe buloba ebu Abalama wakenzela Yehowa, wakamueneka kudiye, tshioshelu
Moshe kuangata mashi a nyama ayi kuela mu dilongu

Maweja Nangila kumuleja ditunga dia Kenaane dijima, kutuadijila ku ditunga dia Ngilaade too ne dia Dane, maloba a bena Naftali, bena Efrayime, bena Menashe, bena Yuda, too ne ku Mayi manene a pankatshi pa matunga, buloba bua kuinshi mu ditunga, ne tshibandabanda tshia Yardene, ditunga dia Yeriko tshimenga tshia mabue a ngaji ne ku Soware
Hashishe Palô wakabikila Mose ne Alona lubilu, wakamba ne, Nakuenzela Yehowa Nzambi wenu bualu bubi ne nuenu kabidi
Bakamutendelela, bakahingana ku musoko ne disanka dinene; bakadi mu ntempelo ku dituku ne ku dituku batumbisha Nzambi
Nanku, kulejabu muena Levi yonsu mudimu uvuaye ne bua kuenza ne tshintu tshivuaye mua kuambula, amu bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambe
Musambu wa Solomo Mukashi Musela ne Bana Bakashi ba mu Yelushalema Musambu wa mu misambu, udi wa Solomo
Wewe wakasasula bintu bianyi bionso, wakasanganamu tshintu tshiebe tshimue, anyi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ebu mbualu bua mudimu wa Bena Lewi ba bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu tô ne ha mutu nebenze mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, hahitabo bidimu makumi atanu, nebalekele mudimu, kabankuatshidi mudimu kabidi, kadi nebakuatshile bana babo mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bua kulamabo bintu, kabenji mudimu mukole, wewe newenzele Bena Lewi nunku hawabalesha mudimu wabo
Monai bu mudi bena bukitu bashihibue, ne bintu bia nvita bijimishibue
Hakadiye ubuela mu buatu, wakadi mukuatshike ne bademon wakamutendekena ne, Ndi musue kuikala n ebe
Hakabamona Yakoba, yeye wakamba ne, Ebi mbisumbu bia banjelo ba Nzambi, Wakabikila muaba au ne, Mahanayima
Wakashimika luhangu ludi lunyunguluka nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne tshioshelu tshia milambu ya kuosha, wakakudika tshilulu ku mbelu kua luhangu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Umueneshile Samuele
Yeye kakamumanya kabidi tshiendelele

Badi benza malu abo onso anu bualu bua bantu babamone; badi badiundisha nfulakatelio yabo badi badiundisha mibanga ya bikowelu biabo, hayabo ku bidia bia disanka, badi basue muaba munene, badi basue nkuasa minene mu nsunagoga, badi basue bantu babasekelele mu bisalu, badi basue bantu bababikile ne, Labi
Lewitiki Bintu Bidi Bimpe mua Kudia ne Bidi Kabiyi Bimpe Dut
Bidi bibaluluke bu bibanda, bu bibunda bidi hehi ne musulu, bu mitshi ya aloe yakakunabo kudi Yehowa, bu mitshi ya cèdre idi hehi ne mai
Mvidi Mukulu kutabeja mesu a Agare
Bualu bua Mukelenge, Yehowa wa misumba, neashikishe mudimu wa kubutula munkatshi mua ba ha buloba bonso bu muakadihangidishileye
; Yel
Yakobe kuandamuna Labane ne: Ndi mukunyeme, bualu mvua ntshina ne: udi mua kunnyenga bana bebe ba bakaji ku bukole
Kadi bualu bua yeye kakadi ne bia kumana n abi dibanza, mukelenge wandi wakamba ne, Bamuhane ne mukashi wandi ne bana bandi ne bintu biandi bionso, bua kumana dibanza
Pashishe nuenu bafike ne muakunyenu udi mushale awu, nenjadike ne: nudi nuamba bulelela
Yuda wakabimanya, wakamba ne, Yeye udi muntambe meme buakane, bualu bua meme tshiakamubakisha kudi muan anyi mulume Shela

Kadi nakabisha tshianza tshianyi bua kuditshiha kudibo mu tshihela ne, Nennumuangalashe munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu, nennutangadishe mu maloba makuabo, bualu bua kabakenza mikenji yanyi kadi bakahidia mei anyi, bakanyanga matuku anyi a mbingu, ne mioyo yabo yakasamina mpingu ya batatu babo muoyo
Yeye wakabebesha ne, Nudi nubakonka tshinyi
Kulondolola Muprofete Yehu Udi Ubela Yehoshafata Yehoshafata, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakahingana ku nsubu wandi mu Yelushalema ne ditalala
Kadi nenshale ku Efeso tô ne ku dituku dia Pentekoste; bua bakumana kungunzuluila tshibi tshinene ne tshia kuenza mudimu mukole, ne bahumbishi ba bungi badiku
Bakuabo kabidi bakamba ne, Yeye udi bu muambi wa malu a nzambi ya bende, bualu bua yeye wakadi wamba bua Yesu ne bua dibika dia ku lufu
Kadi nyama wa mu Lebanona wakahitaku, wakadiata dieba munda mua dikama
Hakadibo bahueka ha mukuna, Yesu wakabambila ne, Kanuambidi muntu mukuabo bualu bunuakumona tô ne habika Muana wa muntu ku lufu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nuangate manza a butue bua mu tshikutu, Mose abumiamine mulu ku mesu kua Palô
Hushai wakambila Abashaloma ne, Dî diakukuambila Ahitofele tshikondo etshi kadiena dimpe nansha

Yeye wakahuka kudiye hakadiye mu nshila, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Lua biebe, ndi musue kulala n ebe, yeye kakamanya ne yeye udi ma muen andi Mukashi wakamukonka ne, Neumpe tshinyi hawalua kundi
Hakabuela bamessager mu nsubu, bakatangila luhingu mu bulalu ne musamu wa miosa ya mbushi ku mutu kualu
Bamfumu ba Ditunga ba kale bavwabo basungula badi batshipwita bakulumpa bwa kashidi
Masalayi akaluka tshifulu tshia bukelenge tshia meba akamubuesha ku mutu, akamuluatshisha tshikowelu tshikunze; akalua kudiye, akamuambila ne, Muoyo, Mukelenge wa Bena Yuda
Mukaji awu uvua utatshisha amu kutatshisha Yozefe matuku onsu, umusengelela bua ashale bayende
Umwe ne umwe udi ne tutupa twa teletwale twikala katuyi ku bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bwa kumutu etu: tshimenga,komina, seketela ne musoko wa bamfumu ba kabukulu
Mu matuku au bakenza muana wa ngombe, bakashihela luhingu nyama, bakasanka bua bintu biakenzabo ne bianza biabo
Hakambeye dî edi, bonso bakadi n andi lukuna bakakuatshika bundu ku mesu; bantu ba tshisumbu tshionso bakasanka bua malu onso a butumbi akenzeye
Ndi musue bua numanye ne: ndi wa tshijila
Biabika muena mashimi bua kutumpila mukuabo bua malu mabi akadiye wenza, nunku bubidi buabo badi batandangana, nebimane ku mesu kua Yehowa ne ku mesu kua bakuidi ne balumbuluishi ba mu matuku au
Milambu ya Masanka Majalame Dituku dia dikumi ne anai dia ngondo wa kumudilu ndituku dia kuhita kua Yehowa
Bakamukumina milonda mu bianza ne makasa ku mutshi mutshiamakane; bakabanyangana bilulu biandi, bakabielela nshobo bua kumanyabo tshiangata muntu ne muntu
Kadi nuenu nenuangate bukole, hanuhuekela Nyuma Muimpe ham bidi henu; nenuikale bamanyi banyi mu Yelushalema ne mu Yudaya yonso ne Samalea ne kunfudilu kua buloba
Makalu a nvita anai akadi afuma hankatshi ha mikuna ibidi; mikuna ei yakadi mikuna ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Kabakamanya mua kubala bungi bua bantu bakuabo bakafuma n andi mu bululu: Bena Lubima ne Bena Sukiya ne Bena Atiopa
Bakuabo bakasua kumukuata, kadi muntu kakamulenga tshianza
Mukenji umue newikale kûdi ne kudi muntu muledibue mu buloba buenu ne muenyi udi ushikama munkatshi muenu

Muntu wa mu tshisumbu wakamuandamuna ne, Muyishi, nakulua kûdi ne muan anyi mulume, yeye udi ne nyuma mubi wa kamama; kuonso kudiye umuendesha utu wamututa hanshi; muana utu wahatuka lututu ku mishiku, utu wasumakana mena, udi unyanganyanga; nakulomba bayidi bebe mua kumushabo nyuma, kadi bobo kabakamanya mua kumumusha
Kadi Paulo, wakambila kapitene ka masalayi ne masalayi mene ne, Bikala bantu aba kabai bashale mu buatu, kanuena mua kusungidibua
Nulekele nyunyi awu aye
Kadi bapostolo Bânaba ne Paulo, hakunvuabo bualu abu, bakadihanda bivualu, bakaya lubilu munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia bantu, bela dî bikole ne, Balumiana, nudi nuenzela nunku tshinyi
Bakadi babala mu mukanda, mu mikenji ya Nzambi, bakajingulula biakane; bakayijinguluila bantu kabidi, nunku buonso buabo bakunvua biakane
Wakenda mu nshila wa ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba, wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa bu muakenza ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba, bualu bua yeye wakadi bayandi tshina wa ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba
Balami bakahingana, batumbisha Nzambi bamutendelela, bualu bua malu anso akunvuabo ne akamonabo, bu muakabambilabo
Colossians Paulo, mupostolo wa Kilisto Yesu bua disua dia Nzambi, ne Timote, muan etu wa mu Kilisto, kudi badi mu Kolosai, basanto ne bana betu bananukidi ba mu Kilisto

Bakangata bimuna biabo ne bintu bionso biakangatabo mu buloba bua Kanana, bakalua mu Ejipitu, Yakoba ne tunkanunuina tuandi bionso bana bandi ba balume bakaleleye, ne bana ba balume ba bana bandi, ne bana bandi ba bakashi bakaleleye, ne bana ba bakashi ba bana bandi, wakalua ne buonso buabo mu Ejipitu
Tshibuelelu ne mbalanda watshi biakadi ne madidishi nseke yonso, ne tshibuelelu tshiakadi ne coudées makumi atanu mu bule buatshi ne coudées makumi abidi ne itanu mu butshiama buatshi
Mu diba adi mene nakadi mu Nyuma, ne mona, nkuasa wa butumbi wakashikikibua mu diulu, ne mukuabo wakadi mushikame ha nkuasa wa butumbi
Hashishe Yishai wakabikila Abinadaba, wakamuhitshisha ku mpala kua Samuele
Biwahidia kubalekela, nentume biula mu buloba buebe
Yeye kabidi wakatulesha dinanga dienu dia mu Nyuma Muimpe

Nakanufundila mu mutanda wanyi ne, Kanubuelakanyi ne bena masandi; tshiakamba dî nasha kakese bua bena masandi ba ha buloba ebu, anyi bena lukuka lua bintu, anyi banyengi ba bintu, anyi bena mpingu; nunku nuakadi kuikala ne bualu bua kumuka mu buloba ebu
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Wakumona bimpe, bualu bua ndi ndama dî dianyi bua kudishikisha
Bakamuambila ne, Uye biebe, bualu bua Yehowa neafile musoko mu bianza bia mukelenge
Dituku adi, nembalekele bulelela, bualu mbenze malu mabi, batendelela mvidie
Hakatshidiye wambila bisumbu bia bantu mei andi, mamu andi ne bana babo bakadi bimane ha mbelu, bakeba kumuambila dî
Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Bantu ba tshikondo etshi kabena bashika tô ne hashika malu â onso
Nunku bantu ba Davidi bakalukila, bakahingana kudi Davidi, bakamuambila mei â onso
Kanuendi mu bilele bia tshisamba tshindi ngihata ku mesu kuenu, bualu bua bobo bakenza malu au onso, nunku nakabalengulula

Tukiko, muan etu munanga wa mu Kilisto, muena mudimu wa lulamatu ne muhika n anyi mu Mukelenge, neanumanyishe malu anyi onso; unakatuma kunudi bua bualu ebu mene, bua nuenu kumanya malu etu ne bua yeye asambe mitshima yenu
Ada wakalela Yabala, yeye wakadi nkambua wa badi bashikama mu nsubu ya ntenta ne badi ne bimuna
Baluka wakabahingashila dî ne, Yeye wakangambila mei â onso mukana muandi, ne meme nakâfunda mu mukanda ne mai a mukanda
Kuenzekabi nanku
Balumbuluishi Muanjelo wa Yehowa ku Bokima Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakafuma ku Gilegala, wakaya ku Bokima

Hakahita matuku â, mukelenge wakalambishila bantu bonso bakadi n andi mu nsubu wandi wa mu Shushana, ne banene ne bakese, bidia bia disanka, mu tshiendedi tshia mu tshibunda tshia ku mbalasa wa mukelenge matuku muanda mutekete
Wewe wakangelesha nyima ya bakadi n anyi lukuna, bua meme kushiha bakadi bankina
Bakakema bonso, bakakonkangana ne, Etshi ntshinyi
Mabue awu, neikale tshimanyinu tshia bisamba dikumi ne bibidi bia bena Izrayele
Ndi nebe, nenkulame ku njiwu yonsu, kabidi difutu diebe nedikale dinene
Kadi, bu mudi Mukelenge mutahuluile muntu ne muntu tshikadilu, bu mudi Nzambi mubikile muntu ne muntu, ende biandi nunku
Hashishe nakamba ne, Aka, Mukelenge Yehowa

Mu diba adi mene ubahingishe dî dia Yehowa ne, Bu munuakulekela meme, ne bu munuakukuatshila nzambi ya bende mudimu mu buloba buenu mene, nunku nenukuatshile bantu ba bende mudimu mu buloba budi kabuyi buenu
Mampa a Kuteka ku Mpala kua Yehowa Wangate bukula bubotesha, ulambe n abu mikata dikumi ne ibidi, ulambe mukata umue ne bituha bibidi bia dikumi bia épha
Pawapingana ku mudimu webe, umvuluke, ungakuile kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, bua ampatule mu nzubu wa lukanu emu
Umushayi mvidie ya bisamba bikuabu idi munkatshi muenu

Ka ludimi luanyi nebambile bantu bua buakane buebe Psalms Ditomboka diandi didi diambila muntu mubi dî munda mua mutshima wandi; Bualu bua didi dimubomba ku mesu kuandi ne, Mei a mukana muandi adi a kuenza malu a tshianana ne a kudinga; Udi uhangidisha bua kuenza malu a dihambuka halaleye mu bulalu buandi; Yehowa, luse luebe lujalame ludi lufika tô ne mu diulu, Buakane buebe budi bu mikuna ya Nzambi, Nzambi, ke mudi luse luebe lujalame luikale lua mushinga mukole

Bakatuma mikanda ei mu bianza bia bantu ku nseke yonso ya mukelenge bua kushihabo ne bua kubutulabo Bena Yuda bonso ne batekete ne banunu ne bana bakese ne bakashi dituku dimue, mu dituku dia dikumi ne asatu dia ngondo wa dikumi ne ibidi, ngondo wa Adâ mene, ne bua kuhaulabo bintu biabo bionso

Ebi mbifuanyikishi bia or bia masungu biakahingishila Bena Peleshete Yehowa bu milambu ya kubuikidila n ai mibi; ku Ashedodo tshimue, ku Gaza tshimue, ku Ashekelona tshimue, ku Gata tshimue, ku Ekelona tshimue; ne bifuanyikishi bia or bia mpuku bu bungi bua misoko yonso ya Bena Peleshete yakadi ku nyima kua bakelenge aba batanu, ne misoko yakadi ne ngumbu ne yakadi hatuhu tô ne ku dibue adi dinene diakatekabo mushete wa Yehowa, didi mu budimi bua Yoshua, Muena Bete shemeshe, tô ne lelu
Ku mbelu kua luhangu tshilulu netshikaleku tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin mutambe buimpe, tshienjibue kudi mundi wa lungenyi lule, enza makunshi anai ne nkanu mai
Kadi munda muabu nemuikale tshituha tshia bukole bua tshiamu, bu muwakumona tshiamu tshifike tshisangisha ne dima

Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Bika biebe, uye ku nshila wa musoko udibo babikila ne, Mululame, ku nsubu wa Yuda, ukonkeku muntu, dina diandi Shaula, udi biandi Muena Tâso, bua tangila, yeye udi utendelela Nzambi; yeye kabidi wakamona muntu, dina diandi Anania, ubuela kudiye ma tshikena kumona, umulenga tshianza bua kutabaleye
Batu bauteka ha mutu ha mesa a muinda, nasha

Bualu ebu budi bu muntu wakaya ku luendu ku luseke lukuabo; wakashîa nsubu wandi, wakabanyina bantu bandi bukokeshi, muntu mudimu wandi muntu mudimu wandi, wakambila kabidi mulami wa ku tshibi ne, Udimuke
Nunku masalayi akangata Paulo, bu muakâmbilabo, akalua n andi mu butuku tô ne ku Antipati
Bankambua betu kale bavua baye mu Ejipitu
Bintu bionso bidibo bakuata n abi mudimu mu tshiendelele ne milonda yonso yatshi, ne milonda yonso ya luhangu luatshi, nebikale bia tshiamu tshia mitaku
Yehoshafata wakamba ne, Dî dia Yehowa didi mukana muandi
Bualu bua ne ngunvue disengelela diandi bua bualu buenu, bua tshinuenzedi bibi bua buhote buenu

Yeye wakela dî diakamuambila Yehowa ku tshioshelu atshi, wamba ne, Tshioshelu, tshioshelu, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Muana wa balume nealedibue mu nsubu wa Davidi, dina diandi Yoshiya: yeye neafile bakuidi badi bosha musenga wa manananshi ha mutu hebe bu mulambu wa kuosha; neboshe mifuba ya bantu ha mutu hebe
Umunkonke amu meme
