Tatu wanyi wakufila bintu bionso mu bianza bianyi; kakuena muntu udi mumanye Muana, anu Tatu; kakuena muntu udi mumanye Tatu, anu Muana ne udi Muana musue kulesha Tatu
Ku nyima wakababadila mei onso a mikenji, ne masanka ne milau, bu muakadi malu onso mafunda mu mukanda wa mikenji
Bikala matutu mûle tente ne mai a nvula, adi amumatshisha ha buloba; biahona mutshi ku luseke lua ku sude anyi lua ku nôde, mutshi newikale anu mu muaba wakahonenau
Bualu mbintu biende
Mose wakaluhuka kudi Palô, wakalomba Yehowa
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nakabenzela bu muakangenzelabo
Nunku bantu kabahendi bualu buebe buimpe
Nunku bakabikila muaba au ne, Besheba bualu bua bubidi buabo bakaditshihilaku
Bingikala muenze bibi, ndi mua kukuenzela tshinyi, tô ne hakalua bualu ebu bujitu kundi
Kadi panuikala kanuyi nukumbaja mikenji eyi, kanuyi nuitaba bindi nnuambila, nutendelela mvidie inudi kanuyi banji kumanya, nenuikale bena diakabi
Muntu yonsu udi ubuelela muanabu wa bakaji wa tatuende, nansha wa mamuende, mu nzubu, asangane muena tshibawu kuenza anyi
Kabidi kena mua kubishintakaja to
Moshe kutuuta dikombu pa lubuebue misangu ibidi
Lekela kuhitshibua kudi malu mabi; kadi wikale uhite malu mabi ku malu mimpe
Bakashihela ba demon badi kabayi Nzambi nyama, nzambi idibo kabayi bamanye, nzambi mihia mihia yakamueneka anu katataka, yakadi batatu benu kabayi batshina diambedi
Pashishe kulambulaye ngombe mulume umue, ne mukoku wa tshimpanga umue pa tshilambuilu tshionsu
Nshila wanyi kena mululame, anyi
Mose wakaha tshisamba tshia Lubena buhianyi bu bungi bua meku abo

Hashishe tshiji tshikole netshinkuate dituku adi, ne meme nembalekele, nengumushe mesu anyi kudibo ne bobo nebajimishibue; ne matata ne makenga a bungi nealue kudibo; bobo nebambilangane dituku adi ne, Malu â mabi onso kaena alua kutudi bualu bua Nzambi wetu kena munkatshi muetu, anyi

Bakenza ndibu ya or nkayandi, bakateka ndibu hankatshi ha tumuma tuakadi kuinshi kua tshikowelu, kadibu ne kamuma kadibu ne kamuma kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshia kuenza n atshi mudimu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Eli wakamukonka ne, Bualu bishi mbuenjibue, muan anyi
lupetu lusomba munda mwa ditunga bwa majinga a polovensa;
Wakitabusha, kakavila, wakitabusha ne, Meme tshiena Kilisto
Yeye wakabuela mu nsubu wa Nzambi hakadi Ebeyata muakuidi mimene, wakadia bidia bilesha, biakadi tshijila, anu bakuidi ba Nzambi mbakadi badia, yeye kabidi wakahaku bakadi n andi
Bikai, tuye; tangilai, muntungidi udi ha buihi
Mutumikidi wa mikenji kena ukengeshibua; mutshima wa muena meji udi ujingulula bikondo ne ngenzelu
Shaula ne Yonatana bakadi bakane, bakadi banyishibua kudi bantu mu mioyo yabo, kabakadi bahanduluke mu lufu luabo; bakahita nyunyu ya mikanku lubilu, bakatamba nyama ya ntambue bukole
Hakunvua Elisha, muntu wa Nzambi, lumu ne, Mukelenge wa Isalele wakahanda bilulu biandi, yeye wakatumina mukelenge dî ne, Wakuhandila bilulu biebe tshinyi
Leya umona ne lulelu luakoseki, kufilaye mupika wende Zilpa kudi Yakobe, bua ashale mukajende
Nanku bua nuenu kuikala ne muoyi, nuitabe tshindi nnuambila

Joshua Yoshua wakabikila Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe, wakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakatumikila mei onso akanuambila Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, nuakunyua dî dianyi mu malu onso anakunuambila; kanuakalekela bana benu matuku au onso tô ne ku dituku edi, kadi nuakatumikila mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Nenusanke ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne wewe ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muntu webe mulume ne muntu webe mukashi ne Muena Lewi udi mu musoko webe ne muenyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi munkatshi muenu, mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi
Tshikuabu kupeshaye bayende, awu pende kudia
Bakamukudi muna di ne, Nansha, katuena bamanye mua kuenza nunku, anu hatuasangisha mikoko yonso ne humushabo dibue ku mushiku wa dina, hashishe netunuishe mikoko mai

Bakatela mena a bantu bakuabo bua kufilabo bintu kudi bana balume ba Alona, bakuidi bakadi bashikame mu madimi akadi ku mpenge kua musoko ne musoko, ne bua kuhabo balume bonso ba bakuidi bintu biabo ne kudi bonso bakadi babadibue mu kulondolola kua Bena Lewi
Sala, mukashi wa mukelenge wanyi, wakamulelela muana mulume hakadiye muntu mununu, yeye wakadia muana eu bintu bionso bidiye n abi
Hanuakahikudibua ku bubi, nuakavuishibua bahika ba buakane
Muena mudimu wandi wakamuebesha ne, Aka, mukelenge wanyi, netuenze tshinyi

Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Yai bienu, nuambile Yone malu anudi nunyua ne anudi numona; bafofo badi batabala, balema badi benda, bena nsudi badi balengeshibue, bena mahaha badi bunvua, bafue badi babishibua ku lufu, badi bambila bahele lumu luimpe lua Nzambi, Muntu yonso udi kai ulenduka bua bualu buanyi udi ne disanka
Tshidi tshintu tshiakunuambila Yehowa ne, Muntu ne muntu adisangishilebi mudiye mua kudia, tshihiminu Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, bakuabo bakasangisha bia bungi, bakuabo bakasangisha bikese
Mukelenge Agipa, wewe udi witabusha mei a baprofete, anyi

Kadi hanakatangila ne kabakenda bajalama bu mudi lumu luimpe lua bushua luamba, nakambila Kefa ku mesu kua buonso buabo ne, Wewe, Muena Yuda, biwenza bu mudi bantu ba mu bisamba bia bende benza, kui wenza bu mudi Bena Yuda benza, munyi mûdi musue kuenzesha bantu ba mu bisamba bia bende bua bobo benza bu mudi Bena Yuda benza
Bintu ebi bizola biakadi munda mua nsubu muonso
Yesu wakamba ne, Meme kabidi tshiena nkubanda, ya biebe, kuenji bualu bubi kabidi tshiendelele
Asakidile kabidi ne tshia bitanu tshimue tshia mushinga wa bintu abi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne bana bandi balume ne, Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu mu muaba udibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia nebashihe mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu ku mesu kua Yehowa, eu udi mulambu mutambe wa tshijila
Umuinyike Ismayele
Hakadi Petelo wendakana mu nseke yonso, wakahueka kudi basanto bakadi ku Luda
Nunku ndi nnusengelela ne, Nuhunge dî ne mukelenge wanyi, mukelenge wa Ashû, hashishe nennuhe tubalu binunu bibidi binuamanya mua kushikika bantu ha nyima hatu
Hakabuela Yesu mu nsubu wa Petelo, wakamonamu muku wandi mukashi mulale hanshi ne disama dia mubidi kahia
Mukelenge Nebukadenesâ, tatu ebe mene, wakamuteka kahita ka batempi ba mbuku, bamanyi ba malu a mitoto, Bena Kasada ne bena meji bakuabo
Udi ne matshu unvue biandi
ne dihila
Kubatuminaye tshipupu tshikole

Nyeye udi wenda mu buakane, udi wenza malu makane, Nyeye udi kayi wela mukoso ne ludimi luandi, Ku mesu andi muntu mubi udi mulenguludibue; Kena usombesha bakuabo argent yandi bua kuangateye kasombela Misambu Nzambi undame, bualu bua ndi nkeba tshinyemenu tshianyi kûdi
Netuende nebe
Hakimanabi talalâ, biakabuikila mahuahua abi
Kadi ndi nditshipa ne: bu mundi ne muoyi, kabidi bu mudi buloba bujima buwule ne butumbi buanyi, muntu nansha umue wa ku ndelanganyi eyi kakubuela mu Kenaane to
Bakanusumba ku mushinga mukole; kanulu bahika ba bantu

Hakabidikishabo ne tshihiminu, muntu wakadi usangisha bia bungi bintu kabiakashala kudiye, ne muntu wakadi usangisha bikese kakadi ne nzala, muntu ne muntu wakadisangishilabi bu muakamanyeye mudiadieye

Ne mu ditekemena edi nakasua kulua kunudi diambedi bua nuenu kuikala ne ngasa tshiakabidi; nakasua kuhitshila munkatshi muenu ku Makedonia, ne kuhingana kunudi ku Makedonia kabidi, bua nuenu kuntuma ku mpala mu luendu luanyi lua ku Yudaya
Hakatangila Samuele Shaula, Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Mona muntu unakukuambila, kayeye au

Hakatangila nsongalume ne bantu bonso bakadi bimanaku, yeye wakumusha Amasa mu nshila, wakaya n andi mu mpata, wakamubuikila tshilulu; bualu bua yeye wakatangila ne muntu yonso wakafika hakadiye wakimanaku
Bantu bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi ne nkama ibidi
Nanku muaba onsu unudi basomba kanuena mua kudia kabidi mashi a nyunyi, nansha a nyama too ne kashidi
Bafalese bakadi bafume ku Yelushalema bakamba ne, Yeye udi ne Belezebula, udi umusha bademon mu dina dia mukelenge wa bademon
Yehoshafata wakadi ne bubanji ne butumbi bua bungi; wakahunga tshihungidi ne Ahaba

Nakatangila nkuasa ya butumbi, ne bakashikamahu, ne bakabaha bukole bua kulumbuluisha; ne nakatangila mioyo ya bakoshibua mitu bualu bua bumanyishi buabo bua Yesu, ne bualu bua dî dia Nzambi, ne bobo bakadi kabai bakukuna nyama wa luonji, anyi tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, ne hakadi kabai bangata tshimanymu ha mpala habo ne ha tshianza tshiabo; bobo bakikala ne muoyo, ne bakakokesha ne Kilisto bidimu tshinunu
Kabikadi ne buhianyi, bualu bua meme ndi buhianyi buabo; kanubahi luhetu mu Isalele, bualu bua meme ndi luhetu luabo

Hita biebe, Muana mukashi udi mushikame mu Malota udi uhampakana Suika makalu ku tubalu tudi tuenda lubilu, Nunku bûdi n abu mbua kufila tshintu tshia kulayangana n atshi Wewe, muana mukashi udi mushikame mu Malesha, Dikungula mutu, kosa nsuki yebe yonso, Mika Mulau wikale kudi badi belangana meji a kuenza bibi, Badi bakuma mitshima yabo ku madimi a bakuabo, badi bânyenga; Bua malu â Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu dituku adi nebanusendeke, Nunku mu disangisha dia Yehowa kanuena nuikala ne muntu Badi bambila baprofete ne, Lekelai tshiakulakula tshienu; Nebamanye mua kunukonka, nuenu Bena Yakoba, ne, Kadi anu makelela bantu banyi bakubika bu bena lukuna kundi
Dituku kai dituakakutangila usama ne mu nsubu wa lukanu, tualua kûdi
Bikala tshintu tshikese tshia munyinyi wa tshijila anyi tshia bidia bishale tô ne ku dinda, wewe neutshioshe mu kahia, kabatshidi, bualu bua tshidi tshia tshijila
Tshidi tshilondolola Bukalenga bunene, kumpanyi ya mbulamatadi pamwe ne nzubu ne midimu ya Mbulamatadi
Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kakunyua mei a Belâma; kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakakudimuna mulau ulua disanka dienu, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanusua
Ruth Naomi wakadi ne muikulu wa mu tshiota tshia bayandi, Elimeleke, muntu mukole ne mubanji, dina diandi Boaza
Nenkuvudishangane ba bungi, nenkuvuishe bisamba bia bungi, bakelenge nebaledibue munda muebe
Nunku Yehowa wakasungila Bena Isalele dituku adi; bakaluangana n abo tô ne ku Bete awena

Mukelenge wandi wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakunzulula bibi bia nsubu, wakamba kuya mu nshila wandi; ne monai, mukashi wandi muhika wakadi muhone hanshi ku tshibi tshia nsubu, ne bianza biandi mu mbelu
Kadi yeye wakabambila ne, Nudi nutangila bintu ebi bionso, anyi
John Tangilai mushindu wa dinanga diakamba Tatu bua tuetu tubikidibue ne Bana ba Nzambi; ne tud nunku
Yeye wakabambila ne, E, ndi mumanye, nuanji kuhuwa
Nunku kanutshinyi, mushinga wenu udi mutambe wa mishamisha ya bungi
Muanabute kulela muana wa balume, kumuinyika dina ne: Mowabe
Muntu kai udi mulenduishibue, ne tshishi tshianyi katshi tshitema
Hanubikilabo kudi Palo, yeye neanukonke ne, Nudi benji ba mudimu kai
Kabakudia kundi ne mitshima yabo, Nakubayisha ne nakukolesha maboko abo, Badi bahingana, kadi kabena bahingana kudi Nzambi wa mu diulu, Hoshea Teka mpungi ku mishiku yebe

Nuenu nenukudimune di ne, Bantu bebe bakadi balami ba bimuna hatuakadi bitende tô ne katataka, ne tuetu ne batatu etu, bua nuenu nushikame mu buloba bua Goshene Bualu bua mulami yonso wa mikoko udi mulenguludibue kudi Bena Ejipitu
Dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Atalaya, muana wa Omeli, mukelenge wa Isalele
Tuakenza bualu ebu tuela meji ne, Halua matuku makuabo bana benu nebakonke bana betu ne, Nuenu nudi ne Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, bualu, anyi
Musangu eu nentume milau yanyi yonso ku mutshima webe ne kudi bena mudimu bebe ne kudi bantu bebe, bua kukumanyisha ne, Kakuena nzambi mukuabo bu meme mu buloba buonso
Katuakutumikila dî dia Yehowa Nzambi wetu, bua kulonda mikenji yandi yakatekeye ku mpala kuetu mu mei akamba bantu bandi baprofete
Muntu awu apingaje tshintu atshi amu bu mu watshi, asakidile kabidi ne tshia bitanu tshimue tshia mushinga wa tshintu atshi
Kadi biwadimusha muntu eu mubi bua kulekeleye kuenda mu nshila wandi mubi, ne bikaleye kayi ulekela kuenda mu nshila wandi mubi, yeye neafue bua bubi buandi, kadi wewe wakuhandisha muoyo webe
Muntu wakalua kudiye, wakamba ne, Muyishi, nengenze bualu buimpe kai, mpete muoyo wa tshiendelele
Bakuabo bakadi bimaneku, hakunvuabo dî edi, bakamba ne, Yeye udi Ubikila Eliya
Ba Hemana, bana ba Hemana: Bukia, Matanaya, Uziele, Shebuele ne Yelimota, Hananya, Hanani, Eliata, Gidaleti ne Lomameti ezê, Yoshebe kasha, Maloti, Hotî, Mahaziota
Bana babidi aba kuandamuna tatuabu ne: Mulumiana ewu kavua mua kuangata muanetu wa bakaji ku bukole, bu mukaji mudisombele to
Nunku yeye wakabambila ne, Nungambule nungele mu mai manene, bua mai manene abatame; bualu bua ndi mumanye ne tshihuhu etshi tshinene tshidi tshinukuate bua bualu buanyi
Kadi Bena Lewi kabakenzesha bualu ebu lukasa
Nunku bakalua ne bantu aba ku mpala kua mukelenge

Nudimuke, kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi ne malu anakunuambila lelu: hanuadia bintu bia bungi, hanukuta, hanuasa nsubu mimpe ne hanuashikamamu, hakumbana ngombe yenu ne mikoko yenu ne havulangana biamu bienu bia argent ne bia or, ne havulangana bintu bienu bionso; hashishe nudimuke, kanudisu mu mitshima yenu, kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu; wakanulombola mu tshihela tshinene tshibi, tshiakadi ne nyoka isuma bu kahia ne tuminyiminyi, ne buloba budi kabuyi ne mai; wakanuhatula mai mu dibue dikole; wakanuisha ne mana mu tshihela, adi batatu benu kabayi bamanye; bualu bua kunuhuekesha ne kunuteta, bua kunuenzela bimpe mu matuku a kunshikidilu kuenu: kanuambi mu mitshima yenu ne, Tuakudiangatshila biuma ebi bionso ne bukole bua bianza bietu

Nunku hakunvua bantu bonso tshiona tshia mpungi, tshia nshiba, tshia nzenze, tshia nkombe, tshia guitare, tshia bimama ne tshia biombelu bionso, ba bisamba bionso ne ba miaku yonso bakatua mpala yabo hanshi, bakatendelela luhingu lua or luakadi mukelenge Nebukadenesâ muimanyike
Muntu udibo bânji kulama mu tshimana udi ne bukookeshi bwa kuyukila diakamwe ne beena dîku diende anyi ne mumwakwidi wende
Bua meme, tshî munkatshi muenu mu mubidi, kadi muikale n enu mu nyuma wanyi, nakumana kulumbuluisha muntu wakenza bualu ebu nunku, bu mundi muikaleku
Nsubu webe ne bukelenge buebe nebujadikibue ku mesu kuebe tshiendelele; nkuasa webe wa butumbi neajadikibue tshiendelele
Aba bonso bakadi bana ba balume ba Asela
Yeye wakahingasha kahita ka bena maluvu mu mudimu wandi kabidi, ne yeye wakaha Palo luhanza luandi mu tshianza tshiandi kabidi
Kadi nuenu nuikale ne bukole, kanutekeshi maboko enu; bualu bua nebanufute ku midimu yenu
Bobo bakambila Yoshua ne, Tuetu tudi bahika bebe
Ntempelo wa Nzambi udi uhunga di kai ne mpingu
Nunku monai, Yehowa udi wela mukenji ne, Tubalu tudi mua kunyemena lubilu ha mabue, anyi

Mose wakatshiawila, wakangata mashi atshi, wakâlaba ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia Alona ne ku tshiala tshia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku munu munene wa dikasa diandi dia balume
Eku kudi ditantamana, ne ditabusha dia basanto
Hakadi Bafalese badisangisha nunku, Yesu wakabakonka ne, Nudi nuamba munda muenu ne, Kilisto udi nganyi
Yeye wakamba ne, Ya kabidi misangu muanda mutekete
Yone wakadi mumane kuambila Helode ne, Wewe kuena mumanye mua kuikala ne mukashi wa muan enu
Bena Ejipitu bavua Yozefe mubikile, kudia kabidi pa nkayabu
Bualu bua bintu bionso bidi bifuma kûdi, tuakafila anu bintu biebe kûdi
Yehoaza, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Ahiezê muana mulume wa Amishadai neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Dana
Bana bonso banudi batela mbanyi; ban a bute ba balume ba bimuna mbanyi, ban a bute ba ngombe ne ba mikoko
Ndi nya kusomba mutantshi mule nebe

Kadi muhika au wakaluhuka mu nsubu, wakasangana muhika n andi wakadi n andi dibanza dia lukama lua ndenalio; Muhika n andi wakadishinda mukudimane, wakamusengelela ne, Kungenzedi bualu lukasa, nenkufute
Colossians Nunku binuikala babishibue hohamue ne Kilisto ku lufu, nukebe malu a mu diulu, mudi Kilisto, mushikame ku tshianza tshikole tshia Nzambi

Nuenu nudi nusankila mu tshintu tshia tshianana, Yehowa, Nzambi wa misumba, udi wamba ne, Amos Mukelenge Yehowa wakandesha tshikena kumona etshi: Monai, yeye wakadi utuma mikumbi ku tshibangidilu tshia kutoloka kuibidi kua bia kudia; monai, kuakadi kutoloka kuakalonda bia kudia biakanowelabo mukelenge
Wakenzela tshioshelu munyingu wa tshiamu tshia mitaku, wakatekeye munda mua mibangu ya ku mutu kua tshioshelu hankatshi, mu bule buatshi
Nunku Muena Lewi wakasomba
Bena Yuda bakaya ku mpala ne dibendele dia tshitudilu tshiabo, Nashona, muana mulume wa Aminadaba, wakadi ku mutu kuabo
Bualu bukuabo, Elenatana ne Delaya ne Gemaleya hakamana kusengelela mukelenge ne, Kuoshi mukanda nansha; kadi yeye kakabunvuila
Yai bienu nuyile dî edi ne, Ndi musue luse, tshiena nsua nyama minshihela; meme tshiakuluila bua kubikila badi bakane, nakuluila bua kubikila badi babi

Badi bambanda bavuale dinyanguka dia lumu luabo, Nensakidile Yehowa bikole ne mei a mukana muanji, Bualu bua yeye udi wimana ku tshianza tshia balume tshia muhele, Psalms Yehowa Yehowa neolole bukokeshi buebe bu dikombo kule bubangile mu Siona
Hankatshi ha lumingu nealekeshe difila dia mulambu wa nyama mishiha ne wa bia kudia
Wakenza makunshi a acacia anai, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ku makunshi, akadi ne bitubuidi bia or, wakenza nkanu yau mai ya tshiamu tshia argent
Ka nuenji mudimu, nenufile mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Nanku uvua mumuteleshile tshinkutu tshia mushinga mukole
Dituku adi, buloba kupandika, kubajibikila pamue ne Kora
Yesu wakabakonka ne, Nudi ne mitanda bungi munyi
Bakelenge ba mu Sukota bakamuambila ne, Bianza bia Zêba ne Salemuna bidi mu bianza biebe katataka bua tuetu tukuhe bidia bua bena nvita bebe, anyi
Bakamba ne, Yeye udi mumanyi

Bualu bua dijinga dia malu a mubidi didi difuilangana ne dijinga dia malu a Nyuma, ne dijinga dia malu a Nyuma didi difuilangana ne dijinga dia malu a mubidi; bua malu â adi mimanyinangane, bua nuenu kanuenji malu anudi basue kuenza
Bena Peleshete bakahingishila Bena Isalele misoko yabo yakanyengabo ku Ekelona tô ne ku Gata; Bena Isalele bakumusha mikalu yabo mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Nenkukuile tshibasa tshia mutshi, anyi
Yesu wakamuambila bikole ne, Kuambidi muntu bualu ebu; uye biebe, udimueneshe kudi muakuidi wa Nzambi, udie biakamba Mose bu tshimanyishilu ku mesu kua bantu bualu bua kulengeshibua kuebe
Ndi nusengelela bua nuenu kutamba kuenza bualu ebu, bua meme mpingishibue kunudi lubilu

Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya, hakashikisha mukelenge Sedekiya kuhunga tshihungidi ne bantu bonso bakadi mu Yelushalema bua kubambileye mukenji wa budishikaminyi ne, Muntu yonso alekele muhika wandi mulume ne muhika wandi mukashi badi Bena Ebelu, baye hatuhu; bua kakuikadi Muena Yuda wabuesha muan abo mu buhika
Ebu mbualu budi Tatu wanyi mutuile, ndi nteka muoyo wanyi hanshi bua meme kûangata kabidi
Bantu bonso bakunvua mukenji wakelela mukelenge tupitene tuonso bualu bua Abashaloma
Mutuangaji amukenkete
Bantu bakaya kusangila n andi, bua bakunvua bualu bua tshimanyinu etshi tshiakenzeye
Nunku netuambe tshinyi

Mpanza yonso ya kunuina mukelenge Solomo yakadi ya or, ne mpanza yonso ya mu nsubu wandi wa ditu dia Lebanona yakadi ya or kabidi; kabakabala argent bu tshintu tshia mushinga mukole mu matuku a Solomo
Hashishe Yesu wakamanya ne, Malu onso akushika; bualu bua kushikisha dî diakadi difunda mu Mukanda wa Nzambi, yeye wakamba biandi ne, Ndi ne nyota
Uliya muakuidi wakatshienza ku mpala kua dihingana dia mukelenge Ahaza ku Damaseke
Nuenu bena Izrayele, umvuayi mukenji unudi ne bua kulama kashidi: matuku dikumi a ngondu wa muanda mutekete, nuenu, bana benu ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, nujile biakudia
Padi ditoba adi ditampakane ku tshimana, mutuangaji atume diyi, balamune mabue adi makuate butu awu

Miehu muanda mutekete mikese yakadi mifubidile ku luhehele luakafuma ku esete, yakadiundila kuinshi kua mikuabo, ne miehu nukese yakadia miehu muanda mutekete miakane, meme nakatshiawila benu majimbu, kadi nansha umue wabo wakamanya mua kutshinjinguluila
Kadi yeye wakandamuna ne, Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Tshiena munumanye
Mose nealue nkayandi hehi ne Yehowa, kadi bobo kabalu hehi nansha, bantu kabayi n andi
Bakalua kudiye, bakamukuata ku makasa, bakamukukuila
Muaba eu wikale bu tshituha tshikuabo tshia buloba tshiumushibue ku tshituha tshia buloba tshidi tshijidila Yehowa, tshintu tshitambe tshijila, muaba udi mutuangane ne butshika bua Bena Lewi
Umuambile alue kunkuatshisha
Yeye wakabambila ne, Muana wa muntu udi mukelenge wa dituku dia Lumingu
Hakaluhuka Yoaba ku mesu kua Davidi, yeye wakatuma bantu ku nyima kua Abinê, banahingana n andi ku dina dia mai dia mu Sila; kadi Davidi kakadi mumanye bualu ebu
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Eliya, Muena Tishebe, ne, Wakutangila bu mudi Ahaba mudihuekeshe ku mesu kuanyi, anyi
Wakasungula bidikishilu biabu nganyi, biwamanya mua kungambila
Hanuaya kusangana mba ne bantu badi banukengesha mu buloba buenu, nenuele mpungi bikole, nenuikale nuvulukibua ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenusungidibue kudi bantu badi n enu lukuna

Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza, ne mu kukumbasha kua bana ne mu kukumbasha kua bimuna bienu ne mu bintu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba; bualu bua Yehowa neikale ne disanka bualu buenu, bu muakasankeye bualu bua batatu benu; binuatumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi ne mei andi bidi bifunda mu mukanda eu wa mikenji: binuakudimuka kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso
Wewe utshidi udibandisha kudi bantu banyi, udi uhidia kubalekela munyi

Hakajidilabo nsubu eu wa Nzambi bakafila milambu ya ngombe lukama ne bimpanga nkama ibidi ne bana ba mikoko nkama inai; bakafila milambu ya kubuikila n ai mibi ya Bena Isalele bonso mpumbu ya mbushi dikumi ne ibidi bu bungi bua bisamba bia Bena Isalele
Mona, tuetu tudi bena mudimu lelu eu, ne bua buloha buwakaha bankambua betu bua kudiabo mamuma abu ne bintu biabu biakane, mona, tuetu tudi bena mudimu mu buloba ebu
Butumbi bua Yehowa buakusha tshitendelelu tshia Yehowa tente, ne nakatua mpala wanyi hanshi

Yoasha wakambila bakuidi ba Nzambi ne, Argent yonso ya bintu bidibo balua n abi mu nsubu wa Yehowa bua kumujidilabi, ne argent yonso idibo bangata kudi muntu yonso hamubalabo, ne argent yonso idi bantu basue kufila mu nsubu wa Yehowa bua mitshima yabo, bakuidi bitabushe bintu ebi kudi bana babo, balongolole miaba ya mu nsubu wa Yehowa yakashimbuka hanshi
Tshiena mua kunubenga to
Ne bibi biau kabiena buhidibua mu munya, nasha kakese bualu bua butuku kabuena buikalaku ; nebaluemu ne butumbi ne buneme bua bisamba
Munga muntu udi ne ditabusha dia mua kudia bintu bionso, kadi mukuabo udi mutekete ma ditabusha udi udia midioko
Kuandi kungenzela malu abidi, umushe tshianza tshiebe nam bidi hanyi; Hashishe, umbikile, ne meme nengitabe kudi, Mibi yanyi ne malu mabi anyi bidi bungi munyi
Masalayi akangata mpalata, akenza bu muakâmbilabo; lumu elu, bakalutangadisha munkatshi mua Bena Yuda tô ne katataka

Mutuangaji ele mafuta mu tshianza tshiende tshia bakaji, pashishe atue munu wende watshianza tshia balume, udi mulonde tshiala mu mafuta adi mu tshianza tshia bakaji, amiamine mafuta awu ne munu wende misangu muanda mutekete kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Paulo ne bakadi n andi bakumuka ku Pafo, bakasabuka ku Pêge wa mu Pampulia
Buloba bua Bena Lewi ne buloba bua musoko kabidi bikale munkatshi mua buloba bua mukokeshi; ne buloba bua mukokeshi buikale hankatshi ha mukulu wa Yuda ne makalu wa Benyamina
Ku nyima kuandi Elona, Muena Zebuluna, wakalumbulula Bena Isalele; yeye wakalumbulula Bena Isalele bidimu dikumi
Ndi mumanye ne, Mukelenge wa Ejipitu kena witabusha bua nuenu kuya, neitabushe anu ne tshianza tshikole
Bena Isalele bakambila Samuele ne, Kulekedi kutulombela Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bua yeye atusungile mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Nunku, nuenu bakelenge, nuikale ne meji; nuyishibue, nuenu bakokeshi ba ha buloba
Bulelela, tudi mua kubandibua bua diyoyo dia lelu, bua kadi ne bualu buadi, katuena bamanye mua kuamba budi musumba eu mungele
Nunku badi babikila muaba eu ne, Bama, Nunku ambila ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kanuena nudinyanga bu muakenza batatu benu, anyi
Lehabama wakaya ku Shekeme; bualu bua Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangisha ku Shekeme bua kumuhingisha mu bukelenge
Muana wa mukashi eu wakafua butuku, bualu bua yeye wakamuikila
Malia wakakonka muanjelo ne, Bualu ebu nebulue munyi, meme tshi muanze kumanya mulume
Bu muakelabo mukenji bua kushiya tshikuku tshia mutshi ne miji yatshi, bukelenge buebe nebuikale kûdi hawamanya ne wa mu diulu nyeye muine udi ukokesha
Mu tshidimu tshisatu tshia bukelenge bua Asa, mukelenge wa Yuda, Bâsha wakamushiha, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Padi muntu ne bualu, aye kudi Arone ne Ure, banudi nushala nabu
Wasua muoyo wandi neaujimishe; wikala ne muoyo wandi udiye n au ha buloba lukuna neaulame tô ne ku muoyo wa tshiendelele
Bavua batangila luseke lukuabu bua kabamonyi butaka bua tatuabu
Hakamba diba kubuela, muena budimi wakambila mulami wa bintu biandi ne, Bikila bena mudimu, ubahe difutu diabo, uhangile kudi ba kunshikidilu tô ne kudi ba diambedi
Hakambeye malu â, wakela dî diandi bikole ne, Udi ne matshu unvue biandi
Kadi wewe, muana wa muntu, unvua dî dindi nkuambila; kuntombokedi bu mudibo benza kudi tshisamba atshi tshia bantombokedi

Monai, dituku dia Yehowa dilualua, Bualu bua mitoto ya mu diulu ne bisumbu bia mitoto bidimu Nenkengeshe ba ha buloba bua bubi buabo, Nenvishe bungi bua bantu butamba bua or bukese, Nunku nenzakashe bintu bia mu diulu, Mu dituku adi, bu mudi ngulungu udibo bihata, Nebatubule muntu yonso udibo basangana, Nebele bana batekete ba bantu aba hanshi, Monai

Tuakunvua lumu lua diambu dia Moaba ne, Nunku Bena Moaba badidile Moaba muadi, Bualu bua madimi a mu Heshebona adi amba kuhanga, Nunku nendidile muonshi wa mu Sibema Disanka ne tuseku biakumuka mu budimi Bua malu â mutshima wanyi udi udidila Moaba ne tshiona bu tshia lunzenze, Mu diba adi, halua Moaba ku mpala kuanyi, hadihangisheye ne mitendelelu ha mutu ha mukuna, habueleye mu tshitendelelu tshiandi bua kutendelela, kena udikuatshisha ne bualu bumue bua malu â

Numuheshe bu muakahesheye bakuabo, ne numuhitshishile dikenga diandi misangu ibidi bu mudi bienzedi biandi; mu luhanza muakasangishileye bakuabo makenga numusangishile makenga misangu ibidi
Yeye wakumusha tshituha tshia bena sodoma bakadi bashala mu buloba mu matuku a tatu wandi Asa

Dituku dia kumudilu dia lumingu hatshiatshia bakalua ku lukita, diba dimane kuhatuka

Hashishe mukelenge wakambila Amasa ne, Umbikidile Bena Yuda bonso, badisangishe kunoko hahita matuku asatu, wewe wikaleku

Mu dituku adi mene mene Yehowa wakumuka ne Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu ne bisumbu biabo

Bantu aba ne bena mudimu bebe batu bimana ku mpala kuebe bua kunvua lungenyi luebe badi ne disanka
Yoshua wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Luai kunu, nunvue mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Lomo Butudi n abu, tuetu bantu bakole, mbua kutuala matekete a badi batekete, kembua kudisankisha nkayetu

Yeye wakadila kudi tatu wandi ne, Mutu wanyi, mutu wanyi
Nuleshe kujalama kua dinanga dienu ne kua ditumba dietu bua bualu buenu ku mesu kua ekelesia
Yoshua wakabika ne dinda dionso, ne bakuidi bakambula mushete wa tshihungidi wa Yehowa
Kadi Davidi kakamanya mua kuyaku bua kuebesheye Nzambi bualu bua yeye wakadi utshina muele wa mata wa muanjelo wa Yehowa

Wakumusha bitendelelu biakadi ku mutu kua mikuna, wakashimbula makunshi akatendelelabo, wakatahila Bashela hanshi, wakabutula nyoka wa tshiamu tshia mitaku Wakenza Mose, bualu bua mu matuku au Bena Isalele bakadi boshila nyoka au musenga wa manananshi; wakamubikila ne, Nehushetana
Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada bakidika tshioshelu ne Ede, bualu bua hankatshi betu n abo tshidi bu mumanyi wa bualu ne, Yehowa udi Nzambi
Hakatshidi munyinyi mukana, diambedi bobo kabayi banze kûdia ku menu, tshiji tshiakakuata Yehowa bua bantu, ne Yehowa wakasamisha bantu bikole

Munya utu watema bua bantu bakane mu buloba, Nusanke bienu mu Yehowa, nuenu bantu bakane; Misambu Nuimbile Yehowa musambu muhia muhia, Yehowa wakumanyisha bantu luhandu luandi, Wakuyuluka luse luandi lujalame ne lulamatu luandi lua bushuwa kudi Nuelele Yehowa mbila ya disanka, nuenu bonso ba ha buloba; Nuimbile Yehowa misambu ya kumutumbisha n ai ku lunkombe, Nuele mbila ya disanka ku mpala kua Mukelenge, Yehowa mene, diatshimue ne kuela kua mpungi ne ku tshiona tshia dî dia lusengu
Labana wakadi ne bana bakashi babidi dina dia muan a bute diakadi Lea, ne dina dia mukuny andi diakadi Lakele

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nusabuke ku bisanga bia Kitima, numone; Tshisamba tshidi tshikudimune nzambi yatshi, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua batu banyi bakuenza malu mabi abidi: Isalele udi muhika, anyi

Kadi bikala mulambu wandi wa kuditshiha n au anyi mulambu udiye ufila ku disua diandi, yeye neaudie mu dituku didiye ûfila ne tshituha tshidi tshishale yeye neatshidie makelela, kadi bikala tshituha tshia munyinyi wa mulambu tshishale tô ne ku dituku disatu, nebatshioshe mu kahia

Biakulenduisha tshianza tshiebe, anyi dikasa diebe, watshikosa, watshimasha; bua wewe kubuela mu muoyo ne tshilema ne kuzobela kudi kutamba bua wewe kuimashibua mu kahia ka tshiendelele ne bianza bibidi ne makasa abidi
Ku luseke ludi diba dipatukila, mukalu wa ditunga dienu wikale utuadija ku Ashare Enane, uya ku Shefame

Leviticus Halua muntu ne mulambu wa bukula kudi Yehowa, neafile bukula bubotesha, newelehu manyi ne musenga wa manananshi, nealue n abu kudi bana balume ba Alona bakuidi, neambulule dianza tente ne bukula ne manyi abu ne manananshi abu onso, ne muakuidi neabuoshile ha tshioshelu, bu tshivilukidi, bu tshintu tshidi tshi tua dihembu kudi Yehowa, ne tshituha tshia bukula tshidi tshishale netshikale tshia Alona ne bana bandi balume ntshintu tshidi tshitambe tshia tshijila tshia mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia

Belâma wakambila mpunda ne, Bualu bua wewe wakansekesha, bu meme muikale ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza, nakadi kukushiya

Ezela wakavungulula mukanda ku mesu kua bantu, bualu bua yeye wakadi ku muaba wakadi kulu kua bonso; hakavungululeye mukanda, bantu bonso bakimana kulu; Ezela wakavudishila Yehowa Nzambi munene disanka
Nunku yeye wakangata bantu bu binunu bitanu, wakabateka bua kudiabo bu balaminyi ku luseke lua nôde lua musoko; Yoshua wakaya mu tshibanda butuku abu

Nanku angata mupika wanyi ewu, ikale mukajebe

Dimukai bua bualu buakambabo kudi baprofete kabulu kunudi ne, Nuenu bena dihetu, tangilai, nukeme, nubutuke; Hakadibo baluhuka, bakabatendekena ne, Nutuambile mei â kabidi Lumingu lualua

Nenudie mampa adi kayi ne luevene to matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dia kumudilu nenumushe luevene mu nsubu yenu, muntu yonso udi udia mampa adi neluevene ku dituku dia kumudilu to matuku muanda mutekete, nebamumushe munkatshi mua Bena Isalele

Yakatangadishibua bualu bua kakuakadi mulami; yakalua bia kudia bia nyama yonso ya mu mpata

Muanjelo mukuabo wakaluhuka mu ntempelo, wela dî dikole kudi yeye wakadi ushikama ha mutu ha ditutu ne, Utume muele webe, unowe; bualu bua diba dia kunowa diakulua, bualu bua bintu bia ha buloba bia kunowa biakulua
Yeye wakaya mu nsunagoga yabo ya mu luseke luonso lua Galela, ubambila bualu bua Nzambi, umusha bademon

Manashe wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika mu tshibunda tshiandi tshiakadi hehi ne nsubu wandi, mu tshibunda tshia Uza mene

Netuitabushe anu bua bualu ebu, bua buonso buenu nulue bu tuetu, ne balume bonso ba munkatshi muenu batengudibue, hashishe, netufile bana betu ba bakashi kunudi, ne tuetu netuangate bana benu ba bakashi, netuikale n enu netuikale bu bantu bamue

Ungunvuile, Yehowa, ungunvuile bua bantu aba bamanye ne, Wewe, Yehowa, udi Nzambi, ne wewe wakakudimusha mitshima yabo kabidi

Muntu wa Nzambi wakambila mukelenge ne, Nansha, biwampa tshituha tshia nsubu, tshiena nya n ebe, tshiena ndia, tshiena nnua mu muaba eu; bualu bua Yehowa wakandimusha ne, Kudi bidia, kunu mai, kuhinganyi mu nshila uwakafumina
Bavua bana ba badi basombele mulu bavuabu balele ne bana ba bakaji ba bantu bavuabu basela
Mukashi wakabika, wakaya mu nshila wandi, wakavula tshilulu tshiandi tshikudika, wakaluata bilulu bia mu lufuila kabidi
Mbualu bukese ku mesu kua ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Yuda bua kuenzabo malu a bundu adibo benza mu muaba eu, anyi
Hakamona Bena Isalele ne Mukelenge kakabunvuila, bantu bakandamuna ne, Tudi ne tshituha kai mu Davidi
Nunku nungambile tshilota, nemmanye ne nudi bamanye mua kundesha dijingulula diatshi
Dituku dia kumudilu nenuangate mamuma a mitshi mimpe ne bikola bia mabue ne matamba a mitshi ne ntuhu ya mu mai, nenusanke ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matuku muanda mutekete
Lua ne muan ebe
Muladilu wa Dituku dia Dikisha, muena Izrayele yonsu uvua wambula litre ya biakudia muanda mukulu pa mutu pa inayi iwaye wambula ku dituku
Bana ba Yeleko, nkama isatu ne makumi anai ne batanu
Bua Kilisto kabidi kakadisankisha, kadi bu muakafundabo ne, Bihendu bia bakadi bakuhenda, biakahona ham bidi hanyi
Tshianana, badi mua kubunda tshibawu tshia lufu
Badi Basungula Balumbuluishi Dut

Bikala Yehowa nguakakusonsolola bualu buanyi, yeye itabushe mulambu; kadi bikala bantu mbakenza nunku, bobo bedibue mulau kudi Yehowa, bualu bua bobo bakungihata lelu bua meme tshikadi mu buhianyi bua Yehowa, badi bangambila ne, Ya, ukuatshile nzambi mikuabo mudimu
Nefushime ne: mbamudie kudi nyama wa lonji
Yakoba wakatuma miloho ku mpala kuandi kudi Esau mukulu andi mu buloba bua Seî, buloba bua Edome
Dituku adi nenulombe mu dina dianyi; tshiena nuambila ne, Nenulombele Tatu; bua Tatu mene udi munusue, bualu bua nuenu nuakunsua meme, nuakuitabusha ne, Nakafuma kudi Tatu
Wambile bantu mu matshu abo ne, Mulume yonso alombe muena mutumba n andi, ne mukashi yonso alombe mukashi muena mutumba n andi bilenga bia argent ne bilenga bia or
Zebuluna ikale ne tshituha tshimue tshituangane ne mukalu wa Yisakâ, ku luseke lua esete tô ne ku luseke lua wesete
Bakenza bifuanyikishi bia maoshi muinshi mua mubangu wa tshiowelu, makumi abidi ku coudée ne ku coudée: maoshi akadi mu milongo ibidi hakahongololabo tshiowelu
Nunku ntshinyi
Pashishe kuyaye ku mikuna ya Ngilaade
Nganyi udi mumanye malu adi makanyine muntu udi uhitshisha matuku makese a muoyo wandi wa hatuhu bu mundidimbi
Tshimuangi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Neudimuene nkayebe mundi ngenzeja mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ku bukole bua kulekelaye bena Izrayele baye
Eliyabe, muana wa Palu, uvua ne bana balume basatu: Nemuyele, Datane, ne Abirame
Hakimanabo, nkata ai yakimana kabidi; hakabandabo mulu, nkata ai yakabanda n abo; bualu bua nyuma wa bifukibue wakadi munda muai
Bobo bakambila Yoshua ne, Bulelela, Yehowa wakadia buloba buonso mu bianza bietu; ne bualu bukuabo kabidi, bena buloba bonso badi batekete teketê ku mpala kuetu
Pilato wakabambila ne, Nuenu nudi ne balami, yai bienu, milulame ne lungenyi luonso lunudi n alu
Bika biebe, ubishe nsongalume, umukuate ku tshianza, bualu bua meme nemmuvuishe tshisamba tshinene

Hulama wakamba kabidi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ikale ne disanka; yeye nguakafuka diulu ne buloba, wakaha Davidi muana wa lungenyi udi ne meji makane ne mutshima muimpe bua kuibakileye dina dia Yehowa nsubu ne bukelenge buandi nsubu

Bidi bilwa mêyi badi babimanyisha, kumpala kwa dishintakaja ngenyi ne dibianyisha, Bukalenge bunene budi butumina, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi aloonda dibituma, wabu ngelelu wa meeji ku Bilo bia Tshibambalu etshi anyi tshiatshia
Nunku kanuitabushi bua bubi bukokeshe mu mibidi yenu ifuafua, bua nuenu nutumikile nkuka yai
Davidi wakambila Yonatana ne, Mona, makelela ngondo udi ubala, ne bundi n abu mbua kudia bidia ku mesa a mukelenge; kadi witabushe bua meme kuya kubulama mu budimi tô ne hahita matuku asatu

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua ba mu Edome bakenzela ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Yuda bibi hakadisombuelabo kudibo, ne bakadivuishila dihila ditambe bukole hakadisombuelabo, nunku Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nengolole tshianza tshianyi kudi Bena Edome, nengumushemu bantu ne nyama, nenvuishe buloba ebu tshikulu; ku Temana tô ne ku Dedana nebafue ku muele wa nvita

Hashishe Shemaya muprofete wakalua kudi Lehabama ne bantu banene ba mu Yuda, bakadi badisangisha mu Yelushalema bualu bua Shishaka, wakabambila ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nuenu nuakundekela, nunku nakunushiya mu bianza bia Shishaka
Wakamukukuila

Mukelenge wakankudimuna ne, Ndi bianyi Yesu ûdi ukengesha; kadi bika, wimane, bua bualu ebu nakumuenekela kûdi bua kukusungula bu muenji wa mudimu wanyi ne bu mumanyishi wa malu awakumona ne wa malu anamuenekela kûdi; nenkusungile mu bianza bia bantu ne bia bisamba bia bende, bandi nkutuma kudibo, bua wewe kubulula mesu abo, bakome nyima ku midima batangile ku munya, bakoma nyima ku bukole bua Satana batangile kudi Nzambi, bua bobo bahete dijimisha dia mibi yabo ne buhianyi munkatshi mua badi balengeshibue ku ditabusha didibo bangitabusha n adi

Hashishe muena luendu wakalua kudi muntu mubanji; yeye kakitabusha bua kushihela muena luendu wakadi mulue umue wa mu mikoko yandi anyi umue wa mu ngombe yandi, kadi wakangata kana ka mukoko wa muntu muhele, wakamushihela muenyi wakadi mulue ku mbelu kuandi
Mahuahua a bakeluba akololodibua tô coudeês makumi abidi; bakeluba bakadi bimana ne makasa abo; mpala yabo yakatangilangana
Lote mumane kushiyangana ne Abrame, Maweja Nangila kuambila Abrame ne: Kenzakana, tangila ku mutu kua ditunga ne kuinshi kuadi, kudi diba dipatukila ne kudidi dibuelela

Yelemiya Mu tshidimu tshinai tshia bukelenge bua Yehoyakima, muana wa Yoshiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, dî edi dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Wangate mabeshi a mukanda muvungulula, ufundemu mei onso anakukuambila bua kuhisha n au Bena Isalele, Bena Yuda ne bisamba bionso bia bantu, ku dituku dinakudianjila kukuambila mu matuku a Yoshiya tô ne ku lelu eu
Matama andi adi bu bibunda bia bintu bia dihembu dimpe ne bu midioko ya muhuya muimpe; mishiku yandi idi bu nsungubidi, manananshi a myrrhe adi amataku
Yeye wakandamuna ne, Wakutua n anyi bidia mu dilonga dimue neantungile tshitungu
Lungenyi kai luakuhabo muntu eu
Yehowa, teleja matshu ebe, unvue biebe; Yehowa, ubulule mesu ebe, utangile; unvue mei onso a Saneheliba, akatumeye bua kufunyineye Nzambi udi ne muoyo bulobo
Mark Bakafika dishia dia dishiba mu luseke lua Bena Gelasa
Mabaya adi manyunguluila mesa awu, ikale malamika tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Mu tshikondo atshi Hazaele, mukelenge wa Sulia, wakaya kuluangana ne bena musoko wa Gata, wakaunyenga; Hazaele wakatangila mpala wandi bua kuyeye ku Yelushalema
Udi mua kunyenga muntu mu tshianza tshianyi udiku anyi
Bintu bionso bidibo balela, ne bia bantu ne bia nyama idibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nebikale biebe, kadi wewe neuhikule ban a bute ba bantu ne ban a bute bonso ba nyama idi kayiyi miakane
Kanuena mua kuangata tshintu nansha tshimue tshia bidibu ne bua kuosha, bua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu amone mua kutuyisha tshiji tshiende
Mbobo bandi ngamba ne, Nembafile mu bianza bia badi n abo lukuna, ne mu bianza bia badi bakeba mioyo yabo
Hashishe, Yehowa wa misumba wakamba ne, Nakababikila, kadi bobo kabakangunvuila
Nunku, ya biebe, meme nengikale ne mukana muebe, meme nenkuyishe mei andi musue wewe kuamba

Bena Ejipitu bakabalonda ne tubalu dionso ne makalu onso bia Palô Masalayi andi ne bantu ba ha nyima ha tubalu bakabaheta hakadibo bashikama hehi ne mai manene, hehi ne Pi hahilota ku mpala kua Bâla sefona
Bumuka mu Tahate, kuyabu ku Tera
Bualu bua bintu bionso mbienu; ne Paulo ne Apolo ne Kefa ne buloba ne muoyo ne lufu ne bintu bidiku ne bintu bilualua: bionso mbienu; ne nuenu nudi ba Kilisto, ne Kilisto udi wa Nzambi
Enza biebe makunshi atanu a acacia adi ne or ku nseke yonso enza bitubuidi biau ne or, ne enza nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku itanu ya kuelaku
Mona, Abinê wakalua kûdi; wewe wakamutuma ne yeye wakamana kuya bua tshinyi

Muena mudimu wa difutu, kai mulami wa mikoko mene, kai muena mikoko, hamoneye nkashama ulua, udi ushîa mikoko, udi unyema, nkashama udi wikuata, udi witangadisha; yeye udi unyema bualu bua yeye udi muena mudimu wa difutu, mikoko kayena bu bualu kudiye

Kanukengeshi muntu wakabuela mu mudimu wa difutu, udi muhele ne udi kayi ne bintu, nansha umue wa bana benu nansha muenyi udi ushikama mu buloba buenu ne mu misoko yenu; nubafute difutu diabo buatshia buatshia diambedi diba kadiyi dianze kubuela; bualu bua bobo badi bahele ne badi bakuma mitshima yabo ku difutu; bobo kabadidi kudi Yehowa bualu buenu, ne bualu ebu kabuikadi bubi kunudi
Bantu basatu ba bantu aba banene makumi asatu bakaya kudi Davidi ku dibue dia mu lubuebue lua Adulama; bena nvita ba Bena Peleshete bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo mu tshibanda tshia Bena Lefa
Amenona wakambila Tamâ ne, Ulue ne mikata ai mu nsubu wa bulalu bua meme kuyidia ku tshianza tshiebe
Kanuluhudi bujitu mu nsubu yenu dituku dia Lumingu, kanuenji mudimu; kadi nujidile dituku dia Lumingu, bu munakambila batatu benu
Wewe, mukelenge, udi mukelenge wa bakelenge, udi Nzambi wa mu diulu muhe bukelenge, bukokeshi, bukole ne butumbi
Bakalenga ba bisamba bishilangane nebapatukile ku ndelanganyi yende
Muinshi muatshi muakadi bifuanyikishi bia ngombe yakanyunguluka ku nseke yonso, ku coudées dikumi ku nseke yonso ya tshiowelu
Musoko udi muibaka muakanangane ku matumba anai, ne bule buau budi muomumue ne butshia; ne wakidikisha musoko ne dilenga, kilometa binunu bibidi, nkama ibidi, makumi anai
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Muana wa muntu, dia bidia ne dikanka, nua mai ne dizakala ne buowa
Nunku bantu bakadi bamuangalaka buloba bua Ejipitu buonso bua kukeba bisonsa
Padi dituku dia muanda mutekete dikumbana, mutuangaji udi ukenketa dikeji tshiakabidi
Makuabo akamata ha dibue; hakatolokau, akafubidila, bualu bua kâkadi ne tshitelela
Hashishe Abashaloma wakamuambila ne, Mona, malu ebe adi malengele ne makane, kadi kakuena muntu musungula kudi mukelenge bua kunvueye malu ebe
Kushalabi muaba wa kujika bena diende bonsu

Yelemiya Hashishe tupitene tuonso tua bena nvita ne Yohanana, muana wa Kalea, ne Yezanya, bakambila Yelemiya muprofete ne, Tudi tukusengelela bua kunvua kutendekena kuetu, utulombele Yehowa Nzambi webe, tuetu bantu aba bonso badi bashala, bualu bua tuakushala anu bakese ba ku bantu ba diambedi, bu mudi mesu ebe amona
Imashai muhika mulembakane mu mîdima, muadi newikalemu ne kusumakana menu
Bintu ebi bidi ku mpala kuebe mbia nganyi
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Hakalela Ebê Pelege, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama mai ne makumi asatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi

Difutu dia mudimu wa muntu muakane didi dimuvuisha muoyo, Udi utumikila diyisha udi mu nshila wa muoyo, Udi usokoka lukuna luandi udi ne mashimi mukana muandi, Havulangana mei, kushiha kua mikenji kudiku, Ludimi lua muntu muakane ludi bu tshiamu tshia argent tshia mushinga mukole, Mishiku ya muntu muakane idi idisha ba bungi, Disankisha didi difuma kudi Yehowa didi divuisha bubanji, Budi bu kunaya kudi muntu muhote bienzeye bibi, Tshidi muntu mubi utshina netshilue kudiye, Bu mudi nvunde uhita, mbu mudi Bu mudi vinaigre ne nvuenvue ku menu, bu mudi muishi wa kahia mu mesu, Ditshina dia Yehowa didi dilehesha matuku a muoyo, Ditekemena dia bantu bakane nedishihe ne disanka, Nshila wa Yehowa udi musoko wa ngumbu kudi muntu muakane, Muntu muakane kena umushibua kashidi, Mukana mua muntu muakane mudi muhatula meji, Mishiku ya muntu muakane idi mimanye tshidi mua kusankisha bantu, Nsumuinu Tshiamu tshidibo bidikisha n atshi bujitu tshia mashimi tshidi tshitondesha Yehowa, Halua kudibandisha, bundu bulualua kabidi; Butoke bua mutshima bua bantu bakane nebubalombole; Biuma kabiena bikuatshisha muntu mu dituku dia tshiji tshikole, Buakane bua muena mutshima mutoke budi bululamisha nshila wandi, Buakane bua bantu bakane budi bu babandisha, Hafua muntu mubi, ditekemena diandi didi dijimina; ditekemena dia badi beyemena bukole didi dijimina
Bielabo mai ha bintu ebi bia kukuna ne biahona tshituha tshia mubidi yabi mufue ha mutu habi, bintu ebi nebikale ne bukoya kunudi
Nunku Mukelenge wakatulela mikenshi ne, Hakunvua bantu ba bende dî edi, bakasanka, bakatumbisha di dia Nzambi; bakadi basungidibue bua kubahabo muoyo wa tshiendelele bakitabusha
Wewe newenze tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi ne mutshi wa acacia
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Kadi nuenu nudi nungamba ne, Nganyi

Bantu bakumuka mu buhika bakafila milambu ya kuosha kudi Nzambi wa Isalele, balume ba ngombe dikumi ne babidi bua Bena Isalele bonso, ne bimpanga makumi tshitema ne bisambombo ne bana ba mikoko makumi muanda mutekete ne muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu ya mbushi dikumi ne ibidi bu milambu ya kubuikila n ai mibi yabo: bionso ebi biakadi milambu ya kuoshela Yehowa
Dîyi didi difila bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya balumbulwishi
Mukelenge wakambila Alauna ne, Nansha, nengule bintu ebi kûdi ku mushinga; tshiena nfila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, milangala hatuhu
Wewe neulamike tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe mu nseke yonso, ne ku mpenge kabidi
Kadi nansha bobu bamone nanku, kabavua bangitaba to
Basumbi badi bayishiha, ne kakuena udi ubahisha; bahanyi badi bamba ne, Yehowa atumbishibue bualu bua tuakulua babanji
Bakamanyisha Shaula ne, Davidi wakumuka mu Kila; yeye wakalekela kuyaku
Muana wa muntu kabidi kakuluila bua bantu bamukuatshile mudimu, wakuluila bua kubakuatshila mudimu, ne bua kufila muoyo wandi bua kuhikula n au bantu ba bungi
Kadi bantu aba bakatuenzela bimpe, kabakatufuisha bundu, kabakatujimishila nansha tshintu tshimue, musangu utuakuenda n abo, hatuakadi mu madimi

Monai, Bena Isalele bonso bakalua kudi mukelenge, bakamuebesha ne, Bualu kai bana betu, Bena Yuda, bakakeba, bakasambula mukelenge ne bonso ba mu nsubu wandi ne bantu bonso ba Davidi dia munemu dia Yadene
Yoshua wakaluangana ne bakelenge aba bonso tô musangu mule
Yuda wakamba ne, Netuandamune mukelenge wetu dî manyi
Hatuakashikisha luendu lutuakafuma n alu ku Tulo, tuakafika ku Tolemai, nakelangana ne bana betu muoyo, tuakalala n abo difuku dimue
Kutshiompakajaye tshiluilu atshi
Tshiena ngamba bua muoyo mukese webe, kadi bua muoyo mukese wa mukuabo; bua budishikaminyi buanyi budi bulumbuluishi bua kudi muoyo mukese wa mukuabo bualu kai
Panudi nuya ku mvita mu ditunga dienu bua kuluisha bena lukuna benu, nuele mpungi ne bibingu bia mvita musangu umue

Tshimuangi Beshalele ne Okoliyabe ne bantu bakuabu bavua Maweja Nangila mupeshe tshipedi tshia kuenza midimu ya muaba wa tshijila, nebenze bintu bia kuenza nabi mudimu mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu bu muvua dijinga dia Maweja Nangila
Bu Mukelenge kai mukeheshe matuku au, muntu umue kakadi kuhanduka; kadi yeye wakukehesha matuku au bualu bua bantu bandi bakusunguleye
Kabakihata Bena Kanâna bakadi mu Gezê: kadi Bena Kanâna batshidi bashikama munkatshi mua Bena Efelayima tô ne ku dituku edi, bakatua bu bahika babo ba mudimu
Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kanuena nutangila luhehele, kanuena nutangila nvula, kadi tshibanda atshi netshiule tente ne mai, ne nuenu ne bimuna bienu ne tubalu tuenu nenunueku
Bantu bonso badi balela munkatshi muenu nebenze bilele ebi, hafilabo milambu ya kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Kadi mu muaba wa nzambi ai neatumbishe nzambi wa misoko miasa ne ngumbu ya nvita
Abrahame kulongolola masanka dituku adi
Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, avudishibue disanka, ku tshibangidilu tô ne kunshikidilu
Yeye wakabambila ne, Kanuangatshi mulambu mutambe wakunuambilabo
Hakatangila bantu difutu dimana ku mbelu kua Ntenta, bantu bonso bakabika, bakatendelela muntu ne mu ntu ku ntenta wandi
Bakadi n andi ha mitshi mitshiamakane bakamuhenda
Yesu wakabambila ne, Buonso buenu nenulenduke bua bualu buanyi butuku ebu: bua bakafunda ne, Nenshihe mulami wa mikoko, tshisumbu tshiai netshitangadike

Yeye wa kamba ne, Ndi Nzambi wa tatu ebe, kutshinyi bua kuya mu Ejipitu, bualu bua nenkuvuisheku tshisamba tshmene nenye n ebe mu Ejipitu, nennumusheku kabidi bulelela, Yosefe neateke bianza biandi ha mesu ebe Yakoba Wakabika ku Be sheba, bana balume ba Isalele bakatuala Yakoba tatu abo ne bana babo ne bakashi babo mu makalu akabatumma Palo
Nenvuishe ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba bu nsubu wa Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, ne bu nsubu wa Bâsha, muana wa Ahiya
Batu bahuola nfigi ku mingonge, anyi

Yeye wakateka luhingu luakasongeye mu nsubu wa Nzambi, muakadi Nzambi wamhila Davidi ne Solomo muan andi ne, Nenteke dina dianyi mu nsubu eu wa mu Yelushalema unakasungula munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia mu Isalele, nentekemu dina dianyi tshiendelele
Tshitupa tshibîdi : Bidi bitangila Bweena Ditunga Kanungu ka Bweena ditunga dia Kongu budi bumwe ne bwa mukawu
Ne batambe bungi ba munkatshi mua bana betu ba mu Mukelenge bakakolesha mitshima yabo bualu bua nkanu yanyi, badi bamba dî dia Nzambi ne dikima ditambe, kabai batshina
Hakatshidibo benda bayikila, monai, dikalu dia kahia ne tubalu tua kahia biakamueneka, biakabahandulula, ne Eliya wakabandishibua mu diulu mu nvunde

Alona wakangata dilonga diandi bu muakamba Mose, wakaya lubilu munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia bantu, ne monai, disama dikole diakamana kubanga munkatshi mua bantu, yeye wakatekahu musenga wa manananshi bua kubuikidila bantu bubi buabo
Kanukukuidi mpingu ya nanku, kanuyitendeledi

Kadi bakuidi bakatamba bukese, kabakamanya mua kûbula biseba bia milambu yonso ya kuosha; nunku bana babo Bena Lewi bakabakuatshisha tô ne hakamanabo mudimu wonso ne hakadijidila bakuidi bonso; bualu bua Bena Lewi bakadi ne mitshima miakane bua kudijidila bakahita bakuidi kudifila
Balaame kubambila ne: Lalayi munemu
Uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, udijidile, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Hakatangila Shaula ne yeye wakadilama bikole bu muena lungenyi, buowa buakamukuata bualu buandi
Yai bienu mu masanga a misesu, nubikile banuamona ku disanka dia dibanji
Yelemiya Edi ndî diakalua kudi Yelemiya bualu bua bantu bonso ba mu Yuda, mu tshidimu tshinai tshia bukokeshi bua Yehoyakima, muana wa Yoshiya, mukelenge wa Yuda

Samuele wakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Binuasua kuhingana kudi Yehowa ne mitshima yenu yonso, nunku numushe nzambi ya bende ne ya Bashela munkatshi muenu, kudimunai mitshima yenu kudi Yehowa, numukuatshile yeye nkayandi mudimu; ne yeye neanusungile mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Wakabatuma ku Lebanona, binunu dikumi bia bantu ku ngondo ku ngondo, bakashala ku Lebanona ngondo umue, ne kuabo ngondo ibidi
Muntu mukuabo wakamuambila ne, Badi mu Nayota hehi ne Lama
Moshe ne Arone kuya kumpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena

Bana balume ba Siona ba mushi nga mukole, Nyama ya mibuabua mene mene idi yamusha bana bai mabele; bu nyunyu ya nfiondo Ludimi lua muana utshidi wamua mabele Bakadi badia bia kudia bishema Dikenga diakukuata muana mukashi wa bana betu bua mibi yandi Bakokeshi bandi bakadi ne mitshima mihite neige butoke, mibidi yabo yakadi ne lukunjilakunjila luhite dibue dia corail dinkenke diai diakadi bu dia dibue dia saphir
Kudisongedi luhingu anyi tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu tshia mu diulu anyi tshia tshintu tshia hanshi ha buloba anyi tshia tshintu tshia mu mai adi muinshi mua buloba
Diyisha dia mei a bushuwa diakadi mukana muabo, ne mei mabi kakahatuka ku mishiku yabo
Hakatshiabu, Hazaele wakangata tshilulu tshia ha bulalu, wakatshina mu mai, wakatshibuikila ha mpala ha Bene hadada tô ne hakafueye
Yeye wakamutuma ha bule tô ngondo ibidi; yeye wakaya ne balunda bandi, bakajinga matuku akatshidiye kamama ku mutu kua mikuna
Genese Nzambi Udi Ubikila Abalama Yehowa wakambila Abalama ne, Umuka mu musoko webe ne kudi bana benu ne ku nsubu wa tatu ebe, ya biebe mu muaba undualua kukulesha

Ebelu Nunku, tuetu kabidi, bualu bua tudi tunyungulukibua ne tshisumbu tshinene nunku tshia bamanyi, tumushai bujitu buonso, ne malu mabi adi bualu butekete bua kutulenduisha, tuidikishe ne kutantamana tshidikishilu tshietu tshia lubilu tshidi tshitekibua ku mpala kuetu, batangila kudi Yesu, mubandi ne mushikishi wa ditabusha dietu, yeye, bua disanka diakatekibua ku mpala kuandi, wakakankamana hakakengeye ka mutshi mutshiamakane, wakalengulula bundu, ne wakushikama ku tshianza tshikole tshia nkuasa wa butumbi wa Nzambi
Bakamukudimuna di ne, Tudi ba ku Halana

Yeye wakangata tupitene tua bantu lukama ne bantu banene bonso ne bakokeshi ba bantu ba mu buloba, bakafuma ne mukelenge mu nsubu wa Yehowa; bakabuela ku tshibi tshia ku mutu mu nsubu wa mukelenge, bakashikika mukelenge mu nkuasa wa bukelenge
Nunku biwikala kui muende masandi, kadi biwashiha muntu, wewe wakulua mushihi wa mikenshi yonso

Tshidi tshikonyangala, kabena mua kutshiludika kahidi; Nakamba mu mutshima wanyi ne, Nakuheta lungenyi lua bungi, muhite bonso bakadi ku mpala kuanyi mu Yelushalema; bulelela, mutshima wanyi wakajingulula meji a bungi ne lungenyi lua bungi
Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Bilele bia Bena Buloba Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, kanuyidi bua kulonda ku nyima kua malu a bundu a bisamba abi
Diba adi mukajebe Sara neikale mumane kulela muana wa balume
Bana ba balume ba Yefete badi: Ngomere, Magoge, Madayi, Yavane, Tubale, Mesheke ne Tirase
Bantu ba mukelenge bakamuambila ne, Mona, bantu bebe bakamana kudilongolola bua kuenzabo malu onso adi mukelenge wabo musungule

Ukenge hebe, tantamana, ulele, wewe muana mukashi wa Siona, Katataka bisamba bia bungi bia bantu Kadi kabena bamanye meji adi mu mutshima wa Yehowa, Bika biebe, ubashihule, Mika Mpindiu udisangishe mu misumba, wewe muana mukashi, muena misumba; Kadi wewe, Betelehema Efelata, Nunku yeye neabafile mu bianza bia badi n abo lukuna Yeye neajalame, neadishe mikoko yandi mu bukole bua Yehowa, Yeye eu neikale ditalala dietu
Nasha kakese
Kadi mikoko yanyi idi ne bua kudia mashinde au anuakudiata, ne bua kunua mai anuakunyanga ku bikono bienu, anyi
Bantu bebe bonso nebalue kundi, nebankukuile, nebambe ne, Ya biebe ne bantu bonso badi balonda ku nyima kuebe, ne ku nyima kua bualu ebu nempatuke
Muntu yonsu wa kunudi anemeke tatuende ne mamuende, kabidi anemeke dituku dia Dikisha
Yaele wakaluhuka bua kusangakena ne Sisela, wakamuambila ne, Buelamu, mukelenge wanyi, ubuele munu, kutshinyi
Hakatangila mufofo mulu, wakamba ne, Ndi ntangila bantu; ndi mbamona benda bu mitshi

Tatu wa mushikankunde neambile bakulu ne, Nakafila muan anyi kudi mulume eu bu mukashi wandi, ne yeye udi umukina; yeye wakambila bakuabo mei a bundu ne, Tshiakasangana bimanyinu bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama kudi muana webe; kadi ebi mbimanyinu biandi bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama
Yeye wakadi ne mikoko binunu dikumi ne binai, tumelo binunu bisambombo, ne ngombe ibidi ibidi ku tshikokedi tshimue bu bikokedi tshinunu ne bakashi ba nyama ya mpunda tshinunu

Muntu yônso, mweena mbulamatadi yônso kabeena mwa kumukanyika mwa kuneemekayi dîyi didibo bamutumina pikala dîyi edi kadiyi dineemeka pa butooke mapa a muntu yônso, budikadidi bwa bantu bônso ne bibidilu bia mulowo
Ditshina dia Yehowa diakakuata bantu bonso, bakaluhuka diatshimue
Bakakengeshibua bua buakane buabo badi ne disanka, bua bukelenge bua mu diulu budi buabo
Nenjadike bukelenge buandi tshiendelele, biananukileye kutumikila mikenji yanyi ne mei anyi bu mudibi lelu
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kukonka bantu bende bua kujadika tshivua tshienzeke
Hashishe diabolo wakamushîa; ne monai, banjelo bakalua, bakadi bamukuatshisha ne biakadiye n abi bualu
Biamuha mukelenge wandi mukashi ne biamulelela mukashi nansha bana ba balume nansha bana ba bakashi, mukashi ne bana bandi nebikale ba mukelenge wandi, yeye muhika neaye nkayandi
Biahana muntu muahandi mukashi bu muhika, yeye kena uluhuka bu bahika balume
Neutukokeshe, anyi

Dî edi diakalua kudiye kabidi mu matuku a Yehoyakima, muana wa Yoshiya, mukelenge wa Yuda; diakashala tô ne kunshikidilu kua tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshimue tshia bukokeshi bua Sedekiya, muana wa Yoshiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne tô ne hakayabo ne Bena Yelushalema mu buhika mu ngondo muitanu
Yehowa, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi ne butumbi ne bukole, Yehowa, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi tshisunsula bantu badi n etu lukuna
Dituku dia makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete dia ngondu muibidi, buloba kuuma kashidi
Yeye wakakudimuna dî ne, Sua Mukelenge Nzambi webe ne mutshima webe wonso ne muoyo webe wonso ne bukole buebe buonso ne lungenyi luebe luonso; ne sua mukuenu bu mûdi mudisue
Ku Tabela ne Masa ne Kibelota hatawa nuakafuisha Yehowa tshiji

Muntu wa mu tshisumbu wakamuandamuna ne, Muyishi, nakulua kûdi ne muan anyi mulume, yeye udi ne nyuma mubi wa kamama; kuonso kudiye umuendesha utu wamututa hanshi; muana utu wahatuka lututu ku mishiku, utu wasumakana mena, udi unyanganyanga; nakulomba bayidi bebe mua kumushabo nyuma, kadi bobo kabakamanya mua kumumusha
Kadi Petelo wakamubisha ne, Bika biebe, meme muine ndi anu muntu
Masalayi a Palô akamana kumuka mu Ejipitu; hakunvuabo Bena Kasada bakadi batshintshimika musoko wa Yelushalema lumu luau, bakumuka ku Yelushalema
Ndi musue kumonangana nende, pantshidi ne muoyi apa

Yonadaba, muana wa Shimea, muan abo ne Davidi, wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge kedi meji ne, Bakashiha bansongalume bonso, bana ba mukelenge, bualu bua anu Amenona nkayandi wakafua; bualu bua Abashaloma wakahangidisha bualu ebu ku didiku diakakuateye muan abo mukashi Tamâ ku bukole
Ndi mumupeshedi, yeye ne ndelanganyi yende, bualu yeye uvua muitabe diyi dianyi, mundamate ne muoyi mujima

Kadi nyunyu wa nkutshi kakamona muaba wa kuikala, nunku wakahingana kudiye mu buatu, bualu bua mai akatshidi ha buloba buonso, yeye wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakamukuata, wakamuteka mu buatu muakadiye
Bakamanyisha Davidi bualu ebu; yeye wakasangisha Bena Isalele bonso, wakasabuka dishiya dia Yadene, Wakafika kudibo, wakasa mualu wa nvita
Kadi yeye wakadi wamba bua ntempelo wa mubidi wandi
Yehu wakatuma dî ku nseke yonso ya Isalele; batendeledi ba Bâla bonso bakadisangisha diatshimue, nansha umue wabo wakashala
Bena Izrayele kusabuka ku makasa kume
Neubule tshiseba tshia ngombe, neamukose bituha
Muntu wakadi ne nyuma mubi munda wakabuhukila, wakubatamba bubidi buabo, wakabatekesha; bakanyema mu nsubu muakadibo, butaka ne batahika mputa ham bidi

Lesha luse luebe ludi lutukemesha, Undame bu kamonyi ka disu diebe; kudi bantu babi badi bankengesha, Bakukanda mitshima yabo bua kabikadi ne luse, Miaba yonso itudi basue kuenda bakutunyungulukaku mpindiu, mbu mudi nyama wa ntambue hadiye ne lukuka lua kukuata tshintu, Yehowa, ujuke biebe, wimane ku mpala kuandi, umuele hanshi; Yehowa, unsungile kudi bantu ne tshianza tshiebe, Kadi meme hanyi, mu kubingishibua kuanyi, nemmone mpala webe: Misambu Ndi nkunanga, wewe Nzambi, bukole buanyi
Wakaya biandi dituku dibidi, wakamona balume babidi ba Bena Ebelu baluangana, yeye wakakonka muntu
Matshua a tshioshelu a ha mutu hatshi ikale coudées inai mu bule bua mulu; nsengu inai ikale ha mutu ha matshua, lusengu ne lusengu luikale ne bule bua coudée umue
Padi muntu musue kulambula Maweja Nangila budimi bumue bua ku madimi ende, mushinga wabu udi ulondeshila bungi bua bintu bidibu mua kukunamu
Kuyaye kusomba pa nkayende mutantshi muipi udibu mua kuela muketa ufika
Mukenji wa Esetê wakajadika malu â a Pulima; bakaufunda mu mukanda
Amasaya wakakolesha mutshima wandi, wakaya ne bantu bandi ku Tshibanda tshia Luehu, wakashiha Bena Seî binunu dikumi
Mukelenge wakenza bintu bilengele bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne bia mu nsubu wandi ne bisanji ne nzenze bia bimbi ba misambu ku mitshi ei ya sandal; kabakatangila bintu bu ebi diambedi mu buloba bua Yuda
Isaiah Dî dia tshijila Bakummanyisha tshikena kumona tshikole; Nunku tshimono tshianyi tshiakûla tente ne kanyinganyinga, Mutshima wanyi udi uhampakana, buowa buhite bukole buakuntshinyisha

Umuambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wambila Yelushalema ne, Ku tshibangidilu tshiebe ne ku kuledibua kuebe wewe udi wa mu buloba bua Kanâna; tatu webe wakadi Muena Amole, ne mamu webe wakadi Muena Hiti
Bakamujika mu lukita lua bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Nama, Muena Amona

Mu makanyika mafila kudi mêyi a ditunga, bidi biambulwisha, mu dîba dia ditalala, ku ditantshisha dia bubanji, dia nsombelu wa bantu ne dia bunkambwa pamwe ne ku dikuba dia bantu ne bintu biaabo Kanungu ka Bilwilu bidi bia ditunga dijima
Nuleje ne: nudi nuntshina meme Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Wakamuambila kabidi ne, Tudi ne mashinde ne manvua a bungi, ne miaba ya kulala
Bobo babikila dina dia nzambi wabo, meme nembikile dina dia Yehowa: ne Nzambi udi witaba ne kahia ikale Nzambi malelela
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu dituku adi dialua Gogo kuluangana ne ba mu buloba bua Isalele, tshiji tshianyi tshikole netshinunke tô ne mu diulu dianyi
Hakunvua mukelenge Yehoyakima mei andi ne bena bukitu bandi bonso ne baminyampala bandi bonso, mukelenge wakakeba kumushiha
Tshiena mbihata mu tshidimu tshimue bua buloba kabulu tshianana, ne nyama ya mu mpata kayikumbanyi ku mesu kuebe
Badi babasungula mu tshipungu tshibîdi ku Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa
Yakobe kutendakena Esawu ne: Bu wewe musue, umfuile luse
Tuetu kupitshila mu tshipela tshipite bunene, tshikuatshishe bowa, tshinudi bamanye, tshidi mu njila wa ku mikuna ya bena Amore
Nunku unvuile mei abo; kadi ubadimushe bikole ne ubaleshe mushindu wa mukelenge wabakokesha

Nuenu bena Izrayele bonsu, lumingu alu lujima, nuikale anu basomba mu tuzubu tua bisasa, bua ndelanganyi yenu ijadike ne mvua munupatule mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, kabidi mvua munuladike mu tuzubu tua bisasa
Davidi wakabuela mu nsubu wandi mu Yelushalema; mukelenge wakangata bakashi bahika dikumi babakibue kudiye, bakashiyeye bua kulamabo nsubu, wakabateka ha buabo, wakabadisha, kadi yeye kakaya kudibo
Solomo wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, wakajikibua mu musoko wa Davidi, tatu wandi; Lehabama, muan andi wa balume, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Bualu ebu bunakuamba nebulue, nebuenjibue; edi ndituku mene dinakanuambila
Bakamukonka ne, Yeye udi hanyi
Kadi nuikale benji ba di, kanuikadi anu bunvui badi, bua nunku nudi nudidinga
Mose wakaya ne mulangala wa Nzambi mu tshianza tshiandi
Udi wamba ne, Ihata mukashi muhika ne muan andi mulume: bualu bua muana wa mukashi muhika kena mua kuhiana bintu ne muana wa mukashi, muena budishikaminyi
Nanku Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuladika muntu mulume tulu tukole
Neuluke nkanu yanyi

Bantu bakane nebabahishe ne dihisha didibo bahisha n adi bakashi ba masandi ne dihisha dia bakashi badi bamatshisha mashi a bakuabo hanshi; bualu bua badi bakashi ba masandi, ne mashi adi ha bianza biabo
Bua yeye muena malu â adibo bamba, udi muena tshisamba tshikuabo, kuditshi kakuakadi muntu wakukuata mudimu wa ku tshioshelu
Yeye wakabakudimuna ne, Nyaya Nunku bakatuma muan abo Lebeka ne muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi ne muhika wa Abalahama ne bantu bandi

Halua dituku dia muanda mukulu, nealue ne bintu bia kudilengesha n abi kudi muakuidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena ku mpala kua Yehowa, muakuidi neangate muana wa mukoko wa mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji ne dikoho dia manyi, ne muakuidi neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa
Uye anu ne bantu aba
Hakila butuku, Mukelenge wakimana ha buihi n andi, wakamba ne, Kolesha mutshima webe; bu muwakuamba bualu buanyi mu Yelushalema, nunku bûdi n abu mbua kubuamba mu Lomo kabidi
Tshiena ngangata dijadika dia bualu buanyi kudi muntu; kadi ndi ngamba malu â bua nuenu kusungidibua

Hakatshidi Yesu wamba nunku, Yudasa, mukuabo wabo wa ba dikumi ne babidi, wakalua ne tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu, bakadi ne miele ne bibonge bafume kudi bakuidi banene ba Nzambi ne bafundi ne bakulu
Bualu bua nengumushe mena a Ba Bâla mukana muandi, kabena batela mena abo kabidi

Kadi bianza bia Mose biakanema bujitu; bakangata dibue, bakaditeka ku nyima ne yeye wakashikama ha mutu hadi, ne Alona ne Hû bakabandisha bianza biandi, umue ku luseke lukuabo, umue ku luseke lukuabo, ne bianza biandi biakakoleshibua to ne hakabuela diba

Nunku buonso buetu bakamana kukola mu bualu bua Nzambi tuikale ne meshi momumue; ne binuikala ne meshi makuabo mu bualu bukuabo, Nzambi neanubuluile bualu ebu kabidi; kadi kutuakamana kufika, tuende bietu mu nshila muomumue
Hashishe Lesinyi, mukelenge wa Sulia, ne Peka, muana wa Lemalaya, mukelenge wa Isalele, bakalua kuluangana ne Bena Yelushalema; bakatshintshimika Ahaza kadi kabakamanya mua kumutshimuna
Nênze anu malu akamanabo kuenza
Abiya ne bantu bandi bakabashiha ne kushiha kukole; Bena Isalele ba bukitu binunu nkama itanu bakadishinda hanshi bafue
Yeye wakakosa mutshi, wakawela mu mai, ne tshisui tshiakalelemuka

Nebashihe muprofete au anyi mulotshi au wa bilota, bualu bua yeye wakamba mei adi anutombuesha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanu; hatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, wakanuhikula mu nsubu wa lukanu; udi musue kunusesuisha mu nshila wakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenubua nuenu kuendamu
Hashishe, muyidi wakadianjila kufika ku lukita, wakabuela, wakatangila, wakitabusha
Mu dituku adi nenshikishe malu onso anakamba bua Eli ne ba mu nsubu wandi ku tshibangidilu tshiau tô ne kunshikidilu kuau
Biashala bidimu bia bungi, neamuhingishile bu mushinga wa kudihikula n au tshituha tshia bintu biakamusumbabo babi
Bantu ba Davidi bakamuambila ne, Mona, tuetu ludi tutshina kunoko mu Yuda, nunku ludi tutamba kutshina bua kuya ku Kila bua kuluangana ne Bena Peleshete nansha
Abiya wakasa mualu wa nvita ne bena nvita ba bukitu binunu nkama inai; Yalobama wakaluangana n andi ne bena nvita ba bukitu binunu nkama muanda mukulu
Hakadi luesu luakadiye ufumba ne dima lunyanguke mu tshianza tshia mufumbi, yeye wakafumba n adi luesu lukuabo, bu muakadiye musue kulufumba
Pashishe ulambule milambu ya bena Izrayele
Bana ba balume ba Hananiya: Pelatiya ne Yeshaya; muan andi wa balume Lefaya, muan andi wa balume Anana, muan andi wa balume Obadiya, muan andi wa balume Shekaniya
Monai bunene bua bimanyinu biandi
Kutekaye tshilambuilu pabuipi ne mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta, bua kulambuilapu Maweja Nangila milambu ya kuosha, ne ya bintu bia mu madimi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mmuambile
Muntu yonsu wa kutudi nealambule biende bintu bia tshiamu tshia mpawungi bidiye mupete: tukanu tua majita, nkanu ya ku maboku, tukanu tua ku minu, tukanu tua ku matshi, ne mabue a mu nshingu
Bualu bua nakaditshiha bua kubuhesha batatu benu; nunku buloba ebu nebuikale kunudi bu buhianyi buenu
Yosefe wakadi mukokeshi wa mu buloba, nyeye mene wakadi uhanyisha bantu bonso bintu, bana babo ne Yosefe bakalua, bakamukukuila hanshi
Ne mashi au neabuikidibue
Udi ne mikenshi yanyi, udi uyenza, ngudi munsue; Tatu wanyi neasue wansua, meme nemusue kabidi, nendimueneshe kudiye
Kadi tudi tuamba meshi a Nzambi mu bualu busokoka, meshi mene akadi masokoka, akadianjila Nzambi kusungula ku mpala kua bikondo bionso bua butumbi buetu
Hashishe wakabaha balumbuludi tô ne ku muprofete Samuele

Kadi Shaula, udi ne dinga dina Paulo, mûle tente ne Nyuma Muimpe, wakamutangila talala, wakamba ne, Wewe, mûle tente ne mashimi ne budimu, muana wa diabolo, udi ne malu makane onso lukuna, kuena ulekela kunyanga nshila milulame ya Mukelenge, anyi
Biwikala ne mukashi wa ngombe anyi wa mukoko, kumushihi ne muana wandi dituku dimue
Bualu bua butumbi bua Yehowa buakumuka ku mitu kua bakeluba, buakaya ku mbelu kua nsubu; nsubu wakula tente ne ditutu, ne tshiendelu tshiakula tente ne dinkenke dia butumbi bua Yehowa
Kadi bualu ebu budi anu bualu bukese ku mesu kua Yehowa; yeye neafile Bena Moaba mu bianza bienu kabidi
Bayidi bonso bakamba muomumue
Bisamba bia Gozana ne bia Halana ne bia Lesefe ne bia Edene biakadi mu Telasâ
Bakamba ne, Mukelenge, tangila, miele ya nvita ibidi kayiyi
Yozefe kulota tshilota tshikuabu, kutshiawila bana babu, ubambila ne: Mvua mulote: diba, ngondu ne mitotu dikumi ne umue bilua kunkukuila
Bena Izrayele bonsu kabena mua kubanda ku mukuna eku to
Genesis Nzambi wakasankisha Noa ne bana bandi, wakabambila ne, Nulelangane, nukumbane ba bungi, nuikale ha buloba buonso
Hakadibo bendakana mu misoko, bakafila mikenshi yakelabo kudi bapostolo ne bakulu ba mu Yelushalema bua kuitumikilabo

Nakamana kukutumina muntu wa meji udi ne lungenyi lule, muana wa Hulama, tatu wanyi mene, udi muana wa mukashi wa Bena Dana; tatu wandi wakadi Muena Tulo, wakadi ne lungenyi lua kuenza mudimu mu or ne mu argent ne mu tshiamu tshia mitaku ne mu tshiamu tshifike ne mu mabue ne mu mabaya ne mu bilulu bikunzubile ne bia bleu ne mu lin muimpe ne bilulu bikunzu kunzû; wakamanya mua kusonga bintu bionso ne bua kuenzeye bintu bionso; bua wewe kumuha muaba munkatshi mua bantu bebe ba lungenyi bakasungula mukelenge wanyi Davidi, tatu webe
Nganyi udi Nzambi bikaleye kayi Yehowa
Kadi kanuena mua kudia mashi a nyama to
Utuyishe mua kubala matuku etu onso ne dibala edi nunku Yehowa, hingana biebe

Biumusheye mutshima wandi bua kuhinganau kudiye, biasangisheye nyuma wandi ne muhuya wandi munda muandi nkayamu, ba ha buloba bonso nebajimine diatshimue, Biwikala ne dijingulula dia malu unvua dî edi; Udi ukina kulumbulula kuakameka udi mua kukokesha bakuabo anyi
Muntu kai wakuambila Nzambi dî edi ne, wewe unyishe bualu bundi tshiyi muanze kumona; Yeye neakuenzele bu mûdi musue bualu bua wakabenga dikosa diandi dia nsambu, anyi
Yeye wakasumba tshilulu tshia line; hakamutululeye hanshi, wakamujingila tshilulu, wakamuladika mu lukita lumbula mu dibue; wakabunguluisha dibue dinene, wakadijibika ku mushiku wa mbelu wa lukita

Au mmukalu wa Bena Efelayima ku meku abo; mukalu wa buhianyi buabo bua ku esete wakadi Atalota adalâ tô ne ku Bete holona udi ku mutu; ne mukalu wa ku wesete wakahatuka ku Mikemetata ku nôde, ne mukalu wakanyunguluka ku esete ku Tânata shilo, wakaya ku esete kua Yanoa; wakahueka ku Yanoa ku Atalota ne ku Nâla tô ne ku Yeleko, wakahatuka ku Yadene
Isalele wakabisha luendu luandi, wakashimika ntenta yandi ku nyima kua tshibumba tshinene tshia Ede
Kabidi mutumibue wanyi awu, neende kumpala kuenu bua kunufikisha mu ditunga dia bena Amore, bena Iti, bena Perizi, bena Kenaane, bena Ivi ne bena Yebusa
Kaleba wakamba ne, Muntu yonso watamba musoko wa Kîyata sefe, udi ûnyenga, nemmuhe Akasa, muan anyi wa bakashi, bu mukashi wandi

Bana bandi ba balume bakadi ne tshilele tshia kulambishilangana bia kudia mu nsubu yabo, muntu ne muntu dituku diandi; bakadi batuma dî bua kubikila bana ba bakashi basatu bua kudia n abo, kunua n abo
Nuikishe dituku dia Dikisha
Nenuikale balunda banyi, binuenza bu mundi nuambila
Abalahama wakamba bua Sala, mukashi wandi, ne, Yeye udi muan etu mukashi, ne Abimeleke, mukelenge wa Gelâ, wakatuma bantu, bakangata Sala
Moshe udi usungula bakulu bakoshi ba nsambu Butshia dinda, Moshe kusomba bua kumvua bilumbu bia bantu
Matshu andi akajikuka lukasa, tshiakadi tshisuika ludimi luandi tshiakusuluka lukasa, wakakula bimpe
Panuikala bayile njila umue bua kubaluisha, nenubanyeme, nupingane mu njila muanda mutekete mishilangane

Bumue bua bualu ebu mbuakamumushilabo kûdi tshituha, bua wewe wikale n andi tshiendelele; kembu muhika, kadi muhite muhika buimpe, muan enu munanga wa mu Kilisto, munangibue kundi tshishiki, kadi mutambe kunangibua kûdi, ne mu mubidi ne mu Mukelenge

Mukelenge wanyi wakuntuma kûdi bua kukuambila ne, Anu katataka bansongalume babidi ba bana ba baprofete ba ku mikuna ya Efelayima bakafika kundi; ndi nkusengelela ne, Bimpe ubampele ntalanta wa argent ne bilulu bibidi bitambe buimpe
Mutungidi wa Yesu wakabaha tshimanyinu ne, Unatuangana n andi mishiku, nyeye; numukuate, nuye n andi bimpe
Numutumbishe bua bienzedi biandi binene
Nenuudie ngondu mujima
Butumbi bua Nzambi wa Isalele buakadi bufuma ku luseke lua esete
Hakunvabo dî dia mukelenge, bakaya biabo; mutoto wakamonabo ku esete wakaya ku mpala kuabo tô ne hakimanau ha buludi hakadi muana, Hakamonabo mutoto, bakatamba kusanka
Bualu bua hakamanyabo Nzambi, kabakamutumbisha bu Nzambi, kabakamusakidila; kadi meshi akelabo akalua a hatuhu, ne mitshima yabo mijibale yakalua mîdima

Yeye wakakuata dragon, nyoka au wa kale, udi diabolo ne Satana, wakamusuika bidimu tshinunu, ne wakamuela mu dina didi kadî ne tshishikidilu, ne wakadînshila, ne wakamutekelahu tshimanyishilu ha mutu handi, bua yeye kadingi bisamba bia bantu kabidi, tô ne hashika bidimu tshinunu; ku nyima kua bualu ebu budiye n abu mbua kusuludibua tshituha tshihi
Kadi wewudi nganyi bua wewe udi ulumbuluisha mukuenu

Anu tulu tukese, anu kulala tulu tshituha; Hashishe buhele buebe nebukukuate bu munyengi, Muntu wa tshidingidingi, muena tshinyangu, Udi uhodia ne mesu andi, udi usheta makasa andi, Udi ne mutshima wa tshishiku, Bua malu â neabuluke lubilu; Mianda isambombo idiku idi Yehowa ukina; mesu adi ne dihetu, ludimi ludi lushima, ne bianza bidi bimatshiha mutshima udi uhangidisha mianda ya meji mabi, mumanyi wa malu udi wamba mei a kudinga, Muan anyi, lama mukenji wa tatu ebe, Ubilame matuku onso mu mu tshima webe, Hawenda, lungenyi alu nelukulombole; Bualu bua mukenji udi muinda, diyisha diau didi munya, Biobi nebikulame ku buteyi bua mukashi munyanguke, Kusaminyi muoyo ku bulengele buandi nansha, Bua bualu Muntu udi mua kuteka kahia mu tshiadi tshiandi, Muntu udi mua kudiata ha makala a kahia adi atema, Bidi muomumue kudi muntu udi ubuela kudi mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi; Bantu kabena bahetula muibi, Kadi biamukuatabo, neahingishe bintu bivudisha misangu muanda mutekete; Udi wenda masandi ne mukashi kena ne lungenyi, Neahete mikumu ne dilengulula; Bualu bua mukau udi ubandisha tshiji tshia mulume, Kena witabusha bintu bia kubuikidila n abi bubi buandi, Nsumuinu Muan anyi, ulame mei anyi, Ulame mikenji yanyi, wikale ne muoyo; Ubisuike ku minu yebe; ubifunde mu mutshima Wambile meji ne, Udi muan etu wa bakashi; Bua biobi bikulame bua wewe kuebela mukashi wa bende, bua kuehela biebe mukashi Bualu bua ku dididishi dia mu nsubu muanyi Nakatangila munkatshi mua batshimbakanyi, Wakadi uhitshila mu musesu hehi ne masangu akadi nsubu wa mukashi, mu diba dia kafuanshimba, hakabuela diba, Monai
Bua kukuatshila Bena Ejipitu mudimu budi butamba bua kufua mu tshihela buimpe

Mukelenge Yehowa udi ukuambila wewe, muana wa muntu, ne, Ambila nyunyu ya mishindu yonso ne nyama yonso ya mu mpata ne, Nudisangishe hohamue, nulue; nufume ku nseke yonso, nudikunguishe ku muaba udi minyinyi yanyi indi nnushihela, milambu mene indi nnulongoluela ha mikuna ya mu Isalele, bua nuenu nudie munyinyi ne nunue mashi
Genese Abalama ne Lota Badi Bahanduluka Abalama wakumuka mu Ejipitu ne mukashi andi ne bintu biandi bionso ne Lota, wakaya mu luseke lua ku Sude
Kadi muntu ne muntu udi uheshibua dimueneka dia Nyuma bua kukuatshishangana
Bakashiha Bena Peleshete dituku adi ku Mikemasha tô ne ku Ayalona
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu udi nenu
Badi basomba talala pabuipi ne Mvidi Mukulu wabu
Yehowa neambe ne, Nzambi yabo idi kudi kunyi, ne dibue diabo diakadibo batekemena didi hanyi, yakadia manyi a nyama yakadibo bamushihela, yakanua nvinyo yakafilabo
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bualu bua idi nyuma ya bademon idi yenza bimanyinu, idi iya kudi bakelenge ba ha buloba buonso, bua kubasangisha ku nvita ya dituku dinene dia Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso
Bena Isalele bakadila Mose matuku makumi asatu mu mpata wa Moaba; nunku matuku a kudila kua Mose akashika
Shekeme muana mulume wa Hamo, Muena Hiwi, mukelenge muana wa buloba, wakamutangila wakamukuata, wakalala n andi, wakamufuisha bundu
Yehowa udi ne muoyo; dibue dianyi disankishibue, Nzambi atumbishibue, dibue dia luhandu luanyi

Ndi ngamba bua muntu kasambuki mikalu ne kenzedi muan abo wa mu Kilisto bibi mu bualu ebu; bualu bua Mukelenge udi musombuedi mu malu â onso, bu mutuakadianjila kunudimusha kabidi ne mutuakanumanyisha
Lakele wakamba ne, Nakasangana bibula bikole ne mukulu wanyi wa bakashi, nakumutamba bukole, wakamuidika dina ne, Nafatale
Bena Amone ne bena Mowabe kabena mua kubuela muaba udi bantu ba Maweja Nangila basangile, nansha ndelanganyi yabu ya musangu wa dikumi
Nunku Nzambi wakasombuela bubi bua Abimeleke buakenzeleye tatu wandi hakashiheye bana babo makumi muanda mutekete

Nennulumbuluishe ku butshika bua buloba bua Isalele; nunku nenumanye ne, Ndi Yehowa, muena mei anudi kanuyi nulonda, muena mikenji mudi kanuyi nuenza, kadi nuakuenza bu mudibo benza kudi bisamba bidi binunyunguluka
Bualu bua bantu aba, yeye wakabateka ku musoko ne ku musoko ku matshika a buloba bua Ejipitu to ne kunfudilu kuabu
Mona, mutshima wanyi kawena muanze kunyanguka nunku; bualu bua ku bunsongalume buanyi tô ne mpindiu tshiena muanze kudia munyinyi wa nyama mudibi

Bikaleye mukuambile ne, Tshiena musue kumuka kûdi, bualu bua yeye udi ukunanga ne ba mu nsubu webe, wakabela disanka kûdi, hashishe wewe newangate nkulonda, neumutuhite ditshu ku tshibi ne yeye neikale muhika webe tshiendelele

Hakabanga Yesu mene kuyisha bantu, yeye wakadi bu bidimu makumi asatu, bantu bakadi belangana meshi ne, yeye udi muana wa Yosefe, muana wa Heli, muana wa Matata, muana wa Lewi, muana wa Meleki, muana wa Yana, muana wa Yosefe, muana wa Matana, muana wa Amosa, muana wa Nahuma, muana wa Eseli, muana wa Nagai, muana wa Mâta, muana wa Matatia, muana wa Semei, muana wa Yoseke, muana wa Yoda, muana wa Yoanana, muana wa Lesa, muana wa Zelubabela, muana wa Shalatiele, muana wa Neli, muana wa Meleki, muana wa Adi, muana wa Kosama, muana wa Elemadama, muana wa Ele, muana wa Yesu, muana wa Eliezê, muana wa Yolima, muana wa Matata, muana wa Lewi, muana wa Shimeona, muana wa Yuda, muana wa Yosefe, muana wa Yonama, muana wa Eleyakima, muana wa Melea, muana wa Mena, muana wa Matata, muana wa Natana, muana wa Davidi, muana wa Yishai, muana wa Obeda, muana wa Boaza, muana wa Salamona, muana wa Nashona, muana wa Aminadaba, muana wa Ani, muana wa Heselona, muana wa Pelese, muana wa Yuda, muana wa Yakoba, muana wa Isaka, muana wa Abalahama, muana wa Tela, muana wa Nahô, muana wa Seluga, muana wa Leu, muana wa Pelege, muana wa Ebê, muana wa Shela, muana wa Kenana, muana wa Afashada, muana wa Sheme, muana wa Noa, muana wa Lemeke, muana wa Metushela, muana wa Hanoka, muana wa Yalede, muana wa Mahalalêle, muana wa Kenana, muana wa Enosha, muana wa Shete, muana wa Adama, muana wa Nzambi

Balumbuluishi Mika ne Benu Dana Mu matuku au kamuakadi mukelenge mu Isalele; mu matuku au ba mu tshisamba tshia Dana bakakeba muaba wa kushikamabo; bualu bua tô ne ku dituku adi bobo kabakadi bangata buhianyi buabo munkatshi mua bisamba bia Isalele
Bana betu, lekelai kuikala bana mu meshi enu, kadi nuikale tuana tukese mu malu mabi, nuikale bantu bakole mu meshi enu
Hashishe Yonatana ne Davidi bakahungakasha tshihungidi, bualu bua yeye wakamunanga bu mutshima wandi mene
Wewe musangane mbuji udi kayi ne matoba anyi udi kayi ne mipolu pambidi, nansha mukoku udi kauyi mufike, nengikale muivi
Bana betu bananga, mimanye bienu bualu ebu
Bualu bua bikala bualu budi bujiminajimina ne butumbi, bualu budi bushala budi butamba butumbi

Wakenza tshioshelu tshia musonga wa manananshi ne mabaya a acacia, buludi bua tshi buakadi coudée umue, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudée umue, bakidikisha nseke yonso ne luidi lumue, bule buatshi bua mulu buakadi coudées ibidi, wakenza nsengu yatshi ne tshituha tshijima
Dituku adi nusanke, nutuhike bua disanka, bualu bua difutu dienu didi dinene mu diulu; bualu bua bankambua babo bakenzela baprofete nunku kabidi
Kanuakibata bakuidi ba Yehowa, bana ba Alona, ne Bena Lewi, kanuakadisunguila bakuidi bu mudi tshilele tshia bantu ba mu makelenge makuabo, anyi
Nanku, kufikaye munda bikole, kuimanshaye mabue avuaye nawu ku bianza kuinshi kua mukuna, mabue awu kukosekawu
Genesis Hakashika malu a, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Abalama mu tshilota ne, Abalama kutshinyi, meme ndi ngabu webe ne difutu diebe ditambe bunene
Muntu eu wakadi Umuka ku musoko wandi ku tshidimu ku tshidimu bua kutendeleleye ne bua kufileye milambu kudi Yehowa wa misumba ku Shilo
Bikala nyama kayi muakane, yeye neamuhikule bu mudi mushinga webe, neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu, bikaleye kayi umuhikula, wewe neumuhane bu mudi mushinga webe
Nutabale, nutantamane mu ditabusha, nuikale balume mene, nukuatshibue bikole
