Bena Peleshete bakadisangisha bua kuluanganabo nvita ne Bena Isalele, bungi bua bena makalu buakadi binunu makumi asatu, ne bua bakadi babanda ha nyima ha tubalu buakadi binunu bisambombo, ne bungi bua bantu bakadi benda hanshi buakadi bu nsenga ya ku muelelu wa mai manene; bakalua, bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo mu Mikemasha ku esete kua Bete awena
Bintu bionso biakafukibua kudiye; kakuena tshintu tshiakafukibua kudi mukuabo, anu kudiye
Newafunde ha minoko ya bibi bia nsubu webe, ne ha bibi bia mishiku ya luhangu luebe
Nembatangadishe eku ne eku munkatshi mua makelenge a ha buloba bualu bua malu a Manashe, muana wa Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, akenzeye mu Yelushalema
Yeye wakadi mumiamina mu mionshi ya meba udi unvua dî dia Nzambi, kadi meshi a malu a ha buloba ne mashimi a biuma bidi binyengela dî, yeye udi wikala kai ne maminu
Hakadi Yesu umukaku, bafofo babidi bakamulonda bela dî diabo ne, Wewe muana wa Davidi, utufue luse
Bafalese bakambilangana ne, Nudi numona ne kanuena nuheta bualu; monai, ba ha buloba bonso badi bamulonda
Kuinshi kuonsu kua muntumpu awu, bavua bazola bimuma bia grenade ne buanda bua miosa ya nyama bufikuluke, bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzuu, kabidi ne buanda bukole bua ndanda
Nakadi kusua ne wikale nasha ku mashika anyi ku kahia
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Mona, muken ebe wakahingana kudi bana babo ne kudi nzambi wandi, wewe ulonde muken ebe
Kana wakumuka ku mesu kua Yehowa, wakashikama mu buloba bua Nodo, ku esete kua Edene
Bobo batshidi bantu bebe ne buhianyi buebe, bawakahatula ne bukole buebe bunene ne diboko diebe diolola
Tshidime udi wenza mudimu mukole wa mu budimi ngudi ne bua kudia bia mu budimi ku mpala kua bakuabo
Bimunyi abi bikale bimanyinu bia matuku, bidimu ne bikondu bia bibilu, bikale kabidi bitokesha pa buloba bujima
Nempane bana benu ba balume ne bana benu ba bakashi kudi Bena Yuda, ne bobo nebabahane kudi Bena Seba, bantu aba ba kule
Nasha kakese

Bikala Nzambi, hakasueye kulesha bantu tshishi tshiandi, ne kubamanyisha bukole buandi, wakatukisha ne lutulu lunene bifuadi bitekela tshishi tshiandi bilongolodibua bua dibutuka, ne bua kumanyisha bantu bua bubanshi bua butumbi buandi ku bifuadi bilesha luse biakadianjileye kulongolola ku butumbi, tuetu mene, bakabikileye kabidi, kamba munkatshi mua Bayuda nkayabo, kadi ba munkatshi mua bisamba bia bende kabidi; ebu mbualu bukole, anyi
Bafalese bakaluhuka, bobo ne bena Helode bakamuelela tshifufu bua kumushiha
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama inayi ne bisatu
Bua meme Yehowa tshitu ngakudimuka, nunku nuenu, bana ba Yakoba, kanuena nubutuka

Kushikisha Alona ne bana bandi balume kubuikila nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bintu bionso bia mu nsubu, hayabo mu nshila, hashishe bana balume ba Kohata nebalue bua kubituala, kadi bobo kabalengi bintu bia tshijila bianza, bua kabafu

Badi bavudisha mei abo, badi bamba mei a diambu; Badi batshibula bantu bebe bituha, Yehowa, Badi bashiha mukashi wa mu lufuila ne muenyi, Badi bamba ne, Yehowa kena umona malu etu; Elanganai meji a bualu ebu, nuenu badi bajibale munkatshi mua Yeye wakasa ditshu, kena unvua biandi, anyi

Ei mmilambu ludi mua kuoshila ha tshioshelu bana ba mikoko babidi ba tshidimu tshimue ku dituku ku dituku misangu yonso Wewe newoshile umue wa mikoko ne dinda ne mukuabo dilolo Woshe muana umue wa mukoko ne tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu tshia bukula busangisha ne tshia tshinai tshia tshihiminu tshia manyi, ne tshia tshinai tshia tshihiminu tshia nvinyo bu mulambu wa kunua
Hashishe mukelenge wakambila Siba ne, Mona, bintu bionso bia Mefibosheta mbiebe
Alona ne bana bandi balume nebaluate mihanu ei hayabo mu tshitendelelu anyi hayabo hehi ne tshioshelu bua kuenza mudimu wabo mu muaba wa tshijila, bobo kabatuadi mahambuka, kabafu
Ngasa kunudi ne ditalala bia kudi Nzambi Tatu ne Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto

Wewe udi Yehowa, wewe nkayebe mene; wewe wakafuka diulu ne diulu dia mu diulu ne misumba yau yonso ne buloba ne bintu bionso bidimu ne mai manene ne bionso bidimu, wewe utu wabilama buonso buabi; misumba ya mu diulu idi ikutendelela
Yesu wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakamulenga ne, Ndi musue, wikale mulengeshibue
Bana ba balume ba Yediele: Bilehana
Nunku nentume nsongalume, nemmuambile ne, Ya biebe, ukebe mikete
Kadi Yalobama wakamana kuteka bâlaminyi ku nyima kuabo; nunku bakuabo bakadi ku mpala kua Bena Yuda, ne bâlaminyi bakadi ku nyima kuabo
Ubambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Di edi dia Yehowa didi dikuata mukelenge wa mu Yelushalema ne bonso ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele badi mu musoko eu
Bualu bua buhote bua Nzambi budi buhita meshi a bantu, ne butekete bua Nzambi budi buhita bukole bua bantu

Wakidikisha bujitu bua mesa a bidia bilesha, ku mesa ne mesa; ne bua argent ya mesa ne mesa; ne bua or ya bitubuidi bia munyinyi ne malonga ne makoho, ne bujitu bua or ya bihanza bionso, ne bua bihanza bia argent kabidi
Hashishe bakatumina Izebele dî ne, Nabota udi mushihibue ne mabue
Mabaya awu, ikale ne mpoku bua kulamakaja abidi abidi
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune
Wakashilangana ne nyama mikuabo yonso yakadi ku mpala kuandi, wakadi ne nsengu dikumi
Tshiakafua dituku adi; ne mikoko yakadi mihite kunyana yakunvua dî dianyi, yakamanya ne, Di adi diakadi dia Yehowa

Kadi tshioshelu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku tshiakenzabo kudi Besalele, muana wa Uli, muana wa Hû, tshiakadiku ku mpala kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu wa Yehowa; ne Solomo ne bantu bakadi n andi bakakebelamu Yehowa
Bituikala badijingulule munda muetu, kabakadi ne bualu bua kulumbuluisha
Unvuai, bana betu bananga; Nzambi kakasungula bahele ba mu bintu bia ha buloba bua kuikalabo babanshi mu ditabusha ne bahianyi ba bukelenge buakalayeye badi bamunanga, anyi
Yeye wakandamuna ne, Wakutua n anyi bidia mu dilonga dimue neantungile tshitungu

Muntu yonso udi mudijidile udi mua kudia munyinyi eu, kadi mundi udi kayi mudijidile udi udia munyinyi wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala udibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nebumushe mundi eu munkatshi mua bana babo
Hashishe muakuidi neuvuwe bilulu ne mubidi wandi ne mai, ne ku nyima nealue biandi mu tshitudilu, neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo

Mu diba adi kabidi, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi, diamba ne, Muana wa muntu, bantu aba badi bashikame mu bikulu bia mu buloba bua Isalele batshidi bamba ne, Abalahama wakadi anu muntu umuehele, kadi yeye wakahiana buloba ebu; nunku, bualu bua tuetu ludi ba bungi, nebatuhe buloba ebu bu buhianyi buetu
Mfumu wa tshisamba eshi uvua Eliyasafe, muana wa Layele
Leya kuamba ne: Ndi muena diakalenga, bualu bakaji nanyi nebambikile ne: mmuena diakalenga
Yeye wakamuambila ne
Nenkuvuishe tshisamba tshinene, nenkusankishe, nenvuishe dina diebe dinene, ne wewe neuvudishile bakuabo disanka
Pashishe uvua mushipe kabidi Datane ne Abirame, bana ba Eliyabe, ba mu tshisamba tshia Rubene
Umusha mesu ebe kundi, bua meme kumanya mua kusanka kabidi; Misambu Nakindila Yehowa ne lutulu, wakatelela matshu andi kundi, Wakampa tula mu dijimba dia kabutu mu bintampi muakadi bitoshi
Maweja Nangila udi unyoka bantu bende Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Bantu babi aba nebangele mpata kashidi anyi
Nunku Yoaba ne muakuny andi Abishai bakashiha Abinê bualu bua yeye wakashiha muan abo Asahele mu nvita ya mu Gibeona
Balumbuluishi Shimishona ku Gaza Shimishona wakaya ku Gaza, wakatangilaku mukashi wa masandi, wakabuela kudiye
Ahaba wakaya bua kusangileye ne Eliya
Kishi wakambila muan andi Shaula ne, Wangate umue wa bena mudimu, aye n ebe: jukai, nuye kukeba nyama ya mpunda
Yakoba wakangata mitshi mibishi ya peuplier ne ya amande ne ya platane, wakubula bihusu bibaka bitoke, wakamuenesha bibaka bitoke bia mitshi
Yeye wakabashia, wakaluhuka mu musoko, wakaya ku Betania, wakalalaku
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ha mutu ha nsubu yonso ya mu Moaba ne mu misesu yonso muadi udi kuonso; bualu bua nakutshibula Moaba bu dilonga dia tshianana

Hakamanya Yesu bualu ebu, wakumukaku; bantu ba bungi bakamulonda; yeye wakabakolesha bonso, wakabambila bikole ne, Kanunmanyishi kudi bantu; bua dî diakambabo kudi muprofete Yeshaya dishikishibue ne, Tangila, muntu wanyi unakusungula; Yeye kena utanda, kena wela mbila, Yeye kena utshibula disele didi diamba kukoseka, Bisamba bia bende nebitekemene dina diandi

Kakunyua Bena Gibeona muakenzela Yoshua Yeleko ne Ai, hobo bakenza budimu, bakadisangisha bu miloho yakalua kule, bakateka bibombi bikulakasha ha nyima ha mpunda yabo, ne milondo ya nvinyo ya biseba bihandike ne bilamakasha, ne bisabata bilamakasha ku makasa abo, ne bilulu bisunsuke ham bidi habo, ne mampa abo onso akûma, akakuata butu

Bikalabo ne bundu bua malu onso akenzabo, ubamanyishe bua tshifundu tshia kuasa n atshi nsubu wa ntempelo, miaba ya kuhatukila ne ya kubuelela, bilele bia kulondamu, kulongolola kua kutendelela ne mikenji yandi; funda malu au onso ku mesu kuabo bua bobo balonde dilongolola dia malu andi onso, batumikile mikenji yandi yonso ne benze malu au onso
Pula, mukelenge wa Ashû, wakalua bua kuhaula buloba

Bana ba Gada ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo, ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita; bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Gada binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama isambombo ne makumi atanu
Hashishe tshiji tshia Elihu, muana wa Balakela, Muena Buzi, wa diku dia Lama, tshiakatema

Bualu bua Bafalese ne Bena Yuda bonso, bikalabo kabai buvue bianza ne mai bikole, kabena badia bidia, badi ne tshilele tshia bankambua babo nunku; hafumabo ku tshisalu, kabena badia, anu howabo; badi bitabusha kabidi bilele bikuabo bia bungi, bu kuvua kua mpanza ne ngesu ne bintu bidi bienjibua ne tshiamu tshia mitaku
Nebakudike bujitu buonso bua tshiota tshia tatu andi ham bidi handi, bana bakalelabo ne bantu ba hatuhu baledibue kudi bana aba, dilonga dionso dia tshianana mene, ku makoho tô ne ku mbidiki yonso
Hakumukeye mu mai, wakamona diulu dibululuka, ne Nyuma bu nyunyu wa nkutshi umutulukila; dî diakafuma mu diulu ne, Wewe udi Muana wanyi munanga, wewe udi unsankisha bimpe
Uvua amu ne bana ba bakaji batanu: Mala, Nowa, Ogla, Milka ne Tirsa

Wewe newoshe muana wa ngombe ku dituku ku dituku bua kubuikidila bantu mibi yabo, wewe neutokeshe tshioshelu hawoshila bintu bia kubuikidila n abi bantu mibi yabo, wele manyi ha tshioshelu bua kutshijidila
Nuele Ubano, umena mudimu n etu mu Kilisto, ne Staku, munanga wanyi, muoyo

Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso akusankishe akukumbashe, akuvuishe bana ba bungi bua wewe ulue tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu, akuhe wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe disanka dia Abalahama, bua wewe kuhiana buloba buakalaya Nzambi Abalahama
Moshe kuandamuna Maweja Nangila ne: Bena Ejipitu mbamanye muudi mupatule bena Izrayele mu ditunga diabu ku bukole buebe
Noa Udi Ukuatshika Maluvu Bana balume ba Noa bakaluhuka n andi mu buatu bakadi Sheme, Hama ne Yafete Hama wakadi nkambua wa Kanâna

Hashishe Solomo wakahia milambu ya kuosha ba tshioshelu tshia Yehowa tshiakaseye mu mbalanda buatshia buatshia bu muakadi mikenji ya Mose, ku matuku a lumingu, ne hakabala ngondo, ne hakadiabo bidia bia disanka misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu, hakadiabo bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene, ne bidia bia disanka dia mbingu, ne bidia bia disanka dia bitandatanda
Kabidi nudi mua kuadila amu muaba wa tshijila
Tuai mikemu
Nuenu balume muomumue, nuikale ne bakashi benu bu mudi lungenyi luimpe, bu mudibo banutambe mubidi butekete, bu mudibo bahianyi n enu ba ngasa wa muoyo; bua kutendelela kuenu kakuhumbishibu
Hoshea, muana wa Ela, wakelela Peka, muana wa Lemalaya, tshifufu, wakamukuma, wakamushiha, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi tshia bukelenge bua Yotama, muana wa Uziya
Musangu wa kumpala udibu bela mpungi nanku, bena Izrayele badi basombe luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua ntenta wa kusambakena nebatuadije luendu
Ne dî dia mu Makanda wa Nzambi diakashikishibua ne, Abalahama wakitabusha Nzambi ne bakamubadila ditabusha diandi bu buakane buandi; bakamuidika, Mulunda wa Nzambi
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Anu muwambi amu

Hashishe bûdi n abu mbua kumuka ku muaba au tô ne hawafika ku mutshi wa telebinta wa ku Tabô; wewe neusangileku ne balume basatu baya ku Betele bua kutendelela Nzambi, umue mutuale bana ba mbushi basatu, mukuabo muambule mitanda ya bidia isatu, ne mukuabo muambule mulondo wa nvinyo; bobo nebakuele muoyo, nebakuhe mitanda ya bidia ibidi, bûdi n abu mbua kuyangata ku bianza biabo
Isaka wakalua n andi mu ntenta wa mamu wandi, Sala, yeye wakangata Lebeka, wakalua mukashi wandi Isaka wakamunanga, ne mutshima wandi wakasambibua bua lufu lua mamu wandi
Matuku onso a Hanoka akadi bidimu nkama isatu ne makumi asambombo ne bitanu
Shimishona wakamba ne, Nuditshihe kundi ne nuenu nkayenu kanushihi

Dielulula Mua kusombuela mushipianganyi udi kayi mumanyike Panuafika mu ditunga dikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupe bua kusomba, nuenu basangane tshitalu tshia muntu mu tshisuku, kanuyi bamanye uvua mumushipe, bakulu ne balumbuluishi nebapime mutantshi uvua muntu mufuile, ne ku bimenga bidi pabuipi, bua kujadika tshimenga tshidi pabuipi ne tshitalu tshia muntu awu

Matthew Yeye wakabikila bayidi bandi dikumi ne babidi, wakabaha bukole bua kuhitabo n abu nyuma ya bukoya, ne bua kuyumushabo munda mua bantu, ne bua kukoleshabo n abu bantu bakadi ne masama ne matekete a mishindu yonso

Ba mu Betele bakadianjila kutuma Shalesê ne Legeme meleke ne bantu babo bua kulombabo diakalengele kudi Yehowa; bua kukonka bakuidi ba mu nsubu wa Yehowa wa misumba ne baprofete bandi ne, Ndi mua kuasa madilu ne kujila bia kudia mu ngondo muitanu bu munakumana kuenza bidimu ebi bia bungi, anyi
Kubikidisha benji ba majimbu bonsu ne bena meji ba mu ditunga diende, ubawila bilota abi

Hakatangila Bena Amona ne, Davidi wakalengulula, Bena Amona bakabikila Bena Sulia ba mu Bete lehoba ne ba mu Soha, binunu makumi abidi bakadi benda hanshi; mukelenge wa Mâka wakafila tshinunu tshia bantu; bantu ba Tobo bakadi binunu dikumi ne bibidi
Mikaya wakamuambila ne, Tangila, wewe neumone bualu ebu hawabuela mu tshisokomenu bua kusokoma

Hanakamba mei anyi, kabakankudimuna; Bakangindila bu mudibo bindila nvula, Nakabatuila mimuemue hakadibo kabayi ne tshieyemenu, Nakabasunguila nshila bua bobo kuendela, nakashikama bu nfumu wabo, Job Kadi katataka bantu bandi mpita bidimu badi banseka, Bukole bua bianza biabo budi mua kunkuatshisha munyi
Kadi Bena Isalele bakambilangana ne, Tunyeme bietu, tubasemeshe kule ne musoko, baluile mu nshila minene
Bua, monai, dilualua
Kadi nganyi wamanya mua kushala holâ mu dituku dia kulua kuandi
Hahita bakuabo mu buloba, ne hamona mukuabo mufuba wa muntu mufue, budiye n abu mbua kuteka tshimanyinu hehi n au, tshishaleku tô ne halua bajiki kûjika mu Tshibanda tshia Hamona Gogo
Mu ntenta wa kusambakena amu, Arone ne bana bende ba balume, batekemu tshitekelu tshia muendu
Biashala muntu ne muoyo bidimu bia bungi, asankilemu; kadi avuluke biandi kabidi matuku a mîdima, bualu bua neikale a bungi

Bualu bua nensangishe ba mu bisamba bionso bua kuluanganabo nvita ne Bena Yelushalema; nebanyenge musoko, nebahaule bia mu nsubu, nebakuate bakashi ku bukole; tshituha tshia hankatshi tshia bena musoko netshibuele mu buhika, kadi bantu hadi bashala kabena bumushibua mu musoko

Nunku nakangata luhanza ku tshianza tshia Yehowa, nakalunuisha ba mu bisamba bionso biakadi Yehowa muntume: ba mu Yelushalema ne misoko ya mu Yuda ne bakelenge babo ne baminyampala babo, bua kubabutula kabutu, bua kubavuisha bu tshintu tshidi tshikemesha bantu, tshidibo babingila, tshidibo bela mulau, bu mudibo lelu eu

Nebashihe muprofete au anyi mulotshi au wa bilota, bualu bua yeye wakamba mei adi anutombuesha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanu; hatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, wakanuhikula mu nsubu wa lukanu; udi musue kunusesuisha mu nshila wakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenubua nuenu kuendamu

Yeye wakasungula bena bukitu binunu lukama ba mu Isalele ku difutu dia lukama lua ntalanta Kadi muntu wa Nzambi wakalua kudiye, wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge, kuitabushi bua Bena Isalele kuya n ebe; bualu bua Yehowa kena ne Bena Isalele, bana bonso ba Efelayima mene
Yeye nduhangu lua buakane, bakuenzela Yehowa mene, ditekemena dia batatu babo, bibi
Nuenzele bantu malu onso anudi basue banuenzele
Bakadisangisha ku Misepa, bakasuna mai, bakâhongolola ku mesu kua Yehowa, bakajila bia kudia dituku adi, bakamba ne, Tuakuenzela Yehowa bibi
Moshe ne Elazare kuya kudi bena Izrayele mu mpata ya Mowabe, ku muelelu wa musulu wa Yardene, dishiya dia Yeriko
Kadi Abashaloma wakanyema, wakaya kudi Talemai, muana wa Amihû, mukelenge wa mu Geshû
Paulo wakamuambila ne, Biadi meme nakaledibua Muena Lomo

Kadi bua kubapepejila mudimu ewu, ubapeshe mfumu umue ku tshisamba tshionsu, bilondangane mushindu ewu: Kalebe, muana wa Yefune, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Yuda; Yemuyele, muana wa Amikude, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Shimeyone; Elidade, muana wa Kislone, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Binyamine; Buki, muana wa Yogli, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Dane; Aniyele, muana wa Efode, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Menashe, muana wa Yozefe; Kemuyele, muana wa Shiftane, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Efrayime, muana wa Yozefe; Elishafane, muana wa Pamake, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Zebulone; Paltiyele, muana wa Azane, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Isakare; Ahihude, muana wa Shelomi, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Ashere; Pedahele, muana wa Amikude, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Naftali
Halueye, udi usangana nsubu mukomba, mulengesha

Hanakatekemena diakalengele, dikenga diakalua; Munda muanyi mudi mukungulu, kamuena muhuwa; Ndi ngendakana mufikishibue, kadi kembua munya; Nakulua muan abo ne nyama ya mibuabua, ne mulunda wa nyunyu ya nfiondo
Nukebe kuvuishila musoko unakanutuma mu buhika ditalala, nûlombele diakalengele kudi Yehowa; bua bikalau ne ditalala, nuenu nenuikale ne ditalala
Nunku Davidi wakangata mulondo wa mai ne difuma diakadi ku mutu wa Shaula, bakaya
Bualu bua Bena Isalele badi bantu banyi banakahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Hakambeye malu â, wakabambila ne, Mulunda wetu Lazalo udi mulale tulu; kadi ndi nya kumubisha mu tulu
Bena Izrayele, Maweja Nangila neanunzuluile tshibuashibuashi, muaba udiye mulame mayi a mvula
Bakabasangisha mu muaba udibo babikila mu muaku wa Buena Ebelu ne, Ha Megido
Bintu bionso bidi biakane kudi bantu badi ne mitshima mitoke; kadi kudi badi babike, badi kabai ne ditabusha, kakuena tshintu tshidi tshiakane; kadi meshi abo ne muoyo mukese wabo mbioneka
Yeye wakungenzela bimpe
, Bana balume ba Abalahama: Isaka ne Yishemaele
Romans Nunku ditamba kai didi Muena Yuda n adi, anyi dikuatshisha dia ditengula didi ku tshinyi
Nanku, angatayi maminu, nuye kukuna mu madimi
Mose eu nguakahidiabo ne, Wakuvuisha mukelenge ne mulumbuludi nganyi
Ba mu nsubu wa Ahazaya kabakadi ne bukole bua kujadika n abu bukelenge
Bakidikishila tatu andi bianza ne, Udi musue bamuidike dina kai
Pavua bimuna binua mayi awu, bimpanga bivua bikuata mashina
Mpindiewu, ambila Pinhase ne: ndi ntua nende ndondu, udi umupetesha bupole

Nunku ufuile muntu webe luse, bualu bua wewe wakamana kuhunga n anyi tshihungidi mu dina dia Yehowa; bikala bualu bubi munda muanyi, unshihe nkayebe; udi musue kulua n anyi ku mesu kua tatu webe bishi
Kanutatshishi muanenu mupele bua bualu abu
Kabakamanya mua kudia bidia talalâ, bualu bua bantu ba bungi bakadi bahitakana
Wakatuma kapitene kakuabo ne bantu bandi makumi atanu

Bobo bakashiha Mukelenge Yesu ne baprofete, bakatuihata tuetu kabidi, kabena basankisha Nzambi, ne badi banyoka bantu bonso; badi batukanda bua tuetu katuakudi ne ba bisamba bia bende bua bobo basungidibue; nunku bobo badi bakumbasha mibi yabo misangu yonso; kadi hashishe tshishi tshiakafika kudibo
Bua hikalaku tshihungidi, budibo n abu mbua kulesha lufu lua mutshihungi
Bualu ke dituku divua Maweja Nangila muleje bukole buende, munupatule ku bupika mu Ejipitu
Nahô wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi abidi ne tshitema, wakalela Tela
Kakuakadi munga wakamanya mua kuhandisha tshimpanga ku bukole bua mpumbu
Malu makole a mushindu ewu akavua menzeke anyi
Yozefe kuela mukenji ne: tshia bitanu tshimue tshia biakudia, ntshia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Hakunvua Yesu dî diabo, wakamuambila ne, Kutshinyi, itabusha anu kuitabusha, nebamusungile
Bandai ku buloba bua mu mikuna, hinganai ne mabaya, ibakai nsubu eu; ne meme nensanke n andi ne nentumbishibuemu
Kumufila kudi muena mudimu bua amulambe lukasa

Kadi bua badi ne buowa, ne badi kabai ne ditabusha, ne bena tshikama, ne bashihianganyi, ne bena masandi, ne bena muhongo, ne batendeledi ba mpingu, ne bena mashimi bonso, luseke luabo neluikale mu dishiba didi ditema ne kahia ne soufre; didi lufu luibidi
Yeye wakajadika mutshima wandi bua kukebeye Nzambi mu matuku a Zekâya nguakamanya mua kujingulula bikena kumona bia Nzambi; musangu wonso wakadiye ukeba Yehowa, Nzambi wakamuvudishila diakalengele
Bualu bua tuetu katuakalonda nsumuinu yakambabo ku budimu bua bantu hatuakanumanyisha bua bukole ne bua dilua bia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto, kadi tuetu tuakadi bamonyi ba butumbi buandi ku mesu etu
Nealambule kabidi ne mukoku wa tshimpanga bua mulambu wa bobumue, pamue ne tshisaka tshia mikata kayiyi miela buanga bua mampa

Kadi yeye udi Muena Yuda bua malu adi munda muandi; ne ditengula didi dia mu mutshima didi mu nyuma, kadiena mu mikenshi mifunda; udi ne butumbi buandi kabui bufuma kudi bantu, kadi budi bufuma kudi Nzambi
Yeye wakamba ne, Ungambila difutu diebe, nenkufutedi
Buloba buakadi talalâ bidimu makumi anai
Dimukai, nutabale bimpe, nutendelele Nzambi; bua kanuena bamanye dituku adi haluadi

Mu diba adi mene minu ya tshianza tshia muntu yakamueneka, yakafunda ha tshimanu tshia mbalasa wa mukelenge, tshiakadi tshilaba luhemba, tshitangilangane ne tshitekelu tshia minda; mukelenge wakatangila tshituha tshia tshianza tshiakadi tshifundahu
Uteke tshioshelu tshia or tshia musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kua mushete, ukudike tshilulu ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Munyi kabakutangila muntu mukuabo muhingane bua kutumbisha Nzambi, anu muntu eu wa bende
Wakamuebesha ne, Netuyile nshila kai

Nuenu nutumikile mei andi ne mikenji yandi, bu munakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne disanka ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima, ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu ha buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha tshiendelele
Nunku bakabanga kumubikila dituku adi ne, Yelubâla, bamba ne, Bala amuluishe bualu bua yeye wakasungula tshioshelu tshiandi
Kuvudi tatu ebe anyi mamu ebe bilulu, yeye udi mamu webe, kumuvudi bilulu
Shaula wakakonka Yehowa lungenyi, kadi Yehowa kakamuitaba, nansha mu tshilota nansha ku Ulima, nansha kudi baprofete
Mose wakolola tshianza tshiandi mulu ne midima mikole be yakadi mu buloba bua Ejipitu to matuku asatu
Kadi meme nganyi ne bantu banyi mbanganyi, bua tuetu tuakadifidila bintu bietu nunku
Yudasa Isakaliote wa mu bayidi dikumi ne babidi wakaya kudi bakuidi banene ba Nzambi bua kumufila kudibo
Kanukunyi biakudia, kanunowi biakudia bidi bidimenene bia tshidimu tshishale, kanupodi tumuma tua mvinyo tua ku mionji inuvua kanuyi basole
Bakashalamu musangu mule ne bayidi
Ku luseke lua Gada lua ku sude mukalu ubange ku Tama uye tô ne ku mai a Melebota kadeshe, ku kasulu ka Ejipitu, tô ne ku Mai Manene
Ndelanganyi ya Dedane ivua nunku: Bena Ashure, bena Letushe, ne bena Leyume
Nanku kanuenji bibi to
Wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa bu muakenza Davidi, nkambua wandi
Mpindiewu bangayi luendu tshiakabidi
Ne mukashi uwakatangila udi musoko munene udi ukokesha ku mutu kua bakelenge ba ha buloba
Nebakose tshilumbu tshiebe bu mudi bienzedi biebe ne midimu yebe

Bikalaku mushikankunde utshidi kamama, udi mubangila kudi mulume, ne muntu mukuabo udi usangakena n andi mu musoko, udi ulala n andi; hashishe nebalue n abo bubidi buabo ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko au, nenubakume ne mabue tô ne hafuabo; mushikankunde, bualu bua yeye kakadila hakadiye mu musoko, ne mulume, bualu bua yeye wakanyanga mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu

Matthew Hakafikabo ha buihi ne Yelushalema ku Bete fage, ku Mukuna wa Oleve, Yesu wakatuma bayidi bandi babidi, wakabambila ne, Yai mu musoko udi buludiludi bunudi batangile, nenumone nyama wa mpunda musuika ne muan andi

Hashishe, Yona wakahatuka mu musoko, wakashikama mu muaba wakadi mutangilangane ne musoko ku luseke lua esete ne wakadibakilaku tshitandatanda, wakadi mushikame muinshi mua dileshi diatshi bua kumoneye ne malu kai akuata musoko
Bantu banene bakaha bantu ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bintu biakasuabo mu mitshima yabo
Yeye udi uhesha mukelenge wandi luhandu lunene, yeye udi ulesha wakeleye manyi ha mutu luse lujalame, kudi Davidi ne kudi tunkanuniuna tuandi tshiendelele
Hashishe Sedekiya, muana wa Kenana, wakasemena ha buihi, wakataha Mikaya dilu ku ditama diandi, wakamuebesha ne, Nyuma wa Yehowa wakaya mu nshila kai hakafumeye kundi bua kukuambila dî
Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa bukula bana balume ba Alona nebaufile ku mesu kua Yehowa ku mpala kua tshioshelu
Bualu bua tuetu katuena bu ba bungi badi banyanga dî dia Nzambi
Bakabangila kukeba ku muan a bute to ne ku muan a mukala, bakasangana luhanza mu tshibombi tshia Benyamina
Kabidi kikadi ne biuma bia bungi to

Mbalanda watshi wakatangilangana ne tshiendelu tshia ntempelo tshia mu lubanza; bifuanyikishi bia mabue a ngashi biakadi ha biluwa biatshi ku luseke elu ne ku luseke lukuabo, ne tshibandilu tshiatshi tshiakadi ne bidiatshilu muanda mukulu
Nunku yeye wakalua kudi Simona Petelo

MUTU WA MUKANDA WA KUMPALA I : BULONGOLODI BWA MU KABUJIMA Tshitupa Tshia kumpala : Bidi bitangila Mbulamatadi ne Didikookesha Njila wa kumpala : Bidi bitangila Mbulamatadi Kanungu ka kumpala Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi, anu mu mikalu yadi ya mu dia a kashipunkenza ayi, Mbulamatadi wa mêyi ne mikandu, mudikadile, mudikookesha, musangisha ne kayi kwabanya, udi utangila majinga a bantu, wa mungalata ne kayi mutwa ku tshia tshisumbu tshia ditabwija nansha tshimwe

Samuele Lungenyi lua Ahitofele ne Hushai Ahitofele wakambila Abashaloma ne, Witabushe bua meme nsungule bantu binunu dikumi ne bibidi, nenjuke butuku ebu mene bua kulonda Davidi; nemmuhete hatshidiye muhungile ne mutekete, nemmutshinyishe; bantu bonso badi n andi nebanyeme, Nenshihe anu mukelenge nkayandi, nempingishe bantu bonso kûdi wewe
Nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, ne bantu bandi bonso mu tshianza tshietu kabidi; tuakabashiha, nansha muntu umue wakashala
Yeye kakuntuma kudi bantu badi bashikame ha mutu ha lumbu, bua bobo hadie tunvi tuabo, banue menyi abo diatshimue n enu, anyi

Ambila ba mu buloba ebu ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba bua badi bashikame mu Yelushalema mu buloba bua Isalele ne, Nebadie bidia biabo ne kuhampakana, nebanue mai abo ne tutshina; bua buloba buabo nebuikale tshikulu, nebuhaudibue ne bintu bionso bidimu, bualu bua ditomboka dia bantu bonso badi bashikamemu
Bantu hakahingana, bakamanyisha mukelenge

Yeye wakidika Simona ne, Petelo; ne Yakobo muana wa Zebedayo ne Yone muan abo ne Yakobo, yeye wakabidika ne, Boanêge, kukudimuna kua muaku ne, Bana ba mukungulu wa nvula; ne Andele, ne Filipo, ne Bâtolomayo, ne Matayo, ne Toma, ne Yakobo muana wa Alafayo, ne Tadaya, ne Simona Muena Kananayo, ne Yudasa Isakaliote, wakamutungila tshitungu
Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Umusha bisabata ku makasa, bualu bua muaba ûdi muimane udi buloba bua tshijila
Hakadiye umusengelela ne mei andi ku dituku ku dituku, wakamutatshisha, mutshima wandi wakatata tô ne ku lufu
Abashaloma wakaya kudi mukelenge, wakamuambila ne, Mona, muntu webe udi ne bakoshi ba miosa ya mikoko, ndi nkusengelela ne, Mukelenge ne bantu bandi baye ne muntu wandi
Nenuikale ne bintu bipite bungi: ntete ya kuenza bukula, mvinyo, mafuta, ngombe, mikoku ne mbuji

Â adi mena a bena nvita ba bukitu bakadi n abo Davidi: Yoshebashebeta, Muena Takemona, wakadi ku mutu kua tupitene tuonso; dina diandi dikuabo Adino, Muena Esene, wakela bantu nkama muanda mukulu difuma diandi, wakabashiha tshikondo tshimue
Bua Benyamina yeye wakamba ne, Munangi wa Yehowa neashikame n andi talalâ, utu wamubuikila matuku onso, udi ushikama hankatshi ha makaya andi
Yesu wakabakudimuna dî ne, Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Muana kena mumanye mua kudienzela bualu, utu wenza anu budiye umona Tatu wandi wenza; malu onso adi Tatu wenza Muana utu wênza muomumue
Bualu bua meme nakadi mutuadi wa luhanza lua mukelenge
Bantu ba bende nebadisangishe n abo, nebadilamike kudi ba mu bana ba Yakoba
Bakuabo nebababikile ne, Buloba bua bubi, ne Bantu badi Yehowa n abo tshiji tshiendelele
Biaheta muntu buloba buonso, ne bua bualu ebu udi udijimisha anyi udi unyanga muoyo wandi, mushinga wandi muimpe udi hanyi
Hilekiya ne Zekâya ne Yehiele, bakokeshi ba nsubu wa Nzambi, bakaha bakuidi milambu ya kufila: mikoko binunu bibidi ne nkama isambombo ne ngombe nkama isatu
Aboye butu budi pa tshilambuilu, anji kubuteka panshi ku luseke lua tshilambuilu
Bakambila Samuele ne, Shaula wakalua ku Kâmele, ne mona, wakimanyikaku dibue dia tshivulukidi, wakatshunguluka, wakalota, wakaya ku Gilegala
Hakambeye nunku, wakangata mutanda wa bidia, wakasakidila Nzambi ku mesu kua buonso buabo, wakautshibula, wakabanga kudia
Kadi uhidie dikonkangana dia malu mahote ne a badi kabai bayishibua, Umanye ne adi alela matandu

Nudi bamanye ne, Tshiakatshina bua kunuambila malu onso akamanya mua kunukuatshisha ne bua kunuyisha hadi bantu bunguile, ne ku nsubu ne ku nsubu, ngambila Bena Yuda ne Bena Gelika bua kukudimunabo mitshima kudi Nzambi ne bua kuitabushabo Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto
Nebakufuishe bundu bua masandi ebe, malu ebe a tshikama ne a masandi mene

Bualu bua muntu udi ne tshilema kena mua kulua ha buihi muntu mufofo anyi tshibombo anyi muntu udi ne diulu dibatama anyi tshioka tshitambe bule, anyi muntu udi ne dikasa ditshibuka anyi udi ne tshianza tshitshibuka anyi muntu udi ne nyima mutuntamana anyi muntu mushunguke anyi udi ne disu disama anyi udi ne mpusu anyi udi ne bilamulamu anyi udi ne mihesa yandi mitshibuke, muntu wa munkatshi mua bana ba Alona muakuidi udi ne bintu ebi ham bidi handi kena mua kulua ha buihi bua kulaleye mulambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, yeye udi ne tshitema, kena mua kudia mulambu kudi Yehowa
Nunku Apolo udi bu tshinyi
Hashishe, Yesu wakabambila ne, Kanutshinyi; yai bienu, nuambile bana betu ne, Yai mu Galela, nenunmoneku
Tshiole tshiakadi ku nseke yonso ya buloba, ne Yosefe wakunzulula bibi bia mayeba onso, wakamanyisha Bena Ejipitu, tshiole tshiakatamba bukole mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Hakadisangishabo hohamue, Pilato wakabakonka ne, Nudi basue meme nulekelele nganyi
Bobo bakelangana meshi munda munda ne, Bituamba ne, Mu diulu, yeye neatuebeshe ne, Bualu kai kanuakamuitabusha
Bakamukudimuna ne, Bu muntu eu kai muenze bualu bubi, katuakadi kumufila mu bianza biebe
Buloba buakashiyabo nebuikale ne bidimu bia kubanda, nebuikale hatuhu; bobo nebitabushe dikenga dia mibi yabo bualu bua bobo bakahidia mei anyi, ne mitshima yabo yakalengulula mikenji yanyi
Bakuidi banene ba Nzambi ne bafundi bakakeba mua kumushiha, bua bobo bakadi batshina bantu

Lehabama wakadi ne bidimu makumi anai ne tshimue hakabangeye kukokesha, yeye wakakokesha bidimu dikumi ne muanda mutekete mu Yelushalema, musoko wakasungula Yehowa munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele bua kutekamu dina diandi; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Nâma, Muena Amona
Hakambeye dî edi, wakabalesha bianza biandi ne lubadi luandi
Kadi nsubu ya mu misoko idi kayiyi minyungulula ne lumbu neyikale ne madimi, nudi mua kuyihikula, ne bena nsubu nebahingane halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene
Kushipabu kabidi ne Amore ne muanende Shekeme, kuangata muanabu wa bakaji Dina uvua kudi Shekeme, kuya nende
Kabena balumbuluisha wamuitabusha, kadi bakumana kulumbuluisha wahidia kuitabusha, bualu bua kakitabusha dina dia Muana umuehele mulela wa Nzambi

Ezela Ntempelo udi Muashibue Tshiakabidi Nunku baprofete Hagai ne Zekâya, muana wa Ido, bakambila Bena Yuda bakadi mu Yuda ne mu Yelushalema dî dia Nzambi; bakabambila dî mu dina dia Nzambi wa Isalele
Kubishaye ne munyinyi wa nyama uvua mushale pa tshilambuilu
Hakafikeye ku mbelu kua tshibi tshia Benyamina, kahita ka bansentedi kakadiku, dina diandi Iliya, muana wa Shelemeya, muana wa Hananya
Yeye wakamba ne, Wele mukenshi wa bana banyi aba babidi kushikamabo, mukuabo ku tshianza tshiebe tshia balume, mukuabo ku tshianza tshiebe tshia bakashi, mu bukelenge buebe
Bana ba Binui nkama isambombo ne makumi anai ne muanda mukulu
Nuele muoyo kudi bana betu ba mu Kilisto ba mu Laodikiya, ne kudi Numpa ne bena ekelesia ba mu nsubu wandi
Hakatangila Bena Peleshete ne, Tshilobo tshietu tshiakadia, bakanyema
Tshibangidilu Mvidi Mukulu udi musue kubutula bantu Pavua bantu batuadija kuvulangana pa buloba, kulelabu bana ba bakaji
Yeye wakosha mifuba ya bakuidi ha bioshelu biabo, wakalengesha Yuda ne Yelushalema
Kanuvuadi bilamba bitela ne manda a mishindu ibidi mishilangane
Kadi pikalabu balombe muena ngombe tshibawu bua adipikule pa mutu pa kufuaye, nanku neafile bintu bionsu bidibu bamulombe
Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Wangitabusha nenze biandi kabidi malu antshidi ngenza; nenze biandi malu adi mahite andi ngenza, bualu bua meme ndi nya kudi Tatu

Washiha mukenshi umue wa mu mikenshi ei idi mitambe butekete, ne wayisha bantu bakuabo nunku, nebamuidike ne, Mutambe bukese mu bukelenge bua mu diulu; kadi wayenza, ne wayisha bantu bakuabo nunku, nebamuidike ne, Munene mu bukelenge bua mu diulu
Uvua muambule mukajende ne bana bende pa nyama wa mpunde
Nanku meme nemfikishe bena Izrayele mu ditunga didi ne biakudia bia bungi, dimvua mulaye bankambua babu, bua badie batshionkomoka
Solomo kabidi udi ushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge
Nzambi udi uvuisha tshishi udi mubi, anyi
Ba munkatshi mua Bena Nafatale bakadi tupitene tshinunu, ne bantu binunu makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete bambudi ba ngabu ne mafuma
Muena mudimu wa Shaula wakadiku dituku adi, mukandibue ku mesu kua Yehowa, dina diandi Doege, Muena Edome, kahita ka balami ba mikoko ya Shaula
Bualu bua mikenshi nakamana kufua ku mikenshi, bua meme ngikale ne muoyo kudi Nzambi
Pikala bena tshimenga atshi bitabe, banunzuluile biibi bia tshimenga, nebanukuatshile mudimu
Kuluanganabu ne bena Izrayele, kubatshimuna, kubipata too ne ku Orma

Hakadiye ubayisha, wakabambila ne, Nudimukile bafundi, bobo badi basue kuendakana baluate bikowelu bile, badi basue bantu babasekelele mu bisalu, badi basue nkuasa minene mu nsunagoga, badi basue miaba minene hayabo ku bidia bia disanka; bobo kabidi batu banyenga nsubu ya bakashi ba mu lufuila; batu batendelela Nzambi musangu mule anu bualu bua lubombo luabo; kuhila kuabo nekutambe bunene

Kadi Muena Samalea wakadi ulua mu nshila, wakalua kudiye; hakamumoneye, luse luakamukuata, wakalua kudiye, wakamujingila tshilulu ha mputa, wakelabu manyi ne nvinyo; wakamushikika ha nyima ha nyama wandi, wakalua n andi ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, wakamulama bimpe
Hashishe Yoaba wakalekela kulonda Bena Amona, wakahingana ku Yelushalema
Bakabatahulula ku nshobo ku mudimu ne ku mudimu; bualu bua bakadi ne tuhita tua mu muaba wa tshijila ne tua Nzambi tua munkatshi mua bana ba Eleazâ ne tua Itamâ kabidi

Nenufile milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa, muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, bintu bisatu bia dikumi ku muana wa ngombe, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko tô ne ku bana ba mikoko muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ha mutu ha milambu idibo bosha babala ngondo, ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua, bu mudi mukenji wamba, milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Kadi pikala mukaji musela mulaye, nansha muditshipe, bayende kayi mubenge dituku didiye ubumanya, mukaji udi ne bua kukumbaja bionsu bidiye mulaye

Bualu bua yeye wakakokesha bantu bonso dishiya dia munemu dia musulu wa Pelata ku Tifesa tô ne ku Gaza; wakadi ku mutu kua bakelenge bonso ba dishiya dia munemu dia musulu wa Pelata; yeye wakadi ne ditalala ku nseke yonso yakadi nunyunguluke

Mu bidimu bimpe muanda mutekete buloba buakalua ne bintu bia bungi, mafuka mafuka Yeye wakasangisha bintu bia kudia bionso bia mu bidimu abi muanda mutekete bia mu Ejipitu, wakabiteka mu bimenga, bintu bia kudia biakadiunda mu madimi a ha matshika a musoko, wakabiteka mu musoko au

Muanjelo wa muanda mutekete wakela mpungi; ne mei makole a mu diulu akalua, amba ne, Ne bakulu makumi abidi ne banai, badi bashikama ku mpala kua Nzambi ha nkuasa yabo ya butumbi, bakahona ba mpala habo, bakatendelela Nzambi, bamba ne, Ne ba mu bisamba bakadi ne tshishi, ne tshishi tshiebe tshiakalua, ne tshikondo tshia kulumbuluisha bafue tshiakalua, ne tshikondo tshia kufila bukenshi kudi bahika bebe, baprofete, ne kudi basanto, ne kudi badi batshina dina diebe, bakese ne banene; ne tshia kubutula badi babutula buloba
Muntu wakihata mbushi wa Azazele neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neowe mai, ne ku nyima yeye neuhingane mu tshitudilu
Wewe wakashiha Uliya, Muena Hiti, ku muele wa nvita, wakangata mukashi wandi bu mukashi webe, wakamushiha ku muele wa nvita wa bana ba Amona
Zechariah Wakandesha Yoshua muakuidi munene muimane ku mpala kua muanjelo wa Yehowa, ne Satana muimane ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume bua kumudingila malu
Biwenza malu â, udimueneshe kudi ba ha buloba

Bakafila milambu kudi Yehowa; bakafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa, ne lunkelu kabidi bakafila tshinunu tshia balume ba ngombe ne tshinunu tshia bimpanga ne tshinunu tshia bana ba mikoko ne milambu idibo banua; Bena Isalele bonso bakafila milambu ya bungi; bakadia, bakanua ku mpala kua Yehowa dituku adi ne disanka dinene
Davidi wakakonka Yehowa ne, Nenye bua kushiha Bena Peleshete aba, anyi
Wewe udi muhumbakasha kudi mukashi, anyi
Bobo bakelangana meshi munda munda ne, Bituamba ne, Mu diulu, yeye neatuebeshe ne, Munyi kanuakamuitabusha
Yeye neangate kudi Bena Isalele mpumbu ya mbushi ibidi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne tshimpanga tshimue tshia mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Uvuluke matuku a lumingu, wakale ne ditshina mu nsubu wanyi meme ndi Yehowa
Moshe kuela ndelanganyi ya bena Yuda lupemba, wamba ne: Maweja Nangila, bena Yuda badi bakubikila, ubateleje
Mpunde wa Balaame Mvidi Mukulu kufikila Balaame munda bua luendu alu

Hakafika Gideona kudibo, wakasangana muntu wakadi wawila mukuabo tshilota tshiandi; yeye wakamuambila ne, Nakalota tshilota, nakatangila mutanda wa bidia bia orge wenda ubunguluka mu tshitudilu tshia Midiyana, wakadikuma ku ntenta, ntenta wakuhuka, wakatua mutu muinshi, wakabataha
Yeye udi wimana anyi udi uhona bua mukelenge wandi mene

Hakalamuneye tshimanyishilu tshitanu, nakatangila munshi mua tshioshelu mioyo ya bantu bakashihibua bua dî dia Nzambi, ne bua bumanyishi buakadibo n abu; ne bakadila ne dî dikole, bamba ne, O Mukelenge wa tshijila ne mulelela, udi windisha musangu bule munyi bua kulumbuluisha ne bua kutusombuela bua mashi etu kudi badi bikala ha buloba
Ambila kabidi bena Izrayele ne: Nudilongolole bua dituku dia maloba, numushe mikiya
Ke bualu budi butambe nunku ne, Hantshidi tubingishibua mpindiu ku mashi andi, netusungidibue ku tshishi tshia Nzambi kudiye

Ku mukalu wa Yuda ku luseke lua esete tô ne ku luseke lua wesete kuikale muaba wa tshijila unudi nujidila Yehowa; butshiama buau buikale coudées binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu, bule buau buikale muomumue ne bule bua buhianyi bua tshinga tshisamba ku luseke lua esete to ne ku luseke lua wesete; ne tshitendelelu tshikale munkatshi muau
Wewe udi muena lubombo, diambedi umushe mutshi mimene udi mu disu diebe, nunku neumone mua kûmusha kasosa kadi mu disu dia muan enu
Bualu nudi bana ba Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Bianudinga muntu ne mei a mashimi, wamba ne, Bulelela, nensangishe bana benu bonso, Yakoba; Muhandi wa lumbu neadianjile ku mpala kuabo; Micah Nakamba kabidi ne, Nuenu nudi ne buimpe lukuna ne nudi nunanga bubi; nudi nudia munyinyi wa bantu banyi, Hashishe, nebadile kudi Yehowa, Yehowa udi wamba dî edi bualu bua baprofete Nunku butuku nebunuidile, kanuyi numona kabidi bikena kumona, Bamonyi ba malu nebatatakane, Kadi meme hanyi, ndi mule tente ne bukole Ndi nnusengelela bua nunvue bienu muanda eu, Badi bibaka Siona ne mashi, Badi ha mutu ha musoko budi balumbulula bilumbu anu bua mbueshilu, Nunku bua bualu buenu nebabundulule Siona ne lukasu Micah Mu matuku alualua mukuna wa nsubu wa Yehowa Ba mu bisamba bia bungi bia bantu nebalue, nebambe ne, Yeye nealumbulule bilumbu bu munkatshi mua bantu bu bungi, Kadi nebashikame, mu ntu ne muntu, muinshi mua muonshi wandi wa tumuma tua nvinyo Bualu bua ba mu bisamba bionso batshidi benda Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nenyishe badi benda bazobele difuka dia tshisamba, Wewe, tshibumba tshia balami ba mikoko yanyi, Bualu kai udi ubandisha mei ebe a muadi mpindiu
Nanku, bayende kena ne bualu to

Bualu bua muenyi udi kayi wa munkatshi mua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, hafumeye ku buloba budi kule bua dina diebe dinene ne bua tshianza tshiebe tshikole ne bua diboko diebe diolola, halueye kutendelela ku nsubu eu, unvue biebe mu muaba webe mu diulu, witabushe malu onso adi muenyi eu ukulomba; bua bantu bonso ba ha buloba bamanye dina diebe, bakutshine, bu mudi bantu bebe Bena Isalele; bamanye kabidi ne nsubu eu unakukuibakila udi ubikidibua dina diebe
Shaula ne muan andi wa balume Yonatana ne bantu hakadibo n abo bakashala mu Geba wa mu buloba bua Benyamina; kadi Bena Peleshete bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo mu Mikemasha
Ha mukuna eu yeye neumushe tshilulu tshikudika tshidi tshibuikila ha mitu ya bantu bonso, ne tshibuikilu tshidi tshiadisha ha mutu ha bisamba bionso

Wewe wakuhila bua mashi awakumatshisha hanshi, wakunyanguka bua mpingu yebe iwakusonga; wakusemesha dituku dia kubutuka kuebe ha buihi, wakukumbasha bidimu bia meme kukubadila malu mabi ebe; nunku nakukuvuisha tshintu tshidibo bahenda kudi bisamba bia bantu, ne tshidibo baseka kudi ba mu maloba mikuabo onso
Hashishe Solomo wakaya ku muelelu wa mai manene ku Esione gebê, ne ku Elota mu buloba bua Edome
Yesu wakamba ne, Nengikale n enu tshituha tshihi, hashishe nenye kudi wakuntuma
Dikuata dia bantu Pikala muena Izrayele mukuate muanabu, mumulame bu mupika, nansha mumupane, mbimpe kushipa mukuatshianganyi awu
Bualu ebu buwakenza kabuena buakane
Hakumuka bakuidi bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, hakadiatabo makasa abo ha buloba bume, hashishe mai a Yadene akahingana mu muaba wau, aka tua ku muelelu bu diambedi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, mu matuku atshidi alua, nensampishile Davidi Lutonga luakane; yeye neakokeshe bu mukelenge, nealeshe bakuabo meji makane, neajadike kulumbulula kuimpe ne buakane mu buloba
Bena Lewi honso ba mu musoko wa tshijila bakadi nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mukulu ne banai

Beena Bukalenga bwa polovensa badi mwa kubumbusha ku mudimu mu tshibûngi anyi ku muntu ku muntu pa nkayenda, pikala dilomba dia ditangilula anyi dia didiombola difila kudi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa ditabijibwe

Azô; Azô wakalela Sadoka; Sadoka wakalela Akimi; Akimi wakalela Eliyuda; Eliyuda wakalela Eleazâ; Eleazâ wakalela Matana; Matana wakalela Yakoba; Yakoba wakalela Yosefe bayandi wa Malia muledi wa Yesu, udibo babikila ne, Kilisto
Ne mikenshi kayena ku ditabusha, kadi, Wayenza neikale ne muoyo bua bualu buai
Kadi hakaheta Bena Isalele bukole, bakalambuisha Bena Kanâna mulambu wa mudimu, kabakabihata mene
Katataka nenkuambile dî dia bushuwa
Kadi nakunvua lumu luebe ne, wewe udi mua kujingulula bantu malu a nunku ne kuitaba makonka makole
Yalobama wakadi muimane ku tshioshelu bua kuosheye musenga wa manananshi
Matthew Hashishe Nyuma wa Nzambi wakalombola Yesu mu tshihela bua diabolo amuteye

Nengambule maboko a mukelenge wa Babulona mulu, kadi maboko a Palô nealembelele hanshi; nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa hanateka muele wanyi wa nvita mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Babulona, ne hawololeye ha buloba bua Ejipitu
Pashishe mutuangaji neangate nyunyi udi mushale ne muoyi, mitshi ya sedre, bilamba bienza ne miosa ya nyama bilaba kakula, ne mabeji a mutshi wa isope
Exodus Wewe newenze tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi ne mutshi wa acacia
Kadi yeye kakitabusha, wakamuambila ne, Uye biebe kuebe kudi balunda bebe, ubamanyishe malu manene akukuenzela Mukelenge ne luse luakukufueye
Bantu bakela mbila ne, Ndi dia nzambi, kandia muntu
Pashishe Noba kunyenga tshimenga tshia bena Kenate, ne misoku yonsu ivua pabuipi natshi

Samuele, Mulumbuluishi wa Bena Isalele Samuele wakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Binuasua kuhingana kudi Yehowa ne mitshima yenu yonso, nunku numushe nzambi ya bende ne ya Bashela munkatshi muenu, kudimunai mitshima yenu kudi Yehowa, numukuatshile yeye nkayandi mudimu; ne yeye neanusungile mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Hakunvua kapitene dî edi, wakaya kudi kamanda, wakamuambila ne, Udi wamba kuenza tshinyi
Shaula wakamba ne, Nzambi wakamufila mu tshianza tshianyi; bualu bua yeye wakabuela mu musoko udi ne bibi bidi bibaka bikole
Hashishe, Danyele, udibo babikila ne, Beleteshasâ, wakadi ne mutshima muhandike tô tshituha tshia diba, ne meji andi akamutatshisha

Mukelenge wa Isalele wakakudimuna Yehoshafata ne, Muprofete mukuabo udiku; kadi ndi n andi lukuna, bualu bua yeye katu wamba malu mimpe bualu buanyi, anu malu mabi; yeye mene udi Mikaya, muana wa Yimela
Pashishe nenkuele lupemba kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, tshiyi muanji kunushiya
Eleazâ, muana wa balume wa Alona, wakabaka umue wa bana ba bakashi ba Putiele, yeye wakamulelela Pinehasa
Bienza Muena Isalele bualu bubi ku mpukahuka budi Yehowa uhidia ne biahileye, ne hamanyeye bualu bubi buakenzeye, yeye neafile mukashi wa mbushi udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wa bubi buakenzeye
Kadi pikala mulume, matuku mamane kupita, umona ne: mukaji katshiena kabidi unsankisha, nansha undengelela, udi mua kumulekela, bua aye kudiye musue
Nuenu nenutahulule buloba bituha bituha muanda mutekete, nenungambile bu munuakenza; meme nennuelele nshobo ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu
Bakumuka mu Bimuna, bakashikama mu Oboto
Wakadila tshinyi kunoko

Numanye bienu lelu ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi uya ku mpala kuenu udi bu kahia kadi kabutula bionso; yeye nembashihe, neabahoneshe ku mpala kuenu: nunku nenubihate, nembajimishe lubilu, bu muakanuambila Yehowa
Kadi nakumusha tshianza tshianyi kudibo, nakabenzela malu â bua dina dianyi kadihendibu ku mesu kua ba mu bisamba bia bantu bakantangila hanakahatula Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu
Kadi nuenu nuikale ne bukole, kanutekeshi maboko enu; bualu bua nebanufute ku midimu yenu
Bakuabo bakamuteta munda, bakamulomba tshimanyinu tshia mu diulu
Katuena ne bukole bua kudia ne bua kunua, anyi
Mose wakaluhuka, wakambila bantu mei a Yehowa, wakasangisha balume makumi muanda mutekete ba bakulu ba bantu, wakabanyungulusha Ntenta
Bakumuka mu Lefidima bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Yeye neahatule dibue dia ku musonga wa nsubu helabo mbila ne, Diakalengele, diakalengele dikale kudidi

Meme nakenza midimu minene; nakadiashila nsuhu; nakakuna mionshi ya tumuma tua nvinyo; nakadilongoluela bibundu ne miaba ya biendelu; nakakunamu mitshi ya mamuma ya mishindu yonso; nakadiumbuila mena a mai bua kusunabo mai a kumiamina mitshi inakakuna; nakasumba bahika balume ne bahika bakashi; nakadi ne bana ba bahika baledibue mu nsubu muanyi; nakadi ne bimuna bia bungi, ngombe ne mikoko, bihite bia bonso bakadi ku mpala kuanyi mu Yelushalema
Numpeshe muaba, muenu munu, wa kujika muena kuanyi
Batuangaji nebaleje muntu yonsu tshintu tshidiye mua kuambula

Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Nenkumbashe matuku a kulela bana, Buonso buenu badi bamunange, Bua nuamue mabele a kunusamba kuandi, Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba dî edi ne, Bu mudi muntu udi mamu andi usamba, Nenumone malu â, ne mitshima yenu neyisanke; Bua, monai, Yehowa nealue mu kahia, Bualu bua Yehowa neashikishe dikosa diandi dia bilumbu ne kahia, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Badi badidila ne badi badilengesha bua kubuelabo mu bibidi bua kutendelela, balonda muntu wa munkatshi muabo, badia munyinyi wa ngulube, wa tshintu tshibi ne wa kahuku, nebalue ku nshikidilu wabo hohamue
; Kul

Bikala muntu ne tshima mu dikoba, ne bikala tshima tshiondahibue, ne bikala muaba watshi mutoke tô, anyi ditoba ditoke, nunku yeye neadileshe kudi muakuidi, muakuidi neatangile, ne bielanganeye meji ne disama diakabuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, ne miosa idi miandamuke mitoke tô, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi diakamueneka mu tshima
Nudi bamanye mua kunua luhanza lundi nua, anyi
Bakangata Abashaloma, bakamuha mu lubuebue lunene luakadi muitu, bakamungushila mushiki munene wa mabue; Bena Isalele bonso bakanyema muntu ne muntu ku ntenta wandi
Bua bualu ebu nakanutumina Timote, udi muana wanyi munanga ne wa kueyemena mu Mukelenge; yeye neanuvuluishe bua bienzedi bianyi bia mu Kilisto, bu mundi nyisha bantu kuonso mu ekelesia yonso
Enza tshitekelu ne bintu ebi bionso ne ntalanta Udimuke biebe bua kuenza bintu bionso bu tshidikishilu tshinakukulesha mu mukuna
Nunku bakela nshobo, nshobo yakakuata Yona
Hashishe, bualu ebu busokoka buakasokolodibua kudi Danyele mu tshikena kumona butuku
Hashishe mukelenge Davidi wakatuma bantu bakamûmusha mu nsubu wa Makî, muana wa Amiele, wa mu Lo debâ

Nengumushe difuka dia buhianyi buanyi didi dishale, nendifile mu bianza bia bantu badi n adi lukuna; bobo nebalue bambudibue ne bahaudibue kudi bena lukuna bonso; bualu bua bobo bakuenza malu mabi ku mesu kuanyi, bakunfuisha tshiji ku difuku dinakafuma ne bankambua babo mu Ejipitu tô ne ku dituku edi

Nunku hafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu, ne hanuaheta dikisha mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana, hashishe nenujimishe tshivulukidi tshia Amaleka muinshi mua diulu; kanuhu muoyo bua bualu ebu nansha
Bua katuena ne musoko kunoku udi wikalaku tshiendelele, kadi tudi tukeba musoko ulualua
Tupitene tua bantu nkama bantu nkama tuakenza bu muakadi dî dia Yehoyada, muakuidi wa Nzambi
Bantu bonsu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Dane badi
Wakamona mukashi muhele wa mu lufuila wela tukuta tubidi

Dî dindi ngamba, tshiena ndiamba bu dia Mukelenge mudingambile, kadi bu mu tshiakulakula, muditekemene mu kuditumbisha kuanyi, Bualu bua bantu ba bungi badi baditumbisha mu malu a mubidi, meme kabidi nenditumbishe
kabena babaha tshimanyinu tshikuabo anu tshia Yona
Kadi hakunvua Uliya lumu elu, wakatshina, wakanyemena ku Ejipitu
Yeye wakabambila ne, Bualu bua bukole bua mitshima yenu Mose wakitabusha bua nuenu numushe bakashi benu; kadi ku tshibangidilu kakuakadi nunku
Yeye kabidi wakaha bantu bonso ditabusha dia bualu ebu, bua yeye wakamubisha ku lufu
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Nansha tshintu; kadi anji kuitabusha bua meme kuya
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Wakujingulula bimpe
Bonsu kunua maluvu, kukuatshika
Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku disambombo
Bapostolo dikumi ne babidi bakabikila tshisumbu tshionso tshia bayidi, bakamba ne, Kambimpe bia tuetu kulekela dî dia Nzambi bua kuenza mudimu wa mesa
Au mmena a bana ba balume ba Alona Nadaba muan a bute ne Abihu ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ
Kadi wakavudisha masandi andi, uvuluka biandi matuku a bunsongakashi buandi, hakalondeye malu a masandi mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Mukelenge wa Isalele ne Yehoshafata, mukelenge wa Yuda, bakadi bashikame mu nkuasa yabo ya bukelenge, baluate bilulu bia bakelenge, ku mbelu kua tshibi tshia ku Samalea; baprofete bonso bakadi bamba mei ku mpala kuabo
Ku bana bavua Esawu mulele ne mukajende Oholibama, muana wa Ana, nkupatuke bamfumu basatu: ke Yewusha, Yalame ne Kora

Bulongolodi bwakane bwa Dîyi dikulu budi buleeja tshitupa tshia midimu tshipungila bukalenga buludiki bwa ku mutu ne polovensa, ne kabidi budi buleeja tshitupa tshidi makalenga abidi a Mbulamatadi aa afwilakana
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Yeye ulualua
Kadi udi ne mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Wakamukuata ku tshianza tshia balume, wakamubisha; makasa andi ne tuhombo biakakola lubilu
Bualu bukuabo, numuhatuile orge mikuabo mu bisumbu nuyishiye hanshi, bua yeye ayihumbulule, kanumukandi nansha
Hakunvua Davidi lumu elu, yeye wakatuma Yoaba ne masalayi andi onso a bukitu
Abidana, muana mulume wa Gideoni, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Benyamina
Nemukume, nemulekele

Kanungu ka Mapa a dikolesha ngenyi,bukookeshi bwa kufuka ngenyi ne bwa kufuka bintu mu lungenyi, ne bukookeshi bwa dikebulula dia mamanya ne dia bia kwenza nabi mudimu adi majadika, kadi anu mudineemeka dia mêyi a ditunga, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne dia bibidilu bia mulowu

Buakabuluibua Umue wa banjelo muanda mutekete bakadi ne mpanza muanda mutekete wakalua, wakakula n anyi, wamba ne, Lua biebe kunoku, nenkuleshe dilumbuluisha dia mukashi wa masandi munene udi ushikama ha mutu ha mai a bungi, udi bakelenge ba ha buloba benda n andi masandi, ne badi bikala ha buloba bakakuatshishibua ne nvinyo wa masandi andi
Pashishe nengenze nebe tshisamba tshikuabu, tshidi tshipite bena Izrayele ku bungi ne ku bukole
Uziya wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika hohamue ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi
bamanye mua kuitabusha anyi kuenza, bua tudi Bena Lomo
Kadi ndi ngambila batshidi bajike ne bakashi ba mu lufuila ne, Bidi bimpe biashalabo bu meme mene
Bua nuakabikidibua bua muanda eu, bualu bua Kilisto wakakenga bua bualu buenu, wakanushila tshileshilu bua nuenu numulonde mu makasa andi
Bakalua ne mushete wa Yehowa ne ntenta wa kusambakena ne bintu bia tshijila bionso biakadi mu Ntenta; bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bakatuala bintu ebi bionso

Timothy Paulo, mupostolo wa Kilisto Yesu bu mudi mukenshi wa Nzambi Musungidi wetu, ne wa Kilisto Yesu ditekemena dietu, kudi Timote, muan anyi wa bushua mu ditabusha: Ngasa, luse, ditalala bia kudi Nzambi Tatu ne kudi Kilisto Yesu Mukelenge wetu
Uteke tshiowelu hankatshi ha ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshioshelu tshia milambu, welemu mai
Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ikale n ebe
Yehowa wakankonka ne, Muana wa muntu, neulumbuluishe Ohola ne Oholiba, anyi
Nunku bakalekela mudimu wa nsubu wa Nzambi wa mu Yelushalema; bakalekela mudimu nunku tô ne ku tshidimu tshibidi tshia mu bukokeshi bua Dayawesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa
Hakasabukeye ku mpata, muntu wa mu musoko wakasangila n andi, wakadi ne bademon munda; tô musangu mule yeye kakadi uluata bilulu, kakadi ulala mu nsubu, anu mu majambu
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Kanuena nujingulula bimpe tô ne katataka, anyi

Hakatangila Yosefe ne tatu wandi wakatentekasha tshianza tshiandi tshia balume ha mutu ha Efelayima, bualu ebu kabuakamusankisha, ne yeye wakabisha tshianza tshia tatu wandi, wakamba kutshiumusha ku mutu wa Efelayima, wakamba kutshiteka ku mutu wa Manashe
Wewe newenze nkanu ya or ibidi, uteke nkanu ei ku nseke ibidi ya tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi

Yeye wakaha bonso bakamuitabusha bukole bua kuluabo bana ba Nzambi, bobo mene badi bitabusha dina diandi; bakadi kabai baledibue kudi mashi, anyi kudi disua dia mubidi, anyi kudi disungula dia muntu, kadi bakaledibua kudi Nzambi

Kadi bobo ne bankambua betu bakadisua, bakambula mpala yabo, kabakunvua mikenji yebe, bakabenga mua kuyitumikila, kabakelangana meji a malu a kukema awakenza munkatshi muabo; kadi bakambula mpala yabo; mu kutomboka kuabo bakadisunguila mulombodi wa kubahingisha mu buhika buabo
Bualu bua bu muakafuma mukashi kudi mulume, nunku mulume udi uledibua kudi mukashi; kadi bintu bionso bidi bifuma kudi Nzambi
Mukelenge wa Sodoma ne mukelenge wa Amole ne mukelenge wa Adema ne mukelenge wa Bena Seboi ne mukelenge wa Bela eu udi Soa bakaluhuka, bakaluangana n abo mu tshibanda tshia Sidima
Tuetu tudi bu benyi ku mesu kua tatu etu nansha
Kakuena muntu udi mua kujadika bishimikidi bikuabo, anu biobio biakamana kujadikibua, bidi Yesu Kilisto mene
mianda ya batshikuma mbila, tshisanji, televizio, matanda a bindidimbi;
Hashishe Yonatana wakamba ne, Tatu wanyi wakutatshisha buloba
Udi nkambua wa bena Ebere bonsu
Binuatombokela Yehowa lelu, makelela yeye neakuatshile tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele tshiji

Kadi Bena Yuda ba mu Shushana bakadisangisha hamue mu dituku dia dikumi ne asatu ne mu dituku dia dikumi ne anai kabidi; bakikisha mu dituku dia dikumi ne atanu, bakadisunguila dituku dia kudiabo bidia bia disanka ne musangelu
Ebelu Dinangangana dia bana babo ba ma Kilisto dikaleku
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama ibidi
Yesu wakamba ne, Nmeme; nenumone Muana wa muntu mushikame ku tshianza tshia balume tshia Bukole, ulua biandi ne matutu a mu diulu
Bakadia bidia bia disanka matuku muanda mutekete; dituku dia muanda mukulu diakadi dituku dinene dia disangisha, bu muakadi mukenji mujadike
Kadi mutuangaji umushe mafuta onsu a ngombe awu, awoshe pa tshilambuilu
Nanku ebi ke mikenji ne meyi ne malongesha, bivua Maweja Nangila mumanyishe Moshe pa mukuna wa Sinayi bua ambile bena Izrayele
Petelo wakamuandamuna ne, Wewe udi Kilisto
Wewe newenze malonga ne nkuta ne mpanza ne bihanza bia or mutambe buimpe
Hakunvua Bena Peleshete ne Bena Isalele bakadisangisha mu Misepa, bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete bakaya kuluisha Bena Isalele
Bana balume babidi ba Eli, bakuidi ba Yehowa, bakadiku mena abo Hofeni ne Pinehasa
Wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ha mutu ha mabaya, wakenza nkanu ya or ya kubueshamu mitshi, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ha mutu ha mitshi
Nakambila Yoshua ku tshikondo atshi ne, Mesu ebe akatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bakelenge aba babidi: Yehowa nênzele makelenge onso nunku a kunudi nuya
Mpindiu bantu kabena bamanye mua kumona munya udi ukenka mu diulu, Ku luseke lua nôde kudi kuhatuka dinkenka didi bu dia or
Yehowa kakukutuma nansha; kadi wewe udi wenzesha bantu aba bua kueyemenabo mei a mashimi
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi, anyi yeye neatekeshe mitshima ya bantu bakuabo
Mukumu wonso wa mulangala wa mulau udi Yehowa umukuma n au newikale ne tshiona tshia makasa ne nzenze; nealue kudibo ne diboko diela mulu, utshintshila bua kuluangana n abo

Yehowa wakamufila buloba buonso bua Gilada tô ne ku Dana, ne buloba buonso bua Nafatale, ne bua Efelayima ne Manashe ne buloba buonso bua Yuda tô ne ku mai manene a ku nyima, ne buloba bua ku Sude, ne mpata wa mu tshibanda tshia Yeleko, musoko wa mabue, tô ne ku Soâ
Tshiena mumanye mua kuenza ne bintu bianyi bu mundi musue, anyi

Ezekiel Wewe, muana wa muntu, udiule Gogo, umuambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Tangila, ndi n ebe tshilumbu, wewe Gogo, mukelenge wa Losha, Nenkuimanyike, nenkuendeshe ku bukole; nendue n ebe ku luseke lua kunfudilu kua nôde; nenkufikishe ha mikuna ya mu Isalele
Nunku badi babikila muaba au ne, Gilegala tô ne lelu
Nunku muomumue mu tshikondo etshi difuka dikese didiku bua disungula dia ngasa

Dibadika Mpungi ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Wenzeje mpungi ibidi ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole bua kubikila nayi bantu, nansha bua kubamanyisha diba didi tshiluilu tshionsu mua kubanga luendu
Bahika ba muena budimi bakalua, bakamukonka ne, Mukelenge, wewe kuakuela maminu mimpe mu budimi buebe, anyi
Bana bandi ba balume kabakamulonda mu makasa andi, kadi bakasesuka bualu bua lukuka lua biuma, ne bakangata bintu bia mbueshilu, bakandamusha kulumbulula kuakane
Bakadia bidia bia kuhita kua Yehowa mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia bukelenge bua Yoshiya, Lufu lua Yoshiya Bak
Katataka ndi nusengelela ne, Koleshai mitshima yenu, bualu bua muoyo wa muntu umue wa munkatshi muenu kawena ujimina, anu buatu
Bianuha Muana budishikaminyi, nenuikale badishikamine bulelela
Wewe ndaku, ufikishe bantu muaba umvua mukuambile, mutumibue wanyi neakulombole

Tangilai, ne biayau malulame mu nshila wa ku mukalu wau wa ku Bete shemeshe, nemmanye ne Nzambi wakatuenzela bualu ebu bubi; kadi biayau mu nshila mukuabo, nemmanye ne tshianza tshiandi katshiakatushiha, kadi bualu buakatukuata ku mpukahuka
Hashishe Yonatana wakamba ne, Tatu wanyi wakutatshisha buloba

Bikaleye mumukume ne tshiji, anyi bikaleye mumuele tshintu, hakadiye muale mu nshila, wakamushiha, anyi bikaleye mumukume ne tshianza tshiandi ne tshiji, mumushihe, nebashihe muntu wakamukuma, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu musombuedi neashihe mushihi wa muntu, hasangakeneye n andi
Bakashi bakangata hafue babo ku dibisha dia ku lufu; bakuabo bakashihibua ne mikumu, kabai bitabusha luhandu; bua bamanye mua kuangata dibisha dia ku lufu didi ditamba buimpe

Nunku bikondo bionso ku Abalahama tô ne ku Davidi bidi dikumi ne binai; ku Bayidi tô ne hakayabo n abo ku Babulona bidi dikumi ne binai; bakayabo n abo ku Babulona tô ne ku Kilisto bidi dikumi ne binai
Luka Mu matuku au Kaisa Augusto wakela mukenshi ne, Bafundishe mena a ba ha buloba bonso
Bakaya ku luendu luabo, ditshina dia Nzambi diakadi ku misoko yakadi ha buihi n abo, ne bena musoko kabakalonda bana ba balume ba Yakoba
Kanutshinyi ku mesu kuabo, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi munene udi uvuisha ditshina dikole
Nuvua bayilambule nyama, bayilambule maluvu a kunua
Hakahita matuku asatu, meme mumane kulela, mukashi eu wakalela muana kabidi; anu tuetu babidi bakadi mu nsubu, nansha muntu mukuabo wakadi n etu

Miloho yakahingana kudiye kabidi, yakamba ne, Bene hadada udi wamba ne, Nakatuma mukenji kûdi wamba ne, Bûdi n abu mbua kufila argent yebe ne or yebe ne bakashi bebe ne bana bebe kundi; kadi nentume bantu banyi kûdi makelela ha diba edi mene, bobo nebadikebele mu nsubu webe ne mu nsubu ya bantu bebe, hashishe bintu bionso bidi bimpe ku mesu kuebe bobo nebabiangate mu bianza biabo, nebaye n abi
Wakatuma mukenji kudi Yehoshafata, mukelenge wa Yuda, wamba ne, Mukelenge wa Moaba wakuntombokela, wewe neuye n anyi bua kuluangana ne Bena Moaba, anyi
Malenda ku bilamba Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu, nutele malenda ku mielelu ya bilamba bienu ne buanda bufikuluke

Balume aba bakatuma Mose bua kutentekelabo buloba, bakadi bahingana, bakadi batontoluesha bantu bonso kudiye, bualu bua bobo bakalua ne lumu lubi lua buloba, balume aba mene bakalua ne lumu tubi lua buloba bakafua ne disama dikole ku mpala kua Yehowa
Muana wakakuatshila Yehowa mudimu ku mesu kua Eli muakuidi
Kanutambakanyi ku nsubu ne ku nsubu
Neabuele kabidi mu buloba bulengele, neabutule binunu makumi a bantu; kadi ba mu Edome, ba mu Moaba ne tshituha tshinene tshia Bena Amona nebahanduke mu bianza biandi
Ndi nuambila ne, Bandulukai, numone madimi, adi matoke katataka bua kunowabo
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, meme, muntu webe nakadieyeka bu tshieya tshia nsongalume eu kudi tatu wanyi
Baluka wakabahingashila dî ne, Yeye wakangambila mei â onso mukana muandi, ne meme nakâfunda mu mukanda ne mai a mukanda
Ndi mulami muimpe wa mikoko; mulami muimpe udi ufuila mikoko
Tshibangidilu Yakobe udi usambakena ne Rakele Yakobe kutungunuka ne luendu, kuya ku ditunga dia kudi diba dipatukila
Bakamuitaba ne, E

Nunku ubambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu mundi meme ne muoyo, badi bashikame munkatshi mua bikulu abi nebashihibue ku muele wa nvita; nenfile badi bashala mu mpata kudi nyama bu bia kudia biai; badi mu miaha mikoleshibue ne mabue ne mu nyongolo nebafue ku tshihuhu
Bobo bakadi babadibua mu bikondo biabo mu misoko yabo bakadi bajidibua mu midimu yabo kudi Davidi ne Samuele, mumonyi wa malu
Muakuidi nealue munu wandi mu mashi makuabo a mulambu, nealabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia kahia, neahongolole mashi makuabo ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu tshia kahia
Nenku nulame mukenji ewu kashidi
Bena Bete shemeshe bakakonkangana ne, Nganyi udi mumanye mua kuimana ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wa tshijila

Bialenga muntu tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshibi, nansha mifuba ya nyama udi kayi muakane, nansha mifuba ya ngombe udi kayi muakane, nansha mifuba ya tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi tshidi katshiyi tshiakane, ne bikala bualu ebu busokoka ku mesu kuandi, yeye udi muntu wa bukoya, neahile
Hakatangila Bena Isalele ne, Abimeleke wakafua, bakaya muntu ku muaba wandi muntu ku muaba wandi
Nakusanka bikole mu Mukelenge bua mpindiu, musangu walehi, nuakasangisha meshi enu a bualu buanyi; bulelela, nuakadi nuela meshi a bualu buanyi, kadi kanuakadi ne tshikondo tshimpe
Bakabakuata, bakababuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu tô ne hakatshiabu, bualu bua diba diakamba kubuela
Wa kumudilu wakaya, wakahongolola luhanza luandi ha buloba; ne mputa mibi idi isamisha bantu yakakuata bakadi ne tshimanyinu tshia nyama wa luonji ne bakadi bakukuila tshifuanyikishi tshiandi
Muaba awu, ke uvuabu bateka mushete wa ndondu uvua ne mabue a mikenji
Nunku Davidi wakamutumina ba messager bua kumusamba bua lufu lua tatu wandi

Hashishe, nakunvua mukuabo wa tshijila wakula; muibidi wa tshijila wakakonka wakadi wakula diambedi ne, Kumusha kua mulambu wa kuosha wa buatshia buatshia, bualu bubi budi buvuisha kabutu, ne kufila kua tshitendelelu ne musumba wa mu diulu bua kudiatshibuabi muinshi mua makasa, malu â akamueneka mu tshikena kumona neikaleku musangu bule munyi
Bana benu ba balume bonso nebamueneke kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Nuikale ne meshi â munda muenu akadi kabidi munda mua Kilisto Yesu
Baluishi abu, nebanutshintshimike mu bimenga bionsu, bidi mu ditunga didi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupe
Nanku amu mutuangaji udi ukobolola muntu ke udi wangata munyinyi awu
Yesu wakabambila ne, Buonso buenu nenulenduke bua bualu buanyi butuku ebu: bua bakafunda ne, Nenshihe mulami wa mikoko, tshisumbu tshiai netshitangadike
Hakamuela demon hanshi munkatshi muabo, wakumuka munda muandi, kai mumuenzele bibi
Hashishe Hezikiya wakebesha bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bua bisumbu ebi
Yesu wakamba ne, Nsongalume, ndi nkuambila ne, Bika
Bantu ba Isaka bakimba dina mu tshibanda, bakasanganamu mushimi wa mai
Bana betu, katuena basue nuenu nuhange kumanya bua makenga akatukuata mu Asia, bu muakatamba bujitu kutunemena, buhita bukole buetu, tô ne hatuakamanya ne
Nanku kanuakufikisha bena Izrayele mu ditunga dingabapesha to
Nengambe tshinyi kabidi
Bakazola bifuanyikishi bia bakeluba ne mabue a ngashi ku bimanu bia tshitendelelu hanshi tô ne kulu; nunku bakalengesha bimanu bia ntempelo
Mu tshidimu tshibidi tshia bukelenge bua Peka, muana wa Lemalaya, mukelenge wa Isalele, Yotama, muana wa Uziya, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakabanga kukokesha
Bakabakengesha bakadi ne bukole, bobo kabakadi ne musambi
Nundambule kabidi milambu ya bobumue
Muntu mukuabo wakadiku kabidi, wakamba dî mu dina dia Yehowa, dina diandi Uliya, muana wa Shemaya wa ku Kîyata yalima
Ikale anu mushindu umue bua kuenza matumba a muaba wa tshijila

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula; ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuyifila n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Abidana, muana mulume wa Gideoni
Hashishe, yeye udi uya biandi, udi wangata minga nyuma muanda mutekete idi imutamba yeye bubi, idi ibuelamu, idi ishikama; malu a muntu au a hashishe adi atamba a diambedi bubi
Ku nyima kua malu â Yoasha wakasua kukankamasha nsubu wa Yehowa kabidi
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Meme udi bianyi nshila ne bulelela ne muoyo; kakuena muntu udi ulua kudi Tatu, kai muanze kulua kundi diambedi

Muntu kanunyengi bukenshi buenu bualu bua kudihuekesha kuandi kudiye udisunguila, ne kukukuila kuandi kua banjelo, ne dilamata diandi dia mu bikena kumona, mûshibue hatuhu ku meshi andi a mubidi, udi kai ulamata Mutu, kudi mubidi wonso, mukoleshibue ne musuikakasha ku manungu ne mijilu, udiundaku ne kudiunda kua kudi Nzambi
Butshiama bua mushiku wa mbelu buakadi coudées dikumi ne inai, ne tshibi tshia ku luseke ne ku luseke lua mushiku tshiakadi coudées isatu mu butshiama buatshi
Matayo Mu matuku au Yesu wakadi uhitshila mu madimi a blé, dituku dia Lumingu lua Bayuda; bayidi bandi bakadi ne nsala, bakabanga kutshibula miehu yai, bakadia

Bualu bukuabo, Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bua bualu buenu, wakaditshiha ne, Wewe kuena mua kusabuka Yadene ne kubuela mu buloba abu buimpe budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bu buhianyi buenu; kadi bûdi n abu mbua kufuila mu buloba ebu, kuena mua kusabuka Yadene; kadi nuenu nenusabuke, nenuhiane buloba abu buimpe
Yeye wakalekesha mitshima ya Bena Yuda bonso, wakakasha mitshima yabo bu mutshima umue; nunku bakatumina mukelenge di ne, Hingana ne bantu bebe bonso
Kulondolola Malu Makuabo Akenza Solomo Bak
Bituikala ne muoyo bua Nyuma, tuende bietu bua Nyuma kabidi
Nunku Saneheliba, mukelenge wa Ashû, wakumuka, wakahingana, wakashikama ku Ninewe
Moshe kukumbaja bivua Maweja Nangila muambe
Arone kuteka dibungu adi kumpala kua mushete wa ndondu, bua kudilama bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Yeye wakabambila ne, Muntu kai wa munkatshi muenu, udi ne mukoko umue, biahonau mu dina dituku dia Lumingu, kena ûkuata bua kûhatula
Kadi muntu wakahatuka bademon munda muandi wakamutendekena ne, Ndi musue kuikala n ebe; kadi Yesu wakamutuma ne, Uhingane ku nsubu kuebe, ubambile malu manene akukuenzela Nzambi
Hakamujikeye, yeye wakambila bana bandi ba balume ne, Hanafua meme, nunjike mu lukita luakajikabo muntu eu wa Nzambi; nuteke mifuba yanyi hehi ne mifuba yandi

Bua Yehoyakima, mukelenge wa Yuda, wambe biebe ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wakuosha mukanda eu wamba biebe ne, Bualu kai wakufundamu mei a ne, Mukelenge wa Babulona nealue bushuwa, neabutule buloba ebu, neashihemu bantu ne nyama kabidi
Shaula wakafua ne Bâla hanana, muana mulume wa Akabo, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Tshimuangi Pikalabu bakuate muivi mu nzubu butuku, bamushipe, mumushipi kena ne tshilumbu to
Isaka tatu andi wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi nganyi
Bualu bua Dilongolola dia Bena Yuda, ne bua lukita luakadi ha buihi, bakajikamu Yesu

Lubena wakabambila ne, Kanumatshishi mashi andi hanshi, tumuele mu mukela eu udi mu tshihela, kadi kanumulengi tshianza nansha, yeye wakamba nunku bua kumusungileye mu bianza biabo ne bua kumuhingasheye kudi tatu wandi
Mu diba adi dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nuenu Bena Isalele, tshiena mua kunuenzela bu mudi mufumbi eu wenza, anyi
Nunku Davidi wakavudishila Yehowa disanka ku mpala kua bantu bonso; Davidi wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele tatu wetu, wikale ne disanka tshiendelele

Samuele Davidi Udi Utamba Bena Amaleka Bukole Hakahita matuku asatu, Davidi ne bantu bandi bakafika ku Sikelaga; Bena Amaleka bakadi bafuma ku Sude, bahaula bintu, bakabutula Sikelaga, bakawosha ne kahia; bakakuata bakashi bu bahika ne bonso bakadimu, ne banene ne bakese; kabakashiha umue wabo, bakabatuala, bakaya n abo
Bayidi bandi bakamuambila ne, Bikala bualu bua mulume ne mukashi wandi nunku, kubaka mukashi kakuena kuimpe
Nakunuha tshifuanyikishi etshi bua nuenu kuenza bu munakunuenzela
Abiyama ne Yalobama bakaluangana nvita
Hakayeye mu luseke luandi, wakayisha bantu mu nsunagoga wabo, nunku bakakema ne, Muntu eu wakangata lungenyi elu ne malu â a kukema kudi kunyi
Hashishe mukashi wa lungenyi wa mu musoko, wakela dî diandi ne, Unvuai
Abalama ne Nahô bakabaka bakashi, dina dia mukashi wa Abalama diakadi Salai, ne dina dia mukashi wa Nahô diakadi Mileka, muana wa Halana, tatu wa Mileka ne tatu wa Yiseka

Yeye neujidile Yehowa matuku a tshijila tshiandi, nealue biandi ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bihanga diandi, kadi matuku a diambedi adi hatuhu bualu bua tshijila tshiandi tshiakadi tshionyibue
Hanuambila bantu ne, Nukebe lungenyi kudi bena lubuku lua muzangu ne kudi bena muhongo badi bakula bu biambi ne badi banungana, bualu kabuena bukuata bantu bua kukeba lungenyi kudi Nzambi wabo, anyi
Abinê wakamukudimuna dî ne, Bu mudi mutshima webe ne muoyo, mukelenge, tshiena mumanye
Diambedi kabakadi banze kumanya dî dia mu Mukanda wa Nzambi ne, Budiye n abu mbua kubika ku lufu
Hakambeye nunku, wakaya, wakabikila muan abo Malia mu busokoko, wakamuambila ne, Muyishi wakulua, udi ukubikila
Kolosai Nuenu banfumu, nuenzele bahika benu malu adi makane ne adi kâi ne kansungunsungu; bualu bua nudi bamanye ne nuenu kabidi nudi ne Mukelenge mu diulu
Ke musangu wa kumpala uvua bena Izrayele bamuangala mushindu uvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Bakabunvua bakula mu miaku mikuabo, batumbisha Nzambi
Yeye wakamba ne, Bukelenge bua Nzambi budi bu mudi muntu mukune maminu mu buloba; udi ulala tulu, udi ubika butuku ne munya; maminu adi atoloka, adi aleha, kadi yeye kena mumanye mudiû adienzela
Nunku nakahueka ku nsubu wa mufumbi wa ngesu, ne monai, yeye wakadi wenza mudimu wandi ku nkata wa dima
Hashishe Davidi wakatumina Yoaba dî ne, Untumine Uliya, Muena Hiti
Bakamujika ku mukalu wa buhianyi buandi mu Timenatahelese, ku mikuna ya mu Efelayima, ku nôde kua mukuna wa Gasha
Kadi biwaditumbisha, uvuluke ne, Kenguewe udi ukolesha muji, kadi mmuji udi ukukolesha wewe
Hanuabuela mu nsubu, nudianjile kuamba ne, Ditalala dikale mu nsubu eu

Yelemiya Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya hakadi Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, ne masalayi andi onso ne makelenge onso a hanshi ha buloba bakadi muinshi mua bukokeshi buandi ne ba mu bisamba bionso, baluangana ne Yelushalema ne misoko yau yonso: Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Ya wambile Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, nenfile musoko eu mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Babulona, ne yeye neawoshe ne kahia
Lufu, kalonda kebe kadi hanyi
Yonatana wakela nsongalume dî ne, Endesha, ya biebe lubilu, kujanguluki
Bakenza nkanu ya mu nsubu ne ya mu bilulu ne ntalanta ya argent lukama, ntalanta ku lukanu, ntalanta ku lukanu
Nunku muntu udi uhidia kudikokela kudi bukokeshi udi uhidia mei majadikibue kudi Nzambi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile tshisumbu tshonso ne, Umukai ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu wa Kola ne Datana ne Abilama
Bualu bukuabo, nakunvua mikemu ya Bena Isalele badi mu butaka kudi Bena Ejipitu, ndi muvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi
Bena Izrayele bakese bikale bashale ne muoyi mu matunga a baluishi babu, nebabutuke bua mibi yabu ne ya bankambua babu
Efelayima ikale ne tshituha tshimue tshituangane ne mukalu wa Manashe, ku luseke lua esete tô ne ku luseke lua wesete
Kadi yeye wakamba ne, Bialua malu onso kundi, nyaya
Dina dia diboko dia kumudilu didi Pishona, didi dinyunguluka buloba buonso bua Hawila, kudi or, or wa mu buloba abu udi muimpe, ne mabue a mushinga mukole a bdelhum ne a onyx adiku
Bakamana nsubu eu ku dituku disatu dia mu ngondo wa Adâ mu tshidimu tshisambombo tshia bukokeshi bua mukelenge Dayawesha
Enza mahu asambombo ha tshitekelu, mahu asatu ku luseke lumue, mahu asatu ku luseke lukuabo

Mikenji eyi idi bua Mikenji ya bena Levi Tshidimu tshia kulekela kudima Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ku mukuna wa Sinayi, bua amanyishe bena Izrayele mikenji idi ilonda eyi ne: Diba dinudi nubuela mu ditunga dindi munupeshe, nulekele kudima bikondu bikuabu mu dina dianyi, bua buloba buikishe
Malu mabi adi kudi Nzambi, anyi
Uyaya kuepi
Mukuabo, dina diandi Keleopa, wakamukonka kabidi ne, Ahu wewe udi muenyi udi usomba ha nkayebe mu Yelushalema kui mumanye malu akulua matuku â
Wewe undonde
Muntu yonsu udi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne pa mutu, neafile mulambu awu kudi Maweja Nangila
Agare kudikonka ne: Ndi mumone Udi mummone anyi
Kanubueshakanyi bimuna bienu, kanukunyi ntete ya mishindu ibidi mu budimi bumue, kanuluatshi bilulu bikuma ne munda mashilangane
Isaka wakalua mu nshila wa ku Bê laha loi, bualu bua yeye wakadi ushikama ku buloba bua ku Sude
Revelation Nakatangila muanjelo uhueka hanshi ufuma mu diulu, muikale ne luvungula lua ku dina didi kadî ne tshishikidilu, ne lukanu lunene mu tshianza tshiandi
Bantu ba mu Netofa, makumi atanu ne basambombo

Dibadika Tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila Mu ngondu wa kumpala wa tshidimu tshivua tshilonda tshidimu tshivua bena Izrayele bapatuka mu Ejipitu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe mu tshipela tshia Sinayi ne: Bena Izrayele nebenze tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila amu matuku mabafundile
Yeye neikale ne disanka bulelela Ha kunvua Esau mei a tatu andi waka dila muadi bikole ne mutshima wandi munyingalala, wakambila tatu andi ne, Unsankishe meme kabidi, tatu anyi
Bana aba bakadiunda, Esau wakadi tshilembi tshidi ne budimu bua bungi, Yakoba wakadi biandi munda mukole, wakashikama mu ntenta
Tshivua mumanye ne: wewe ke uvua muimane mu njila kumpala kuanyi
Kadi yeye wakakudimuna dî ne, Mukelenge, witabushe bua meme nganje kuya diambedi bua kujika tatu wanyi
Udi mubutule mu mayi manene, matempu ne biluilu bia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Malu â onso nealue kudi bantu ba tshikondo etshi

Bakaha bana ba Alona muakuidi, Hebelone, tshimenga tshia kunyemenabo kudi mushihianganyi, ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Libina ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Yati ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Eshetemo ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Holona ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Debî ne miaba ya ku matshika, Ayina ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Yuta ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Bete shemeshe ne miaba ya ku matshika; bimenga tshitema munkatshi mua bisamba ebi bibidi
Meme mene mene nakananukila kulamata mudimu wa lumbu elu, katuakadisumbila madimi; bena mudimu banyi bonso bakadisangishaku bua kuenzabo mudimu
Kadi mulume kakitabusha bua kulala butuku abu; wakabika, wakaya, wakafika ku Yebuse udi Yelushalema mene ne mukashi wandi ne mpunda ibidi yakadi ne biseba ha nyima hai
Kadi bana benu bakese banuakuamba ne, Bobo nebafue ku miele ya nvita, nendue n abo, bobo nebamanye buloba bunuakuhidia
Aba bakadi bana bandi ba balume ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo
Kadi kakuakadi muntu wa munkatshi mua bantu bonso wakamuandamuna
Muntu yonso wabenga kutua mpala wandi hanshi ne kulutendelela, nebamuele mu tshikutu tshia kahia kakole

Bua muanda eu ndi nkenga makenga â kabidi, kadi bundu kabuena bunkuata ku mesu; bua ndi mumumanye yeye unakuitabusha, ne nakuitabushishibua ne yeye udi ne bukole bua kulama tshintu tshianyi tshiteka tô ne dituku diadia

Mbua meme kumumanya yeye, ne bukole bua dibika diandi ku lufu, ne buobumue n andi mu makenga andi, muikale mufuanyikishibue n andi mu lufu luandi; binamanya mua kufika ku dibika dia munkatshi mua bafue
Yosefe wakela bantu bandi mukenji bua kulongololabo tshitalu tshia tatu wandi, banganga buka bakalongolola tshitalu tshia Isalele
Malu onso audi wenza wenze ne bukole buebe buonso; bualu bua kakuena mudimu, kakuena kulongolola kua malu, kakuena lungenyi anyi meji ku Muaba wa Bafue kûdi uya
Bulelela, meme kabidi nakadi ngelangana meshi ne, Bundi n abu mbua kuenza malu a bungi adi abihisha dina dia Yesu wa ku Nazaleta
Katataka nudi nutetshila Nzambi munda tshinyi, bua nudi basue kuteka tshikokedi ha nshingu ya bayidi tshiakadi bankambua betu kabai bamanye mua kutshituala ne tuetu kabidi
Hashishe, bayidi ba Yone bakahia kudi Yesu ne, Tuetu ne Bafalese tutu tuajila bia kudia misangu ya bungi, kadi bayidi bebe kabatu bajila bia kudia bualu kai
Bobo nebafue ne lufu lua masama mabi, bantu kabena babashila muadi ne kabena babajika; nebikale bu tunvi ha buloba
Bana ba mikoku, bimpanga bia mafuta ne mbuji ya mpumbu, kubapetesha munyinyi
Bibi bionso ne biluwa bionso biakadi bunene bumue; ne bibi bia ha masoso biakatangilangana mu milongo isatu

Katuena ne dikima bua kudibala anyi bua kudielekesha ne bantu aba bakuabo badi baditumbisha; kadi bobo nkayabo, badi bidikishangana ne badi belekeshangana, kabena ne lungenyi, Kadi katuena tuditumbisha ku mutu kua luelekeshi luetu, kadi netudielekeshe ku kuelekesha kua luidi luakatutekela Nzambi bu luidi, bua kufikalu tô ne kunudi
Ku luseke luabo lukuabo bakasa kudi Melemota, muana wa Uliya, muana wa Hakosa
Yolama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi
Nakatshidi bidimu makumi anai hakantuma Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, ku Kadeshe bânea bua kutentekela buloba; nakahingana kudiye kabidi ne dî diakadi mu mutshima wanyi
