Ne bikala muntu widikisha bualu mu manaya kabidi, kabena bamuasa tshifulu tshia buhitshi bikaleye kai muidikishe mu bualu bu mudi mikenshi ya manaya yamba

Yehowa wakambila dî mukana mua bantu bandi baprofete ne, Bualu bua Manashe, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakuenza malu â onso a bundu, wakutamba Bena Amole kuenza malu mabi, wakutamba bonso bakadi ku mpala kuandi kuenza malu mabi, wakuenzesha Bena Yuda kabidi malu mabi ne mpingu yandi; nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Nentume malu mabi kudi Bena Yelushalema ne Bena Yuda adi ahatshisha matshu a bantu bonso badi baunvua
Hashishe Yesu wakumuka ku Galela, wakalua ku musulu wa Yadene kudi Yone bua Yone amubatize
Ku Holeba wa mu nshila wa ku mukuna wa Sei tô ne ku Kadeshe bânea, nduendu lua matuku dikumi ne dimue
Dihanga dianyi didi tshinyi

Minyinyi ya mu mai yakadi mu musulu bakafua, musulu wakamuha muhuya mubi, ne Bena Ejipitu kabakamanya mua kunua mai a mu musulu, mashi akadi mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, Bena bilengulengu ba mu Ejipitu bakenza muomumue ne manga abo, mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Mukashi wakamuambila ne, Mukashi eu wakungambila ne, Tufile muan ebe wa balume, tumudie lelu, ne makelela netudie muan anyi wa balume
Hakadia Yeholama bukelenge bua tatu andi ne hakadikolesheye, yeye wakashiha bana babo bonso ne muele wa nvita ne bantu banene bakuabo kabidi hakadi mu Isalele
Musangu unuikala bamane kufika mu ditunga dia Kenaane, nuenu bamane kukuna mitshi ya bimuma ya mishindu yonsu, nenutangile bimuma bu bintu bidi ne mikiya
Binualekela Yehowa, binuakuatshi la nzambi ya bende mudimu, hashishe yeye neakudimuke, neanukengeshe, neanubutule, yeye mumane kunuenzela bimpe
Yeshaya muprofete wakadila kudi Yehowa, yeye wakahingisha mundidimbi wakamana kuhueka ku tshibandilu tshia diba tshia Ahaza ku nyima biendedi dikumi
Bakenza mabue a onyx, bakabuesha mu masoso a or, bakafundahu mena a bisamba bia bana ba balume ba Isalele
Hashishe, bakahia, bakalenga Yesu bianza, bakamukuata
Bualu bua bu mudi tshituha tshia muntu wakaya mu nvita mbu mudi tshituha tshia muntu wakashala kulama bintu: nebabanyangane bintu muomumue
Ke bankambua ba meku a bena Rubene
Yehowa wakumpa mabue au abidi akadi mafunda ne munu wa Nzambi; akadi mafundahu mei onso akanuambila Yehowa ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia mu dituku dia disangisha dietu
Bana balume ba baprofete ba mu Yeleko bakaluhuka kudi Elisha, bakamuebesha ne
Ndi nditshipa ne: bu mudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne muoyi, kanuena mua kumuka mu ditunga edi, muanenu muana wa mukala awu kayi mufike to
Nunemeke muaba wanyi wa tshijila
Biwatangila mpunda wa muntu udi n ebe lukuna muhone muinshi mua bujitu buandi, kushiya mpunda nunku, kadi umukuatshishe ne bujitu buandi
Bena Isalele bakabika ne dinda, bakatula tshitudilu tshiabo hehi ne Gibea; Bena Isalele bakaluhuka bua kuluangana ne Bena Benyamina; Bena Isalele bakela mualu wa nvita kudibo ku Gibea

Masalayi, hakamukuminau milonda mu bianza ne ku makasa ku mutshi mutshiamakane, akangata bilulu biandi akabanyangana anai, disalayi biadi, disalayi biadi; ne tshikowelu tshiandi kabidi, kadi tshikowelu katshiakadi ne mitelu, tshiakadi tshikuma tshijima kulu tô ne hanshi
Hakunvua Mâta ne, Yesu ulualua, wakaya kumuakidila; kadi Malia wakashala mushikame mu nsubu

Numanye ne, Lutulu lua Mukelenge wetu nduhandu; bu mudi muan etu munanga Paulo kabidi, bua lungenyi luakamuhabo, wakanufundila; bu mudiye wenza kabidi mu mikanda yandi yonso wambamu bua malu â, munda muai mudi manga malu adi makole ha kuajingulula, adi bantu badi kabai bayishibue ne ba mitshima mitekete bakonyangasha mei, bu mudibo benzela mei makuabo mu Mukanda wa Nzambi, bua dibutuka diabo
Hakamanya Yesu ne, Badi bamba kunkuata ku bukole bua kumbuesha mu bukelenge, wakaya ku mukuna kabidi, yeye nkayandi

Kadi yeye kakitabusha lungenyi luakamuambila bakulumpe; wakebesha bansongalume bakakola n andi, bakadi bimana ku mpala kuandi ne, Nuenu nudi ne lungenyi kai lua kukudimuna bantu aba bakungambila ne, Uheheshe bujitu bua mutshi wa tshikokedi wakatutekela tatu webe
Shaula wakamanya ne nSamuele; wakatua mpala wandi hanshi, wakamukukuila
Nikodemo wakamukonka ne, Hakulumpa muntu, yeye udi mumanye mua kuledibua tshiakabidi munyi
Biwenza bimpe, kuena ubanduluka, anyi
Butshiama buawu buikale santimetre muanda mukulu
Kutuadijaye kupenda Mvidi Mukulu, usendeka dina diende
Bakabelela nshobo, nshobo yakakuata Matia; bakamubala ne bapostolo dikumi ne umue
Tshisamba tshia Naftali:

Kadi nsongalume mukuabo wakabatangila, wakamanyisha Abashaloma; nunku bubidi buabo bakaya lubilu, bakafika ku nsubu wa muntu wa mu Bahulima, wakadi ne dina dia mai mu luhangu luandi; bakabuela mu dina adi
Bantumbishe, bantu bonsu batangile
Mitshima ya bayidi yakasanka, hakatangilabo Mukelenge
Wakahingana ne biuma biabo bionso ne muan abo Lota, ne bintu biandi ne bakashi ne bantu
Mose wakashikisha mudimu wonso nunku
Bualu bua muoyo Juka biebe bua kutukuatshisha, Psalms Mutshima wanyi udi uhumuna mei adi mimpe
Bena Iti, bena Amore, bena Kenaane, bena Perizi, bena Ivi ne bena Yebusa, nenubashipe bonsu, muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu muambe
Mu miaba yonso inakendakana ne Bena Isalele bonso nakambila umue wa balumbuluishi bonso ba Bena Isalele unaka mbila bua kulameye bantu banyi ne, Wewe kuakungibakila nsubu wa cèdre bualu kai, anyi
Biabengabo kuangata luhanza ku tshianza tshiebe bua kulunuabo, ka neubambile ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Nenulunue bulelela
Bakaya kabidi ne ngesu ne bikasu ne bijimishi bia minda ne nkutu ne bintu bionso bia tshiamu tshia mitaku biakenzabo n abi mudimu
Edi ndi diakamba Yehowa bualu bua Moaba mu bidimu biakamana kuhita
Ashale ne muoyi
Misambu Yehowa, muntu kai neashikame mu nsubu webe wa ntenta
Yehezekele Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshimue, mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, bualu bua Tulo wakuamba dî dibi bualu bua Yelushalema ne, Kia
Bakalua mu muaba wakadibo babikila ne, Getesemane; yeye wakambila bayidi bandi ne, Shikamai aha, hanatendelela Nzambi
Mose wakambila Alona ne, Ambila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele ne, Luai ha buihi ku mpala kua Yehowa, bualu bua yeye wakunvua tshitanu tshienu
Mapangadika dîyi adi ajika bukookeshi tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia dianyisha
Ba bana ba Lehabeya, Yishiya wakadi kahita
Udi witabusha Muana udi ne muoyo wa tshiendelele; kadi udi uhidia Muana kena umona muoyo, tshishi tshia Nzambi tshidi tshishala ngandi

nsombelu ne kudi Dilekelela anyi dinyanga dia bâna bu mudi kusangila bu mulume ne mukaji ne bâna bakese, bwenzavi bwa masandi pamwe ne dibatalula mupongo budi bukandikibwa ne badi babufidila manyooka kudi mêyi ne mikandu

Bualu bua wakadi ne anu bintu bikese tshiyi muanze kulua kunoko mpindiu biakuvulangana tshisumbu tshinene, Yehowa wakukusankisha wewe bua malu onso anakukuenzela, ne katataka meme nengenze mudimu tshikondo kai bua kukumbasha bia ba mu nsubu wanyi kabidi
Ezela muakuidi wakalua ne mukanda wa mikenji ku mesu kua bantu bakadi badisangishaku ne balume ne bakashi ne bonso bakadi ne matshu a kunvua mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa muanda mutekete
Bana balume ba Lewi bakenza bu mu di dia Mose, bantu bakafua dituku adi bu binunu bisatu
Hashishe mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Wewe Esetê, mukelenge mukashi, udi musue tshinyi

Ndi nkutendekena ne, Wamba biebe ne, Meme ndi muan abo wa bakashi, bua meme mpete diakalengele bua bualu buebe, ne mutshima wanyi wikale ne muoyo bua bualu buebe Hashishe hakalua Abalama mu Ejipitu, Bena Ejipitu bakatangila ne mukashi wakadi mulengele be
Hashishe bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete bakalua kudiye ne milemu mibishe muanda mutekete yakadi kayiyi mianze kûma, ne yeye wakamusuika n ai
Elisha wakamuambila ne
Alambule Maweja Nangila ngombe mulume, udi kayi ne bulema, bua Maweja Nangila amufuile luse
Nunku Tamâ wakashala ne kanyinganyinga mu nsubu wa muan abo Abashaloma

Ndi ngambila bena dibaka di, kememe udi wamba kadi mMukelenge udi ubambila ne, Mukashi kumuki kudi mulume wandi, kadi biumukeye kudiye, ashale biandi mujike, anyi alengeshe ne mulume wandi ne mulume kalekedi mukashi wandi
Nunku Bena Isalele bakutombokela ba mu nsubu wa Davidi tô ne ku dituku edi

Mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale, Kedeshe wa mu Galela ne miaba ya ku matshika, tshimenga tshia kunyemenabo kudi mushihianganyi, ne Hamata dô ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Kâtana ne miaba ya ku matshika; bimenga bisatu
Biakutaha muntu dihi ku ditama, umuandamuine dinga ditama; bianyenga muntu kazaku kebe, kuhidi mua kumuha nshemise webe kabidi

Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne ibidi, mu ngondo wa kumudilu, mu dituku dia dikumi ne itanu dia ngondo, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, ashile tshisumbu tshia ba mu Ejipitu muadi, ubahuekeshe hanshi, yeye ne bana bakashi ba mu bisamba bineme bia bantu, ubatume tô ne mu ndondo wa buloba, hohamue ne bantu aba badi bahueka mu Dina dia Bafue
Bana balume ba Noa bakaluhuka n andi mu buatu bakadi Sheme, Hama ne Yafete Hama wakadi nkambua wa Kanâna
Kadi Mukelenge wakamukudimuna dî ne, Nuenu bena lubombo, mukuabo wenu kai udi kai usulula ngombe wandi anyi nyama wa mpunda ku tshidilu bua kuyeye kumunuisha mai dituku dia Lumingu
Bualu bua ndi mbandisha tshianza tshianyi kulu bua kuditshiha ne, Bu mundi muikale ne muoyo tshiendelele
Patumuku kuetu ku Kenaane, tuvua bafike ne makuta avua mu bibombi, atuvua basangane matenteka pa biakudia
Kadi batatu benu kabakangunvuila, kabakateleja matshu abo kundi
Bakelenge badi bamanye bulelela ne, Yeye udi Kilisto, anyi
Bobo bakatatshisha, bakakengesha Bena Isalele tshidimu atshi
Bankambua betu bakadia mana mu tshihela, bu muakafundabo ne, Yeye wakabaha bidia bia mu diulu
Ndi musue kubasa mikete yanyi yonsu
Hawakubuhana mushinga wabu kawakadi webe, anyi
manene, ne njû kudi bantu bakadinga ne, Tudi bana benu

Bualu bua bonso ba mu Isalele kabena Bena Isalele bulelela, ne buonso buabo kabena bana bandi: bualu bua badi tunkanunuina tua Abalahama; kadi mbu muakafundabo ne, Mu Isaka tunkanunuma tuebe, netubikidibue
Nunku yeye wakambila bantu bandi ne, Budimi bua Yoaba budi ha buihi ne buanyi, yeye udi ne orge mikunamu; yai, nuyoshe ne kahia
Kadi bualu bukuabo, undongoluele muaba wa kulala kabidi, ndi ntekemena bua kufikishibua kunudi bualu bua kulomba kuenu
Bantu aba bakadianjila kuya ku mpala, bakadi batuindila mu Toa

Hakumukeye mu buatu, katataka muntu mukuatshike ne nyuma wa bukoya, ulua mu majambu, wakasangila ne Yesu, wakadi wikala mu majambu; kakuakadi muntu mumanye mua kumusuika ne tshintu, bintu bionso biakahanga, ne lukanu mene; bakamusuika misangu ya bungi ne nkata ne nkanu, yeye wakatshibula nkanu, wakatula nkata; kakuakadi muntu mumanye mua kumukokesha
Buludi buatshi buakadi coudées itanu ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées itanu, ne bule buatshi bua mulu buakadi coudées isatu
Avua ne muenya bu wa mikata milamba ne mafuta
Wakidikisha luseke lua node, luakadi nkama itanu bu tshidikishilu tshia luidi
Davidi wakanyenga ngabu ya or yakadi n ai bantu ba Hadadezê, wakalua n ai ku Yelushalema
Kadi nebahaule Bena Kene tô ne haya Bena Ashû n abo bu bena lukanu
Bualu bua Mukelenge, Yehowa wa misumba, neashikishe mudimu wa kubutula munkatshi mua ba ha buloba bonso bu muakadihangidishileye
Mu masanka awu, mwuluke bena Levi banudi nabu mu bimenga bienu, bualu kabena ne wabu muaba wa bumpianyi munkatshi muenu
Alauna wakambila mukelenge kabidi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi webe, akuitabushe
Bayidi bandi bakadi bamane kuya mu musoko bua kusumba bia kudia
Bakashiha bantu bonso bakadimu ne miele ya nvita, bakaba butula; kabakashiya nansha umue ne muoyo; wakosha Hasô ne kahia
Maweja Nangila udi wakuila bakaji bakamba ne bana ba nshiya
Nunku unvuai bualu budi Yehowa n abu bua kuenzela Babulona, ne bualu budiye uhangidisha bua kuenzela ba mu buloba bua Bena Kasada
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Ambaku dijimbu diebe, tuetu tudiunvue
Wakashiha mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne bana balume ba Alona bakamulesha mashi ne yeye wakâmiamina ku tshioshelu
Ne bua bualu ebu tuakasengelela Tito, bua yeye, bu muakabangeye mudimu eu diambedi, nunku akebe biandi kukumbasha ngasa eu munda muenu kabidi
Bualu kai wewe kuena ulama mukelenge webe
Kabuena nunku ne, Wewe uyaya n etu, ne tuetu, meme ne bantu bebe, netuikale bu bantu badi bahanduluka kudi bisamba bionso bia bantu badi hanshi ha buloba, anyi
Mukelenge wandi wakamona ne, Yehowa udi n andi, ne Yehowa wakadi mumuendeshe diakalengele mu tshianza tshiandi mu malu onso akenzeye
Yeye wakambula mpala wandi bua kutangila ha disoso, wakakonka ne, Udi ku luseke luanyi nganyi
Bantu bakambila Shaula ne, Yonatana, nguakadi Usungila Bena Isalele ne luhandu elu lunene, neafue biandi, anyi
Kadi, bia munda bionsu, ne bikonu bia ngombe, babisukule mu mayi

Lebeka wakambila Isaka ne, Bana bakashi ba Bena Hete badi batondesha muoyo wanyi, biabaka Yakoba mukashi wa bana bakashi ba Bena Hete bu bana bakashi badi mu buloba ebu, muoyo wanyi newikale ne mushinga kai kundi
Yuda kuandamuna ne: Mukalenga wetu, tshitudi mua kuamba ntshinyi bua kukujadikila mutudi babinge
Hashishe Bena Babulona bakahia kudiye, bakasangila n andi bulalu mu dinanga, bakamunyanga ne masandi abo, ne yeye wakanyanguka kudibo, ne mutshima wandi wakabahidia
Mutumibue kuimana kabidi mutantshi mu njila mu madimi a mvinyo pankatshi pa bimana bibidi
Katataka nyaya kudi bantu banyi, lua biebe, nenkuleshe malu adi bantu aba benzela bantu bebe mu matuku adi ku mpala
Wakalua ha buihi, wakalenga tshituadilu tshia tshitalu tshianza; batuadi batshi bakimana
Tshintu tshi difume anyi tshidi tshihandulula kudi nyama yeye kena mua kutshidia, yeye neadinyange n atshi meme ndi Yehowa
Wakidikisha bule bua mbalanda, buakadi coudées makumi abidi mu muaba muakadi tshiendelu tshia munda mua ntempelo tshituangana ne mbalanda eu
Bena Isalele bakatshunguluka, ne Bena Benyamina bakatua mikemu, bakamanya ne, Bualu bubi buakutukuata
Kakuena muntu muimpe anu umue, Nzambi
Diba diakufika, Muana wa muntu udi mufila mu bianza bia bantu babi

Bulelela, nakadi kûtuala ha diaha dianyi; Nakadi kumubadila bungi bua biendedi bianyi; Bikala buloba buanyi budile bua kumbanda, bingikala mudie bia kudia biabu tshianana, tshiyi mufile argent, nunku, meba adiunde mu muaba wa blé, Yobo Nunku bantu aba basatu bakalekela kukudimuna Yobo mei, bualu bua yeye wakadi muakane ku mesu kuandi
Bua bualu ebu makenga andi nealue dituku dimue, lufu ne madilu ne tshiole; nebamushidishe mu kahia, bua Mukelenge Nzambi udi umulumbuluisha udi mukole

Biahikula Muena Lewi nsubu, nunku nsubu wakahanabo ne musoko wa buhianyi buandi nebihingane kudibo halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, bualu bua nsubu ya mu misoko ya Bena Lewi idi buhianyi buabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Bakenza bibi bia mitshi ya olive ku mbelu kua muaba wa tshijila; biluwa bia ku mbelu biakadi bunene bua tshituha tshitanu tshia tshimanu tshia nsubu
Yakajadikibua ha miaba yakayilongoluelabo mu tshimanu tshia tshitendelelu mu nseke yatshi yonso, bua nsubu ijadikibue ha miaba yai ne bishimikidi biai bishilangane ne bia tshimanu tshia tshitendelelu
Hawalua ne munyinyi wabi ku mpala kua Yehowa, bakuidi belehu luehu ne bobo babifile bu mulambu wa kuoshela Yehowa
Mutuangaji atume diyi bua bakosele muminu wa nyunyi umue pa luesu lua dibumba, luikale ne mayi a mu mpokolu
Kadi nansha mbua kena mua kubululala umue wa Bena Isalele, nansha muntu nansha nyama, bua nuenu mumanye ne, Yehowa udi utahulula Bena Ejipitu ne Bena Isalele
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona, Shelumiele muana mulume wa Sulishadai
Bualu bua mishiku ya muakuidi idi ne bua kulama lungenyi, ne bantu badi ne bua kukeba diyisha diakane mukana muandi; bualu bua yeye udi messager wa Yehowa

E, bulelela mene, ndi mbala bintu bionso bu tshintu tshijimina bualu bua bulengele butambe bua kumanya kua Kilisto Yesu, Mukelenge wanyi; unakajimishila bintu bionso bua bualu buandi, ne ndi mbibala bu bintu bia kuela ku diala bua meme mpete Kilisto, ne bua kunsanganabo munda muandi, tshi ne buakane buanyi budi bufume ku mikenshi, kadi ngikale ne buobu abu budi bua ditabusha dia mu Kilisto, buakane mene budi bufuma kudi Nzambi hangitabusha
Nunku tudi miloho bua bualu bua Kilisto, bu mudi Nzambi munusengelele ne dî dietu, nunku tuetu tudi tunusengelela bua bualu bua Kilisto ne, Nulengeshibue ne Nzambi
Padi muntu usela, kabidi ubuelela muanabu wa bakaji wa tatuende nansha wa mamuende mu nzubu, babanyoke, bantu bonsu batangile, bualu mbenze bualu bua bundu
Kubapeshaye mayi a kuowa ku makasa
Nzubu awu, ne bintu bia kutekamu, bikale anu mushindu undi nkuleja
Bana ba Yakoba Kul
Hashishe, hakatangila Elihu ne kakuakadi ditaba kudi Yobo mukana mua bantu aba basatu, tshiji tshiandi tshiakatema kudibo
Nakunyenga nyama wa mpunda wa nganyi
Arone kufuila ku lusongu lua mukuna aku
Kadi ndi nnuambila mpindiu ne, Kebai diakalengele kudi Nzambi bua yeye atuleshe luse luandi; bua muanda eu unuakuenza ku bianza bienu, yeye neanuanyishe ne disanka, anyi
Bonso badi basue didilesha dimpe mu malu a mubidi, badi banuenzesha bua kutengudibua; anu bua kababakengeshi bualu bua mutshi mutshiamakane wa Kilisto

Hana wakadi wakula anu mu mutshima wandi, anu mishiku yandi yakadi inyunga, dî diandi ka diakadi diunvuika; nunku Eli wakelangana meji ne yeye udi mukuatshike maluvu, Eli wakamukonka ne, Wewe neukuatshike maluvu musangu bule munyi

Mu matuku au bantu banene ba nfiondo bakadi ha buloba, ne hakaya bansongalume ba bantu ba Nzambi kudi bansongakashi ba bantu ba tshianana, bakalela n abo bana Bobo bakadi bantu banene ba kale ne ba butumbi
Yeye wakakonka ne, Wewe udi nganyi

Yeye wakabanga kumanyisha bayidi bandi ne, Budi Muana wa muntu n abu mbua kukengeshibua makenga a bungi, ne bua kuedibua kudi bakulu ne kudi bakuidi banene ba Nzambi ne kudi bafundi, ne bua kushihibua, ne bua kubika hahita matuku asatu
Nanku nuye kumanyisha tatu muanzu undi nawu mu Ejipitu
Amba biebe ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe musoko udi umatshisha mashi hanshi munkatshi muau, bua tshikondo tshia kubutuka kuau tshifike kudiu, udi udisongela mpingu bua wowo unyanguke
Kadi kakumusha bitendelelu bia ku mikuna; bantu batshivua bafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ne musenga wa manananshi ha mutu ha mikuna
Bua badi bafunda ne, Nunku, buonso buetu, muntu ne muntu, neabadile malu andi kudi Nzambi
Bialala mulume ne mukashi, biamueleye bilumi, bubidi buabo nebadioweshe ne mai, nebikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo

Esetê Esetê Udi Ubikila Mukelenge ne Hamana ku Disanka Hakahita matuku asatu, Esetê wakadiluatshisha bilulu biandi bia bukelenge, wakimana mu tshiendedi tshia munda mua nsubu wa mukelenge ku mbelu kua nsubu wa mukelenge; mukelenge wakadi mushikame mu nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge mu nsubu wa bukelenge, ku tshibueledi tshia nsubu
Hakunvua Pilato mei â, wakaluhuka ne Yesu, wakashikama mu nkuasa wa bulumbuludi ha muaba wakadibo babikila ne, Wa Mabue Malongolola Hanshi, kadi mu Buena Yuda ne, Gabata
Ke muvua Abrame uya mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, bua kuanji kusombamu
Kanuena mua kuenza mudimu dituku adi to
Matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondu awu, nutuadije tshibilu tshia matuku muanda mutekete, anudi nudia mampa adi kaayi mela buanga
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nebaye n ai ku Babulona, neyikaleku tô ne ku dituku dindi nyivuluka; mu diba adi nendue n ai, nenyihingashe mu muaba eu
Moshe kuambila bena Izrayele ne: Nudie biakudia ebi lelu
Belâma wakabika dinda, wakambila miloho ya Balaka ne, Yai bienu ku buloba buenu, Yehowa wakahidia bua meme kuya n enu
Hashishe wakasangisha bena mudimu ba banfumu ba mu buloba, bakadi nkama ibidi ne makumi asatu ne babidi; hashishe wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso bu binunu muanda mutekete
Hakatshidiye wakula nunku, Yonatana, muana wa Ebeyatâ muakuidi, wakafika kudibo; Adoniya wakamuambila ne, Buela biebe, bualu bua wewe udi muena kalolo, udi ulua ne lumu luimpe
Petelo wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge, ndi ne dikima dia mua kuya n ebe ne mu nsubu wa lukanu ne ku lufu
Monai
Ditunga diende nedialabale, diye kuinshi muditunga, diye kabidi luseke ludi diba dibuelela
Hakabuela muntu eu, bakeluba bakadi bimana ku luseke lua nsubu lua ku tshianza tshia balume, ne ditutu diakusha tshiendelu tshia munda mua nsubu
Hadada wakasangana luse lunene ku mesu kua Palô, wakamuha bukonde buandi bu mukashi wandi, yeye wakadi muan abo ne Tapenese, mukelenge mukashi
Nkata inai yakadiku hehi ne bakeluba, nkata umue hehi ne mukeluba umue, nkata mukuabo hehi ne mukeluba mukuabo; nkata yakadi ne mubidi bu wa dibue dia chrysolithe
Ngombe ne nyama ya mpunda idi ibila buloba mu budimi buebe neyidie bia kudia bimpe bisangisha ne luehu, bia kudia mene bidibo bahehula ne tshikasu tshia mpau ne tshihehudi
Yesu wakabakonka ne, Kabena bafunde mu mikenshi yenu ne, Nakuamba ne, Nuenu nudi banzambi, anyi
Amenona wakamba ne, Bantu bonso bakuabo bumuke kundi
Bakashi bonso ba mu lufuila bakadi bimane ha buihi n andi, badila, baleshangana mitelu ne bivualu biakatela Dôka hakadiye n abo
Binakulesha lungenyi lua wewe kulonda, kuena ungunvuila
Nudi basue tuetu kubasunga, anyi

Anu bualu ebu, bikadilu bienu bikale biakanangane ne lumu luimpe lua Kilisto; bua binalua kunumona anyi bingikala kukuabo, ngunvue bianyi lumu lua malu enu ne, Badi bajalama mu nyuma tunue, ne badi batshinta hohamue ne mutshima umue bua ditabusha dia lumu luimpe, ne kabena batshinyishibua nasha ku bualu bumue kudi bena lukuna
Oteniele, muana wa Kenasa, muan abo ne Kaleba, wakaunyenga: yeye wakamuha Akasa, muan andi wa bakashi, bu mukashi wandi
Musombeshanganyi wakadiku, wakadi ne bena mabanza andi babidi; mukuabo wakadi ne dibanza dia ndenalio Hakahangabo bintu bia kumufuta, yeye wakabalekelela mabanza bubidi buabo

Kadi binuakenga bualu bua buakane, nudi ne disanka; kanutshinyi kutshinyisha kuabo, kanulubakashibu mitshima yenu; kadi nujidile Kilisto mu mitshima yenu bu Mukelenge; nuikale badilongolola misangu yonso, bua kukudimuna dî kudi muntu yonso udi unukonka bua muanda wa ditekemena didi munda muenu; kadi nuenze nunka ne kalolo ne dishina

Bana banyi, didi diba dia kunshikidilu; ne mbu munuakunvua ne, Mufuilakanyi ne Kilisto ukadi ha kulua, ne katataka bafuilakanyi ne Kilisto bakumana kulua ba bungi; bua malu â tudi bamanye ne, Didi diba dia kunshikidilu
Kulengululaye bualu abu
Nuenu nukonke Amasa kabidi ne, Wewe kuena mufuba wa mu mifuba yanyi ne musunyi wa mu misunyi yanyi, anyi
E, buonso buenu nudiluatshishe ne buhuekele, bua kukuatshishangana; bualu bua Nzambi udi uhidia badi badisue, kadi udi uha badi badihuekesha ngasa
Matitiya, umue wa Bena Lewi, muan a bute wa Shaluma, Muena Kola, wakadi ne mudimu wa kulama bintu biakalambabo mu malonga
Kadi meme nakakuibakila nsubu ne muaba wa wewe kushikama tshiendelele
Tshianana pafika bena mvita, badi mua kudisanga ne bena lukuna betu bua kutuluisha, pashishe kumuka mu ditunga

Udilengeshe ne bulengele ne bunene, Lesha tshiji tshiebe tshikole; Tangila muntu yonso udi mudisue, umuhuekeshe hanshi; Ubajike hohamue mu dinfuenkenya dia buloba, Hashishe, nenkutumbishe kahidi ne, Tangila biebe nguvu, unakafuka n ebe diatshimue
Mesu ebe ikale ku budimi budibo banowa, ubalonde, meme tshiakamana kudimusha bansongalume ne, Kanumulengi bianza, anyi
Kakuena muena meshi umue munkatshi muenu udi mua kulumbuluila bana benu ba mu Kilisto bilumbu biabo, anyi
Hakashika argent yonso ya mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ya mu buloba bua Kanana, hashishe Bena Ejipitu bonso bakalua kudi Yosefe, bakamuambila ne, Utuhe bia kudia, netufuile ku mesu kuebe bualu kai
Bualu kai

Thessalonians Bana betu, tudi tunusengelela bua dilua dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto ne bua kusangishibua kuetu kudiye; bua nuenu kanuzakashibu lubilu mu meshi enu, ne kanutshinyishibu, nasha bua nyuma nasha bua dî nasha bua mukanda udibo badingila ne ngua kutudi ne, Dituku dia Mukelenge dikadi aha
Gala, muana wa Ebede, wakamba ne, Abimeleke udi nganyi, ne Shekeme udi nganyi, bua tuetu kumukuatshia mudimu
Mose wakafunda ne, Muntu udi wenza buakane bua ku mikenshi neikale ne muoyo bualu buabu
Kadi kabakunvua mei a Yehowa akambeye mukana mua muprofete wandi Yelemiya, nansha yeye nansha bena mudimu bandi nansha bantu ba mu buloba abu
Neafile muana wa mukoko mukuabo dilolo, neufile mulambu wa bukula bu mûdi wenza dinda ne nvinyo udibo banua, mulambu udibo bosha ha kahia, udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Aba bonso bakadi ku mutu kua bintu bia Davidi

Dî diakahatuka ku nkuasa wa butumbi, diamba ne, Nakwmia dî bu dî dia tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu, ne bu dî dia mai a bungi ne bu dî dia mikungulu mikole diamba ne, Tusanke, tuikale ne disanka dinene, tumuhe butumbi, bualu bua dibaka dia Muana wa Mukoko diakulua, ne mukashi wandi wakudilongolola
Bena Isalele bakasa tshitudilu mu Gilegala; dilolo bakadia bidia bia disanka dia Kuhita kua Yehowa mu mpata ya Yeleko mu matuku dikumi ne anai a ngondo
Bana ba Pashû tshinunu tshimue ne nkama ibidi ne makumi anai ne muanda mutekete
Tuvua bamonemu ne bantu ba mpolondu, ndelanganyi ya Anake
Yeye wakatahulula bana ba Lea ne ba Lakele ne ba bakashi babidi benji ba mudimu

DITUNGA DIA KONGU WA MUNGALAATA TSHIMAMWENDE WA BUKALENGA TSHIA DITUNGA TSHILUBA TSHINGENYINGENYI TSHIA DIYI DIKULU DIA DITUNGA DIA KONGU WA MUNGALAATA KINSHASA LWABANYA NKASU DIUMVWIJA DIA TSHIEENA BWAALU Katshia Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata diaapeta budikadidi bwaadi mu matuku a kashipu nkenza , didi anu diambulangana ne ntatu ya tshidiidi itwa ipingana milela nangananga kudi dibeenga dia kwitabuja bishimikidi bidi koku ne bantu badi babiludika
Nunku nuenu, bana banyi ba balume, unvuai dî dianyi, nuteleje matshu ku mei a mukana muanyi
Nebatangishe mpala yabo mulu, nebatangile kabidi ha buloba, ne monai
Kadi kanuakuikala nabu to, bualu nebaye mu bupika
Kadi, panudi nulamba munyinyi wa muana wa mukoku nansha wa muana wa mbuji, kanuedimu mabele a mamuende to
Meme kupingana muaba wanyi wa mudimu
Yeye wakadi umue wa bana ba Pelese, wakadi ku mutu kua tupitene tuonso tua mu ngondo wa kumudilu
Kadi Yehowa bakamukudimuna dî dituku adi
Hakatshiabu, Paulo wakaya n etu kudi Yakobo; bakulu bonso bakadiku

Hashishe, mu difuku adi hakukuha Yehowa dikisha ku dikenga diebe ne ku malu akadi akutatshisha ne ku mudimu mukole wakakuenzeshabo ku bukole, neubange kuimba musambu eu wa kutshimbisha n au mukelenge wa mu Babulona
Wakamba ne, Tshiena yeye

Nakatangila kabidi muinshi mua diba ne, Bena lubilu lukole kabena bahita hakuaho mu kutumbila lubilu misangu yonso, nansha bena bukitu kabena bahitahita bakuabo bukole mu nvita; bena meji kabalu baheta bia kudia bionso; bena lungenyi kabatu baheta bubanji buonso; badi ne ngenzelu muimpe kabatu baheta diakalengele dionso; kadi buonso buabo badi ne bikondo bidi malu abatulukila
Badi ne tshia kupeta difutu dikumbana bwa kushindika budikadidi bwabo ne mushinga wabo
Mukelenge wakambila Bâzilai ne, Lua, usabuka n anyi ne meme nenkudishe mu Yelushalema
Nunku nengumushe bituha bia Kilisto bua kubivuisha bituha bia mukashi wa masandi, anyi
Luka Hakashikisheye kuambila bantu mei andi onso mu matshu abo, wakabuela mu Kapênuma
Utume Zena, mumanyi wa mikenshi, ne Apolo ku mpala ku luendu luabo lubilu; bua kabahangi tshintu tshimue tshidibo n atshi bualu

Kanungu ka Ndondo ya bupole, ya bungenda mushinga, ndondo ne diumvwangana bidi bitangila ndongolwelu ya bukwa matunga ne idi bitangila dikosa dia bilumbu bia bukwa matunga, eyi idi ikengela lupetu lwa Mbulamatadi, eyi idi ishintulula bulongolodi bwa ngelelu wa mêyi, eyi idi itangila mubidi wa bantu, eyi idi ifikisha kudishintakaja ne disakidila tshitupa tshia buloba badi mwa kuyijadika anyi kuyanyisha bilondeshila mêyi a ditunga
Eyo, nennusangishe hohamue, nennuele muhuya ne kahia ka tshifik a munda, nenuenguluke mu musoko eu
Bana ba Elama, tshinunu tshimue ne nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu ne banai
Mulau ulualua kunudi, bua nuenu nutu nuibaka nkita ya baprofete, bakashihabo kudi bankambua benu
Katataka wewe udi wamba ne, Ya, wambile mukelenge webe ne, Eliya udiku, yeye neanshihe
Palô wakamba ne, Nennulekele, nuye mu tshihela bua kushihela Yehowa Nzambi wenu nyama, kadi kanuyi kule, nundombele Nzambi

Nentumine bamue badi bahanduka munkatshi muabo kudi bisamba bia bantu, ku Tâshishi, ku Pula, ku Luda, bobo badi banana buta, ku Tubala ne ku Yawana, ku maloba a kule adi ku muelelu wa mai manene, hadi kabayi banze kunvua lumu luanyi lunene, kabayi banze kumona butumbi buanyi
Kadi biamu atu bila muntu ne, Tshintu etshi ntshishihela mpingu; kanutshidî, bua bualu buandi wakanumanyisha bualu ebu, ne bua muoyo mukese kabidi

Nunku mukelenge Lehabama wakadikolesha mu Yelushalema, wakakokesha bantu; Lehabama wakadi ne bidimu makumi anai ne tshimue hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha bidimu dikumi ne muanda mutekete mu Yelushalema, musoko wakasungula Yehowa munkatshi mua bisamba bia Bena Isalele bionso bua kutekamu dina diandi; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Nâma, Muena Amona
Mukashi wanyi muhungile, umuke n anyi ku Lebanona; umuke n anyi ku Lebanona
Ne banjelo muanda mutekete bakadi ne makenga muanda mutekete bakaluhuka mu ntempelo, baluatshishibue mabue a mushinga mukole, matoke ne makenka, banyungulule ne mikaba ya ngolo ha biadi biabo
bualu bua bikala Abalahama mubingishibue ku bienzedi, udi ne tshia kuditumbisha n atshi, kadi kenku mesu kua Nzambi
Bu nuenu bitabushe Mose, nuakadi kungitabusha meme, bua yeye wakafunda bualu buanyi
Mu diba edi, hawalesha bantu aba mei â onso, nebakukonke ne, Yehowa wakuamba mei â onso bua kutuhisha n au bualu kai
Bantu aba basatu, Shadalaka, Meshaka ne Abedenego bakahona basuika mu tshikutu tshia kahia kakole
Ngasa, luse, ne ditalala bia kudi Nzambi Tatu ne kudi Yesu Kilisto, Muana wa Tatu, nebikale n etu mu bushua ne mu dinanga
Bakadiata tumuma mu tshikaminu ha nyima ha musoko, ne mashi akahatuka mu tshikaminu, akabanda tô ne ku mionshi ya ku mbanga ya tubalu, ku ntanta wa kilometa nkama isatu
Mark Wakumuka aku, wakalua mu luseke luandi, bayidi bakamulonda
Yesu wakamba ne, Hanuabisha Muana wa muntu, nenumanye ne, Meme nyeye, ne tshitu ngadienzela bualu, kadi ntu ngamba anu malu akunyisha Tatu

Yesu wakabikila bayidi bandi, wakabambila ne, Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Bintu biakuela mukashi eu muhele wa mu lufuila bidi bitambe bidi bakuabo bonso bela mu tshibutshilu; buonso buabo bakuela bintu biakadibo kabai n abi bualu, bia ha mutu; kadi mukashi eu wakuela bintu biakadiye n abi bualu, bintu biandi bionso bia kudia mene mene
dibandila dia ditunga ne dia bintu;
Nzambi wakaha Solomo ngenyi ya bungi be ne dijingulula ditambe ne bunene bua mutshima, biakadi bungi bua nsenga ya ku muelelu wa mai manene

Muomumue balami ba bintu bikale ne kanemu; kabikadi ne mei abidi; kabadidi ku maluvu a bungi; kabakumi mitshima yabo ku biuma bidi bifume ku nshila mibi; balame bualu busokoka bua ditabusha mu muoyo mukese mutoke
Neenze bionsu bidi bikengela bua kudikobolola, kukobolola ne bena diku diende
Mulami wa nsubu wa lukanu wakafua bonso bakadi mu nsubu wa lukanu mu tshianza tshia Yosefe, malu onso akenzabomu, yeye wakadi bu muenzeshi wau
Nanku, Mvidi Mukulu kunyungulula bena Izrayele
Muntu udi ushiha nyama neafute muena nyama ne mundi udi ushiha mukuabo nebamushihe
Biamubakisheye kudi muan andi wa balume, yeye neamuenzele bu mu tshilele tshia bana ba bakashi
Mu muaba wawa nembitabushe, ne mu muaba wawa nennulombe milambu yenu ne mamuma a kumudilu anudi nufila kundi ne bintu bienu bionso bia tshijila
Wakidikisha tshinunu tshikuabo, wakampitshisha mu mai, mai akafika mu binu bianyi
Kadi Izake kayi muanji kuela Yakobe lupemba, kumukonkaye tshiakabidi ne: Wewe udi Esawu muanabute wanyi menemene anyi

Hashikisheye kulandakasha buloba bua ha mutu ha budimi, Bualu bua Nzambi wandi udi umulesha lungenyi luimpe lua kulondeye, Bua kabena bashihula maminu a nielle ne tshiamu tshitue, Badi babotesha maminu adibo benza n au bidia, anyi
Kadi biakudimuka mitshima yabo kudi Mukelenge, tshilulu tshikudika tshidi tshiumushibua
Eliya wakabambila ne, Bingikala muntu wa Nzambi, kahia kafuma mu diulu, kakuoshe ne bantu bebe makumi atanu
Ubisangishe kaba kamue, welemu luepu bua kubilengeja bikale bia tshijila

Wakatumanyisha bualu busokoka bua mu disua diandi bu mudi disanka diandi dimpe diakasunguleye munda muandi, tô, ne halua tshikondo tshia dikumbana dia bihungu, bua kusangisha bintu bionso mu Kilisto, ne bidi mu diulu ne bidi hanshi ha buloba
Nembambile mei onso a kulumbulula kuanyi bua malu mabi abo onso, bualu bua bakundekela, bakuoshila nzambi mikuabo musenga wa manananshi, bakutendelela bintu biakusongabo ne bianza biabo
Bua mu matuku enu, nuenu ba mu diku dia bantombokedi, nengambe dî dianyi, nendimane; â mmei adi Mukelenge Yehowa wamba
Yalobama kakaheta bukole kabidi mu matuku a Abiya; Yehowa wakamushiha, wakafua
Mu miaba yonso inakaya ne Bena Isalele, nakakonka mulumbuluishi umue wakasungula bua kulameye bantu banyi Bena Isalele ne, Kuena muanze kungibakila nsubu wa mabaya a cèdre bualu kai
Bualu ebu buakatamba kunyingalasha mutshima wanyi; nunku nakumusha bintu bionso bia Tobiya mu nsubu

Yehiele ne Azaziya ne Nahata ne Asahele ne Yelimota ne Yozabada ne Eliele ne Yisemakaya ne Mahata ne Benaya bakadi batangidi mu bianza bia Konaniya ne bia Shemei muan abo, bua mukenji wa mukelenge Hezikiya ne wa Azaya, mukokeshi wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi
Bena Yuda bine nebaluangane ne Bena Yelushalema kabidi
Kadi mukashi wakalua, wakamukukuila ne, Mukelenge unkuatshishe, Yeye wakandamuna ne, Kambimpe bia kuangata bidia bia bana kubielela mbua

Bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele bakalua; Bena Lewi bakambula mushete wa Nzambi; bakalua ne mushete wa Nzambi ne ntenta wa kusambakena ne bintu bionso bia tshijila biakadi mu nsubu wa ntenta; bakuidi Bena Lewi bakalua ne bintu ebi bionso
Kadi nuyilambule anu muaba wikalaye musungule bua nuenu kumonangana nende
Shimei, muana wa Gela, Muena Benyamina wa mu Bahulima, wakaya lubilu ne Bena Yuda bakuabo bua kusangakeneye ne mukelenge Davidi
Neubatshipe muaba awu
Kujimina kua diulu ne buloba mbualu bukese, kadi kuhona kua katoba kamue ka mikenshi ya Mose mbualu bunene

Bananga, kanukemi bua dikenga didi bu kahia munkatshi muenu diakaluila kunudi bu diteta, bu bualu buhia buhia buakanukuata; kadi bualu bua nudi babanyanganyi ba makenga a Kilisto, nusanke; bua nuenu nusanke kabidi ne disanka dinene ku dibuluibua dia butumbi buandi
Mei kâluhuki mukana muebe lukasa; mutshima webe kauhatudi bualu ku mpala kua Nzambi lubilu; bualu bua Nzambi udi mu diulu, wewe udi ha buloba; nunku mei ebe ikale makehele

Yonadaba wakamuambila ne, Lala ha bulalu buebe bu muntu udi ne disama; halua tatu webe kukutangila, umuambile ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Anji kuitabusha bua muan etu wa bakashi Tamâ alue bua kundisheye bidia, alongolole bia kudia anu ku mesu kuanyi, bua meme mbitangile, mbidie anu ku tshianza tshiandi
Ku tshidimu ku tshidimu yeye wakendakana ku luseke alu ku Betele ne Gilegala ne Misepa: wakalumbulula Bena Isalele mu misoko ei yonso
Nualekele, apueke panshi bu mayi
Bua badi bafunda ne, Nunku, buonso buetu, muntu ne muntu, neabadile malu andi kudi Nzambi
Ya, wambile Yalobama ne
Ne meme nendongolole malu makuabo hanalua

Nakalunuisha ba mu Dedana, Tema ne Buza ne bonso badi babeya nsuki yabo biketu; ne bakelenge bonso ba mu Alaba ne bakelenge ba bantu ha bisamba bikuabo badi babuelakana n abo ne badi bashikame mu tshihela; ne bakelenge bonso ba Zimeli ne bakelenge bonso ba Elama ne bakelenge bonso ba Bena Madai; nakalunuisha bakelenge bonso ba ku node ba kule ne ba ha buihi muntu unua ne mukuabo ne ba mu makelenge onso a ha buloba
Mutumibue kubenga, wamba ne: Kupinganyi to
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Nzambi akufute luse, muan anyi
Tendelelai bienu Yehowa baluate bivualu bia tshijila, Nuambe munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu ne, Yehowa udi ukokesha Diulu dikale ne disanka, buloba busanke kabidi
Bua kutangila muntu muluate bilulu binefuke, anyi
Katataka nyaya ne mutshima wanyi musuika ku Yelushalema, tshi mumanye malu aluaku kundi, kadi Nyuma Muimpe udi unmanyisha mu misoko yonso ne, Nkanu ne makenga bidi bikuindila
Bakumuka mu Haselota, bakashikama mu Litema
Bakafunda ha mutu handi ne: Bantu babi babidi bakadi bahohela, mukuabo wakahenda Yesu ne, Wewe kuena Kilisto, anyi
Bualu nudi bafike ku mbelu kua muntu wenu

Bakafunda mu Mukanda wa Misambu ne, Balume bakuabo bakadi bendakana n etu matuku onso akadi Mukelenge Yesu utambakana munkatshi muetu, babangile ku dibatiza diandi kudi Yone tô ne ku dituku diakangatshibueye kutudi bua kaya mu diulu; budi umue wabo n abo mbua kusungudibua bua kuikaleye mumanyi n etu wa dibika diandi ku lufu
Kadi Yohanana, muana wa Kalea, ne tupitene tuonso tua nvita bakangata bonso ba mu Yuda bakadi bashala, bobo mene bakadi bahingane ku Yuda bua kushikamaku, bafume ku makelenge onso kuakadibo babatume
Udi ne matshu unvue budi Nyuma wambila ekelesia
Hakashikisha Yehowa kusomba ne Mose ha mukuna wa Sinai, yeye wakamuha mabue abidi akadi ne mikenji mifundahu ne munu wa Nzambi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bakuhempa lusengu lua Moaba, diboko diandi diakutshibuka

Nunku badi babikila matuku a ne, Pulima, bu mudi dina dia Pû, Nunku bua mei onso akatuabo mu mukanda eu, ne bua malu onso akatangilabo ku mesu ne bua malu onso akadi abakuata, Bena Yuda bakahunga dî diabo bualu buabo ne bua bana babo baledibue ne bua bantu bonso bakalamata kudibo ne, Tuetu katuena tuhanga kuvuluka matuku â abidi bu muakafundabo, ne mu tshikondo tshiakasungulabo, ku tshidimu ku uhidimu; netuvuluke matuku â ne netualame ku bikondo bionso kudi ba mu meku onso ne ba ku nseke yonso ne ba mu misoko yonso; matuku â a Pulima kaena mua kuhanga munkatshi mua Bena Yuda nansha kuvuluka kuau kudi tunkanunuina tuabo tshiendelele
Nunku nenvuishe mukuna wa Seî tshikulu ne tshihela tshia tshianana; ku muele wa nvita nenshihe muntu wabuelamu ne muntu wahatukamu
Yeye wakatuma bantu bua kusangakenabo n abo; bualu bua bantu bandi aba bakadi ne bundu bunene
Katataka mona, badiadia, banuanua ku mpala kuandi bamba ne, Mukelenge Adoniya ikale ne muoyo musangu mule
Ne bikala bualu bukufikishe munda, meme nempingane kabidi
Katataka ndî nkusengelela ne, Mukelenge wanyi unvue mei a muntu wandi
Kabidi neasakidile tshia bitanu tshimue tshia bintu abi
Amupeshe muana wa mukoku wa tshidimu tshimue bua aulambule Maweja Nangila, bu mulambu wa kuosha
Monai bu muakashihibua bena bukitu
Tshiena mumanye mua kuowamu mai, ngikale muakane, anyi
Bana balume ba Eliezê bakadi Lehabeya kahita; Eliezê kakadi ne bana bakuabo nansha; kadi bana ba Lehabeya bakadi ba bungi
Buenzayi bua nanku kabutampakanyi ditunga dijima nansha

Dituku dikuabo yeye wakadi uyisha bantu; Bafalese ne bayishi ba mikenshi ya Mose bakadi bashikame ha buihi, bafume ku misoko yonso ya Galela ne ya Yudaya ne ku Yelushalema; bukole bua Mukelenge buakadi n andi bua kuondaheye n abu bantu
Yeye wakadi wamba bua Yudasa, muana wa Simona Isakaliote, bualu bua yeye nguakadi ha kumutungila tshitungu, yeye wakadi umue wabo wa ba dikumi ne babidi
Ebelu Bua bualu ebu butudi n abu mbua kutamba kudimuka ku malu atuakunvua bua bumue katulu kuhambuka
Yeye udi ulama ndondu wende too ne ku ndelanganyi tshinunu

Bualu bua Mukelenge muine neahueke mu diulu wela dî dikole, ne dî dia muanjelo mutambe bakuabo bunene, ne dî dia mpungi wa Nzambi; ne bantu bafue mu Kilisto nebabike diambedi; ne hasnishe tuetu batshidi ne muoyo badibo bashîa netuangatshibue n abo hohamue mu matutu, bua kusangila ne Mukelenge mu luhehele; nunku netuikale ne Mukelenge tshiendelele

Hakahungeye dî ne bantu, yeye wakasungula bantu bua kuimbilabo Yehowa misambu ne bua kumutumbishabo mu buakane buandi hakadibo baye ku mpala kua bena nvita, bamba ne, Tumbishai Yehowa, bualu bua luse luandi ludi lujalame tshiendelele
Nakambila Yoshua ku tshikondo atshi ne, Mesu ebe akatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bakelenge aba babidi: Yehowa nênzele makelenge onso nunku a kunudi nuya
Hakamubatizabo ne bakadi mu nsubu muandi, yeye wakatendekena ne, Binuanjingulula ne, Meme udi muena ditabusha mulelela wa Mukelenge, nulue mu nsubu muanyi nushalemu
Luke Yesu wakambila bayidi bandi kabidi ne, Muntu mubanshi wakadiku, wakadi ne mulami wa bintu biandi; bakamubanda ku mesu kua mukelenge wandi ne, Yeye utu watangalasha bintu biebe
Masalayi akalua, akutshibula bibelu bia wa kumudia, ne bia mukuabo wakabashihabo n andi ku mutshi mutshiamakane; kadi hakalau kudi Yesu, akamusangana mumane kufua, kâkatshibula bibelu biandi
Bualu budi bumanyishibua ne, Mukelenge wetu wakuledibua mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, tshisamba tshivua Mose kai muambile bua bakuidi
Yotama, muana wa mukelenge, wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu wandi ulumbulula malu a bantu ba mu buloba
Wakusangisha luhehele mu bianza biandi bitunya nganyi

Kamanda wakabikila tupitene tubidi, wakabambila ne, Nulongolole masalayi nkama ibidi bua kuyau tô ne ku Kaisalia, abike butuku ebu diba ha tshitema, ne masalayi adi enda ha tubalu makumi muanda mutekete, ne bena mafuma nkama ibidi; wakabambila kabidi bua kuangatabo tubalu tua kushikikahu Paulo bamufikishe bimpe kudi ngovena Felika
Mona, hatuabuela mu buloba, wewe neusuike nshinga eu mukunze ku dididishi dia nsubu kuwakututuila: udisangishe mu nsubu webe ne tatu webe ne mamu webe ne bana benu ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu webe
Bakamba ne, Mukelenge udi n andi bualu
Kadi nebapete tshia dikumi tshia bintu bidi bena Izrayele ne bua kundambula
Yehowa wakambila Yoshua ne, Mona, nakulala Yeleko ne mukelenge wa musoko ne bena nvita bonso ba dikima mu tshianza tshiebe
Monai, nuenu Bena Isalele, buonso buenu, leshai meji enu, lumbululai
Mei au anakukuambila lelu eu ikale mu mutshima webe; wewe newayishe bana bebe, wewe neusombelele n abo bua mei au, hawashikama mu nsubu webe, ne hawenda mu nshila, ne hawalala, ne hawabika
Munyi kanuena nudisunguile bualu budi buakane
Yesu wakamubela ne, Hua, Umuka munda muandi
Mukuabo wa bantu ba muakuidi munene, muan abo ne wakakosabo ditshu kudi Petelo, wakamukonka ne, Tshiakukutangila n andi mu muaba wa mitshi ya mamuma, anyi
Tunkanunuina tua Gada Bana ba balume ba Gada bakashikama ha buihi n abo mu buloba bua Bashana ku Saleka; Yoele wakadi ha mutu habo ne Shafama wakamulonda, ne Yanai ne Shafata mu Bashana
Yeshua wakalela Yoyakima, ne Yoyakima wakalela Eleyashiba, ne Eleyashiba wakalela Yoyada, ne Yoyada wakalela Yonatana, ne Yonatana wakalela Yadua
Nzambi wakamona bintu bionso biakenzeye ne biakadi bimpe be
Nenfuishe bana bandi ne lufu, ne ekelesia yonso neimanye ne meme nyeye udi uteta meshi ne mitshima; ne nempe kudi muntu ne muntu wa munkatshi muenu difutu bu mudi midimu yandi
Kanuditapi nsalu pambidi to
Mu dituku adi kakuena kuikala ngend a mushinga
Bana ba balume ba Alona: Nadaba ne Abihu ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ
Bobu kuandamuna tatuabu ne: Muena Ejipitu mukuabu mmutusungidile kudi balami ba mikoku, kabidi mmutusunyine mayi, munuishe bimuna bietu
Yayende wa muana kukonka muana wa mukalenga ne: Udi musue nkubikidile mukaji wa bena Ebrewu udi mua kukuamushila muana ewu dibela anyi
Bantu bonsu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Efrayime badi
Mutshi wonso udi mumanyibue ku mamuma au
Bantu badi bamba malu malelela, babenga mabuejila ubateke bakulu badi ku mutu kua bantu tshinunu, lukama, makumi atanu too ne kua bantu dikumi
Yeye wakalela muana, muana mulume mene, udi ne bualu bua kukokesha bisamba bionso ne dikombo dia tshiamu; ne muana wandi wakakuatshibua mu diulu kudi Nzambi ne ku nkuasa wandi wa butumbi
Akupeteshe mayi adi apatuka munda mua buloba
Yakobe uvua ubala bidimu abi anu bu matuku makese, bualu uvua mupite kunanga Rakele

Kadi hakamanya Paulo ne, Bakuabo mBasadoke, bakuabo mBafalese, wakela dî dikole ha tshilumbuluidi ne, Bana betu, Edi bianyi Mufalese, udi muana wa Mufalese; badi bandumbuluishila bua ditekemena ne bua dibika dia befue
Bakulu makumi muanda mutekete ba munkatshi mua bakulu ba Bena Isalele bakadi bimana ku mpala kua mindidimbi ai; ne munkatshi muabo muakadi Yâzanya, muana wa Shafana, muimane
Mabue a nvula akashika bintu bionso bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu biakadi mu budimi, ne bantu ne nyama, mabue a nvula akashika midioko yonso ya mu budimi ne mitshi yonso
Mulume yonso udi utendelela anyi udi wambila bakuabo dî dia Nzambi ne mutu wandi mubuikila, udi uhuekesha butumbi bua mutu wandi
Bena Izrayele kusopa buloba kuenza madiotu, kudimina bena Ejipitu madimi

Dituku adi Basadoke bakalua kudi Yesu, badi bamba ne, Dibika dia ku lufu kadienaku; bakamukonka ne, Muyishi, Mose wakamba ne, Biafua mulume, kai ne bana, muan abo abake mukashi wandi, alelele muan abo wakufua bana
Hashishe Mika wakamba ne, Katataka ndi mumanye ne Yehowa neangenzele bimpe, bualu bua meme ndi ne Muena Lewi bu muakuidi wanyi

Hakadiye welangana meshi a malu â, muanjelo wa Mukelenge wakamueneka kudiye mu tshilota tshiandi, wakamba ne, Yosefe, muana wa Bayidi, kutshinyi mua kuangata mukashi webe Malia, bualu bua udi muimita munda muandi ngua Nyuma Muimpe
Ndi musue bantu aba bikale mu tshianza tshianyi, hashishe nengumushe Abimeleke
Arpakshade mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi asatu ne bitanu, kulelaye Shela
Pashishe nenuambile Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu ne: Maweja Nangila wanyi, ndi mukumbaje mikenji yebe yonsu
Nuenu, badi batumbishangana, badi kabai bakeba butumbi budi bufuma kudi Nzambi nkayandi, nudi bamanye mua kuitabusha munyi
Nunku Tamâ wakaya ku nsubu wa muan abo Amenona, wakamusangana mulale hanshi

Mukelenge wakabuela mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne Bena Yuda bonso ne bantu ba mu Yelushalema ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne bantu bonso, ne banene ne bakese; yeye wakababadila mei onso a mu mukanda wa tshihungidi wakasanganabo mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Kadi pikala muntu udi ne mikiya kayi musue kuyumusha, nebamuipate munkatshi mua bena Izrayele, bualu udi unyanga muaba wa tshijila wa Maweja Nangila

Bana babo ba mu meku abo, hakabalabo kulondolola kuabo, bakadi tulala Yiele ne Zekâya, ne Bêla, muana wa balume wa Azaza, muana wa balume wa Sheme, muana wa balume wa Yoele, wakashikama mu Aloe tô ne ku Nebo ne Bâla meona; ne ku esete bakamuangalaka tô ne ku tshibuelelu tshia tshihela ku musulu wa Pelata, bualu bua bimuna biabo biakavulangana mu buloba bua Gilada
mianda ya dikolesha lungenyi ne ya manayi;

Nakakeba muntu munkatshi muabo wakamanya mua kuibaka lumbu kabidi, ne bua kuimaneye ku mpala kuanyi mu muaba wakashimbuka bua kukuatshisha ba mu buloba ebu, bua meme tshibubutudi; kadi tshiakasangana muntu
Kadi bishimikidi bikole biakateka Nzambi bidi bijalama, bidi ne tshimanyishilu etshi ne, Mukelenge udi mumanye badi bandi; ne, Muntu yonso udi utela dina dia Mukelenge ûmuke biandi ku malu mabi
Hakadiye wamba dî edi, ditutu diakalua, diakababuikila; hakadibo babuela mu ditutu, bakadi ne buowa
Bakabukiya ne Uno, bana babo, bakadi ha buihi n abo mu midimu yabo
Bienzedi Hatuakahanduka, tuakamanya ne, Tshisenga etshi ntshidibo babikila ne, Melita
Ku tshibangidilu yeye wakadi mushihianganyi, katu wimana mu bualu bulelela, bua yeye kena ne bualu bulelela munda muandi

Bamuledi bakandamuna ne, Tudi bamanye ne, Eu udi muana wetu, wakadi mulela mufofo; kadi katuena bamanye muakutabaleye katataka, katuena bamanye wakumutabasha mesu; numukonke; yeye nmuntu mukole; neadiambile

Kudi dinyanga dia lumu anyi diupula dia mushinga wa ditunga bu mudi dîba didi lwendu lwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga anyi lwa Minisitila wa Kavulambedi lubengangana ne bibidilu bia mulowu anyi padibo babajadikila ne badi bênza, bênza pamwe anyi bambulwisha bakwabo mu ditulakaja dibi dia lupetu, dibwejilangana anyi dineema dikandikibwe
Nunku lua biebe kundi, ndi nkusengelela, bua meme kukuha lungenyi lua mua kusungila muoyo webe ne muoyo wa muan ebe Solomo
Bana ba balume ba Shemaya: Hatusha ne Igala ne Baliya ne Nealiya ne Shafata, basambombo bonso
Nakakula kabidi ne muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi, nakamukonka ne, Ebi mbinganyi, mukelenge wanyi
Halua dituku dibidi, fila mpumbu wa mbushi udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au mibi; nunku tshioshelu ne tshilengeshibue bu muakalengeshibuatshi ku mulambu wa mulum a ngombe
Yehowa wakunyua dî dia Eliya, muoyo wa muana wakahingana munda muandi kabidi, yeye wakatuluka
Wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa; kadi kakenza malu onso bu muakenza Davidi, kaku wandi; Wakenza malu onso bu muakenza Yoasha, tatu wandi
Tuvua baye bonsu kunowa bia mu madimi

Hashishe bakadi ku mutu kua meku a Bena Lewi bakalua kudi Eleazâ muakuidi, ne kudi Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, ne kudi bakadi ku mutu kua meku a Bena Isalele; bakabambila mu Shilo mu buloba bua Bena Kanâna ne, Yehowa wakela mukenji wandi kudi Mose bua kutuha misoko ya kushikamamu ne miaba ya kudishamu bimuna bietu
Bana babu ne Yozefe kuambuisha tumelu tuabu bibombi bia ntete ya kuenza bukula abi, kupingana ku Kenaane

Bualu bua nudi nusakila ne lubese ne diaha ne nudi nutua mikoko mitekete nsengu yenu, tô ne hanuayitangadisha mu miaba mikuabo, nunku nensungile tshisumba tshianyi tshia mikoko, kayena ikala bu tshintu tshia kuhaulabo, nendumbulule tshilumbu tshidi hankatshi ha mukoko ne mukoko

Nunku mukelenge Sedekiya wakaditshiha kudi Yelemiya mu musokoko, wamba ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo, wakutufukila muoyo wetu, tshiena nkushiha, tshiena nkufila mu bianza bia bantu aba badi bakeba muoyo webe
Agare kusomba ku mpenga, udila muadi
Batatu, udi nufundila mukanda, bualu bua nudi bamanye Yesu udi wa ku tshibangidilu
Muhika wa Abalahama wakahatula bilenga bia argent ne bia or ne bilulu, Wakabikila kudi Lebeka, yeye wakaha muan abo mulume ne mamu wandi kabidi bintu bia mushinga mukole
Lehabama wakaya ku Shekeme, bualu bua Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangishaku bua kumuhingisha mu bukelenge
Uyaya kudi kunyi
Davidi wakambila Yonatana ne, Mona, makelela ngondo udi ubala, ne bundi n abu mbua kudia bidia ku mesa a mukelenge; kadi witabushe bua meme kuya kubulama mu budimi tô ne hahita matuku asatu
Hashishe balume ba mu Isalele bakambila Gideona ne, Utukokeshe; ne wewe ne muan ebe mulume, ne muana wa muan ebe mulume kabidi; bualu bua wewe wakatusungila mu bianza bia Bena Midiyana
Ndi ngamba ne, Wewe ne Siba nuabanyangane buloba

Mose wakamba ne, Netuye ne bana bakese ne bantu banunu, ne bana betu ba balume ne bana betu ba bakashi, netuye ne mikoko yetu ne ngombe yetu, bualu bua tudi ne bualu bua kudia bidia ku mesu kua Yehowa
Wakatuma muisatu; bakamutaha mputa, bakamuihata
Genesis Ei idi ndelanganyi ya Esau dina diandi dikuabo Edome

Ne ku nyima kua tshilulu tshikudika tshibidi kuakadi muaba wa mu tshitendelelu udibo babikila ne, Muaba mutambe tshijila; wakadi ne tshioshelu tshia mananashi tshia ngolo, ne mushete wa tshihungidi mulamika ne ngolo ku nseke yonso; munda muau muakadi tshifuadi tshia ngolo tshitekelamu mana, ne mulangala wa Alona wakela ntonga, ne mabue akadi ne mei a tshihungidi mafundahu; ne ha mutu hau bakeluba ba butumbi bavuisha dileshi ha mutu ha muaba wa kubuikidila mibi; bua bintu ebi kakuena bualu bua kuamba katataka mudi tshintu ne tshintu
Kadi yeye wakamushima
Bakalamika mabaya a cèdre ha mutu ha makunshi makumi anai ne atanu: dikumi ne atanu ku mulongo ne ku mulongo
Yeye kabidi wakaha bantu bonso ditabusha dia bualu ebu, bua yeye wakamubisha ku lufu
Kadi, bua muntu wanyi Moshe kabiena nanku to
Yesu wakamukonka ne, Tshiakukuambila ne, Biwitabusha, neumone butumbi bua Nzambi, anyi

Bakasangana bualu mu mukanda wa mikenji buakambila Yehowa Mose bua Bena Isalele bashikame mu bitandatanda, badie bidia bia disanka mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete; bua bobo batumine bantu bonso mu misoko yonso ne mu Yelushalema ne, Yai bienu ku mikuna, nuangate matamba a olive ne matamba a olive ya muitu, ne matamba a mitshi ya myrte ne malala a mabue, ne matamba a mitshi mikuabo bua kuenza n au bitandatanda bu muakafundabo
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mushindu udi batuangaji mua kulambula milambu a
Bakumuka ku mpala kua bena tshilumbuluidi basanka bualu bua bakabadibua ne, Mbakane bua kufuishibuabo bundu bualu bua Dina dia Yesu

Hezikiya wakunvua mei a bantu aba, wakabalesha bintu bionso bia mu bibutshilu biandi, bintu bia argent ne bia or ne bintu bia muhuya muimpe ne manyi a mushinga mukole ne nsubu wa bintu biandi bia nvita ne bintu bionso biakadiye n abi; Hezikiya kakabenga bua kubalesha bintu bionso bia mu nsubu wandi ne mu bukelenge buandi
Nuteleje tshindi nnuambila nuenu, bana banyi meme Yakobe
Mei a bena meji adibo bunvua talalâ adi ahita mbila ya mukokeshi wa bahote buakane
Ekesode Mulau Udi Ukuata Bimuna Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi Palô, umuambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu, udi Wamba ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye kuntendelela
Wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa bu muakenza Davidi, nkambua wandi
Kuinshi kua nsubu wakenzaku nsubu mukuabo ne mabaya a cèdre, bunene buandi buakadi coudées makumi abidi: wakenza nsubu eu wa muaba wa tshijila
Nuelangane muoyo ne dituangana dia mishiku dia tshijila
Bakadi batumibue bakasangana bu muakabambileye
Bobo bakaya ku mikuna, bakalua mu tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bakatentekela buloba

Wewe, muana wa muntu, kubatshinyi nansha, kutshinyi mei abo kabidi, nansha hikala mingonge ne meba bikunyunguluke, nansha biwikala mushikame munkatshi mua tuminyiminyi; kutshinyi mei abo, kukuatshiki buowa bua mpala yabo, bualu bua badi tshisamba tshia bantombokedi
Wakidikisha tshibuelelu atshi ne luidi luakidikishileye n alu bikuabo, nsubu yatshi ya bansentedi, biluwa biatshi, ne mbalanda watshi; ne wakabisangisha bikale ne bunene buobumue ne bua bikuabo

Hakatangila mukashi ne Yosefe wakashiya tshivualu mu tshianza tshiandi, wakanyema, wakahatuka, mukashi wakela dî kudi balume ba mu nsubu wandi, wakabambila ne, Tangilai, mulume wanyi wakulua ne Muena Ebelu mu nsubu bualu bua kutufiusha bundu, wakabuela mu nsubu bua kulaleye banyi, ne meme nakuela di dianyi dikole
Au mmena a bana ba balume ba Alona bakuidi bakadi ne manyi mela ha mitu, bakajidilabo bua kuenza mudimu wa buakuidi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Makelela ha diba edi mene nebahane tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha ku nshekele umue, ne bihiminu bia bukula bua orge bibidi ku nshekele umue ku tshibi tshia ku Samalea
Bintu bionsu bidi ku muaba wa tshijila, ne bidibu benza nabi muaba awu, too ne ku milonda ya bitupa idi ku ntenta wa muaba wa tshijila ne ku lupangu, bikale anu bia tshiamu tshikunze
Kadi bobo bakaluhuka, bakatangalasha lumu luandi mu luseke alu luonso

Azaya, muana wa Sadoka, muakuidi; Eleholefe ne Ahiya, bana ba Shisha, bakadi ba secrétaire; Yehoshafata, muana wa Ahiluda, wakadi mufundi; Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, wakadi ku mutu kua masalayi; Sadoka ne Ebeyatâ bakadi bakuidi; Azaya, muana wa Natana, wakadi ku mutu kua tuhita tuandi; Zabuda, muana wa Natana, wakadi muloho wandi manene, mulunda wa mukelenge; Alusha wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu wandi; Adonilama, muana wa Abeda, wakadi kahita ka bena mudimu
Kadi mulau wikale kudi udi udinga, udi ne mulume wa mikoko mu bimuna biandi, udi ulaya bua kumufila, hashishe, udi ufila mukuabo udi mulema kudi Yehowa
Nuenu nuakadibisha mu miaba ya batatu benu bu bana ba bantu babi bakavulangana, bua kudiundisha bukole bua tshiji tshia Yehowa kudi Isalele
Matthew Mukanda wa bankambua ba Yesu Kilisto, muana wa Bayidi, muana wa Abalahama
Nundekelele bubi ebu

Nunku Hilekiya, muakuidi munene, ne Ahikama ne Akabo ne Shafana ne Asaya bakaya kudi Huleda, muprofete mukashi, wakadi mukashi wa Shaluma, muana wa Tikewa, muana wa Hâhasa, mulami wa bilulu bia mukelenge; yeye wakadi mushikame mu luseke luibidi lua mu Yelushalema ; bakasomba n andi
Kadi kabakunvua, kabakateleja matshu bua kukudimunabo mitshima yabo ku bubi buabo, bua kulekela kuoshila nzambi mikuabo musenga wa manananshi
Wewe neuteke mu mushete mabue a dihungila andi nkuha
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba bua Yehoyakima, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne, Yeye kena wikala ne muana wa kushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Davidi, ne nebimashe tshitalu tshiandi mu munya ne mu mashika a butuku
Ndi mona ne wewe utshidi mu nyongangandu wa bululu ne mu lukanu lua bualu bubi

Shelomota eu ne bana babo bakadi ku mutu kua bibutshilu bia bintu bionso bia tshijila biakajidilabo kudi Davidi mukelenge ne kudi ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya hatatu babo, ne kudi tupitene tua bantu tshinunu ne tua bantu lukama ne kudi tupitene tua masalayi
Alona wakasaku, bakamujika; ne Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, wakenza mudimu wandi wa buakuidi
Asa wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa bu muakenza Davidi, tatu wandi
Udi ne mukashi udi biandi mubaki wa mukashi; kadi mulunda wa mubaki, himaneye n andi, hatelesheye dî diandi, neatambe kusanka bualu bua dî dia mubaki; ka disanka dianyi didi dikumbane
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Bualu bua nuenu kanuakungitabusha bua kunjidila ku mesu kua Bena Isalele, nunku kabuena nulua ne bantu aba mu buloba bunakubaha

Yeye udi Muena Bukole umuehele mutumbishibue, udi biandi Mukelenge wa bakelenge ne Nfumu wa banfumu; anu yeye udi kai mua kufua, udi wikala mu munya udi bantu kabai bamanye mua kufika kudiu, udi muntu kai muanze kuimona, ne udiye kai mumanye mua kumona kabidi; yeye ikale biandi ne buneme ne bukole bua tshiendelele
Muntu wanyi Davidi neikale mukelenge ku mutu kuabo; buonso buabo nebikale ne mulami wa mikoko umue; nebende mu malu andi mbambila, nebatumikile mikenji yanyi, nebayenze
Bualu bua dina dia Nzambi didi dihendibua bualu buenu munkatshi mua bisamba bia bende, bu muakafundabo
Baluishi aba kuasa mu ditunga adi
Bualu bua nudi nukeba dijadikibua dia Kilisto udi wakula munda muanyi, udi kai mutekete kunudi kadi udi mukole munda muenu

Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua bana ba Alona udi muena nsudi anyi udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi kena mua kudia bintu bia tshijila tô ne hashika disama diandi Muntu yonso udi ulenga mukuabo udi munyanguke bualu bua wakadi mulenge tshitalu anyi wakadi muele bilunu, anyi udi ulenga tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi tshidi mua kumunyanga, anyi ham bidi ha mundi udi munyanguke mu mushindu wonso, muntu udi ulenga bianza ham bidi ha bintu ebi neikale munyanguke tô ne dilolo, kena mua kudia bintu bia tshijila diambedi yeye kayi muanze kuowa mai ha mubidi
Nennuhe mutshima muhia muhia kabidi, nenteke nyuma muhia muhia munda muenu; nengumushe mutshima udi bu dibue munda muenu, nennuhe mutshima wa buntu
Nvula munene nealoke, ne mabue a nvula neahone, ne tshihuhu tshikole netshilushimbule
Moshe, muntu wa Maweja Nangila, kufuila mu ditunga dia Mowabe, anu bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumane kuamba
Hakaluabo kudi bayidi, bakatangila tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu tshibunguile ne bafundi babakonka malu
Nendumbuluishe Bena Moaba; nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Yeye wakadiolola ham bidi ha muana misangu isatu, wakadila kudi Yehowa ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, ndi nkusengelela ne, Hingisha muoyo wa muana eu munda muandi kabidi

Neangate mashi a muana mulume wa ngombe, neamiamine mashi ne munu wandi ku tshibuikilu tshia mushete ku luseke lua ku esete, neamiamine mashi ku mpala kua tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne munu wandi kabidi misangu muanda mutekete

Mikenji ya dikosa dia bilumbu Mu bimenga bionsu bikale Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupe bua kusomba, nusungule balumbuluishi ne bulombodi, badi mua kulumbuluisha bantu bonsu ba mu bisamba bienu, kakuyi kansungansunga
Nakakeba kunutekela budimu kudi mukuabo wa banakanutumina, anyi

Hakunvuabo dî edi, bakatumbisha Nzambi ne mutshima umue, bakamba ne, Mukelenge wetu, wewe wakafuka diulu ne buloba ne mai manene ne bintu bionso bidimu; wewe wakamba kudi Nyuma Muimpe mukana mua tatu wetu Davidi, muntu webe ne, Bakelenge ba ha buloba bakutantamana bua kuluangana, Bulelela, mu musoko eu, Helode ne Pontio Pilato ne bisamba bia bende ne Bena Isalele bakadisangisha bua kuelela Muana webe wa tshijila Yesu, uwakela manyi ha mutu, tshifufu, ne bua kuenza malu onso akasungula tshianza tshiebe ne mutshima webe diambedi ne, Alue
Kuendi masandi
Binuamba mu mitshima yenu ne, Bisamba ebi bidi bituhita bunene, nembihate munyi
Nuele ba mu nsubu wa Nâkiso badi mu Mukelenge muoyo

Bana balume ba bimbi ba misambu bakadisangisha hohamue, bafume ku nseke yonso yakadi minyunguluke Yelushalema ne ku misoko ya Bena Netofa, ne ku Bete gilegala ne ku nseke ya Geba ne Azamaweta; bualu bua bimbi ba misambu bakasa misoko yabo minyunguluke Yelushalema
Wakamuitaba ne, Yeye wakungambila ne, Wewe neusangale bulelela
Yoshua wakamuangalasha bantu, mu ntu ku buhianyi buandi mundi ku buhianyi buandi
Nakajingulula kabidi ne Bena Lewi kabakadi bangata bintu biabo; nunku Bena Lewi ne bimbi ba misambu, bakadi benza mudimu, bawahingana muntu ne muntu mu budimi buandi
Bantu bakamukudimuna dî ne, Udi ne demon munda, udi ukeba kukushiha nganyi
Ndi ngamba ne, Lungenyi ludibo bakulesha ne bukole buebe bua kuluangana n abu nvita bidi anu mei a hatuhu
Yesu wakabambila ne, Luai ku nyima kuanyi, nenuvuishe bilembi bia bantu
Bualu bua mudimu wandi ne wabo wakadi muomumue, wakadi ushikama n abo, bakadi benza mudimu, bua bakadi benji ba nsubu ya bilulu
Mukaji awu kumulelela bana basambombu: Zimrane, Yokshane, Medane, Madiyane, Ishebake ne Shuwa

Kadi yeye nkayandi wakaya luendu lua dituku dimue mu tshihela, wakashikama hanshi muinshi mua mutshi wa genêt; wakalomba Nzambi bua kufueye, wamba ne, Kuakushika mpindiu, Yehowa angate muoyo wanyi, bualu bua meme tshiena muhite batatu banyi buakane
Hakunvua Bena Isalele lumu alu, tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele aba tshiakadisangisha ku Shilo, bua kuluangana n abo
Bakabika dinda hatshiatshia honso, bakatendelela ku mpala kua Yehowa, bakahingana, bakafika ku nsubu wabo mu Lama: Elekana wakamanya Hana, mukashi wandi, ne Yehowa wakamuvuluka
Bubidi buabo, mulume ne mukashi, bakadi butaka, kabakadi ne bundu

Nenuikale mu bitandatanda matuku muanda mutekete; bantu bonso hakalelabo mu Isalele nebashikame mu bitandatanda bua kumanyisha bantu ba mu bikondo bienu bionso ne, Bena Isalele bakashikama mu bitandatanda hanakahatuka n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu, meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Mukana muandi muakabuluka lubilu, ludimi luandi luakambuluka, wakakula utumbisha Nzambi
Hezikiya wakamba ne, Mbualu bukese bua mundidimbi uye ku mpala biendedi dikumi; mbimpe mundidimbi uhingane biendedi dikumi
Mitshi ya bimuma idi itolokamu anyi
Wakanyema lubilu, wakaya kudi Simona Petelo ne kudi muyidi mukuabo wakadi musuibue kudi Yesu, wakabambila ne, Bakumusha Mukelenge mu lukita, katuena bamanye kuakumuladikabo
Aba mbakelenge bakakokesha mu buloba bua Edome diambedi mukelenge kayi muanze kukokesha Bena Isalele: Bela, muana mulume wa Beô; dina dia musoko wandi diakadi Dinehaba

Hashishe bantu bakadi bakuatshila mukelenge mudimu bakamuambila ne, Bakebele mukelenge bansongakashi balengele batshidi tumama; mukelenge asunguile tuhita tuandi mu nseke yonso ya bukelenge buandi bua bobo basangishe bansongakashi bonso balengele batshidi tumama mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa mu Shushana; babafile mu bianza bia Hegai, muntu mutungula wa mukelenge, mulami wa bakashi ba mukelenge, bashikame mu luhangu lua bakashi, babahe bintu bia kubalengesha n abi
Milambu ayi, nuyilambule pamue ne inudi nundambula matuku a Dikisha

Nakatuma bamessager mu tshihela tshia Kedemota kudi Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona, ne mei a ditalala ne, Witabushe bua tuetu tuhite mu buloba buebe: netuye anu mu musesu munene, katuena tusesuka ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Misambu Wewe Nzambi, bualu kai wakutubenga tshiendelele
Hashishe Natana wakambila Davidi ne, Wewe mene udi muntu eu
Kuvudi muana mukashi wa mukashi wa tatu ebe bilulu, yeye udi muan enu mukashi
Dinga dî didi mu Mukanda wa Nzambi kabidi ne, Nebatangile wakutuabo difuma
Umue wabo wakaya mu budimi bua kuaka kaleji, wakasanganamu muonshi wa hatuhu, wakahuola biloaloa mu tshilulu tshiandi, wakahingana n abi, wakabihanda, wakabiela mu luesu, kabakabimanya nansha
Bantu bakalua ne milambu ya kumusakidila n ai; bantu bakasua kuenza nunku mu mitshima yabo bakalua ne milambu ya kuosha kabidi
Nunku, yeye wakihata mulume, wakateka bakeluba ku esete kua budimi bua Edene ne muele wa nvita wa kalua wakadi utshinguluka ku nseke yonso, bua kulamabo nshila wa ku mutshi wa muoyo
Badi bambila muntu yonso udi wenda mu tshitshu tshia mu mutshima wandi ne, Dikenga kadiena dikukuata
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya Esau dina diandi dikuabo Edome
Ekesode Mose wakandamuna ne, Kadi bobo kabena bangitabusha, kabena bunvua di dianyi, bobo nebambe ne, Yehowa kakamueneka kûdi nansha
Mukelenge wa Yeleko wakatumina Lahaba dî ne, Hatula balume bakulua kudi, bakubuela mu nsubu muebe; bualu bua bobo bakulua bua kutentekela buloba buonso
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nensokoke Abalahama bualu bundi ngenza, anyi
Nakabatumina ba messager ne, Meme ndi ngenza mudimu munene, nunku tshiena mua kulua; bundi n abu mbua kuhumbisha mudimu hanumuka bianyi bua kulua kunudi bua tshinyi
Bana ba muan enu mukashi musungula badi bakuela muoyo
Yozefe ufika ku nzubu kuende, kudielabu panshi kumpala kuende, kumulambula bintu biabu
Unvuai, diba nedilue, diakumana kufika mene mene, dianumuangalashabo, muntu kuandi, muntu kuandi; nenunshîe meme nkayanyi; kadi tshiena nkayanyi bualu bua Tatu udi neanyi
Bakela lufu ne Muaba wa Bafue mu dishiha dia kahia
Mulume wakidika bimuna bionso ne nyunyu yonso ya mu diulu ne bimuna bionso bia mu madimi mena abi, kadi mulume kakadi ne mukuatshishi wa bu muakadiye nansha
Bakatuma bantu makumi atanu, bakakebakeba tô matuku asatu, kadi kabakamusangana
Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Beleteshasâ, tshilota etshi ne dijingulula diatshi kabikutatshishi nansha
Mu ditutu adi nenumanye ne, Meme ndi munda mua Tatu wanyi, nuenu nudi munda muanyi, meme ndi munda muenu
Muakuidi neatangile ha munyinyi wa mubidi mubishe, neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane, munyinyi eu mubishe kawena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi
Bualu bua muanjelo wanyi neaye ku mpala kuebe, nealue n ebe kudi Bena Amole ne kudi Bena Pelizi ne kudi Bena Hiti ne kudi Bena Kanana ne kudi Bena Hiwi ne kudi Bena Yebuse, ne meme nembashihe
Hanuasa nsubu muhia muhia, nenuenze kabidi lumbu tukese ku mutu kua nsubu, nunku muntu kahonyi hanshi, ne mashi andi kaikadi ku nsubu yenu

Tshiena ndombela aba nkayabo, kadi ndi ndombela kabidi badi bangitabusha bua dî diabo; bua buonso buabo bikale bamue; Tatu, bu mûdi munda muanyi ne meme munda muebe, bobo kabidi bikale munda muetu, bua ba ha buloba bitabushe ne, Wewe wakantuma
Bua Gada yeye wakamba ne, Muntu wavudishila Gada disanka udi ne disanka: yeye udi walamina bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, yeye udi utula diboko ne lubombo lua ku mutu kabidi
Nunku nakatendelela Nzambi wa mu diulu

Nsumuinu yenu idi anu nsumuinu ya butue, Nuanji kutulesha, nundekele bua meme ngakule bianyi; Kakuena bualu; nensume munyinyi wanyi ku menu anyi, Monai, yeye neanshihe; tshiena ne ditekemena; Kadi bualu ebu nebuikale luhandu luanyi ne, Unvuai dî dianyi bimpe, Tangilai mpindiu ne, Nakuteka tshilumbu tshianyi ku mpala kuandi; Nganyi udi mua kuelangana n anyi mpata
Moshe kuambila Arone ne: Bikila bena Izrayele bonsu, basemene kudi Maweja Nangila, bualu mmumane kumvua bijanu biabu
Muntu yonso udi kai ulenduka bua bualu buanyi udi ne disanka
Bakambila Davidi bualu ebu; yeye wakasangisha Bena Isalele bonso hohamue, bakasabuka musulu wa Yadene, bakafika ku Helama

Bakulu ba mu musoko au nebakuate muntu au, nebamukengeshe; ne bobo nemmuambile ne, Ufute lukama lua nshekele ya argent ne yeye neayifile kudi tatu wa mushikankunde eu, bualu bua yeye wakuona lumu lua mukashi utshidi kamama mu Isalele: yeye neikale mukashi wandi, yeye kena mua kumuhidia tô matuku andi onso
Bualu budi butamba buimpe bua nuenu nuitabushe banuenzele bibi, nasha
Ya tshibilu tshia Tuzubu tua Bisasa Matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondu wa muanda mutekete, kanuenji mudimu to

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Tshiena nnuenzela bu mudi malu mabi enu, anyi bu mudi bienzedi bienu binyanguke, nuenu ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele, kadi nenumanye ne, Ndi Yehowa, hananuenzela malu bua dina dianyi
Kanujadiki dibue dia kutendelela didi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ukina
Tuvua ne biakudia bipite bungi: mishipa katuyi tusumba, bisekiseki bivule, mawoji, bimuma bia melone, matungulu a mishindu mishilangane ne ndungu

Lebeka wakangata bilulu bimpe bia Esau, muan andi muan a bute, biakadiye n abi mu nsubu, wakabiluatshisha Yakoba, muan andi muan a mukala, wakamuluatshisha biseba bia nkungulu ya mbushi ha bianza ne ha dikoshi
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudi Bena Isalele, yeye wakabafila mu bianza bia Hazaele, mukelenge wa Sulia, ne mu bianza bia Bene hadada, muana wa Hazaele, tô matuku abo onso
Kuenzaye kabidi ne manananshi a tshijila a kuosha pa tshilambuilu
Badi Bashikisha Kuenza Bintu bia Kubuesha mu Tshitendelelu Ek
Bana ba balume ba Kaleba, muana wa Yefune: Ilu, Ela ne Nâma; bana ba balume ba Ela: Kenaza
Yeye kakateka buloba bua bantu bulualua, butudi tuamba bualu buabu, munshi mua banjelo
Mukelenge wanyi wakakonka bantu bebe ne Nudi ne tatu, anyi muan enu mukuabo, anyi
Nebasangashe mabue adi bu mishiki mu diala akamanabo kuosha, anyi
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu mundi ne muoyo, tshiena ngitabusha bua nuenu nulombe lungenyi kundi
dipeta dia bintu bwa majinga a ditunga, kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ;
Nyunyi umue ikale mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu
Nebakeme, bamba ne: Bena tshisamba tshinene etshi badi ne bantu ba lungenyi ne meji
Kadi bikala bualu bubuluibua kudi mukuabo udi ushikamamu, muntu wa kumudilu ahue biandi
Mukashi muenji wa mudimu wakadi ulama ku tshibi, wakakonka Petelo ne, Wewe kabidi udi mukuabo wa bayidi ba muntu eu, nasha
Wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi muana wa nganyi
John Meme ndi muonshi mimene mulelela wa mamuma a nvinyo, Tatu wanyi udi mulami wau

Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kukolesha ne kujadika, ne diambulwisha dia tulasa, dimanya dia maalu ne ditangalaja, dineemeka dia mapa a bantu bônso, budikadidi bwa nshindameenu ne makanyika a mweena mwaabo adibo bafunda mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi
Tatu wetu wakatuambila ne, Yai bienu kabidi, nutusumbile tuntu tua kudia tukese
Yeye wakamukukuila
Wakadi uhingana ku Lama bualu bua nsubu wandi wakadiku: wakalumbululaku Bena Isalele, wakashilaku Yehowa tshioshelu
Nunku batahike ba Bena Peleshete bakahona mu nshila wa ku Shâlayima tô ne ku Gata ne ku Ekelona
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Nujidile matuku anyi a mbingu kabidi, ikale biau tshimanyinu hankatshi banyi n enu, bua nuenu numanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa Nzambi wenu

Muntu webe, tatu wetu wakabambila ne, Nudi bamanye ne mukashi wanyi wakundelela bana balume babidi, umue wabo wakumuka kundi, nakamba ne, Nyama mubi wakamuhandulula, ne ku dituku adi tshiakamutangila kabidi, binumusha muana eu mukuabo kundi, ne biakuatshishibueye bualu bubi, nennubueshe nsuki yanyi mitoke to mu Muaba wa Bafue ne kanyinganyinga kakole Nunku hanaya kudi muntu webe, tatu wanyi, ne nsongalume eu kayi n etu, bualu bua muoyo wandi udi musuikakana ne muoyo wa nsongalume eu, hashishe, hatangileye ne nsongalume kena n etu, yeye neafue, ne tuetu, bantu bebe, netubueshe nsuki ya muntu webe, tatu wetu, mu Muaba wa Bafue ne kanyinganyinga kakole
Yakobe kuimanyika bakaji bende bapika abu ne bana bavuabu balele kumpala kua mulongu
Yeye kakamuandamuna nasha di dimue; ngovena wakatamba kukema
Nunku nuenu nenufile mulambu wa bia dikumi bionso binudi nuangata kudi Bena Isalele bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, wewe neuhe Alona muakuidi mulambu eu wa bintu bidibo banyukula kudi Yehowa
Alue biandi kundi, amanye biandi ne muprofete udi mu Isalele
Kadi mulume kakitabusha bua kulala butuku abu; wakabika, wakaya, wakafika ku Yebuse udi Yelushalema mene ne mukashi wandi ne mpunda ibidi yakadi ne biseba ha nyima hai
Meme ndi ne bukole bua kukukengesha n abu, kadi Nzambi wa tatu ebe wakungambila butuku bua lelu ne, Udimuke, kuambidi Yakoba nansha dî dimpe nansha di dibi
Kuena munmanye ne, Meme ndi ne bukokeshi bua kukulekela, ndi ne bukokeshi kabidi bua kukushiha ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Nebamanye ne meme Yehowa nakuamba dî bua mukau wanyi, hanahumuna tshiji tshianyi ham bidi habo
Ku luseke luabo lukuabo bakasa kudi Sadoka, muana wa Bâna
Kadi musangu awu Yuda kavua kumbelu to
Yoshua Wakenza bu muakamuambila Mose, wakasangana ne Bena Amaleka Mose ne Alona ne Hû bakaya ha mutu ha mukuna
Bakidikisha bujitu bua bituha bia mpalata makumi asatu, bakamuhabi

Mose wakadi ushimika ntenta ku butshika bua tshitudilu, wakamubikila ne, Ntenta wa kusambakena Muntu yonso wakasua kukeba Yehowa wakaluhuka mu tshitudilu bua kuya ku ntenta wa kusambakena, wakadi ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Uziya wakabalongoluela, buonso buabo mene, ngabu ne mafuma, ne bifulu bia tshiamu ne bikowelu bia tshiamu ne mata ne mabue a kuela mu bielelu
Shaula wakamana kufila muan andi mukashi, Mikala, mukashi wa Davidi, kudi Palati, muana wa Layisha wa mu Galima

Mulau ulualua kunudi; bualu bua nuenu nutu nuafila tshia dikumi tshia luenyi, ne tshia tshidibi a luenyi, ne tshia tshikote, kadi nuakulekela kuenza malu makole a mikenshi ya Nzambi, bulelela ne luse ne ditabusha; biakadi bimpe bia nuenu kuenza malu â a ku nyima, kambimpe nulengulule mua kuenza malu au a ku mpala kabidi
Mu tshikondo atshi nakanuambila malu onso anudi ne bualu bua kuenza
Bena Isalele bakakolesha mitshima yabo, bakela mualu wa nvita ku muaba wakelabo mualu wa nvita diambedi
Nanku muntu yonsu udi ne mikiya, nansha udi kayi nayi, udi mua kudia munyinyi awu, mudiye musue, bu munudi nudia munyinyi wa kabuluku, nansha wa ngulungu
Bishi bionsu bidi ne masala, kanuena mua kubidia to, bualu bidi ne mikiya
Kîyata bâla eu udi Kîyata yalima kabidi ne Laba; bimenga bibidi ne misoko yabi
bamanye mua kumumona
Hakabueleye kudiye, yeye wakamuambila ne, Ambule muana webe
Bena Lewi ne bana ba Kohata ne bana ba Kola bakajuka, bakatumbisha Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele ne dî dikole

Hakabeyeye nsuki ya ku mutu bualu bua yeye wakadi ne tshilele tshia kubeya nsuki yandi ku tshidimu ku tshidimu, bualu bua bujitu buai , hakidikisheye bujitu bua nsuki yandi buakadi bu nshekele nkama ibidi, bu mudi tshidikishilu tshia mukelenge
Meme hanyi nenduangane n enu ne tshianza tshiolola kunudi ne diboko dianyi dikole, ne tshiji, ne tshifik a munda, ne tshiji tshikole
Nunku Palo asungule muntu udi ne budimu ne lungenyi, amuteke ku mutu kua buloba bua Ejipitu

Ezekiel Mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshitanu tshia buhika buetu, ku tshibangidilu tshia tshidimu, mu dituku dia dikumi dia ngondo, tshiakadi tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshinai tshia ku nyima kua tshidimu tshiakashihabo musoko, mu dituku adi mene tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi ham bidi hanyi, ne yeye wakalua n anyi kuinaku
Moshe kufikisha bivua bantu bandamune kudi Maweja Nangila
Kadi yeye wakenda mu nshila ya bakelenge ba Isalele; wakadidila Bala mpingu ya biamu kabidi
Nzambi wakamuha malu akalombeye
Bakatekahu muonshi wa bleu muhindakana, bakatshisuika ha tshilulu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Muntu wakadi mu nsubu wa lukanu, dina diandi Balaba, musuika ne batomboke n andi; mu batomboki buabo bakadi bashihangane
Bena Isalele bonso, balume ne bakashi, ba mitshima miololoke bakitabusha kufila bintu ku mudimu wakadi Yehowa Wambila Mose bua kuenjibua, bakabika kudi Yehowa bu kuha kuabo kua disanka
Hashishe yeye wakabambila ne, Yai, numubikile
Nebimanshe bintu abi ku mpenga kua tshimenga muaba wa bintu bibi
Bualu kai
Nakalua n andi kudi bayidi bebe, bobo kabakamanya mua kushikisha disama diandi
Kumuelaye mulawu wamba ne: Kenaane ikale muena diakabi
Hezikiya Wakenza nunku ku nseke yonso ya Bena Yuda; yeye wakenza malu mimpe ne makane ne a lulamatu ku mpala kua Yehowa Nzambi wandi
Hakamanya Yesu ne, Yeye wakuandamuna dî dia lungenyi, Yesu wakamuambila ne, Wewe udi ha buihi ne bukelenge bua Nzambi
Bua ditabusha Yakoba, hakadiye wamba kufua, wakasankisha muana ne muana ba Yosefe ne wakatendelela mueyemene ha dikombo diandi
Genese Yakoba Udi Udilongoluela bua Kusambakena ne Esau Yakoba wakaya mu nshila wandi ne banjelo ba Nzambi bakasambakena n andi

Hashishe Hamana wakambila mukelenge ne, Bua muntu udi mukelenge usanka kunemeka, balue ne bilulu bidi mukelenge uluata ne kabalu kadi mukelenge wenda ha nyima haku ne tshifulu tshia bukelenge tshidiye wasa ku mutu kuandi; bafile bintu ebi ne kabalu mu bianza bia umue wa bantu ba mukelenge badi batamba buneme, baluatshishe muntu udi mukelenge usanka bua kunemeka, bendeshe muntu au ha nyima ha kabalu aka mu musesu wa musoko, bele dî ku mpala kuandi ne, Nebenzele muntu udi mukelenge usanka bua kunemeka nunku
Bakambila Yakoba ne, Mona muan ebe Yosefe ulua lua kûdi Isalele wakadikolesha, wa kashikama ha bulalu
Hashishe Eliezê, muana wa Dodawahu wa mu Malesha, wakamba dî bua Yehoshafata ne, Bualu bua wewe wakadisangisha ne Ahazaya Yehowa wakumana kushiha midimu yebe
Nunku Satana wakaluhuka ku mpala kua Yehowa, wakasamisha Yobo ne biusha binene ham bidi bonso, munda mua makasa tô ne ku lubombo lua mutu wandi
Bobo kabakamanya ne, Yosefe wakadi ujingulula mei akadibo bambilangana, bualu bua muandamunyi wa miaku wakadiku
Kadi bakuidi ba ku bitendelelu abi kabakalua ku tshioshelu tshia Yehowa tshia mu Yelushalema; bakadia bidia biakadi kabiyi ne luevene munkatshi mua bana habo
Yeye wakatendekena Yesu ne, Kutuihatshi mu luseke elu
Kutedi dina dianyi meme, Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu webe, tshitelatela, bualu meme nengangate muntu yonsu udi kayi unemeka dina dianyi bu muena tshibawu

Nshikidilu wa bantu bonso udi muomumue: udi muomumue kudi bantu bakane ne kudi bantu babi, kudi bantu bimpe badi ne mitshima mitoke ne kudi badi ne mitshima mifike, kudi badi bashihela Nzambi nyama ne kudi badi kabayi bamushihela nyama; muntu muakane udi anu bu muntu mubi; udi muditshihe udi muomumue ne udi utshina mua kuditshiha
Bakabisangisha buatshia buatshia, muntu ne muntu bu muakamanyeye mudiadieye, ne hakatema munya, bidia biakenguluka

Dilomba diônso ku dimwe ku dimwe badi badifila ku Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa tshidi tshilondesha bulongama bwa dilomba, bwa tshingenyingenyi anyi bwa difwanyikija
Yeye mene neakokeshe bantu banyi
Bana ba balume ba Etana: Azâya
Sisela wakasangisha makalu andi a biamu onso nkama tshitema, ne bantu bonso bakadi n andi, ku Haloshete wa munkatshi mua bisamba bia bende, tô ne ku musulu wa Kishona
Hakadisangishabo hohamue, Pilato wakabakonka ne, Nudi basue meme nulekelele nganyi
Nudi nuamba bienu ne, Yehowa udi wamba dî edi, kadi meme tshiakudiamba nansha
Ba mu bisamba bionso bakalua bua kunvua meji a Solomo; ba mu banfumu ba buloba, hakunvuabo lumu lua meji andi, bakulua

Bana betu, ndi nusengelela bua Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto ne bua dinanga dia Nyuma Muimpe, ne, Nudienzeshe n anyi bikole mu dilomba dienu dia bualu buanyi kudi Nzambi, bua meme mpanduke mu bianza bia bena tshitshu ba mu Yudaya, ne bua dikuatshisha dinyana n adi mu Yelushalema dikale bu mudi basanto basue, ne bua meme nfike kunudi ne disanka bua disua dia Nzambi, ne bua kusangana n enu dikisha
Kudingidi mukuenu
Nyuma ya bukoya yakaluhuka, yakabuela munda mua ngulube; tshisumbu tshiai tshiakanyemena lubilu ku tshibungubungu, tshiakahona mu dishiba; yakadi bu binunu bibidi; yakafua mu mai
Monai, ntshihoyi tshia Solomo
Bualu Mvidi Mukulu uvua mumanye ne: pikale mvita mijuke, nebatshine, bapingane kabidi mu Ejipitu
Aba bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo mu bikondo biabo bionso, bantu banene; bakadi bashikama mu Yelushalema
Genese Badi Bahetela Isaka Mukashi Abalahama wakadi muntu mununu mukoke, ne Yehowa wakasankisha Abalahama mu malu andi onso
Nunku Bena Isalele bakatombokela ba mu nsubu wa Davidi tô ne ku didiku edi
Hashishe, habueleye mu nsubu wa kulaleye tulu, wewe uta ngile muaba udiye mulale, wewe ubuelemu umushe bilulu ku makasa andi ulale biebe ne yeye neakua, mbile tshiudi mua kuenza
Abimeleke kuambila Abrahame ne: Ditunga dianyi ndikulekele, wase muaba uudi musue
Mukelenge udi Nyuma, ne hadi Nyuma wa Mukelenge hadi budishikaminyi
Yeye wakabala mu mukanda wa mikenji ya Nzambi ku dituku ku dituku, ku dituku dia kumudilu tô ne ku dituku dia nshikidilu
Kadi Paulo wakamba ne, Mukelenge Festo, tshiena muhale, kadi ndi ngamba mei a bushua ne a meshi
Nushihe mikoko ya kuhita kua Yehowa, nudijidile, nujidile bana benu, bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa diakambabo kudi Mose
Mukelenge wakambila Danyele ne, Bulelela, Nzambi webe udi Nzambi wa nzambi yonso, Mukelenge wa bakelenge, musokolodi wa malu masokoka, bualu bua wewe wakumanya mua kusokolola bualu ebu busokoka
Kadi Yehowa wa kakolesha mutshima wa Palo, yeye kakabalekela

Kakuena nyama mukuabo bu yeye hanshi ha buloba, Yeye udi utangila bintu bionso bidi bidibandisha, ubihetula; Yobo Hashishe, Yobo wakakudimuna Yehowa dî ne, Ndi mumanye ne, Wewe udi ne bukole bua kuenza malu onso, Nganyi udi usokoka meji hadiye kayi ne lungenyi
