Halua dituku dia muanda mukulu, nealue ne bintu bia kudilengesha n abi kudi muakuidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena ku mpala kua Yehowa, muakuidi neangate muana wa mukoko wa mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji ne dikoho dia manyi, ne muakuidi neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa
Nenkukuatshishe ne bintu bia ku tshihehudi anyi bia ku tshikaminu tshia tumuma, anyi
Amiamine kabidi muntu uvua mulenge tshitalu, mifuba ya muntu, nansha mulenge pa lukita
Yeye wakabenga bua kunueye mai a, kadi wakâhongolola ku mesu kua Yehowa
Yesu wakabambila ne, Nuenu bantu kabai ne lungenyi, nudi nunenga ha kuitabusha mei onso akamba baprofete
Bakuabo ba mu Yelushalema bakakonka ne, Eu kanyeye udibo bakeba kushiha, anyi
Kanuhu Muena Lewi udi ku mbelu kuenu muoyo; bualu bua yeye kena ne tshituha tshiandi ne buhianyi buandi kunudi
Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, wakadianjila kufikaku, wakayuishibua kapitene

Muena mudimu wakadi ku mutu kua banowi wakamukudimuna ne, Yeye udi nsongakashi, Muena Moaba, wakahingana ne Naomi, balue ku buloba bua Moaba; yeye wakungambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela, anji kuitabusha bua meme kuhumbulula mpumbuluila ku nyima kua banowi munkatshi mua bisumbu bia orge, nunku yeye wakalua wakashala diandi to ne katataka, anu hakayeye mu nsubu tshituha
Bujitu Bujima kudi Muntu Yonso Bualu bukuabo, Muambi wakadi ne meji, yeye wakayisha bantu lungenyi; bulelela, yeye wakelangana meji, wakakebakeba ne wakalondolola nsumuinu ya bungi
Nebanyangakaje ndondu umvua mutue nabu
Hashishe Holama, mukelenge wa Gezê, wakalua bua kukuatshisha Bena Lakisha; Yoshua wakamushiha ne bantu bandi bonso, kakashiya nansha umue
Umue wa bansongalume wakamanyisha Abigayila, mukashi wa Nabala, ne, Davidi wakatuma bantu ku tshihela bua kuelabo mukelenge wetu muoyo; yeye wakabatandisha
Nakatangila bualu bubi muinshi mua diba bua muntu mudilamine luhetu tô ne hakamukengeshalu; luhetu elu ludi lujimina mu malu mabi; kadi bialeleye muana wa balume, kena ne tshia kumushila

Katuakahita luelekeshi lua kutumba kuetu bua mudimu wa bakuabo; kadi tudi tutekemena ne, Bu mudi ditabusha dienu didiundisha, tuetu netutumbishibue munkatshi muenu bu mudi luidi luetu lua ku dikumbana dia mudimu wetu, bua tuetu kuambila bantu ba ku nseke idi ku mpala kuenu lumu luimpe; ne bua tuetu katutumbi mu mukalu wa muntu mukuabo bua mudimu nuimana kulongolola
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Hakalela Pelege Leu, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama ibidi ne tshitema, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi

Yesu wakabambila ne, Bana ba tshikondo etshi batu babaka, batu babakibua; kadi bantu bakasungulabo ne, Badi bakane bua kufikila ku tshikondo tshiatshia ne ku dibika dia bantu ku lulu, kabena babaka, kabena babakibua; kabena bamanye mua kufua kabidi, badi muomumue ne banjelo; badi bana ba Nzambi, badi bana ba dibika dia ku lufu
Wewe newangatshile Bena Lewi meme ndi Yehowa mu miaba ya ban a bute ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, ne bimuna bia Bena Lewi mu miaba ya ban a bute ba bimuna bia Bena Isalele
Ditabusha adi didi dimanye mua kumusungila, anyi
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Nenzakashe bisamba bionso, ne meme nengûshe nsubu eu ne butumbi tente
Hashishe mukelenge Nebukadenesâ wakatua mpala wandi hanshi, wakakukuila Danyele, wakela mukenji bua bamulambule, bamuoshele musenga wa manananshi a muhuya muimpe
Kanuvua bangate bionsu bivuaye munuambile ne mushinga
Hezikiya wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi abidi ne tshitema; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Abiya, muana mukashi wa Zekâya
Munkatshi mua bantu bonso bakadi bashala mu buloba Bena Amole ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Pelese ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse kabakadi ba bisamba bia Bena Isalele
Nenteke Nyuma wanyi munda muenu, nennuendeshe mu mikenji yanyi mifunda, nenutumikile mikenji yanyi, nengenze

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ulua n enu mu buloba buimpe, buloba budi bûle tente ne tusulu tua mai, ne mishimi ya mai idi ihatuka mu mikuna ne mu bibanda; buloba bua blê ne orge ne mionshi ya tumuma ne mitshi ya nfigi ne grenade; buloba bua mitshi ya olive ne buitshi; buloba bunudi mua kudia bidia bia bungi, kanuena nukengela tshintu; buloba budi ne biamu bia tubanda, nudi bamanye mua kumbula biamu bikunze bia tubanda ku mikuna yabu

Bakenza disoso munda mua tshibuiku ne tshibuiku, bunene buadi buakadi coudée umue; bakalengesha ha nyima ha disoso edi bu muakenzabo bitekelu tô ne ku coudée umue ne tshituha; bakasonga bilongo ku mishiku yadi, bakaditahulula nseke inai, kabiakadi tshijengu
Bantu ba mu Betele ne Ai, nkama ibidi ne makumi abidi ne basatu
Lupangu lua nzubu wa tshijila Kuenzabu lupangu luvua lunyungulula nzubu wa tshijila
Kadi tshiena mbingisha muntu udi mupile
Bena Izrayele badi muaba ewu mbapite pa binunu nkama isambombu
Kadi Bena Isalele bakenda mu buloba bûme munkatshi mua mai, mai akadi bu tshimanu kudibo ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Meme ndi ne bukole bua kuenza malu onso, kadi malu onso kêna ankuatshisha
Udi umukolesha ke Mvidi Mukulu wa Yakobe, muena bukole buonsu, Mulami wa bena Izrayele, dibue didibu beyemina
Luai n andi kundi
Mukashi muena ditabusha bikaleye ne ba mu lufuila badi bamueyemena, yeye abakuatshishe, ne katekedi ekelesia bujitu ebu; bua ekelesia akuatshishe ba mu lufuila lua bushua
Nanku Sihone ne tshikulu tshiende, kutubunda pabuipi ne tshimenga tshia Yahase
Luta, Muena Moaba wakamukudimuna ne, Bulelela, yeye wakungambila ne, Wewe ulamate bansongalume banyi to ne hashikishabo kunowa bintu bianyi bionso
Kadi halua Musambi unanutumina, Nyuma wa bulelela mene mene, wafuma kudi Tatu, yeye neangambe; nuenu kabidi nudi nungamba, bualu bua nuakadi n anyi ku tshibangidilu tô ne katataka
Bakanua nvinyo, bakatumbisha nzambi ya or ne ya argent, ya tshiamu tshia mitaku, ya tshiamu tshifike, ya mitshi ne ya mabue
Biwavuluisha bana benu ba mu Kilisto malu â, wewe newikale muena mudimu muimpe wa Kilisto Yesu, mudiundisha mu mei a ditabusha ne mu diyisha dimpe diwakulonda tô ne katataka

Bua ditabusha wakashikama mu buloba bua mulayi; bu adi ma buloba bua bende, wakashikama biandi mu nsubu wa bilulu, ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bahianyi n andi ba mulayi muomumue; bualu bua wakatekemena musoko udi ne bishimikidi, mulongolodi wau ne muibaki wau nNzambi
Bakuidi bakitabusha ne, Katuena tuangata argent kudi bantu kabidi, kadi katuena tulongolola miaba mishimbuke ya mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Unemeke bakashi ba mu lufuila badi ne lufuila lua bushua
Yeye wakadi kayi muitabushe di dia Yehowa wakashiya bantu bandi ne bimuna biandi mu mpata
Nunku bobo bakakudimuka, bakamba ne, Bu muakadi Yehowa wa misumba muhangidishe bua kutuenzela bua bienzedi bietu ne bua malu etu, mbu mudiye mutuenzele
Mukelenge Sedekiya wakabambila ne, Monai, yeye udi mu bianza bienu, bualu bua mukelenge kena mua kuenza bualu bua kunuhumbisha
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Ahimeleke, wewe neufue ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu webe bulelela
Hakafika diba ha dikumi ne ibidi, wakaya kabidi; ne bakafika diba ha isatu, Wakenza muomumue
Mutoyi wa bantu ba bungi udiku, Ba mu bisamba bia bantu badi mua kuenda lubilu bu dihueka dia lukasa dia mai a bungi, Habuela diba, monai, buowa bukole budiku
Meme tshiena ngangata tshintu nansha tshimue pa kumusha biakudia bivua bantu banyi badie
Kanubienzedi mudimu, kanubikukuidi
Yesu wakabambila ne, Bulelela, Eliya udi ulua diambedi, udi ulongolola bintu bionso bu muakadibi diambedi; bakafundila Muana wa muntu tshinyi ne, Neakenge makenga a bungi, nebamuhetule
Pashishe netusabuke musulu wa Yardene, bua tufike mu ditunga, didibu batupe kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu

Bikala mulume ne bakashi babidi, udi musue umue, udi ukina mukuabo, ne bubidi buabo ne mukashi wakadiye musue ne mukuabo wakadiye ukina, hakamulelela bana; ne bikala mukashi wakadiye ukina mumulelele muan a bute wandi; hashishe mu dituku didiye uhianyisha bana bandi balume bintu bidiye n abi, yeye kena mua kuteka muana wa mukashi wakadiye musue ku mpala kua muan a bute wandi wa mukashi wakadiye ukina
Katuena tutamba kuobokela, bu mutuakadi katui bafike kunudi; kadi tuetu tuakadianjila kufika tô ne kunudi ne lumu luimpe lua Kilisto
Biasueye kumuhikula, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu ha mushinga wandi
Bonso bakadi babasangana bakubadia, bena lukuna babo bakamba ne, Tuetu katuena bahile, bualu bua bobo bakuenzela Yehowa bibi
Bakatshina Yehowa, kadi bakakuatshila nzambi yabo mudimu, bu muakenza bantu ba mu bisamba biakabumusha
Kadi mpindiu Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Elanganai meji a bienzedi bienu

Ku tshikondo atshi tshituha tshia bantu banyi bakenza mudimu ne tshituha tshikuabo tshiakakuata mafuma ne ngabu ne mata ne bikowelu bia nvita; bakokeshi bakashala ku nyima kua tshisamba tshionso tshia Bena Yuda
Ndi ne malu a bungi a kuamba bualu buenu ne a kunulumbuluisha; kadi wakuntuma udi mulelela; ndi ngambila ba ha buloba malu anakusua kudiye
Hakatshia butuku, wakaluhuka, wakaya mu tshihela; bantu ba bungi bakamukeba, bakalua kudiye, bakakeba kumuhumbisha ne, Kumuki munkatshi muetu
Muprofete au wakambula tshitalu tshia muntu wa Nzambi, wakatshiteka ha nyima ha mpunda, wakahingana n atshi, wakalua mu musoko wa muprofete mununu, wakamujinga, wakamujika
Ukose kabidi mitshi ya ndunga ibidi, uyilamike tshiamu tshia mpawungi ku nseke yonsu
Kadi, tshikale tshitela ne mampinda abidi ku nseke bua kutshivuala bimpe
Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Bulelela, bulelela, udi nuambila ne, Kanuena nunkeba bua bimanyinu binuakutangila, nudi nunkebela bua nuakudia mitanda, nuakûkuta
Biamuha mukelenge wandi mukashi ne biamulelela mukashi nansha bana ba balume nansha bana ba bakashi, mukashi ne bana bandi nebikale ba mukelenge wandi, yeye muhika neaye nkayandi
Kulambulabu bifukibua, kabiyi nansha mvidie, milambu

Nunku ndi ngela mukenji ne, Muntu yonso, wa tshisamba tshionso, anyi wa muaku wonso wadiula Nzambi wa Shadalaka, Meshaka ne Abedenego, nebamukose bituha bituha, nebavuishe nsubu wandi bu diala; bualu bua kakuena nzambi mukuabo udi mua kuhandisha bantu bu muakuenzeye

Kadi Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Ya biebe, bualu bua yeye udi bu luhanza lunakasungula bua kutuala dina dianyi ku mesu kua bisamba bia bende, ne kua banfumu, ne kua bana ba Isalele; bualu bua neamuleshe bungi bua malu adiye ne bua kukengela bua dina dianyi
Yoasha wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika mu Samalea diatshimue ne bakelenge ba Isalele; Yalobama wakashikama mu nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge
Nunku newambe ne, Bakuahula matamba bua meme kulamakashibuamu
Ba mu Yuda ne ba mu misoko yabo yonso nebashikamemu hohamue, ba bidime ne balami badi bendakana ne bisumbu bia mikoko
Bonso ba mu Luda ne ba mu Shalona bakamumona, bakakudimuna mitshima yabo kudi Mukelenge
Oteniele, muana wa Kenaza, wakafua

Bena Amole bakasemesha Bena Dana ku mukuna, bualu bua kabakitabusha bua bahueke mu tshibanda; kadi Bena Amole bakashikama ku mukuna wa Helese, wa mu Ayalona, ne mu Shâlabima; kadi tshianza tshia Bena Yosefe tshiakabahita, bobo bakabakuatshila mudimu wa mulambu

Kanungu ka : Minisitila kavulambedi udi ujaadika dikumbaja dia mêyi ne udi ne bukookeshi bwa kufila tuludiki, pa kumbusha makookeshi adibo bitabijila anu Mulombodi wa Ditunga yêye nkayenda kudi Dîyi dikulu edi
Bualu bua kembimpe bua mulume mene kubuikila tshilulu ku mutu kuandi, bualu bua yeye udi tshifuanyikishi ne butumbi bua Nzambi; kadi mukashi udi butumbi bua mulume
Ekesode Mikenji ya Kuhingashila Bakuabo Bintu Biabo Biba muntu ngombe anyi mukoko, biamushiheye anyi biamuhaneye, yeye neahingashe ngombe itanu ku ngombe umue, ne nukoko mai ku mukoko umue
Buhianyi bua muanda mutekete buakadi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Dana ku meku abo
Yehowa Nzambi, kukudimushi mpala wa muntu webe wakelabo manyi ha mutu handi; uvuluke luse luebe lujalame kudi Davidi, muntu webe
Shaula kakamba bualu dituku edi, wakelangana meji munda ne, Bualu buakukuata Davidi, yeye kena muakane bua kudieye; bulelela, kena muakane

Nunku, Nzambi, hakasueye kutamba kulesha bahianyi ha milayi disua diandi didi kadi mua kukudimuka, wakateka kuditshiha kuandi hankatshi habo; bua ku malu abidi adi kâi mua kukudimuka, adi Nzambi kai mumanye mua kushimamu, tuikale ne ditantamika dikole dia mutshima, tuetu mene bakanyema bua kulamata ditekemena diakatekabo ku mpala kuetu
Mukashi, muhika wandi wakadiye mubake, wa mu Shekeme, wakamulelela muana wa balume kabidi, wakamuidika dina ne Abimeleke
Ne wewe Kapênuma, nebakubandishe mu diulu, anyi
Nakatshinguluka bua kutangila dî diakakula n anyi
Bakaya mu Kapênuma; dituka dia Lumingu lua Bayuda yeye wakabuela mu nsunagoga, wakabayisha Diyisha diandi diakabakemesha, bualu bua yeye wakabayisha bu muena mei, kakadi bu bafundi
Ha diba adi Hamana wakabuela mu tshiendedi tshia mu nsubu wa mukelenge bua kumuebesha bualu bua kuoweye Môdekai ku tshiowelu tshiamulongolueleye
Wakatangila bualu abu nguakabuamba, dî diandi ndelela; udi mumanye biandi, ne, Dî dianyi ndilelela, bua nuenu kabidi nuitabushe
Sangisha bintu bia ku diabi bionso, nebikale bu bintu bia kudia biebe ne biabi kabidi
Judges Shimishona wakaya ku Gaza, wakatangilaku mukashi wa masandi, wakabuela kudiye
Bu nuenu bansue, nuakadi, kusanka, bualu bua meme ndi nya kudi Tatu, bua Tatu udi muntambe meme
Nengangate bidia bianyi ne mai anyi ne munyinyi wanyi unakashihela bakoshi banyi ba miosa ya mikoko bua kubifila kudi bantu bandi tshiyi mumanye kuakafumabo, anyi

Yeye wakamba ne, Ndi bianyi Muena Yuda, nakaledibua mu Tâso wa mu Kilikia, kadi nakakolela mu musoko eu, ku makasa a Gamaliele; bakanyisha bu mudi tshilele mene tshia mikenshi ya bankambua betu, muikale ne lukunukunu lua bualu bua Nzambi bu munudi n alu buonso buenu lelu

Yoshua wakahingana ne Bena Isalele bonso ku Debî, bakauluisha; wakanyenga musoko ne mukelenge wau, ne misoko yau yonso; bakabashiha ne muele wa nvita ne bakabutula bantu bonso bakadimu; kakashiya nansha umue: bu muakenzeye ku Hebelone, nunku wakenzela Debî ne mukelenge wau bu muakenzeleye Libina ne mukelenge wau
Danyele wakamba ne, Nakadi ntangila mu tshikena kumona tshianyi butuku, ekumona, mpehele inai ya mu diulu yakaheha ha mutu ha mai manene
Munudi mua kupola bimuma Nuenu bapitshile mu budimi bua bende budi ne mitshi ya mvinyo, nudi mua kudia tumuma bu munudi basue
Matuku onsu Maweja Nangila udi unulama, udi ne bukole bunene pa buloba bujima, uvua nabu kale, udi nabu lelu
Hashishe Doege, Muena Edome, wakadi muimane munkatshi mua bantu ba Shaula, wakamuambila ne, Meme nakatangila muana wa Yishai mulue ku Nobo kudi Ahimeleke, muana wa Ahituba

, ne dilongu diondoke dia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, dikale dia bujitu bua grame , bilondeshile tshipimu tshidi muaba wa tshijila malongu abidi aa, avua ne bukula busambakaja ne mafuta bua mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi
Nunku kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Misoko ei yonso yakadi ne mpangu mile ne bibi bikanda ne biamu; tuakanyenga misoko mikuabo ya bungi yakadi kayiyi ne mpangu
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele mei onso akambila Yehowa Mose
Kadi nudiunde mu ngasa ne mu dimanya bia Mukelenge wetu ne Musungidi Yesu Kilisto
Mukelenge wa Sulia wakadianjila kuambila tupitene tua makalu andi makumi asatu ne tubidi ne, Kanuluanganyi ne bantu bakese anyi banene anu ne mukelenge wa Isalele mene
Kadi pikala muena tshimuna mudimuene bionsu bivua bienzeka abi, kabena mua kumufuta to

Mose wakambila Kola ne, Wewe ne bantu bonso baudi habo nuikale ku mpala kua Yehowa ne kua Alona makelela: mundi yonso angate dilonga diandi dia kahia, atekehu musenga wa manananshi, bantu bonso balue ne malonga nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne wewe ne Alona, mundi ne dilonga diandi mundi ne dilonga diandi
Ke Maweja Nangila kufikila Moshe munda, umuambila ne: Muanenu Arone, muena Levi, udi mumanye mua kuakula bimpe

Yeye wakatangila buhuekele bua mukashi muhika wandi; Bualu bua udi ne bukole wakungenzela malu manene; Luse luandi ludi ku milongo ne ku milongo Wakenza malu makole ne diboko diandi; Wakahuekesha banfumu bakadi mu nkuasa ya butumbi, Bakadi ne nsala wakabukutshisha ne bintu bimpe; Wakukuatshisha muntu wandi Isalele Wakubutuka bua kufuila Abalahama ne bana bandi luse tshiendelele, Malia wakasomba n andi bu ngondo isatu, wakahingana kuabo
Tudi tutendekena Nzambi bua nuenu kanuenji bualu bubi; kembua tuetu kumueneka bu bantu badibo bitabusha ne, Mbakane, kadi bua nuenu nuenze malu malengele; nasha tuetu bikala bu babengibue
Bantu aba, mukelenge wetu, kabakukunemeka mene, kabena bakuatshila nzambi yebe mudimu, kabena batendelela luhingu lua tshiamu tshia or luwakuimanyika
dienza, diambula, dienzela ne dipaana dia nzembu;
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; kadi kakenza bu muakenza tatu wandi ne mamu wandi; bualu bua yeye wakumusha luhingu lua Bâla luakenza tatu wandi
Mose wakalua, wakambila bantu mei onso a musambu eu mu matshu abo, yeye ne Hoshea, muana mulume wa Nuna
Hakadiye ushikama udia bidia mu nsubu, basangishi ba mulamba bakalua, ne bantu babi kabidi, bakashikama ku mesa ne Yesu ne bayidi bandi

Nunku Shishaka, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, wakalua bua kuluisha Bena Yelushalema wakanyenga bintu bia mu bibutshilu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne bia mu nsubu wa mukelenge; wakaya n abi bionso; wakangata ngabu ya or yakatulabo kudi Solomo kabidi

Bena Izrayele badi babanyangana ditunga dia Ngilaade Ke mutuvua bakuate tshikondu atshi matunga a bakalenga babidi ba bena Amore, bavua base luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene, pankatshi pa musulu wa Amone wa muenji mukole, ne mukuna wa Ermone
Kanusuiki ngombe ne mpunda ku mutshi wa tshikokedi umue
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Ne ditalala dia Nzambi didi ditamba dijingulula dionso dia bantu, nedilame mitshima yenu ne meshi enu mu Kilisto Yesu

Hashishe, bana ba mikoko nebadieku mashinde bu muakadibo mua kudia mu budimi buabo bua mashinde, nyama Mulau wikale kudi badi bakoka malu mabi kudibo ne mionshi ya mashimi, badi bamba ne, Endeshe biandi lubilu, Mulau wikale kudi badi babikila bualu bubi ne, Mbualu buakane, Mulau wikale kudi badi badimona bu bena meji, Mulau wikale kudi badi ne bukitu mu kunua kua maluvu badi babingisha muntu muhila ku mbueshilu, Nunku bu mudi ludimi lua kahia luosha misengeleke ya mponda, Bua malu â tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakatema kudi bantu bandi, Yeye neabishe dibendela diandi bua kusangishaku ba mu bisamba bidi kule, Kakuena umue wabo udi uhanga anyi udi ulenduka mu nshila; Mikete yabo idi misakisha bimpe, Tshibingu tshiabo netshikale bu Mu dituku adi nebele bantu aba tshibingu Yeshaya Mu tshidimu tshiakafua mukelenge Uziya nakamona Mukelenge mushikame mu nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge, muikale kulu ne mubandishibue mulu, ne tshilulu tshia kumanda kua muzabi wandi tshia kûsha ntempelo tente
Nebamuidike dina mu Isalele ne, Nsubu wa udi ne tshisabata tshiandi tshisulula
Nubifile bu milambu ya kuosha bua bualu buenu; ne muntu wanyi Yobo nennulombele Nzambi

Hashishe Mose wakasungula misoko ya kunyemena isatu dishiya dia Yadene kudi diba dihatuka; bualu bua mushihi wa muntu ku mpukahuka, wakadi kayi n andi lukuna diambedi, anyemene ku umue wa mu misoko ei, ikale biandi ne muoyo
Bua bingibaka bintu tshiakabidi binakasasula diambedi, ndi ndijadika bu mushihi wa mikenshi
Wakadi mushikame ne muloho munene, dina diandi Sêgio Paulo, muntu wa lungenyi

Enzelai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshioshelu ne mabue adibo kabayi basonge; nuenu nenuoshilehu Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, milambu; nenufile kabidi milambu yenu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, nenudieku; nenusanke ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Ndiku: numpishe ku mesu kua Yehowa ne ku mesu kua wandi wakedibua manyi: Meme nakunyenga ngombe wa nganyi
Yeye wakadi umusha demon wa kamama munda mua muntu Hakumuka demon, kamama kakakula; bantu bakakema
Nebadile kundi ne, Bena Isalele bakubenga malu adi makane; Bakadisunguila bakelenge, tshiyi mubambile; Bena Samalea, nakûmusha muan a ngombe wenu
Pilato wakamukonka ne, Bulelela ntshinyi
Yeye ke udi munufikishe ku bantu

Kana wakambila Yehowa ne, Dikenga dianyi didi dintamba bukole Mona, wewe wakungihata lelu ha buloba, nengikale musokome ku mesu kuebe, nengikale munyemi ne muena tshiendenda ha buloba, ne hashishe yonso wansangana neanshihe
Mu matuku au Yehowa wakabanga kukehesha Bena Isalele
Wewe newangate bintu ebi ku bianza biabo, ubioshile ha tshioshelu bu mulambu udi utua dihembu dimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa, udi mulambu udibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia
Anyi, meme nkayanyi ne Bânaba, katuena ne bukole bua kuhidia kuenza mudimu wa bianza, anyi
Mose wakamba ne, Ebu mbualu buakamba Yehowa bua nuenu nuenze, ne butumbi bua Yehowa nebumueneke kunudi
Muntu yonsu udibu babadika, alambule tshia bibidi tshimue tshia sikle bu mudibu benza muaba wa tshijila
Hakunvua Yesu dî diandi, yeye wakakema, wakambila bakadi bamulonda ne, Bulelela, Udi nuambila ne, Munkatshi mua Bena Isalele mene mene tshiakusanganamu ditabusha dinene nunku
Muntu wakadimu, dina diandi Zakayo; wakadi muntu munene wa basangishi ba mulambu, wakadi mubanshi
Hakafikabo ku mpata, bakamona makala a kahia akenka ne munyinyi wa mu mai muteka ha kahia ne mutanda wa bidia
Hakabuela Petelo mu nsubu, Kônelio wakamuakidila, wakadihonena ku makasa andi, wakamukukuila
Nudi nuvuishibua babanshi mu tshintu tshionso bua kuha kuonso, kudi kuenzesha disakidila kudi Nzambi bua bualu buetu
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Undonde

Tubalu tuabo tuakadi nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asatu ne tusambombo; nyama yabo ya mpunda nyama yabo ya tumelo, nkama inai ne makumi asatu ne tutanu; nyama yabo ya mpunda binunu bisambombo ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi abidi

Ne muanjelo muisambombo wakela mpungi, ne nakunvua dî dia ku nsengu ya tshioshelu tshia ngolo tshidi ku mpala kua Nzambi, mukuabo wamba kudi muanjelo muisambombo, wakadi ne mpungi ne, Sulula banjelo banai badi basuika ku musulu mimene Pelata
Ndi musue kuikala nabu muaba umue

Kadi yeye wakatshinguluka, wakambila Petelo ne, Satana, yila ku nyima kuanyi, wewe udi tshilenduishi tshianyi, bualu bua wewe kuena welangana meshi a malu a Nzambi, udi welangana meshi anu a malu a bantu
Mukelenge wa Ejipitu Wakabikila baleleshi, wakabambila ne, Bualu kai nuakuenza nunku, nuakusungila bana ba balume
Nyuma kudibo, bakamba dî dia Nzambi, kadi kabakenza kabidi musangu mukuabo
Badi bimba musambu wa Mose, muhika wa Nzambi, ne musambu wa Muana wa Mukoko, bamba ne, Mukelenge, nganyi udi kai utshina, udi kai utumbisha dina diebe
Hakajuka mpata minene nunku, kamanda wakatshina ne, Paulo neatuanyibue, wakambila masalayi bua kuyau kumumusha munkatshi muabo ku bukole ne bua kuluau n andi mu nsubu wa masalayi
Ba bungi kabidi bakadi bitabushe diambedi bakadi balua, batonda basokolola malu abo
Udi uyisha bianza bianyi mua kuluangana nvita; nunku maboko anyi adi mamanye mua kunana buta bua tshiamu tshia mitaku
Nshobo ya ku esete yakakuata Shelemeya
Kadi bituamba ne, Kudi bantu, bantu bonso nebanshihe ne mabue, bua bobo badi bitabusha ne, Yone udi muprofete
Wakamuambila kabidi ne, Ela tshivualu tshiebe ham bidi, undonde
Muena mudimu awu kuangata tumelu dikumi tua mfumuende ne bionsu bivuaye mumone ne mbilenga
Kadi nakanutumina bena mudimu banyi bonso baprofete, njuka hanyi ne lunkelu bua kubatuma, ngamba hanyi ne, Kanuenji bualu ebu budi bunfuisha bundu, bundi nkina

Biasua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, kunvua mei a Labashake, wakatuma mukelenge wa Ashû, mukelenge wandi, bua kubendeye n au Nzambi wa muoyo, neamubele bua mei akunvua Yehowa, Nzambi webe; nunku ulombele difuka dia bantu didi dishala Nzambi
Yonatana wakambila Davidi ne
Jeremiah Yehowa wakangambila ne, Ya biebe, ule mukaba wa tshilamba tshia lin, ûsuike mu tshifuka tshiebe, kûtu mu mai nansha
Kenyeye udi udianyisha udi witabushibua, kadi yeye udi Mukelenge wanyisha

Numbers Bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ba diku dia Bena Gilada, muana mulume wa Makî, muana mulume wa Manashe, wa meku a bana balume ba Yosefe, bakalua kudi Mose ne kudi bakelenge ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ba mu Isalele, bakamba ne, Yehowa wakela dî kudi mukelenge wetu bua kutahulula buloba bua buhianyi ku nshobo, Yehowa wakela dî kudi mukelenge wetu kabidi bua kuha buhianyi bua Selofehada muan etu mulume kudi bana bandi bakashi
Yeye wakangambila ne, Akuenjibua
Kadi bantu bakahuwa, kabakamukudimuna dî; bualu bua mukelenge wakadianjila kubambila ne, Kanumukudimunyi dî nansha

Mukelenge wakambila Sadoka ne, Hingisha mushete wa Nzambi mu musoko; binasangana luse ku mesu kua Yehowa, yeye neampingishe kabidi, neaundeshe ne musoko wandi kabidi; kadi biangambileye ne, Tshiena n ebe disanka kabidi, mona, meme ndiku, angenzele budi buimpe kudiye
Bana babu ne Binyamine kumvua bowa, kudipanda bilamba

Usengelele bahika bua bobo bikale bakokele banfumu babo, ne babasankishe mu malu onso; kabikadi ne mpata; kabibi; kadi bikale ne lulamatu luimpe mu malu onso; bua bobo batumbishe diyisha dia Nzambi, Musungidi wetu, mu malu onso

Bungi bua matuku atuakalala mu nshila ku Kadeshe bânea tô ne ku kasulu ka Zelede akadi bidimu makumi asatu ne muanda mukulu; tô ne hakafua mulongo wonso wa bena nvita munkatshi mua tshitudilu, bu muakabalaya Yehowa
Badi bu bana bakese badi bashikama mu tshisalu, badi babikilangana, badi bamba ne, Tuakunuelela nshiba, kanuena baje; tuakujinga, kanuena badile
Yesu wakabakonka kabidi ne, Davidi udi umubikila mu Nyuma Muimpe ne, Mukelenge, munyi
Au mmeku a Lewi: diku dia Bena Libina, diku dia Bena Hebelone ne diku dia Mali ne diku dia Bena Mushi ne diku dia Bena Kola Kohata wakalela Amalama
Mikenji ya bena Levi BADI BAJIDILA BATUANGAJI BA KUMPALA Tshibilu tshia kujidila Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ubikidishe Arone ne bana bende ba balume ku mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Betania wakadi hehi ne Yelushalema, ntanta bu ya kilometa isatu; Bena Yuda ba bungi bakadi balue kudi Mâta ne Malia bua kubasamba bua muan abo
Yeye wakamuitaba ne, Unvudishile disanka; bualu bua wewe wakunteka ku buloba bua ku Sude, Umpe bianyi kabidi mishimi ya mai
Bana ba Yakobe kuenza bionsu amu muvua tatuabu mubashila diyi
Nanku dituku dia Dikisha dionsu nundambule mulambu wa kuosha ewu, pamue ne mulambu wa nyama ne wa mvinyo wa ku dituku ku dituku

Mu matuku â Petelo wakimana munkatshi mua bana babo ba mu Kilisto, bakadi badisangishe nunku bu lukama ne makumi abidi, yeye wakamba ne, Bana betu, buakadibo n abo mbua kushikisha dî didi difunda mu Mukanda wa Nzambi, diakambabo bua Yudasa diambedi kudi Nyuma Muimpe mukana mua Davidi, yeye wakadi mulombodi wa bakuatshi ba Yesu
Kulondolola Nunku mudimu wonso wakenza Solomo wa mu nsubu wa Yehowa wakashikishibua
Bualu bua ku mikenshi kudi kufuma dijingulula dia bubi
Nunku nenuikale bantu banyi, ne meme nengikale Nzambi wenu; bua njadike mutshihu wanyi unakaditshiha kudi bankambua benu, bua kubaha buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, bu mudibu lelu eu
muan anyi, wewe wakatamba kumpuekesha, wewe udi umue wa munkatshi mua banutatshisha; bualu bua meme nakabulula mukana muanyi kudi Yehowa, tshiena mua kualukila ku nyima
Nunku bakamusungula kapitene kabo; kadi yeye kakadi wa mu mulongo wa basatu ba ku mpala
Mukashi wakamba ne, Wewe udi bayanyi wa mashi bualu bua ku tengula
Yakoba wakalamba bintu bia kudia, Esau wakahingana mu tshisuku, wakadi muhungila
Ku tshitekelu tshia muendu aku kuenzaye kabidi tulongu tukese tunayi, tuikale ne mapu ne bilongu bu mudi mutshi wa amande
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, Abishai, muana wa Seluya, wakashiha Bena Edome binunu dikumi ne muanda mukulu mu Tshibanda tshia Luehu
Ushiye disoso ku mutu kua tshikowelu bua kubueshamu mutu, nyungulula disoso ne muonshi muhindakasha, bu mudibo benza tshikowelu tshia nvita tshikowelu katshihandiki nansha
Bobo bakabaka bakashi ba Bena Moaba, dina dia mukuabo, Ôpa, ne dia mukuabo Luta, bakashikamamu bu bidimu dikumi
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu bakaluangana ne Bena Peleshete mu Gobo; Sibekai, Muena Husha, wakashiha Safa, wakadi wa bana ba bantu bale ba nfiondo

Hakamanya Yesu ne, Badi basue kunkonka bualu ebu, yeye wakabakonka kabidi ne, Nudi nuebeshangana bua dî dinakuamba ne, Haleha tshituha tshihi kanuena nuntangila, ne haleha tshituha tshihi kabidi nenuntangile
Bualu bua yeye nealue tshisamba tshinene, ne bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bua bualu buandi
Tshilambuilu atshi tshivua ne metre abidi ne desimetre itanu nseke yatshi yonsu
Hakadiye uya mu nshila, Wakafika hehi ne Damaseke, munya mukole wa mu diulu wakamutemena lukasa; wakahona hanshi, wakunvua dî dimuambila ne, Shaula, Shaula, udi unkengeshila meme tshinyi
Balaame kufika munda bikole, kutuuta mpunde ne dikombu

Kanungu ka Bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu badi babulêja kudi dîyi dilongolodi Njila mwisambombo : Bidi bitangila lupetu lwa Mbulamatadi Kalongu ka kumpala : Bulongolodi bwa mu kabujima Kanungu ka Franc congolais ke udi kabujima kamwe ka kashintu ka Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungala
Hashishe buloba buakakanka, buakazakala; makunshi a diulu akanyunga, akazakishibua, bualu bua yeye wakadi ne tshiji
Bakamutandisha bikole

Ubatamishile Kusesuki ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi, Nsumuinu Muan anyi, tinvua meji anyi; bua wewe kushala ne bukole bua kuhangidisha mianda bimpe, Bua mishiku ya mukashi wa bende idi imata buitshi, Kadi kunshikidilu yeye udi ne bululu bu nyongangandu, Makasa andi adi ahueka tô ne ku lufu, Bua yeye kena Mpindiu, bana banyi, nungunvuile, Semesha nshila webe kule n andi, bua wewe kufidi buneme buebe kudi bantu ba bende, bua benyi kabukutshi ne biuma biebe, Nunku wewe kufu mikemu kunshikidilu kua muoyo webe, ne udi wamba ne, Mona munakukina dikengesha diakadi dinyisha ne Tshiakunvuila dî dia bayishi banyi, Nakamba kubuela mu dikengesha dionso anu kaba kabalê Unue mai a mu tshina tshiebe wewe, Mishimi yebe ya mai idi ne bua kumuangalashibua mu muaba wa ha bule, anyi
Meme ntu ngamba malu anakutangila kudi Tatu wanyi, nuenu kabidi nutu nuenza malu anuakunvua kudi tatu wenu
Buakabuluibua Hakasululeye tshimanyishilu tshia muanda mutekete, ditalala diakadi mu diulu bu tshituha tshia hankatshi tshia luhola lua diba
Tuakutangila mutoto wandi ku esete, tuakuluila kumukukuila
Kadi Yozefe uvua ubenga amu kubenga kashidi
Bena Peleshete bakaluangana, bakahita Bena Isalele bukole: muntu yonso wakanyema lubilu ku ntenta wandi; ba bungi bakafua, bualu bua bakashiha Bena Isalele bakadi benda ku makasa binunu makumi asatu
Nuenu nuhidie tshintu tshia tshijila; kanuangatshi tshintu tshinuakajila; binuatshiangata, nenueleshe tshitudilu tshia Bena Isalele mulau, nenutshikengeshe
Bakalua n andi ha nyima ha tubalu, bakamujika diatshimue ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Yuda
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Udi ne tshintu kai mu tshianza tshiebe
Kadi ubitele ne buanda bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzuu
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Eliya, Muena Tishebe, ne, Juka, uye biebe bua kusangila ne Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele, udi mushikame mu Samalea; yeye udi mu budimi bua Nabota buakuyeye kuangata
Luhehele luakabihehula, bua muanda eu kabakasangana nansha katuha kabi kabidi; kadi dibue adi diakakuma luhingu diakalua mukuna munene, diakusha buloba bujima tente

Yehowa wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole ne diboko diandi diolola ne malu makole ne bimanyinu ne malu a dikema; wakalua n etu mu muaba eu, wakatuha buloba ebu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Nenjadike bukelenge buandi tshiendelele, biananukileye kutumikila mikenji yanyi ne mei anyi bu mudibi lelu
Kimoko kakuena bintu bia kukuna nansha mamuma a nfigi nansha tumuma tukese nansha mamuma a grenade, kakuena mai a kunua
Yehowa wakaha bantu dikasa dimpe kudi Bena Ejipitu Muntu eu Mose wakadi muntu munene be mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ku mesu kua bena mudimu ba Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Biasambuka muntu ku mikenji bua kuenza bualu bubi ku mpukahuka mu malu a tshijila a Yehowa, yeye neafile mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, tshimpanga tshidi katshiyi ne tshitema mushinga wa nshekele Yeye neahingishe mushinga wa tshintu tshia tshijila ne tshituha tshitanu ha mutu, neabifile mu bianza bia muakuidi, ne muakuidi neafile tshimpanga bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Nunku bantu kabakalabula bia kudia
Muana wa muntu udi mufila mu bianza bia bantu babi
Gideona wakamba ne, Hashikisha Yehowa kufila Zêba ne Salemuna mu bianza bianyi, nenkande minyinyi yenu ne meba a mu tshihela ne mingonge
Wakatula ngabu ya or nkama isatu mikuabo; wakatula ngabu ne ngabu ku nshekele ya or nkama isatu; mukelenge wakayiteka mu nsubu wa ditu dia Lebanona
Panuikala baselela mupika mukaji, mukaji awu munulelele bana ba balume nansha ba bakaji, nulekele mupika awu anu nkayende
Helode wakamana kukuata Yone, wakamusuika, wakamubuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu bualu bua Helodia, mukashi wa muan abo Filipo
Muntu mukuabo wakaya kudi mukelenge wandi, wakamuambila ne, Nsongakashi wa mu buloba bua Isalele udi Wamba mei nunku
Yehowa Nzambi wakamenesha mudiantondo, wakaulehesha tô ne ha mutu ha Yona, bua wikale dileshi ha mutu handi bua kumûmushila lutatu luandi
Aba mbimbi ba misambu ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo ba Bena Lewi bakadi bashikama mu nsubu ei; bakadi kabayi ne mudimu mukuabo, bualu bua bakadi ne mudimu wabo munya ne butuku
Bakateka mushete wa Nzambi ha dikalu dihia dihia, bakûmusha mu nsubu wa Abinadaba wakadi ku mutu kua mukuna; Uza ne Ahio, bana balume ba Abinadaba, bakadi bendesha dikalu
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bu mu dî dia Yehowa ne, Ba mu tshisamba tshia bana balume ba Yosefe badi bamba dî dilelela
Bakabanyangana buloba buanyi, bakelela bantu banyi nshobo, bakahana muana wa balume ku mukashi wa masandi, bakahana muana wa bakashi ku maluvu a nyinyo, bakânua
Nakamba mu mutshima wanyi ne, Bualu ebu budi hatuhu kabidi

Dituku dia tshivulukilu ne dia disanka Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele mikenji idi ilonda eyi ne: Dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu wa muanda mutekete, ndituku dia tshivulukilu ne dia dikisha
Hatuakasabuka mai akadi hehi ne Kilikia ne Pampulia, tuakafika ku Mula, musoko wa mu luseke lua Lukia
Bualu ebu kabuakasankisha mutshima wa Samuele hakambabo ne, Utusungile mukelenge wa kuikaleye utulumbuluila

Bena Togâma bakashintakasha n ebe tubalu tudi tuambula majitu, tubalu tua nvita ne nyama ya mpunda, Bantu ba ku Dedana bakenduluka n ebe mushinga; bantu ba mu maloba mangi a ku muelelu wa mai bakakukuatshila mudimu bu bangend a mushinga; bakalua kûdi ne milambu ya mibanga ne mitshi ya ébéne
Nenvuishe mikete yanyi bu mukuatshiki wa maluvu bualu bua mashi abo, ne muele wanyi wa nvita neudie munyinyi wabo ne mashi a bafue ne a bena lukanu, ne mitu ya bukelenge ba bena lukuna
Ndi nuelela mukenshi muhia muhia ne, Nusuangane; nusuangane bu munakunusua
Nuenu, balami ba mikoko, asai miadi, nudile; Balami kabena bamona nshila wa kunyemenamu, Unvuai

Nuitabushe balue ne mai, nuvuwe makasa enu, nuikishe bienu mu diledi dia mutshi, nendue ne bintu bia kudia bikese, nukoleshe mitshima yenu hashishe nudi mua kuhita, bualu bua nuenu nuakulua kudi muntu wenu Bakamuambila ne, Enza biebe bu muwakuamba

Hamo ne muan andi Shekeme bakalua ku tshibi tshia ku musoko wabo, bakayilala ne bena musoko, bakamba ne, Balume aba badi bashikama n etu talala nunku tuitabushe bua bobo bashale mu buloba buetu bendeshangane n etu mushinga buloba budi bunene bua bobo bikalemu tuangate bana babo ba bakashi bu bakashi betu, tufile bana hetu ba bakashi budibo
Kakuanyisha bua bena Izrayele bumuke to
Kadi Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka bansentedi, wakashiya bantu bahele bakadi kabayi ne tshintu mu buloba bua Yuda, ne wakabaha madimi a tumuma tua nvinyo ne madimi makuabo diatshimue

Muntu mukuabo wakela buta buandi ku mpukahuka, wakatata mukelenge wa Isalele kuakadi bintu biandi bia nvita bituangana, nunku yeye wakambila muendeshi wa dikalu diandi ne, Usesuishe dikalu, bualu bua meme ndi mutahe mputa bikole
Yehowa wakahueka mu dî ditu, wakasomba n andi, wakangata tshituha tshia Nyuma wakadiye n andi, wakamuteka kudi bakulu makumi muanda mutekete, hashishe hakalua
Wakidika muana mukuabo dina ne, Efelayima, bualu bua wakamba ne, Nzambi wakunkumbasha mu buloba bua dikenga dianyi
Abahalama wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakangata kele bua kushiheye n aku muan andi
Hezikiya wakamba ne, Mbualu bukese bua mundidimbi uye ku mpala biendedi dikumi; mbimpe mundidimbi uhingane biendedi dikumi
Yesu wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi muyishi wa Isalele, kuena mumanye malu â
Kadi Esawu kukonka tatuende ne: Kuena mua kungela panyi lupemba nansha lukese anyi
Yeye utshidi unanukila kulamata ku buakane buandi, kadi wewe wakanshikila bualu buandi bua kumubutula kayi ne bualu, Satana wakakudimuna Yehowa ne, Dikoba ku dikoba
Nanku, meyi ne mikenji bindi nnuambila lelu, nubilame bimpe, nubikumbaje
Dane udi bu nyoka udi mu njila, bu nyoka wa ntoke ku mpenga kua njila: nyoka udi usuma kabalu mu lutambiku lua tshibelu

Daniel Mu tshidimu tshia kumudilu tshia bukokeshi bua Beleshasa, mukelenge wa Babulona, Danyele wakalota tshilota, wakamona bikena kumona ku mutu wandi hakadiye mu bulalu buandi; hashishe, wakafunda tshilota tshiandi, utela malu onso akamoneye
Hashishe muakuidi neuvuwe bilulu ne mubidi wandi ne mai, ne ku nyima nealue biandi mu tshitudilu, neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Bua bualu ebu budi mukashi n abu mbua kuikala ne tshimanyinu tshia bukokeshi ku mutu kuandi, bualu bua banjelo
Pashishe ndi mbamanyisha meyi ne mikandu bia Mvidi Mukulu
Davidi wakabanda mukuna wa Olive, wenda udila; wakabuikila mutu wandi, wakashiya makasa andi hatuhu, bantu bonso bakadi n andi bakabuikila mitu yabo, badile hakabandabo
Bua meme, tshî munkatshi muenu mu mubidi, kadi muikale n enu mu nyuma wanyi, nakumana kulumbuluisha muntu wakenza bualu ebu nunku, bu mundi muikaleku
Hashishe nakamba ne, Aka, Mukelenge Yehowa
Hashishe bakeluba bakolola mahuahua abo, ne nkata yakashala hehi n abo; butumbi bua Nzambi wa Isalele kabidi buakadi ha mitu habo
Yonatana wakamuambila ne, Bualu ehu kabuikadiku, wewe kuena ufua; tatu wanyi katu wenza bualu bunene anyi bukese diambedi yeye kayi muanze kungambila; tatu wanyi neansokoke bualu ebu bishi
Hakalua Petelo ku Yelushalema, bakadi batengula bakela n andi mpata ne, Wewe wakubuelakana ne bantu bakadi kabai batengula, wakadia n abo
Kadi Bânaba wakamuangata, wakaya n andi kudi bapostolo, wakabambila bu mu akamoneye Mukelenge mu nshila, ne bu muakakula Mukelenge n andi ne bu muakajukuileye bantu dî mu dina dia Yesu mu Damaseke
Nenuhe muakuidi diboko dia balume dia nyama wa mulambu wa kuikisha n au ditalala udibo banyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa
Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakamufila mu tshianza tshietu; tuakabashiha ne yeye ne bana bandi balume ne bantu bandi bonso
Kanuendakanyi bu bena mukoso munkatshi mua bantu benu, kanuhuwi bikala muena mutumba n enu mikuata kudi tshilumbu meme ndi Yehowa
Hashishe mukashi wakamba ne, Udi musue meme nkumueneshile nganyi

Bena Isalele kabakavuluka Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, nguakabasungila mu bianza bia bantu bakadi n abo lukuna bonso ba ku nseke yonso; kabakalesha ba mu nsubu wa Yelubâla, udi Gideona mene, luse bu malu mimpe akalesheye Bena Isalele
Nanku nenganyishe bena Izrayele baye kulambula Maweja Nangila milambu
Neoshe dianyi dionso ha tshioshelu, bu muakenzeye ne dianyi dia mulambu wa kuikisha n au ditalala, muakuidi neafue mulambu wa ku buikila n au bubi buandi ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Unvuai, Isalele, nubienze; bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nukumbane ba bungi, bu muakanulaya Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu enu, mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Yeye kena kunoko, wakubika bu muakambeye
Nenubahe kabidi bintu binudi nuhuola diambedi, ne tshia nvinyo muhia muhia, ne tshia manyi enu, ne miosa ya mikoko
Panudi nundambula milambu, nuenda nuimba misambu, nuntumbisha, nuenze bionsu bilondeshile mikenji yanyi, bua nuenu kupeta diakalenga
Nzambi wakamba ne, Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe; yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Udi wamba mei mabi bua tatu andi anyi mamu andi afue biandi bulelela

Nganyi munkatshi muabo wakuimana ku mpala kua Yehowa Tangilai, tshihuhu tshia Yehowa, Tshiji tshia Yehowa katshiena tshikudimuka Tshiakatuma baprofete aba, Bu bobo bimane ku mpala kuanyi bua kuangata lungenyi, Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Meme ndi Nzambi udi anu ha buihi, ne tshiena Nzambi udi kule kabidi, anyi

Mukelenge Yehowa, Nzambi wa misumba, udi wamba ne, mu dituku dinatumina Bena Isalele makenga bua malu mabi abo, Nenshihe nsubu udibo balala mu tshikondo tshia mashika, Amos Unvuai dî edi, nuenu bakashi ba ngombe ba ku Bashana, Mukelenge Yehowa wakaditshiha ku buimpe bua tshijila tshiandi ne, Nenuhatukile mu miaba idi ngumbu mishimbuke, Luai ku Betele, enzai malu mabi enu; Oshilai Nzambi mulambu wa kumusakidila wa bidia biela luevene, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Meme kabidi nakakanda nvula bua kanulokedi, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nunku nennuenzele muanda eu, Bena Isalele; Monai, yeye udi wimanyika mikuna ne udi utuma luhehele, Amos Unvuai dî edi dia muadi dindi Muana mukashi utshidi kamama, Bualu bua Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bua Yehowa udi wambila Bena Isalele dî edi ne, kadi kanukebi Betele, Kebai Yehowa, nenuikale ne muoyo; nuenu mbadi bakudimuna kulumbulula kuakane bua kuluaku anu bululu, Yeye wakafuka mitoto ya Tshidiminanzashi ne ya Nyama ne Mbua ne Muntu, Yeye udi utuma dibutuka kudi bena bukitu, Badi ne muntu udi ubabela ku tshibuelelu tshia musoko lukuna, Nudi nudiata muntu muhele muinshi mua makasa enu, Bualu bua ndi mumanye ne malu mabi enu adi mavule, Nunku muntu udi ne budimu neahuwe mu tshikondo atshi, Kebai malu makane, kanukebi malu mabi, Kinai malu mabi, nangai malu mimpe, Nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wa misumba, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu madimi onso a tumuma tua nvinyo nemuikale muadi; Mulau unukuate nuenu badi ba sue dituku dia Yehowa dimuenekele

Mu musoko muakadi mukashi mubi; hakamanyeye ne, Yesu udi ushikama ku mesa mu nsubu wa Mufalese, wakalua ne mulondo wa alabasta, mu mulondo muakadi mananashi; hakadiye muimane ku makasa a Yesu ku nyima kuandi udila, wakabanga kubolesha makasa andi ne binsonshi biandi, wakâkuhula ne nsuki yandi, wakatua mishiku ku makasa a Yesu, wakaela mananashi
Yeye wakamuebesha ne, Nenkueyeke tshieya kai
Yeye wakimana ha buihi ne mutubu wa mai udi uyila ku kashiba ka mai kadi ku mutu kua mukuna mu nshila wa budimi bua muvuwi wa bilulu
Bulelela, nensanke bua kubenzela bimpe, ne nembakune mu buloba ebu mu bushuwa ne mutshima wanyi mujima ne muoyo wanyi mujima
Kadi meme nganyi ne bantu banyi mbanganyi, bua tuetu tuakadifidila bintu bietu nunku

Osha tshituha tshisatu tshia nsuki mu kahia munkatshi mua musoko hashika matuku a kutshintshimika kuau; angata tshituha tshikuabo tshisatu, utshitahe ne muele wa nvita hautshidi wendakana mu nseke yonso ya musoko; hehula tshituha tshikuabo tshisatu mu luhehele, ne nempatule muele wa nvita bua kubihata
Mukelenge wakambila bantu bandi bakadi bimane kudiye ne, Shihai bakuidi ba Yehowa, bualu bua bianza biabo bidi kudi Davidi; bobo bakamanya ne, Davidi wakadi munyeme, kabakungambila
Petelo wakavuluka dî diakamuambila Yesu ne, Tshitala katshi tshianze kusama misangu ibidi, wewe neumpidie misangu isatu
Kutedi dina dia Nzambi tshitelatela, kuhendi mukokeshi wa bantu bebe
Nakunvua muanjelo wa mai wamba ne, Wewe udi muakane, udiku ne wakadiku, Wewe wa Tshijila, bualu bua wakalumbulula nunku
Mukenji ewu ushale kabidi kashidi kudi ndelanganyi yenu yonsu
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuipata muntu mu lupangu lua Edene bua aye kudima buloba, bualu buloba ke buvuaye mumufuke nabu
Ebi bidi bu mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Netukulongoluele bilenga bia or bilamika argent
Eu udi mudimu wa meku a bana balume ba Melali, udibo benza mu ntenta wa kusambakena, ku tshianza tshia Itamâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi
Nakunuambila malu â mu nsumuinu; kadi diba nedilue dingikala tshi nuambila malu mu nsumuinu kabidi, nenujukuile bualu bua Tatu
Udi ne muoyi
Davidi wakangata ngabu ya biamu bia or yakadi bantu ba Hadadezê n ai, wakalua n ai ku Yelushalema
Dituku dinuasabuka musulu wa Yardene, bua kubuela mu ditunga didi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupe, nuimanyike mabue manene, nualabe lupemba
Tuakuenza lelu bu muakamba Yehowa bua kunubuikidila bubi
Biwasumba muhika, Muena Ebelu, yeye neakukuatshile mudimu bidimu bisambombo, ne tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete yeye neahete budishikaminyi hatuhu
Yeye wakabambila ne, Bua bakuya ne Mukelenge wanyi, tshiena mumanye kuakumuladikabo
Maweja Nangila kuenza tshishima atshi, kutuma njiji mipite bungi
Meme Paulo, udi nutumina muoyo, mufunde ne tshianza tshianyi
Masungulangana badi baenza kudi bantu bônso, kaayi kansungansunga, muntu yônso weela kakanda pa nkayenda
Yakatangadishibua bualu bua kakuakadi mulami; yakalua bia kudia bia nyama yonso ya mu mpata
Tshiakatshina bua kunuambila malu onso adi Nzambi musue
Wewe udi Eliya, anyi
Ntshinyi tshiudi utangidila kasosa kadi mu disu dia muan enu, kui utangila mutshi mimene udi mu disu diebe
Nenungoshile kabidi mafuta a nyama ayi bua nganyishe dipembu diawu dimpe
Bena Izrayele kudia mana awu bidimu makumi anayi, too ne ku difika diabu mu ditunga divua bantu base, nanku too ne papitabu ku mikalu ya ditunga dia Kenaane
Yeye wakafidibua mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Isalele; bakashiha bantu bandi ba bungi
Nanku, umunyukuile bukole buebe, bua bena Izrayele bonsu bamuitabe
Selofehada, muana mulume wa Hefê, kakadi ne bana ba balume nansha, wakadi anu ne bana ba bakashi, mena a bana ba bakashi ba Selofehada
Bakahingana, bakalua ku Ene mishapata eu udi Kadesha , bakahaula buloba buonso bua Bena Amaleka ne Bena Amole bakadi bashikama mu Hasasona tamâ
Wakafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ne musenga wa manananshi ha mutu ha mikuna ne ha tukuna ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi yonso

Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Mona, meme nakakuteka ku mutu kua milambu yanyi idibo banyukula ne bintu bionso bidi Bena Isalele bajila, nakakuha bintu ebi bu tshituha tshia bintu biebe bualu bua kujidila kuebe ne kua bana bebe balume tshiendelele
Mîyama, muprofete mukashi, muan abo mukashi ne Alona, wakangata tshisanji mu tshianza tshiandi, ne bakashi bonso bakamulonda ne bisanji, benda batuhika
Enza biebe nkanu ya or mai, witeka kû mikolo ya mushete, ibidi ku luseke lumue, ibidi ku luseke lukuabo
Bakalungakasha nsubu mukuabo ha mutu, bule buandi bua mulu buakadi coudées itanu; bakateka mabaya a cèdre ku musaka wa nsubu

Kabeena mwa kubwelakana diakamwe anyi mu mantonya mu mishinga ya patooka idi ifila makasa kudi biludiki anyi bishimikidi bidibo badiila pabo makasa kudi bukalenga bunene, polovensa ne bitupa biludiki bidikadile
Nenudie bidia bia disanka dia mbingu ku mesu kua Yehowa hanuahuola bintu, ne hanuasangisha bintu kunshikidilu kua tshidimu
Abrahame kujuka, kuinyika mutu panshi, wambila ndelanganyi ya Ete bavua base mu buloba abu, ne: Panuikala basue bua meme kujika muena kuanyi apa, ndombelayi kudi Efrone, muana wa Sohare
Bulelela, bonso ba mu Isalele bakushiha mikenji yebe, bakusesuka, kabakunvua dî diebe
Ba bana ba Melali: ba Yâziya, Beno, ne Shohama ne Zakû ne Ibeli

Yefeta wakaditshiha kudi Yehowa ne, Biwafila Bena Amona mu tshianza tshianyi, hashishe tshionso tshidi tshiluhuka ku bibi bia nsubu wanyi bua kusangakena n anyi, hanahingana kudi Bena Amona ne ditalala, netshikale tshia Yehowa, nentshifile bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia

Bukelenge bua mu diulu kabidi budi bu muntu udi biandi muendi wa mushinga, udi ukeba mabue mimpe a mushinga mukole; hakasanganeye dibue dia mushinga mutambe bukole, wakaya, wakahana bintu biandi bionso, wakadisumba
Tshikale tshitangilangane ne mushete wa ndondu awu, muaba utuikala tumuenangana nebe

Yeye wakavula bilulu bia mu lufuila, wakaluata bilulu bikuabo, wakadibuikila ne tshilulu tshikudika, wakashikama ku tshibi tshia ku Enayima, hehi ne nshila wa ku Timena, bualu bua yeye wakamona ne, Shela wakamana kudiunda ne kabena banze kumbakisha kudiye
Yeye mene nease ntempelo wa Yehowa, neikale ne butumbi, neashikame mu nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge, neakokeshemu; neikale muakuidi mu nkuasa wandi wa butumbi; midimu ei ibidi neyikuatshishangane
Bobo bakamukudimuna ne Yeye wakadi ne bualu bua kuenzela muan etu wa bakashi bu mukashi wa masandi, anyi
Abinê ne bantu bandi bakenda butuku bujima, bakahitshila mu buloba bua Alabâ, bakasabuka dishiya dia Yadene, bakahitshila mu buloba bua Bitelona tô ne hakafikabo ku Mahanayima
Wewe newoshe tshimpanga tshijima ha tshioshelu, tshidi mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa, udi utua dihembu, udibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia
Yehoshafata wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge kambi nunku nansha
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubikila Moshe ne Arone
Kuena mumanye ne kunfudilu kua bualu ebu nekuikale anu ne kanyinganyinga
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Muakuny ebe wakulua ne bu dimu wakumana kuangata disanka diebe
Kadi ngovena wakabakonka ne, Badi babidi, nudi basue meme nulekelele nganyi
Bobo bakalua ne bintu biakamba Mose ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bantu bonso bakalua ha buihi, bakimana ku mpala kua Yehowa
Bena Isalele bakambila Bena Hiwi ne, Bumue nuenu nudi ba munkatshi muetu, nunku netuhunge n enu tshihungidi munyi
Padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila bintu bia tshianyi bia mu budimi buende, abikange, abitue mu tshinu, bangabanga ne kubilambula

Pikala muena Levi umuka mu tshimenga tshia bena Izrayele mudiye musombe, bua kuya muaba wikala Maweja Nangila musungule, neenzele Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wende mudimu muaba awu, anu bu mudibu benza kudi bena Levi bakuabu badi benza mudimu mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu
Mu dekele mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, udi uteeka bantu ku midimu ya basivile ne ya basalâyi idi kayiyi ku bukookeshi bwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga
Ebu mbu munuakamanya kudi Epafa, muhika n etu munanga, udi biandi muena mudimu munanukidi wa Kilisto bua bualu buetu
Bena nsudi ba bungi bakadi mu Isalele mu matuku a muprofete Elisha; kadi bakuabo kabakalengeshibua, anu Nâmana Muena Sulia
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakambila Yehoshafata ne, Meme nendivuishe bu muntu mukuabo hanaya mu nvita, kadi wewe uluate bilulu biebe bia mukelenge

Malu Makole Adi Akuata Bashihi ba Mikenji Kadi binuahidia kunvua dî dianyi, binuahidia kutumikila mikenji yanyi, binuahidia mikandu yanyi, binuabenga mei anyi mu mitshima yenu, kanuyi nuenza mikenji yanyi, binuashiha tshihungidi tshianyi, meme kabidi nennuenzele nunku nengenze malu adi anutshinyisha, nennutumine masama adi anyanyisha mibidi yenu ne disama dia mubidi kahia, masama au neashihe mesu enu, neanyanyishe mitshima yenu, nenukune bintu bienu tshianana, bualu bua bantu badi n enu lukuna nebabidie
Tshiena musue kunujimija bonsu babidi dituku dimue to
Nebumushe butu bonsu budi mu tshilambuilu bua kuadijamu tshilamba tshikunze

Mikenji ya Milambu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Elela Alona ne bana bandi balume mukenji ne, Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, mulambu wa kuosha newikale ha nkunyi ha tshioshelu butuku buonso tô ne dinda, kahia nekikalehu butuku buonso, kakajimi nansha
Nuikale ne meshi â munda muenu akadi kabidi munda mua Kilisto Yesu
Katataka nudi bamanye bualu budi bumukanda bua yeye abuluibue mu tshikondo tshiandi tshine
Amen
Bule bua dibaya dimue nebuikale coudées dikumi ne butshiama buadi nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha

Nunku kufuishibu bundu ku mesu bua bumanyishi bua Mukelenge wetu, anyi bua bualu buanyi, meme muena lukanu wandi; kadi ukenge n anyi bua lumu luimpe bu mudi bukole bua Nzambi; wakatusungila, wakatubikila ne dibikila dia tshijila, kembu mudi midimu yetu mimpe, kadi bu mudi disungula diandi mene ne ngasa, wakatuheye mu Kilisto Yesu diambedi bikondo bia tshiendelele kabi bianze kuikalaku
Hakasabuka mukelenge Yadene, Shimei, muana wa Gela, wakamukukuila

Nusakidile milambu eyi ku mulambu wa kuosha wa ku dituku dionsu: Dituku dibidi: nundambule ngombe dikumi ne ibidi, mikoku ya tshimpanga ibidi, bana ba mikoku dikumi ne banayi, badi bamane kukumbaja tshidimu tshijimu, kabidi ne mbuji wa mpumbu umue
Hakadiye muntu mununu, disama diakamukuata ku makasa andi
Bena nvita nebanyeme ku mpala kuandi bu mai mahasalale mahite mielelu ya musulu, nebabutudibue; mukelenge wa tshihungidi kabidi neabutudibue

Hamana wakabamanyisha bua butumbi bua bubanji buandi, ne bungi bua bana bandi bakaleleye, ne ku mutu kua malu onso kuakamuteka mukelenge ne bu muakamubandisheye ku mutu kua bantu banene bonso ne bena mudimu ba mukelenge

Kadi wewe, hawajila bia kudia, ulabe manyi ku mutu, wowe mai ku mesu; nunku bantu kabakumonyi ne, Udi mujile bia kudia; kadi Tatu webe udi mu musokoko neakumone; ne Tatu webe udi umona mu musokoko neakuhe

Mubidi udi ukunyibua mubole, udi ubishibua kawi mubole; udi ukunyibua kawi ne butumbi, udi ubishibua ne butumbi; udi ukunyibua ne butekete, udi ubishibua ne bukole; udi ukunyibua mubidi wa bantu, udi ubishibua mubidi wa nyuma

Lewitiki Alona Udi Ufila Milambu Hakahita matuku muanda mukulu, Mose wakabikila Alona ne bana bandi balume ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele, wakambila Alona ne, Angata kana ka ngombe bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne tshimpanga, bidi kabiyi ne tshitema, bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ubifile ku mesu kua Yehowa

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata mulangala, usangishe bantu bonso ne wewe ne Alona mukulu ebe, wewe wambile dibue didi ku mesu kuabo, dihatule mai, wewe neubahatuile mai ku dibue, wewe neubanuishe mai ne bimuna biabo
Udi mumanye ne, Yehowa neumushe mukelenge webe ku mutu kuebe lelu, anyi
Kuyaye kuasa bashilangane mutantshi mule ne muanabu Yakobe mu ditunga dikuabu
Yeye wakenda mu nshila ya Asa tatu andi, kakasesukamu, wakenza malu akadi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa

Hakamba matuku a kumubandishabo mulu kukumbana, yeye wakambula mpala wandi mutangisha ku Yelushalema bua kuyeye kuakua, wakatuma bena mukenshi ku mpala kuandi; bakaya, bakabuela mu musoko wa Bena Samalea, bualu bua kumulongoluela malu
Edi ndî dia Yone hakatuma Bena Yuda ba mu Yelushalema bakuidi ba Nzambi ne Bena Lewi kudiye bua kumuebesha ne, Wewe nganyi
Nuenu kabidi nuvua bamulaye bua kuikala tshisamba tshiende, tshia bantu badiye mupite kunanga, badi bakumbaja meyi ende ne mikenji yende
Bualu bua wewe, Mukelenge Yehowa, nguakabasungula munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia ha buloba bua kuikalabo buhianyi buebe, bu muakamuambila muntu webe Mose hawakafuma ne bankambua betu mu Ejipitu
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu dituku didiye ubuela mu tshitendelelu, mu tshiendelu tshia munda mua luhangu, bua kukuata mudimu wa mu tshitendelelu, afile mulambu wandi wa kubuikila n au bubi
Bantu ba mu Anatota lukama ne makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu
Yeye wakabika, wakambula bulalu buandi lukasa, wakumuka ku mpala kua bonso; bantu bonso bakakema bua bualu ebu, bakatumbisha Nzambi, bakamba ne, Katuena banze kumona bualu bu ebu diambedi
Biwasangana nansha ngombe nansha mpunda bia muntu udi n ebe lukuna biya ha bule, uhingashe nyama wandi kudiye kabidi
Mukalu wa ku luseke lua sude uyile ku Tamâ tô ne ku mai a Melibota kadeshe ne ku kasulu ka Ejipitu tô ne ku Mai Manene
Netuye luendu lua matuku asatu mu tshihela, netushihele Yehowa Nzambi wetu nyama bu muatuambileye
Disanka dia Bena Yuda, Disanka dia Bisambusambu, diakadi ha buihi

Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Nuenu ne bakashi benu nuakuamba mei â onso mukana muenu, nuakuênza ne bianza bienu, nuamba ne, Bulelela, netushikishe mitshihu yetu ituakuditshiha, bua kuoshila mukelenge mukashi wa mu diulu musenga wa manananshi ne bua kumuhongoluela milambu ya bia kunua
Hashishe, bayidi bandi bakalua kudiye, bakamuebesha ne, Kuena mumanye biebe ne, Bafalese bakulenduka, hakunvuabo dî edi, anyi
Yuda kumuinyika dina ne: Onane
Yehowa wakambila Gada, mumonyi wa malu wa Davidi, ne, Ya, Wambile Davidi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ndi nteka malu asatu ku mpala kuebe; usungule bumue buau bua meme kukuenzelabu
Bumuka mu Punone, kuyabu ku Obote
Nunku Akisha wakamuha musoko wa Sikelaga dituku adi; nunku musoko wa Sikelaga udi ulamata kudi bukelenge ba Yuda tô ne ku dituku edi
Kadi neboshe nzubu yenu

Muntu udi witabusha Muana wa Nzambi, udi ne bumanyishi munda muandi; muntu udi kai witabusha Nzambi wakamuvuisha muenu mashimi, bualu bua kakuitabusha bumanyishi budi Nzambi umanyisha bualu bua Muana wandi
Hashishe Davidi wakambila Natana ne, Nakenzela Yehowa bibi
Bana balume ba Hama: Kusha ne Miselayima ne Puta ne Kanâna
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Ebu mbuloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba ne, Nembuhe tunkanunuina tuenu, nakukuleshabu ne mesu ebe, kadi wewe kuena usabukaku

Acts Muntu wakadiku, dina diandi Anania, ne mukashi wandi Sapila, wakahana tshintu tshiakadiye n atshi, wakasokoka tshituha tshia mushinga, mukashi wandi wakadi mumanye bualu ebu; Anania wakalua ne tshinga tshituha, wakatshiteka ku makasa a bapostolo
Akula ne Pisikila ne bena ekelesia ba mu nsubu wabo badi banutumina muoyo wa bungi mu Mukelenge
Au mmeku a bana balume ba Ashê, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi atanu ne bisatu ne nkama mai

Tudi bamanye ne, Mikenshi kayena mielela muntu muakane, kadi idi mielela badi kabai baitabusha ne bena buhidia ne badi kabai banemekela Nzambi ne badi babi ne badi kabai ba tshijila ne bahendi ha Nzambi ne bashihi ba batatu ne bamamu ne bashihianganyi ne bena masandi, balume badi benzelangana malu a bundu, banyengi ba bantu, bena mashimi, bena mitshihu ya mashimi, anyi bikalaku tshinga tshintu tshidi tshifuilangana ne diyisha dimpe; bu mudi lumu luimpe lua butumbi bua Nzambi udibo batumbisha, luakatekibua mu bianza bianyi
Palo wakakonka Yakoba ne, Bidimu bia muoyo webe bidi bungi munyi
Ke yeye uvua mutshimune bena Madiyane mu mpata ya Mowabe
Butuku abu Maweja Nangila kumumuenekela, umuambila ne: Kutshinyi
Bulelela, bu meme mukutume kudi ba nanku au, bakadi kukunvuila
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Yoshiya ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Yeye kabidi wakashehula tshibumba tshia mu Penuele, wakashiha bena musoko
Hakamubikileye, yeye wakimana ku tshibi
Pilato wakafunda makanda, wakauteka ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Yeye wakitaba ne, E
Wakaya biandi ne Petelo ne bana babidi ba Zebedayo, wakabanga kunyingalala mutshima, mutshima wandi wakatamba kunema
Davidi wakasungila bintu bionso biakanyenga Bena Amaleka; wakasungila bakashi bandi babidi kabidi
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe kuena ujuka ha bulalu bûdi mulale, kadi wewe neufue bulelela
Kabena banze kuenza muanda muinshi mua diulu dionso bu muanda eu wakuenzelabo Yelushalema

Kadi bikala Yehowa wenza bualu buhia buhia, ne buloba bubulula mukana muabu bubamina ne bantu bonso hadibo n abo, ne bobo baya ku Muaba wa Bafue hatshidibo ne muoyo, nunku nenumanye ne bantu aba bakalengulula Yehowa
Yehowa wakamueneka kudiye, wakamba ne, Kuyi mu Ejipitu, ushikame mu buloba bundi nkuambila
Anu Yonatana, muana wa Asahele, ne Yahezeya, muana wa Tikewa, bakabanga bualu ebu; Meshulama ne Shabetai, Muena Lewi, bakabakuatshisha
Hakunvua bapostolo bakadi mu Yelushalema ne, Bena Samalea bakuitabusha dî dia Nzambi, bakabatumina Petelo ne Yone
Ei idi mikenji yakela Yehowa kudi Mose bua mulume ne mukashi wandi, ne bua tatu ne muan andi mukashi udi mu nsubu wandi mu bunsongakashi buandi
Yeye wakakenzakana bua kumona wakenza bualu ebu

Bua monai muakadisangisha bakelenge hamue, Bakaumona, hashishe bakakema, Dizakala diakabakuataku; Wewe wakatshibula matu manene a ku Tâshishi Bu mutuakunvua lumu, mbu mutuakumona Nzambi, tuakuelangana meji a luse luebe lujalame Nzambi, bu mudi dina diebe dimanyibue, Mukuna wa Siona wikale ne disanka; Endakanai ku nseke yonso ya Siona, numunyunguluke, Tangilai bimpe ngumbu yandi ya nvita, nubuele mu nsubu yandi mikole, Eu udi Nzambi, Nzambi wetu tô ne tshiendelele
Bakelenge Ahaba Udi Uhita Bena Sulia Bukole Bene hadada, mukelenge wa Sulia, wakasangisha masalayi andi onso: bakelenge makumi asatu ne babidi bakadi n andi, ne tubalu ne makalu
Kadi Kabanga kulua, mukuate muanabu Esawu ku tshikankanya
Hakamona banga bahika n andi bualu buakenzeye, mitshima yabo yakanyingalala bikole, bakalua, bakamanyisha mukelenge wabo malu onso akenjibua
Nanku kanuena mua kutendelela kabidi Maweja Nangila munudi nuenza mpindiewu to, muntu yonsu utendelela wende mushindu
Nunku kakuena mua kuikala Muena Gelika ne Muena Yuda, Muena ditengula ne udi kai muena ditengula, musenshi, Muena Sekutia, muhika ne mudishikamine; kadi Kilisto udi malu onso ne udi mu malu onso
Palô wakanyunguluka, wakaya mu nsubu wandi, kakateka bualu ebu mu mutshima wandi
Kadi muntu udi wenza bualu bubi ne mutshima mukole nansha muntu mulela munkatshi muenu nansha muenyi, muntu au udi uhenda Yehowa, nebamumushe munkatshi muabo
Kadi bintu bidi kabi ne muoyo ne bidi biakula, nasha lushiba nasha tshisanji, bikala muadi wabi kawi mutahuluke, nebamanye munyi, tshidibo bela anyi tshidibo bimba
John Muntu wakadiku, wakadi usama, dina diandi Lazalo wa mu Betania, musoko wa Malia ne muan abo Mâta

Shafana secrétaire wakahingana kudi mukelenge, wakalua ne dî kudi mukelenge ne, Bantu bebe bakangata argent yakadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, bakayifila mu bianza bia badi ku mutu kua bena mudimu mu nsubu wa Yehowa

Bakadia bidia bia disanka dia mu nsubu ya bitandatanda bu muakafundabo; bakafila milambu ya kuosha ya buatshia buatshia bu mudi bungi buai, bu mudi dî dijalame, bu muakadibo ne bua kuenza buatshia buatshia; ku nyima bakananukila kufila milambu ya kuosha ne milambu ya ngondo mihia mihia ne ya masanka onso majadika a Yehowa akadi majidibue ne wa muntu yonso wakadi ne mutshima wa disua dia kufila kudi Yehowa
Bobo bakahia kudi Filipo, muena Bete saîda wa Galela, bakamuambila ne, Mukelenge, tudi basue kutangila Yesu
Bayidi bakenza bu muakabambila Yesu; bakalongolola Kuhita kua Yehowa
Yeye wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Geshoma, wakamba ne, Nakadi mushikame mu buloba bua benyi

Nakabambila ne, Kanunzuludi bibi bia ku Yelushalema anu habanda diba mulu; nuinshile bibi hatshidiku balami, bele nsahi, nusungule batentekedi ba munkatshi mua Bena Yelushalema, muntu ne muntu mu muaba wandi, muntu yonso ikale buludiludi ne nsubu wandi
Mutuanganyi kena mutuanganyi wa umue; kadi Nzambi udi umue
Bikala nsubu muimpe, ditalala dienu diluemu; kadi bikala nsubu kai muimpe, ditalala dienu dihingane kunudi
Nudi batukebele dikenga ne lulu

Mukashi eu wakadi ne kana ka ngombe ka manyi mu nsubu; yeye wakaya lubilu, wakakashiha; wakangata bukula, Wakenza n abu mampa adi kâyi ne luevene; wakalua n abi kudi Shaula ne kudi bantu bandi; bakadia

Mu tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete tshia Yoasha Yehoyada wakabikila tupitene tua bantu nkama bantu nkama ba Bena Kala ne ba balami, bakalua kudiye mu nsubu wa Yehowa; yeye wakahunga n abo tshihungidi, wakabatshihisha mu nsubu wa Yehowa, wakabalesha muana wa mukelenge
Dituku dia muanda mukulu diakadi dia disangisha dia tshijila; bualu bua bakadi bajidila tshioshelu matuku muanda mutekete, ne bakadia bidia bia disanka matuku muanda mutekete
Yeye wakamba ne, Nuenu bantu bonso, unvuai
Biamona mukelenge ne mbimpe, bakebe mu nsubu wa tshibutshilu tshia mukelenge udi kuakua ku Babulona ne, Mukelenge Kolesha wakela mukenji bua kuasa nsubu eu wa Nzambi mu Yelushalema, anyi
Bualu bua mulayi wa kuhianeye buloba kawakadi kudi Abalahama anyi kudi tunkanunuina tuandi bualu bua mikenshi; kadi wakadika bua buakane bua ku ditabusha
Meme nengikale munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, nengikale Nzambi wabo
Kadi bu mudi ekelesia ukokela Kilisto, nunku bakashi bakokele babayabo mu malu onso
Hakalua nyuma mubi mufume kudi Nzambi kudi Shaula, hashishe Davidi wakangata tshisanji, wakatshimba ne tshianza tshiandi: Shaula wakadi usangala, wakalua bimpe, ne nyuma mubi wakumuka kudiye
Pashishe Moshe kutemesha miendu ayi muaba uvua Maweja Nangila, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Kadi malu onso enjibue bilengele, ne alondangane biakane
Filipo wakasangana Natanaele, wakamuambila ne, Tuakumona wakafunda Mose mu mikenshi, ne baprofete, Yesu wa ku Nazaleta, muana wa Yosefe
Neafile nyunyu muibidi bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, bu muakadi mikenji, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kumubuikidila n au bubi buandi ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue

Davidi wakamba ne, Muan anyi Solomo utshidi nsongalume udi mutekete, ne nsubu utudi tuibakila Yehowa udi ne bua kuikala muakane ne wa butumbi ku nseke yonso ya buloba; nunku meme nembange kusangisha bintu
Yehowa anuleshe luse lujalame ne bulelela; meme kabidi nennufute bua kalolo kenu, bualu bua nuenu nuakenza bualu ebu
Neupete biakudia, amu wewe muluangana mvita, newikale mupika wa muakunyebe Yakobe
Bualu ebu budi bukuatshisha kudi kunyi
Moshe kumukonka ne: Wewe neutupe bimuna bitudi mua kuya kuosha bua kulambula Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu anyi
Nedienjibue
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele nunku, ne bobo bakaluhuka ne muena bihendu ku butshika bua tshitudilu, bakamukuma ne mabue Bena Isalele bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bualu bua meme Yehowa nengambe dî dianyi, ne dî dindi ngamba nedijadikibue, kadiena dijanguluka kabidi
Manashe wakamatshisha mashi a bantu bakadi kabayi ne bilumbu hanshi, tô ne hakûsheye Yelushalema tente; wakenza malu au ha mutu ha malu mabi makuabo akenzeye ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kadi bikaladi bualu bua ngasa, kendia kuenza kua mikenshi kabidi; bua bikaladi nunku, ngasa kena kabidi ngasa
Pashishe kuambilabu Yakobe ne: Tangila udi uvua ne bimuna wawa, ke muanende wa bakaji Rakele
Hakalueye, Bena Yuda bakadi bafume ku Yelushalema bakimana bamunyungulule, bakamubanda malu makole a bungi akadibo kabai bamanye mua kuashikika

Nyima wandi udi ne milongo ya mabamba adi bu ngabu yandi, Diamba dimue didi ditamba kukuatakana ne dikuabo, Dinga didi dilamatangana ne dikuabo; Kuela kuandi kua nyashi kudi kukenkesha dinkenka bu munya, Ndimi ya kahia idi ihatuka mukana muandi, Muishi wa kahia udi uhatuka mu mihembu ya diulu diandi, Muhuya wandi udi utemesha makala a kahia, Bukole budi bujalama mu nshingu wandi, Bituha bia munyinyi wandi bidi mu difu diandi bidi bilamatangana, Mutshima wandi udi mukole bu dibue; Hajukeye, bantu bakole badi batshina, Bakeba muntu kumutaha ne muele wa nvita, kawena umuenzela bualu
Panuikala bantu ba nsongu, nuanyishe bua muntu umue wa kunudi ashale mu lukanu emu
Bena Benyamina bonso bakadisangisha bafume ku misoko yabo yonso, bakaya ku Gibea bua kuluanganabo ne Bena Isalele
Hashishe Abashaloma wakamba ne, Bikilai Hushai, Muena Aka, kabidi, tunvue tshidiye Wamba kabidi

Hakabatuma mukelenge Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne bena nvita bandi bonso, bakanyema, bakaluhuka mu musoko butuku, bakayila mu nshila wa tshibidi tshia mukelenge, bahitshila mu tshibi tshiakadi hankatshi ha ngumbu ibidi, bakayila mu nshila wa ku tshibanda tshia Alabâ
Nunku Yohanana, muana wa Kalea, ne tupitene tuonso tua bena nvita ne bantu bonso kabakatumikila dî dia Yehowa ne, Bashikame mu buloba bua Yuda

Biakuenzelabo bibi ne kakuena muntu udi kayi wenza malu mabi ne wewe udi n abo tshiji, udi ubafila mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo bua kuyabo n abo bu bahika mu buloba bua bena lukuna, mu buloba budi kule anyi budi ha buihi; kadi biabangabo kuelangana meji munda muabo mu buloba buwakabatuma bu bahika, ne biakudimunabo mitshima yabo, biakutendekenabo mu buloba buwakabatuma bu bahika, bamba ne, Tuakuenza bibi, tuakuenza bualu buhote, tuakahambuka; biahinganabo kûdi ne mitshima yabo yonso ne mioyo yabo yonso, mu buloba bua bena lukuna babo bakababuesha mu buhika, biakutendelelabo ne mesu abo matangile ku buloba buabo buwakaha bankambua babo, ne ku musoko eu uwakusungula, ne ku nsubu eu unakuashila dina diebe; unvue kulomba kuabo ne kutendekena kuabo mu diulu kûdi ushikama, ujadike bualu buabo
Nakufundila ekelesia malu makuabo, kadi Diotelefe udi musue kuikala ku mpala munkatshi muabo, kena utuitabusha
Dikasa dia Balaame kutapika

Mu nsubu munene kamuena anu bitekelu Nunku biumusha muntu malu mabi â munda muandi, yeye neikale bu tshitekelu tshiteka bua buneme, tshia tshijila, tshikumbane mudimu wa mukelenge, tshilongolola bua mudimu muimpe wonso
Kadi kanufidi tshintu tshidi ne tshilema bualu bua tshiena ngitabusha tshintu etshi
Wakabuesha lungenyi lua kuyisheye n alu bantu mu mutshima wandi, ne yeye ne Oholiaba, muana mulume wa Ahisamaka wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana
Meme nakadiangatshila bana benu, Bena Lewi, munkatshi mua Bena Isalele badi bu kuha kuebe kuwakuha Yehowa bua kuenza mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena

Udi usonsakaja beena Kongu mwa kwendabo mushinga mushadila, kufuka bintu mu lungenyi, kwenza midimu ya bianza ne kabidi udi wenza mwende mônso bwa kukuba ne bwa kuvulula mamanya mapiluke ne makookeshi adi mu ditunga
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mei enu akadi annyoka
Kadi biwadimusha muntu eu mubi bua kulekeleye kuenda mu nshila wandi mubi, ne bikaleye kayi ulekela kuenda mu nshila wandi mubi, yeye neafue bua bubi buandi, kadi wewe wakuhandisha muoyo webe
Panudi nusombesha muenyi makuta, udi mua kunupingajila
Moshe mumane kumanyisha bena Izrayele malu onsu avua Maweja Nangila muambe, kubabelaye ne: Mikenji yonsu indi nnuambila lelu eyi, nuyikumbaje
Bena Isalele bakasa bitudilu biabo, bakadi bu bisumbu bia bana ba mikoko bibidi ku mpala kuabo; kadi Bena Sulia bakûsha buloba tente
Bisumbu bia mikoku ne bia mbuji bisatu bivua muaba awu, bikishe
Nunku hanakulua, nakadi kumuangata ne tshia kasombelu
Palô wakabika mu butuku, yeye ne bantu bandi bonso, ne Bena Ejipitu bonso, muadi munene wakadi mu Ejipitu, kamuakadi nsubu wakadi kayi ne mufue
Nakangata nkambua wenu Abalahama dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, nakamuendesha mu buloba buonso bua Kanâna, nakavudisha bana bandi, nakamufila Isaka
Ke mundi musue ne: bikale bantu ba tshijila matuku onsu

Nakadi bu mesu kudi bantu bafofo, Nakadi bu tatu kudi bakengi, Nakatshibula menu a ku tshinyanganyanga a muntu mubi, Hashishe, nakamba ne, Nenfuile mu nsubu muanyi; muji wanyi udi ulamba tô ne ku mai, butumbi buanyi budi buhia buhia munda muanyi, Bantu bakateleja matshu abo kundi, bakindila di dianyi, bakahuwa talalâ bua kunvua lungenyi luanyi
Udi upitshila mu diulu, upueka, wenda pa mavuba, anu bua kuvua kunuambuluisha
Mukaji muena mupongu, numushipe
Mose wakamba ne, Nudie bintu ebi lelu, bualu bua edi ndituku diakadijidila Yehowa, kanuena nubisangana mu mpata lelu

Yeye wakamuitaba ne, Tô ne hahita matuku, dinda ne dilolo, binunu bibidi ne nkama isatu; Hashishe, meme Danyele, hanakatangila tshikena kumona etshi, nakadi nkeba kutshijingulula, ekumona, tshinfuanyi bu tshia muntu tshimana ku mpala kuanyi
Yoshua wakahunga dî ne bantu dituku adi, wakabajadikila mukenji ne dî dijadika mu Shekeme
Tamâ wakela butue mu mutu wandi, wakadihanda bilulu biandi bia bibaka bibaka biakadiye muluate; yeye wakateka tshianza tshiandi ha mutu handi, wakaya wenda udila bikole
Yeye wakandamuna ne, Tshiena musue; kadi ku nyima yeye wakakudimuna mutshima wandi, wakaya
Musambu wa Solomo Meme ndi bu tshilongo tshia mu Shalona ne bu tshilongo tshia nsungubidi tshia mu tshibanda
Esawu kudia, kunua, kutungunuka ne luendu
Nuenu bena Izrayele, matuku malondangane asambombu kanuena mua kudia mampa mela buanga
Udi muimanyike bantu ku dinda too ne ku dilolu bua tshinyi
Kadi bua nuenu mimanye ne, Muana wa muntu udi ne bukole, hatshidiye ha buloba, bua kujimisha mibi yeye wakambila muena kaneke ne , Ndi nkuambila ne, Bika biebe, ambula bulalu buebe, ya ku nsubu kuebe
Bikala muntu ne lukama lua mikoko, hajimina mukuabo, yeye kena ushîa minga makumi tshitema ne tshitema, kena uya mu mikuna bua kukebeye udi muhambuke, anyi

Hakahita matuku asatu, miloho yakendakana munkatshi mua tshitudilu; yakambila bantu ne, Hanuatangila mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bakuidi Bena Lewi bautuala, nenumuke ku muaba unudi, nenûlonde
Tatuenu kunshima, kushintula difutu dianyi misangu dikumi
Yehowa kena ulekela bantu bandi bualu bua dina diandi dinene, bualu bua Yehowa wakasungula bua kunuvuisha bantu bandi mene
Bukookeshi bwa kweela mwadi pa nkoselu wa tshilumbu budi bujadikibwa bwa muntu yônso
Nunku ntshinyi, bana betu
Ahaza wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu dikumi ne bisambombo
Yakobe kuinyika muaba awu ne: Betele, mmomumue ne: Nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu muaba uvua Mvidi Mukulu muyukile nende

Budi bu lutete lua mutada, ludi lutambe ntete yonso ya ha buloba bukese; kadi halukunabo mu buloba, ludi Bileha, ludi lutambe midioko yonso bunene, ludi bela matamba manene; nunku nyunyu ya mu diulu idi mimanye mua kuikila mu dileshi diau
Nuenu benze nanku, nebanubutule musangu umue ne mpingu ayi
Bena Manashe bakangata bituha dikumi ha mutu ha buloba bua Gilada ne Bashana budi dishiya dia Yadene; bualu bua bana ba bakashi ba Manashe bakangata buhianyi munkatshi mua bana bandi ba balume
Yeye neakuhule tshinsonshi tshionso ku mesu kuabo; ne lufu kaluena luikalaku kabidi; madilu kêna ikalaku kabidi, nasha muadi, nasha kanyinganyinga kabidi; malu a kumudilu akumuka
Wakatshiawila tatu wandi ne bana babo, tatu wandi wakamukuhulula ku di diandi ne, Etshi ntshilota kai tshiwakulota
bulongolodi budi butangila ngikadilu wa midilu, wa madimi ne meetu, bumunyi,bidibwa bia munyinyi ne bia bisekiseki;
Hakatangila mufofo mulu, wakamba ne, Ndi ntangila bantu; ndi mbamona benda bu mitshi
Bulelela, nenkemeshe bantu ba bungi bua bualu buebe, ne bakelenge babo nebazakale ne buowa bukole bua bualu buebe, hanahenyesha muele wanyi wa nvita ku mpala kuabo
Bualu bubi bua Peô budi bututamba bukese, anyi
Bua hatuakadi munkatshi muenu mene, tuakanuelela mukenshi eu ne, Bikala muntu kai witabusha kuenza mudimu, kadi biandi tshintu
Bana ba Yola, lukama ne dikumi ne babidi
Ndi nditshipa ne: kanuakufika mu ditunga dia Kenaane, dimvua munulaye to
Bena Isalele bakatangila bualu bukole buakenzela Yehowa Bena Ejipitu, ne bantu bonso bakatshina Yehowa, bakeyemena Yehowa ne muntu wandi Mose

Bakokeshi bakalua ne mabue a onyx ne mabue makuabo a kuteka mu efoda ne mu tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi, ne manyi ne bintu bia dihembu dimpe bia kuela mu manyi, ne manyi a muinda ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne manyi adi atua dihembu
Muoyo wandi wakahingana, wakabika lukasa; Yesu wakamba ne, Bamuhe bia kudia
Batatu, nakunufundila mukanda, bualu bua nudi bamanye Yesu udi wa ku tshibangidilu
Bulelela, nebahulumune bana bakese bahite butekete ba mu tshisumbu tshia mikoko bua kuya n abo; bulelela, ba mu luhangu luabo nebakeme bua bualu abu budi bubakuata
Dayawesha, Muena Madai, wakadia bukelenge, wakadi ne bidimu bu makumi asambombo ne bibidi
Bule bua dibaya dimue nebuikale coudées dikumi ne butshiama buadi nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha
Kusunaye mayi kabulubulu tente, kunuisha muana
Mu matuku onso adiye mudijidile kudi Yehowa yeye kena mumanye mua kulua ha buihi ne mundi mufue
Bu mudi bualu mu ekelesia yonso ya basanto, bakashi bahue mu ekelesia; bualu bua kabena bitabusha bua bakashi bakulemu, kadi bikale ku nyima kua balume bu mudi mikenshi yamba
Bakayûsha tô ne ku mibangu yai

Yeye wakambila muena tshiota ne, Naomi, nguakafuma mu buloba bua Moaba udi uhana tshituha tshia buloba tshiakadi tshia muan etu, Elimeleke; nakuelangana meji bua kukuambila bualu ebu ku matshu ne, Wewe utshisumbe ku mpala kua bantu badi bashikama aha, ne ku mpala kua bakulu banyi
Yonatana wakabikila Davidi, wakamuambila malu â onso

Hashishe bakajuka kudi ba ku mutu kua biota bia batatu ba mu Bena Yuda ne bia batatu ba mu Bena Benyamina, ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi, buonso buabo mene bakadi ne mitshima mitabulushibue kudi Nzambi, bua kuyabo bua kulongolola nsubu wa Yehowa udi mu Yelushalema

Bualu bua mulume udi kai muena ditabusha udi mujidila mu mukashi wandi, ne mukashi udi kai muena ditabusha udi mujidila mu mulume wandi udi muena ditabusha; bikala bualu ebu kabui nunku, bana benu batshidi babiha; kadi katataka badi ba tshijila
Padi muntu ubuelela mukaji awu mu nzubu, mu matuku atshidiye ku tshijila tshia bakaji, muntu awu udi upia mikiya ivua nayi mukaji awu

Ndi nkutendekena ne, Wamba biebe ne, Meme ndi muan abo wa bakashi, bua meme mpete diakalengele bua bualu buebe, ne mutshima wanyi wikale ne muoyo bua bualu buebe Hashishe hakalua Abalama mu Ejipitu, Bena Ejipitu bakatangila ne mukashi wakadi mulengele be
Hakayabo n abo ha bule umue wabo wakamba ne Nyema lubilu, bua kuhandisha muoyo webe kutangidi ku nyima kuebe, kushadi ha mpata nyema ku mikuna kufu biebe
Bualu bua mulume udi ku mutu kua mukashi bu mudi Kilisto ku mutu kua ekelesia, yeye musungidi wa ekelesia, mubidi wandi mene
Balaame mumane kuamba nanku, kupinganaye kuabu

Davidi wakambila Ahimeleke muakuidi ne, Mukelenge wakuntuma bua mudimu wandi: yeye wakungambila ne, Kumanyishi muntu bua mudimu unakakutumina anyi bua mei anakakuambila; nakamana kutuma bantu ku muaba ne ku muaba
Bua tshitangidi bualu ebu bubi budi bulue kudi tatu wanyi

Palo enze biandi bualu ebu kabidi, asungule tuhita tua mu buloba, tusangishe tshintu tshitanu tshia bintu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba bua Ejipitu mu bidimu ebi muanda mutekete bidi buloba bulua ne bintu bia bungi
Yeye wakamuitaba ne Ndi nkeba bana betu, ndi nkusengelela ne, undeshe kudibo badisha mikoko
Yehowa atambe kuenzela Yonatana bibi biamba tatu wanyi kukuenzela wewe bibi ne meme tshiyi nkuambila, tshiyi nkutuma ha bula bua wewe uye ne ditalala; Yehowa ikale n ebe bu muakadiye ne tatu wanyi
Diswika diônso anyi dipangadika diônso badi badiangata mudibio mu mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu anyi mwa Tshisangilu tshia bibambalu biônso
Elela bantu mukenshi bua malu â, ubayisheu
Bantu nebasumbe madimi mu buloba ebu kabidi bunudi nuamba ne, Budi bushala bikulu, kabuyi ne bantu anyi bimuna, budi bufidibue mu bianza bia Bena Kasada

Yoketana wakalela Alamodada ne Shelefe ne Hasamaweta ne Yela ne Hadolama ne Uzala ne Dikela ne Obala ne Abimaele ne Shiba ne Ofi ne Hawila ne Yobaba bantu aba bonso bakadi bana balume ba Yoketana Mukalu wabo wakadi ku Mesha mu nshila wa ku Sefa, to ne ku mikuna mile ya ku esete
Nentangadishe Bena Ejipitu munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu, nembamuangalashe munkatshi mua maloba makuabo
Balume bakadi muanda mutekete; yeye neikale mukashi wa mulume kai, halua dibika dia ku lufu
Hakabuela diba, bayidi bandi bakahueka ku dishiba; bakabuela mu buatu, bakadi baya dishia ku Kapênuma
Moshe kukosa tshimpanga atshi muminu, kumiamina mashi atshi ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu

Yehowa, ndi ndila kûdi; E, nyama ya mu mpata mene idi idila kûdi, Joel Elai mpungi mu Siona, Ndituku dia mîdima ne dia mufitu, Ku mpala kua mikumbi ei kahia kadi kosha bintu, kabimana, Tshifuanyikishi tshiai tshidi bu tshifuanyikishi tshia tubalu; Bu mudi tshiona tshia makalu a nvita ha mikuna Bantu badi bazakala ku mpala kuai ne buowa bukole, Idi inyema lukasa bu bena bukitu; Kayena isakilangana, Idi yenda idiela mu musoko, Buloba budi buzakala ku mpala kuai; Yehowa udi wela dî dikole Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mpindiu mene, Handai mitshima yenu, kanuhandi hivualu bienu, Nganyi udi mumanye ne kena ukudimuna mutshima wandi, Elai mpungi mu Siona, sangishai bantu
Udi weyemena nganyi, hawakuntombokela
Hashishe nakanuambila ne, Kanuikadi ne buowa, kanubatshinyi
Ku tshikondo atshi bana balume ba mukelenge makumi muanda mutekete bakadi ne bantu banene ba mu musoko bakadi babadiundisha
Wewe neuhange bulelela, ne wewe ne bantu badi n ebe bujitu bua bualu ebu budi bukutamba bukôle, wewe nkayebe kuena mua kubuenza
Nenkusungile wewe ne musoko eu mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Ashû; nenduile bena musoko eu nvita
Hilekiya muakuidi munene wakambila Shafana secrétaire ne, Nakusangana mukanda wa mikenji ya Mose mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Au mmena a bana ba balume ba Gêshona ku meku abo Libini ne Shimei
Monai, ndi nutumina mulayi wa Tatu wanyi; kadi nushale mu musoko eu tô ne hanuluatshishabo bukole bua mu diulu

Nakakuluatshisha ne mayeka akadi ne malenda mimpe, nakabuesha bisabata bia tshiseba tshia nyama wa mu mai ku makasa ebe, nakakujingila tshilulu tshia lin tshinefuke, nakakuluatshisha tshilulu tshia soie
Yozefe kubela bana babu ne: Kanutandianga nyi mu njila to
Ba ku Yawana, Tubala ne Mesheke bakenduluka n ebe mushinga; bakashintakasha n ebe bahika ne malonga a tshiamu tshia mitaku ku bintu biebe biwakenduluka n abi
Bantu ba bungi nebalonde bienzenza biabo bia masandi; bua bualu buabo nshila wa bushua neahendibue
Mose Wakangata makalu ne ngombe, wakabifila kudi Bena Lewi
