Mutshima udi uteketa, binu bidi bikanka, Buina bua nyama ya ntambue Nyama wa ntambue wakasunsuluila bana bandi munyinyi, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Mona, ndi nkuhidia, nenshidishe makalu ebe mu kahia, muele wa mata neumane bana bebe ba ntambue, bintu biebe biwakunyenga, nembiumushe ha buloba, bantu kabena bunvua kabidi dî dia ba messager bebe
Buonso buabo bakamukosa ne, Wewe udi Muana wa Nzambi, anyi
Muntu uvuaye wambila bua kutendelela mvidie, ke udi udianjila kumuasa dibue
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Ki mmutoyi wa bantu batshimune mvita nansha babatshimune to, ndi ngumvua bantu bimba misambu ya bibilu
Yehowa, Muhikudi webe, Aka

Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe bakambila bakadi ku mutu kua binunu bia Bena Isalele ne, Nzambi Umue Munene, Yehowa, Nzambi Umue Munene, Yehowa, udi mumanye; Bena Isalele nebamanye biabo ne, Bikalaku ditomboka, anyi bikalaku buhidia bua kuhidia Yehowa, kanutusungidi lelu
Mukashi wa Shimishona wakadila ku mpala kuandi wamba ne, Wewe udi n anyi lukuna, kuena munsue nansha
Yeye wakabambila ne, Mutshima wanyi udi utamba kunyingalala, lufu ludi luntonda; nushale aha, nutabale
Mushinga wa budimi udi mua kuikala wa bungi, padi budimi butshidi ne bidimu bia kunowa bia bungi
Hakunvua Mikaya, muana wa Gemaleya, muana wa Shafana, mei onso a Yehowa akadi mu mukanda, yeye wakahueka ku nsubu wa mukelenge, ubuela mu nsubu wa secrétaire
Nudisangishe matuku asambombo, kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete didi dijidila, kabiena bikalaku dituku adi

Diba diakamba kubuela, bayidi bandi dikumi ne babidi bakalua, bakamuambila ne, Umuangalashe bantu, baye mu misoko ne mu luseke elu bua kulala ne bua kuangata bia kudia: bualu bua kunoko tudi mu tshihela
Yeye wakateka ngabu ne mafuma mu misoko yonso, wakayidika bikole
Bakajika mifuba ya Shaula ne ya Yonatana muan andi mu lukita lua Kishi, tatu wandi, mu Sela mu buloba bua Benyamina
Bobo bakalongolola matabisha diambedi Yosefe kayi muanze kulua diba hankatshi, bualu bua bakunvua lumu ne, Netudieku n andi bidia
Moshe kuela ndelanganyi ya Ngade lupemba, wamba ne: Maweja Nangila atumbe
Miriyame kuambila bena Izrayele ne: Imbilayi Maweja Nangila musambu: mmuleje bukole budiye nabu, mmubutule tubalu ne bavua babandapu
Nasha, kadi wewe, muntu udi nganyi udi wela Nzambi mpata
Nanku Yozefe kunzulula nzubu ya mayeba, bua bantu basumbe biakudia
Mu malu ebe onso a tshinyangu ne a masandi kuakuvuluka matuku a buana buebe, hawakadi butaka kuyi ne tshivualu, udibonda mu mashi ebe
Davidi wakabuesha tshianza tshiandi mu mpaya wandi, wakambula dibue, wakadiela, wakataha Muena Peleshete mu mpala wandi; dibue diakajika mu mpala wandi, yeye wakadishinda mutue mpala hanshi
Bualu bua bobo bonso bakasua kututshinyisha, bamba ne, Netutekeshe maboko abo mu mudimu, kabawenji nansha
Nunku Hushai, mulunda wa Davidi, wakalua mu musoko; ne Abashaloma wakabuela mu Yelushalema

Kadi nuakukudimuka ne nuakuhetula dina dianyi, nuakudihingashila, muntu ne muntu, bahika banuakadi balekele, balume ne bakashi, ne nuakubabuesha mu buhika tshiakabidi bua kuikalabo bahika benu, balume ne bakashi
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Tshihi tshia ku tshibuelelu etshi tshishale tshinshila, kabatshiunzuludi, ne muntu kabuedimu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, wakabuelamu, nunku tshishale tshinshila
Bobo nebalame mushete wa Nzambi ne mesa ne minda ne bioshelu ne malonga adibo benza n au mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne tshilulu tshidibo bateka ku mpala kua muaba wa tshijila

Nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ushikishe dî diwakalaya muntu webe Davidi tatu wanyi ne, Kuena uhanga muntu mulume wa kushikama ku mpala kuanyi mu nkuasa wa bukelenge bua Isalele, biadimuke bana bebe mu nshila yabo bua kuendabo mu mikenji yanyi bu muwakuenda ku mpala kuanyi
Abinê wakatumina Davidi ba messager, bakamukonka ne, Buloba ebu mbua nganyi
Nunku Belâma wakaya ne miloho ya Balaka
Hakafuneye bulobo kudi Bena Isalele, Yonatana, muana wa Shimea, muan abo ne Davidi, wakamushiha

Kanungu ka Bukalenga bunene kabweena mwa kutumina nzuji dîyi padiye mu mudimu wende to, anyi kutangila bilumbu, anyi kunyangakaja lwendu lwa dilumbulwisha, anyi kubenga mwa kukumbaja dipangadika dia bilumbulwilu
Numbers Yehowa Wakambila Mose ne, Usombuele Bena Isalele bualu bua Bena Midiyana, ku nyima wewe neusangakene ne bankambua bebe
Ditshina dia Yehowa diakakuata bantu bonso, bakaluhuka diatshimue
Ke milambu inudi ne bua kundambula mu ntuadijila wa ngondu yonsu

Hanuakenga mu dikenga, halua malu au onso kunudi, nenuhingane kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu matuku adi ku nyima, nenutumikile dî diandi: bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi wa luse; yeye kena unuhanga, kena unujimisha, yeye kena uhua muoyo bualu bua tshihungidi tshia batatu enu tshiakahungeye n abo
Nebakuhetshi

Nensunguile bantu banyi Bena Isalele muaba, nembajadikemu bua bobo bashikame mu muaba wabo, kabena bumukamu kabidi; bantu babi kabena babatatshisha bu muakenzabo diambedi; bu munakenza mu matuku anakasungula bantu banyi Bena Isalele balumbuluishi, nenkuvuishe dikisha kudi bena lukuna bebe bonso
Dituku dia muanda mutekete bena Izrayele bakuabu kumuka mu mitanda bua kukeba biakudia
Badi bimba musambu wa Mose, muhika wa Nzambi, ne musambu wa Muana wa Mukoko, bamba ne, Mukelenge, nganyi udi kai utshina, udi kai utumbisha dina diebe
Nanku asukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi a mpokolu bua mikiya kujikayi
Kupeshaye bena Ngershone matempu abidi ne ngombe inayi, bua bibambuluishe mu mudimu udibu nawu
Mukashi wa muan andi Pinehasa wakadi ne difu, kulela kuandi kuakadi ha buihi

Ne kakuena mpata ya bunene bua bualu busokoka bua buimpe bua Nzambi: Timothy Kadi Nyuma udi wamba batoke ne, Halua bikondo bia kunshikidilu ha buihi, bantu bakuabo nebalekele ditabusha diabo, balamata ku nyuma idi ihambuisha ne ku mayisha a bademon; bualu bua lubombo lua bantu badi bamba mei a mashimi, badi boshibua mu muoyo mukese wabo ne tshiamu tshibia ne kadilu
Kayeena yikumbanangana kabidi ne majitu kampanda mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi kansanga to
Abashaloma ne Bena Isalele bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo mu buloba bua Gilada
Lea wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa bintu bia bungi, katataka bayanyi neashale n anyi bualu bua meme nakamulelela bana ba balume basambombo, wakamuidika dina ne, Zebuluna
Kings Manashe wakadi ne bidimu dikumi ne bibidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi atanu ne bitanu
Biakabuela ne Noa mu buatu, bintu bibidi bintu bibidi bia bintu bionso bidi ne muhuya wa muoyo
Eleyehoenai ne Omeli ne Yelemota ne Abiya ne Anatota ne Alemeta

Hangambila muntu mubi ne, Wewe muntu mubi, neufue bulelela, ne wewe udi uhanga kuamba dî dimue bua kudimusha muntu mubi bua kulekeleye kuenda mu nshila wandi mubi, muntu eu mubi neafue bua bubi buandi, kadi nendombe mashi andi ku tshianza tshiebe
Bika, hueka munshi, uye n abo; kuedi mpata, bualu bua nakubatuma
Nadaba ne Abihu bakafua hakafuabo kahia kakadi kakayi ka tshijila kudi Yehowa
Yeye wakitaba ne, Nansha, nakutuma bu mukelenge wa musumba wa Yehowa

Lemeke wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu ne bibidi, wakalela muana mulume, wakamuidika dina ne, Noa, wakamba ne, Yeye neatusambe mu mudimu wa bianza bietu, bualu bua buloba buakedibua mulau kudi Yehowa
Kadi nansha nanku, kabeena mwa kwanji kwimanyika midimu ya kabadi ka kabwendela to

Bunga bualu, badi bayila kabidi mua kuikala bafuba, bendakana ku nsubu ne ku nsubu; ne kabena bayila mua kuikala anu ne bufuba nkayabu, kadi mua kuikala bena mukoso ne bena bienzenza, bakula mei adi kâi mimpe bua kuakula
Nunku unvuai bualu bua lusumuinu lua mumiaminyi
Shaula wakaluangana nvita mikole ne Bena Peleshete matuku andi onso; bakatangila Shaula muntu mukole anyi muntu wa bukitu, yeye wakamuangata bu muntu wandi
Hakaubaleye, wakakonka luseke luakadiye; hakamanyeye ne, Ngua ku Kilikia, wakamuambila ne, Nengunvue tshilumbu tshiebe bimpe, halua bakubanda wakamba bua kumulamabo mu nsubu munene wa Helode
Bakambila Lebeka mei a Esau, muan andi muan a bute yeye Wakabikila Yakoba muan andi muan a mukala, wakamuambila ne Esau mukulu ebe udi welangana meji a kukushiha bua kutokesheye munda muandi
Bakadi balume bu binunu bitanu

Yeye wakamuitaba ne, Tô ne hahita matuku, dinda ne dilolo, binunu bibidi ne nkama isatu; Hashishe, meme Danyele, hanakatangila tshikena kumona etshi, nakadi nkeba kutshijingulula, ekumona, tshinfuanyi bu tshia muntu tshimana ku mpala kuanyi
Yehowa wakamba ne, Udi wenza bimpe haudi ukuata tshiji nunku, anyi
Bantu ba bende, ba mu bisamba bia bantu badi batamba kukuatshisha bakuabo buowa, nebautahe, nebaushiye
Bualu bua bu tshihungidi tshia kumudia tshikale tshijalame katshi ne bualu, kabakadi kukeba muaba wa kuhunga tshibidi
Bakulua ne bena meji, bamanyi ba malu a mitoto, ku mpala kuanyi, bua kumbadila tshifundu etshi ne kummanyishabo dijingulula diatshi; kadi kabakamanya mua kundesha dijingulula dia bualu
Kuenzaye nkanu inayi ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Ku kudividila kuanyi kua kumudilu kakuakadi muntu wakimana n anyi hamue, kadi bonso bakandekela; bualu ebu kabubadibu kudibo
Nunku unvuai bualu budi Yehowa muhangidishe bua kuenzela Edome, ne malu akahangidisheye bua kuenzela badi bashikame mu Temana
Kanudionenyi mitshima yenu ne malu au Ebi mbilele bia bisamba bindi ngihata ku mesu kuenu, buloba buabo buakoneka, nempingishe bubi ha mutu habu, buloba nkayabu budi buluka bena buloba
Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, wakafila Sihona ne bantu bandi bonso mu bianza bia Bena Isalele, ne bobo bakabashiha; nunku Bena Isalele bakangata buloba bua Bena Amole, bantu ba ku luseke alu

Kanyinganyinga kalualua; bobo nebakebe ditalala, ne diodio kadiena dikalaku, Kubutuka nekulonde ha nyima ha kubutuka kukuabo, ne lumu nelulonde ha nyima ha lumu lukuabo; nebakebe tshikena kumona kudi muprofete, kadi diyisha dia mikenji kudi muakuidi nedishike, ne bakulu kabena bikala ne bukole bua kulesha bakuabo meji
Abimeleke ne bavuaye nabu kuandamuna ne: Tudi tukulonda bualu tudi bajadika ne: Maweja Nangila udi nebe
Yeye neakudimune mitshima ya batatu bua ihingane kudi bana babo, neakudimune mitshima ya bana bua ihangane kudi batatu babo; bua meme tshilu kubutula buloba ku mulau

Mukashi eu wakangata bantu aba babidi, wakabasuika; yeye wakamba ne, Bulelela, bantu aba bakulua kundi kadi tshiakamanya kuakafumabo; ne bakulua diba didibo binshila bibi bia musoko, hakuila butuku, bantu aba bakaluhuka; kadi meme tshiena mumanye kuakuyabo; nubalonde lubilu, nenubahete
Ngombe mulume umue, mukoku wa tshimpanga umue ne muana wa mukoku umue wa tshidimu tshimue bua milambu ya kuosha
Nenupete mputa ya lubangu ne masama makole mavule adibu kabayi mua kuondapa
Kadi nenjadike tshihungidi tshiandi ne Isaka, wakulelela Sala tshidimu tshialua hakumbana ngondo yandi
Mukelenge Davidi wakangata biamu bia mitaku bia bungi mu Beta ne Belotai, misoko ya Hadadezê
Wambile ba mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa Yuda ne, Unvuai bienu dî dia Yehowa, nuenu ba mu nsubu wa Davidi

Yesu wakambila bantu malu â onso mu nsumuinu, yeye kakabambila malu tshianana, anu mu nsumuinu; bua dî diakambabo kudi muprofete dishikishibue ne, Hashishe, Yesu wakashîa bisumbu bia bantu ku nyima, wakabuela mu nsubu; bayidi bandi bakalua kudiye, bakamuambila ne, Utujinguluile lusumuinu lua luhela luakadi mu budimi
Mu muanda eu tudi bamanye dinanga, bualu bua Yesu wakateka muoyo wandi hanshi bua bualu buetu; ne tuetu tudi ne bualu bua kuteka mioyo yetu hanshi bualu bua bana betu
Kanuena bamanye
Etshi kantshishelele tshiakahatulabo mu kahia, anyi
Mvidi Mukulu kutuma tshipepela pa buloba, mayi kutuadija kukepela
Bakamba ne, Bikai, tuyai kubaluisha; bualu bua tuakatangila buloba ne budi buimpe; nuenu nenushikame tshianana, anyi
Bavua bamuenzela mudimu anu bilondeshile mikenji ivuaye muambile Moshe
Hakafikeye ku muaba au, wakabambila ne, Nutendelele Nzambi bua nuenu kanuhonyi mu mateyi
Meme tshiena muimite, tshiena mulele bantu bonsu aba to
Nakanuambila nunku, kanuakangunvuila; kadi nuakadi ne budisu, nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, nuakadiyila ku mikuna
Mukuna wa Sinai wonso wakadi ne muishi, bualu bua Yehowa wakahueka ha mutu hau mu kahia, muishi wakabanda bu muishi wa tshikutu, mukuna wonso wakakanka bikole
Nundombele Yehowa, bualu bua makubakuba ne mabue a nvula biakututonda, nennulekele, kanuena nushala kabidi
Kuambaye ne: Mpindiewu bayanyi neandamate, bualu mbamuleledi bana ba balume basatu
Yehowa wakakonka Kana ne, Muakuny ebe Ebele udi kudi kunyi
Hashishe meme, Danyele, nakatangila, ekumona, bantu bakuabo babidi bakadi bimane ku musulu, mukuabo dia munemu, mukuabo dia muamua
Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, muntu wa Yehowa, wakafua hakadiye ne bidimu lukama ne dikumi

Jeremiah Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya hakadi Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, ne masalayi andi onso ne makelenge onso a hanshi ha buloba bakadi muinshi mua bukokeshi buandi ne ba mu bisamba bionso, baluangana ne Yelushalema ne misoko yau yonso: Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Ya wambile Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, nenfile musoko eu mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Babulona, ne yeye neawoshe ne kahia
Nuditengule mu mitshima yenu, kanuikadi bantu ba tshitshu kabidi
Hakashikisheye kumunuisha mai, yeye wakamba ne, Nensunyine tumelo biebe mai kabidi to ne hukutatu
Kakuena muntu udi mua kukandika muhuya wa muoyo; yeye kabidi kena mua kuindisha dituku dia lufu; kabena balekela bena nvita hatshidibo baluangana; bubi kabuena mua kuhandisha muen abu
Yehowa wakambila Solomo ne, Bualu bua wewe wakatamba kuenza nunku, kuakatumikila tshihungidi tshietu ne mei anyi binakukuambila, bulelela, nenunyenge bukelenge, nembuhe muntu webe
Elisha wakamuambila ne
Numanye ne: minyinyi ayi idi ne mikiya
Biasanganabo mulume mulale ne mukashi wa muntu mukuabo, nebashihe bubidi buabo, ne mulume wakadi ulala ne mukashi eu ne mukashi kabidi: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi mua Isalele
Bantu bonso bakambila Samuele ne, Ulombele bantu bebe Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua tuetu katufu, bualu bua tuetu tuakavudisha bualu ebu bubi bua kudilombela mukelenge ha mutu ha mibi yonso ituakuenza
Nunku nakaditshiha bua ba mu nsubu wa Eli ne, Kabena babuikidila mibi ya ba mu nsubu wa Eli ku milambu ya kuosha ne ku bintu bidibo bafila tshiendelele
Bakumukaku, bakaya, bakateka bana ne bimuna ne bintu biabo ku mpala kuabo
Wewe wakuenza buhote mu bualu ebu, kubangila mu dituku edi wewe newikale ne nvita

Edome Udi Uhidia bua Bena Isalele Bahite Mose wakatuma miloho ku Kadesha kudi mukelenge wa Edome ne, Muan enu Isalele udi wamba ne, Wewe udi mumanye makenga onso akutukuata: bankambua betu bakaya mu Ejipitu, ne tuetu tuakashikama mu Ejipitu musangu mule, Bena Ejipitu bakadienzela bibi ne bankambua betu kabidi: ne hatuakadila kudi Yehowa, yeye wakumpa dî dietu, wakatuma muanjelo wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu, ne tangila, tudi mu Kadesha, musoko udi ku butshika bua buloba buenu mene
Nebakuenzele malu â bualu bua wewe wakenda masandi ne ba mu bisamba bia bantu hawakadinyanga ne ditendelela dia mpingu yabo
Kadi Shaula wakabutula bena ekelesia, wakabuela mu nsubu yonso, wakakoka balume ne bakashi, wakababuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu

Hakambeye mukenji eu, Bena Isalele bakafila bintu bia bungi bia bintu biakahuolabo diambedi ne bia nvinyo ne bia manyi ne bia buitshi ne bia bintu bionso biakamena mu madimi abo; bakalua ne tshia dikumi tshia bintu biabo bia bungi

Anyi binavuisha muele wa nvita ha buloba abu, bingamba ne, Muele wa nvita, hita mu buloba ebu; nunku nenshihemu bantu ne nyama; Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nansha bu bantu aba basatu bikalemu, bu mundi ne muoyo, kabakadi kuhandisha mioyo ya bana babo balume anyi ya bana babo bakashi; anu bobo nkayabo bakadi kuhanduka

Ku tshibangidilu hakayikila Yehowa ne Hoshea, Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Ya biebe, ubake mukashi wa masandi, ulele n andi bana ba mu masandi; bualu bua ba mu buloba ebu badi balonda malu a masandi, bahambuke kudi Yehowa
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nembabutule kabutu; Tudi bashikame hanshi bua tshinyi
Edi ndî dia Yehowa
Amalama wakabaka Yokebede, muan abo wa bakashi ne tatu wandi, ne yeye wakamulelela Alona ne Mose, bidimu bia Amalama biakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete

Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Mukelenge wanyi, muena mudimu wanyi wakundinga; bualu bua muntu webe wakamba ne, Nendielele tshiseba ha nyima ha nyama wa mpunda, bua meme mbande ha nyima handi, nye ne mukelenge; bualu bua muntu webe udi mulema
Itamare, muana wa mutuangaji Arone, ke uvua ulombola bena Levi bavua babala bintu ebi
Bualu bua bonso bakadi benza malu mabi kabai ne mikenshi nebafue bu badi kabai ne mikenshi; ne bonso bakadi ne mikenshi bakadi benza malu mabi nebalumbuluishibue ku mikenshi
Hakafikabo ha buihi ne Musia, bakakeba kuya mu Bitunia, kadi Nyuma wa Yesu kakitabusha
Mikenji ya mulambu wa dinua tshibalu ne ya mulambu wa kukobolola bantu, idi anu mushindu umue
Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele, wakebesha Yehoshafata, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne, Wewe neuye n anyi ku Lamota gilada, anyi

Nzambi wakamuambila mu tshiota ne, Bulelela, ndi mumanye ne wewe wakuenza bualu ebu mu buakane bua mu mutshima webe, nakakuhidisha kabidi bua kuenza bualu bubi ku mesu kuanyi, nunku tshiakuitabusha bua wewe kumulenga tshianza
Bikala mulambu webe wa bukula budibo balamba mu dilonga, neusangishe bukula bubotesha ne manyi
Bakayisha mu Yuda; bakadi ne mutanda wa mikenji ya Yehowa; bakaya ku misoko yonso ya Bena Yuda, bayisha bantu

Hashika bidimu tshinunu, Satana nealekedibue mu nsubu wandi wa lukanu, nealuhuke bua kudingeye bisamba bia ku matengu anai a buloba, Goga ne Magoga, bua kubisangisha hamue ku nvita, bungi buabo budi bu nsengu ya ku mai manene
Mutshi udi hankatshi ha mabaya neuhite ku ditumba dimue tô ne ku ditumba dikuabo
Kubambilabu ne: Nuenu nudi ne mutu mukole
Kadi wewe, ya, windile tô ne hashika malu â; newikishe, hashishe neujalame mu buhianyi buebe kunshikidilu kua matuku â
Kadi tshimuna tshionsu, tshinene nansha tshikese, tshidi tshitebuke, nansha tshidi ne tshidimba tshishawuke, udi mua kutshindambula amu bua mulambu wa budisuile
Bianukonka muntu ne, Nudi nuenzela nunku tshinyi

Bua bobo badi basue kuhua muoyo bua bualu ebu ne, Diulu diakadiku kale, ne buloba huakakuatakashibua bua mu mai bufume mu mai bua dî dia Nzambi; bualu bua mai â, buloba abu buakadiku mu tshikondo atshi buakabuikidibua ne mai, buakajimina

Ndi ngamba bua bantu bakushiha tshihungidi tshianyi, badi kabayi benze bu muakambabo mu tshihungidi atshi tshiakahungabo ku mpala kuanyi, hakahandabo muana wa ngombe nseke ibidi ne hakahitshilabo munkatshi mua nseke ei; baminyampala ba Bena Yuda ne ba Yelushalema mene, bantu babo batungula, bakuidi ne bantu bonso ba mu buloba ebu bakahitshila munkatshi mua nseke ibidi ya muana wa ngombe
Nuvuluke dî dinakunuambila ne, Muhika kena mutambe nfumu wandi
Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Diba nedilue, didiku katataka mene, diunvua bafue dî dia Muana wa Nzambi; badi bunvua nebikale ne muoyo
Samuele wakambila bantu ne, Luai, tuye ku Gilegala, netujadikileku bukelenge

Muakuidi wakamuambila ne, Muele wa nvita wa Goleyata, Muena Peleshete, uwakashiha mu tshibanda tshia Ela, udiku, udi mujingila mu tshilulu ku nyima kua efoda; biwasua kuwangata, uwangate, bualu bua kakuena muele mukuabo kunoko
Nunku Solomo wakashikisha nsubu wa Yehowa ne nsubu wa mukelenge; Solomo wakamana malu onso bimpe akadi mu mutshima wandi bua nsubu wa Yehowa ne bua nsubu wandi kabidi
Mu tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne muanda mukulu tshia bukelenge bua Uziya, mukelenge wa Yuda, Zekâya, muana wa Yalobama, wakakokesha Bena Isalele mu Samalea anu ngondo isambombo

Hashishe yeye wakabandila mukanda musangu muibidi, wakabambila ne, Binuikala ku luseke luanyi, binuasua kunvua dî dianyi, hashishe nutule mitu ya bana balume ba mukelenge wenu, nulue n ai kundi ku Yizelele makelela ha diba edi
Ke padibu babikila muaba awu ne: Ngalede
Bena Yuda bakamukudimuna ne, Tudi ne mukenshi wetu, mbimpe bia yeye afue biandi bu mudi mukenshi wetu, bua yeye wakudivuisha bu Muana wa Nzambi
Yehowa wakamba ne, Bena Yuda nebadianjile kuya

Bualu bua matuku nealue adi badi n ebe lukuna babuelela luhangu, nebatunyunguluke, nebakutshintshimike ku nseke yonso, nebakukume hanshi ne bana badi n ebe; kabena bashîa dibue dimue ha mutu ha dikuabo, bualu bua wewe kuakumanya dituku diakalua Nzambi kûdi

bualu bua dî dia muena lukuna, Mutshima wanyi udi unyingalala munda muanyi, Kutshina ne kuzakala kudi kufika kundi, Ndi ngamba ne, Nakadi kusua kuikala ne mahuahua a nyunyu bu mudi eyo, nakadi kunyema kule, Nakadi kudiendesha lubilu bua kuheta bianyi tshinyemenu Mukelenge, ubutule malu adibo bahangidisha, uhandulule ndimi yabo, Munya ne butuku badi banyunguluka musoko, benda ha mutu ha kubutuka kudi munkatshi muau
Pashishe kumutuadilabu tshimpanga tshikuabu bua kujidila batuangaji
Isaka wakabambila ne, Nudi n anyi lukuna, nuakungihata munkatshi muenu, nunku nuakuluila kundi bua tshinyi
Meme hanyi, Danyele, mutshima wanyi wakahampakana ne buowa, ne mpala wanyi wakandamuka; kadi nakalama muanda eu mu mutshima wanyi
Bialueye ne muana wa mukoko bu mulambu wa kubindila n au bubi, nealue biandi ne mukashi wa mukoko udi kauyi ne tshilema
John Hakashika malu â, disanka dia Bena Yuda diakadiku; Yesu wakaya ku Yelushalema

Kadi muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musungule munkatshi mua bisamba bienu bionso, bua kujadikamu dina diandi: nenukebe muaba kudiye mushikame, nenudisangisheku; nenulueku ne milambu yenu ya kuosha, ne nyama mishiha, ne bintu bia dikumi bia bintu bienu, ne bintu bienu bidibo bakuha, ne milambu ya kuditshiha kuenu, ne bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, ne ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne ba mikoko yenu
Yeye ne balume bakadi n andi bakadia, bakanua, bakalala butuku abu, bakabika ne dinda, yeye wakabambila ne, Nuntume kudi mukelenge wanyi
Mukelenge wakatshinguluka, wakatangila Petelo talala
Hakafuabo ku luseke ludi hehi ne Yadene mu buloba bua Kanâna, Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe, bakasa tshioshelu ku Yadene, tshioshelu tshinene tshia dikema
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Wakuamba bulelela ne, Tshiena ne mulume; bualu bua wewe wakadi ne balume batanu, ûdi n andi katataka kena mulume webe; wewe wakuamba bulelela
Hakatshiabu bakabika ne dinda dionso, bakafua milambu ya kuosha, bakalua ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, bantu bakashikama bua kudia ne bua kunua, bakabika bua kunaya
Kadi ubambile ne, Matuku akukumbana ne tshikena kumona tshionso netshijadikibue

Tshitadi tshia muaba wa tshijila Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe kabidi ne: Pawikala ubadika bena Izrayele, muntu yonsu afile tshintu tshia kudipandisha natshi ku ntatu ne makenga bidi mua kumukuata, diba dia kubadika bantu

Bantu banene ba munkatshi mua bana balume ba Eleazâ bakahita bana balume ba Itamâ bungi; bakabatahulula nunku: ba bana balume ba Eleazâ ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo bakadi dikumi ne basambombo; ne ba bana balume ba Itamâ bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo bakadi muanda mukulu
Diba adi neakungule nsuki
Mbualu bua buowa bua kuhona mu bianza bia Nzambi udi ne muoyo
Bana ba Zatu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi anai ne batanu
Timote Bonso badi bahika munshi mua mutshi wa tshikokedi babale banfumu babo ne mbakanyine buneme buonso; bua dina dia Nzambi ne diyisha dia buala buandi kabihendibu
Kadi Maweja Nangila kushala muaba uvua Abrahame
Ke kuinyikabu muaba awu dina ne: Mispa, mmomumue ne: kaleya ka mutentekedi
Wakenza bilulu bia miosa ya mbushi dikumi ne tshilulu tshimue bua kuteka ha mutu ha nsubu
Bimenga abi bionsu bisanga nebikale makumi anayi ne muanda mukulu, kabidi ne mpata idi pabuipi nabi ya kudishila bimuna
Edi kandituku dia lumingu ne ngondo kena muanze kubala
Nuele Ubano, umena mudimu n etu mu Kilisto, ne Staku, munanga wanyi, muoyo
Nunku biwikala kui muende masandi, kadi biwashiha muntu, wewe wakulua mushihi wa mikenshi yonso
Unvua mudibo bakubanda malu a bungi
Hakamona Bena Isalele bonso ne, Mukelenge kena witabusha dî dietu, bobo bakebesha mukelenge ne, Kadi Lehabama wakakokesha Bena Isalele bakadi bashikame mu misoko ya mu Yuda
Yosefe wakambila bana babo ne, Ndi Yosefe mene; tatu wanyi utshidi ne muoyo, anyi
Bakuidi bakadi batuala mushete bakimana munkatshi mua Yadene, tô ne hakashika malu onso akambila Yehowa Yoshua bua kuambileye bantu, malu onso akambila Mose Yoshua; ne bantu bakasabuka lubilu
Wa bana ba Bani, Shelomita, muana wa Yosifiya; bakadi n andi bakadi balume lukama ne makumi asambombo

Bua luhandu elu baprofete bakakeba ne bakalukesha bikole, bamba bua ngasa wakadi ha kulua kunudi; bakebakeba tshikondo kai ne mushindu kai wa tshikondo tshiakabalesha Nyuma wa Kilisto wakadi munda muabo, hakadianjileye kubambila bua makenga a Kilisto ne bua butumbi buakadi ha kualonda
Kadi pikala mukaji mupete njiwu, mbimpe kusombuela
Bualu bua tshiona tshia bena tubalu ne tshia makalu a hatuhu ne tshia makalu a nvita, ngumbu yebe neyikanke habueleye mu bibi biebe, bu mudi muntu ubuela mu musoko hashimbuka tshituha tshia lumbu
Mu muanda eu mudi dinanga, kembua tuetu tuakunanga Nzambi, kadi bua yeye wakatunanga, wakatuma Muana wandi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au mibi yetu
Wenze bitaku bitanu bia tshiamu tshikunze bua makunji awu
Eu udi mukenji wa muena nsudi udi kayi mua kusangisha bintu bia mushinga mukole bia kudilengesha n abi
Bualu bua Yobo wakamba ne, Bumue bana banyi ba balume bakuenza malu mabi, bakuhenda Nzambi mu mitshima yabo
Bana ba balume ba Shimeona: Nemuele ne Yamina, Yaliba, Zela, Shaula; Shaluma muan andi, Mibesama muan andi, Mishema muan andi
Dituku dikuabo Kana wakalua ne bintu biakamena mu buloba bu mulambu kudi Yehowa
Wakenza mbote ya or makumi atanu, wakatuangasha bilulu ne mbote ai, nunku nsubu wa tshitendelelu wakadi bu nsubu umue

Mona, wewe newimite difu, neulele muana mulume, neumuidike ne, Yesu; yeye neikale munene, nebamuidike dina ne, Muana wa Udi Mutambe Bunene wa mu diulu; Mukelenge Nzambi neamuhe nkuasa wa butumbi wa tatu wandi Davidi; neikale mukelenge wa nsubu wa Yakoba tshiendelele; bukelenge buandi kabuena ne tshishikidilu
Bualu bua nenusabuke Yadene bua kubuelamu ne bua kuhiana buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha; nenubuhiane, nenushikamemu
Muntu yonsu wa kunudi anange muanabu, bu mudiye mudinange
Yeye wakamba ne, Petelo, ndi nkuambila ne, Tshitala katshî tshianze kusama lelu wewe neuvile misangu isatu ne, Tshiena mumumanye
Nganyi wa munkatshi mua nzambi yonso ya bisamba wakasungila buloba buabo mu tshianza tshianyi, bua Yehowa amanye mua kusungila Yelushalema mu tshianza tshianyi
Kadi muntu udi ne muan abo lukuna, yeye utshidi mu midima, udi wenda mu midima, kena mumanye kudiye uya, bualu bua midima yakufofomesha mesu andi
Eliya wakambila Elisha ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ushikame kunoko, bualu bua Yehowa wakuntuma ku Yeleko
Mai akadi ajuka mavuala bualu bua tshihehele tshikole tshiakadi tshiheha
Panyima pa muaba wa tshijila, pikala nanku mabaya muanda mukulu menza ne bitaku dikumi ne bisambombu bia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Monai, diulu ne diulu ditamba mulu kaena makukumbane, ka nsubu eu unakukuashila neikale muhite bukese
Wakabakudimuna ne, Yeye udi muprofete
Milayi yakalayidibua Abalahama ne kankanunuina kandi; kayakalayidibua tunkanunuma tua bungi, kadi anu muntu umue, kankanunuina kebe, Kilisto mene
Betasheba wakamuambila ne, Kakuena bualu, ne nku akuhe kudi mukelenge
Hashishe Manoa wakamanya ne, Yeye wakadi muanjelo wa Yehowa
Munkatshi muadi muakahatuka tshinfuanyi tshia bifukibue binai bidi ne muoyo
Tshidimu tshivua Agare mulela muana, Abrame uvua ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu ne bisambombu
Nebikale bamfumu benu, nuenu nubenzela mudimu

Samuele wakambila bantu ne, Kanutshinyi: bulelela, nuakuenza bualu ebu bubi, kadi kanulekedi kulonda Yehowa, kadi nukuatshile Yehowa mudimu ne mitshima yenu yonso; kanusesuki mu nshila mukuabo: binuenza nunku nenulonde bintu bia tshianana bidi kabiyi bimanye mua kunukuatshisha ne kunusungila, bualu bua bidi bia hatuhu
Wakajuka, wakadia, wakanua, wakaya mu bukole bua bidia abi tô minya ne matuku makumi anai tô ne ku Holeba, mukuna wa Nzambi
Hashishe mukelenge Davidi wakabuela mu nsubu, wakashikama ku mpala kua Yehowa, wakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, meme ndi nganyi, ne tshiota tshianyi tshidi tshinyi bua wewe wakalua n anyi anu kunoko
Katuena mua kufua ne nzala, wewe muikaleku to

Mu matuku a Atashasete, Bishilama ne Miteledata ne Tabêla ne ba ku mulongo wabo bakafundila Atashasete, mukelenge wa Pelasa, mukanda; mukanda eu wakadi mufundibue mu maleta a Bena Sulia, mufundibue mu muaku wa Bena Sulia

Matuku dikumi ne muanda mutekete a ngondu muibidi, Nowa mumane kukumbaja bidimu nkama isambombu, mayi onsu avua muinshi mua buloba kupatukawu ne bukole miaba mishilangane, bibi bionsu bia mulu ku nzulukabi
Miehu mikese yakamina miehu yakadi miakane
Mukelenge wakakonka ne, Udi mu tshiendedi nganyi
Monai, yeye udi muimane ku nyima kua tshimanu tshietu, udi utangidila ha madidishi a nsubu, udi ukenzakana ha masoso a madidishi
Bualu bua dituku dia Yehowa didi ha buihi; Nunku bianza bia bantu bonso nebitekete, ne bobo nebakuatshike buowa
Or ne ntalatala kabiena n au muomumue, Katuena mua kutela mena a mabue a corail ne a cristal diatshimue n au
Solomo wakitaba ku makonka andi onso; yeye kakamusokoka bualu bumue
Pa wabu bamufite kua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu apu, Yozefe uvua ne bidimu makumi asatu
Nenkumbaje malu onsu andi mukulaye
Mutangidi wa bantu bavua balongolola maluvu a mukalenga, kuawila Yozefe tshilota tshiende, umuambila ne: Ndi mulote: mmone mutshi wa maluvu a mvinyo kumpala kuanyi, muikale ne matamba asatu
Bena Yuda bakashiha bena lukuna babo bonso ne miele ya nvita, bakabashiha ne bakababutula ne bakenzela bakadi n abo lukinu bu muakasuabo
Bantu bonso bakunguila Yelemiya tshisumbu mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Yakobe kulala muaba awu

Bobo bakambilangana ne, Buakuambileye nunku mbua tuetu katuakangata mitanda ya bidia, Hakamanya Yesu bualu ebu, wakabakonka ne, Nudi nuambidilangana ne, Mbua tuetu katuakangata mitanda ya bidia, tshinyi
Biuvuwabo tshilulu nansha milongo ya buludi nansha milongo ya butshiama anyi tshintu tshia tshiseba, ne biajimina disama, nebatshiuvuwe musangu muibidi ne tshintu etshi netshikale tshiakane
Bualu bua mashi adi bu muoyo wa tshintu nakanuha mashi ha tshioshelu bualu bua kunubuikidila n au bubi buenu mashi adi anubuikidila bubi bualu bua muoyo wau
Tshiyole tshia nzala atshi kutampakana mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu
Hakamukonkeye dî edi, wakaluhuka, wakaya kudi Bena Yuda, wakabambila ne, Tshiena mumusangane ne bualu
Muntu awu mumane kukungula nsuki, mutuangaji neamupeshe diboku dia mukoku wa tshimpanga dimane kulamba, kabidi ne mukata mulamba kabayi bela buanga wa mu tshisaka, kabidi ne kampa
Bena Isalele bakambila Yehowa ne, Tuakenza bibi, utuenzele bu mûdi musue, kadi anji kutusungila lelu, tudi tukusengelela
Bantu bakadi benda mu makalu ne ha nyima ha tubalu bakaya n andi, tshisumbu tshinene be

Hashishe hanuakunvua dî diakadi munkatshi mua midima, hakadi mukuna mutema kahia, nuenu nuakalua kundi, ne ba ku mutu kua bisamba bienu ne bakulu benu; nuakamba ne, Tangila, Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafuisha butumbi buandi ne bunene buandi, tuakulua dî diandi munkatshi mua kahia: tuakatangila lelu ne Nzambi udi usomba ne muntu, ne yeye udi wikala ne muoyo
Yeye wakayidika ne Buloba bua Kabula tô ne ku dituku edi
Matuku asatu awu, bena Ejipitu kabavua ne mushindu wa kuendakana, bualu kabavua mua kumona bantu nabu to
Ubiteke milongo ibidi, mulongo isambombo mulongo isambombo, ha mesa adi ku mpala kua Yehowa
Yeye neibakile dina dianyi nsubu, nenjadike nkuasa wa bukelenge buandi tshiendelele
Kanuikadi ne meji mabi a ne: tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete tshia kulekelangana mabanza tshidi pabuipi
Kanukengeshi muenyi, bualu nudi bamanye dikenga diende, bu munuvua penu benyi mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Bintu ebi mmajitu a bana balume ba Kohata mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Bena Merari ke bavua ne mudimu wa kulama bintu bivuabu benza nabi nzubu wa tshijila: mabaya, makunji ne bitaku biawu, ne bintu bikuabu bionsu

Bualu bua Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Tangilai, nentumine Bena Tulo Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, mukelenge wa bakelenge, mufume biandi ku luseke lua nôde, muikale ne tubalu ne makalu a nvita ne babandi ba ha nyima ha tubalu ne tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu bakuabo
Badi bantu banyi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nendekeshe kabidi mundi wa mu Moaba udi ubanda ku tshioshelu tshidi ha mutu ha mukuna, udi ufilahu mulambu wa musenga wa manananshi kudi nzambi yandi
Awu kubambila ne: Nuye kutendelela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bakabanda ku tshibandilu tshiakadi ne bidiatshilu dikumi

Uziya mukelenge wakadi muena nsudi tô ne ku dituku dia lufu luandi; wakashikama mu nsubu ha nkayandi, bualu bua yeye wakadi muena nsudi; bualu bua yeye wakadi mukandibue ne, Kubuedi mu nsubu wa Yehowa; Yotama muan andi wakadi ha mutu ha ba mu nsubu wa mukelenge, wakakokesha bena buloba
Tshitaku tshionsu tshivua ne kilo
Nundekelele bubi buanyi anu musangu eu, nundombele Yehowa Nzambi wenu, yeye angumushile bualu ebu bua lufu
Hakunvuabo mei â, yeye wakatenteka dî dikuabo, wakela lusumuinu, bualu bua yeye wakadi hehi ne Yelushalema, ne bualu bua bobo bakadi belangana meshi ne, Bukelenge bua Nzambi bukadi ha kulua katataka
Hashishe Natana wakambila Betasheba, mamu wa Solomo, ne, Kuakunvua lumu ne, Adoniya, muana wa Hagita, udi ukokesha, ne mukelenge wetu Davidi kena mumanye bualu ebu, anyi
Nuenu mikuna ya mu Isalele, unvuai dî dia Yehowa
Bûngi bwa batshipwita ba mu polovensa bateeka amu nanku mu diumvwangana kabweena mwa kupita pa tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia bûngi bwa beena Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa
Sala wakadia ne, Tshiakaseka, bualu bua yeye wakadi utshina
Bakabakuata ne muoyo, bakabashiha ku dina dia mai dia mu nsubu wa bakoshi ba miosa, bu bantu makumi anai ne babidi

Bena Netinima: bana ba Siha ne bana ba Hasufa ne ba Tabaota, bana ba Kelosa, bana ba Siaha, bana ba Padona, bana ba Lebana, bana ba Hagaba, bana ba Akuba, bana ba Hagaba, bana ba Shamelai, bana ba Hanana, bana ba Gidela, bana ba Gahâ, bana ba Leaya, bana ba Lesini, bana ba Nekoda, bana ba Gasama, bana ba Uza, bana ba Pasea, bana ba Besai, bana ba Asena, bana ba Meunima, bana ba Nefisima, bana ba Bakâhuka, bana ba Hakufa, bana ba Hâhû, bana ba Baseluta, bana ba Mehida, bana ba Hâsha, bana ba Bâkosa, bana ba Sisela, bana ba Tema, bana ba Nesiya ne bana ba Hatifa
Hakatshia butuku Yakoba wakamona ne Lea wakambila Labana ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi munyi
Neavule bilulu ebi, nealuate bilulu bikuabo, neatuale butue ku butshika bua tshitudilu ku muaba mutoke

Kadi nuvuluke matuku a diambedi munkatshi muau munuakatantamana mu diluangana dikole dia mu makenga, hanuakamana kutokeshibua mu munya; tshituha tshia makenga mbualu bua nuakavuishibua bu tshintu tshia kutangilatangilabo bua bihendu ne makenga; ne tshituha tshikuabo bualu bua nuakalua babanyanganyi ne bantu bakadi benjibua nunku
Uvua wamba ne: Tshiena musue kumona mudi muananyi ufua to
Nubilekele, bishale bua kuambuluisha bapela ne benyi
Hakatshinabo, hakatuabo mpala hanshi, balume bakabakonka ne, Nudi nukebela udi ne muoyo munkatshi mua bafue tshinyi
Ne nsengu dikumi iwakutangila idi bakelenge dikumi badi kabai banze kuangata bukelenge, kadi badi bangata bukokeshi bu bakelenge, hohamue ne nyama wa luonji, luhola lumue
Tshidime udi wenza mudimu mukole wa mu budimi ngudi ne bua kudia bia mu budimi ku mpala kua bakuabo

Kadi yeye neitabushe muan a bute wandi wa mukashi udiye ukina, neamuhe bituha bibidi bia bintu bionso bidiye n abi; bualu bua yeye udi wa tshibangidilu tshia bukole buandi; bintu bia buan a bute mbiandi
Muntu eu wakaya ku buloba bua Bena Hiti, wakasaku musoko, wakawidika ne Luza; edi ndina diau tô ne lelu
Mikenji ya Kunvuangana Biateya mulume mukashi utshidi kamama, udi kayi muanze kutangila kudi mulume, ne bialaleye n andi, yeye neafile biuma bia dibaka bulelela bua yeye kuikaleye mukashi wandi
Diakamue bena Izrayele kumufunda kudi Moshe
Monai, nempe ba mu musoko eu kusangala ne bukole bia mubidi, nenshikishe disama diabo; nembaleshe ditalala ne bushuwa bikumbana
Bana ba balume ba Ashe, Yimena ne Yishewa ne Yishewi ne Belia ne muan abo wa bakashi, Sela, ne bana ba balume ba Belia, Hebê ne Malekiele
bakuabo lukama lukama
Hatuakabuela mu buatu bua ku Adulamutiona buakadi buamba kuya ku miaba yakadi kukala kua mai a luseke lua Asia, tuakaya; Alistâko, Muena Makedonia wa ku Tesalonike wakadi n etu
Muana wakadiunda, ne Yehowa wakamusankisha
Usaye mukoku wa tshimpanga awu, usukule bia munda ne mikonu
Bisosa bia mu mpata bidiku lelu, makelela nebibueshibue mu matshua; nuenu bena ditabusha dikese, bialuatshisha Nzambi bisosa nunku, yeye kena utamba kunuluatshisha bienu, anyi
Bia momumwe, tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa katshieena mwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa to
Kayey eu unakuamba ne, Ku nyima kuanyi kulualua muntu udi muntambe, bualu bua yeye wakadiku ku mpala kuanyi
Tuakabuela mu buatu, kadi bobo bakahingana kuabo
Munyi mûdi mumanye mua kuambila muan enu ne, Muan etu, nkûmushe kasosa kadi mu disu diebe, kui utangile mutshi munene udi mu diebe disu
Munga nzambi Nzambi ya Hamata ne ya Âpada, idi kudi kunyi
Hakadiye wamba malu â, mukashi wa mu tshisumbu tshia bantu wakela dî diandi, wakamba ne, Difu diakukutuala didi ne disanka ne mabele awakuamua
Muleleshi wakamba ne, Mona tshihatukidi tshiwakuhatuka
Job Hashishe, Yobo wakabulula mukana muandi, wakela dituku dia kuledibua kuandi mulau
Yehowa neanutumine milau ne makenga ne mahumbisha mu malu anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu, tô ne hanuajimishibua ne hanûmushibua lubilu ha buloba; bualu bua bubi bua bienzedi bienu, bua nuakundekela
Kadi kanusanki bua nyuma mibi idi itumikila dî dienu, kadi nusanke bua mena enu adi mafunda mu diulu

Exodus Mose ne Bena Isalele balambila Yehowa musambu eu, bakamba ne, Yehowa udi bukole buanyi ne musambu wanyi, Yehowa udi muena nvita, Wakela makalu a Palô ne bisumbu biandi bionso mu mai manene, Mai adi ha mutu habo, Yehowa, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi ne butumbi ne bukole, Mu bunene bua buakane buebe, wewe utu wahita bantu bukole badi badilesha ku mesu kuebe, Muhuya webe wakabandisha mai, akimana bu tshimama, Muena lukuna wakamba ne, Nembalonde, nembahete, Wewe wakatuma luhehele luebe, ne mai manene akababuikila, Nganyi udi bu wewe Yehowa, munkatshi mua nzambi mikuabo
Yeye wakabakonka tshiakabidi ne, Nudi nukeba nganyi
Hakalueye mu nsubu, bafofo bakatua kudiye, Yesu wakabambila ne, Nudi nuitabusha ne, Meme udi mumanye mua kuenza bualu ebu, anyi

Kabafuidi mukashi wa mu lufuila mu mulongo wa ba mu lufuila bikaleye kai muanze kufika ku bidimu makumi asambombo, yeye mumane kuikala mukashi wa anu muntu umue; udi ne lumu luimpe lua bienzedi biandi bimpe, bikaleye mudiundishe bana bandi, bikaleye musangele benyi, bikaleye mume makasa a basanto, bikaleye mukuatshishe bena makenga, bikaleye munanukile kulonda midimu mimpe yonso
Kadi kanuenji Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku
Yeye wakafila milambu kudi Egelona, mukelenge wa Moaba: Egelona wakadi ne mafuta a bungi
Kanuenji bu munudi nuenza kunoko lelu, benza muntu yonso anu malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuandi; bualu bua kanuena banze kubuela mu dikisha ne buhianyi bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Mu dituku disambombo nebalongolole bidibo bangate, bikale tshituha ha mutu ha tshituha tshidibo basangisha ku dituku ku dituku
Kanuikadi ne Muena Edome lukuna, bualu bua yeye udi muan enu; kanuikadi ne Muena Ejipitu lukuna, bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba buandi
Kanungu ka Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi mwa kukwata mudimu menemena anu padi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beenabi bikalaku

Yehowa neafute muntu yonso bu mudi buimpe buandi ne lulamatu luandi lua ku bushuwa; bualu bua Yehowa wakakufila mu tshianza tshianyi lelu ne meme tshiakitabusha bua kulenga muntu wakela Yehowa manyi ha mutu tshianza
Moshe kubanda ku mukuna
Bubidi buabo, muana kai wakenza bu muakamba tatu wandi
Bualu ebu budi bu muwakumona, dibue diakulamuka ku mukuna, tshianza tshia muntu katshiyi tshi dilenga, diakutshibula tshiamu tshifike, tshiamu tshia mitaku, dima, argent ne or
Ne wakadi mushikamehu, mumueneke ku mesu bu dibue dia yasape ne dia sardoine, ne muanzankongolo wakadiku, munyunguluke nkuasa wa butumbi, mumueneke ku mesu bu émeraude

Ezela wakavungulula mukanda ku mesu kua bantu, bualu bua yeye wakadi ku muaba wakadi kulu kua bonso; hakavungululeye mukanda, bantu bonso bakimana kulu; Ezela wakavudishila Yehowa Nzambi munene disanka
Udi mudisangishe ne bamfumu ba bisamba, bua kukumbaja bidi Maweja Nangila musue, bua kukuatshila bena Izrayele bakuabu mudimu mu dina diende
Kadi tudi mua kuiba tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, nansha mpawungi bidi mu nzubu mua mukalenga webe bua tshinyi
Kanungu ka Mêyi malongolodi adi aleeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa midimu ya mbulamatadi ya bukalenga bunene, ya polovensa ne ya bitupa bia teletwale bidiludika
Yehowa wakulua dî dia Bena Isalele, wakafua Bena Kanâna mu bianza biabo, bakabashiha ne misoko yabo yonso, ne dina dia muaba au diakadi Hôma
Moshe kulomba Maweja Nangila, wamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu wanyi, anyisha ondapa disama edi
Wakafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ne milambu ya bukula; wakahongolola milambu ya bintu bia kunuabo, wakamiamina mashi a milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala ha tshioshelu
Nanku tshiena mua kuanyisha milambu yenu ya mushindu ewu to
Kanungu ka Mbênza tshisangilu tshia ba Nguvenêla ba polovensa
Nakalua n enu mu buloba bua Bena Amole bakadi bashikama dishiya dia Yadene; bobo bakaluangana n enu, nakabafila mu bianza bienu, nuakanyenga buloba buabo; nakababutula ku mpala kuenu

Bualu bua bobo ne bana babo balume bakadiangatshila bana bakashi ba bantu aba bu bakashi babo; nunku bantu ba tshijila bakabuelakana ne bena maloba â; bulelela, bantu banene ne bakokeshi bakadianjila kuenza bubi ebu
Nunku Manashe wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika mu nsubu muandi; Amona muan andi wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Wakela di diandi kudi muhika wandi wa ku mpala ne, Hawasambakena ne Esau, mukulu anyi, ne hakukonkeye ne, Wewe udi wa nganyi
Hamana wakambila mukashi wandi Zeleshe ne balunda bandi bualu buonso buakamukuata
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne muku wandi udi ne mulau
Yelamele wakadi ne mukashi mukuabo, dina diandi Atala; yeye wakadi mamu wa Onama
Kadi yeye wakamanya meshi abo, wakabambila ne, Bukelenge buonso budi buhanduluke nebufue, nsubu kabidi udi muhanduluke neuhukile ha munga

John Meme mukulu, udi mufundile mukashi musungula kudi Nzambi ne bana bandi bandi nanga mu bushua; ne kememe nkayanyi udi munanga, kadi mbonso kabidi badi bamanye bualu bulelela; bua bualu bua bushua budi buikale munda muetu, nebuikale n etu tshiendelele
Nakunubatiza mu mai, kadi yeye neanubatize mu Nyuma Muimpe
Davidi wakambila Solomo muan andi ne
Yesu wakamukonka ne, Dina diebe nganyi
Bapete kabidi pabuipi nabi mpata ya kudishila bimuna biabu, ne nyama mikuabu idibu mua kupeta
Nungandamune
Mulami wakalombesha minda, wakabuela mu nsubu uzakala ne buowa, wakahona ku mpala kua Paulo ne Sila, wakabaluhula, wakamba ne, Bakelenge, bundi n abu mbua kuenza tshinyi bua kusungidibua
Bakamukonka ne, Netuenze tshinyi bua tuetu kuenza midimu ya Nzambi
Yehowa wakabambila ne, Monai, yeye wakadisokoka munkatshi mua bintu

Mikenji yebe idi invuisha muhitshi wa bena lukuna banyi meji; Ndi ntamba bayishi banyi bonso kujingulula malu, Ndi mpita bantu banunu kujingulula malu, Ndi nkanda makasa anyi bua kaendedi mu nshila yonso mubi, Tshiakuehuka ku mei ebe majalame, Mona mudi mei ebe mashemakane handi ngalabula, Ndi mpeta lungenyi ku mei audi ungambila, Dî diebe didi muinda ku makasa anyi Nakuditshiha, nengenze munakuditshiha ne, Ndi mukengeshibue bikole; Yehowa, witabushe mei adi mukana muanyi mufile kûdi bu milambu ya luse; Muoyo wanyi udi mu muaba wa njiu matuku onso, Bantu babi bakunteya buteyi, Nakuangata mikenji yebe bu bubianyi tshiendelele, Nakuinyika mutshima wanyi bua kuenzau mikenji yebe mifunda Ndi nkina bena mitshima ibidi; Wewe udi tshisokomenu tshianyi ne ngabu wanyi; Nuenu benji ha malu mabi, umukai kundi, Unjadike bu mudi mulayi webe, bua ngikale bianyi ne muoyo; Ungimanyike kulu, bua mpanduke bianyi, Wewe udi ulengulula bonso badi behuka ku mikenji iwakubafundila; Wewe udi umana bantu babi bonso ba ha buloba bu mudi mualu umusha tshikanganya; Mubidi wanyi udi uzakala bua dikutshina dianyi; Nakuenza bienzedi bualame ne biakane, Wikale tshieya kudi umena mudimu webe bua kumuenzela bimpe; Mesu anyi adi ateketa ne ditekemena diau dia luhandu luebe, Wenzela muena mudimu webe bu mudi luse luebe lujalame; Ndi muena mudimu webe; umpeshe lungenyi, Tshikondo tshiakufika bua Yehowa kuenza mudimu Bua malu â ndi ntamba kunanga mikenji yebe ku mpala kua tshiamu tshia or; Bua malu a ndi Mikenji yebe idi ilesha bu mûdi idi ya dikema, Kubulula kua mei ebe kudi kutemeshila bantu munya, Nakubuela mukana muanyi bu tshibalubalu, nakuhuyakana, Ukudimune mpala webe kundi, undeshe dinanga, Ujadike biendedi bianyi mu dî diebe, Umpikule ku dikengesha dia bantu, Utemeshile muena mudimu webe mpala webe, Mesu anyi adi ahatula binsonshi bu misulu ya mai; Yehowa, wewe udi muakane, Wewe wakujadika mikenji yebe mu buakane buebe Lukunukunu luanyi luakunshiha, Dî diebe didi dilengeshibue tshishiki, Ndi muntu wa hatuhu, ndi muhetudibue, Buakane buebe budi buakane bua kashidi, Dikenga ne kanyinganyinga biakunkuata, Mikenji yebe idi ilesha bu mûdi idi miakane tô ne kashidi, Ndi nkubikila ne mutshima wanyi mujima; witabe kundi, Yehowa
Yeye neambule dianza dia bukula bubotesha tente budi busangisha ne manyi ne musenga wa manananshi, neabuoshe ha tshioshelu bu tshintu tshidi tshima dihembu, bu tshivulukidi kudi Yehowa
Nenuenzeleku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshioshelu ne mabue, kanuoshi tshiamu ha mutu hau
Biuvuwabo tshilulu nansha milongo ya buludi nansha milongo ya butshiama anyi tshintu tshia tshiseba, ne biajimina disama, nebatshiuvuwe musangu muibidi ne tshintu etshi netshikale tshiakane

Hakadiye wakulangana abo bualu bua buakane, ne bua didikanda, ne bua tshilumbuluidi tshilualua, Felika wakatshina bikole, wakamba ne, Ya biebe katataka; hanaheta tshikondo tshiakane, nenkubikile kundi
Pilato wakasua kuenzela tshisumbu tshia bantu biakane, wakabalekelela Balaba; hakakumeye Yesu, wakamufila bua kumushihabo ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Abalama wakadi muikale ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu ne bisambombo, hakamulelela Haga Yishemaele
Padi muena tshibawu awu musue kulambula Maweja Nangila mukoku, asungule amu mukoku mukaji udi kauyi ne bulema, bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Nunku Yehowa akufute bimpe bua bualu buwakungenzela lelu

Numutumbishe, nuenu banjelo bandi bonso; Numutumbishe, nuenu diba ne ngondo; Umutumbisha, wewe diulu dia ha mutu ha diulu; Bionso bitumbishe dina dia Yehowa; Wakabidika kabidi bua kuikalabi tô ne kashidi
Bobo bakabanga kumutendekena ne, Umuka mu luseke luetu
Nentume kahia ham bidi ha ba mu Magoga ne ham bidi ha badi bashikame kabayi ne ntatu mu miaba ya ku muelelu wa mai manene; nunku bobo nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Bualu nudi mua kupetula dina dianyi meme, Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Tshiena ngakula bua dikengela dia bintu; bualu bua nakuyila mua kuikala ne mutshima muhole mu malu onso andi n au
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Bûdi wamba mbulelela
Bobo nebabalonde ku nyima, tshisumbu tshisatu
Bua meme kuamba ne, Ndi ne ditekemena bua kuikala ne mulume butuku ebu bua kundelesheye bana ba balume kabidi, nuenu nenuitabushe bua kubindila to ne hakoldbo, anyi
Ne bikala muntu kai ne Nyuma wa Kilisto, kena wa Kilisto nasha
Bana ba Elama tshinunu tshimue ne nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu ne banai
Bantu bebe badi badifila kûdi ne disanka Yehowa Mukelenge udi ku tshianza tshiebe tshia balume, Nealumbuluishe ba mu bisamba bia bantu, Neanue mai ku kasulu kadi mu nshila, Misambu Tumbishai Yehowa
Hashishe mukelenge wa Isalele wakabikila kahita, wakamuambila ne, Ya lubilu, ubikile Mikaya, muana wa Yimela
Bantu banene ne bantu bonso bakasanka, bakatua n ai, bakayela mu mushete tô ne hakasangishabo yonso
Hakabuela Elisha mu nsubu, wakasangana muana mufue muladika ha bulalu buandi
Kadi luhetu luau ne ditutu diau bua bundumba nebijidibue kudi Yehowa; kabiena bibutshidibua ne kabiena bitekedibua
Bu mudi nyunyu wa mukanku unyungisha disua diandi, udi uhahala ha mutu ha bana bandi; nunku yeye wakolola mahuahua andi, wakabangata, wakabatuala ha mahuahua andi
Kushiminyinyi mukuenu bualu

Ebu mbualu bunakumubikidila ku mpala kuenu, ne kudi wewe mene, mukelenge Agipa, hakonkibueye tshilumbu tshiandi, nemmanye dî dia kufunda, bualu bua ndi mona ne, Kendungenyi luakane bua kutuma muena lukanu, tshi muambe tshiakamubandabo
Bungi bua bidimu biakakokesha Davidi Bena Yuda mu Hebelone buakadi bidimu muanda mutekete ne ngondo isambombo
Difutu dia muena mudimu webe dikale anu pa diba diadi, kuyi ulala nadi dituku nansha dimue
Kadi, tshiena mbingisha muntu udi mupile
Kadi nyunyi ya mulu kulua kuzokola mikata ayi mu tshisaka pavuatshi pa mutu wanyi
Wakamukudimuna ne, Mukelenge, yeye udi nganyi, nmuitabushe
Hakafikabo ku mukuna, yeye wakabiangata mu bianza biabo, wakabiteka mu nsubu, wakahingisha bantu aba, bakaya
Danyele Mukelenge Nebukadenesâ udi utuma dî kudi bantu bonso, ba bisamba bionso ne ba miaku yonso badi bashikame ha buloba buonso ne, Ditalala dikumbane kunudi
Bana balume ba baprofete ba mu Yeleko bakaluhuka kudi Elisha, bakamuebesha ne
Bikala mubidi webe wonso utoka ne munya, kawi ne luseke lukuabo lufike, wonso neutoke ne munya, bu mudi muinda ukutemena ne dinkenka diau
Wakangambila ne, Muana wa muntu, diaku mukanda eu undi nkuha, ûhatshishe munda muebe tente
Hashishe mukashi wakaha kudi bantu bonso ne lungenyi luandi
Yesu wakadi wamba bua lufu luandi; kadi bobo bakadi bela meshi ne, Budiye wamba anu bua tulu

Nunanukile mu ditendelela dienu nutabalamu ne disakidila; nutulombele kabidi mu tshikondo tshiotshimue bua Nzambi atunzuluile tshibi tshia dî bua tuetu kuamba bualu busokoka bua Kilisto, buakunsuikilabo mu nkanu kabidi, bua meme kubumanyisha bantu, bu mundi n abu mbua kubambila

Nubambile ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu mundi ne muoyo, bu munuakuamba mu matshu anyi, nennuenzele nunku: mibidi yenu neyihone hanshi mifue mu tshihela etshi, buonso buenu baka balabo ba bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bakadi bantontolola, bulelela, nuenu kanuena nulua mu buloba bunakanulaya bua nuenu nushikamemu, anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna
Bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa bakashala mu tshituha ne bu muakadi dî ba Yehowa bakaya ku luendu, bakatumikila dî dia Yehowa, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Mu tshikondo atshi Abimeleke ne Pikola, kamanda ka masalayi andi, bakambila Abalahama ne, Nzambi udi n ebe mu malu onso audi wenza

Yehowa Nzambi wetu kakukutuma bua kutuambila ne, Kanuyi ku Ejipitu bua kushikamaku; kadi Baluka, muana wa Neliya, udi ukukabila kutudi, bua kutufila mu bianza bia Bena Kasada, bua batushihe ne bua baye n etu mu buhika ku Babulona
Kadi nuenu nudi nuamba ne, Nshila wa Mukelenge kena mululame
Nanku bena Kekate kabamonyi tshintu tshia tshijila nansha katupa ka diba to

Haditshiha mukashi kudi Yehowa, anyi halayeye mulayi wandi, hatshidiye mu nsubu wa tatu andi, ku bunsongakashi buandi, biunvua tatu wandi kuditshiha kuandi, biahuwa tatu wandi kudiye, nunku kuditshiha kuandi kuonso ne mei andi onso nebijalame
Mu bikena kumona bia ku mutu wanyi binakadi n abi mu bulalu buanyi nakatangila, ekumona, mutangidi, muntu wa tshijila, uhueka hanshi, mufume mu diulu

Bialama muena bukole luhangu luandi, muikale ne bintu bionso bia nvita, biuma biandi nebikale talalâ; kadi biamutukidila mukuabo udi mumutambe bukole, neamutshimune, neamunyenge bintu biandi bionso bia nvita biakueyemeneye, neabanyine bakuabo bintu biakunyengeye
Bobo nebalame bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne bintu bia Bena Isalele, bua kuenzelabo mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Wakamutuma ku tshibanda tshia Hebelone, ne yeye wakalua ku Shekeme Mulumiana wakamusangana ne, mona, wakadi wendakana mu tshisuku, wakamuebesha ne, Udi ukeba tshinyi

Pangipata bisamba bikuabu bionsu binudi nabi pabuipi, nendiundishe mikalu ya ditunga dienu, bua panudi numuka bua kumonanganna nanyi misangu eyi isatu, bantu bakuabu kabena mua kuikala ne lukuka lua ditunga dienu to
Biahona tshituha tshia mibidi mufue ya bintu ebi ha tshintu, tshintu atshi netshikale ne bukoya, nansha nfulu nansha bivuadi, nebanshihe, bidi ne bukoya, nebikale bibi kunudi

Nunku mukelenge Lehabama wakadikolesha mu Yelushalema, wakakokesha bantu; Lehabama wakadi ne bidimu makumi anai ne tshimue hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha bidimu dikumi ne muanda mutekete mu Yelushalema, musoko wakasungula Yehowa munkatshi mua bisamba bia Bena Isalele bionso bua kutekamu dina diandi; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Nâma, Muena Amona
Muntu yonso wabenga kutua mpala hanshi ne kulutendelela, mu diba adi mene nebamuele mu tshikutu tshia kahia kakole
Shaula wakabandisha dî diandi, wakadila

Bakenza biluwa bia ku mbelu kua ntempelo ku mitshi ya olive; bunene buabi buakadi bu tshituha tshinai tshia tshimanu tshia nsubu; bakenza bibi bibidi bia mitshi ya cyprès; bakenza tshibi tshimue ne mabaya abidi ne tshikuabo ne mabaya abidi
Yone wakadi muluate tshilulu tshia mioso ya kamelu, wakadi ne mukaba wa tshiseba mu tshimono tshiandi, wakadi udia mikumbi ne buitshi
Dutelonone Nebikale ne bualu bua Kufunda Mikenji ku Mukuna wa Ebala Mose ne bakulu ba mu Isalele bakambila bantu ne, Nutumikile mikenji yonso indi nnuambila lelu
Rakele kuimita difu, kulela muana wa balume

Yeye wakadi ne nyota mikole, wakabikila Yehowa, wakamba ne, Wewe wakafila luhandu elu lunene ku tshianza tshia muena mudimu webe, ne katataka nenfue bua nyota, nempone mu bianza bia bantu badi kabayi batengula
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Butumbi bua nsubu eu bua matuku alualua nebuhite butumbi buandi bua diambedi bunene; mu muaba eu nempeshe bantu ditalala
Nenvuishe buloba bikulu ne tshihela tshia tshianana; bukole buabu buakadi bubuheshisha dihetu nebujimine, ne mikuna ya mu Isalele neyishale hatuhu, kakuyi muntu wahitshila ha mitu hai
Kadi mukashi mukuabo wakabenga ne, Nansha, muana udi ne muoyo mmuana wanyi, ne muana eu udi mufue mmuana webe
Hanakadi ngamba mei â, Pelataya, muana wa Benaya, wakafua
Mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina, Gibeona ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Geba ne miaba ya ku matshika, Anatota ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Alamona ne miaba ya ku matshika: bimenga binai
Yeye wakateka bakuidi mu miaba yabo, wakakolesha mitshima yabo mu mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Nukoleshe mitshima yenu, nulue ne mamuma a mu buloba abu Hakayabo nunku, mamuma a nvinyo akabanga kulua
Nunku Gada wakafika kudi Davidi, wakamuambila malu au, wakamukonka ne, Udi musue batume bidimu bia tshiole muanda mutekete mu buloba buebe
Yeye kena ne bualu bua kudiangatshila bakashi ba bungi bua kukudimuneye mutshima wandi; yeye kena ne bualu bua kudikumbashila biamu bia argent ne bia or
Bulelela, bulelela, udi nuambila ne, Mose kakanuha bidia bia mu diulu, Tatu wanyi udi unuha bidia bilelela bia mu diulu
Ndi nvuluka ditabusha didi munda muebe didi kadi ne lubombo, diakadianjila kuikala munda mua kaku webe Loi ne mua mamu webe Eunike; ndi ngitabushishibua ne didi munda muebe kabidi
Kadi bikata tuetu anyi muanjelo wa mu diulu tunuambila lumu lukuabo ludi kalui lumu luimpe lutuakanuambila, ikale biandi ne mulau
Maweja Nangila neabafuile luse
Nuenu bamane kushala matuku a bungi mu ditunga edi, didi Maweja Nangila munulaye, nuenu bamane kulela bana, bapete ne bikulu, kanuenji bibi to
Hakatangila bantu bakadi bamumanye diambedi ne, Monai, yeye udi wamba dî dia Nzambi ne baprofete, bakakonkangana ne, Bualu ebu buakulua kudi muana wa Kishi budi tshinyi
Danyele Meme hanyi, mu tshidimu tshia kumudilu tshia bukokeshi bua Dayawesha, Muena Madai, nakimana bua kumukuatshisha ne kumukolesha
Bena Isalele bakadiku bakadia bidia bia kuhita kua Yehowa ku tshikondo atshi ne bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene tô matuku muanda mutekete
Diyoyo diakadi mu musoko mujima, bantu bakunguila, bakakuata Paulo, bakabanga kumumusha ku bukole mu ntempelo, bibi biakinshidibua lukasa
Kadi muanjelo wa Yehowa kakamueneka kudi Manoa anyi kudi mukashi wandi kabidi
Kundombi bualu ebu kabidi to

Nakunuha mukelenge mu tshifik a munda tshianyi, Dihila dia Bena Efelayima didi disuikibue mu dibuki, Didinyenga didi dikuata mukashi udi wamba kulela nedibakuate mene, Nembahikule ku bukole bua Muaba wa Bafue, anyi

Nunku tuakuambilangana ne, Hatuambilabo anyi hambilabo milongo idi ilonda ku nyima mei â, netuambe ne, Monai tshifuanyikishi tshia tshioshelu tshia Yehowa tshiakenza batatu betu, kambualu bua kuoshelahu milambu ya kuosha, anyi nyama mishiha; kadi tshidi bu mumanyi wa bualu hankatshi hetu n enu
Kadi ebu mbualu bua kuledibua kuebe ne mu dituku diakakulelabo kabakakosa dila dia ku muofu webe, kabakakuowesha mai bua kutokesha mubidi webe, kabakakulaba luehu, kabakakujingila tshilulu
Bakasungula Alesandelo mu musumba wabo, Bena Yuda bakamutuma ku mpala
Udi ne matshu unvue biandi
Nakatekamu mushete wa Nzambi muakadi tshihungidi tshia Yehowa tshiakahungeye ne Bena Isalele

Yoshua Dî dia Kunshikidilu dia Yoshua Yoshua wakasangisha bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele ku Shekeme, wakabikila bakulu ba Bena Isalele ne bakadi ku mutu kua bisamba ne balumbuluishi babo ne tuhita tuabo; bakadisangisha ku mpala kua Nzambi
Baluka, muana wa Neliya, wakenza malu onso akamuambila Yelemiya muprofete, ubala mei a Yehowa akadi mu mukanda mu nsuhu wa Yehowa

Joshua Yoshua wakasangisha bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele ku Shekeme, wakabikila bakulu ba Bena Isalele ne bakadi ku mutu kua bisamba ne balumbuluishi babo ne tuhita tuabo; bakadisangisha ku mpala kua Nzambi

Bana betu, tshiena musue nuhange kumanya bualu ebu busokoka, bua nuenu kanuditekemenyi bu munudi bena meshi, ne, Bukole bua mutshima buakakuata Bena Isalele tshituha tshihi, tô ne hafika dikumbana dia bisamba bia bende mu lumu luimpe
Hakadi Bena Isalele bashikama mu Heshebona ne mu misoko yabo ne mu Aloê ne mu misoko yabo ne mu misoko yonso idi ku muelelu wa mai a Ânona bidimu nkama isatu, bualu kai kuakayangata musangu au
Hakasungula Paulo ne Bânaba ekelesia ne ekelesia bakulu, hakatendelelabo Nzambi ne dijila dia bia kudia, bakabashia mu bianza bia Mukelenge wakitabushabo
Bena Isalele bakamona mpala wa Mose ne musunyi wa ha mpala ha Mose wakakonka: Mose wakateka tshilulu tshikudika ha mpala handi kabidi tô ne hakayeye kusomba ne Yehowa
Mukashi mukuabo wakabuikila mushiku wa dina ne tshilulu, wakabadilahu blé wakatueye; bualu ebu kabuakamanyibua
Nusakidile Tatu, wakatuvuisha bantu badi mua kuikala babanyanganyi ba buhianyi bua basanto bua mu munya
Diba dipatuka, Yakobe kumuka ku dilobu dia Penuyele, wenda utebuka, bualu tshikundukundu tshivua tshikoyoboke
Tshidimu atshi tshiakadi tshidimu tshia kumudilu tshia bukokeshi bua Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona

Bakangambila ne, Bantu bakumuka mu buhika mu buloba bukuabo badi bashalaku badi mu dikenga dikole, badi bafuishibua bundu; lumbu lua Yelushalema kabidi tutshidi hanshi, ne bibi bialu bidi bioshibua ne kahia
Pashishe, mutuangaji amuteke pa nkayende matuku makuabu muanda mutekete
Kuakûmushibua
Mikenshi ya Mose ne baprofete biakadiku tô ne hakalua Yone; bakalueye tô ne mpindiu badi bambila bantu lumu luimpe lua bukelenge bua Nzambi, bantu bonso badi babuelamu ku bukole

Yeye wakambila Yalobama ne, Angata bihese dikumi, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Mona, nenyenge bukelenge mu bianza bia Solomo, nenkuhe wewe bisamba dikumi kadi yeye neikale ne tshisamba tshimue bualu bua Davidi, muntu wanyi, ne tshikuabo bua Yelushalema, musoko unakasungula munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele , bualu bua bobo bakundekela, bakutendelela Bashetoleta, nzambi mukashi wa Bena Sidona, ne Kemosha, nzambi wa Bena Moaba, ne Milekoma, nzambi wa Bena Amona; kabakuenda mu nshila yanyi, bua kuenzabo malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuanyi ne bua kutumikilabo mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi bu muakenza Davidi tatu wandi
Kanuena bamanye ne, Unudi midifila kudiye bu bahika bua kumutungila, nudi hahika ba unudi nutumikila; ne ba bubi tô ne ku lufu, ne ba ditumikila tô ne ku buakane

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu edi, mishindu ya Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa ya kumanyisha ne ya kulondolola Bukalenga bunene, kumpanyi ya Mbulamatadi, nzubu ne midimu ya Mbulamatadi idi: a lukonko lwa mukana anyi lwa pa dibeji kwikala anyi kakuyi dikokangana, kabayi balulondeshisha kudi dieela dia tukanda; b lukonko lwa pa mianda ya lelu; c dieebeja dia diumvwija; d dituma dia bantu bwa kutangilula; e diteelejibwa kudi tusumbu tukese
Petelo wakabika, wakaya n abo

Kanulu ne difutu dia mukashi wa masandi anji dia muntu udi bu mbua, mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kushikisha diditshiha dienu; bualu bua bubidi buabo badi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Nunku Hilama wakamana mudimu wonso wakenzeleye mukelenge Solomo mu nsubu wa Yehowa: makunshi au abidi, ne bibuiku biakadi ha mutu hau, ne bilongo biakalengesheye n abi bibuiku biakadi ha mutu ha makunshi; ne mamuma a grenades nkama inai, bu luakasongabo milongo ya grenades ibidi ku tshibuiku ne ku tshibuiku biakadi ha mutu ha makunshi; ne bitekelu ebi dikumi ne biowelu ebi dikumi biakadi ha bitekelu; ne tshiowelu atshi tshinene, ne bifuanyikishi bia ngombe dikumi ne ibidi biakadi muinshi muatshi: Bivuadi ne nkasu ne bihanza: bintu ebi bionso biakenzela Hilama mukelenge Solomo mu nsubu wa Yehowa biakadi bia tshiamu tshia mitaku
Wanuha luhanza lua mai a kunua, bualu bua nuenu nudi ba Kilisto, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Kena uhanga kuangata difutu diandi
Wewe neuye ku Babulona, neufuileku, nebakujikeku, wewe ne balunda bebe bonso bawakuambila mei a mashimi
Mena a bamfumu abu adi nunku: Shamuwa, muana wa Zakure, wa mu tshisamba tshia Rubene
Mukelenge ikale ne buonso buenu
Nunku bakidika muaba au ne, Bokima; bakashihelaku Yehowa nyama
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe bungi budi muntu kayi mua kuyibala
Ahaba wakakonka Eliya ne, Wewe, muena lukuna wanyi, wakusangana, anyi
Wewe newangate tshiadi tshia tshimpanga tshia kujidila kua Alona, utshinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, netshikale tshituha tshiebe
Lufu lua Lakele Bakumuka ku Betele, ne diambedi bobo kabayi banze kufika ku Efelata, kanyinganyinga kakakuata Lakele, wakatantamana bikole
Hakukonkabo kudi muan ebe mulume ne, Mei au ne mikenji ne malu biakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bidi tshinyi

Alona nealue biandi mu ntenta wa kusangakena, neavule bilulu biandi bia lin biakadiye muluate hakayeye mu muaba wa tshijila, neabishiyemu, yeye neowe mai mu muaba wa tshijila, nealuate bilulu biandi, neahatuke neafile mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bantu wa kuosha ha ka hia, neabuikile bubi buandi ne bubi bua bantu

Mu diba adi Baluka wakabala mei a Yelemiya akadi mu mukanda mu matshu a bantu bonso mu nsubu wa Yehowa, mu nsubu wa Gemaleya, muana wa Shafana secrétaire, mu tshiendelu tshia kulu, hehi ne tshibuelelu tshia ku tshibi tshihia tshihia tshia nsubu wa Yehowa
Hakunvua Ahaba mei au, wakadihanda bilulu biandi, wakaluata bilulu bikayabala ham bidi n andi, wakajila bia kudia, wakalala mu bilulu bikayabala, wakenda bitulu bitalu

Asa Wakenza malu akadi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa Nzambi wandi; bualu bua yeye wakumusha bioshelu bia bantu ba bende ne bitendelelu biakadi ba mutu ha mikuna, wakabutula makunshi, wakataha mitshi ya Bashela, wakelela Bena Yuda mukenji wa kukebabo Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo, ne wa kutumikila mikenji ne mei andi
Binuahidia kunvua di dianyi meme mumane kunuenzela malu au onso, nennukengeshe bikole misangu muanda mutekete bualu bua mibi yenu
Wenze mabaya a mitshi ya ndunga abidi, walamike tshiamu tshia mpawungi nseke yonsu
Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku disambombo
Yeye wakaha mukuabo ntalanta Wakadi ne ntalanta itanu wakaya lukasa, wakenda n ai mushinga, wakaheta minga ntalanta itanu
Ne hamanabo kubala mukanda eu munkatshi muenu, nûbadishe bena ekelesia ba mu Laodikiya kabidi; ne nuenu kabidi nubale mukanda wanyi udi ufuma ku Laodikiya
Yeye wakambila Balaka ne, Wimane ha buihi ne mulambu webe wa kuosha ha kahia, nenye kusangakena ne Yehowa kuaka
Nganyi muntu udi uhita malu a ha buloba bukole
Anu tshituha tshihi diulu diakafika ne matutu, tshitelele tshiakatuta, nvula ya bungi yakaloka
Yeye wakamba ne, Ulue ne tshi lulu tshiudi n atshi, utshikuate yeye wakatshikuata, ne wakamubadila bihiminu bia orge bisambombo wakamutekeye, yeye wakaya ku musoko
Ndi nuambila ne, Neabasombuele lubilu

Bualu bua matuku mahite akakumbana bua nuenu nulonde disua dia bisamba bia bende, ne bua nuenu nuende mu tshienzenza tshia masandi, mu nkuka, mu kukuatshika kua malulu, mu manaya a bundu, mu tshingu tshia banu ba malulu, ne mu kutendelela kua mpingu mibi
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakambila Manoa ne, Mukashi adimuke bua mei onso anakamuambila
Nengande bukuondo ku mpala kuandi, yeye neakuatshibue mu buteyi buanyi; nenye n andi ku Babulona, ku buloba bua Bena Kasada; kena ubumona ku mesu, kadi neafuilemu

Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Mibi yonso ya bana ba bantu neijimishibue ne bihendu biahendabo n abi Nzambi, kadi kabena bajimisha bubi bua muntu wahenda Nyuma Muimpe tshiendelele, yeye neikale ne bubi buandi tshiendelele
Hakamutangila Yuda, yeye wa kelangana meji ne, Yeye udi mukashi wa masandi, bualu bua yeye wakabuikila mpala wandi ne tshilulu
Meku onsu a bena Naftali aa avua ne bantu balume
Bualu Maweja Nangila udi udiula bikole bantu badi benza buenzayi bua mushindu ewu
Kadi bobo kabakangunvuila; Manashe wakabenzesha malu mabi akahita a bisamba biakabutula Yehowa ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bubi

Wakautuma mu bianza bia Elasa, muana wa Shafana, ne Gemaleya, muana wa Hilekiya udi Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, mutume ku Babulona kudi Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wamba ne, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wambila bantu bonso bakumushisheye mu Yelushalema bua kubuelabo mu buhika mu Babulona dî edi ne, Asai nsubu, nushikamemu; nukune bintu mu madimi, nudie mamuma abi

Misoko yakadi ne ngumbu yakadi Sidima, Sê ne Hamata, Lakata ne Kinelete, ne Adama ne Lama ne Hasô, ne Kedeshe ne Edelei ne Ene hasô, ne Iliona ne Migedala ele, Holema ne Bete anata ne Bete shemeshe; bimenga dikumi ne tshitema ne misoko yabi
Kubalejabu kabidi bimuma bia mu ditunga adi
Mukelenge Solomo wakatuma Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, wakamuhonesha ne yeye wakafua
Tuetu bashipe mikoku, mbuji ne ngombe yonsu itudi nayi, nansha tuetu baloba mishipa yonsu ya mu mayi manene, kabiena mua kukumbana bantu aba to
Bienzedi bia Yolama biakenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Ndi mumanyi wa bualu ne, Bu nuenu bamanye mua kuenza nunku, nuakadi kuntudila mesu enu bua kuampa
Kilisto udi mutahuluka, anyi
Kabavua ne diba dia kulamba biakudia, nansha dia kuangata bintu bia luendu
Tatu wandi wakahueka kudi mukashi au, ne Shimishona wakabalambishila bidia bia disanka, bualu bua etshi tshiakadi tshilele tshiakadi bansongalume benza
Dibatiza dia Yone diakafuma kudi kunyi
Nanku muntu kena mufue kabidi to
Ha mutu ha bintu bionso nuambule ngabu wa ditabusha, unudi mua kuehela n andi miketa yonso ya Satana idi ne kahia kasuikaku
Numbers Bantu ba mu tshisumbu tshionso bakela dî diabo bikole, bakadila butuku abu
Nuambile Âkipo kabidi ne, Udimuke bua mudimu uwakangata mu Mukelenge, bua wewe ûshikishe

Kadi biahidieye kuhikula budimi, anyi bikaleye muhanyishe muntu mukuabo budimi, kabena mua kubuhikula kabidi, kadi halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene hahingashabo budimi mu bia nza bia banfumu babu, budimi ebu nebuikale bua tshijila kudi Yehowa, nebuikale mu bianza bia muakuidi
Bukula abu, buikale busambakaja ne mafuta, bukanga pa dilata bua kuenza mukata
Bakakolesha lumbu lua Yelushalema tô ne ku lumbu lua muhimbu munene
Yeye wakamba kuya, kadi wakatangila ku muaba wakadibo basongela mpingu ya mabue wakadi mu Gilegala, wakamba ne, Mukelenge, ndi ne dî dia kukuambila mu musokoko
Ditunga diabu didi ne mikuna minene ne mikese, idi ipatula biakudia, ku kale ne ku lelu
Mutuangaji neangate mashi a nyama wa milambu, aalabe muntu udi udikobolola awu ku lusongu lua ditshi, ku tshiala ne ku muana nkasa munene bia luseke lua dia balume
Ezra Nunku baprofete Hagai ne Zekâya, muana wa Ido, bakambila Bena Yuda bakadi mu Yuda ne mu Yelushalema dî dia Nzambi; bakabambila dî mu dina dia Nzambi wa Isalele

Bena mudimu bakashi ba Esetê ne bantu bandi batungula bakalua kudiye, bakamuambila bualu ebu; mukelenge mukashi wakatamba kunyingalasha mutshima wandi; yeye wakatuma bilulu bua Môdekai aluate, ne bua kumusheye bilulu biandi bikayabala; kadi yeye kakabiangata
Neanuhandishe ku malu enu onso a bukoya
Tuenze malu mabi bualu bua katuena munshi mua mikenshi ne bua tudi munshi mua ngasa, anyi
Bena Midiyana, bendi ba mushinga bakahita, ba kahatula Yosefe mu mukela, bakamuhanyisha Bena Yishemaele ku bituha bia argent makumi abidi

Yoshiya wakaha bantu bonso bakadiku milambu ya kufila mu kuhita kua Yehowa, mikoko ne bana ba mikoko binunu makumi asatu ne balume ba ngombe binunu bisatu; ebi biakadi munkatshi mua bintu bia mukelenge
Muambi Udi bu muena meji nganyi

Kadi butudi n abu mbua kusakidila Nzambi misangu yonso bua bualu buenu, bana betu banangibua kudi Mukelenge, bualu bua Nzambi wakadianjila kunusungula ku tshibangidilu bua kunuha luhandu mu kujidila kua Nyuma Muimpe ne mu kuitabusha kua malu a bushua; wakanubikilamu bua lumu luimpe lutuakunuambila, bua nuenu nuhete butumbi bua Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto
Hezikiya wakadila bikole
Kadî Mukelenge wakimana n anyi, wakankolesha; bua dî dia Nzambi dimanyishibue kuonso bua bualu buanyi, ne bua bonso ba bisamba bia bende badiunvue; nakabandishibua mukana mua nyama wa ntambue
Pashishe boshe ngombe awu mujima, yeye mutangile

Kembimpe bua kunemeka muntu mubi, Mishiku ya muhote idi ivuisha matandu; Mukana mua muhote mudi ku butuka kuandi, Mei a umena bunsonge adi bu tuhesa tua bia kudia bilengele; Muntu udi ulenguluka mu mudimu wandi Dina dia Yehowa didi tshibumba tshikole; Biuma bia mundi mubanji bidi musoko wandi wa ngumbu, Mutshima wa kudisua udi uya ku mpala kua dibutuka; Biakudimuma mundi dî kayi muanze kuteleja matshu diambedi, Muoyo wa mundi neumukoleshe mu butekete buandi, Mutshima wa mujinguludi wa mianda udi uheta lungenyi; Kuha kua mundi kudi kumuhetesha muaba, Udi udianjila kuamha tshilumbu tshiandi udi umueneka bu mubinga; Kuela kua nshobo kudi kukosesha matandu, Kulengesha Muntu udi ukuta mamuma adi mukana muandi mukuama, Lufu ne muoyo bidi mu bukokeshi bua ludimi; Udi uheta mukashi udi uheta disanka, Muntu muhele udi wakula mei a disengelela, Muntu udi ne balunda ba bungi udi udibutuisba, kadi kudi mulunda Nsumuinu Muntu muhele udi ne mutshima mutoke Kembimpe bua mundi kuhanga lungenyi; Buhote bua muntu budi bunyanga nshila wandi; Biuma bidi bivudishila muntu balunda ba bungi, Mumonyi udi ne mashimi kena uhanga kukengeshibua; Ba bungi badi bakeba diakalengele kudi muntu udi tshihahai; Bana babo ne muhele bonso badi n andi lukuna; Udi uheta meji udi unanga muoyo wandi; Mumonyi udi ne mashimi kena uhanga kukengeshibua; Kuikala ne bintu bimpe bia bungi kakuena kukumbanyina muhote; Lungenyi luimpe lua muntu ludi lukanda tshiji, Tshiji tshia mukelenge tshidi bu muadi wa nyama wa ntambue, Muana muhote udi ubutuisha tatu andi; Nsubu ne biuma bidi buhianyi budi bufuma kudi batatu, Bufuba budi buladika muntu tulu tukole, Udi utumikila mukenji udi ulama muoyo wandi; Udi ufuila muhele luse udi usombesha Yehowa bintu; Kengesha muan ebe bua kumuyisha, bualu bua ditekemena ditshidiku; Muena tshiji tshikole neatule tshibau; Unvua meji adibo bakuha, witabusha diyisha, Mutshima wa muntu udi ne malu a bungi adiye uhangidisha, Tshidi tshivuisha muntu dinanga kudi bakuabo nduse luandi; Ditshina dia Yehowa didi dilombola muntu ku muoyo; Mufuba udi ubuesha tshianza tshiandi munda mua dilonga, Kuma mubuidi, nunku mutshimbakanyi neadimuke; Muntu udi unyanga biuma bia tatu andi, udi wihata mamu andi, Muan anyi, lekela kunvua diyisha didi dikuhambuisha ku mei a lungenyi
Hanuanyenga musoko nenuwoshe ne kahia; nuenze bu mu dî dia Yehowa; monai, nakanuambila

Wakabambila ne, Nakutamba kusua bua kudia n enu bidia ebi bia Kuhita kua Yehowa, diambedi tshi muanze kukenga; ndi nuambila ne, Tshiona ndia bintu ebi kabidi tô ne hashikishabo malu onso mu bukelenge bua Nzambi
Bena Isalele bonso bakadi binunu tshinunu ne binunu lukama bakadi bena nvita; Bena Yuda bakadi binunu nkama inai ne binunu makumi muanda mutekete bakadi bena nvita

Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Binuikala kanuyi baunvuile, ne binuikala kanuyi bauteka mu mitshima yenu, bua kunemeka dina dianyi, nennutumine mulau, nenkudimune masanka enu alue milau; eyo, nakumana kuavuisha milau, bualu bua kanuena nuteka dî dianyi mu mitshima yenu
Yakasungila musoko wa Samalea mu tshianza tshianyi, anyi
Hatuakafika ku Sulakusa, tuakalalaku matuku asatu
Nunku nuenu nenuikale bakane bu mudi Tatu wenu wa mu diulu muakane
Ndi nsengelela Ewodia ne ndi nsengelela Suntuke bua kuikalabo ne meshi amue mu Mukelenge
Nuakunua mabele ai, nuakudiluatshisha miosa yai; nuakushiha mikoko idi ne manyi, kadi kanuakudisha mikoko
Eliya wakambila Elisha ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Wewe ushikame kunoko, bualu bua Yehowa wakantuma ku Betele

Bualu bua bakambila muntu wa Nzambi mukelenge ne, Makelela ba diba edi nebahane bihiminu bia bukula bua orge bibidi ku nshekele umue ne tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha ku nshekele umue ku tshibi tshia Samalea; kapitene kakambila muntu wa Nzambi ne, Biatunzuluila Yehowa bibi bia mu diulu bualu ebu nebuikale munyi
Kadi Noa wakasangana luse ku mesu kua Yehowa

Ne Nzambi wakateka bakuabo mu ekelesia: ba kumudilu bapostolo, bibidi baprofete, bisatu bayishi, hashishe, malu a kukema, ne bihedi bia kuondaha, ne bakuatshishi, ne bakokeshi ba bantu bandi, ne lungenyi lua kuakula miaku ya bungi
Yeye wakamuha Bileha, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, bu mukashi wandi, ne Yakoba wakaya kudiye
Ndi mbangata bua bikale banyi, pa muaba wa bamuanabute bonsu ba bena Izrayele
Yehowa wakakengesha bantu bualu bua bobo bakenza kana ka ngombe kakadi Alona muenze

Nentume malu makole kûdi, nenkubutule, nenshihe bana ba balume bonso ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba, ne badi mu nsubu ne badi ha bule mu Isalele; nenvuishe nsubu webe bu nsubu wa Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, ne bu nsubu wa Bâsha, muana wa Ahiya, bua tshiji tshiwakunfuisha ne bua malu mabi awakuenzesha Bena Isalele
Badi ne bukole anyi mbafuba
Nzambi ya bisamba abi biakabuela batatu anyi yakabasungila, anyi

Bakamuambila ne, Mu Beteleheme wa mu Yudaya; bualu bua dî edi diakufundibua kudi muprofete ne, Wewe Beteleheme, buloba bua Yudaya, Hashishe Helode wakabikila Bena Meshi mu musokoko, wakabakonka diba mene mene diakamueneka mutoto
Nsudi yandi yakashika lukasa
Masalayi onso a Bena Kasada akadi ne kapitene ka masalayi akashimbula lumbu luakadi lunyunguluka Yelushalema
Yeye neikale kûdi bu musangalashi wa muoyo ne bu mudishi wa mu bununu buebe, bualu bua mamuen ebe, udi mukusue, udi muhite bana ba balume muanda mutekete buimpe kûdi, nguakamulela
Yeye kena muana wa muena mabaya, anyi
Kadi, nenufuile bonsu mu tshipela emu, bualu nudi nunjana
Bana balume ba Gomê: Ashakenaza ne Difata ne Togâma
Kadi bialenduisha muntu umue wa mu bantu aba bahuekele, biakadi kutamba buimpe kumusuika dibue dinene dia kuhela n adi mu nshinga muandi, kumuela mu mai manene
Hakatshingulukeye kudi mukashi, wakambila Simona ne, Udi utangila mukashi eu
Pilato wakabakonka ne, Ngenzele Yesu, udibo babikila ne, Kilisto, tshinyi
Maweja Nangila neanuepule ku masama onsu, ne ku bipupu bikole bionsu, bivua bikuata bena Ejipitu, munudi bamanye
Nunku bakalongolola mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Bela wakafua, ne Yobaba, muana wa Zela, muana wa Bosela, wakadia bukelenge buandi
Yeye wakamba ne, Wewe udi mumanye bualu bunakuluila kûdi, anyi
Bena Ninewe bakitabusha mei a Nzambi; bakajila bia kudia, bakaluata bivualu bikayabala, kubangila kudi baneme tô ne kudi bahuekele

Mukana mua bakashi ba bende mudi dijimba dile; Buhote budi busuikibue mu mutshima wa muana; Udi ukengesha muhele hua kuvudisha luhetu luandi, Teleja matshu ebe, unvue mei a bena meji, Bualu bua newikale ne disanka, biwâlama munda muebe, Bua dieyemena diebe dikale mu Yehowa, Tshiena muanze kukuindila bua kukujadikila mei a bushuwa, Kunyengi bintu bia muhele bualu bua buhele buandi, Bualu bua Yehowa neabalumbuluile tshilumbu tshiabo, Kukuatshi bulunda ne muntu utu wakuata tshiji, bua wewe kuibididi mu nshila idiye wenda, Kuikadi munkatshi mua badi batutangana bianza bua kuhunga dî, Bualu bua biwikala kuyi ne tshintu tshia kumufuta n atshi, Kumushi mukalu wa kale Udi utangila muntu udi wenza mudimu wandi ne lungenyi, anyi

Asa wakadi ne bena nvita mu Yuda binunu nkama isatu bakatuala mafuma ne ngabu, ne mu Benyamina binunu nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mukulu bakatuala ngabu ne mata; aba bonso bakadi bena nvita ba bukitu

Mose wakambila Alona ne bana bandi balume ne, Nulambe munyinyi mu mai a kahia ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, nûdie ne mampa adi mu tshisaka tshidi ne bintu bia tshijila bu munakamba ne, Alona ne bana bandi balume nebaudie
Nakangata milangala ibidi, nakidika mukuabo ne, Diakalengele, nakidika mukuabo ne, Buobumue
Hilama wakatumina Solomo dî ne, Nakunvua dî diwakuntumina, nengenze malu onso awakuamba bua mitshi ya cèdre ne ya cyprès
Ke mudi bualu bubi bumue baakavuisha dihila kudi bantu bonso, nunku kabidi bualu buakane bumue buakuvuisha dibingishibua dia muoyo kudi bantu bonse
Bakakanda bantu nunku
Lakele wakamba ne, Biwampa tumuma tua muan ebe, Yakoba nealale n ebe butuku ebu
Ke Rebeka kuambila Izake ne: Panu mpantonde, bualu bua bakaji ba bena Iti, badi muananyi Esawu musele
Hakadibo bendakana mu misoko, bakafila mikenshi yakelabo kudi bapostolo ne bakulu ba mu Yelushalema bua kuitumikilabo
Yeye wakatangila kudi Bena Kene, wakabela lusumuinu ne, Muaba unudi nushikama udi mukole, udi munkatshi mua mabue
Bakateka bintu biandi bia nvita mu nsubu wa nzambi yabo; bakakumina mutu wandi mu nsubu wa Dagona

Tuetu tuakulua ne mulambu wa Yehowa, bintu biakangatabo kudi mundi ne mundi, bintu bia or ne nkanu ya ku mikolo ne nkanu ya ku maboko ne tukanu tua ku munu, lukanu tua ku matshu ne tukanu tua ku nshingu, bualu bua kubuikidila n abi bubi buetu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Alona nealue ne bintu ebi mu muaba wa tshijila ne muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne tshimpanga tshia mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Bualu bua badi balonda malu a mubidi badi bateka meshi abo ku malu a mubidi; badi balonda Nyuma badi bateka meshi abo ku malu a Nyuma
Nendumbuluishe Bena Moaba; nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Maweja Nangila kuambila Abrame ne: Umanye bimpe ne: ndelanganyi yebe neyisombe mu ditunga dia bende
Bandisha bahuekele, huekesha babandile

Kadi biahangeye kumuhikula diambedi tshidimu tshimue katshiyi tshianze kuhita, nunku nsubu wa mu musoko udi munyungulula ne lumbu neikale kudi wakamusumba tô tshiendelele, muena nsubu kena uhingana mu nsubu halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene
Baprofete bonso badi bamba bualu buandi ne, Muntu yonso wamuitabusha neangate dijimisha dia dibi mu dina diandi
Matthew Mu matuku au muloho Helede wakunvua lumu lua Yesu, wakambila bantu bandi ne, Au nYone Mubanji, wakubika ku lufu, bua bualu ebu malu a kukema adi enjibua kudiye

Luta Luta ne Naomi Mu matuku a, hakadi balumbuluishi balumbuluisha bilumbu, tshiole tshiakadi mu buloba Muntu mukuabo wakumuka mu Beteleheme yuda, wakaya bua kushikameye mu buloba bua Moaba, ne yeye ne mukashi wandi ne bana bandi ba balume babidi
Bonso bakadi babasangana bakubadia, bena lukuna babo bakamba ne, Tuetu katuena bahile, bualu bua bobo bakuenzela Yehowa bibi
Padi mputa awu mondoke, kabidi boya bua muaba awu bukunzubile, buenda butuka, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu ewu mmupie mikiya, bualu udi ne disama dia nsudi ku mutu nansha ku tshibanga
Moshe neele butu abu mulu, mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu mutangile

Biunvua mei onso andi nkuambila, biwenda mu nshila yanyi bua kuenza malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuanyi, ne hua kutumikila mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi bu muakenza muntu wanyi Davidi, nengikale n ebe, nenjadike tshiota tshiebe bulelela, bu munakajadika tshiota tshia Davidi; nenkuhe wewe Bena Isalele
