Yehowa neanuhingashe mu Ejipitu kabidi mu matu mu nshila unakanuambila ne, Kanuena numutangila kabidi
Mona
Eu udi mukenji wa mukashi udi ulela nansha muana wa balume nansha muana wa bakashi
Nuenu nudi bana betu, nudi bu mifuba ya mifuba yanyi ne musunyi wa mu misunyi yanyi; nunku nutshidi bashadile ku nyima bua kuhingisha mukelenge bua tshinyi
Ndi mukuenzele mudimu bidimu dikumi ne binayi, bua kusela bana bebe ba bakaji babidi, pashishe bidimu bisambombu bikuabu bua kupeta bimuna

Bena Yuda bakakeba kuenza bu muakabangabo kuenza, ne bu muakadi Môdekai mubafundile; bualu bua Hamana, muana wa Hamedata, Muena Agaga, muena lukuna wa Bena Yuda bonso, wakatungila Bena Yuda tshitungu bua kubabutuleye, wakadi wela Pû, eu nnshobo mene, bua kubashiha ne bua kubabutula; kadi hakamanya mukelenge bualu ebu, yeye wakafundila mikanda bua kukudimuneye bualu bubi buakadiye musue kuenzela Bena Yuda ha mutu handi, ne yeye ne bana bandi balume bakowibua ku tshiowelu
Nenuikale ne milau mu kukumbasha kua bana ne mu bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba ne mu kukumbasha kua bimuna ne kua mikoko

Bantu bakuabo bakadi badieyemena ne, Tudi bakane, bakadi bahetula bantu bakuabo, Yesu wakabelela lusumuinu ne, Bantu babidi bakabanda mu ntempelo bua kutendelela Nzambi; munga wakadi Mufalese, mukuabo wakadi musangishi wa mulambu
Mufalese mukuabo wakasua Yesu adie ngandi bidia

Wewe neujidile tshidimu tshia makumi atanu, newele di bua bantu bonso bahete budishikaminyi, etshi ntshidimu tshia disanka dinene kunudi, neuhingishe buloba buonso kudi bena buloba, ne muntu yonso neahingane kudi bana babo
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamueneka kudiye mu ludimi lua kahia, luakadi luluhuka mu katshi, wakamona talala, kahia kakadi kosha katshi, katshi kakakahia
Bualu bua matuku a Muana wa muntu nebuikale bu muakadibu mu matuku a Noa
Hakaluabo, hakasangishabo bena ekelesia, bakabalondela malu onso akenza n abo Nzambi, ne bua yeye wakunzuluila bisamba bia bende tshibi tshia ditabusha
Arone umutangila, kujadikaye ne: Miriyame udi ne disama dia nsudi
Yeye wakunyua dî dianyi mu ntempelo wandi, muadi wanyi wakafika mu matshu andi
Makenga aa neanupangishe mua kumona bimpe
Kudi batekete nakalua mutekete, bua meme kuheta mioyo ya batekete; kudi bonso nakulua muena malu onso, bua meme kumanya mua kusungila bakuabo ne ngenyi yonso
Kadi tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi ne bujitu kudi Bena Ashedodo, yeye wakababutula, wakabashiha ne masungu, Bena Ashedodo mene ne bakadi ku matshika abo kabidi
Bualu kai udi ummueneshisha bienzedi bibi Bua malu â diyisha dia mikenji diakuteketa, Tangilai bienu munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nunku ndi mpidia baprofete badi biba mei anyi, badi bibangana mei anyi, muntu yonso kudi muena mutumba n andi
Nunku bakakuata mukelenge, bakaya n andi kudi mukelenge wa Babulona ku Libela mu buloba bua Hamata, ne yeye wakamulumbu luisha
Nunku mukelenge wakela dî kudi Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada; yeye wakaya, wakamushiha, wakafua
Mona, nakuha Bena Lewi tshintu tshia dikumi tshionso tshia mu Isalele bu buhianyi buabo bua mudimu udibo benza mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Kulekelabu bana ba balume ne muoyi
Kunyangaye nkata ya matempu abu a mvita
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu dituku didiye ubuela mu tshitendelelu, mu tshiendelu tshia munda mua luhangu, bua kukuata mudimu wa mu tshitendelelu, afile mulambu wandi wa kubuikila n au bubi
Nudi mua kulombela bantu ba bende bintu ebi; kadi bintu bionso bidi muan enu mulume n abi, nuenu nenubilekele
Bakatonkolola makunshi a mabue a Bâla hanshi, bakashimbula nsubu wa Bâla, bakamuvuisha bu diala tô ne ku dituku edi

Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Bantu banunu, balume ne bakashi, nebashikame kabidi mu misesu ya mu Yelushalema, muntu ne muntu ne tshibangu tshiandi mu tshianza bualu bua bidimu biandi biakavulangana
Matamba awu kusampila, kuela bilongu, kukuama tumuma tumane kuboba
Biakudia bidi bishale mbienu
Nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu, nenupingane kabidi kudi Maweja Nangila, bua kukumbaja meyi ende ne mikenji yende, bindi nnumanyisha lelu ebi
Bonso bakadi ku mutu kua bantu, ne bena bukitu bonso, ne bana balume bonso ba mukelenge Davidi bakadikokela kudi mukelenge Solomo
Mâko Yesu wakabikaku, wakalua mu nseke ya Yudaya ne dishia dia Yadene; bantu ba bungi bakalua kudiye kabidi: yeye wakabayisha bu muakadiye wenza matuku onso
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Amba mei â onso mu misoko ya mu Yuda ne mu misesu ya Yelushalema, ubambile ne, Unvuai mei a tshihungidi etshi, nuenze
Kuena ne bua kulambula bana bebe kudi mvidie wa Moleke to, bualu udi upepeja dina dianyi
Nuakulengulula lungenyi luonso lunakunulesha kabidi, kanuakadi basue kunyua kubela kuanyi
Mukashi muenji wa mudimu wakamumona, wakabanga kuambila bakadi bimane ne, Eu nguabo

Monai, Bena Isalele bonso bakalua kudi mukelenge, bakamuebesha ne, Bualu kai bana betu, Bena Yuda, bakakeba, bakasambula mukelenge ne bonso ba mu nsubu wandi ne bantu bonso ba Davidi dia munemu dia Yadene

Nuoshe mpingu yabo yakasongabo ne kahia: kanukumi mitshima yenu kudi argent anyi or idi ha mutu hai, kanuyidiangatshidi, kanudionyi mu buteyi ebu; bualu ebu budi butonda mutshima wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Kadi Shaula ne bantu bandi bakasungula Agaga ne mikoko ne ngombe ne biakadi ne manyi a bungi ne bana ba mikoko biakatamba buimpe, ne bintu bionso biakadi bimpe, bakahidia kubishiha; kadi bintu bionso bia tshianana, bakaushiha
Nenushikame mu buloba bunakaha batatu benu; nenuikale bantu banyi, meme nengikale Nzambi wenu

Bakenzela Alona ne bana bandi balume bikowelu bia lin, ne bifulu bia lin, ne bilulu bikuabo bia ha mutu, ne mihanu ya lin, ne mukaba wa lin ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû, mudimu wa bantu ba lungenyi lule, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Mitshi yenu ne bintu bienu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba nebikale bia mikumbi

Yosefe udi bu ditamba dia mutshi diakakuama mamuma a bungi, Bilembi bia m ta biakumunyingalasha bikole, kadi buta buandi buakuikala bukole, Nzambi wa tatu ebe udi ukukuatshisha, Masanka a tatu webe akuhita masanka a batatu anyi bunene Benyamina udi bu nkashama udi ne luonji, Bonso aba badi bisamba bia Bena Isalele dikumi ne bibidi, a mmei akabambila tatu wabo, hakabavudishileye disanka, muntu ne muntu wakadi ne disanka diakamuvudishileye n adi
Yeye kena muena mabaya, anyi
Yesu wakabambila ne, Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Diambedi kabai banze kulela Abalahama, meme ndiku
Muntu yonso atshine tatu andi ne mamu andi, nuvuluke matuku a lumingu ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bakumuka mu Lisa bakashikama mu Kehelata
Bakamuambila ne, Muanda mutekete
Wabanya bintu abi mu bitupa bibidi bia mushindu umue: etshi bangate kudi bena mvita bavua mu mvita, tshikuabu bangate kudi bena Izrayele bavua kabayi mu mvita
Bintu ebi bionso ubienze ne tshituha tshimue tshia or, tshintu tshijima tshienza ne tshituha tshimue tshia or muedibue mutambe buimpe
Moshe kuebeja Maweja Nangila ne: Bantu aba badi bakeba kungasa mabue bua kunshipa, mbenzele tshinyi
Kadi banga balume bakamulamata, bakitabusha; munkatshi muabo kabidi muakadi Dionusio, umena Aleopago, ne mukashi, dina diandi Damali, ne bakuabo n abo

Yeye wakasangisha bakuidi ne Bena Lewi, wakabambila ne, Yai bienu ku misoko yonso ya Yuda, nusangishe argent kudi Bena Isalele bonso ya kulongolola n ai nsubu wa Nzambi wenu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu; nudimuke bua nuenu nuenzeshe bualu ebu lukasa
Nanku meme kunua mayi
Heshebona wakadi tshimenga tshia Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi uluangana ne mukelenge mukuabo wa Moaba, wakanyenga buloba buandi buonso mu tshianza tshiandi to ne ku mai a Ânona
Buonso buetu tuakadi mu buatu bantu nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mutekete ne basambombo
Halua dituku dia kulumbulula, bujitu bua dikenga dienu nebutambe bua Tulo ne bua Sidona
Ditwangaja, midimu, bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa tshipangu tshia ku mutu kwa mianda ya dimwangalaja dia ngumu ne dileeja dia bimfwanyi ku tudioomba badi babileeja kudi dîyi dilongolodi
Leu wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu ne bibidi, wakalela Seluga
Ku nyima kuandi Pedaya, muana wa Palosha, wakalongolola
Pashishe mutuangaji avuale muntumpu muenza ne buanda bua ndanda
Ehuda wakabuela muakadiye; yeye wakadi mushikame nkayandi mu nsubu wakadi kulu mu muaba mialala
Ishi boshete wakatuma bantu, bakamunyenga kudi bayandi, Palatiele mene, muana mulume wa Layisha

Bulelela, bakuabo badi bamba Kilisto bualu bua mukau ne kutandangana; ne bakuabo kabidi badi bamuamba bualu bua disanka dimpe; aba badi bamuamba bua luse, bamanye ne ndi mutekibue bua kuvidia kua lumu luimpe; kadi bakuabo badi bamba Kilisto bua ditahuluka, kabai ne mitshima mitoke, bela meshi bua kunjudila makenga mu nkanu yanyi

Bahingishe malonga a or ne a argent mu nsubu wa Nzambi, akangata Nebukadenesâ mu ntempelo udi mu Yelushalema, akalueye n au ku Babulona; baye n au kabidi mu ntempelo udi mu Yelushalema, bateke dilonga ne dilonga mu muaba wadi; bateke mu nsubu wa Nzambi

Hashishe, bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele bakadisangisha hamue, bakalua kudi Samuele ku Lama; bakamuambila ne, Tangila, wewe udi muntu mununu, ne bana bebe ba balume kabalu benda mu makasa ebe, nunku utusungile mukelenge wa kuikaleye utulumbulula bu mudi ba bisamba bionso benza

Yelemiya Mu tshidimu tshia tshitema tshia bukokeshi bua Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, mu ngondo wa dikumi, Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakalua ne masalayi andi onso bua kuluisha Bena Yelushalema, ne bakautshintshimika

Hakamba diba kubuela, bualu bua dituku adi diakadi Dilongolola, diakadi ku nyima kua Lumingu lua Bayuda, Yosefe wa ku Alimataya wakalua; yeye wakadi mulumbuludi wa butumbi, wakadi mutekemene bukelenge bua Nzambi; wakaya kudi Pilato ne dikima mu mutshima, wakamulomba tshitalu tshia Yesu
Ke pandi muvuluke ndondu umvua mutue nabu
Nubabadile mikenji eyi kumpala kua Mvidi Mukulu Maweja Nangila, muaba wikalaye musungule
Nengumushe Bena Ejipitu mu buhika bua kubaha diakalengele, nembahingashe mu buloba bua Patelosa, mu buloba bua bangabanga; nebikalemu bu bukelenge buhuekele
Aba mbana balume ba Kaleba, Salama, tatu wa Beteleheme, Halefe, tatu wa Bete gadê
Nuenze mudimu anu matuku asambombu
Hakumukeye ku muaba au, wakasangila ne Yehonadaba, muana wa Lekaba, wakadi ulua kusangakena n andi

Wakangata tshifulu tshia butumbi tshia mukelenge tshiakadi ku mutu kuandi; bujitu buatshi buakadi bua ntalanta wa or, Yeye wakangata bantu bakadimu, wakabenzesha mudimu wa kuhandabo mabaya ne scie ne bua kuenzabo biamu bia kuihila n abi ne bisui, ne bua kuenzabo tushola; wakenzela Bena Amona ba mu misoko yabo yonso nunku
Bakamuambila ne, Bayidi ba Yone batu bajila bia kudia misangu ya bungi, batu balomba Nzambi, bayidi ba Bafalese batu benza nunku kabidi; kadi bebe batu badia, batu banua
Kadi Yehoyada wakalua muntu mununu, wakadi ne matuku a bungi; wakafua; wakadi ne bidimu lukama ne makumi asatu hakafueye
Efa, mukashi muhika mubakibue kudi Kaleba, wakamulelela Halana ne Mosa ne Gazeza; Halana wakalela Gazeza
Abimeleke wakebesha Abalahama ne, Wakuteka bana aba ba mikoko muanda mutekete ha buabo bua tshinyi
Mabue abidi awu, wateka pa mampinda abidi adi pa tshilamba tshia efode tshia mutuangaji munene
Hashishe Hulama, mukelenge wa Tulo, wakafundila Solomo mukanda ne, Bualu bua Yehowa udi unanga bantu bandi, yeye wakakuhingisha mu bukelenge
Ne hatekabo bintu bionso munshi muandi, hashishe, Muana muine kabidi neatekibue munshi mua Tatu wakateka bintu bionso munshi muandi, bua Nzambi kuikala ku mutu kua bionso ne mu bintu bionso

Badi batusangana kabidi bamanyishi ba bualu bua Nzambi badi ne mashimi, bualu bua tuakamanyisha bua Nzambi ne, Wakabisha Kilisto ku bafue, udiye kai mubishe ka bafue, bikala bantu bafue kabai babishibue ku lufu
Bakelenge Solomo Udi Ubuesha Mushete wa Tshihungidi mu Ntempelo Kul
Kuyisuikabu kuinshi kua mampinda a tshilamba tshia efode pa mutu pawu

Ebi mbilulu bidibo ne bua kutela tshintu tshia kuteka ha tshiadi, ne efoda, ne tshikowelu, ne kazaku ka bibaka bibaka, ne tshilulu ne mukaba, bobo nebatelele Alona ne bana bandi bilulu bia tshijila, bua yeye ankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi
Bamfumu ba bena Izrayele kuya kumanyisha Moshe bualu abu
Mu malu onso a meji ne lungenyi lule biakabebesha mukelenge, wakabasangana bahite bena mbuku ne bena buloshi bonso ba mu bukelenge buandi misangu dikumi
Hashishe Yonatana wakamba ne, Mona, netuye kudi bantu aba, netudimueneshe kudibo
Mukenji wa Kolesha Ez
Mutshima wanyi kaubuedi mu tshifufu tshiabo, ne butumbi buanyi kabubuelakanyi n abo mu disangisha diabo
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bingikala musangane diakalengele ku mesu kuebe, undeshe tshimanymu ne, Nguewe mene udi wakula n anyi

Bualu bua bu mudi mukaba ulamatangana ne tshifuka tshia muntu, nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakulamakasha Bena Isalele bonso ne Bena Yuda bonso kundi, bua bobo bikale kundi bu bantu banyi, bu dina dianyi, bu butumbi buanyi ne bu buneme buanyi; kadi bobo kabakunvua
Hakaluabo ne argent mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Hilekiya muakuidi wakasangana mukanda wa mikenji wakafundabo kudi Mose
Pashishe, wewe ne Arone, nubikile bena Izrayele bonsu
Nempatule ndelanganyi yebe mu ditunga adi
Ne yeye wakadi ne difu, wakadi udila, muikale ne didinyenga dia kuleleye, ne mu dikenga dia kumuleleshabo
Bakabakuata; Eliya wakaya n abo ku kasulu ha Kishona, wakabashihelaku
Diakamue Yakobe kumona bana ba balume babidi bavua nabu Yozefe, kumukonka ne: Bana aba mbanganyi
Tatuabu Yakobe kubambila ne: Nuambutuidi bana banyi babidi: Yozefe kufua, Shimeyone kenaku
Ndi ngamba nunku ne, Muntu ne muntu wa munkatshi muenu udi wamba ne, Meme ndi wa Paulo; meme ndi wa Apolo; meme ndi wa Kefa; meme ndi wa Kilisto
Bua bualu ebu Yesu kakendakana munkatshi mua Bena Yuda kabidi; wakumukaku, wakaya mu luseke luakadi hehi ne tshihela, ku musoko dina diau Efelayima; wakalalaku ne bayidi
Hakimanabi talalâ, biakabuikila mahuahua abi
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Biwalesha bantu aba kalolo, biwabasankisha, biwabambila mei mimpe, bobo nebikale bena mudimu bebe tshiendelele
ndi nkusengelela ne, Ya lubilu kusangakena n andi, umuebeshe ne, Udi bimpe, anyi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mona, meme nakudiangatshila Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele mu miaba ya ban a bute bonso bakalelabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi: bualu bua ban a bute bonso mbanyi, mu dituku dinakashiha ban a bute bonso mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nakadijidila ban a bute bonso ba mu Isalele, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, bobo mbanyi, meme ndi Yehowa
Bakalua mu buloba bua Moaba, bakashikamamu
Kadi mukashi wakandamuna ne, Bulelela, Mukelenge; kadi mbua idi munshi mua mesa itu yadia nkototo idi bana bamatshisha hanshi
Meme nentume Sisela, kapitene ka masalayi a Yabina, kûdi ku musulu wa Kishona, ne makalu andi a nvita ne tshisumbu tshiandi tshinene; nemmufile mu bianza biebe
Wakalenga tshianza ku ditshu diandi, wakamuhingishiladi
Basenshi bakadi batutua luse lua bungi: bakatutemena kahia, bakatubikila buonso buetu, bualu bua nvula wakadi muloke ne bua mashika akadiku
Biwabenga kuenza nunku, hashishe, halala mukelenge wanyi tulu ne bankambua bandi, nebatubale meme ne muan anyi Solomo bu bantu badi balenduisha bakuabo
Nakatangila, ne mena, buloba buakadi bukuamisha mamuma buakalua tshihela, Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Buloba buonso nebuikale muaba wa hatuhu, kadi tshiena mbutula bintu bionso tshishiki
Ke muvua bena Izrayele ne bua kuambula bukula bua mampa buvuabu bamane kusopa, buanga kabuyi buanji kubandisha ditapi
Ku mesu kua Nzambi tudi tuamba mu Kilisto
Nyama ya mikiya, ne idi kayiyi ne mikiya Nyama idi ne mikiya idi Maweja Nangila mubenge, kanuena mua kudia munyinyi wayi to
Kadi bualu bukuabo, undongoluele muaba wa kulala kabidi, ndi ntekemena bua kufikishibua kunudi bualu bua kulomba kuenu
Muibidi udi mufuanangane n au ne, Sua mukuenu bu mûdi mudisue
Nennuvuishile bihendu bia tshiendelele ne bundu bua tshiendelele, bidi bantu kabayi bahua muoyo
Bua muanda eu, Nzambi wetu, unvua kulomba kua muntu webe ne misengelelu yandi, ne bua bualu buebe mpala webe atemene tshitendelelu tshiebe tshidi tshinyanguke

Kadi muntu yonso udi unvua mei, kai wênza, udi bu muntu wakibaka nsubu wandi ha buloba butekete, kakadi ne bishimikidi; musulu wakakuma ku nsubu, wakashimbuka lukasa; diuhuka dia nsubu au diakadi dinene
Wakenza nunku mu misoko ya Manashe ne Efelayima ne Shimeona tô ne ku Nafatale, wakabibutula

Exodus Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nuhingane, Shikamai ku mpala kua Pi hahilota, hankatshi ha Migedola ne mai manene, ku mpala kua Bâla sefona, Shikamai bienu ku mpala kua muaba eu hehi ne mai manene
Wakatamba kukenga ne kanyinganyinga, wakatendelela Nzambi bikole; luanga luakahatuka mamata manene ham bidi handi bu mashi amata hanshi
Kutukandiki tshiakabidi bua bena Izrayele kabayi kulambula Maweja Nangila milambu
Mukuabo neamuebeshe ne, Ei mmputa kai idi mu bianza biebe
Bayidi ba Yesu bakalua dishia dia dishiba, muoyo wakabahua bua kuangata mitanda ya bidia
Mukelenge wakakumbasha argent ne or mu Yelushalema bu mabue; ne mitshi ya cèdre yakadi bu mitshi ya sycomore ya mu bibanda, bualu bua bungi buabi
Amona wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne bibidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu bibidi
Yeye wakumuka, wakakonka mamu andi ne, Nemulombe tshinyi

Bu mudi muprofete Yeshaya mufunde ne, Di dia muntu udi wela lubila mu tshihela ne, Yone wakalua, wakadi ubatiza mu tshihela wambila bantu bualu bua dibanza dia kukudimuna kua mitshima ne mibi yabo ijimishibue
Nanku, divuba divua kumpala kua bena Izrayele mu munya, ne tshimunyi tshia kapia tshivua kumpala kuabu butuku
Bua bualu ebu mulume neashiye tatu andi ne mamu andi, nealamate mukashi wandi, bubidi buabo nebikale mubidi umue
Bena Isalele bakalekela kuihata Bena Peleshete bakalukila, bakahaula tshitudilu tshiabo
Wikale mudimuke ku malu ebe ne ku diyisha diebe

Nunku lua biebe, ndi nkusengelela, ungelele bantu aba mulau, bualu bua bobo badi bantamba bukole, hashishe nembahite bukole, netubashihe, nengihate mu buloba, bualu bua ndi mumanye ne, Muntu ûdi uvudishila disanka neikale ne disanka, ne mundi ûdi wela mulau neikale ne mulau
Nunku newambe ne, Bakuahula matamba bua meme kulamakashibuamu

Bakuabo ba munkatshi muenu bakuhia tshibindi ne bakashi ba batatu babo; Mukuabo wakuenza bualu bua bundu ne mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi; munga wakunyanga mukashi wa muan andi mulume ne wakuhia tshibindi; mukuabo wa munkatshi muenu wakufuisha muan abo mukashi bundu, muana wa tatu andi mumuledi mene
Nunku helabo mpungi bikole, hanunvua muadi wa mpungi, bantu bonso nebele mbila; ne lumbu lua musoko neludishimbukile hanshi mu muaba walu, ne muntu yonso neabuele mu muaba udi buludiludi n andi
Bakalua kudi mukelenge

Matthew Hakashikisha Yesu kuamba mei â onso, wakambila bayidi bandi ne, Nudi bamanye ne, Hahita matuku abidi, Kuhita kua Yehowa nekulue, nebafile Muana wa muntu bua kumushihabo ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Yeshaya Mu tshikondo atshi Melodaka baladana, muana wa Baladana, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakatumina Hezikiya mikanda ne kuha; bualu bua wakunvua muakadiye ne disama ne muakasangaleye

Bualu bua mpingu ya telafima idi yamba mei a hatuhu, Tshiji tshianyi tshidi kudi balami, Dibue dia mu ditumba dia nsubu nedifume kudi Bena Yuda, Nebikale bu bena bukitu mu nvita Nenkoleshe Bena Yuda, Bena Efelayima nehikale bu bena bukitu; Nembele muoso, nembasangishe hamue; Nansha bingikala mubatangalashe munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu, Nendue n abo kabidi bafume mu buloba bua Ejipitu, Yehowa neahite mu mai manene a ntatu, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nembakoleshe mu Yehowa, Zechariah Lebanona, unzulule bibi biebe, Asa muadi, wewe mutshi wa cyprès, Unvuai muadi wa balami ba mikoko Yehowa Nzambi wanyi wakangambila ne, Disha mikoko idibo hamba kushiha
Kanuena ne dî diandi dishala munda muenu, bualu bua kanuena nuitabusha wakatumeye
bampulushi ba ditunga;

Yehowa Nzambi wakamenesha mitshi yonso idi buimpe ku mesu ne idi mimpe bua kudia mu buloba, mutshi wa muoyo kabidi wakadi munkatshi mua budimi, ne mutshi wa lungenyi lua kujingulula malu mimpe ne malu mabi
Yakobe kupampakana bikole, bowa kumuenzabu
Bobo bakakeba mena abo mu mikanda ya kulondolola kua bankambua, kadi kabakâsangana; nunku bakadi banyanguke, bakumushibua ku mudimu wa buakuidi
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuhe Kaisa bintu bia Kaisa, nuhe Nzambi bintu bia Nzambi
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neasabuke ku mpala kuenu; yeye neashihe bisamba abi ku mpala kuenu, nuenu nenubihate; Yoshua neasabuke ku mpala kuenu bu muakamba Yehowa

Kadi kakumusha bitendelelu bia ku mikuna; bantu batshivua bafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ne musenga wa manananshi ha mutu ha mikuna Hakajadikabo bukelenge mu bianza biandi, yeye wakashiha bena mudimu, bashihi ba tatu wandi, mukelenge

Kadi luhandu lua bantu bakane ludi lufuma kudi Yehowa; Yehowa udi ubakuatshisha, udi ubasungila; Psalms Yehowa, kumbedi mu tshiji tshiebe, Bualu bua mikete yebe yakubuela munda muanyi; Kakuena bukole mu misunyi yanyi bualu bua tshiji tshiebe; Bualu bua malu mabi anyi akûla, akuhita ha mutu hanyi
Anu mu Madiyane amu, Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Eyowa, pingana mu Ejipitu, bualu bantu bonsu bavua bakuelela meji mabi mbamane kufua
Kabidi udi mumane kuimita ne difu

Muntu muimpe udi uhatula tshintu tshimpe mu tshibutshilu tshimpe tshia mutshima wandi; muntu mubi udi uhatula tshintu tshibi mu tshibutshilu tshibi; bua mukana muandi mudi muamba anu malu adi matambe kuvulangana mu mutshima wandi

Ku tshianza tshia bakashi tshia bana babo bakimana bana ba balume ba Melali: Etana, muana wa Kishi, muana wa Abedi, muana wa Maluke, muana wa Hashabeya, muana wa Amasaya, muana wa Hilekiya, muana wa Amasi, muana wa Bani, muana wa Shemê, muana wa Mali, muana wa Mushi, muana wa Melali, muana wa Lewi
Bualu bua buonso buenu nudi bamanye mua kuamba dî dia Nzambi ku muntu ku muntu, bua buonso buenu nuyile, ne bua buonso buenu nusambibue
Nenuntuadile mampa abidi a ku nzubu yenu bua kundambula
Nzambi wakaha bansongalume aba banai meji ne lungenyi mu diyila dia mikanda yonso ne mu meji makuabo; ne Danyele wakadi ne lungenyi lua kujingulula bikena kumona bionso ne bilota
Malu nkayau adi munda mua bantu kêna anuyisha ne, Bikala mulume ne nsuki yandi mile, bualu ebu budi bundu kudiye, anyi
Lewitiki Mikenji ya Kuikala ba Tshijila ne Kulumbulula Kuakane Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nuikale bantu ba tshijila bualu bua meme Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ndi wa tshijila
Nunku mikenshi idi ya tshijila, ne mukenshi au udi wa tshijila ne udi muakane ne udi muimpe
Mutshima wa muakuidi wakasanka, yeye wakangata efoda ne telafima ne luhingu luakasongabo, wakaya munkatshi mua bantu
Mark Yesu wakabanga kabidi kuyisha bantu ku muelelu wa dishiba
Davidi wakamukudimuna ne, Ndi muana wa muntu webe Yishai, Muena Beteleheme
Hashishe bakahanda bilulu biabo, bakahingasha majitu ha nyima ha mpunda yabo, bakahingana mu musoko
Tamare kuvula bilamba bia lufuila, kusuika tshitambala mu mpala, kuya kusomba ku tshibuelelu tshia Enayime ku njila udi muye ku Timna
Yeye kena Nzambi wa bisamba bia bende kabidi, anyi
Hakatshiabu nyuma mubi mulume kudi Nzambi wakatulukila Shaula bikole, yeye wakalubakana mu nsubu muandi; Davidi watamba tshisanji ne tshianza tshiandi bu muakadiye wenza ku dituku ku dituku
Tangila, ndi ndua lubilu; ne difutu dianyi didi n anyi, dia kuhingishila kudi muntu ne muntu, bu mudi mudimu wandi
Baku ngenzela malu makuabo kabidi: bakunyanga tshitendelelu tshianyi dituku adi diodimue, bakunyanga matuku anyi a mbingu

Bena Peleshete bakuabo bakalua ne bintu kudi Yehoshafata ne argent ya milambu; Bena Alabâ bakalua kudiye ne bimuna biabo, bimpanga binunu muanda mutekete ne nkama muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu ya mbushi binunu muanda mutekete ne nkama muanda mutekete

Nakadianjila kunuambila hanakadi n enu musangu muibidi, ne katataka kabidi hangikala tshi munkatshi muenu, ndi ndianjila kuambila bantu bakenza malu mabi diambedi ne bantu bonso bakuabo ne, Binalua tshiakabidi, tshiena mbafuila luse
Anyi kanuena bamanye dî didi Mukanda wa Nzambi wamba bualu bua Eliya, anyi
Meme Maweja Nangila ndi nnupeshadi
Hakalueye hehi ne tshitudilu, wakatangila kana ka ngombe ne bantu baja maja Mose wakadi ne tshiji tshikole, wakela mabue hanshi akadi mu bianza biandi, wakatshibula kuinshi kua mukuna

Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Muana wa muntu, mona, ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele badi bamba ne, Tshikena kumona tshidiye umona ntshia matuku a bungi atshidi ku mpala, ne yeye udi wamba malu a bikondo bitshidi kule
Ndi mumone mudi bena Izrayele banyingalala
Nanku padi tufina atu tupatuka, nansha tupatakaja mubidi wende awu, tufina atu tudi ne mikiya, tudi lukuatshisha kabidi muntu mikiya
Nuenze malu â, bualu bua nudi bamanye tshikondo etshi ne, Diba diakumana kufika bua nuenu kubishibua ku tulu; bua katataka luhandu luetu ludi lutamba dituku dia dianjila kuitabusha kuikala ha buihi
Mukelenge wakamukonka mu busokoko hakadibo mu nsubu wandi ne, Dî dia Yehowa didiku, anyi

Meme nengikale tatu wandi, yeye neikale muana wanyi; tshiena ngumusha luse luanyi lujalame kudiye bu munakalûmusha kudi wakadi ku mpala kuebe; luidi nemmujadike mu nsubu muanyi ne mu bukelenge buanyi tshiendelele; nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge neajadikibue tshiendelele

Kabafiki mu muaba udi muntu mufue bua kudinyanga; kadi bua tatu, anyi bua mamu, anyi bua muan andi wa balume, anyi bua muan andi wa bakashi, anyi bua muan abo wa balume, anyi bua muan abo wa bakashi wa difu dimue udi kayi ne mulume, badi bamanye mua kudinyanga
Bakambila Davidi bualu buakenza Lisepa, muana mukashi wa Aya, umue wa mu bakashi bahika babakibue kudi Shaula
Tshitekelu tshia muendu Wenza kabidi tshitekelu tshia muendu anu tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi nkayatshi
Bakamutentekela, bakatuma batentekedi bua kumukuatabo ku mei, bobo bakadi badinga ne, Tudi bantu bakane, bakasua kumufila mu bianza bia ngovena, muena bukokeshi

Nyama ya mu mpata, kanu tshinyi; Nuenu bana ba balume ba mu Siona, sankai bienu, Bishihuidi nebiule tente ne blé, Nennuhingashile bintu ha mutu ha bienu biakadiabo kudi mikumbi, Nenudie bintu bikumbane, nenukute; Nenumanye ne meme ndi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, Ku nyima kua malu â Nengitshikishile Nyuma wanyi kabidi Nendeshe bantu malu a kukema mu ditu ne ha buloba: mashi, kahia ne mulanjilanji wa muishi

Yeye wakadi mumiamina ha buloba buimpe udi unvua dî dia Nzambi, udi udijingulula; yeye mene udi uvudisha maminu; manga adi avulangana lukama lukama, manga makumi asambombo asambombo, manga makumi asatu asatu
Awu kulonda bena Izrayele, bualu bena Izrayele bavua bapatuke mu Ejipitu bu bantu bakadi mua kudienzela malu
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu dituku dindi nnulengesha ku malu mabi enu onso, nenjadike bantu mu misoko yenu, nebibake kabidi miaba yakadi bikulu

Nuntangile, nukeme, Hanavuluka muanda eu, ndi ne dishina, Bualu kai bantu babi badi bashala ne muoyo, Bana bakalelabo ne tunkanunuma tuabo badi bajadikibua ku mesu kuabo ne badi ha buihi n abo, Mu nsubu yabo mudi ditalala, kamuyi buowa, mulangala wa Nzambi kawena uyikuma

Bushuwa, kakuena bualu munda muanyi budi mua kunkuatshisha, Kudi muntu udi wamba kuhanga bidi bimpe bua mulunda wandi kumulesha luse, Bana betu bakundinga bu musulu wa mai udi uhasalala, udi ûma ku nyima, Idi ne mai mafike bualu bua mabue a mashika Mu tshikondo tshidi munya utema idi ijimina; Bisumbu bia bena luendu bidi bisesuka mu nshila yabo; Bena luendu ba ku Tema bakakeba mai, Bakafuishibua bundu bualu bua bakâeyemena, Nuenu nudi nanku kundi mpindiu, Nakunulomba bua kumpa tshintu, anyi

Yeye wakungambila ne, Yehowa, undi ngendakana ku mpala kuandi, neatume muanjelo wandi n ebe, neakuendeshe dikasa dimpe, ne wewe newangatshile muan anyi mulume mukashi kudi bana betu ne kudi ba mu nsubu wa tatu wanyi Hashishe, munda muebe nemuikale mutoke ku kuditshiha eku, hawaya kudi bana betu, biahidiabo kukuha mukashi, munda muebe nemuikale mutoke ku kuditshiha eku
Wakamba ne, Bûshe milondo inai ne mai tente, bâhongolole ha mulambu wa kuosha ne ha nkunyi
Bakeluba bakolola mahuahua abo, bakabuka ha buloba, bakabanda mulu ku mesu kuanyi, ne nkata yakashala hehi n abo hakayabo nunku

Shaula Udi ne Davidi Mukau Mu matuku au kakahingana Davidi kuakashiheye Muena Peleshete, bakashi bakaluhuka mu misoko yonso ya Bena Isalele bua kusambakenabo ne mukelenge Shaula, bakadi bimba misambu, bakadi baja maja, bakadi ne makasa ne bintu bikuabo bia kuimba n abi misambu, bakadi ne disanka dinene
Ne mabue a nvula manene a bujitu bua ntalanta adi afuma mu diulu adi ahonena bantu; ne bantu bakahenda Nzambi bualu bua dikenga dia mabue a nvula; bualu bua dikenga diau diakatamba bunene

Munkatshi mua bifukibue bidi ne muoyo muakamueneka bintu bu makala a kahia akadi atema, bifuanangane ne bimunyi bitambakane munkatshi mua bifukibua; kahia kakakenka bikole ne nuele ya nvula yakahatuka munkatshi mua kahia

Bualu bua binuakudimuna mitshima yenu kudi Yehowa kabidi, bakuenu ne bana benu balela nebahete luse ku mesu kua bantu bakaya n abo mu buhika, nebahingane ku buloba ebu kabidi; bualu bua Yehowa Nzambi wenu udi mûle tente ne luse ne dinanga, kena unukoma nyima binuahingana kudiye
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Kanuena bitabe mumvua munuambile
Bakashimbula nsubu ya ntenta yakadi ya ngombe kabidi, bakaya ne mikoko ya bungi ne tumelo, bakahingana ku Yelushalema
Yehowa wakamba bualu bua Izebele ne, Mbua neyidie Izebele hehi ne lumbu lua Yizelele
Bualu ebu budi buimpe ne mbudi Nzambi Musungidi wetu witabusha, udi musue bantu bonso basungidibue, bafike ku dimanya dia malu malelela
Nudi ne bahele matuku onso munkatshi muenu; nudi bamanye mua kubenzela bimpe dituku dionso dinuasua; kadi kanuena n anyi meme matuku onso
Davidi wakajuka ne bantu bakadi n andi, nkama isambombo, bakaya kudi Akisha, muana wa Maoka, mukelenge wa mu Gata

Bualu bua muntu wa kua bende udi kayi wa munkatshi mua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, hafumeye mu buloba bua kule bua dina diebe bualu bua bobo nebunvue lumu lua dina diebe dinene, ne lua tshianza tshiebe tshikole ne lua diboko diebe dilulame , halueye bua kukutendelela ku nsubu eu, umunvuile mu diulu kûdi ushikama, wenzele muntu wa bende malu onso adiye ukulomba; bua bantu bonso ba ha buloba bamanye dina diebe, bua kukutshina bu mudi bantu bebe Bena Isalele benze; bamanye kabidi ne dina diebe didi dibikidibue ku nsubu eu unakukuashila
Yeye kena ujula miji yau, kena uhuola mamuma au, anyi
Mu tshibombi tshia muanamukala, kuena upingajamu amu makuta avuaye mutule to
Nyuma mubi mutume kudi Yehowa wakadi kudi Shaula hakashikameye mu nsubu muandi ne difuma mu tshianza tshiandi; Davidi wakadi wimba tshisanji ne tshianza tshiandi
Bana ba balume ba Apaima: Yishi
Abioshe bionsu pa tshilambuilu

Numbers Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Balai bungi bua bana balume ba Kohata ba munkatshi mua bana balume ba Lewi ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, mu bidimu makumi asatu to ne ku bidimu makumi atanu buonso buabo badi bakuata mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Ndi ngela mukenji ne
Hashishe Yelemiya wakambila bakokeshi ne bantu ba hatuhu bonso ne, Yehowa wakuntuma bua kuamba mei a kuhisha n au nsubu eu ne mei a onso anuakunvua

Corinthians Bana betu, tudi tunumanyisha bua ngasa wa Nzambi wakaheshibua munkatshi mua ekelesia ya mu Makedonia, ne, Mu kuteta kua bungi kua mu makenga, dikumbana dia disanka diabo ne buhele buabo bua bungi biakavudisha bubanshi bua kuha kuabo
Ku nyima kuandi bakalongolola kudi bana babo, Bawai, muana wa Henedada, mukokeshi wa tshituha tshia luseke lua Kila

Hanualongolola mulume wa ngombe bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia anyi bu mulambu wa kushikisha kuditshiha anyi bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa, nebafile mulambu wa bukula bubotesha bu bituha bisatu bia ha dikumi busangisha ne tshituha tshia dikoho dia manyi, nebafile kabidi tshituha tshia dikoho dia nvinyo bu mulambu udibo banua, bu mulambu wa kuosha, bua kûtuisha dihembu kudi Yehowa

Halueye, neatuishe ba ha buloba bua bubi, ne bua buakane, ne bua dihila; bua bubi, bualu bua bobo kabena bangitabusha; bua buakane, bualu bua meme ndi nya kudi Tatu, kanuena nuntangila kabidi; bua dihila, bualu bua mukokeshi wa buloba ebu wakumana kuhila

Bakasangakena ne Mose ne Alona mu nshila hakaluhukabo kudi Palô, bobo bakabambila ne, Yehowa anutangile, anulumbuluishe, bualu bua nuakutuvuisha bu tshintu tshidi tshi tua tshibi ku mesu kua Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi, nuakuteka muele wa nvita mu bianza biabo wa kutushiha n au
Udi unkonkela meme tshinyi
Mu dituku adi tshioshelu tshia Yehowa netshikale mu muaba wa munkatshi mua buloba bua Ejipitu, ne dikunshi nedikale ku mukalu wabu dijidila kudi Yehowa
Kadi bialekela muntu buakane buandi ne bienzeye malu mabi ne bialondeye bienzedi bionso bia tshinyangu bidi muntu mubi wenza, yeye neikale ne muoyo, anyi
Kanuitabushi argent mikuabo kudi bana benu, kadi nuyifile bua kulongolola miaba ei idi mishimbuke mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Yeye wakatumina Bena Manashe bonso bamessager, ne bobo bakadisangisha kudiye kabidi
Uziya wakasa bibumba mu Yelushalema ku tshibi tshia ku ditumba dia lumbu, ne ku tshibi tshia mu tshibanda, ne ku ditumba dikuabo dia lumbu, wakatekamu bintu bia nvita
Buonso buetu hatuakahona hanshi, nakunvua dî dingambila mu muaku wa Bena Ebelu ne, Shaula, Shaula, udi unkengesha meme tshinyi
Bûdi n abu mbua kushiha ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba, mukelenge webe, bua kusombuela mashi a bantu banyi baprofete ne a bantu bonso ba Yehowa akamatshisha tshianza tshia Izebele hanshi
Wakabuela, wakashikama anu mu musesu wa mu musoko, bualu bua kakuakadi muntu wakaya n abo mu nsubu wandi bua kudiabo
Hashishe Bene hadada wakalubuka kudiye; yeye wakamushikika mu dikalu diandi
Nennulekele, nuye
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Wewe newikale mulami wa bantu banyi Bena Isalele, wewe newikale mukelenge wabo
Bukole buanyi budi bu bua mabue, anyi
Muhote udi udikuata bianza, udi udidia mubidi wandi
Mitshi yonsu ne biakudia bionsu bia mu madimi enu, nebabidie anu kudi mpasu ya mukumbi
Bua malu â ambila ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kudimunai mitshima yenu, nukome mpingu yenu nyima, umushai mesu ku malu enu a bundu
Kadi kuena mua kutshilambula bu mulambu wa mapiku to

Alauna wakambila Davidi ne, Mukelenge wanyi angate bintu bionso bidiye musue, abifile bu mulambu; tangila ngombe ya kuosha ha kahia kayiyi; wangate bintu bidibo bahehula n abi ne bikokedi bia ngombe bua nkunyi: Alauna neahe mukelenge bintu ebi bionso
Elona, Muena Zebuluna, wakafua; bakamujika mu Ayalona mu buloba bua Zebuluna

Kamuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi buleeja mu tunungu twa , ne twa Dîyi ditudi nadi edi, basungudianganyi ne badi mwa kusungudibwa, bilondeshila makanyika a dîyi, badi beena Kongu balume ne bakaji, bikala bamana kukumbaja mvula dikumi ne mwanda mukulu ya tshileledi ne bikala ne makookeshi abo a bweena mwabo ne a tshidiidi
Nansha tshintu tshikuabo tshiakadi mu mushete eu anu mabue abidi akadi ne mikenji mifundahu akatekamu Mose ku Holeba kuakahunga Yehowa tshihungidi ne Bena Isalele hakumukabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Kadi Danyele wakahangidisha bualu mu mutshima wandi bua kadinyangi ne bia kudia bia mukelenge ne nvinyo wakadiye unua
Abashaloma wakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Lungenyi luakatuambila Hushai, Muena Aka, ludi luhita lua Ahitofele buimpe
Bakashi babidi ba Davidi, Abinoama, Muena Yizelele, ne Abigayila, Muena Kâmele, wakadi mukashi wa Nabala diambedi, bakadi bakuatshibue bu bahika

Nunku Bena Isalele kabena mua kuimana ku mpala kua bena lukuna babo; bakela bena lukuna babo nyima bualu bua bobo bakadiela mulau; meme tshiena ngikala n enu kabidi anu hanûmusha tshintu tshia tshijila munkatshi muenu
Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakahunga n etu tshihungidi mu Holeba
Nenuenzele misoko yonso idi kule, idi kayiyi misoko ya bisamba ebi
Anukuatshile mudimu too ne ku tshidimu tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene
Kadi yeye neasungidibue mu kulela kuandi kua bana, bikala bakashi bananukila mu ditabusha ne mu dinanga ne mu malu a tshijila adi ne buhuekele
Bualu bua Shaula wakamba ne, Tshiena musue kumulenga tshianza, kadi Bena Peleshete bamulenge bianza
Nenku nzubu awu kabena mua kumupingaja, nansha bobu bafikile mu tshidimu tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene to
Bakuabo bakamba ne, Yeye udi muprofete, anyi bu muprofete
Tusulu tua mai ne misulu mikuabo nebikale ha mutu ha mukuna mule wonso ne ha mutu ha mukuna muihi wonso, mu dituku dia kushiha kunene, huhuka bibumba
Habuela mukokeshi mu tshibuelelu atshi, abuele mu nshila udi uya mu mbalanda wa tshibuelelu, ne ahatukilemu muomumue
Bimuna bionso bidi ne mikono mihanduluke, bidi bihingishilula bintu mukana: nudi mua kudia nyama ei
Samuele Yoaba Udi Ukeba Kuhingisha Abashaloma Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, wakatangila bu muakadi mutshima wa mukelenge muikale kudi Abashaloma
Yeye wakabambila ne, Kanuangatshi bintu bia kuya n abi mu luendu, anyi tshibangu, anyi tshibombo, anyi bidia, anyi mpalata, Hanuabuela mu nsubu, nushalemu tô ne hanumuka
Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, ndi nkulomba ne, Ungendeshe dikasa dimpe lelu, ufuile mukelenge wanyi Abalahama luse
Upueka ku tshiina, kusunaye mayi mulondu tente

Bikala muenyi mushikame n enu, udi musue kuenza tshilele tshia kuhita kua Yehowa, nebatengule bana bandi ba balume bonso, nunku yeye udi mua kutshienza, yeye neikale bu muntu muledibue mu buloba buenu, kadi muntu udi kayi mutengula kena mua kutshidia
Nanku Yoshuwa ne bena Izrayele bonsu nebakumbaje bionsu bidi mutuangaji Elazare ubambila
Dî diandi diakazakasha buloba tshikondo atshi, kadi katataka wakutulaya wamba ne, Musangu umue mukuabo kabidi meme nenzakashe, kembuloba nkayabu, kadi diulu kabidi
Uvua mupika, bupika buende bujike, apingane kuabu
Aba mbana balume ba Benyamina ku meku abo, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama isambombo

Nsala yakamukuata, wakasua kudia; hakadibo balongolola bidia, wakalotakana, wakamona diulu dibuluke ne tshintu bu tshilulu tshinene tshihueka hanshi tshikuata ku nzemba yatshi inai; munda muatshi muakadi nyama yonso ya makama anai ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ne nyunyu ya mulu
Bu muakadi Yona munda mua munyinyi mimene wa mu mai minya isatu ne mafuku asatu, nunku Muana wa muntu neikale munda mua buloba minya isatu ne mafuku asatu
Yehezekele Wewe kabidi, muana wa muntu, angata dimpana, uditeke ku mpala kuebe, fundahu tshifundu tshia musoko, Yelushalema mene
Nenumanye mua kulomba lungenyi kundi munyi, nuenu ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele
Tshibangidilu Lufu lua Abrahame
Hashishe nakamba ne, Aka, Mukelenge Yehowa
Panudi mu madilu, kanuditapi mputa pambidi
Hakalua dituku disambombo, bakasangisha bituha bibidi, bihiminu bibidi ku muntu ne ku muntu, ne bakulu ba munkatshi muabo Bakalua, bakamanyisha Mose
Mubidi wa Miriyame kawena mua kunyanguka, ufiondoka makoba bu wa muana mufuile munda
Davidi wakanyenga ngabu ya or yakadi n ai bantu ba Hadadezê, wakalua n ai ku Yelushalema
Kanungu ka Budikadidi bwa kwenza bisangilu kabiyi ndululu ne bia lufu budi bwanyishibwe kadi anu mu dineemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne dia bibidilu bia mulowo

Yeye wakateka tupitene ku mutu kua bantu, wakabasangisha kudiye mu muaba wa hatuhu ku tshibi tshia musoko, wakabasamba ne, Nuikale ne dikima, kanutshinyi, kanukemi bualu bua mukelenge wa Ashû, ne bua bantu bonso badiye n abo; bualu bua udi n etu udi umuhita bunene; bualu bua yeye udi anu ne maboko a bantu, kadi Yehowa Nzambi wetu udi n etu bua kutukuatshisha ne bua kutufila nvita
Kadi binuikala kanuyi baditshiha, bualu ebu kabuena bubi kunudi
Tangila, ndi ndua bu muibi, Disanka didi kudi udi mutabale ne udi ulama bivualu biandi, hua yeye kendakanyi butaka ne bua kabatangidi bundu buandi
Mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Yeye udi kudi kunyi

Bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete bakaha kudiye, bakamuambila ne, Umuitabushishe bua kujingulula mudi bukole buandi, ne mua tuetu kumanya mua kumuhita bukole, ne bua tuetu kumusuika, kumukengesha; ne buonso buetu, muntu ne muntu, netukuhe argent tshinunu tshimue ne lukama lumue
Nunku Yoshua wakalua kudibo lubilu ne bena nvita bonso bakadi n andi ku mai a Meloma, wakadiela kudibo

Hebrews Nunku, tuetu kabidi, bualu bua tudi tunyungulukibua ne tshisumbu tshinene nunku tshia bamanyi, tumushai bujitu buonso, ne malu mabi adi bualu butekete bua kutulenduisha, tuidikishe ne kutantamana tshidikishilu tshietu tshia lubilu tshidi tshitekibua ku mpala kuetu, batangila kudi Yesu, mubandi ne mushikishi wa ditabusha dietu, yeye, bua disanka diakatekibua ku mpala kuandi, wakakankamana hakakengeye ka mutshi mutshiamakane, wakalengulula bundu, ne wakushikama ku tshianza tshikole tshia nkuasa wa butumbi wa Nzambi
Katataka ditabusha ne ditekemena ne luse bidi bishala, busatu buabi; kadi tshidi tshihita buonso buabi hunene nduse
Nuenu nenuikale bantu banyi ba tshijila, kanuena mua kudia munyinyi wa nyama wa tshisuku uvua nyama ya lonji mishipe
Neanunyenge tshia dikumi tshia maminu enu ne tshia tumuma tuenu tua nvinyo, neatshidie kudi tuhita tuandi ne kudi bahika bandi
Nanku numushe bubi buonsu munkatshi muenu
Ndi nusengelela bua nuenu kutamba kuenza bualu ebu, bua meme mpingishibue kunudi lubilu

Tudi tunumanyisha lumu luimpe lua mulayi wakalayabo bankambua betu, ne Nzambi wakashikishila bana betu mulayi eu, hakabisheye Yesu ku lufu; bu muakafundabo mu musambu muibidi ne, Wewe udi Muana wanyi, nakukulela lelu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Biwaditshiha kundi mu dina dia Nzambi ne, Tshiena nkushiha, tshiena nkufila mu bianza bia mukelenge webe, nennulombole kudi tshisumbu etshi
Etshi ntshilumbu tshia bantu ne, Munya wakalua ha buloba, kadi bantu bakasua midima, kabakasua munya, bua bienzedi biabo biakadi bibi
Lungenyi lua Solomo luakahita lungenyi lua bantu bonso ba ku esete ne lungenyi luonso lua Bena Ejipitu

Tshiendelu tshia munda mua ntempelo tshiakadi ne tshibuelelu tshitangilangane ne tshibuelelu etshi tshia ku luseke lua sude; yeye wakidikisha muaba wa hankatshi ha tshibuelelu ne tshibuelelu, wakadi coudées lukama
Bakatuma miloho kudi Bena Kîyata yalima bambila ne, Bena Peleshete bakahingisha mushete wa Yehowa; luai bienu, nuye n au kuenu

Mukelenge wakashikama mu nkuasa wandi hehi ne tshimanu tshia nsubu bu muakenzeye matuku makuabo; Yonatana wakimana ha muaba wandi, ne Abinê wakashikama ku luseke lua Shaula; kadi nkuasa wa Davidi wakadi mushale hatuhu
Nunku bonso ba mu Benyamina bakafua dituku adi bakadi binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu; buonso buabo bakadi ne miele, bakadi bena bukitu
Mu ditunga dienu nemuikale mitshi ya olive ya bungi
Bumuka mu Kehelata, kuyabu ku mukuna wa Shefere
Bantu baka tontolola Mose ne, Netunue tshinyi
Bana Baledibue kudi Yakoba Hakatangila Yehowa ne Lea wakadi mubengibue, yeye wakamulelesha bana, kadi Lakele wakadi nkumba
Nanku Maweja Nangila udi unutumina diyi nuenu bena Izrayele, bua nupeshe Arone ne bana bende bintu ebi dituku didibu babajidila

Nunku nufuishe bituha bia mibidi yenu ya ha buloba: masandi, malu a bukoya, nkuka ya mubidi, disamina dibi dia mutshima, ne dikuma dia mutshima ku bintu didi kutendelela kua mpingu mene; bua malu â tshishi tshia Nzambi tshidi tshilua kudi bana ba buhidia; anuakendamu kabidi diambedi hanuakikala ne muoyo munkatshi mua malu â

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi; ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa ku bialeha n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Elishama, muana mulume wa Amihuda
Hashishe, bakamutuila mate mu mesu, bakamukuma bisusu, bakuabo bakamukuma mikumu, bakamuebesha ne, Wewe Kilisto, utuambile wakukukuma nganyi
Muntu mulume wakadi mu Yelushalema, dina diandi Shimeona; muntu eu wakadi muakane, wakadi kabidi mutumikidi wa mei, wakadi utekemena disamba dia Isalele; Nyuma Muimpe wakadi n andi
Biasuabo kuyila bualu, bakonke balume babo ku nsubu yabo; bua budi bualu bua bundu bua mukashi kuakula mu ekelesia

Nomba Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuabuela mu buloba bua Kanâna ebu mbuloba bua buhianyi buenu, buloba bua Kanâna mene ku mikalu yabo yonso mukalu wenu wa ku luseke lua sude newikale ku tshihela tshia Sina, ne ku mukalu wa Edome to ne kuinshi kua Dishiba dia Luehu ku luseke lua ku esete, mukalu wenu neunyunguluke mukuna wa Akalabima ku luseke lua ku sude, neutuangane ne tshihela tshia Sina tô ne ku Kadeshe bânea, tô ne ku Hasâ adâ, to ne ku Asemona, mukalu wenu neunyunguluke ku Asemona tô ne ku kasulu ka Ejipitu tô ne ku mai manene
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; kakasesuka mu malu mabi a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele
Gedaliya wakaditshiha kudibo ne kudi bantu babo ne, Kanutshinyi bantu ba Bena Kasada; nushikame mu buloba, nukuatshile mukelenge wa Babulona mudimu, hashishe malu enu neikale makane
Kanusesuishibu ku mayisha a bungi ne a bende; budi buimpe bua mutshima ujadikibue ku ngasa, kenku bia kudia biakadi kabi bikuatshisha bakadi benda n abi

Yeye wakahona ku makasa andi, wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge wanyi, bualu bubi ebu buikale kundi; ndi nkusengelela ne, Witabushe bua muhika webe mukashi akuambile bualu mu matshu ebe, ne unvue biebe mei a muhika webe mukashi

Kadi mu manga malu ndi nufundila mei anyi ne dikima dihita, bua kunvuluisha tshiakabidi, bualu bua ngasa wakampabo kudi Nzambi, bua meme kuikala mukuatshishi wa mudimu wa Kilisto Yesu mutumibue kudi bisamba bia bende, ngenza mudimu wa muakuidi wa mu lumu luimpe lua Nzambi, bua kufila kuanyi kua bisamba bia bende kuvuishibue mulambu udi Nzambi musue, mujidibue kudi Nyuma Muimpe
Bena Shekeme bakamutekela balaminyi ku mutu kua mikuna yonso, bakanyenga bintu bia bantu bonso bakahita mu nshila; bakambila Abimeleke bualu ebu
Nensangishe mikoko ya mu tshisumbu tshianyi idi ishala, nenyumushe mu maloba onso anakuyituma, nendue n ai kabidi mu mpangu yai; neyilelangane, neyikumbane ya bungi
Shimeyone uvua mulele bana ba balume basambombu: Yemuyele, Yamine, Ohade, Yakine, Sohare ne Shawule, muana wa balume uvuaye mulele ne mukaji muena Kenaane
Bana ba balume ba Sofâ: Sua ne Hânefê ne Shuala ne Beli ne Yimela ne Bezê ne Hodo ne Shama ne Shilesha, ne Yitelana ne Bela
Ditahuluka diakalua kabidi munkatshi mua Bena Yuda bua mei â
Nakenza bu muakangambileye

Nuakuhenda dina dianyi munkatshi mua bantu banyi anu bua kuheta manza a orge ne bihese bia bidia; nuakushiha bantu badi kabayi ne bua kufua, ne nuakusungila bakuabo badi kabayi ne bua kushala ne muoyo, bualu bua nuakudinga bantu banyi badi bitabusha mashimi enu
Kadi Yehowa udi mu ntempelo wandi wa tshijila; Habakkuk Kutendelela kua Habakuka muprofete, kulongolola mu tshimbilu tshia Shigionota
Biakane umulombele bukelenge kabidi, bualu bua yeye udi mukulu wanyi: umulombele ne Ebeyatâ muakuidi, ne Yoaba, muana wa Seluya
Mulau wenu wakufika kunudi, nuenu ba ha buloba

Bienzedi Munkatshi mua bena ekelesia ba mu Antiokia muakadi baprofete ne bayishi, mena abo akadi Bânaba, ne Shimeona muidika ne, Nigê, ne Lukio wa ku Kulene, ne Manaene wakakola ne muloho Helode, ne Shaula
Wewe muine Yehowa, Nzambi wa misumba, udi Nzambi wa Isalele
Dinanga dia Isalele kudi Yosefe diakatamba dinanga diandi kudi bana bandi bonso, bualu bua yeye wakadi muana wakaleleye ku bununu buandi, wakamulelela tshikowelu tshia maboko male
Bana ba Zatu, nkama tshitema ne makumi anai ne batanu

Wakamuha kabidi umue wa mikanda yakafundabo mu Shushana wakadi ne mukenji wa kubabutula mufundamu, bua kûlesheye Esetê; wakamuambila dî diandi kabidi bua kuyeye kudi mukelenge bua kumuakuila ne bua kuakuileye bantu bandi ku mesu kuandi
Hatshiatshia, bakamba hanshi kutoka, mukelenge wakajuka, wakaya lukasa ku buina bua ntambue
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Wewe neumudinge, neumuhite bukole; ya, wenze nunku
Wakosha munyinyi ne tshiseba ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Tshisamba tshionsu tshia bena Izrayele netshilame buloba buabu bimpe
Kadi biasumba muakuidi muntu, muntu eu udi mua kutshidia, ne bana baledibue mu nsubu muandi nebadie bidia biandi
Bafalese bakalua kudiye, bakamuteta munda ne, Biumusha muntu mukashi wandi bua malu onso, neashihe mukenshi, anyi
Kadi kahita ka bena maluvu wakahua Yosefe muoyo, yeye kakamuvuluka
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mona
Tshintu tshionso tshidiye ulala hadiye ku katshetshi netshikale ne bukoya, ne tshintu tshionso tshidiye ushikama netshikale ne bukoya
Helode wakamukeba; hakahangeye kumumona, wakebesha balami, wakabalumbuluisha ne, Baye n abo bua kubashiha
Mukelenge wakambila Hamana ne, Bakakuha argent, ne bantu kabidi; enza n abi bu mudi umona ne mbimpe
Tshisamba tshia Nafatale Ahila muana mulume wa Enana neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Nafatale
Amen

Mukelenge, unvue biebe; Mukelenge, unjimishile mibi yetu; Mukelenge, utunvuile, wenze bualu ebu; kujanguluki bua muanda webe, Nzambi wanyi, bualu bua musoko webe ne bantu bebe bidi bidikibua dina diebe
Kuhungi n abo tshihungidi anyi ne nzambi yabo
Mai akadi mu mulondo akashika, ne yeye wakaladika muana muinshi mua katshi kasase
Padibu basukula tshintu atshi, dikeji dijika, batshisukulule musangu muibidi, bua tshishale katshiyi ne mikiya
Bakambila bantu ne, Hitai, nunyunguluke musoko, bena nvita baye ku mpala kua mushete wa Yehowa
Pavua divuba adi dishale muaba wa tshijila matuku abidi, ngondu mujima, nansha matuku mapite bungi, bena Izrayele bavua anu basombe, bindile bua divuba dibande
Kadi bua kuehuka ku masandi, mulume ne mulume ikale ne mukashi wandi, ne mukashi ne mukashi ikale ne mulume wandi
Yeye wakangambila ne, Bua kutshiashila nsubu mu buloba bua Shinâ; hashikishabo kumujadikaku, nebatshishimikeku ha tshitekelu tshiatshi

Tela wakangata Abalama, muan andi mulume ne Lota, muana wa Halana, muikulu wandi, ne Salai, ma muen andi, mukashi wa muan andi mulume Abalama, bakamuangala mu buloba bua Ula wa Kasada bua kuya ku buloba bua Kanâna, bakafika ku Halana, bakashikamaku
Muan a bute wakambila muan a mukala ne, Tatu wetu udi mununu, ne kakuena mulume mukuabo udi mua kulua kutudi bu mudi tshilele tshia bonso ba ha buloba
Yoshua wakatuma bantu ku Ai bumuke ku Yeleko, udi hehi ne Bete awena ku esete kua Betele, wakabambila ne, Yai bienu bua kutentekela buloba
Muntu kampande kuluangana nende mvita too ne muatshi butuku
Dikenga disambombu: maputa Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Nuboye butu bua muiku mu bianza
Kampande awu kumuandamuna ne: Udi musue kumanya dina dianyi bua tshinyi
Yesu wakabuesha bayidi bandi mu buatu lubilu, badianjile dishia ku mpala kuandi mu Bete saida, hakatumeye bantu kuabo
Bamonyi ba bualu abu bakabamanyisha malu onso akalua kudi wakadi mukuatshike ne bademon, ne malu onso akalua kudi ngulube

Nukuame mamuma makane adi alesha dikudimuna dia mitshima yenu; kanuedianganyi meshi munda muenu ne, Tuetu iudi ne Abalahama tatu wetu; ndi nuambila ne, Nzambi udi mumanye mua kubisha mabue â alue bana ba Abalahama
Davidi wakatshina Yehowa dituku adi
Kadi meme Maweja Nangila ndi ngamba ne: mu tshidimu tshisambombu, nennuvudijile biakudia bia bungi, bikumbane bua bidimu bisatu

Yakoba wakamba ne Muan anyi kena uya n enu, mukulu andi udi mufue ne anu yeye umuehele udi mushale, biamukuata bualu bubi mu nshila unuaya, hashishe, nenuvuishe nsuki yanyi mitoke to ne kanyinganyinga mu Muaba wa Bafue
Hashishe Eli wakamukudimuna ne, Ya biebe talalâ, Nzambi wa Isalele unvue biandi kulomba kuwakumulomba
Mmusue kutufila kudi bena Amore bua batushipe
Hanuadisangisha, muntu ne muntu udi ne musambu, udi ne diyisha, udi ne bualu buakabuluibua kudiye, udi ne muaku udibo kabai bamanye, udi ne kujingulula kua muaku
Hashishe Yeshaya muprofete wakafika kudi Hezikiya mukelenge, wakamuebesha ne, Bantu aba bakuamba tshinyi
Ndi mumanye kudisua kuebe ne kudibandisha kua mutshima webe: wewe wakuluila anu bualu bua kutangila mata
Wakalela muan andi mulume, muan a bute, yeye wakamujingila tshilulu, wakamuladika mu tshidilu tshia nyama, bualu bua mu nsubu wa tshilala benyi kamuakadi muaba
Bualu mbenze bualu ebu mu tshimenga, kadi nsongakaji kena muele mbila, kena mubikile bantu

Kanudi mampa adi ne luevene ne mulambu eu; nenudie n au mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, mbia kudia bia tshivulukidi tshia dikenga; bualu bua nuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu lubilu; nunku numuke dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu matuku onso a muoyo wenu
Udi mumanye mua kubuela munda mua mamu wandi tshiakabidi, amulele, anyi

Mai manene enze tshiona, ne bionso bidimu bibile; Hashishe mitshi yonso ya muitu neyimbe misambu bua disanka ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nusakidile Nuambe ne, Utusungile, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, avudishibue disanka, Yeye wakashiya Asafa ne bana babo ku mpala kua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, bua kuenzelabo mudimu ku mpala kua mushete bikondo bionso bu muakadi mudimu wa buatshia buatshia, ne Obeda edome ne bana babo makumi asambombo ne muanda mukulu, ne Obeda edome, muana wa Yedutuna, ne Hosa bua kuikalabo balami ba bibi

Nunku nakangata luhanza ku tshianza tshia Yehowa, nakalunuisha ba mu bisamba bionso biakadi Yehowa muntume: ba mu Yelushalema ne misoko ya mu Yuda ne bakelenge babo ne baminyampala babo, bua kubabutula kabutu, bua kubavuisha bu tshintu tshidi tshikemesha bantu, tshidibo babingila, tshidibo bela mulau, bu mudibo lelu eu
Nsuki ya ku mitu yenu mene mene idi mibala yonso
Nunku nebabueshe bantu aba mu buhika bakadi bababuesha mu buhika diambedi, ne nebakokeshe ku mutu kua bakadi babakengesha
Diba diakadi munda munya
Wakatua mpala wandi hanshi ku mesu kua mukelenge, wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakafila bantu bakatombokela mukelenge mu bianza bia mukelenge, avudishibue disanka

Hatuakumuka mu Toa, tuakasabuka, baye balulame ku Samotaka; hakatshiabu, tuakafika ku Neapoli; tuakajukamu, tuakaya ku Filipoi, musoko wakadi muhite yonso mikuabo ya mu luseke alu lua Makedonia; musoko eu wakadi nkolonyi wa Bena Lomo; tuakadi tulala mu musoko au matuku
Bayandi wakabika, wakamulonda bua kumuambileye mei a kalolo ne bua kumuhingisha kabidi; muikale ne muena mudimu wandi ne mpunda ibidi; mukashi wakalua n andi mu nsubu wa tatu wandi
Yesu udi dibue diakahidiabo kunudi nuenu bibaki ba nsubu, kadi diakatekabo ku mutu kua ditumba

Kadi luhetu ludi lutamba bulengele ludi buimpe bua Nzambi busangisha ne mutshima muhole; bua katuakalua ne tshintu ha buloba ebu, ne katuena bamanye mua kumukahu ne tshintu; hadi hatuikala ne bia kudia ne bia kuluata, netuikale ne mitshima mihole ne bintu ebi
Bakalua kutangila bualu buakenjibua nunku
Bualu ebu kabuena bunusankisha
Nakamumona Yesu, wakamubikila, wakamuambila ne, Mukashiana, matekete ebe akulekele
Leya kuimita difu dikuabu, kulela muana wa balume
Bualu bua lukuka lua biuma bobo nebendulule n enu mushinga ne mei a mashimi; dihila diabo diakabahishabo n adi kale kadiena dishanguluka, ne dibutuke diabo kadiena dilala tulu
Kadi Amasa kakadimuka bua muele wakadi mu tshianza tshia Yoaba; yeye wakamutua muele mu mbale, ne mala andi akahatuka hanshi; yeye kakamutua tshiakabidi, wakafua
Nunku uditute ku tshibelu
Hakafikabo ku tshitudilu tshia Bena Isalele, Bena Isalele bakajuka, bakataha Bena Moaba, bakanyema ku mpala kuabo, bakabuela mu buloba bua Bena Moaba, bakabashiha
Bakamulesha mulambu wa kuosha, tshituha ne tshituha ne mutu, yeye wakabisha ha tshioshelu
Yetelo, tatu muenu wa Mose, wakoshila Nzambi nyama ya mulambu, ne Alona ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele bakalua kudia bidia ne tatu muenu wa Mose ku mesu kua Nzambi
Esau wakaya lubilu bua kumuakidila, wakamuela tshituha ku nshingu, wakatuangana n andi mishiku, bakadila

Nakashihibua ku mutshi mutshiamakane ne Kilisto; nunku kememe kabidi udi ne muoyo, kadi Kilisto ngudi muoyo munda muanyi; ne muoyo undi n au mu mubidi katataka ndi n au mu ditabusha dia mu Muana wa Nzambi, wakannanga, wakadifila bua bualu buanyi
Samuel Hakalua Samuele muntu mununu, yeye wakasungula Bena Isalele bana bandi ba balume bu balumbuluishi babo
Ahaza wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu dikumi ne bisambombo
Bana ba balume ba Sheme badi: Elame, Ashure, Arpakshade, Lude ne Arame

Monai, mukashi wakalua ku nyima kua Yesu, wakadi ne disama dia mashi ahatuka bidimu dikumi ne bibidi, wakalenga tshianza tshiandi ku mubangu wa tshivualu tshia Yesu; mukashi wakadi wamba munda ne, Binalenga ku tshivualu tshiandi, nenkoleshibue
Leviticus Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, etshi ntshintu tshidi tshitambe tshijila
Abimeleke kubika patshiatshia, kubikila balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende
Kadi padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila mbuji nansha mukoku bu mulambu wa bobumue, tshimuna atshi tshikale tshilume nansha tshikaji, katshiyi bulema
Bukula bua ku mulambu budi bushale, babuangate anu kudi Arone ne bana bende ba balume
Mvidi Mukulu udi musue kupandisha Nowa Ndelanganyi ya Nowa idi nunku: Nowa nkayende munkatshi mua bantu ba tshikondu atshi, uvua muntu muakane, witaba Mvidi Mukulu, udisanga nende mu malu onsu
Ngombe yakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bisambombo, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi makumi muanda mutekete ne ibidi
Mukelenge, umanye ne, Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu diulu wakaha Nebukadenesâ tatu ebe bukelenge, bunene, butumbi ne buneme
Hashishe nakamba ne, Aka, Mukelenge Yehowa
Bualu bua Davidi wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa matuku onso a muoyo wandi; yeye kakasesuka mu dî diakamuambileye matuku andi onso anu bualu bua Uliya, Muena Hiti
Kanuakunvua
Kadi kahita ka bena maluvu wakahua Yosefe muoyo, yeye kakamuvuluka
Bana balume bonso ba bakuidi nebaudie, etshi ntshintu tshitambe tshijila
Yozefe ne Binyamine kupukilangana, kuasa miadi

Bienzedi bia mukelenge Davidi, bia kumudilu ne bia kunshikidilu, monai, bidi bifunda mu mei a Samuele, mumonyi wa malu a Nzambi, ne mu mei a Natana muprofete, ne mu mei a Gada, mumonyi wa malu a Nzambi, kabidi; ne malu onso a mu bukelenge buandi ne bukole buandi hakadiye ukokesha mu Isalele ne ku mutu kua makelenge onso a mu miaba mikuabo
Dî dia Yehowa diakadi dia mushinga mukole matuku au: kakuakadi tshikena kumona misangu ya bungi nansha
Bu bituha ebi bionso bikale anu tshituha tshimue, mubidi wakadi kuikala kudi kunyi
Muena Peleshete wakambila Davidi ne, Lua kundi, nendishe nyunyu ya mulu ne nyama ya mu tshisuku munyinyi webe

Bantu aba nkama isatu bakela mpungi; Yehowa wakabaluishisha muntu ne mukuandi nvita, ne musumba wonso; musumba wonso wakanyema tô ne ku Bete shita ku luseke lua Zelala tô ne ku butshika bua Abele mehola hehi ne Tabata
Abalahama wakadi ne bidimu lukama hakamulelabo muana wandi mulume Isaka

Abalahama wakangata Yishemaele, muan andi mulume, ne bana bonso bakaledibua mu nsubu wandi, ne bantu bonso bakasumbibua ku argent yandi, bantu balume bonso ba mu nsubu wa Abalahama bakatengudibua dituku adi mene bu muakamuambila Nzambi
Bobo mene bakafila nshingu yabo bua kuikosabo bua muoyo wanyi; kudibo kutudi tubasakidila, kememe nkayanyi, kadi bena ekelesia bonso ba mu bisamba bia bende

Bunene bua nsubu wakibakila mukelenge Solomo Yehowa buakadi ne bule bua coudées Bule bua mbalanda wakadi ku mpala kua nsubu buakadi coudées makumi abidi bu butshiama bua nsubu; butshiama buandi buakadi coudées dikumi
Bela wakafua, ne Yobaba, muana wa Zela, muana wa Bosela, wakadia bukelenge buandi
Abrame kumubuelela mu nzubu
Yeye wakamba ne, Yeye udi Eliya, Muena Tishebe
Didi bu muntu munyeme nyama wa ntambue Kanuena bamanye ne dituku dia Yehowa nedikale mîdima, kadiyi ne munya, anyi
Yuda wakamba ne, Netuandamune mukelenge wetu dî manyi
Bena Ai bakashiha bantu bu makumi asatu ne basambombo, bakabihata ku tshibi tshia musoko tô ne ku Shebalima: bakabashiha mu tshibanda kabidi; mitshima ya bantu yakatekete teketê, yakakudimuka bu mai

Ne umue wa bakulu udi ungambila ne, Kudidi nasha; tangila, Nyama wa Ntambue udi wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, Muji wa Davidi, wakatamba bukole bua kubululeye mukanda ne bimanyishilu biau muanda mutekete
Tshilamba tshionsu tshikale ne metre dikumi ne atanu mu bule, ne metre abidi mu butshiama
Kuena museke Isalele, anyi
Kadi batatu benu kabakangunvuila, kabakateleja matshu abo kundi

Muaba awu, ke unudi mua kulambuila bintu bionsu binudi nabi: milambu ya kuosha, ya bobumue, tshia dikumi tshia bintu bia mu madimi, milambu ya budisuile, milambu ya mapiku, too ne ya banabute ba bimuna bienu: ngombe, mikoku ne mbuji
Kadi wewe, muntu wa Nzambi, nyema malu â; londa malu makane ne a buimpe bua Nzambi ne ditabusha ne dinanga ne ditantamana ne kalolo
Katshia mfika kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bua kumuambila malu mu dina diebe, udi amu ukengesha bena Izrayele bikole
Wakukuta difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Onana
Bena Izrayele kumuangalaka mu Ejipitu, benda badikebela bisosa
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Hanukonka bantu aba, anyi muprofete anyi muakuidi ne, Bujitu bua dî dia Yehowa budi tshinyi
Batshidi babikila lusanga alu ne: Lusanga lua muadi
Bakamukudimuna di ne, Tudi ba ku Halana
Nuenu benze nanku, nenupie mikiya

Bualu bua muaba wau udi masokoka kudi bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo, Kubutuka Nzambi udi ujingulula nshila wa kudiu, Bualu bua yeye udi umona tô ne kunfudilu kua buloba, Hakidikisheye luhehele bujitu bualu, hakeleye nvula mukenji wandi, Mu diba adi yeye wakamona meji ne wakâlondela bantu; Hashishe, wakambila bantu ne, Yobo Yobo wakabanga mei andi kabidi ne, Nakadi kusua kuikala bu munakadi mu ngondo ya kale, hakadi muinda wandi utemena ha mutu hanyi, Nakadi kusua kuikala bu munakadi mu matuku a bukole buanyi, hakatshidi Wa Bukole Buonso n anyi, hakadi makasa anyi muvuwa ne mabele, Hanakaluhuka ku tshibi tshianyi bua kuya ku musoko, bansongalume bakantangila ne bakumuka ku mpala kuanyi, Bakokeshi bakalekela kuakula, Dî dia bena butumbi diakahuwa, Bualu bua hakunvua matshu dî dianyi, akanvudishila disanka; Bualu bua nakasungila bahele bakadila dikuatshisha, Disankisha dia kudi muntu wakadi wamba kufua diakalua kundi; Nakaluata buakane bu tshivualu
Hashishe Eli wakamukudimuna ne, Ya biebe talalâ, Nzambi wa Isalele unvue biandi kulomba kuwakumulomba
Anu dituku adi, Labane kuumusha mbuji ya mpumbu yonsu ivua ne mipolu nansha ivua ne matoba pambidi
Bakahidia mukenji wa mukelenge, bakafila mibidi yabo ku lufu bua kabakuatshidi nzambi mukuabo mudimu, kabamutendeledi mu muaba wa Nzambi wabo mene
Bavua balama kabidi makunji a lupangu ne bitaku biawu, milonda ne mionji
Nembahidie; bakuhatuka mu kahia, kadi kahia kakuabo nekabavingutule; nenumanye ne, Ndi Yehowa, hanabahidia
Bena Izrayele, samunayi Mvidi Mukulu wetu
Nuambe bualu buanuhabo kudi Nyuma Muimpe diba adi; nuenu kanuena nuamba, Nyuma Muimpe udi wamba
Samuel Yehowa wakatuma Natana kudi Davidi
Katshiakadi kudi bantu aba bakenza bibi, bena mibidi yabo yakahona hanshi mu tshihela, anyi
Bualu bua meme nyaya kundi mua kuya; hingana biebe, uye ne bana benu, luse ne bulelela bikale n ebe
Hashishe Davidi wakajuka, wakakosa tshihesa tshia tshikowelu tshia Shaula mu musokoko
Umona nanku, kuambaye ne: Ndi musue kubenda kusemena pabuipi bua kujadika bualu ebu bua dikema: kadilu katema, tshipuka katshiyi tshipia tshibutuka

Mukashi eu wakangata bantu aba babidi, wakabasuika; yeye wakamba ne, Bulelela, bantu aba bakulua kundi kadi tshiakamanya kuakafumabo; ne bakulua diba didibo binshila bibi bia musoko, hakuila butuku, bantu aba bakaluhuka; kadi meme tshiena mumanye kuakuyabo; nubalonde lubilu, nenubahete
Bualu bavua bumvue ne: neafike mu munya bua kudia netu
Petelo wakamukuata ne tshianza, wakamubisha

Kadi katataka wakamueneshibua bualu bua dimueneka dia Musungidi wetu Kilisto Yesu, wakajimisha lufu, wakamuenesha muoyo wa tshiendelele ne udi kawi mua kunyanguka mu munya, bualu bua lumu luimpe, luakantekabo musambi ne mupostolo ne muyishi bualu bualu
Yehowa wakanuihatshila bisamba binene ne bikole; kakuakadi muntu wakanutantamena tô ne ku dituku edi
Kadi bobo bakakolesha mei abo, bakamulomba ne, Bamushihe ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Dilongu adi ne tshitaku tshiadi, bivua anu bia tshiamu tshikunze, tshivua tshifuma ku mienu ya tshiamu tshikunze ya kudi bakaji bavua benza mudimu ku tshibuelelu tshia ntenta wa kusambakena
Nunku nutangile mukelenge unuakasungula, unuakalomba; monai, Yehowa wakateka mukelenge ku mutu kuenu
Bua mukana mudi muamba anu malu adi matambe kuvulangana mu mutshima

Kadi numanye bienu bualu ebu bimpe ne, Binuanshiha, nenuteke mashi a muntu udi kayi ne bualu ham bidi henu ne ha musoko eu ne ham bidi ha bena musoko; bualu bua Yehowa wakuntuma kunudi bulelela bua kunuambila mei â onso mu matshu enu

Bualu bua Bena Yuda badi balomba bimanyinu, ne Bena Gelika badi bakeba meshi; kadi tuetu tudi tuamba Kilisto wakashihabo ku mutshi mutshiamakane, ntshilenduishi kudi Bena Yuda ne mbuhote kudi bisamba bia bende; kadi kudi badi babikidibue, ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Gelika, Kilisto mbukole bua Nzambi ne meshi a Nzambi
Edi ndituku dia lumingu dia dikisha dienu, nujinge mu mitshima yenu, eu mmukenji kunudi tshiendelele
Diba dia kulela dikumbana, kamuvua kabidi mpata to
Mitshima yenu kaizakadi, kaitshinyi
Kuambilanganabu ne: Tuenzayi tushole, tuoshe
Ndelanganyi yende neyenze tshisamba tshinene
Nukumbaje mikenji yonsu indi nnuambila lelu eyi
Nunku nudi nudibanda, nudi nuitabusha malu akenza bankambua benu; bobo bakabashiha, nuenu kabidi nutu nuibaka nkita yabo
Nenkukoleshe tshiji tshianyi, nenkuelele kahia ka tshiji tshianyi; nenkufile mu bianza bia bantu badi bu nyama mene, badi ne lungenyi lule lua kubutula n alu bakuabo
Yeye nealue n abu kudi muakuidi, ne muakuidi neabuambule dianza tente bu tshivulukidi, neabuoshe ha tshioshelu bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia eu udi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu
Shaula wakamuha Mikala, muan andi wa bakashi, bu mukashi wandi

Nzambi wakambila Mose kabidi ne, Wewe newambile Bena Isalele ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Isaka ne Nzambi wa Yakoba wakuntuma kunudi edi ndina dianyi tshiendelele, etshi ntshivulukidi tshianyi kudi bantu bonso
Ndi musue kubabutula bonsu amu mpindiewu
Nunku kanuikadi batshiangatshi n abo
Bena Isalele bonso bakamujika, bakamujinga bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa diakambeye mukana mua muprofete wandi Ahiya
Bena Amaleka ne Bena Kanâna badi ku mpala kuenu, nunku nenufue ku miele ya nvita, bualu bua nuenu nuakuhidia kulonda Yehowa, nunku Yehowa kena wikala n enu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Mona, mu musoko eu mudi muntu wa Nzambi, bantu bonso badi bamutumbisha; malu onso adiye wamba adi alua malelela; tuye bietu kudiye, yeye atujinguluile ku luendu kutuyaya
Hakabikeye bua kuhumbulula mpumbuluila, Boaza wakambila bansongalume bandi ne, Nuitabushe bua yeye ahumbulule mpumbuluila munkatshi mua bisumbu bia orge mene, kanumukandi nansha

Hashishe nakitaba kudibo, nakabambila ne, Nzambi wa mu diulu neakuatshishangane n etu; nunku tuetu bantu bandi netubike, netuase lumbu elu; kadi nuenu kanuena ne buhianyi, nansha tshituha, nansha tshivulukidi mu Yelushalema
Nakabaha mei anyi a kulondabo, nakabamanyisha mikenji yanyi; muntu wayenza neikale ne muoyo bua bualu buai
Nanku kapia kikale katema anu kutema pa tshilambuilu kashidi, kakayi kajima
Hakadi Bena Isalele mu tshihela, bakasangana muntu wangula nkunyi dî diku dia Lumingu
Nebabidie amu kudi bena diku diebe, balume ne bakaji, badi kabayi ne mikiya

Zakayo wakimana, wakambila Mukelenge ne, Mukelenge, unvua, nempe bahele tshituha tshia hankatshi ha bintu bianyi; ne bingikala muangate tshintu tshia muntu mukuabo ku mashimi anyi, nemuhingishile bintu binai
Abiya ne bantu bandi bakabashiha ne kushiha kukole; Bena Isalele ba bukitu binunu nkama itanu bakadishinda hanshi bafue
Pashishe, wela musenga wa kamonya pa makala apu
Bakidika dina dia muaba au ne, Masa ne Meliba, bualu bua kutontolola kua Bena Isalele ne bualu bua bakatela Yehowa ne, Yehowa udi munkatshi muetu, anyi
Hashishe, nebamone muana wa muntu ulua mu matutu ne bukole buandi bunene ne butumbi buandi
Nakatangila ne monai, nuakenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bubi; nuakadienzela kana ka ngombe ne biamu biakatulabo; nuakadi nusesuka lubilu mu nshila wakanulesha Yehowa
Di didi Nzambi uteka mukana muanyi, nenkuambiledi
Ndi ntata bikole bua kuamba bualu
Buloba bua Yuda nebuhatshishe Ejipitu buowa
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Uye biebe, bualu bua meme nembafile mu tshianza Nunku bobo bakafika ku Bâla pelasima; Davidi wakabashihelaku
Kakunyua Zebula, mukelenge wa mu musoko, mei a Gala, muana wa Ebede, tshiji tshiandi tshiakadi tshikole

Bualu bukuabo kabidi, munya udi ufuma ku ngondo newikale bu munya udi ufuma ku diba, ne munya wa ku diba neuvudishibue misangu muanda mutekete, newikale bu munya wa matuku muanda mutekete, mu dituku didi Yehowa ujingila mputa ya bantu bandi, ne udi ukamisha mputa yakatahibuabo
Yeye wakamba ne, Katataka Yehowa wakutuenzela muaba, netukumbane mu buloba
Meme ndi mua kudisha bantu aba bonso munyinyi kudi kunyi
Bualu bua Edome

Muntu udi kayi muakane neangate butue bua mulambu wakoshabo bua kubuikila n au bubi, neangate mai adi ahueka mu dilonga: mundi utshidi muakane neangate mabeshi a hysope, neâtue mu mai, neamiamine ha ntenta, ne ha malonga onso, ne ha bantu bonso bakadimu, ne mundi wakalenga mifuba tshianza, anyi mundi wakafua ku muele wa nvita, anyi mundi mufue, anyi lukita, mundi utshidi muakane neamiamine mai ha mundi udi kayi muakane dî diku disatu ne dituku dia muanda mutekete, ne halua dituku dia muanda mutekete neamulengeshe, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne mai, neikale muakane ku dilolo
Badi bakane ku mesu kua Nzambi kembunvu ba mikenshi, kadi benji ba mikenshi nebabingishibue
Kadî Mukelenge wakimana n anyi, wakankolesha; bua dî dia Nzambi dimanyishibue kuonso bua bualu buanyi, ne bua bonso ba bisamba bia bende badiunvue; nakabandishibua mukana mua nyama wa ntambue

Hashishe Yoshua wakakula ne Yehowa mu dituku diakafila Yehowa Bena Amole mu bianza bia Bena Isalele; ne ku mesu kua Bena Isalele yeye wakamba ne, Diba diakimana ne ngondo wakimana Kakuakadi dituku dikuabo bu dituku edi ku mpala kuadi anyi ku nyima kuadi, hakunvua Yehowa dî dia muntu nunku; bualu bua Yehowa wakadila Bena Isalele nvita

Kanukoleshi mitshima yenu bu muakenza batatu benu; kadi neuhuekeshe kudi Yehowa, nubuele ku muaba wandi wa tshijila wakajidileye tshiendelele; nukuatshile Yehowa Nzambi wenu mudimu bua tshiji tshiandi tshikole tshiumuke kunudi
Bualu uvua ne tshintekateka bua muakunyende uvuaye mumone

Mu tshikondo atshi masalayi a mukelenge wa Babulona akadi atshintshimika Yelushalema, ne bakamana kubuesha muprofete Yelemiya mu lukanu luakadi mu tshiendelu tshia bansentedi tshia mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa Yuda
Hashishe bantu bakuabo bakaya, bakamanyisha Davidi muakenzeleye bantu bandi

Bule buandi bua luidi lua kumudilu buakadi coudées Mbalanda wakadi ku mpala kua nsubu, bule buandi buakadi bu butshiama bua nsubu coudées makumi abidi; bule buandi bua mulu buakadi coudées lukama ne makumi abidi; wakalamika or mutambe buimpe munda muandi ku nseke yonso
Kushihi mudimu wa Nzambi bualu bua bia kudia
Mutuangaji ambule dianza dia bukula budi ne mafuta, ambule kabidi musenga wa kamonya onsu
Kusanganabu Lote musombe ku tshibuelelu tshia tshimenga
Nuenu nutu nuahidia Yehowa katshia ku dituku dinakanumanya
Mukelenge wakabuikila mutu wandi, wakadila ne dî dikole ne, Muan anyi Abashaloma, Abashaloma muan anyi, muan anyi
Hakalua dituku dia muanda mutekete, bakuabo bakaya kusangisha bidia, kadi kabakabisangana
Hatuakahitshilaku ne ditata dikole, tuakafika ku muaba udibo babikila ne, Dilobo Dimpe; musoko wa Lasaya wakadi ha buihi
Netanele, muana mulume wa Sua, mukelenge wa Yisakâ, wakaula bintu biandi dituku dibidi
Yehowa neakokeshe bantu tshiendelele
Lelu eu nakunuambila dî edi, kadi kanuakutumikila dî dia Yehowa Nzambi wenu mu bualu bumue buakuntumeye bua kunuambila
Nuenu, kanukebi bia kudia ne bia kunua, mitshima yenu kailubakanyi
Ebelu Ditabusha didi dimanya dia malu atudi tutekemena ne didi dijadika dia malu atudi katui bamone

Kadi bakuabo bendakanyi ba Bena Yuda, batempeshanganyi ba mbuku, bakatela kabidi mua kubikilabo dina dia Mukelenge Yesu ha bakadi ne nyuma mibi munda, bamba ne, Ndi nkutshihisha mu dina dia Yesu udi Paulo wamba
Wewe wakadimusha biendedi bianyi, nunku makasa anyi kakahalamuka
Nuakuhanga ne Nyuma, mpindiu nudi nushikisha ne malu a mubidi, anyi
Bakamujika ku mukalu wa buhianyi buandi mu Timenata sela wa mu mikuna ya Efelayima, ku nôde kua mukuna wa Gâsha
Kanutendeledi mvidie Kadi, nutambe kuvuluka bualu ebu: Dituku divua Maweja Nangila wakula nenu ku mukuna wa Sinayi, munkatshi mua kapia, kanuvua bamumone to
Bualu bua bobo badi bu tshisamba tshia bantu badi kabayi ne lungenyi, kabena ne dijingulula dia malu munda muabo
Nebamufile mu bianza bia bantu ba bisamba bia bende, nebamuseke, nebamuhende, nebamutuile mate; nebamukume, nebamushihe; kadi hahita matuku asatu, neabike kabidi

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nenfile Palô Hofela, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, mu bianza bia bena lukuna bandi, mu bianza bia badi bakeba muoyo wandi, bu munakufila Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, mu bianza bia Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakadi muena lukuna wandi ne wakadi ukeba muoyo wandi
Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kudikuba
Bualu bua kabena bakengesha benji ba malu mabi lukasa, mitshima ya bana ba bantu idi ikoleshibua bua kuenza malu mabi

Kadi kabakatumikila dî dianyi, kabakateleja matshu kundi; kadi buonso buabo bakenda anu mu tshitshu tshia mu mitshima yabo mibi; nunku nakabavuishila mei onso a mu tshihungidi etshi anakabambila bua kuenzabo, kadi kabakenza nansha
Nuenu nutumikile, nuenze mei onso anakunuambila; kanutentekashi dî dikuabo ha mutu ha mei au, kanûmushi dî ku mei au
Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelese bakadi mu buloba tshikondo atshi
Tunkanunuina tuebe netuikale bu dinfuenkenya dia buloba netumuangalale ku wesete ne ku esete ne ku nôde ne ku sude bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bualu buebe ne bua tunkanunuina tuebe
bûngi bwa bantu, bintu ne dibadika;

BIDI BITANGILA MBULAMATADI NE BIDI BITANGILA BUDIKOOKESHI Luseke lumwe, bwa kukolesha kabumwe ka ditunga kavwa mvita milondangana mipandulula ne, luseke lukwabo, bwa kulongolola miaba ya kudisonsolwela ne ya kukolakena mu ntaku, mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu udi mwabanya buludiki bwa Mbulamatadi wa Ditunga mu polovensa , kusakidila tshimenga tshia Kinshasa, yônso mikala ne dikalaku difila kudi mêyi a mbulamatadi ne kabidi mikala ne bukookeshi bwa mianda ya bwatshia bwatshia buleeja mu Dîyi ditudi nadio edi

Hashishe, bantu aba bakadisangisha ku mpala kua mukelenge, bakambila mukelenge ne, Wamanya, mukelenge, ne mukenji wa Bena Madai ne wa Bena Pelasa udi wamba ne, Kakuena mukandu anyi mukenji wakujadikabo kudi mukelenge udi mua kukudimuka
Wewe neudileshe muakane kudi badi ne buakane; neuleshe mutshima mukole kudi badi ne mutshima mukole
Davidi wakashiha kabidi Hadadezê, muana wa Lehoba, mukelenge wa mu Soba, hakayeye bua kujadika bukelenge buandi buakadi ku musulu wa Pelata
Bualu bua bobo badi badila kundi ne, Utuhe munyinyi wa tuetu kudia
Hakamukuateye, wakamuela mu nsubu wa lukanu, wakamufila mu bianza bia masalayi dikumi ne asambombo, bua kumulamau; wakasua kulua n andi ku mesu kua bantu hashika Kuhita kua Yehowa
Mampa malambula Mvidi Mukulu Wangate bukula, wenze mikata dikumi ne ibidi, mukata onsu wikale ne bujitu bua kilo isambombu
Misangu yonso yakabuela mukelenge mu nsubu wa Yehowa tupitene tuakamema ngabu, tuakalua n ai, hashishe tuakayihingisha mu nsubu wa bulami
Nunku yeye wakabambila ne, Nungambule nungele mu mai manene, bua mai manene abatame; bualu bua ndi mumanye ne tshihuhu etshi tshinene tshidi tshinukuate bua bualu buanyi

Mu tshikondo atshi masalayi a mukelenge wa Babulona akadi atshintshimika Yelushalema, ne bakamana kubuesha muprofete Yelemiya mu lukanu luakadi mu tshiendelu tshia bansentedi tshia mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa Yuda

Bikaleye mubabikile ne banzambi, aba bakatuminabo dî dia Nzambi ne dî dia mu Mukanda wa Nzambi kadiena mua kumushibua , bua yeye wakajidilabo kudi Nzambi ne wakatumeye ha buloba, munyi nudi nuamba ne, Udi uhenda Nzambi, bua nakuamba ne, Ndi Muana wa Nzambi
Gamaliele, muana mulume wa Pedasû, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe
Yeye wakatabala ku tulu tuandi, wamba ne, Nenduhuke bu misangu mikuabo ya diambedi, nendihandishe nkayanyi mu bianza biabo
Alona wakahingana kudi Mose ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, disama diakashika
Milongo ya Bena Lewi bakuabo ba mu Yuda bakalamata kudi Bena Benyamina
Nudi bamanye ne, Bu muena nsubu mumanye diba dialua muibi butuku, wakadi kutabala, nsubu wandi kakadi kutubuka disoso
Bakadinyanga hakatekabo mushiku wabo wa mbelu hehi ne mushiku wanyi wa mbelu, ne dikunshi diabo hehi ne dikunshi dianyi, ne bakadi anu ne lumbu hankatshi hanyi n abo
Ndelanganyi ya Esawu Ke mena a ndelanganyi ya Esawu, nkambua wa bena Edome, bavua base ku mukuna wa Seyire: Ada, mukaji wa Esawu, uvua mulele muana anu umue wa balume, dina diende: Elifaze

Wakambila Adama ne, Bualu bua wewe wakuteleja di dia mukashi webe, wakudia mamuma a mutshi unakukuambila ne, Kuadi nansha, buloba buakedibua mulau bualu buebe, wewe neudie bidia biabu ne kanyinganyinga matuku ebe onso, buloba nebukumeneshile meba ne tusokola, neudie midioko ya mu budimi, neudie bidia ne luanga ha mpala hebe to ne hawahingana mu buloba kabidi, wewe wakumushibua mu buloba, wewe udi dinfuenkenya dia buloba, neuhingane mu dinfuenkenya dia buloba kabidi
Ke pamvua musue kuenza bualu ebu, kondu kanyi ka munda kakayi kantuuta, nansha kampisha mene

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ku nyima kua malu au nenfile Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne hena mudimu bandi ne bantu badi bashala mu musoko bahanduke ku tshihuhu, ku muele wa nvita, ku tshiole, mu bianza bia Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, ne mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo ne mu bianza bia badi bakeba mioyo yabo
Kadi katuena bamanye uvua mutupingajile makuta mu bibombi to
Nzambi udi Nyuma; budi bamutendeledi n abu mbua kumutendelela mu nyuma ne mu bulelela

Bikala muntu ne disama dia nsudi, nebalue n andi kudi muakuidi, muakuidi neatangile, ne bikala tshima tshitoke tô mu dikoba, ne bikala miosa miandamuke mitoke tô, ne bikala munyinyi mubishe mu tshima, edi didi disama dia nsudi diakadi kudiye diambedi mu dikoba diandi, ne muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane, yeye kena umubuesha mu nsubu, bualu bua yeye kena muakane
Bena matempu ba bungi bakasangisha mikanda yabo, bakayosha ku mesu kua bantu bonso
Hashishe yeye wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge avuluke Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, bua musombuedi wa mashi kashihi kabidi, kabashihi muan anyi
Bakakemangana ne, Tshisamba kai tshia Bena Isalele tshidi katshiyi tshitua kudi Yehowa ku Misepa
Kabakashiya umue wabo

Bana balume ba Alona bonso nebatshidie, bu tshituha tshiabo mu bikondo biabo bionso munkatshi mua mulambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, muntu yonso udi ulenga bintu ebi tshianza neikale muntu wa tshijila
Nanku anu bana babidi ba Arone, Elazare ne Itamare, ke bavua bashale bua kuenza mudimu wa butuangaji pamue ne tatuabu

Aba bakadi bana balume ba Lewi ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo bu bantu bakabalabo ku mena abo ku muntu ne muntu, bakadi benza mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Yehowa, bakadi ne bidimu bikumbane makumi abidi tô ne ku mutu
Bakasangana munkatshi mua Bena Yabesha gilada bakashi nkama inai bakatshidi tumama, kabakadi bamanyibue kudi mulume; bakalua n abo ku tshitudilu tshia mu Shilo, tshidi mu buloba bua Kanâna
Muntu undi tshiyi ngumusha ku tshioshelu tshianyi, neikale bua kukusunsuma mu mesu ebe ne bua kunyingalasha mutshima webe; ne bana bonso hadibo balela mu nsubu webe nebafue hatshidibo ne bukole
Bantu bonso bakadi balua mu ntempelo dinda bua kunvua dî diandi

Munya udi webe, bufuku budi buebe kabidi; Wewe wakahanda mikalu yonso ya buloba, Yehowa, uvuluke bualu ebu ne, Muena lukuna wakukuhenda, Kufidi muoyo wa nyunyu webe wa nkutshi kudi nyama wa luonji, Utangile tshihungidi tshiebe bimpe; Kuitabushi bua badi badiatshishibue muinshi mua makasa a bantu bahingane ku nyima bafuishibue bundu
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuangata dima, kuenza nadi nyama yonsu ya pa buloba ne nyunyi yonsu ya mulu
