Bintu bionso bia kudia bidi bituangana ne mai akadi mu bintu ebi nebikale ne bukoya, ne mai a kunua onso akadi mu bintu ebi neikale ne bukoya
Nunku mukelenge wakafua, bakaya n andi mu Samalea; bakajika mukelenge mu Samalea
Bobo badi bamba ne, Tudi bamanye Nzambi; kadi badi bamudiula ne bienzedi biabo; mbena tshinyangu, mbena buhidia, babengibue kadi Nzambi bua kuenza mudimu muimpe wonso
Ulekelele mabanza a malu mabi etu bu mutuakumana kulekela kabidi badi n etu mabanza a malu mabi
Kadi malu â adi tshibangidilu tshia kanyinganyinga
Mayi onsu kuandamuka mashi, mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne bantu bende bamone
Kadi Sisela wakanyema ku makasa andi ku ntenta wa Yaele, mukashi wa Hebê, Muena Kena; bualu bua ditalala diakadi hankatshi ha Yabina, mukelenge wa Hasô, ne nsubu wa Hebê, Muena Kena
Isaka wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi muan anyi Esau bulelela, anyi
Davidi wakatshina Yehowa dituku adi
Butudi n abu mbua kuenza malu a wakuntuma hatshidi munya; butuku bulualua budi muntu kai mumanye mua kuenza mudimu
Samuele wakamuambila malu onso, kakamusokoka nansha bualu bumue
Nunku bakabikila dina dia musoko au ne, Soâ
Wakaya, wakasangana tshitalu tshiandi mu nshila ne mpunda ne nyama wa ntambue bimane ha buihi n atshi; nyama wa ntambue kakadia tshitalu tshiandi, kakahandulula mpunda
Hakambeye nunku, wakamuambila ne, Undonde
Bajikija kuakula, Maweja Nangila kumuka, Abrahame kupingana kuende
Amenona wakamuambila ne, Juka, ya biebe
Muele wa nvita udi uhenya bu muele wa nvula, udi musekeshibue bua kushiha n au bantu
Mamuma a grenades makumi tshitema ne asambombo akadi mu nseke yonso ya makunshi, mamuma onso a grenades akadi ham bidi ha bifuanyikishi bia mionshi mihindakasha akadi lukama
Nanku Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wetu, kutuambuluisha
Nanku, Maweja Nangila neanuendeshe diakabi mu bionsu binudi nuenza: nenuikale ne makenga, ntatu ne bowa, too ne panuabutuka bonsu lukasa, bualu nudi benze malu mabi, babenge Maweja Nangila
Ebu mbungi bua bantu ba bukitu bakadi ne Davidi: Yashobeama, muana wa Muena Hakemoni, wakadi ha mutu ha bantu makumi asatu; yeye wakambula difuma diandi kudi bantu nkama isatu, wakabashiha diatshimue
Maweja Nangila mmumane kukuendesha diakalenga
Ditendelela dibi Kanuena mua kuasa dikunji, nansha kukuna mutshi, bua kutendelela mvidie mikuabu, pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, tshinudi benzela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu to
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu a
Ku tshikondo atshi Bena Peleshete bakadi bakokesha Bena Isalele
Kadi Nadabe ne Abiku bafuile, bualu bavua balambula Maweja Nangila mulambu wa musenga wa kamonya kauyi wa tshijila to
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bana ba bakashi ba Selofehada badi bamba dî dilelela: Ubahe buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo ne tatu abo, buhianyi bua tatu abo nebulue kudibo
Kadi Nzambi wakasangakasha bituha bia mubidi, wakahesha butumbi butamba bunene kudi tshituha tshiakadi katshi n abu, bua mu mubidi kamuikadi ditahuluka, kadi bua bituha biambuluishangane muomumue
Bifulu ebi bia bukelenge nebikale kudi Heledai ne kudi Tobiya ne kudi Yedaya ne kudi Yoshiya, muana wa Sefanya, bu tshivulukidi mu ntempelo wa Yehowa
Bobo bakakeba mena abo mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua bankambua, kadi kabakâsangana; nunku bakadi bu bantu banyanguke, bakabumusha mu buakuidi
Bantu bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo bua kuluisha Bena Gibetona, mu buloba bua Bena Peleshete
Bonso badi balombodibua kudi Nyuma wa Nzambi, bobo badi bana ba Nzambi
Stefano, mûle tente ne ngasa ne bukole, wakenzenza malu a kukema ne bimanyinu binene munkatshi mua bantu
Hakadi Paulo mu Mileto, wakatuma dî ku Efeso, wakabikila bakulu ba ekelesia
Mu diba adi dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nuenu Bena Isalele, tshiena mua kunuenzela bu mudi mufumbi eu wenza, anyi
Tuakabasa mikete, musoko wa Heshebona udi muhaula tô ne ku Dibona, Nunku Bena Isalele bakashikama mu buloba bua Bena Amole

Balume ne bakashi bakalua bungi buabo bakadi bitabusha mu mitshima yabo, bakalua ne tukanu tua ku matshu ne tukanu tua ku minu ne nkanu ya ku maboko ne bintu bionso bia or, muntu ne muntu wakalua ne kuha kua or kudi Yehowa
Bulelela, muan etu, mpeteku disanka dikumbana kûdi mu Mukelenge; ukankamasha mutshima wanyi mu Kilisto
Nuele Filogogo ne Yulia, Neleo ne muan abo mukashi, ne Olumpa, ne basanto bonso badi n abo muoyo
Yeye wakabika mu nkuasa wandi
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuelela mukenji lelu bua nuenu nuenze mikenji ei ne mei au; nunku nubienze ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso

Kadi bianza bia Mose biakanema bujitu; bakangata dibue, bakaditeka ku nyima ne yeye wakashikama ha mutu hadi, ne Alona ne Hû bakabandisha bianza biandi, umue ku luseke lukuabo, umue ku luseke lukuabo, ne bianza biandi biakakoleshibua to ne hakabuela diba

Nunku wambile bantu ba mu Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema dî edi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, ndi nnulongoluela makenga, ndi nnusunguila bualu bua kunuenzela; nunku buonso buenu nulekele kuenda mu nshila idi mihi, nulengeshe bienzedi bienu ne malu anudi nuenza

Dî dia Kilisto dikale munda muenu ne bubanshi buadi; mu meshi onso nuyishangane ne nudimushangane ne misambu ya bena kuitabusha ba kale ne ya bena Kilisto ne ya Nyuma; nuimbile Nzambi misambu ne ngasa mu mitshima yenu
Ke Moshe kusangisha nkanu ya kupikula nayi bungi bua bena Izrayele buvua bupite bungi bua bena Levi
Biangatshile diba adi, bena Izrayele bonsu kutuadija kuitaba bionsu bivua Yoshuwa ubambila
Betuele wakalela Lebeka: Mileka wakalelela Naho muan abo ne Abalahama, bana aba muanda mukulu
Yeye wakangambila dî dikuabo ne, Neumone malu makuabo a bundu adibo benza adi ahita â bubi
Monai, muan anyi mukashi utshidi kamama ne mukashi wandi muhika badiku, nenduhuke n abo, nubafuishe bundu, ne nuenze n abo budi buimpe ku mesu kuenu; kadi kanuenzedi muntu eu bualu bubi
Bua ditabusha tudi tujingulula ne buloba buakalongolodibua ku dî dia Nzambi, bua nunku bitudi tumona ku mesu kabiakufukibua ku bintu bidi bimueneka ku mesu
Miloho yakalua, yakambila Bena Yabesha dî edi, ne bobo bakasanka
Ikala ne bukole, tantamana biebe
Badi bamba ne, Yehowa wakuhidia bantu ba mu meku abidi akusunguleye
Hakahita manga matuku, mukelenge Agipa ne Bênike bakalua ku Kaisalia bua kuela Festo muoyo
Yesu wakabakudimuna ne, Nakunuambila, kadi kanuena nuitabusha; malu antshidi ngenza mu dina dia Tatu wanyi adi angamba

Yeye wakabambila ne, Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Kakuena muntu wakashia nsubu wandi, anyi mukashi wandi, anyi bana babo, anyi bamuledi, anyi bana bandi, bualu bua bukelenge bua Nzambi, udi kai uheta bintu bikuabo bitambe bia diambedi misangu ya bungi mu tshikondo etshi; halua tshikondo tshikuabo, neahete muoyo wa tshiendelele
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Wewe, muana wa muntu, angata mutshi umue, ufundehu mei ne, Bualu bua Yuda ne bua Bena Isalele badi balamata kudiye

Bualu bua ndi mumanye ne, Ku nyima kua lufu luanyi nenutambe kudisangisha ne kusesuka mu nshila unakunulesha; malu mabi neanukuate mu matuku atshidi ku mpala; bualu bua nuenu nenuenze malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufikisha munda bua mudimu wa bianza bienu
Meme kukosa nkanu ya bupika buenu, bua numone mua kuenda ntunku
Bena Kolinto, mukana muetu mudi mubulule kunudi, mitshima yetu idi midiundishibue
Nunku Muena Lewi wakasomba
nennuvudishile disanka dianyi tshidimu tshisambombo, ne buloba nebukuame bintu bia bidimu bisatu
Ngasa ikale kunudi ne ditalala bia kudi Nzambi Tatu wetu

Mukelenge wa Bena Amona wakakudimuna ba messager ba Yefeta dî ne, Bualu bua Bena Isalele bakanyenga buloba buanyi hakaluabo mu Ejipitu, ku musulu wa Ânona tô ne ku Yaboka ne ku Yadene; nunku utuhingishile maloba au kabidi talalâ
Pavua Moshe wela tshianza mulu, bena Izrayele bavua bapita bena Amaleke bukole

Nentumbishe Yehowa hantshidi ne muoyo; Kanueyemenyi baminyampala, anyi muana wa muntu, Muhuya wandi udi uhatuka, udi uhingana kabidi ku dinfuenkenya diandi; Disanka didi kudi muntu udi ne dikuatshisha diandi kudi Nzambi wa Yakoba, wakafuka diulu ne buloba, mai manene ne bintu bionso bidimu, Udi ulumbuluila badi bakengeshibue ne kulumbulula kuakane; Yehowa udi utabasha mesu a bafofo; Yehowa udi ulama benyi, Yehowa neakokeshe tô ne kashidi; Psalms Tumbishai Yehowa
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuenu nudi bamanye muntu au ne mei akadiye wamba
Asenata, muana mukashi wa Poti fela, mubuki wa mu Ono, wakalelela Yosefe bana ba balume babidi, diambedi tshiole katshiyi tshianze kulua
Mesa awu avua ne bule bua metre umue, butshiama bua santimetre makumi atanu, butumbuke bua santimetre makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu
Binuamba mei malelela, nuitabushe bua: umue wenu ashale musuikibue mu nsubi wa lukanu, kadi bakuabo benu baye kuenu ne bia kudia bualu bua tshiole tshidi mu nsubu yenu
Kanungu ka Badi bênza Kapangu ka kulu ka disungidila ditunga
Yeye wakabashia, wakaluhuka mu musoko, wakaya ku Betania, wakalalaku
Ke muaba uvuabu bajike Abrahame ne mukajende Sara, bajike kabidi Izake ne mukajende Rebeka
Nunku ndi nkankamana mu malu makole onso bua muanda wa bantu basungula, bua bobo bangate luhandu lua mu Kilisto Yesu ne butumbi bua tshiendelele
Eyowa, nuenu bamane kusabuka musulu wa Yardene, nuimanyike mabue andi nnuambila aa pa mukuna wa Ebale

Hanuahuola bintu bia mu madimi enu, ne kafulaminyi kadi kanukuata bua kushiya bisumbu bikuabo mu madimi enu, kanuhinganyi bua kubiangata; nebikale bia benyi ne bia bana ba nshiya ne bia bakashi ba mu lufuila; nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Solomo Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; yeye kakatamba kunanukila kulonda Yehowa bu muakenza Davidi, tatu wandi
Mulombodi wa bena lukanu, kupesha Yozefe bantu babidi abu bua kubalama
Ikale tshimanyinu tshia mena a bisamba dikumi ne bibidi bia bena Izrayele
Nueyemene Yehowa Nzambi wenu, bua nuenu nujadikibue; nuitabushe baprofete bandi, bua nuenu nuikale ne diakalengele
Aba mbana balume ba Benyamina ku meku abo Bela ne meku a Bena Bela; Ashabele ne meku a Bena Ashabele; Ahilama ne meku a Bena Abalama; Shefufama ne meku a Bena Shefufama; Hufama ne meku a Bena Hufama
Buloba kabuakadi busunguluka, buakadi butuhu, midima yakadihu, Nyuma wa Nzambi wakadi unyunguluka ha mutu ha mai
Yehowa wakatabasha mesu a nsongalume, wakamona mikuna miule tente ne tubalu ne makalu a kahia binyunguluka Elisha
Nuteke meshi enu ku malu a mu diulu, kanuateki ku malu a ha buloba
Hashishe nakababotesha bu kasoka ka buloba, nakabadiata bu bitotshi bia mu misesu, nakabamuanga lasha
Muana mulume wenu wa mukoko neikale muakane ne wa tshidimu tshimue nebamuangate munkatshi mua mikoko anyi mua mbushi

Yehowa udi unanga bibuelelu bia ku Siona Badi bamba malu a kukutumbisha n au, Ndi mela dina dia Lahaba E, nebambe dî edi bualu bua Siona ne, Yehowa neababale bu bandi, hafundeye mena a bantu, ne, Badi bimba misambu ne badi baja maja badi bamba ne, Misambu Yehowa, Nzambi wa luhandu luanyi, Mutendelelu wanyi ufike ku mpala kuebe, Bualu bua mutshima Badi bambala ne bayaya mu Dijimba dia Bafue; Udibo bashiya hatuhu munkatshi mua bafue, Wewe wakundadika mu ndondo wa Dijimba, Tshiji tshiebe tshidi tshinnemeshila bujitu ham bidi hanyi, Wakumusha balunda banyi kundi, wakubateka kule; Mesu anyi adi alua bitayitayi bualu bua makenga
Yuda wakamba ne, Balue n andi kunoko, bamuoshe mu kalua

Munya utu watema bua bantu bakane mu buloba, Nusanke bienu mu Yehowa, nuenu bantu bakane; Psalms Nuimbile Yehowa musambu muhia muhia, Yehowa wakumanyisha bantu luhandu luandi, Wakuyuluka luse luandi lujalame ne lulamatu luandi lua bushuwa kudi Nuelele Yehowa mbila ya disanka, nuenu bonso ba ha buloba; Nuimbile Yehowa misambu ya kumutumbisha n ai ku lunkombe, Nuele mbila ya disanka ku mpala kua Mukelenge, Yehowa mene, diatshimue ne kuela kua mpungi ne ku tshiona tshia dî dia lusengu
Solomo wakitaba ku makonka andi onso; yeye kakamusokoka bualu bumue, wakamuambila malu onso
Bana muanda matekete ba Muena Yuda dina diandi Sekua, muakuidi mimene wa Nzambi, mbakadi benza nunku
Maweja Nangila kutupatula mu ditunga adi ku bukole buende
Kabakalua ne argent yakangatabo ku milambu ya bisambukidi ne ku milambu ya kubuikila n ai mibi mu nsubu wa Yehowa; ei yakadi ya bakuidi

Bakatuma bayidi babo kudiye ne Bena Helode, bakamuambila ne, Muyishi, tudi bamanye ne, Wewe udi muena bushua, udi uyisha bantu nshila wa Nzambi bulelela, wewe kuena utshina bantu, bualu bua kuena ne bualu ne muntu; utuambile mûdi wamba munda muebe: Mbimpe kuha Kaisa mulambu, anyi
Wakabikila Gehazi, wakamuambila ne, Bikila Muena Shunema
Bualu bua bonso bakenza malu mabi, ne badi bahanga kuheta butumbi kudi Nzambi
Yalobama wakadi muimane ku tshioshelu bua kuosheye musenga wa manananshi
Kufila Kuabo kua Buatshiabuatshia Nom

Nunku udie bana bakalelabo bua kufuabo ne tshiole; Muadi wa ku nsubu unvuibue, Kadi wewe, Yehowa, udi mumanye Yelemiya Yehowa wakamba ne, Ya biebe, usumbe mulondo wa dima wakafumbabo kudi mufumbi; bikila bakulu ba munkatshi mua bantu ne bakulu ba munkatshi mua bakuidi; uye n abo mu tshibanda tshia muana mulume wa Hinoma, tshidi ku tshibuelelu tshia tshibi tshia Hâsita, ubambileku mei andi nkuambila
Nempandishe bantu banyi mu bianza bienu; nunku nenumanye ne, Ndi Yehowa
Hakamumanya bantu ba ku muaba au, bakatuma dî ku luseke alu luonso, bakahia ne bena mabedi bonso kudiye; bakamutendekena bua kulengabo ku mubangu wa tshivualu tshiandi; bakalenga mbobo bakakoleshibua
Mose wakaluhuka mu tshitudilu ne bantu bua kusangakena ne Nzambi, bobo bakimana kuinshi kua mukuna
Bantu bakambila Yoshua ne, Nansha, netukuatshile Yehowa mudimu
Kakuena muntu wakubanda mu diulu anu yeye wakufuma mu diulu, Muana wa muntu mene, udi biandi mu diulu
Kadi bakuabo bakamba ne, Muntu eu wakatabasha mesu a wakadi mufofo, kakamanya mua kusungila muntu eu, kafu biandi, munyi
Ku luseke lua ku esete wakenza bilulu tô ne ku coudées makumi atanu
Hakanumusha Yehowa ku Kadeshe bânea ne, Yai bienu, nuhiane buloba bunakanuha; hashishe nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kanuakamuitabusha, kanuakunvua di diandi
Kadi paudi kuyi wenza bimpe, bubi budi bukuimanyine ku tshibi; kadi ukebe mua kubutshimuna
Kukonkanganabu ne: Tshidi Mvidi Mukulu mutuenzele nunku ntshinyi

Wewe neashihe tshimpanga, angata mashi atshi, wateke ku lusongo lua ditshu didi ku tshianza tshia balume tshia Alona, ne ku lusongo lua ditshu ku tshianza tshia balume tshia bana bandi balume, ne ku tshiala tshia ku tshianza tshiabo tshia bukole, ne ku muan a dikasa munene dia ku tshianza tshia balume, umiamine mashi ha tshioshelu tshionso

Muntu eu wakadi mulongeshibue bua nshila wa Mukelenge, ne bualu bua mutshima wandi wakadi musankedile, yeye wakadi wamba ne uyisha malu a Yesu bimpe, mumanye anu bua dibatiza dia Yone; wakabanga kuamba dî mu nsunagoga ne dikima
Nenkuambile bionsu bikalaye mummanyishe

Hakakumbana tshikondo tshia nsongakashi ne nsongakashi kubuela kudi mukelenge Ahashawelosha, hakashikishabo kumuenzela bu muakadi mukenji bualu bua bakashi bua ngondo dikumi ne ibidi, nunku matuku a kulengeshibua kuabo akashika; akadi nunku: ngondo isambombo bakabalengesha ne manyi a mula, ne ngondo isambombo bakabalengesha ne bintu bia dihembu dimpe ne bintu bikuabo bia kulengesha n abi bakashi ; nunku nsongakashi ne nsongakashi wakabuela kudi mukelenge; bakamuha tshintu tshionso tshikasueye hakumukeye mu nsubu wa bakashi bua kuyeye mu nsubu wa mukelenge
Mpindiewu bakadi batusombuela, bua lufu luende
Pavua tubalu tua mvita, matempu ne badi babandapu bia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bibuele mu mayi manene, Maweja Nangila kubibuikila ne mayi
Badi Butamba Bena Isalele Bukole ku Homa Dut
Bu mudi Tatu ne muoyo munda muandi, nunku yeye wakaha Muana kabidi bua kuikaleye ne muoyo munda muandi; yeye wakamuha bukokeshi bua kulumbuluisha, bualu bua yeye udi muana wa muntu
Wakumuka ku mesu kuandi ne nsudi ham bidi handi mitoke tô bu neige
Bakamuelela tshiseba ha nyima ha mpunda, ne yeye wakabandahu

Kakadila Bena Isalele kudi Yehowa bualu bua Bena Midiyana, hashishe Yehowa wakatumina Bena Isalele muprofete; yeye wakabambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Meme nakafuma n enu mu Ejipitu, nakanuhatula mu nsubu wa buhika; nakanusungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu ne mu bianza bia bantu bonso bakadi banukengesha, nakabihata ku mesu kuenu, nakanuha buloba buabo
Mvidi Mukulu kumuambila ne: Meme ndi Mvidi Mukulu wa tatuebe Izake
Kabidi uvua mumuangalajilamu bantu pa buloba bujima
Mose wakamba ne, Yehowa, nda nkusengelela ne, Utume muntu ûdi musue kutuma
Labana wakabuela mu ntenta wa Yakoba ne mu ntenta wa Lea ne mu ntenta ya bena mudimu babo ba bakashi, kakasangana mpingu
Nunku Yonatana wakabika ku mesa ne tshiji tshikole, yeye kakadia bia kudia dituku dibidi dia ngondo au; mutshima wandi wakatamba kunyingalala bua Davidi bualu bua tatu wandi wakamuenzela bibi
Nudi bamanye mua kunua luhanza lunkadi ha kunua, anyi

Nunku Hulama wakashikisha mudimu wakakuatshileye mukelenge Solomo mu nsubu wa Nzambi; makunshi au abidi ne mpanza ne bintu bilengele biakadi ku mutu kua makunshi, ne bintu bia kulengesha n abi mitu ya makunshi au, ne bifuanyikishi bia mamuma a grenade nkama inai bia kulengesha n abi makunshi, milongo ibidi ya grenade ku dikunshi ku dikunshi bia kuteka ku bintu bilengele biakadi ku mutu kua makunshi
Kadi Petelo wakamuambila ne, Argent yebe ifue n ebe, bualu bua wewe wakulangana meshi ne, Nengangate diha dia Nzambi ku bintu
Ushale n anyi, kutshinyi, bualu bua udi ukeba muoyo wanyi ngudi ukeba muoyo webe kabidi; biwashala n anyi, neulamibue bimpe
Wamba dî edi mu nsubu wa Yakoba, Unvuai bienu dî edi, nuenu bantu bahote ne badi kabayi ne mitshima idi ijingulula; Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Kanuena nuntshina, anyi
Nzambi wakamuha malu akalombeye
Bantu aba kabenaku kabidi; Bena Ashû bakabusungula bua kubufila kudi nyama ya mu tshihela
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Tshidi tshimpe ntshinyi, kuenza malu mimpe dituku dia Lumingu, anyi kuenza malu mabi; kusungila muoyo anyi kûshiha
Hakamona Simona Petelo bualu ebu, wakadihonena hanshi ku binu bia Yesu, wakamba ne, Mukelenge, Umuka kundi, bualu bua meme ndi muntu bubi
Dishone uvua mulele Emdane, Eshebane, Itrane ne Kerane
Katataka nenkuambile dî dia bushuwa
Nunku Davidi ne bantu bandi bakaya mu nshila
Wewe kuakumanya mua kutabala tshituha tshimue tshia diba

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, ndi ne balami ba mikoko tshilumbu; nendombe mikoko yanyi ku tshianza tshiabo, nembakande bua balekele kudisha mikoko yanyi; balami kabena badidisha kabidi; nempandishe mikoko yanyi mukana muabo bua kayikadi bu bia kudia biabo kabidi
Yoshua wakabenzela bu muakamuambila Yehowa: wakakosa tubalu mifingu ya mikono, wakosha makalu abo mu kahia

Bualu bua nakunvua dî bu dia mukashi udi mukuatshike ne didinyenga dia kulela, Yelemiya Endakanai lubilu mu misesu ya mu Yelushalema, Nansha biaditshihabo ne, Wewe Yehowa, mesu ebe kaena amona bualu bulelela, anyi
Tshiakadi ne bifuanyikishi bia mabue a ngashi ha biluwa biatshi, dibue dimue ku luseke elu ne dibue dimue ku luseke lukuabo
Tshituha tshia buloba bunudi nuha Bena Lewi netshikale ku lumbu lua musoko tô ne ku coudées tshinunu ku nseke yonso
Hakalua Yesu mu luseke lua Kaisalia wa Filipoi, wakakonka bayidi bandi ne, Bantu badi bamba Muana wa muntu ne, Nganyi
Bulelela, bionso bidi muntu n abi yeye neabifile bua kusungila muoyo wandi
Yeye wakenza midimu ya bungi mu misoko ya Bena Yuda; wakadi ne bena nvita ba bukitu mu Yelushalema

Mona, ndi nkuha ba mu nsunagoga wa Satana, ba munkatshi mua badi badiamba ne, Tudi Bena Yuda, ne kabena nunku, kadi badi bashima; mona, nembavuishe bua kuluabo ne bua kukukuilabo ku makasa ebe, ne bua kumanyabo ne nakukusua
Padi muntu mulume nansha mukaji muikale ne bilundu ku mutu, nansha ne mputa ku tshibanga, mutuangaji amukenkete
Yehowa nealue n enu ne mukelenge unuakateka ku mutu kuenu kudi tshisamba tshinudi kanuyi bamanye, nansha nuenu nansha bankambua benu; nenutendeleleku nzambi mikuabo ya mitshi ne mabue
Solomo wakadi ne nsubu ya tubalu tua makalu andi binunu makumi anai, ne bantu bakenda ha nyima ha tubalu binunu dikumi ne bibidi
Mu ditunga dia Kenaane, tuyaya kuenza tshinyi
Mona, didi bualu bua dikema
Munkatshi mua bana ba bakuidi bakadi babake bakashi ba bende bakasangana bantu nunku: ba bana ba Yeshua, muana wa Yozadaka, ne bana babo Mâseya ne Eliezê ne Yaliba ne Gedaliya
Ndi nuambila ne, Muntu yonso udi ne bintu, nebamuhe binga; kadi muntu yonso udi kai ne tshintu nebamunyenge tshidiye n atshi
Muanjelo wa Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Angata munyinyi ne mikata idi kayiyi ne luevene, ubiteke ha mutu ha dibue edi, witshikishe nsuhu
Yeye wakalua n au kudiye, yeye wakadia, wakalua kudiye ne nvinyo, yeye wakanua
Bakamulenga bianza, bakamukuata
Wakadi ne bidimu makumi asatu ne bibidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu muanda mukulu

Mukelenge wa Ashû wakamanya ne, Hoshea udi ungelela tshifufu; bualu bua yeye wakatuma ba messager kudi So, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, kakafila milambu kudi mukelenge wa Ashû bu muakadiye wenza ku tshidimu ku tshidimu; nunku mukelenge wa Ashû wakamukuata, wakamusuika mu nsubu wa lukanu
Hezikiya eu wakakanga mushimi wa mai a ku mutu kua Gihona, wakâlombola ku luseke lua ku wesete kua musoko wa Davidi
Naftali uvua mulele bana ba balume banayi: Yasiyele, Nguni, Yesere ne Shileme
Eku nkuidikisha kua tshioshelu tshia milambu ku luidi lua coudées, luidi lua coudées ludi coudée umue ne ntanta wa tshianza
Hakabalekelabo, bakahingana kudi bana babo, bakabamanyisha malu onso akabambila bakuidi banene ne bakulu
Bakamukonka ne, Yeye udi hanyi
Buonso buabo bakakolesha mitshima yabo, ne bobo bine bakangata bia kudia
Bena Gada bakasa Dibona ne Atalota ne Aloe ne Atalota shofana ne Yazê ne Yogebeha, ne Betenimela ne Betehalana, misoko yakadi ne mpangu ya mabue, ne mpangu ya mikoko
Wewe neubafile mu bianza bia Bena Isalele, anyi

Bena Pâtia ne Bena Madai ne Bena Elama, ne badi bashikame mu Mesopotamia, ne mu Yudaya ne mu Kapadokia, ne mu Ponto ne mu Asia, ne mu Fugia ne mu Pampulia, ne mu Ejipitu ne mu nseke ya Libue ne Kulene, ne ba ku Lomo badi basomba kunoko, ne Bena Yuda ne ba bende bakitabusha bualu bua Bena Yuda, ne Bena Kulete ne Bena Alaba, tudi tunvua bantu aba bamba mianda minene ya Nzambi mu miaku yetu
Bualu bua difuka dia bantu nediluhuke mu Yelushalema, nedihanduke ku mukuna wa Siona; lukunukunu lua Yehowa nebimane bualu ebu
Nuenu kutombokela Maweja Nangila, kuya anu ku mikuna ayi

Mu diba dionso dindi ngamba dî dianyi bua tshisamba anyi bua bukelenge, bua kubijula ne bua kubitshibula ne bua kubibutula; biakudimuna bantu ba mu tshisamba atshi tshiakuamba di bualu buatshi mitshima yabo, meme hanyi nenkudimune mutshima wanyi bua dikenga dinakelangana meji bua kubakengesha n adi
Wakenza mbote ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi atanu bua kutuangasha bilulu bia nsubu bu nsubu umue
Filipo wakahueka ku musoko wa Samalea, wakabanga kubambila bua Kilisto
Nunku mundidimbi wa diba wakahingana bidiatshilu dikumi ha tshidikishilu tshia diba ku tshidiatshilu kuakabangau kuhueka diambedi
Mukalenga mupiamupia, uvua kayi mumanye Yozefe, kudia bukalenga mu Ejipitu
Bana ba balume ba Mika: Pitona ne Meleke ne Talea ne Ahaza
Romans Nunku bualu bua tuakabingishibua ku ditabusha, tuikale ne ditalala ne Nzambi bua Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto
Meme nakitaba ne, Nansha, mukelenge wanyi
buludiki bwa bilumbulwilu, bwa nzubu ya buloko ne tshinyongopelu ne ya mashika;
Abiya wakasa mualu wa nvita ne bena nvita ba bukitu binunu nkama inai; Yalobama wakaluangana n andi ne bena nvita ba bukitu binunu nkama muanda mukulu
Nenuikale bantu banyi, nengikale Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bualu kai kanuena ne di bua kuhingisha mukelenge
Yeye ne Samuele bakaya, bakashikama mu Nayota
Teka tshiamu etshi munda mua nseke mai ya tshioshelu ne hankatshi, mu bule buatshi
Au mmeku a bana balume ba Ashê, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi atanu ne bisatu ne nkama mai
Bikala muena musoko mulale ne mukashi webe, wewe wakadi kutuvuisha mu mulau

Yeye wakabambila ne, Bunudi n abu mbua kuenza nunku: tshituha tshienu tshisatu tshialua dituku dia Lumingu netshikale balami ba nsubu wa mukelenge, tshituha tshisatu tshikuabo netshikale ku tshibi tshia ku Sû; ne tshituha tshisatu tshikuabo netshikale ku tshibi ku nyima kua balami aba; nunku nenumanye mua kulama nsubu bua muntu kabuedi
Kumvuanganabu bua kuluangana mvita
Kadi bobo bakamuambila ne, Nansha, netuhingane n ebe kudi bana benu
Ba mu Italia badi banutumina muoyo
Nufike nende kumpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bua mmumanyishe mikenji yanyi
Tuakahaula bintu ku luseke lua Sude lua Bena Kelete ne lua Bena Yuda ne lua Kaleba; luakosha Sikelaga ne kahia
Kadi ngombe ivua minyane bikole mimane kudia ngombe muanda mutekete ya mubidi muimpe ayi, ivua mishale anu bu idi kayiyi midie tshintu

Miehu muanda mutekete mikese yakadi mifubidile ku luhehele luakafuma ku esete, yakadiundila kuinshi kua mikuabo, ne miehu nukese yakadia miehu muanda mutekete miakane, meme nakatshiawila benu majimbu, kadi nansha umue wabo wakamanya mua kutshinjinguluila
Eli wakamba ne, Ebu mbualu bua Yehowa; enze biandi malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuandi

Wakajingila nkanu mifindakasha ne miluka ya kulengesha n ai bibuiku biakadi ku mutu wa makunshi, nkanu muanda mutekete ku tshibuiku tshimue, nkanu muanda mutekete ku tshibuiku tshikuabo, Wakenza makunshi nunku: wakateka nkanu ei mu milongo ibidi bua kulengesha n ai bibuiku biakadi ku mutu wa makunshi; Wakenza tshibuiku tshikuabo diatshimue
Mpumbu wa mbushi udi mukelenge wa Bena Gelika; lusengu lua hankatshi ha mesu andi ludi mukelenge wa kumudilu
Hashishe bakakuata mukelenge, bakaya n andi kudi mukelenge wa Babulona ku Libela; yeye wakamulumbuluishaku
Wakabituma luendu lua matuku asatu hankatshi ha Labana ne Yakoba, Yakoba wakadisha bimuna bikuabo bia Labana biakashala ku nyima
Nakalua n andi kudi bayidi bebe, bobo kabakamanya mua kushikisha disama diandi
Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Witabusha unatuma neangitabushe meme; wangitabusha meme neitabushe wakuntuma
Yeye kututendakena ulomba luse, tuetu kubenga kumufuila luse
Yeye wakamba ne, Muan a mukala utshidi mushale; mona, yeye udi ulama mikoko
Esetê wakateka Môdekai ha mutu ha nsubu wa Hamana
Tudi bamanye ne, Mei onso adi mikenshi yamba, idi yâmbila badi munshi mua mikenshi, bua kubuikila mukana muonso, ne bua ba ha buloba bonso babueshibue munshi mua dilumbuluisha dia Nzambi
Muntu kai udi mulenduishibue, ne tshishi tshianyi katshi tshitema
Anyi wewe kabidi, udi uhetula muan enu bua tshinyi
Kadi Paulo wakamba ne, Ndi Muena Yuda wa ku Tâso wa mu Kilikia, ndi bianyi wa musoko udi kawi wa hatuhu
wa Gela, wakaluhuka, wenda umuhenda hakatshidiye ulua
Dina diebe ditumbishibue tshiendelele; bantu bambe ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi Nzambi ku mutu kua Bena Isalele; tshiota tshia muntu webe Davidi netshijadikibue tshiendelele ku mpala kuebe
Ne bantu bakoshila ne luiya lukole; bakahenda dina dia Nzambi udi ne bukokeshi ha mutu ha makenga â; ne kabakukudimuna mitshima yabo bua kumutumbisha
Bualu mmulambu wa kuosha, udi ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Matuku au Yesu wakafuma ku Nazaleta wa Galela, wakabatijibua kudi Yone mu musulu wa Yadene
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi tshiakabidi ne, Angata mukaba uwakula, udi mu tshifuka tshiebe, juka, uye ku musulu wa Pelata, ûsokokeku mu mutanta wa dibue
Yesu wakadi wamba bua lufu luandi; kadi bobo bakadi bela meshi ne, Budiye wamba anu bua tulu
Nyeye wawa mu njila bua kumonangana nebe
Yehowa wakakuenzela bu muakambeye mukana muanyi
Hashishe, nakajuka, nakakuatshila mukelenge mudimu wandi
Nakadi kusua ne wikale nasha ku mashika anyi ku kahia
Mitshi ei yakatamba bule, nunku bakamanya mua kuntangila mu muaba wa tshijila; kadi kabakamanya mua kuntangila ha bule; idiku tô ne ku dituku edi
Muoyo kawena utamba bidia, anyi
Nanku nyama ya mu bikumbi inudi mua kulambula mu tshibilu etshi nyoyi eyi: ngombe, mikoku ne mbuji
Hashishe, Yobo wakajuka, wakahanda muzabi wandi, wakabeya nsuki ya ku mutu, wakatua mpala wandi hanshi, wakatendelela Nzambi
Bantu bonso bakabalabo ba mu tshitudilu tshia Dana bakadi binunu lukama ne makumi atanu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama isambombo

Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mioyo ya bantu asunguile bantu bandi muntu udi mumanye mua kuya ku mpala kuabo, udi mumanye mua kulua kudibo, udi mumanye mua kubalombola, udi mumanye mua kulua n abo mu buloba, bantu ba Yehowa kabikadi bu mikoko idi kayiyi ne mulami
Hakafikabo, bakimana ku mushimi wa mai udi hehi ne nshila wa mu muaba wa muvu wa bilulu
Bualu badi mua kumushipa mu mvita, muntu mukuabu kuvua kuangata nzubu awu

Matayo Hakamona Yesu bisumbu bia bantu, wakabanda ku mukuna; hakashikameye, bayidi bandi bakatua kudiye; yeye wakabulula mukana muandi, wakabayisha ne: Badi bahele mu mitshima yabo badi ne disanka, bua bukelenge bua mu diulu budi buabo
Dilonga diakadihu diule tente ne nvinega; bakateka musukulampampa mûsha tente ne nvinega ku mutshi wa hisopa, bakauteka ku mishiku yandi
Dilekedibwa anyi dipeepeja dia bitadi didi mwa kwenzeka anu mu diswa dia mêyi a ditunga
Bana ba Atê wa Hezikiya makumi tshitema ne muanda mukulu
Mukashi wakashia mulondo wandi wa mai, wakaya ku musoko, wakambila bantu ne, Luai numone muntu wakungambila malu onso anakenzenza; nyeye Kilisto, anyi
Yobo Udi mumanye mua kuhatula ngandu mu mai ne ndobo, anyi
Mukelenge wa Ejipitu kakumuka mu buloba buandi kabidi, bualu bua mukelenge wa Babulona wakanyenga makelenge onso akadi malamate mukelenge wa Ejipitu ku kasulu ka Ejipitu tô ne ku musulu wa Pelata
Nehemiya gouverneur wakadi ne Ezela muakuidi ne mufundi ne Bena Lewi, bakadi bayisha bantu, bakambila bantu bonso ne, Dituku edi didi dia tshijila kudi Yehowa Nzambi wenu, kanujingi, kanutedi mua dî

Nshobo ya kumudilu wa Asafa yakakuata Yosefe; mibidi yakakuata Gedaliya; yeye ne bana babo bakadi dikumi ne babidi; misatu yakakuata Zakû ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; mmai yakakuata Yiseli ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; mitanu yakakuata Netanya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; misambombo yakakuata Bukia ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya muanda mutekete yakakuata Yeshalela ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya muanda mukulu yakakuata Yeshaya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya tshitema yakakuata Matanaya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi yakakuata Shimei ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne umue yakakuata Azalele ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne ibidi yakakuata Hashabeya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne isatu yakakuata Shubaele ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne inai yakakuata Matitiya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne itanu yakakuata Yelemota ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne isambombo yakakuata Hananya ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne muanda mutekete yakakuata Yoshebekasha ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne muanda mukulu yakakuata Hanani ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya dikumi ne tshitema yakakuata Maloti ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya makumi abidi yakakuata Eliata ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya makumi abidi ne umue yakakuata Hotî ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya makumi abidi ne ibidi yakakuata Gidaleti ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya makumi abidi ne isatu yakakuata Mahaziota ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi; ya makumi abidi ne inai yakakuata Lomameti ezê ne bana bandi ne bana babo dikumi ne babidi
Bualu bobu abu badi bitaba badi benza malu a majimbu, babuka mbuku
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Nansha, mukelenge wanyi, wewe muntu wa Nzambi, kudingi muntu webe mukashi
Bialala mukashi ne nyama, nebashihe mukashi ne nyama kabidi, mashi abi neikale ham bidi habi
Bualu bua luhetu luau lua ku kuendulula kua mushinga neluikale bintu bia kukuatshisha n abi bantu badi bashikame ku mpala kua Yehowa, bua bobo bikale ne bia kudia bikumbane ne bivualu bimpe

Kabidi, nuenu nuakunyua dî diakambilabo bantu ba kale ne, Kuditshihi tshianana, wenzele Nzambi mitshihu yebe; kadi meme ndi nuambila ne, Kanuditshihi; ne kudi diulu, bualu bua diulu didi nkuasa wa butumbi wa Nzambi; ne kudi buloba, bualu bua buloba budi tshitekelu tshia makasa andi; ne kudi Yelushalema, bualu bua Yelushalema udi musoko wa Mukelenge Munene

Nuvuluke matuku a diambedi, nuelangane meji a bidimu ne bikondo bia bungi: Hakaha Nzambi wa mu diulu bisamba buhianyi buabi, Tshituha tshia buhianyi bua Yehowa mbantu bandi; Yeye wakasangakena n andi mu muaba wa hatuhu, mu tshihela muakadi luhehele nkayalu; Bu mudi nyunyu wa mukanku unyungisha disua diandi, Yehowa nkayandi wakamulombola, Yeye wakamubandisha ha mutu ha miaba mile ya ha buloba, Wakamudisha manteke a mabele a ngombe, ne mabele a mbushi, Kadi Yeshuluna wakavunda, wakatua mikumu: Bakamufuisha mukau ne nzambi ya bende; Bakashihela ba demon badi kabayi Nzambi nyama, Nuakulekela Dibue diakanufuka, Yehowa wakatangila bualu ebu, wakadi n abo tshiji, Yehowa wakamba ne, Nenkudimune mesu anyi kudibo, Bakunfuisha mukau ne tshintu tshidi katshiyi Nzambi, Bualu bua kahia kakatemeshibua mu tshiji tshianyi, Nententekashe malu mabi ha mitu habo, nzala neyibanyange, makala a kahia ne makenga makole neabashihe, Muele wa nvita neubashihe ha bula, Nakadi kuamba ne, Nembamuangalashe kule kuaka, bu meme tshiyi nutshine ne bantu badi n abo lukuna nebanfikishe munda, Bualu bua bobo badi bu tshisamba tshia bantu badi kabayi ne lungenyi, Bu bobo bikale ne lungenyi, bakadi kujingulula bualu ebu, Muntu umue wakadi kumanya mua kuihata tshinunu tshia bantu, Bualu bua dibue diabo kadiena bu Dibue dietu Bualu bua mitshi yabo ya tumuma tukese idi bu mitshi ya mu Sodoma ne ya mu madimi a Amola: nvinyo yabo idi bu lulengu lua nyoka, Lulengu elu kaluena lusokoma kundi, Kusombuela kudi kuanyi, ne difutu kabidi, Bualu bua Yehowa nealumbuluile bantu bandi bilumbu biabo, Yehowa neambe ne, Nzambi yabo idi kudi kunyi, yakadia manyi a nyama yakadibo bamushihela, Katataka, tangilai, anu meme nkayanyi, nYeye mene, Bualu bua ndi mbandisha tshianza tshianyi kulu Binatuisha muele wanyi wa nvita, Nenvuishe mikete yanyi bu mukuatshiki wa maluvu bualu bua mashi abo, Nuenu ba bisamba bionso, sankai ne bantu bandi, Mose wakalua, wakambila bantu mei onso a musambu eu mu matshu abo, yeye ne Hoshea, muana mulume wa Nuna
Yeye wakamanya ne, Bobo bakumufila bualu bua mukau
Ne ebu mbumanyishi ne, Nzambi wakatuha muoyo wa tshiendelele, ne muoyo eu udi munda mua Muana wandi

Hakahita matuku asatu, dituku adi diakadi dituku dia kuledibua kua Palo, yeye wakalambishila bantu bandi bidia bia disanka, ne yeye Wakabikila kahita ka bana maluvu ne kahita ka bena bidia ku mesu kua bantu bandi
Hagâ wakalelela Abalama muana mulume Abalama wakidika dina dia muana wakamulelela Hagâ ne, Yishemaele
Kunyungulukabu ditunga dia Edome
Wakangata dianyi dionso diakadi ha bintu bia munda ne lukutu lua mutshima ne tumuma tubidi ne dianyi diatu, Mose wakabisha ha tshioshelu
Hakabala Yehudi mabeshi asatu anyi anai, mukelenge wakâkosa ne kele, wakaela mu kahia kakadi muiku tô ne hakahia mukanda mujima mu kahia kakadi muiku
Yeye wakabambila ne, Dimukai bua bualu bunudi nunyua; nebanuidikishile bintu ne luidi lunudi nubidikishila n alu kabidi; nebanuhe binga bintu ba mutu

Ne bua bualu ebu, nuenu mene, hanuavudisha disuminyina dionso, ku ditabusha dienu utentekashe buimpe; ne ku buimpe buenu nutentekashe lungenyi; ne ku lungenyi luenu nutentekashe didikanda; ne ku didikanda dienu nutentekashe didikankamika; ne ku didikankamika dienu nutentekashe buimpe bua Nzambi; ne ku buimpe bua Nzambi buenu nutentekashe dinangangana dia bana benu; ne ku dinangangana dienu dia bana benu nutentekashe luse

Tangilai, diakalengele diabo kadiena dilua kudibo ku bukole buabo, Misangu bungi munyi idibo bajima muinda wa bantu babi, anyi Nzambi udi ubatahuluila ntatu Misangu ya bungi idibo bu bisonsa ku luhehele, Nudi nuamba ne, Nzambi udi ukengesha bana ba muntu mubi bua bubi bua tatu wabo; Mesu andi mene amone kubutuka kuandi, Bua yeye udi ne disanka kai kudi ba mu nsubu muandi badi bashala ku nyima kuandi Muntu neamanye mua kuyisha Nzambi lungenyi, anyi, Muntu udi ufua hashika bukole buandi, Mpanza yandi idi miule tente ne mabele, Mukuabo udi ufua ne mutshima unyingalala bikole, Bubidi buabo badi balala mu Bushuwa, ndi mumanye meji enu, Bualu bua nudi nuamba ne
Bena Isalele bakadila kudi Yehowa, bamba ne, Tuetu tuakakuenzela bibi, bualu bua tuetu tuakalekela Nzambi wetu, tuakakuatshila Babâla mudimu
bua bobo kabakatshumanya Mose wakabambila ne, Tshidi bidia biakunuha Yehowa bua kudia
Nakukengesha muntu kai tshianana
Bualu ebu budi munyi budi bamonyi aba bakubanda
Omeli Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; wakatamba bonso ba diambedi bubi
Kuelaye bianza mulu kudi Maweja Nangila
Hashishe, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Zekâya ne, Yehowa wa misumba wakamba ne, Kosai bilumbu ne dikosa dia bushuwa, leshanganai dinanga ne nufuilangane luse, muntu ne muntu ne mukuabo
Kadi hakatshiabu Bena Isalele bonso bakatontolola Mose ne Alona ne, Nuenu nuakushiha bantu ba Yehowa
Nzambi munda mua Kilisto wakadi ulengesha ba ha buloba kudiye, kakababadila malu mabi abo, ne wakateka munda muetu dî dia kulengeshisha bakuabo kudiye
Bualu bua yeye wakenda mu nshila yonso ya Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, ne mu malu mabi onso akenzesheye Bena Isalele bua kufuishabo Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, tshiji bua mpingu yabo

Hashishe, Yoshua wakabikila bantu dikumi ne babidi bakasunguleye munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, muntu wa mu tshisamba ne tshisamba; Yoshua wakabambila ne, Hitai ku mpala kua mushete wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munkatshi mua Yadene, muntu ne muntu ambule dibue, aditeke ha diaha diandi, bu bungi bua bisamba bia Bena Isalele; nunku mabue au neikale munkatshi muenu bu tshivulukidi, ne hanukonka bana benu mu tshikondo tshialua ne, Mabue â ntshinyi
Nsongakashi udi usankisha mutshima wa mukelenge ikale mukelenge mukashi mu muaba wa Washeti
Ebu mbualu bua hatuhu ne mudimu wa lutatu
Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangisha kudi mukelenge Solomo bua kudiabo bidia bia disanka mu ngondo wa Etanima udi ngondo wa muanda mutekete
Bungi bua bantu bakalaka, bateke bianza ku mishiku, buakadi balume nkama isatu; kadi bantu bonso bakuabo bakatua binu hanshi bua kunuabo mai
Nemukume, nemulekele
Yesu wakamba ne, Nengikale n enu tshituha tshihi, hashishe nenye kudi wakuntuma
Bana ba balume ba Yisehâ: Kola ne Nefege ne Zikeli
Yehowa wakunvua
Alona ne bana bandi balume nebadie munyinyi wa tshimpanga ne bidia bidi mu tshisaka ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusangakena
Misambu Disanka didi kudi muntu Kadi disanka diandi didi mu mikenji ya Yehowa, Yeye udi bu mutshi Bantu babi kabena nunku nansha, Nunku bantu babi kabena bajalame halua kulumbuluisha kuabo
Ku dituku adi tô bakadi basangisha dî diabo bua kumushiha
Hakafika diba dia kudia, wakatuma muntu wandi bua kuambila bakadiye mubikile diambedi ne, Luai, bualu bua bintu bionso bidi bilongolola

Budikadidi bwa batshikuma mbila, budikadidi mu dimanyisha ne dimwangalaja dia ngumu ku tudiomba ne bindidimbi, bifundibwa, bibejibeji anyi mushindu mukwabo ônso wa dimanyishangana dia mianda udi mwanyishibwa, kadi anu mu dineemeka dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso, dia bibidilu bia mulowo ne dia mapa a muntu mukwabo yônso
Bakadi bakonkangana ne, Watubunguluishila dibue didi ku lukita nganyi
Hakafika mukanda kudibo, bakakuata bana balume ba mukelenge makumi muanda mutekete, bakabashiha, bakateka mitu yabo mu bisaka, bakamutuminayi ku Yizelele
Wewe neuwelehu manyi ne musenga wa manananshi tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia mulambu wa bukula
Bualu bua wakalama dî dia kutantamana kuanyi, nenkulame kabidi ku diba dia kuteta, diodio didi diamba kulua kudi ba ha buloba bonso, bua kuteta badi bikala ha buloba

Mu dituku diakamutekeye mulami wa nsubu wandi ne wa bintu biandi bionso biaka diye n abi, Yehowa wakavudishila bonso bakadi mu nsubu wa Muena Ejipitu masanka, bualu bua Yosefe Disanka dia Yehowa diakadi ku bintu bionso biakadiye n abi mu nsubu muandi ne bia mu madimi andi kabidi
Usuikakaje nkanu ya bijengu idi ku tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi, ne idi ku tshilamba tshia efode ne muonji mufikuluke
Bualu ebu kabuena bunusankisha
Nulue kudi muakuidi wa mu matuku au, numuambile ne, Ndi nkuambila lelu ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ne, Nakubuela mu buloba buakaiaya Yehowa batatu betu, bua kutuhabu
Kadi Yozefe udi ukuata buta bikole
Katataka ya biebe, uye ne bantu ku muaba unakukuambila, tangila, muanjelo wanyi neaye ku mpala kuebe, kadi dituku dinalua kudibo, nembenzele kabidi bu mudi bubi buabo
Kadi ku nyima bakakudimuna muanda eu, bakahingasha bahika aba bakadibo bahikula, ne balume ne bakashi, bakababuesha mu buhika tshiakabidi
Tabalai misangu yonso, nutendelele Nzambi mua kuikala ne bukole bua kuhanduka mu malu â onso alua, ne bua kuimana ku mesu kua Muana wa muntu
Nakunvua kutontolola kua Bena Isalele kudibo bantontolola n aku
Muena Peleshete wakela Davidi mulau mu mena a nzambi yandi

Tangilai, ndi ne bana bakashi babidi badi kabayi banze kumanya balume, binuitabusha, nendue n abo kunudi, nubenzele bu munudi basue, kadi kanuenji balume aba bualu, bualu bua bobo bakulua mu diledi dia nsubu wanyi
Maweja Nangila kuenza bishima bishilangane bivua bikuatshisha bantu bowa

Mulambu wa bia kudia wikale tshihiminu tshia épha tshimue bua kufila ne tshimpanga, ne mulambu wa bia kudia wa kufila ne bana ba mikoko wikale bu mudiye mumanye mua kufila, ne tshihiminu tshia manyi tshia hin tshifidibue ne épha ne épha
Ku yoyi ayi bavua bumushile Maweja Nangila

Corinthians Paulo, mubikidibue mupostolo wa Yesu Kilisto bua disua dia Nzambi, ne Sosetene, muan etu wa mu Kilisto, tudi tufunda mei kudi bena ekelesia ba Nzambi badi mu Kolinto, bajidibue mu Kilisto Yesu, babikidibue bua kuikalabo basanto, ne kudi bonso badi babikila dina dia Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto mu muaba wonso, Mukelenge wabo ne wetu kabidi
Pikala muntu mufue lufu lua tshikosu pabuipi nende, matuku ende a tshijila mmanyanguke, bualu udi ne mikiya bua tshitalu atshi

Dituku dikuabo yeye wakadi uyisha bantu; Bafalese ne bayishi ba mikenshi ya Mose bakadi bashikame ha buihi, bafume ku misoko yonso ya Galela ne ya Yudaya ne ku Yelushalema; bukole bua Mukelenge buakadi n andi bua kuondaheye n abu bantu
Hakalueye kudiye, yeye wakamusengelela bua yeye kulomba tatu wandi budimi; mukashi wakahuka ha nyima ha mpunda wandi, ne Kaleba wakamuebesha ne, Udi musue tshinyi
Miloho yakumuka, yakahingana kudiye kabidi ne ditaba edi
Lua biebe, wanyi munanga, tuye bietu mu madimi; tushikame bietu mu misoko
Hashishe Sedekiya, muana wa Kenana, wakasemena ha buihi, wakataha Mikaya dilu ku ditama diandi, wakamuebesha ne, Nyuma wa Yehowa wakaya mu nshila kai hakafumeye kundi bua kukuambila dî
Neatendelele mpingu ya mvidie ya mabue, ne ya mitshi misonga, inudi kanuyi banji kumanya ku bankambua benu too ne mpindiewu
Kanutambi kuelangana meshi a makelela, bualu bua makelela neadielelangane meshi

Muena mudimu wakambila Shaula ne, Mona, ndi ne tshituha tshinai tshia nshekele Kale kale mu Isalele hakaya muntu bua kukonkeye Nzambi bualu, wakadi wamba ne, Tuye bietu kudi mumonyi wa malu: bualu bua udibo babikila muprofete katataka, diambedimbedi bakadi bamubikila mumonyi wa malu
Tshikondu atshi ke tshivua bantu batuadija kutendelela Mvidi Mukulu, batela dina dia Maweja Nangila
Hakashikisheye kuamba mei au, yeye wakela mufuba wa lubanga wakadi mu tshianza tshiandi hanshi; bakidika muaba au ne, Lamata lehi

Nzambi, ndi ne bualu bua kumana mitshihu inakuditshiha kûdi; Bualu bua wewe wakuhandisha muoyo wanyi ku lufu, Misambu Unfuile luse, Nzambi, unfuile luse, Nendile kudi Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu diulu, Yeye neantumine luhandu lufume mu diulu, neansungile, Muoyo Wewe, Nzambi, wikale mubandishibue ne butumbi ha mutu ha diulu Bakuandila biendedi bianyi bukuondo; Mutshima wanyi udi mushindame, Nzambi, mutshima wanyi udi Wewe, muoyo Mukelenge, nenkusakid le munkatshi mua bantu; Bualu bua luse luebe lujalame ludi lunene lufika tô ne mu diulu, Wewe, Nzambi, wikale mubandishibue ne butumbi ha mutu ha diulu Misambu Nuenu, bantu banene, nudi nuamba mei makane, anyi
Diambulwisha ku majitu a mbulamatadi didi dikanyika dia muntu yônso udi usanganyibwa mu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Hakafikila dituku diakasungulabo, Helode wakaluata bilulu bia bukelenge, wakashikama ha nkuasa wa butumbi, wakadi ubambila mei mimpe
Tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu tshiakamulonda ne tshia bakashi bakadi badila bamujinga
Yeye wakabanga kubambila ne, Lelu bualu ebu buakafundabo buakujalama mu matshu enu
Hakaluhukabo mu nsubu wa lukanu, bakabuela mu nsubu wa Ludia
Wakamuitaba ne, Muntu webe kakuya kuntu
Kadi bena buatu bakita bikole bua kuhingasha buatu ku mpata hadi bakahanga; bualu bua mai manene akabisha mavuala matambe bunene ku mpala kuabo
Bayidi kabakajingulula malu â; di edi diakabasokoma, kabakamanya malu akambeye
Mêyi ne mikandu adi apeesha mishindu mikwabo yônso ya tshinyangu tshia bâna ba mabeela pa ludimi manyooka makole
Wakabambila ne, Yehowa udi mumanyi wa bualu kunudi, ne wandi wakedibua manyi udi mumanyi wa bualu dituku edi ne kanuakasangana tshintu tshia bende mu tshianza tshianyi
Kadi bena mvita bavua kabayi ne mianzu, bavua balame bintu bionsu bivuabu bapete mu mvita
Alabe kabidi mashi awu ku matumba adi matalame ku tshilambuilu tshia kuoshila manananshi, tshidi muaba wa tshijila
Kadi Paulo wakamana kudisunguila bua kuhita Efeso, bua kakasua kulehesha matuku mu Asia; wakadi uya lukasa ne, Binamanya mua kufika ku Yelushalema ha dituku dia Pentekoste
Eliyabe, muana wa Palu, uvua ne bana balume basatu: Nemuyele, Datane, ne Abirame
Yeye wakadia bikole, Bena Ejipitu ne bantu ba mu nsubu wa Palô bakunvua muadi wandi
Yeshaya wakamba ne, Unvuai bienu, nuenu ba mu tshiota tshia Davidi
Bantu ba mu maloba onso bakalua mu Ejipitu kudi Yosefe bua kusumbabo bia kudia, bualu bua tshiole tshiakadi tshikole mu maloba onso
Mu dinda udi umina nyama

Kadi biahidieye kuhikula budimi, anyi bikaleye muhanyishe muntu mukuabo budimi, kabena mua kubuhikula kabidi, kadi halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene hahingashabo budimi mu bia nza bia banfumu babu, budimi ebu nebuikale bua tshijila kudi Yehowa, nebuikale mu bianza bia muakuidi
Ne wakabulula mukana muandi bua kubendeye Nzambi bihendu; bua kuhendeye dina diandi ne nsubu wandi wa tshilulu, bobo mene badi bikala mu diulu

Hakafikeye kunshi kua mukuna wa Oleve, tshisumbu tshionso tshia bayidi bakabanga kusanka ne kutumbisha Nzambi ne dî dikole bua malu onso a kukema akumonamonabo, bakamba ne, Mukelenge udi ulua mu dina dia Nzambi atumbishibue; ditalala dikale mulu ne butumbi mu diulu
Davidi ne bantu bandi bakaya, bakahaula bintu bia Bena Geshû ne Bena Gêze ne Bena Amaleka: aba bakadi bena buloba ba diambedi, bakadi bashikama mu nshila udi uya ku Shû tô ne ku buloba bua Ejipitu
Menahema wakaha Pula ntalanta ya argent tshinunu, bua yeye amukuatshishe bua kujadikeye bukelenge mu tshianza tshiandi
Muntu eu wakuenza bualu bubi kai
Asa wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika mu lukita lua batatu bandi mu musoko wa Davidi, tatu wandi
Bena Amona bakadisangisha ku misoko yabo yonso bua kuluanganabo

Biumuka Muena Lewi ku umue wa misoko ya mu Isalele, muakadiye ushikama, bua kubuela ne mutshima wandi wonso mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula, hashishe yeye neanuenzele mudimu mu dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wandi; bu mudi bana babo, Bena Lewi, batu bimana ku mesu kua Yehowa, benza
Kadi muntu udi wambila bantu dî dia Nzambi udi wakula n abo bua kubadiundisha, bua kubasamba, ne bua kubakolesha mitshima
Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi upatula mêyi bilondeshila makanyika adibo balongolola kudi Dîyi dikulu dia mpindiewu
Kanungu ka Budikadidi bwa kulonda mianda ya diaakwila beena mudimu budi bumanyike ne bujadikibwe
Monai
Kadi bakalomba Paulo bua kumulamabo tô ne ku dikosa dia tshilumbu tshiandi kudi Augusto, nakabambila bua kumulamabo tô ne hanamanya mua kumutuma kudi Kaisa
Kuonso kuakayeye, mu misoko mikese ne mu bimenga ne mu mpata, bakateka bena mabedi mu bisalu bakamutendekena bua kulengabo ku mubangu wa tshivualu tshiandi; bakadi bamulenga mbobo bakakoleshibua
Nunku yeye wakangambila ne, Tangila, nakakuha tunvi tua ngombe bu nkunyi mu muaba wa tunvi tua muntu, bua wewe ulambehu bia kudia biebe

Mu dituku dibidi nenufile bana balume ba ngombe dikumi ne babidi ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi budi, bu mudi mukenji wamba, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Kanuibi, kanudingidianganyi, kanushimianganyi
Hakadiambabo ne, Tudi bena lungenyi, bakalua bahote
Nunku Davidi wakasangisha bintu bia bungi diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua
Hakashikisheye kubowesha, wakambula bivualu biandi, wakashikama ku mesa kabidi, wakabakonka ne, Nudi bamanye bunakunuenzela
Enzai nunku ne ngombe yenu ne mikoko yenu kabidi, muana neikale ne mamu wandi matuku muanda mutekete, kadi numufile kundi dituku dia muanda mukulu
Kadi katataka Yehowa wakatula dia, wakatuma mu bianza bia Bena Midiyana
Mukelenge wakabebesha ne, Kutumbisha kai kuakatumbishabo n aku Môdekai bua bualu ebu
Tuma dî ku Yopa, ubikile Simona udibo babikila ne, Petelo; yeye udi ulala mu nsubu wa Simona mukuonyi wa biseba udi hehi ne mai
Bonsu ne: Enze
Kumulekedi uya, kayi ne tshintu

Kadi yeye, mûle tente ne Nyuma Muimpe, wakatangila mulu talala, wakamona butumbi bua Nzambi, ne Yesu muimane ku tshianza tshia bukole tshia Nzambi, wakamba ne, Monai, ndi ntangila diulu dibululuke, ne Muana wa muntu muimane ku tshianza tshia bukole tshia Nzambi
Bakamba nunku ku mpala kua mukelenge
Kabeena mwa kukosela muntu tshibawu tshinene tshipita etshi tshidibo mwa kukosa dîba didi tshilema tshienzeka
Yeye wakambila bantu ne, Shikamai hanshi; wakamema mitanda muanda mutekete ne mishiha; wakatendelela Nzambi, wakabitshibula, wakabifila mu bianza bia bayidi, bayidi bakaha bantu
Wakakuatshila Bala mudimu, wakamutendelela bua kufuisha Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, tshiji bu muakenza tatu wandi
Bikala nsuki ya muntu mituke, ne bikaleye muena dibala, yeye udi muakane
Ne malu onso anudi nuenza, ne mu mei ne mu bienzedi, enzai onso mu dina dia Mukelenge Yesu; nusakidile Nzambi Tatu bua bualu buandi
Bua tuetu tuakulua babanyanganyi ne Kilisto, bitualamata ku tshibangidilu tshia dieyemena dietu tô ne kunshikidilu; hambabo ne, Bua banganyi, hakunvuabo dî dia Nzambi, bakafikisha munda muandi

Joshua Ku nyima hakunvua Yabina, mukelenge wa Hasô, lumu elu, yeye wakatuma di kudi Yobaba, mukelenge wa Madona, ne mukelenge wa Shimelona ne mukelenge wa Akasafa, ne kudi bakelenge bonso ba ku luseke lua nôde lua ku mikuna ne ba mu Alabâ ne kudi Bena Kanâna ba ku esete ne ba ku wesete ne Bena Amole ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Yebuse ba ku mikuna ne Bena Hiwi kuinshi kua mukuna wa Hêmona mu buloba bua Misepa
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale, Nabi, muana mulume wa Wofesi
Bobo kabena ba ha buloba, bu mundi meme tshi wa ha buloba
Ku luseke luabo lukuabo bakasa kudi Melemota, muana wa Uliya, muana wa Hakosa
Nzambi wakadi ne nsongalume, yeye wakadiunda, yeye wakashikama mu tshihela wakalua tshilembi tshidi ne ndudi
Nuenu nuakahingana, nuakadila ku mpala kua Yehowa; kadi Yehowa kakunvua dî dienu, kakateleja matshu andi kunudi

Mêyi ne mikandu adi aleeja ngikadilu wa beena mudimu ne adi akajilula maalu a sungasunga adi atangila bulongolodi bwa mêyi ni mikandu bwa bisumbu bia beena mudimu ne dienza dia midimu didi dikeba kwikala ne dibeji dia kalasa kapwekela ne dia kalasa kakulumpe

Bikaleye mukuambile ne, Tshiena musue kumuka kûdi, bualu bua yeye udi ukunanga ne ba mu nsubu webe, wakabela disanka kûdi, hashishe wewe newangate nkulonda, neumutuhite ditshu ku tshibi ne yeye neikale muhika webe tshiendelele
Muomumue kabidi, hakashikishabo kudia, yeye wakamema luhanza, wamba ne, Luhanza elu ludi dihungila dihia dihia dia mu mashi anyi; misangu yonso inualunua, enzai nunku bua kunvuluka

Hakalueye kutudi, wakangata mukaba wa Paulo, wakadisuika n au ku makasa ne ku bianza, wakamba ne, Nyuma Muimpe udi wamba ne, Bena Yuda ba mu Yelushalema nebasuike muena mukaba eu nunku, nebamufile mu bianza bia bantu ba bende

Bualu bua hakambilabo bantu bonso mukenshi wonso kudi Mose, bu mudi mikenshi yamba, wakangata mashi a bana ba ngombe ne a mbushi bohamue ne mai ne miosa mikunze ne hisopa, ne wakamiamina mukanda muine, ne bantu bonso, wamba ne, Au adi mashi a tshihungidi tshiakanuelela Nzambi mukenshi bualu buatshi
Pashishe nealambule bukula ne mvinyo
Bakalua mu Yelushalema kabidi; hakadiye utambakana mu ntempelo, bakuidi banene ba Nzambi ne bafundi ne bakulu bakalua kudiye; bakamukonka ne, Wewe udi wenza malu â ne bukokeshi kai
Hashishe Hezikiya wakebesha bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bua bisumbu ebi
Nzambi wakasangakena ne Belâma, ne Belâma wakamuambila ne, Nakasa bioshelu muanda mutekete, nakosha mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga ha tshioshelu ne ha tshioshelu
Nanku dituku dia muanda mutekete, mutuangaji neakenkete muntu awu kabidi
Mikolo yabi yakadi milulame; munda mua makasa abi muakadi bu munda mua mukono wa lukungulu lua ngombe, akakenka bu tshiamu tshia mitaku tshinonoke
Kadi diambedi kebai bukelenge buandi ne buakane buandi, nunku nebanuhe bintu ebi bionso
Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, ne Bena Isalele bakabashiha; ne Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, wakamuha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe bu buhianyi buabo
Nenku milambu ayi ishale ya mutuangaji, bualu idi ya tshijila
Uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, udijidile, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Yalobama wakambila mukashi wandi ne, Bika, ndi nkusengelela ne, Udifuanyishe bu muntu mukuabo, bua bantu kabakumanyi bu mukashi wa Yalobama, uye ku Shilo kudi Ahiya, muprofete wa Nzambi, wakangambila ne, Wewe newikale mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu aba

Nehemiah Bantu bakateka tshimanyinu tshiabo ku tshihungidi bakadi Nehemiya gouverneur, muana wa Hakaleya, ne Sedekiya, Selaya, Azaya, Yelemiya, Pashû, Amalia, Malakiya, Hatusha, Shebanya, Maluki, Halima, Melemota, Obadaya, Danyele, Ginetona, Baluka, Meshulama, Abiya, Miyamina, Mâzaya, Bilegai, ne Shemaya: aba bakadi bakuidi
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe
Mulau wikale ha buloba, ne kudi mai manene, bualu bua diabolo wakuhueka kunudi, muikale ne tshishi tshikole, mumanye ne, Udi ne musangu muihi

Hakafikeye kunshi kua mukuna wa Oleve, tshisumbu tshionso tshia bayidi bakabanga kusanka ne kutumbisha Nzambi ne dî dikole bua malu onso a kukema akumonamonabo, bakamba ne, Mukelenge udi ulua mu dina dia Nzambi atumbishibue; ditalala dikale mulu ne butumbi mu diulu
Nsuki yende idi ijadika mudiye mudifile bua kuenzela Maweja Nangila mudimu
Bualu bua Yehowa udi munene, budiye n abu mbua kutumbishibua bikole; budiye n abu mbua kunemeshibua ha mutu ha nzambi yonso ya hatuhu
Bana ba balume ba Kame badi: Kushe, Misrayime, Pute ne Kenaane
Kadi bobu bamusangane ne bimuna bivuaye muibe abi bitshikale ne muoyi: ngombe, mpunde, mukoku nansha mbuji, bua tshimuna tshimue neafute bimuna bibidi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Wenze nyoka wa tshiamu tshikunze
Eu mmukalu wa ku luseke lua nôde
Hashishe mukelenge Davidi wakatuma bantu bakamûmusha mu nsubu wa Makî, muana wa Amiele, wa mu Lo debâ
Meme nakabanga kuebesha Nzambi bualu buandi lelu, anyi
Mvua muenze bionsu abi, anu bua bubi bu nuvua benze
Bakadi bimane ha buihi ne Paulo bakamuebesha ne, Udi uhenda muakuidi mimene wa Nzambi, anyi
Bantu aba bakadianjila kuya ku mpala, bakadi batuindila mu Toa
Kakuakadi musoko umue wakahunga dî bua kuikala talalâ ne Bena Isalele, anu Bena Hiwi bakadi bashikama mu Gibeona; bakayinyenga yonso anu ku nvita

Kadi mu diba edi, hakabuela Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, mu buloba ebu tuakambilangana ne, Luai tubande ku Yelushalema bua ditshina dietu dia masalayi a Bena Kasada, ne bua ditshina dietu dia masalayi a Bena Sulia; nunku tudi bashikame mu Yelushalema
Kadi tudi tupikula bamuanabute ba balume ba bantu
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu matuku au ne mu tshikondo atshi bana ba Isalele nebalue, bobo ne Bena Yuda hohamue; nebaye mu nshila wabo, benda badila, nebakebe Yehowa Nzambi wabo
Mukelenge ikale ne muoyo musangu mule
Bimpe; bakuâhula bua huhidia buau, kadi wewe udi ujalamamu bua ditabusha diebe
Ba Bena Yisehâ; Kenanya ne bana bandi balume bakadi ne mudimu wabo ha mbelu ha ntempelo mu Isalele bu bakokeshi ne balumbuluishi

Ne meme tshiakadi ne bua kunyingalala bua Ninewe, musoko au munene, mudi bantu binunu lukama ne makumi abidi badi kabayi mua kujingulula tshianza ne ntshia balume ne ntshia bakashi, ne mudi bimuna bia bungi kabidi, anyi
Kabeena mwa kwaasa Tubinadi twa sungansunga anyi twa tshiumusha to, nansha bôbu batwinyika dîna kayi
Wewe wakuela bana betu dijimbu, kuena mudinjinguluile
Mutshima wa mukelenge Davidi wakasua kuya kudi Abashaloma: bualu bua yeye wakasambibua bualu bua Amenona, bua yeye wakafua
Nengele bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba lupemba bualu buebe
Bena Benyamina bakaluhuka ku Gibea, bakashiha Bena Isalele, bahele hanshi dituku adi, bantu binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi

Kadi Yonatana kakunyua hakakandika tatu wandi bantu ne mutshihu: nunku yeye wakatua lusongo lua mulangala wakadi mu tshianza tshiandi mu dihula dia buitshi, wakela tshianza mukana muandi; mesu andi akatanduka
E, bua Mukelenge, utabale
Tuakabika ku Holeba, tuakenda tô mu tshihela atshi tshinene tshibi tshinuakatangila, ku nshila wa ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, bu muakatuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wetu; tuakalua ku Kadeshe bânea
Mona, baprofete babo badi babambila ne, Kanuena numona muele wa nvita, kanuena nuikala ne tshiole; kadi nuenu nenuikale ne ditalala dia bushuwa mu muaba eu
Bobo bakanyingalasha mutshima wa Isaka ne wa Lebeka
Kadi bikala mukashi ne nsuki yandi mile, ebu mbutumbi kudiye; bua nsuki yakamuhebua bu tshibuikilu
Kadi biwabenga kuluhuka kudi baminyampala ba mukelenge wa Babulona, nunku nenfile musoko eu mu bianza bia Bena Kasada; bobo nebawoshe ne kahia, ne wewe kuena uhanduka mu bianza biabo
Bana ba nyama ya ntambue bakadila muadi wa luonji kudiye, Bana balume ba mu Mempi ne Tapanehese Kadi wewe muine kuena mudikebele bualu ebu Katataka kuya kuebe mu Ejipitu kudi kumuhetesha tshinyi
Nyunyi neyizokole munyinyi webe
Yonatana wakahesha nsongalume bintu biandi, wakamuambila ne, Uye n abi ku musoko

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Unsangishile balume makumi muanda mutekete ba bakulu ba mu Isalele, baudi mumanye ne mbakulu ba bantu, ne bakelenge badi ku mutu kuabo, ulue n abo ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bobo bimaneku n ebe
Tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu bakuabo tshiakaya n abo, ne mikoko ne ngombe ne bimuna bia bungi
Nakadi muye ku Beteleheme yuda; katataka ntshidi nya ku nsubu wa Yehowa, ne kakuena muntu udi umbuesha mu nsubu wandi
Pikala nsongakaji awu ubenga mua kumuka mu ditunga diabu, diditshipa diebe kadiena dikuenzela bualu to
Eu nshikidilu wa malu onso; malu onso adi munvuike
Bushuwa, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba dî edi bua mpanza yonso itshidi ishala mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa Yuda ne mu Yelushalema
Neutuishe milambu yonso ya bukula ne luehu, kanulekedi luehu lua tshihungidi tshia Nzambi mu milambu yenu ya bukula, tuishai milambu yonso ne luehu
Solomo wakatabala, mona, buakadi tshilota

Au mmei akafunda Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, hakasameye ne hakasangaleye ku disama diandi: Nakuamba ne, Nembuele mu bibuelelu bia ku Muaba wa Bafue Nakuamba ne, Tshiena ntangila Yehowa, Bakûmusha nsubu wanyi, bakuntudileye bu mudibo batula nsubu wa ntenta Nakadila tô ne ku dinda
Binuamanya malu â, nenuikale ne disanka binuâenza
Hakadiye umuambila muakabisha Elisha muana ku lufu, mukashi muena muana wakabisheye ku lufu wakadila kudi mukelenge bua nsubu wandi ne bua buloba buandi
Meme Yehowa nakuamba di edi, ne meme nendienze
Akaya n andi bua kumushiha ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Hakadibo bashikame badia, Yesu wakamba ne, Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Muan enu mukuabo neantungile tshitungu, yeye mene udi udia n anyi

Balami ba mikoko ba bungi bakunyanga budimi buanyi bua tumuma tua nvinyo, Bakuluvuisha bu muaba wa hatuhu, Bahaudi bakulua ha mutu ha mikuna yonso Bakukuna maminu a blé, bakuhuola meba; Yehowa udi wamba dî edi bualu bua bena mutumba n anyi babi, badi balenga bianza biabo ha buhianyi bunakuhesha bantu banyi Bena Isalele ne, Monai, nembajule mu buloba buabo, nenjule Bena Yuda munkatshi muabo
Bua kuluisha tshimenga kampande, nudianjile kulomba bena tshimenga atshi bua kubuelamu tshianana, kakuyi mvita to
Bobo nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, wakabahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua meme kuikala munkatshi muabo, ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi wabo
Nuangate balume ba lungenyi lule, banudi bamanye, bungi bua bisamba bienu, nembateke ku mutu kuenu
Mose wakadila kudi Yehowa, wakamba ne, Nengenzele bantu aba tshinyi

Ulengeshe ne udi n ebe lukuna lukasa, hautshidi n andi mu nshila; biwikala kui wenza nunku, udi n ebe lukuna neakufile mu bianza bia mulumbuludi, ne mulumbuludi neakufile mu bianza bia mpolushe, nebakuele mu nsubu wa lukanu
Eliya wakumukaku
Hezikiya wakamba ne, Bionso bia mu nsubu muanyi dî bi a kumona ba; kakuena tshintu tshia munkatshi mua bia mu bibutshilu bianyi tshindi tshiyi mubaleshe
Hakamonabo bana babo ba mu Kilisto, bakabakolesha mitshima, bakaya
Davidi Udi Utamba Bena Peleshete Bukole Sam
Yeye wakasangisha bimuna biandi bionso ne bintu bionso biakangateye mu Padana alama bua kuyeye kudi tatu andi Isaka mu buloba bua Kanana

Kadi bikala mukashi wa mu lufuila ne bana bandi balela anyi bikilu bandi, bobo badianjile kuyila mua kunemeka ba mu diku diabo ne mua kuhingishila baledi babo bintu bia kubakuatshisha n abi; bua bualu ebu mbudi Nzambi witabusha
Nakavula bilulu bianyi, nembiluate munyi
Ku nyima muakuny andi wakahatuka ne tshianza tshiandi tshikuata ku tshikankanyi tshia Esau Bakamuidika dina ne, Yakoba Isaka wakadi ne bidimu makumi asambombo hakamuleleleye bana
Banga badi ku nyima katataka nebikale ku mpala, banga badi ku mpala katataka nebikale ku nyima
Tamare upingana kuabu, kuvulaye tshitambala
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Nuenu nudi nuamba ne, Monai mudi bualu ebu butulonda
Hakunvua bakuidi banene ba Nzambi ne bafalese nsumuinu yandi, bakamanya ne, Yeye udi utuamba tuetu

Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe bakumuka munkatshi mua Bena Isalele mu Shilo wa mu buloba bua Kanâna, bakaya ku buloba ba Gilada ku buloba bua buhianyi buakangatabo bu muakadi di dia Yehowa kudi Mose

Bakusesuka lubilu mu nshila unakubambila, bakulamba nkanu ya or, bakutula kana ka ngombe, bakukatendelela, bakukashihela milambu, bakuamba ne, Bena Isalele, nzambi wenu nyeu wakanuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Meme nensake bena Ejipitu bua banunemeke nuenu bena Izrayele
Bualu bua badi banuambila mei a mashimi mu dina dianyi
Bena Yuda ba bungi, bakadi balue kudi Malia, bakamuitabusha, hakamonabo bualu buakenzeye

Ne musoko munene wakatahuluka mu bituha bisatu, ne misoko ya bisamba bia bende yakuhuka; ne Babulona munene wakavulukibua ku mesu kua Nzambi bua kumuhesha luhanza lua nvinyo ya bukole bua tshishi tshiandi
Ku nyima kua malu â Davidi wakaluangana ne Bena Peleshete, wakabahita bukole, wakanyenga Gata ne misoko yakadi ha buihi mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Dihuahua dia mukeluba mukuabo diakadi bule hua coudées itanu diakafika tô ne ku tshimanu tshia nsubu; dihuahua dikuabo diakadi bule bua coudées itanu diakatuangana ne dihuahua dia mukuabo
Nuakabala nsubu ya mu Yelushalema kabidi, nuakashimbula, nsubu mikuabo bua kukolesha n ai lumbu
Bakabituadila hakelenge ba Bena Hiti ne ba Bena Sulia muomumue
Exodus Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Unjidile ban a bute bonso ba Bena Isalele, bonso badianjile kuledibua, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, bobo mbanyi
Bulelela, ndi nkuambila ne, Kuena uluhukamu tô ne hawafuta dibanza dionso, nasha kakuta kakese kushala
Bualu nyama yonsu idi mikale banabute, ikadi ya Maweja Nangila
Nunku Yefeta wakafika kudi Bena Amona bua kuluangana n abo, ne Yehowa wakabafila mu tshianza tshiandi
Yeye wakuamba ne, Funda; bualu bua mei â adi mei a kueyemena ne malelela

Nuakuhua muoyo bua malu mabi a batatu benu, bua malu mabi a banfumu ba Yuda, bua malu mabi a bakashi babo, bua malu mabi enu mene ne bua malu mabi a bakashi benu, akenzabo mu buloba bua Yuda ne mu misesu ya Yelushalema, anyi
Nebikale n anyi ne mpata musangu bule munyi bua malu a kukema onso anakenza munkatshi muabo
Wewe neusumbe bahika balume ne bahika bakashi kudi bisamba bia bantu badi hehi n ebe
Ekesode Bivualu bia Bakuidi Ek

Bualu bua yeye wakahandu tula Bena Isalele kudi nsubu wa Davidi; bakadisunguila Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, mukelenge wabo; Yalobama wakasesuisha Bena Isalele kudi Yehowa, wakabenzesha bualu bubi bunene

Abashaloma wakabika dinda dionso, wakimana ha buihi ne nshila wa ku tshibi tshia musoko; nunku hakalua muntu ne tshilumbu bua kuyeye n atshi ku tshilumbuluidi tshia mukelenge, Abashaloma wakamubikila, wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi wa ku musoko kai
Bena Izrayele kumuka ku mpokolu ya mayi a Bene Yakane, kuya ku Moshera
Nebashikame mu buloba buabo mene
Wewe neulue ne mulambu wa bukula budi busangisha ne bintu ebi kudi Yehowa, ulue n abi kudi muakuidi ne yeye nealue n abi ku tshioshelu
Eu nshikidilu wa malu onso; malu onso adi munvuike
Bantu badi kabai banuitabusha, hanutshidi nuluhuka mu musoko au, nututule nsenga idi mu makasa enu bu tshimanyinu tshia dibenga diabo
Ku nyima kua kahia dî dikese ditekete diakunvuika
Mose wakabikila Mishaele ne Elesafana, bana balume ba Uziele, tatu mukuabo wa Alona, wakabambila ne, Luai ha buihi, numushe bana benu ku mpala kua muaba wa tshijila, yai n abo ku nyima kua tshitudilu
Hakadi Davidi uyikila n abo, mona, tshilobo, Muena Peleshete wa mu Gata, dina diatshi Goleyata, tshiakumuka munkatshi mua Bena Peleshete, tshiamba mei bu muakuambatshi diambedi; ne Davidi wakûnvua
Pashishe neoshile mafuta a nyama ya milambu ya kudikobolola nayi pa tshilambuilu
Ditumibwa diônso dia ku makanda didi tshianana
Maweja Nangila anuleje mpala wa mimuemue, anufuile luse
Wewe udi mumanye ne Abinê, muana wa Nê, wakalua kûdi anu bua kukushima ne bua kumanyeye kûdi uya ne kûdi ufuma ne bua kumanyeye malu onso audi wenza
Badi bu bana bakese badi bashikama mu bisalu, badi babikila balunda babo ne, Tuakunuelela nshiba, kanuena baje, tuakudila, kamina badikume mu biadi
Aba mbana bakalela Davidi mu Hebelone
Bakulu ba musoko bakalua kumuakidila, benda bazakala, bakakonka ne, Ulualua ne ditalala, anyi
Nunku yeye wakahingana ku buloba buandi ne bantu bandi
Bakamujiana nunku

Bana ba Nafatale ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale binunu makumi atanu ne bisatu ne nkama mai
Ndi nuambila ne, Butuku abu balume babidi nebikale mu bulalu; nebangate munga, nebashie mukuabo

Bena Amole bakasemesha Bena Dana ku mukuna, bualu bua kabakitabusha bua bahueke mu tshibanda; kadi Bena Amole bakashikama ku mukuna wa Helese, wa mu Ayalona, ne mu Shâlabima; kadi tshianza tshia Bena Yosefe tshiakabahita, bobo bakabakuatshila mudimu wa mulambu
Gideona, muana wa Yoasha, wakafua biandi ku bununu buandi, bakamujika mu majambu a tatu wandi Yoasha mu musoko wa Ofela wa Bena Abiezê
Bantu badi bendakanyi mu ditunga neababoze mutu
Bualu buakalua nunku kudiye; bantu bakamudiata mu makasa ku tshibi, yeye wakafua
Yesu wakamba ne, Kushihi muntu, kuendi masandi, kuibi, kudingidi muntu, unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe, Sua mukuenu bu mûdi mudisue
Nzambi wakamuha dihungila dia ditengula; nunku Abalahama wakalela Isaka, wakamutengula hakakumbana matuku muanda mukulu; Isaka wakalela Yakoba, Yakoba wakalela bankambua betu dikumi ne babidi
Bena Isalele bakadisangisha kudi Bâla peô ne tshiji tshiakakuata Yehowa bualu bua Bena Isalele
Bakamuindila tô ne bakabatuala bundu; kadi monai, yeye kakunzulula bibi bia ku nsubu wa kulu; hashishe bakangata luvunguia, ne hakunzululabo bibi, monai, mukelenge wabo wakadi muhone hanshi mufue
Ebi mbidia biakufuma mu diulu; kabiena bu wakadia bankambua betu, bakafua; wadia bidia ebi neikale ne muoyo tshiendelele
Yeye wakambila Yakoba ne, Undekele butuku bukadi ha kutshia
Wakukenzesha bua kutuhikaku bu mudi mukumbi utuhika, anyi
Bualu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mmunuendeshe diakalenga mu bionsu binuvua nuenza
Wakamba kabidi ne, Nebakufile mu bialua bia mukelenge wa Babulona
Moshe kubanda ku mukuna bua kumonangana ne Mvidi Mukulu
Nunku yeye wakalua, wakangata tshitalu tshiandi
Mu tshikondo tshinai tunkanunuina tuebe netulue kunoko kabidi, bualu bua bubi bua Bena Amole kabuena buanji kukumbana
Kadi bua mulambu wa bobumue, nenundambule bana ba mikoku babidi, bakadi ne tshidimu tshijima
Yeye wakasa musoko, wakanyunguluka tô ne ku Milo; ne Yoaba wakalongolola tshituha tshikuabo tshia musoko tshiakashala

Binabuikila diulu bua nvula kayiloki, anyi binatuma mikumbi bua kudiayi bintu biakamena mu buloba, anyi binatuma tshihuhu munkatshi mua bantu banyi, biadihuekesha bantu banyi badi babikila dina dianyi, biatendelelabo, biakebabo mpala wanyi, ne biakudimunabo mitshima yabo bua mibi yabo, nengunvuile mu diulu, nembabuikidile mibi yabo, nensangashe buloba buabo
Bantu badi ne bilulu bilengele, badi mu buneme buabo, batu bikala mu nsubu ya banfumu

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa wakamueneka kundi kale, wamba ne, Nenkuase kabidi, ne wewe newashibue, Neukune mionshi ya tumuma tukese kabidi mu madimi Bualu bua dituku nedilue, hela batentekedi Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Tangilai, meme ndifume n abo ku luseke lua ku node, Nebalue badila muadi; Nuenu ba mu bisamba bia bantu, unvuai dî dia Yehowa, Bualu bua Yehowa wakuhikula Yakoba, Nebalue ku mutu kua Siona, nebimbeku misambu, Hashishe mishikankunde itshidi kamama neyisanke mu kuja kua maja, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba dî edi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bulelela, nakunvua Efelayima udila nunku ne, Hakantuminabo kukuabo, nakakudimuna mutshima wanyi; Efelayima udi muan anyi munanga, anyi
Meme kuitaba ne: Ke meme ewu
Kanuena mua kutendelela mvidie ya dishima to
Nengolole muonshi wa Samalea ha mutu ha Yelushalema, ne luidi lunakateka kudi nsubu wa Ahaba; nenkuhule Yelushalema bu mudi muntu ukuhula dilonga, udi udikuhula, udi udiandamuna
Hakunvua baminyampala ba mu Yuda lumu lua malu â, bakafuma mu nsubu wa mukelenge, bakabanda ku nsubu wa Yehowa; bakashikama ku mbelu kua tshibi tshihia tshihia tshia mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Satana wakandamuna Yehowa, wakamukonka ne, Yobo udi utshina Nzambi hatuhu, anyi
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bobo bakamba dî dimpe
Hashishe bana babo ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi bakalua, bakamuangata, bakaya n andi, bakamujika hankatshi ha Solea ne Eshetaola, mu majambu a Manoa, tatu wandi
Dibatiza dia Yone diakafuma kudi kunyi; mu diulu anyi kudi bantu
Hakunvua balunda bandi bualu ebu, bakaya bua kumuangata, bakamba ne, Yeye udi mubale

Ne bualu bukuabo bakashi bakuabo ba mu tshisumbu tshietu bakadi ku lukita dindadinda bakatukemesha; hakahangabo kumona tshitalu tshiandi, bakahingana, bakamba ne, Tuakumona bikena kumona bu banjelo bakatuambila ne, Yeye udi ne muoyo
Yeye wakadi ne bana balume makumi asatu, ne bana bakashi makumi asatu bakatumeye ha bula ku mabaka; yeye wakangata bana bakashi makumi asatu bakadi ha bula bu bakashi ba bana bandi balume
Muena Peleshete wakasemena ha buihi ne Davidi: mutuadi wa ngabu wandi wakaya ku mpala kuandi
Bantu tshisumbu tshinene bakadi n andi hakabikileye Lazalo mu lukita ne hakamubisheye ku lufu, bakadi bamanyishangana bualu ebu

Nuenu badi bashikame mu Dedana, nyemai lubilu, Bialua bahuodi ba tumuma tua nyinyo kûdi, Kadi nakuhaula bionso bia Esau, nakumushiya hatuhu; Shiya bana bebe ba nshiya, nembalame bua bikale ne muoyo, Bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mona, bikala badi kabayi bahile ne bua kunua luhanza, wewe neuhanduke kuyi mulengeshibue, anyi
Muntu udi wenza mudimu wa busalayi udi udifuta bua mudimu wandi musangu kai
Bualu kai udi udibuesha mu malu a bakuabo bua kudikengesha ne bua kudilenduisha n au, wewe ne Bena Yuda
Kadi Bafalese bakumuka, bakamuelela tshifufu bua kumushiha
Bualu bua nuakuhunga dî bua kuamba mei a mashimi ne a kudinga n au ku mpala kuanyi, tô ne hakudimuka bualu
Wewe wakambila bantu bebe ne, Binuikala kanuyi balue ne muakuny enu, kanuena numonangana n anyi ku mesu
Davidi wakenza hu muakamuambila Yehowa, wakashiha Bena Peleshete ku Geba tô ne ku Gesê
Nuakunvua tshihendu tshiandi; nudi nuamba tshinyi
Pilato wakalekela wakadi mubuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu bualu bua ditomboka ne bua dishihangana, wakamulombabo; kadi yeye wakafila Yesu mu bianza biabo bua kuenzabo bu muakadibo basue
Hakatemesheye bimunyi kahia, yeye wakayituma mu madimi a blé a Bena Peleshete, nunku blé yakadi misuika mu bisumbu ne yakadi mimanyike, ne mitshi ya olive kabidi biakoshibua
Muntu udi tshinyi, bua wewe udi umutumbisha, bua wewe udi ulua kumutangila ku dinda ku dinda, Musangu neulehe bule munyi wewe kuyi muanji kumusha mesu ebe kundi
Nunku Bena Efelayima bakadisangisha hamue, bakanyenga mai onso tô ne ku Bete bala ne ku Yadene
Udi mua kunsunguila diba nganyi
Samala wakafua, ne Shaula wa ku Lehobota, hehi ne musulu wa Pelata, wakadia bukelenge buandi
Wakamba kabidi ne, Aba, Tatu, wewe udi mumanye mua kuenza malu onso; ungumushile luhanza elu; kadi bualu buenjibue bu mûdi musue, kabuenjibu bu mundi musue
Bakalongolola dikalu diandi

Bualu bua Bafalese ne Bena Yuda bonso, bikalabo kabai buvue bianza ne mai bikole, kabena badia bidia, badi ne tshilele tshia bankambua babo nunku; hafumabo ku tshisalu, kabena badia, anu howabo; badi bitabusha kabidi bilele bikuabo bia bungi, bu kuvua kua mpanza ne ngesu ne bintu bidi bienjibua ne tshiamu tshia mitaku

Tuakunvua lumu lua diambu dia Moaba ne, Nunku Bena Moaba badidile Moaba muadi, Bualu bua madimi a mu Heshebona adi amba kuhanga, Nunku nendidile muonshi wa mu Sibema Disanka ne tuseku biakumuka mu budimi Bua malu â mutshima wanyi udi udidila Moaba ne tshiona bu tshia lunzenze, Mu diba adi, halua Moaba ku mpala kuanyi, hadihangisheye ne mitendelelu ha mutu ha mukuna, habueleye mu tshitendelelu tshiandi bua kutendelela, kena udikuatshisha ne bualu bumue bua malu â

Hakumuka butumbi bua Yehowa mu muaba wakadibu, Nyuma wakanjula, ne nakuhua ku nyima kuanyi tshiona tshia kukanka kua buloba kunene; tshiakadi tshiona tshia mahuahua a bifukibue bidi ne muoyo hakatutakanau, ne tshiona tshia nkata yakadi n abi, biakavuisha tshiona bu tshia kukanka kua buloba
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Umukai bienu munkatshi mua tshisumbu etshi, nembashihe mu tshituha tshikese
Yehowa wakambila Davidi ne, Ya biebe, bulelela, nenfile Bena Peleshete mu bianza biebe
Kanungu ka Mapa a bukola bwa mubidi ne a kubenga kupeta njiwu ma bia kudia badi baajadika
Bingikala muenze bibi, ndi mua kukuenzela tshinyi, tô ne hakalua bualu ebu bujitu kundi
Yeye wakamba ne, Biamba Bena Sulia kutuhita bukole, ulue biebe kutukuatshisha; kadi biamba Bena Amona kukuata bukole, nendue kukukuatshisha
Yehowa wakambila Yoshua ne, Bika biebe, udi mutuile mpala hanshi tshinyi
Mvua mujadikile tatu ne: Meme tshiyi mupingane ne muana ewu, nenshale muena tshilumbu kashidi kuudi
Bulelela, wewe wakuhita Bena Edome bukole, wakadibandisha mu mutshima webe, wakadisua; Shala biebe kuebe, uditumbishe nkayebe
Hakatshiabu, Pashû wakahatula Yelemiya mu bikunyi

Ku tshikondo atshi Tatenai, gouverneur wa buloba bua dishiya dia muamua dia musulu wa Pelata, ne Shetâ bozenai ne bena mulongo wabo, bakalua kudibo, bakabakonka ne, Wakunuelela mukenji bua kuasa nsubu eu ne bua kushikisha lumbu nganyi
Monai
Kadi bakatangila Palô ne, Bualu buakushika, wakakolesha mutshima wandi, kakabinvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Bobo bakatuma dî, bakabikila bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete, bakabambila ne, Numushe mushete wa Nzambi wa Isalele kutudi, uye ku muaba wau, kautushihi ne bana betu
ne mutshima wanyi newikale ne muoyo
Mikaya wakamuambila ne, Wewe neumone dituku diudi ubuela mu tshisokomenu tshiebe bua kusokoma
Biatangila muakuidi ne miosa mitoke tô kayena mu muaba au mutoke, ne disama kadiena dibuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, muakuidi neamubueshe ha nkayandi mu nsubu matuku muanda mutekete
Ndi ntua nebe ndondu
Kadi Yehowa udi wamba bua bantu aba badi ne mitshima yabo mitekibue ku bintu biabo bidi bibiha ne binyanguka ne, Nembavuishile makenga ha mutu habo bua bienzedi biabo bibi
Bakatamba kuela mbila ne, Bamushihe ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Bualu bua batendeledi balengeshibue musangu umue kabakadi ne dimuma dia mibi kabidi

Bena Sulia bakanyema ku mpala kua Bena Isalele; Davidi wakashiha bantu ba Bena Sulia bakadi benda mu makalu nkama muanda mutekete, ne bantu bakadi benda ha tubalu binunu makumi anai; wakashiha Shobaka, kapitene ka masalayi abo, wakafuaku
Nakashala ku mukuna matuku makumi anai bu munakenza diambedi: Yehowa wakangunvuila musangu eu kabidi; Yehowa kakanushiha
Nennumiamine mai matoke tô, nenuikale bakane; nennulengeshe ku bukoya buenu buonso ne ku mpingu yenu yonso
Nzambi wakambila Belâma butuku ne, Bialua balume aba bua kukubikila, ubike biebe, uye habo, kadi wenze biebe anu dî dinakuambila

Mu dituku adi nembikile muntu wanyi Eleyakima, muana wa Hilekiya, nemmuluatshishe tshivualu tshiebe, nemmujingile mukaba webe, nenfile bukokeshi buebe mu bianza biandi; ne yeye neikale tatu kudi ba mu Yelushalema ne kudi ba mu Bena Yuda
Yeye wakaya bua kuebesha Yehowa
Bakalua n andi ha nyima ha tubalu, bakamujika ne bankambua bandi mu Yelushalema, musoko wa Davidi
Hakandeshabo ne, Badi belela muntu eu tshifufu, nakumutuma kûdi lubilu; nakambila bamubandi kabidi bua kuyabo kumubandila ku mesu kuebe
Yeye wakambila mukashi ne, Ditabusha diebe diakukusungila, ya biebe talalâ

Nunku, nakamona tubalu mu tshikena kumona, ne bakadi bashikama ha nyima hatu, bikala ne bibuikilu bia ha tshiadi bikunzubile, ne bia lubidibidi lua soufre; ne mitu ya tubalu idi bu mitu ya nyama ya ntambue, ne mukana muatu mudi muhatuka kahia ne muinshi ne soufre
Bualu bua muanjelo wanyi neaye ku mpala kuebe, nealue n ebe kudi Bena Amole ne kudi Bena Pelizi ne kudi Bena Hiti ne kudi Bena Kanana ne kudi Bena Hiwi ne kudi Bena Yebuse, ne meme nembashihe

Yakoba wakamukudimuna ne Bidimu bia luendu lua bukole buanyi bidi lukama ne makumi asatu, matuku anyi adi makese, akadi mule tente ne malu mabi, kaena manze kufika ku bungi bua bidimu bia bankambua banyi mu luendu lua bukole buabo
Tshipepela atshi kupandulula mayi manene, buloba buma kumueneka
Genesis Abalahama wakabaka mukashi mukuabo dina diandi Ketula
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Au mmena a balume badi banutahuluila buloba bua buhianyi buenu, Eleazâ muakindi ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna
Hakahuekabo, bakabalombela Nzambi bua kuangatabo Nyuma Muimpe; bualu bua yeye kakadi muanze kuhonena nasha umue wabo; bakadi anu babatijibue mu dina dia Mukelenge Yesu
Bu mudi muoyi wa tshintu muikale mu mashi, ndi nnukandika bua kanushipi muntu nenu, tshianana meme nennushipeshe panyi

Katataka nuenu ne balumbuludi nuambile kamanda bua yeye kulua n andi kunudi, bu badi basue kumanya bualu buandi bimpe; tuetu tudi bamane kudilongolola bua kumushiha diambedi yeye kai muanze kulua ha buihi
Bakamuambila ne, Tudi ne mitanda ya bidia anu itanu ne mishiha ibidi

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nenfile Palô Hofela, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, mu bianza bia bena lukuna bandi, mu bianza bia badi bakeba muoyo wandi, bu munakufila Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, mu bianza bia Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakadi muena lukuna wandi ne wakadi ukeba muoyo wandi
Mulambu awu, newikale wa biakudia bia tshianyi bia ntete

Mumonyi wa hatuhu udi uhetula kulumbulula kuakane; Bakulongoluela babuidi makengesha, Proverbs Nyinyo udi museki wa bantu, maluvu makole adi bu muena diyoyo; Buowa budi mukelenge utshinyisha n abu bantu budi bu muadi wa nyama wa ntambue; Butumbi budi kudi muntu biashilanganeye ne matandu, Muhote kena udima budimi tshikondo tshidi mashika a banga; Meji adi muntu uhangidisha mu mutshima adi bu mai male, Ba bungi badi badiamba ne, Tudi bena luse;
