Muntu muakane udi wenda mu Mukelenge udi ushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge ukosamu bilumbu udi usungulula Muntu kai udi mua kuamba ne, Majitu a mishindu ibidi ne bihiminu bia mishindu ibidi, Muana mene udi umuenesha tshikadilu tshiandi ku bienzedi biandi, Ditshu didi diunvua ne disu didi ditangila, Kunangi tulu, bua kubuedi mu buhele; Musumbi udi wamba ne, Tshidi tshibi, tshidi tshibi; Or ne mabue a bungi a mushinga mukole bidiku; Angata tshivualu tshia muntu udi mueyeke muenyi tshieya; Bidia bidi muntu uheta ku kudinga kuandi bidi bishemakana mukana muandi, Malu adi bantu bahangidisha adi ajadikibua ku kuhunga kua dî; Udi wendakana wamba buambamba udi usokolola malu masokoka; nunku kubuelakana ne muntu udi wakula Biela muntu tatu andi anyi mamu andi mulau, Buhianyi budi muntu uheta lubilu ku tshibangidilu Kuambi ne, Nempingishe bubi ku bubi; Majitu a mishindu ibidi adi atondesha Yehowa; Biendedi bia muntu bidi biendeshibua kudi Yehowa; Budi buteyi kudi muntu bua kuambeye lukasa ne, Tshidi tshia tshijila, Mukelenge udi ne meji udi usungula bantu babi, Nyuma ukebakebe Luse lujalame ne lulamatu lua bushuwa bidi bilama mukelenge; Butumbi bua bansongalume mbukole buabo, Mitutu idi itaha mputa idi ilengesha muntu ku malu mabi; Proverbs Mutshima wa mukelenge mu bianza bia Yehowa udi bu misulu ya mai, Nshila yonso udi muntu wendela udi muakane ku mesu kuandi, Kuenza malu makane ne kukosa nsambu biakane Mesu adi ne dihetu ne mutshima udi udibandisha bidi disanka Meji adi muena mutshima wa mudimu uhangidisha adi amuvudishila luhetu luvule, Kuheta tshibutshilu ku ludimi lua mashimi Tshimbambila tshia bantu babi netshibumusheku, Nshila wa muntu mutambe bubi udi mukonyangale, Kushikama ha ditumba dia ha mutu ha nsubu kudi kutamba kushikama Mutshima Hakengeshabo mubuidi, mutshimbakanyi udi uheta meji; Muntu muakane udi umona ba mu nsubu wa muntu mubi bu mudibo; Udi ujibika mu matshu andi bua kaunvu muadi wa muhele nêle biandi dî bikole, kabena bamunvuila nansha
Nenunyukule mulambu wa mukata wakelabo ne bukula buakaboteshabo diambedi, nenufile mulambu eu bu mulambu wa bintu biakahuolabo
Bualu bua Helode nkayandi nguakadi mutume bantu bandi, mumukuate, wakamusuika mu nsubu wa lukanu bualu bua Helodia mukashi wa muan abo Filipo, wakadi Helode mubake
Bimpe; bakuâhula bua huhidia buau, kadi wewe udi ujalamamu bua ditabusha diebe
Bukokeshi bua Yehoaza ne Kumushibua Kuandi Kul
Mose ne Alona bakabuela mu ntenta wa kusangakena, bakaluhuka, bakavudishila bantu disanka, butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka kudi bantu bonso

Bikaleye mubabikile ne banzambi, aba bakatuminabo dî dia Nzambi ne dî dia mu Mukanda wa Nzambi kadiena mua kumushibua , bua yeye wakajidilabo kudi Nzambi ne wakatumeye ha buloba, munyi nudi nuamba ne, Udi uhenda Nzambi, bua nakuamba ne, Ndi Muana wa Nzambi
Yeye wakanunvuisha dî diandi mu diulu bua kunumanyisha malu: wakanuisha kahia kandi kanene hanshi ha buloba; nuenu nuakunyua mei andi munkatshi mua kahia

Muntu udi ungunvuila, Bualu bua wansangana udi usangana muoyo, Kadi wahanga kunsangana udi wenzela muoyo wandi bibi; Nsumuinu Meji akuasa nsubu wau, Akushiha nyama yau, akusangisha nvinyo yau ne bintu bia muhuya muimpe; Akutuma mishikankunde idi yakuatshila mudimu, Muntu yonso udi utshimbakana abuele biandi munemu
Petelo wakabanga kumuambila ne, Ahu tuetu tuakushia malu etu onso, tuakukulonda

Bavua banuenzela bibi ne muoyi wa lukinu, mu tshilumbu tshia ku Peyore ne mu tshia Kozbi, muana wa mfumu wa bena Madiyane, ufuile mu tshipupu tshivua tshienzeka bua ditendelela dia mvidie wa ku Peyore

Bualu bua wakueyemena bienzedi bia bianza biebe ne luhetu luebe, Mushihianganyi nealue mu misoko yonso, Nuhe Moaba mahuahua, Mulau wikale kudi wajingakana mu mudimu wa Yehowa, mulau wikale kudi wakanda muele wandi wa nvita ne, Kaumatshishi mashi hanshi
Kadi mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, binakuelela bantu banyi baprofete, kabiakafika kudi batatu benu, anyi
Yuda kuambila kabidi tatuende ne: Tatu, anyisha tuye ne Binyamine
Hashishe yeye wakamba ne, Ya, usombe biasu kudi bakuenu bia munda mutuhu: usombe bikumbane bia bungi
Hakumukeye mu buatu, wakatangila tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu, wakadi n abo luse, bualu bua bobo bakadi bu mikoko yakadi kayi ne mulami; yeye wakabanga kubayisha malu a bungi

Abalahama wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakangata bidia ne mulondo wa mai, wakabika kudi Haga, wakabiteka ha diaha diandi, wakamuha muana, wakabatuma ha bule, wakaya biandi, wakendakana mu tshihela tshia Bê sheba
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; kadi kakenza bu muakenza bakelenge ba Isalele bakadi ku mpala kuandi
Nakateka malu au onso mu meji; nakamba ne, Nempete meji, kadi nakuahanga
Bakandamuna Yesu ne, Katuena bamanye
Binuahidia kunvua mei anyi bua malu a onso, binuampidia, meme nennuhidie kabidi, nengikale n enu tshiji nennukengeshe misangu muanda mutekete bualu bua mibi yenu
Nenubahingashile dî ne, Nuenu bine nudi bujitu ebu, ne meme nennuihate
Yesu wakabuesha bayidi bandi mu buatu lubilu, badianjile dishia ku mpala kuandi, yeye ashale kutuma bisumbu bia bantu kuabo
Kumupukilaye
Bakamba ne, Mose wakitabusha bualu bua kufunda mukanda wa kushiha dibaka, ne bua kumumusha

Nenkengeshe badi bashikame mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bu munakakengesha ba mu Yelushalema, ne muele wa nvita, tshiole ne tshihuhu, bua kakuikadi umue wa ba mu Yuda badi bashala bakuya mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kushikamamu wahanduka anyi washala bua kuhinganeye ku buloba bua Yuda kudibo bajinga bua kuhingana ne kushikama
Nunku uditshihe n anyi kudi Nzambi bua wewe kundingi, nansha muan anyi mulume, nansha muana wa muan anyi, kadi ungenzele malu ne luse bu munakakuenzela wewe ne buloba bûdi mushikame
Maloba a bena Izrayele kabena mua kuangata tshiangatangata to
Alabâ ne Duma ne Eshana, ne Yanima ne Bete tapua ne Afeka, ne Humeta ne Kîyata âba eu udi Hebelone kabidi ne Siô; bimenga tshitema ne misoko yabi

Mukalu wakayila nunku ku wesete ne wa kunyunguluka ku sude ku mukuna udi ku mpala kua Bete holona ku sude; wakahatuka ku Kîyata bâla eu udi Kîyata yalima , musoko wa Bena Yuda: eu mmukalu wa ku wesete
Nzambi, bualu ebu buakadi bukese ku mpala kuebe; kadi wewe wakuamba bua nsubu wa mundi webe musangu mule, wewe wakuntumbisha bu muntu munene, wewe Yehowa Nzambi
Bu mudi Yane ne Yambele bakatantamena Mose, nunku bobo kabidi badi batantamena bualu bulelela; mbantu mene badi ne meshi abo moneka, kabai bajadikibua mu ditabusha diabo
Kanubueshakanyi bimuna bienu, kanukunyi ntete ya mishindu ibidi mu budimi bumue, kanuluatshi bilulu bikuma ne munda mashilangane

Mu bibangidilu bia ngondo yenu nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa bana balume ba ngombe babidi ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne bintu bisatu bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku muana wa ngombe yonso, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku muana wa mukoko yonso, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Bana ba Bani, nkama isambombo ne makumi anai ne babidi
Hakunvua kahita ka balami ba ntempelo ne bakuidi banene mei â, mitshima yabo yakalubakana ne, Bualu ebu nebuikale munyi
Yeye kena usomba n etu kabidi, anyi
Azaya, muakuidi munene, ne bakuidi bonso bakamutangila ne, monai, yeye wakadi ne nsudi ha mpala handi, bakamûmusha lukasa; yeye kabidi wakahatuka lukasa, bualu bua Yehowa wakamana kumukengesha

Untumine mitshi ya cèdre ne ya cyprès ne ya sandal ku Lebanona; bualu bua ndi mumanye ne bantu bebe badi bamanye mua kutaha mitshi mu Lebanona; ne mona, bantu banyi nebakuatshilangane ne bantu bebe, bua kutahabo mitshi ya bungi; bualu bua nsubu undi ngibaka newikale munene ne wa butumbi
Mu bintu bia dîku mudi bintu bia mulume ku luseke lwa baku beende, bia bâna ba mabeela pa ludimi ne bia bâna , nansha bakaadi bakole, badi ku bukookeshi bwa baledi
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Ya ubikile mulume webe, ulue biebe kunoko
Yai wakafua, bakamujika mu Kamona

Wewe udi munene mu kulesha kuebe kua lungenyi kudi bantu, udi ne bukole bua bungi mu bienzedi biebe, udi ne mesu ebe mabulule bua kumona nshila yonso ya bana ba bantu, ne bua kufuta muntu yonso bu mudi bienzedi biandi ne bu mudi mamuma a ku bienzedi biandi

Muvua kabidi ngombe milume dikumi ne ibidi, mikoku ya bimpanga dikumi ne ibidi, bana ba mikoku dikumi ne babidi ba tshidimu tshimue, bua milambu ya kuosha pamue ne milambu ya bintu bia mu madimi ya kulambula pamue ne nyama
Enza mitshi ya acacia ibidi, ulamike or ku nseke yonso
Nakamba mu mutshima wanyi ne, Nakuheta lungenyi lua bungi, muhite bonso bakadi ku mpala kuanyi mu Yelushalema; bulelela, mutshima wanyi wakajingulula meji a bungi ne lungenyi lua bungi
Udi umusha bualu bua kumudilu bua kujadika buibidi
Ne Satana kabidi biahandulukeye, bukelenge buandi budi bumanye mua kujalama munyi
Yeye wakalumbuluila Bena Isalele bidimu makumi abidi
Monai, meme ne bana bakumpabo kudi Yehowa tudi bu bimanyinu ne bu malu a kukema mu Isalele bidi Yehowa wa misumba, udi mushikame mu mukuna wa Siona, mutumine bantu
Maona, Kâmele ne Zifa ne Yuta, ne Yizelele ne Yokedama ne Zanoa, Kayina, Gibea ne Timena; bimenga dikumi ne misoko yabi
Nzambi wakambila Isalele mu bikena kumona mu butuku ne, Yakoba, Yakoba Yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Bakelenge bonso ba ha buloba bakalua kudi Solomo bua kunvuabo meji akamuha Nzambi mu mutshima wandi
Mona, wewe wakafuka diulu ne buloba ku bukole buebe bunene ne diboko diebe diolola, ne kakuena bualu budi bukuhita bukole
Nengolole tshianza tshianyi ham bidi habo, nembutule buloba buabo ne nembunyange, miaba yonso idibo bashikamemu, ku tshihela tô ne ku Libela
Yeye wakangambila ne, Muana wa muntu, ndi nkutuma kudi bana ba Isalele, kudi tshisamba tshia bakuntombokela; bobo ne batatu babo bakungenzela bibi tô ne ku lelu eu
Hashishe Solomo wakaya ku muelelu wa mai manene ku Esione gebê, ne ku Elota mu buloba bua Edome

Nasha nuenu bamanye malu onso musangu umue tshiendelele, ndi musue kunuvuluishau kabidi ne, Mukelenge mumane kusungila bantu bandi mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ku nyima yeye wakashiha bantu bakadi kabai ne ditabusha
Ba munkatshi mua Bena Dana bakamanya mua kuasa mualu wa nvita bakadi binunu makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu ne nkama isambombo
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Bualu kai nudi nuenza malu â
Yelemiya muprofete wakambila Hananya muprofete ne, Unvua biebe, Hananya
Kadi Mvidi Mukulu neanuambuluishe
Nunku nuimane talalâ, nutangile bualu ebu bunene budi Yehowa wenza ku mesu kuenu
Ne a mibidi yenu ne, Netuluate tshinyi
Wakimita difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamba ne, Katataka nentumbishe Yehowa, nunku wakidika dina diandi ne, Yuda, ne yeye wakalekela kulela
Kumujikabu muine amu
Davidi wakalua kudi Shaula, wakimana ku mpala kuandi: yeye wakatamba kumunanga; ne yeye wakalua mutuadi wa ngabu wandi
Nudi numbikila ne, Muyishi ne Mukelenge; nudi nuamba bimpe, bua meme ndi nunku
Yehowa wakela dî kudi Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe ne mulangala webe ha mutu ha misulu ne ha mutu ha tusulu ne mashiba bualu bua kutuma biula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Ke Maweja Nangila kuamba ne: Tshiena mua kutekemena kudi bena Izrayele to

Ndi mua kulesha bantu lungenyi, ndi meji a kukuatshisha n au bantu; Bakelenge badi bakokesha bua bualu buanyi, Bua bualu buanyi bakokeshi badi bakokesha, Ndi munange badi bannanga, Biuma ne butumbi bidi kundi, Mamuma anyi adi ahita or buimpe, mahite or yakulengeshabo mu ditanda buimpe; Ndi ngenda mu nshila wa buakane, bua kuhesha badi bannanga buhianyi bua biuma, Yehowa wakanfuka ku tshibangidilu tshia bufuki buandi, Nakajadikibua ku tshibangidilu tshia bidimu, Hakadi ndondo ya mai kayiyi mianze kuikalaku, nakaledibua; Diambedi mikuna mile kayiyi mianze kujadikibua, Hakadiye kayi muanze kufuka buloba ne madimi abu, Hakashimikeye bia mu diulu, nakadiku
Davidi wakabanda bu mu dî dia Gada diakamba Yehowa
Leviticus Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Biwenza nunku, ne Bikala Nzambi numuambile dî diandi nunku, wewe neumanye mua kuikala ne bukole ne bantu nebaye ku miaba yabo talalâ
Nunku malu onso anuakamba mu midima nebaûnvue mu munya; malu onso anuakakula mu ditshu mu bisokomenu nebâmbe ha mitu ya nsubu
Nudimuke, kanupu ndondu muoyi, uvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mutue nenu
Hakumukabo, bakambilangana ne, Muntu eu kena wenza bualu bua lufu anyi bua lukanu
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nensokoke Abalahama bualu bundi ngenza, anyi
Basangana mundi muena lukuna wandi, neumulekele aye, anyi
Tshipwita wa ditunga udi uleeja mpala wa ditunga
Bualu bua kudi meme eu kuikala ne muoyo nKilisto, ne kufua kudi kuhita mushinga muimpe
Mvidi Mukulu uvua musue kupandisha bantu ba bungi, bu munudi numona lelu
Nzambi wanyi, unvuluke bua kungenzela bimpe bua malu onso anakuenzela bantu aba

Bobo bakela nshobo bu muakenza bana babo bana ba Alona ku mpala kua Davidi mukelenge, ne Sadoka ne Ahimeleke, ne ku mpala kua bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ya bakuidi ne ya Bena Lewi, nsubu ya batatu abo bakadi tuhita tô ne ku nsubu ya bakunyi babo
Yeye wakadi kai umona tô matuku asatu, kakadia, kakanua

Genese Yakoba Udi Wangata Disanka dia Isaka Dituku dikuabo hakadi Isaka muntu mununu ne mesu andi akadi bileshileshi, kakamanya mua kutangila bimpe, yeye Wakabikila Esau muan andi, muan a bute, wa kamuambila ne, Muan anyi Yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Bienzedi bia Manashe bikuabo ne malu onso akenzeye ne bubi buandi buakenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukandu wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi

Nzambi wakabutula Bena Bete shemeshe bualu bua bobo bakatangila munda mua mushete wa Yehowa, wakashiha bantu binunu makumi atanu ne makumi muanda mutekete: bena musoko bakadila muadi bualu bua Yehowa wakashiha bantu ba bungi ne kushiha kukole
Bikala muntu mukuabo kai utumikila dî dietu dia ku mukanda eu, mimanye muntu au bua kanubuelakanyi n andi, bua ku fuishibueye bundu ku mesu
Yesu wakabikila bayidi bandi, wakabambila ne, Ndi ne bantu luse, bualu bua bobo bakusomba n anyi matuku asatu, kabena ne tshia kudia; tshiena musue kubatuma ne nsala, kabayi kuhanga mu nshila
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakanukengesha ne kufubisha kua midioko ne butu, nakanutumina mabue a nvula, biakanyanga midimu yonso ya bianza bienu; kadi kanuakakudimuna mitshima yenu kundi
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Monai, nempatule bantu banyi mu buloba bua ku luseke ludi diba dihatuka ne mu buloba bua ku luseke ludi diba dibuela
Meme ndi wa munkatshi mua badi bakeba ditalala ne badi ne kanemu mu Isalele; wewe udi ukeba kushiha musoko ne muledi wa bana wa mu Isalele; wewe udi musue kumina buhianyi bua Yehowa bua tshinyi
Ahaba wakaya mu dikalu mu nshila wa ku Yizelele; tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudi Eliya; wakasuika mukaba mu tshimona tshiandi, wakanyema ku mpala kua Ahaba tô ne ku tshibi tshia ku Yizelele
Ke mikenji yanyi inudi ne bua kulama: Bantu balume bonsu ba ku ndelanganyi yebe, nubateke panshi
Bana balume bonso ba bakuidi nebaudie mu muaba wa tshijila, etshi ntshintu tshitambe tshijila
Bakulu ba mu nsubu muandi bakabika, bakimana ha buihi n andi bua kumubishabo ba buloba, kadi yeye kakitabusha, wakahidia kudia n abo
Kadi nukose nsambu ya bana benu anu pa yoyi
Katataka ndi mumanye ne, Yehowa udi utamba nzambi yonso buene, bualu bua wakahatula bantu mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu hakabaleshabo dikamakama
Muntu yonso wenza bu mudi Nzambi musue udi muan etu mulume ne muan etu mukashi ne mamu anyi
Bana ba Yakobe balume mu mpata, kubambilabu bionsu bivua bienzeka abi
Hakafuabo ku luseke ludi hehi ne Yadene mu buloba bua Kanâna, Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe, bakasa tshioshelu ku Yadene, tshioshelu tshinene tshia dikema
Butshia pa kabundubundu Abrahame kuya muaba uvuabu bimane ne Maweja Nangila
Nunku wewe wakashiha kuditshiha kua kudi Yehowa, ne mukandu unakakuambila bua tshinyi
Mu tshihela nakambila bana bakalelabo ne, Kanulondi malu a batatu benu, kanutumikidi mikenji yabo, kanudinyangi ne mpingu yabo
Rebeka kulela bana ba mapasa babidi ba balume
Neabambuluishe, akosa nsambu yabu pa yoyi
Hakafikabo ku tshituilu tshia Atada, tshidi dishiya dia Yadene, bakadila muadi mukole, baka jinga tatu wandi to matuku muanda mutekete
Bualu kai udi ummueneshisha bienzedi bibi Bua malu â diyisha dia mikenji diakuteketa, Tangilai bienu munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu

Bana ba balume ba Tola: Uzi ne Lefaya ne Yeliele ne Yamai ne Ibisama ne Shemuele, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo, ya Tola mene, bena bukitu ba dikima mu bikondo biabo; bungi buabo mu matuku a Davidi buakadi binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi ne nkama isambombo
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Muntu yonso udi ushiha Kana, nebamusombuele misangu muanda mutekete Yehowa wakalekela Kana tshimanyinu bua wamusangana kamushihi

Revelation Ku nyima kua malu â nakunvua dî bu dî dikole dia tshisumbu tshinene tshia ba mu diulu bamba ne, bualu bua dilumbulula diandi didi dilelela ne diakane; bualu bua wakulumbuluisha mukashi wa masandi mimene, yeye wakanyanga buloba ne masandi andi, ne wakasombuela mashi a bahika bandi mualombe ku tshianza tshiandi
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, Mukelenge, nakuitabusha ne, Wewe udi Kilisto, Muana wa Nzambi, nyeye ulualua ha buloba
Pavua Yozefe mu Ejipitu, mukajende Asnate, muana wa Potifera, mutuangaji wa mu tshimenga tshia One, uvua mulele bana ba balume babidi: Menashe ne Efrayime
Bana balume ba Hama badi nunku Kusha ne Miselayima ne Puta ne Kanana
Bobo kabidi nebamukonke ne, Mukelenge, dituku kai dituakakutangila ne nsala ne nyota ne buenyi ne butaka ne disama ne mu nsubu wa lukanu, tuahanga kukukuatshisha
Yeye neanubele bikole, Butumbi buandi kabuena bunutshinyisha, anyi
Nubenzeje mudimu mukole, bua bapange mua kuteleja meyi a bena dishima
Nuenu bena Izrayele mwuluke ne: nuvua ku bupika mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Kadi mu bikondo biandi mene yeye wakamuenesha dî diandi mu kuamba kua di kuakafidibua kundi bu mudi mukenshi wa Nzambi Musungidi wetu
Pashishe nebabueje milonda ku mushete bua kuwambuilaku
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama isambombo ne makumi atanu
Masalayi kabidi akamukonka ne, Ne tuetu, netuenze tshinyi
Kadi bualu bua Mose, muntu wa Nzambi, bana bandi bakadi babadibue munkatshi mua tshisamba tshia Lewi

Ne nudi ne diedibua dia manyi ha mutu henu kudi Wa Tshijila, ne buonso buenu nudi bamanye buala ebu, Tshiakanufundila bualu bua nuenu kanuakamanya bualu bulelela, kadi bualu bua nuenu nudi babumanye, ne bualu bua kakuena mashimi kudi bualu bulelela
Tshintu tshionso tshia dikumi tshia buloba anyi tshia bintu biakakuama mu buloba anyi tshia mamuma a mitshi, etshi ntshintu tshia Yehowa, ntshintu tshia tshijila kudi Yehowa
Bena Izrayele kumuka muaba uvua Kora, Datane ne Abirame basombe
Mark Yesu wakabambila ne, Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Bakuabo badi bimana aha kabena bafua tô ne hamonabo bukelenge bua Nzambi bulua ne bukole buabu
Yehowa wakadi ne tshiji kudi Isalele ne wakabende sha eku ne eku mu tshihela to bidimu makumi anai tô ne hakafua bantu bonso ba tshikondo atshi, bakadi benze bualu ebu bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Hakamumona bayidi bandi wenda ha mutu ha mai, bakatshina, bakamba ne, Mukishi; buowa buakabakuata, bakahandalala
Nudilame bua kanupi mikiya
Nenkuambuluishe bua umutshimune, umunyenge ditunga edi dijima
Bua meme tshikuhumbishi musangu mule, ndi nkutendekena bua wewe kutelesha mei makese atudi n au bua lutulu luebe
Nunku kanuena nuhanga mu tshihedi tshimue; nudi nuindila dimueneka dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto
Yesu wakabanga kubambila ne, Nuende badimuke, muntu kanuhambuishi
Bualu bua nvita yakadi ku nseke yonso ya buloba; bantu bakafua mu ditu bakahita bantu bakashihibua ku miele ya nvita bungi
Bakamuhesha tshihesa tshia mushiha mukanga
Kadi hankatshi ba matuku a disanka, Yesu wakalua mu ntempelo, wakayisha bantu
Muntu eu Elekana ne bonso ba mu nsubu wandi bakaya bua kufilabo milambu ya tshidimu atshi kudi Yehowa, ne bua kuditshiha
Yai wakafua, bakamujika mu Kamona
Bana balume ba Shimei: Shelomota ne Haziele ne Halana, basatu
Bua wakamanya meshi a Mukelenge nganyi
Nakunuambila malu â bua nuenu kuavuluka, halua diba diau ne, Nakumana kunuambilau

Bulelela, bakuabo badi bamba Kilisto bualu bua mukau ne kutandangana; ne bakuabo kabidi badi bamuamba bualu bua disanka dimpe; aba badi bamuamba bua luse, bamanye ne ndi mutekibue bua kuvidia kua lumu luimpe; kadi bakuabo badi bamba Kilisto bua ditahuluka, kabai ne mitshima mitoke, bela meshi bua kunjudila makenga mu nkanu yanyi
Yobo Hashishe, Yobo wakabulula mukana muandi, wakela dituku dia kuledibua kuandi mulau
Tshibilu etshi, nutshienze ku tshidimu tshionsu, dituku diatshi

Kakuena umue wabo udi uvuluka, ne kakuena lungenyi anyi dijingulula munda muandi bua kuambeye ne, Nakuosha tshituha mu kahia, nakulamba bidia ha mutu ha makala atshi; nakuanyikaku munyinyi, nakudia; nenvushe tshituha tshiau tshidi tshishala tshintu tshia kudinyanga n atshi, anyi
Hakalela Ebê Pelege, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama mai ne makumi asatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Bantu bandi bakadifila Yehowa Nzambi ne muntu wandi Hezikiya ne mei makuabo
Tatu wenu Abalahama wakatamba kusanka bua kutangila dituku dianyi; wakadimona, wakasanka

Bibaki ba lumbu ne batuadi ba bintu bakadiangatshila bintu bia nvita; muntu ne muntu wakenza mudimu ne tshianza tshimue, wakakuata bintu bia nvita mu tshianza tshikuabo; bibaki ba lumbu muntu ne muntu wakadi ne muele wandi wa nvita mubuesha mu mukaba; bakenza mudimu nunku

Hashishe bakalua ne muana wa mukelenge, bakamuashila tshifulu tshia bukelenge, bakamuha mukanda wa dihungila; bakamuhingisha mu bukelenge; Yehoyada ne bana bandi bakamuela manyi ha mutu, bakamba ne, Mukelenge ikale ne muoyo musangu mule

Hashishe Bena Yuda bonso ne Bena Benyamina bonso bakadisangisha mu Yelushalema mu matuku a asatu; bakadisangisha nunku mu dituku dia makumi abidi dia ngondo wa tshitema; bantu bonso bakashikama mu muaba munene wakadi ku mpala kua nsubu wa Nzambi, bazakale bua bualu ebu ne bua nvula munene
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Ku kuhatuka kua diba tô ne ku kubuela kuadi dina dianyi didi dinene munkatshi mua ba mu bisamba bia bantu
Batangadiki ba Yesu bakadisangisha kudiye, bakamuambila malu onso akadibo benza ne malu onso akadibo bayisha bantu
Muntu udi ukuma tatu andi anyi mamu andi, nebamushihe bulelela
Nunku kitabushi bua mashi anyi kumatau hanshi ha buloba anu ku mesu kua Yehowa; bualu bua mukelenge wa Isalele wakalua bua kukeba mukenya bu mudi muntu ukeba nkuadi mu mikuna
Eleazâ muana mulume wa Alona, muakuidi, neikale ku mutu kua bakelenge ba Bena Lewi, ne ku mutu kua bantu badi balama bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu

Leviticus Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Biasambuka muntu ku mikenji bua kuenzela Yehowa bualu bubi, ne bienzeleye muena mutumba n andi bualu bubi ne bintu biakafileye mu bianza biandi anyi hendululeye n abi mushinga anyi bibeye bintu biandi, anyi biakengesheye muena mutumba n andi, anyi bianguleye tshintu tshiakajimishabo kudi mukuabo mumudinge bua bualu ebu ne muditshiheye ne mashimi, bienzeye malu mabi â onso, bienzeye bibi, bikaleye muhile, yeye neahingishe bintu biakibeye anyi tshintu tshiakanyengeye ku bukole anyi bintu biakufileye mu bianza biandi anyi bintu biakadi bijimina biakuanguleye anyi tshintu tshiakaditshiheye n atshi ne mashimi, neahingishe tshintu atshi ne tshituha tshitanu ha mutu katshi, neatshihingishe kudi muen atshi mu dituku didibo bamuhisha
Bena bilengulengu bakenza muomumue ne manga abo, bakatuma biula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Kulondolola Ditomboka dia Bena Isalele Bak
Bonsu abu bamane kufua, Maweja Nangila kushisha kungambila meme Moshe ne: Mpindiewu nupitshile ku mikalu ya ditunga dia Mowabe, nukosoluele mu ditunga dia Are
Ndi mmona bidi Mvidi Mukulu wa bukole buonsu uleja
Bimfuanyi abi, bikale bitangilangane, binangile pa tshibuikidiji tshia mushete, biolola mapuapua mulu bua kubuikila mushete awu
Kakuena munga muimpe anu Nzambi
Monai
Wewe ne bantu baudi n abo nuakudisangisha bua kuelangana ne Yehowa
Yeye wakabebesha kabidi ne, Nudi bamanye Labana, muana wa Naho, anyi
Katuena tudimanyisha kunudi tshiakabidi, kadi tudi tunuha bua kuditumbisha n abu bua bualu buetu, bua nuenu numanye mua kuitaba kudi bantu badi batumba mu malu adi amueneka ku mesu, kenga mu mutshima
Mukelenge wakambila muntu wa Nzambi ne, Uye n anyi kuanyi, wikishe biebe, nenkuhe matabisha ebe
Bakangata butue bua mu tshikutu, bakimana ku mpala kua Palô, Mose wakabumiamina mulu, buakenzesha bantu ne nyama mputa ya mbalanga ham bidi
Nunku neubambile ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua batatu benu bakundekela, bakulonda nzambi ya bende, bakuyikuatshila mudimu, bakuyitendelela, bakundekela ne kabakutumikila mikenji yanyi
Hakunvua Yesu dî diakambabo, wakambila mukelenge wa nsunagoga ne, Kutshinyi, itabusha anu kuitabusha
Yozefe kuitaba ne: Eyowa
Bualu muntu ewu Moshe uvua mutupatule mu Ejipitu, katuena bamanye tshidi tshimuenzekela to

Wakadi mu Yelushalema, wakadi ubuela n abo, uluhuka n abo, wakadi ubajukuila dî mu dina dia Mukelenge; wakadi wakula ne Bena Yuda bakadi bakula muaku wa Bena Gelika, wakadi welangana n abo mpata; kadi bakadi bakeba kumushiha
Dibadika Moshe kumanyisha bena Izrayele bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile

Hakashikisha Mose kufunda mei a mikenji ei mu mukanda, hashishe Mose wakadimusha Bena Lewi bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ne, Nuangate mukanda eu wa mikenji, nûteke ku luseke lua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, newikaleku bu mumanyi wa bualu buanyi
Bafundi ne Bafalese bakamutentekela ne, Yeye neondahe bantu dituku dia Lumingu, anyi

Dituku dikuabu, nudi mua kumvua ne: mu tshimue tshia ku bimenga, bidi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupe bua kusomba, mudi bantu babi badi bambila bena Izrayele bua kutendelela mvidie inudi kanuyi bamanye mpindiewu
Kadi bu muakafundabo ne, Kadi Nzambi wakatubuluila malu â mu Nyuma Muimpe; bualu bua Nyuma udi ukebakeba malu onso, tô ne ku malu male a Nzambi
Shaula wakashiha Bena Amaleka ku Hawila tô ne ku Shû udi ku mpala kua Ejipitu
Mukuna wa Sinayi uvua mufikisha kudi muinshi, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mupueke pa mukuna munkatshi mua muinshi wa kapia
Kushihianganyi

Dî edi diakalua kudiye kabidi mu matuku a Yehoyakima, muana wa Yoshiya, mukelenge wa Yuda; diakashala tô ne kunshikidilu kua tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshimue tshia bukokeshi bua Sedekiya, muana wa Yoshiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne tô ne hakayabo ne Bena Yelushalema mu buhika mu ngondo muitanu

Bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele bakalua; Bena Lewi bakambula mushete wa Nzambi; bakalua ne mushete wa Nzambi ne ntenta wa kusambakena ne bintu bionso bia tshijila biakadi mu nsubu wa ntenta; bakuidi Bena Lewi bakalua ne bintu ebi bionso
Wewe newangate bilulu, uluatshishe Alona tshikowelu ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu ha efoda ne efoda ne tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ne umuele mukaba muluka bilengele wa efoda ku tshimono
Nenshikame munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, tshiena ndekela bantu banyi, Bena Isalele

Bualu bua ba bungi badi benda, banakanuambila malu abo misangu ya bungi, ne bandi nuambila katataka ne binsonshi ku mesu ne, Badi bena lukuna lua mutshi mutshiamakane wa Kilisto; kunshikidilu kuabo didi dibutuka, nzambi wabo ndifu diabo, butumbi buabo budi mu bundu buabo; badi belangana meshi a malu a ha buloba
Muntu nansha umwe keena mwa kubumbusha mu njila wabo bwa kumwenzelabo mudimu yêye nkayende anyi bwa kwenzabu midimu idi imusankisha yêye
Katataka mutshima wanyi udi utata, nengambe tshinyi
E, nenunyeme bu munuakanyema ku mpala kua kutaka kua buloba mu matuku a Uziya, mukelenge wa Yuda

Buakadi nunku bua kujadikabo mulayi kudi tunkanunuina tuonso; kenkudi badi ne mikenshi nkayabo, kadi kudi badi ne ditabusha dia Abalahama kabidi, udi biandi nkambua wa buonso buetu, bu muakafundabo ne, Nakakuvuisha nkambua wa bisamba bia bungi
Biakuendesha muntu ntanta wa kilometa umue ku bukole, wende n andi ntanta wa kilometa ibidi
Mayi kupatuka mapite bungi
Hakamona bantu ba Hadadezê ne, Tuakutambibua bukole kudi Bena Isalele, bakanvuangana ne Davidi, bakamukuatshila mudimu; Bena Sulia bakahidia kukuatshisha Bena Amona kabidi
Masungu akakuata bantu bakashala ne muoyo ne mu adi wa bena musoko wakafika mu diulu

Yoshua Buhianyi bua Efelayima ne Manashe Bana ba Yosefe bakangata buhianyi buabo ku Yadene ku Yeleko, ku mai a Yeleko ku esete, ne tshihela tshidi tshijima ku Yeleko tô ne ku mukuna wa ku Betele; mukulu wakafumina ku Betele ku Luze, wakaya ku butshika bua Bena Akâ ku Atalota; wakahueka ku wesete ku mukalu wa Bena Yafelete, ku butshika bua Bete holona udi kumanda tô ne ku Gezê; kunshikidilu kua mukalu kuakadi kukala kua mai manene
Chronicles Manashe wakadi ne bidimu dikumi ne bibidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi atanu ne bitanu
Bantu basatu ba bantu aba banene makumi asatu bakaya kudi Davidi ku dibue dia mu lubuebue lua Adulama; bena nvita ba Bena Peleshete bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo mu tshibanda tshia Bena Lefa
Mpa buloba mpa makenga eee Kwà nganyì wètù kutwaya eee Kudi kakuyi makenga eee Bwà kudia ka kwena

Umpatule mu lunteke bua meme tshidinyimu, Kuitabushi bua mai adi atuntumuka ahite ha mutu hanyi, Yehowa, witabe kundi, bualu bua luse luebe lujalame ludi luakane; bu mudi divulangana dia luse luebe, ukudimuke kundi
Kuvulaye bizubu bia matamba awu bibakabibaka

Tangila milongo ya bakuidi ne ya Bena Lewi ya mu midimu yonso ya mu nsubu wa Nzambi; muntu yonso udi ne mutshima wa kuenza ne lungenyi lua kuenza midimu yonso neikale n ebe; tupitene ne bantu bonso nebatumikile mikenji yebe yonso kabidi

Luta Boaza Udi Ubaka Luta Hashishe Boaza wakaya ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko, wakashikamaku, ne monai, muena tshiota au wakamba Boaza wakahitaku wakamuambila ne, Mulumiana, lua somba aha Yeye wakahuka, wakashikama
Nakasangana anu bualu ebu bumue ne, Nzambi wakafuka bantu ne mitshima mijalame, kadi bobo bakadikebela malu a ngenyi yabo
Munyi mutuangatshila badi bashala bujike bakashi, bualu bua tuetu tuakamana kuditshiha ne, Katuena tuhia bana betu bakashi kudibo bu bakashi babo
Bobo nebikale ba tshijila kudi Nzambi wabo, kabanyangishi dina dia Nzambi wabo, bualu bua bobo badi bafila milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia nunku bobo nebikale ba tshijila
Nzambi wakabanda kulu ku muaba wakadiye uyikila n andi
Bananga, tshiena nufundila mukenshi muhia muhia, kadi mukenshi mukulukulu unuakadi n au ku tshibangidilu, mukenshi eu mukulukulu udi dî dinuakunvua
Sheme mumane kulela Arpakshade, kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama itanu
Wakaya, wakatangila, wakamba ne, Kakuena tshintu
Bakamba ne, Tuakuluila bua kusuika Shimishona, ne bua kumuenzela yeye bu muakatuenzeleye
Dituku diakasohakanya Yesu buloba, diakabululeye mesu andi diakadi dia Lumingu lua Bayuda
Kubungamaye wamba ne: Nembutule muntu undi mufuke pa buloba
Ubambile ne: Padi muntu wa ku ndelanganyi yenu ya batuangaji idi ilonda, mupie mikiya, usemena pabuipi ne milambu ya tshijila idi bena Izrayele bandambula, numushe muntu awu ku mudimu wanyi
Bakumuka mu Kadesha, bakashikama ku mukuna wa Hô, ku butshika bua buloba bua Edome
Kuvudi mamu ebe mukuabo bilulu, yeye udi muan abo ne mamu ebe

Bualu bua dî dia Nzambi didi ne muoyo ne bukole, didi dihita muele wonso musakisha nseke ibidi kutua, didi ditubula tô ne ku dihandulula dia muoyo ne nyuma, ne dia manungu ne buongo bua mikuha, didi dijingulula lukasa meshi ne mata adi mutshima musue kuenza
Yuda wakamba ne, Balue n andi kunoko, bamuoshe mu kalua
Panuikala numona malenda awu, nenuvuluke mikenji yanyi bua kuyikumbaja
Hashikisheye kulengesha muaba wa tshijila ne ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshioshelu, nealue ne mbushi udi ne muoyo

Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe bakambila bakadi ku mutu kua binunu bia Bena Isalele ne, Nzambi Umue Munene, Yehowa, Nzambi Umue Munene, Yehowa, udi mumanye; Bena Isalele nebamanye biabo ne, Bikalaku ditomboka, anyi bikalaku buhidia bua kuhidia Yehowa, kanutusungidi lelu
Bienzedi bia Abiyama bikuabo ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Hanuahuola mu buloba ne hanuakuna mitshi ya mamuma, kunudi mamuma a mitshi tô bidimu bisatu
Malu a kukema adiye wenza adi munyi
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi biafileye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neadie tumuma tuandi
Bualu bua ku mulambu umue yeye wakuvuisha bantu badi bajidibua bakane tshishiki tshiendelele
Eku nkulondolola kua kale kale
Nuenu

Mukelenge, Yehowa wa misumba mene, Udi umusha muena bukitu ne umena nvita, kapitene ka masalayi makumi atanu, Nenvuishe bana ba balume bakokeshi babo, Bantu nebakengeshangane, Halua muntu kukuata muan abo mu difuku adi mene yeye neahidie ne dî dikole, wamba ne, Tshiena musue kuikala mukokeshi; Bualu bua Yelushalema wakulenduka, Kansungusungu kabo ka mu bilumbu kadi kabahisha; Nuambile bantu bakane dî edi ne, Nenuikale ne diakalengele; Mulau wikale kudi muntu mubi
Wakenza tshiowelu tshia tshiamu tshiakafulabo bu tshijengu, bunene buatshi buakadi coudées dikumi, ne bule buatshi bua mulu buakadi coudées itanu; bulungu buatshi buakadi coudées makumi asatu
Shaula wakadi utshina Davidi bualu bua Yehowa wakadi n andi, ne wakadi mumuke kudi Shaula
Benaya wakafika ku Ntenta wa Yehowa, wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge udi wamba ne, Hatuka
Hashishe Hananya muprofete wakumusha mutshi wa tshikokedi mu nshingu wa Yelemiya muprofete, wakautshibula
Bu muakelabo mukenji bua kushiya tshikuku tshia mutshi ne miji yatshi, bukelenge buebe nebuikale kûdi hawamanya ne wa mu diulu nyeye muine udi ukokesha

Mutshi wa meba wakambila mitshi yonso ne, Binuasua kungela manyi ha mutu bua meme kuikala mukelenge ku mutu kuenu bulelela, hashishe nulue nushikame mu diledi dianyi, kadi binuahidia, kahia kahatuke ku mutshi wa meba bua kuosha mitshi ya cédres ya mu Lebanona
Maweja Nangila kubafikila munda bikole
Bakamba ne, Muanda mutekete
Ne kakuena tshintu tshifukibua tshidi katshi tshimueneshibua ku mesu kuandi, kadi bintu bionso bidi butaka ne bibuluka ku mesu kua utudi n andi ne bualu
Bena Isalele bakaya, bakashikama mu Oboto
Bena Peleshete bakabanda ku Yizelele
Mu matuku au ditalala kadiakadi kudi bakaluhuka anyi kudi bakahingana, kadi ntatu mikole yakadi kudi bena buloba bonso
Wewe wakenza bualu ebu mu musokoko, kadi nengenzeshe bualu ebu ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso anu hatoke tô
Bualu bua muntu yonso watendekena dina dia Mukelenge neasungidibue
Utuhe tshituha tshia bidia bietu bia buatshia buatshia lelu
Nanku tshipupu tshivua tshikuate bena Izrayele kujikatshi

Mukashi eu wakadi ne kana ka ngombe ka manyi mu nsubu; yeye wakaya lubilu, wakakashiha; wakangata bukula, Wakenza n abu mampa adi kâyi ne luevene; wakalua n abi kudi Shaula ne kudi bantu bandi; bakadia
Bua bualu ebu kabidi ndi ngenza mudimu bikole, ndi ntshinta bikole bu mudi kuenzesha kuandi kudi kuenza munda muanyi mu bukole
Aye nende muaba wa tshijila, ateke tshianza pa mutu pa ngombe awu, amukosele muminu mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Yeye wakamukudimuna dî ne, Bulelela, ndi mukashi wa mu lufuila, bayanyi wakafua
Nunku muele wa mata kawena umuka ku nsubu kuebe tshiendelele bualu bua wewe wakandengulula, wakangata mukashi wa Uliya, Muena Hiti, bu mukashi webe

Kadi nuenu nudi nuamba ne, Biambila muntu tatu andi anyi mamu andi ne, Tshintu tshiwakadi kuangata tshidi Kôbana, kukudimuna kua muaku ne, Ntshidi tshiha Nzambi, kanuena nuitabusha bua yeye kukuatshisha tatu andi anyi mamu andi; nunku nudi nuona dî dia Nzambi bualu bua tshilele tshienu tshinuakuyisha bantu; nuenu nutu nuenza malu makuabo a bungi bu bualu ebu
Bena Izrayele badi babenga bua kuya mu ditunga dilaya Tuetu kumuka ku mukuna wa Sinayi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu netu muambe
Hashishe Shaula wakambila Yonatana ne, Ungambile tshiwakuenza
Hanakatangila, ekumona tshianza tshiakadi tshiolola kundi, ne munda muatshi muakadi mukanda muvunga
Yeye kayi muenze nanku, mmuena tshibawu
Kanungu ka Budikadidi bwa muntu ne muntu budi bujadikibwa
Bua tshintu etshi nakalomba Mukelenge misangu isatu ne, Tshiumuke kundi
Malakiya, muana wa Halima, ne Hashuba, muana wa Pahata moaba, bakasa tshituha tshikuabo ne tshibumba tshia bikulu
Ku tshibangidilu tshia tshidimu tshikuabo Bena Moaba bakalua mu bisumbu, bakahaula buloba

Bualu ebu kabuikadi kudi bua wewe kuenza nunku bua kushiha bantu bakane ne bantu babi hohamue, biwenza nunku bantu bakane nebikale muomumue ne bantu babi, bualu ebu kabuikadi kûdi, Mulumbuluishi wa buloba buonso katu wenza bimpe, anyi
Yeye kena unemeka nzambi ya ba tatu andi, kena unemeka nzambi udi bakashi banyisha anyi nzambi yonso mukuabo; bualu bua yeye neaditumbishe ku mutu kua buonso buai

Monai, bisamba bia bantu bidi bu dimata dia mai didi ditanduka ku luesu, Mitshi ya mu Lebanona kayena ikumbana bu nkunyi ya kuosha, Bisamba bionso bidi hatuhu ku mesu kuandi; Nenuelekeshe Nzambi ne nganyi

Bakenzela Alona ne bana bandi balume bikowelu bia lin, ne bifulu bia lin, ne bilulu bikuabo bia ha mutu, ne mihanu ya lin, ne mukaba wa lin ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû, mudimu wa bantu ba lungenyi lule, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Samuel Davidî wakumukaku, wakaya ku lubuebue lua Adulama; hakunvua bana babo ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu andi lumu elu, bakaya kudiye
Nyunyi ya tulumbu Maweja Nangila kujula lupepela lufumina ku mayi manene
Hashishe Amasaya wakatahulula bantu bakalua kudiye ku Efelayima bua kubahingisha kuabo; nunku tshiji tshiabo tshiakadia kudi Bena Yuda; bakahingana kuabo bûla ngane ne tshiji tshikole
Nanku, mpindiewu ndi mpingana kuetu
Mukelenge wa bukitu neabike, neakokeshe ne bukokeshi bukole, nênze bu mudi mutshima wandi musue
Palo Wakabikila Mose ne Alona, wakamba ne, Nundombele Yehowa, yeye umushe biula kundi ne kudi bantu banyi, nendekele bantu baye kushihela Yehowa nyama
Mutumibue wa Maweja Nangila kumubela wamba ne: Pingana anu kudi Sarayi, mfumuebe wa mudimu
Tudi basue kunvua bualu bûdi wela meshi; bualu bua tshisumbu etshi, tudi bamanye ne, Badi batshibanda kuonso
Tshilambuilu tshia manananshi Pashishe Beshalele kuenza tshilambuilu tshia mutshi wa ndunga, bua kuoshilapu milambu ya manananshi a tshijila
Kadi bundi n abu mbua kuya mu nshila lelu ne makelela ne maihi; bualu bua muprofete kena mumanye mua kufuila kukuabo anu mu Yelushalema
Bena Isalele bakaya mu bunene bua mai ha buloba bûme, mai akadi bu tshinunu kudibo ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Uteke tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kuosha ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Mitshi ya ndunga mikuabu itanu, uyiteke milamakaje ne mabaya adi ku luseke lukuabu lua muaba wa tshijila
Nebalue ne mibidi kai

Nunku batusunguile bantu banene ba munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshietu, hashishe bonso aba bakabaka bakashi ba bende baye kudibo mu misoko yabo mu bikondo bidibo basungule; bakulu ne balumbuluishi ba musoko ne musoko baye n abo, tô ne hashikishabo bualu ebu bua kukudimuna tshiji tshikole tshia Nzambi wetu kutudi
Hakamba diba kubuela, bonso bakadi ne bakuatshike mabedi a bungi bakalua n abo kudiye; wakabalenga bianza buonso buabo, wakabakolesha

Hakumuka butumbi bua Yehowa mu muaba wakadibu, Nyuma wakanjula, ne nakuhua ku nyima kuanyi tshiona tshia kukanka kua buloba kunene; tshiakadi tshiona tshia mahuahua a bifukibue bidi ne muoyo hakatutakanau, ne tshiona tshia nkata yakadi n abi, biakavuisha tshiona bu tshia kukanka kua buloba
Yeye kena tatu wenu wakanuafuka, wakanuenza, wakanujadika, anyi
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Lemeke, Metushela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mukulu ne bibidi, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Nuenu nenutumikile mikenji yanyi, nengenze meme ndi Yehowa
Hashishe, wakabalenga ku mesu abo, wakamba ne, Bualu bunuenzekele bu mudi ditabusha dienu
Mona, kahia kakafuma mu diulu diambedi kakosha tupitene tubidi ne bantu batu makumi atanu makumi atanu; kadi witabushe bua muoyo wanyi wikale wa mushinga mukole ku mesu kuebe
Bowa ne dipampakana kubakuata bonsu
Isalele ikale ne disanka mu Mufuki wandi, Batumbishe dina diandi ne maja a disanka, Bamuimbile misambu ya kumutumbisha n ai ku tshiona tshia mazele Bualu bua Yehowa udi ne disanka mu bantu bandi
Bakabisangisha buatshia buatshia, muntu ne muntu bu muakamanyeye mudiadieye, ne hakatema munya, bidia biakenguluka

Diulu, unvua biebe, ne wewe buloba, teleja matshu ebe, Ngombe udi mumanye nfumu wandi, Nuenu, tshisamba tshia bantu babi, Bualu kai nutshidi ne bualu bua banukume kabidi, Munda mua makasa tô ne ku lubombo lua mutu Buloba buenu budi bubutuka, Badi bashiya muana mukashi wa Siona Bu Yehowa wa misumba Nuenu bakokeshi ba mu Sodoma, Yehowa udi unukonka ne, Bisumbu bia milambu yenu bidi bu tshinyi kundi

Uteke milongo ya masoso mai a kubueshamu mabue, mulongo wa kumudilu wa mabue a sardoine ne topaze ne émeraude, mulongo muibidi wa mabue a escarboucle ne saphir ne calcédoine, mulongo muisatu wa mabue a opale ne agate ne améthyste, ne mulongo muinai wa mabue a chrysolithe ne onyx ne jaspe ubueshe mabue a mu masoso
Au mmena a bana balume ba Esau Elifasa, muana wa balume wa Ada, mukashi wa Esau, ne Luele muana wa Basemata, mukashi wa Esau
Yishemaele, muana wa Netanya, wakadiûsha ne bitalu bia bantu bakashiheye
Elisha wakamuitaba ne, Mesu ebe neamone bualu ebu, kadi wewe kuena uhidia nansha
Muena Yuda mukuabo wakadi mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa mu Shushana, dina diandi diakadi Môdekai, muana wa Yai, muana wa Shimei, muana wa Kishi, Muena Benyamina
Chronicles Bena Yelushalema bakahingisha Ahazaya, muan a mukala wa mukelenge, mu bukelenge mu muaba wandi; bualu bua bantu bakalua ne Bena Alabâ mu tshitudilu, bakashiha bakulu bandi bonso
Mu dîba edi, badi banji kwimanyika manyooka
Kadi bua bualu ebu kabutangadiki munkatshi mua bantu, tubakanyinai ne, Kanuambidi muntu bualu mu dina edi kabidi tshiendelele
Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, bakabihata mu tshitudilu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose, Bena Isalele bakenza nunku
Bana ba Yosefe bakambila Yoshua ne, Bualu kai wewe wakatuha anu tshituha tshimue bu buhianyi buetu, tuetu tudi bantu ba bungi bualu bua Yehowa wakatusankisha
Hakafika bantu ba Davidi kudi Abigayila ku Kâmele, bakamuambila ne, Davidi wakatutuma kûdi bua tuetu kubuangata bu mukashi wandi
Bikaleye mumukume ne dibue mu tshianza tshiandi, ne biafileye, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu, nebashihe mushihi wa muntu
Bu muwakasanka bualu bua kubutuka kua buhianyi bua Bena Isalele, nenkuenzele wewe muomumue: Wewe mubutuke, mukuna wa Sei, ne buloba bua Edome buongo: nunku nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Yoasha wakadi ne bidimu muanda mutekete hakababangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi anai; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Sibeya wa mu Bê sheba

Yeye wakamusokoluela malu onso akadi mu mutshima wandi, wakamuambila ne, Dihaya kadiena dianze kubeya ha mutu hanyi, bualu bua nakumana kuikala Munazi kudi Nzambi katshia ku difu dia mamu wanyi; biambeyabo, bukole buanyi nebumuke kundi, nentekete, nengikale bu muntu mukuabo
Utulombele bua Yehowa Nzambi webe atuleshe nshila utudi ne bua kuendela ne muanda utudi ne bua kuenza
Alona wakolola bianza biandi kudi bantu, wakabandisha disanka, yeye wakahueka kuakadiye ufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne wa kuosha ha kahia ne ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala
Nansha, kena wikale ne muoyo
Ke pamvua mumusele nanku

Dikenga dinayi: njiji Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Malaba dinda, padi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu upatuka bua kuya ku musulu wa Nile, uye kumuambila ne: Maweja Nangila mmuntume bua ulekele bantu bende, baye kumutendelela
Nenkuhedi tô ne ku tshituha tshia bukelenge
Isaiah Kadi mufitu kawena wikalaku kabidi ha buloba buakadi ne kanyinganyinga diambedi
Muntu yonso udi ne ditekemena edi kudiye udi udilengesha bu mudiye mulengele
Mesu abo akabuluka
Mvidi Mukulu kulama muana awu bimpe

Bulelela, Mose wakadi wa kueyemenyibua mu nsubu wa Nzambi muonso bu muena mudimu, bua kuikaleye tshimanyishilu tshia malu akadi amba kuambibua ka nyima; kadi Kilisto wakadi wa kueyemenyibua bu Muana ku mutu kua nsubu wa Nzambi; tuetu tudi nsubu wandi, bitualamata ku dikima dietu ne ku kutumbila kua ditekemena dietu bikole tô ne kunshikidilu

Genesis Hakabanga bantu kusangana ba bungi ha buloba ne hakalelabo bana bakashi, bansongalume ba bantu ba Nzambi bakamona bana bakashi ba bantu ba tshianana ne, Mbalengele, bakasungula bonso bakasuabo bu bakashi babo Yehowa wakamba ne, Nyuma wanyi kena utendekena bantu tshiendelele, bualu bua badi anu ba ha buloba, ne matuku abo neikale bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi
Bakadi badia, bakadi banua, bakadi babaka, bakadi babakibua tô ne hakalua ditutu diakabuela Noa mu buntu bunene, hakalua mai a bungi, hakafuabo buonso buabo
Kimoko kakuena bintu bia kukuna nansha mamuma a nfigi nansha tumuma tukese nansha mamuma a grenade, kakuena mai a kunua
Bikaleye mulume udi uhita bidimu makumi asambombo, wewe neubale nshekele dikumi ne itanu, ne bikaleye mukashi, nshekele dikumi

Simona Petelo wakalua umulonda ku nyima, wakabuela mu lukita, wakamona bilulu bia line hanshi, kadi tshitambala tshiakadi ku mutu kua Yesu katshiakadi ha bilulu bia line, tshiakadi tshianga ha buatshi
Hakatuteye ha mai, mai akahanduluka eku ne eku; Elisha wakasabuka

Kanuikadi ne luevene mu nsubu yenu to matuku muanda mutekete, ne muntu yonso udi udia bintu bia luevene, nebamumushe munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele; nansha bikaleye muenyi anyi muntu muledibue mu buloba
Yeye wakabambila ne, Bikololo bitu biadisangisha hadi tshintu tshibole

Ke padibu bafunde mu Mukanda wa mvita wa Maweja Nangila ne: Vahebe mu Sufa, ne misapa yende, Amone ne misapa yende, udi luseke lua Are, uleja mikalu ya ditunga dia bena Mowabe Bena Izrayele bumuke muaba awu, kufika muaba uvuabu babikila ne: Tshiina tshia mayi
Bisamba bia bungi nebilamate Yehowa dituku adi, nebikale bantu banyi; ne meme nenshikame munkatshi muenu, ne wewe neumanye ne Yehowa wa misumba wakuntuma kûdi
Bakaya nunku, bakatentekela buloba ku tshihela tshia Sina tô ne ku Lehoba udi mu nshila wa ku Hamata
Kadi udi wela mpata udi uhila hadieye, bualu bua kena udia ne ditabusha; bualu buonso budi kabui bufuma ku ditabusha budi bubi
Davidi wakamba ne, Yehowa, ndi nkusengelela ne, Kudimuna lungenyi lua Ahitofele lulue luhote
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu dituku adi meji neabuele mu mutshima webe, ne wewe neuhangidishe kuenza bualu bubi
Bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bakadilengesha; bakalengesha bantu ne bibi ne lumbu kabidi
Tshituha tshihi nennuhongoluele tshiji tshianyi tshikole, nemmane difik a munda dianyi kunudi; nennulumbuluishe bu mudi bienzedi bienu, nennuhingashile difutu bua malu enu onso a bundu
Bantu ba bisamba bikuabu bionsu nebamone munudi bantu ba Maweja Nangila, badi bamuenzela mudimu

Biwatutuma ne muan etu, netuye, ne tukusumbile bia kudia, kadi biwahidia kututuma n andi, katuena tuyaku, bualu bua mulume au waka tuambila ne, Kanuena nuntangila ku mesu, binuikala kanuyi nulua ne muakunyi enu kundi
Hakamukonkeye dî edi, wakaluhuka, wakaya kudi Bena Yuda, wakabambila ne, Tshiena mumusangane ne bualu
Hashishe, mukelenge wakela dî bua kubikilabo batempi ba mbuku, bamanyi ba malu a mitoto, bena muhongo ne Bena Kasada, bua bobo bajinguluile mukelenge bilota biandi
Paulo wakasua aye n andi
Butumbi bua Nzambi wa Isalele buakadi bufuma ku luseke lua esete

Yoaba wakatua mpala wandi hanshi, wakamukukuila, wakavudishila mukelenge disanka; Yoaba wakamba ne, Lelu muntu webe udi mumanye ne yeye wakasangana luse ku mesu kua mukelenge wandi bualu bua yeye wakunyua kulomba kua muntu wandi
Bena Yuda bakamba ne, Tangilai muakumusueye
Bakamuambila kabidi ne, Katuena baledibue mu masandi; tudi ne Tatu umue, Nzambi mene
Bia kudia biandi nebikale manteke ne buitshi hamanyeye mua kubenga malu mabi ne mua kusungula malu makane

Nunku nebaye ne ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshisumbu tshia Bena Lewi tshikala munkatshi mua bisumbu bikuabo bu mudibo bashikama mu bitudilu, nebaye ku mpala nunku, muntu mu muaba wandi mundi mu muaba wandi ku mabendele abo
Yeye wakadi uyisha bantu mu ntempelo ku dituku ku dituku; butuku wakalubuka, wakalala mu mukuna udibo babikila ne, Oleve
Bu mudi malu onso akenzabo ku dituku diakumuka n abo mu Ejipitu tô ne ku dituku edi, muakandekelabo bua kukuatshilabo nzambi mikuabo mudimu, nunku badi bakenzela wewe kabidi
Bakuidi bakamukudimuna ne, Nansha
Bakamuangalaka tô ne ku tshibuelelu tshia Gedô ku luseke lua ku esete kua tshibanda bua kukebabo mashinde a kudisha n au bimuna biabo
Kadi bua nyama idi ne mikiya ubuele anu ne mulume umue ne mukaji umue

Bualu bua wewe udi witabusha bieya kudi bana benu hatuhu; Kuena unuisha badi bahungila mai, Kadi muena diboko dikole wa kaheta buloba, Wewe wakuhingisha bakashi ba mu lufuila kuabo ne bianza bituhu, Nunku mateyi adi akunyunguluka, Midima idi ikukuata, ne kuena mua kumona, Nzambi kena mulu mu diulu, anyi
Kenana wakikala ne muoyo bidimu makumi muanda mutekete, wakalela Mahalelela
Nenunyane, nupeta mubidi luya ne biuja

Nushikame ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, muntu yonso wakashiha mundi mukuabo, anyi wakalenga muntu mufue tshianza, adilengeshe ku dituku disatu ne dituku dia muanda mutekete ne nuenu ne bantu banuakukuata
Abrahame kuambila umue wa kudibu ne: Mukalenga wanyi, pangikala mukutokele ku muoyi, kupitshi kumbelu kuanyi to
Numushe kabidi mikiya idi pa bilamba bienu, ne pa bintu bionsu binudi nabi, bidi bienza ne biseba, ne boya bua mbuji, nansha ne mabaya a mitshi
Leya kuamba ne: Mpindiewu Mvidi Mukulu mmunsankishe bikole
Wakaya kuakenzeye tshioshelu diambedi, ne Abalama wakahitaku dina dia Yehowa

Hashishe, nulonde ku nyima kuandi, ne yeye nealue, neashikame mu nkuasa wanyi wa bukelenge, bualu bua yeye neikale mukelenge mu muaba wanyi: nakamusungula mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele ne kua Bena Yuda

Hashishe, mu difuku adi hakukuha Yehowa dikisha ku dikenga diebe ne ku malu akadi akutatshisha ne ku mudimu mukole wakakuenzeshabo ku bukole, neubange kuimba musambu eu wa kutshimbisha n au mukelenge wa mu Babulona
Umiamine manyi ha tshiowelu ne ha mesa atshi, utshijidile
Butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka kudibo

Beyai nsuki yenu ne nuyimashe, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bena Yuda bakuenza malu adi mabi ku mesu kuanyi, bakushimika mpingu yabo ya tshinyangu mu nsubu udibo bambikidila dina dianyi, bua kunyanga nsubu eu
Bena Dana bakamuambila ne, Dî diebe kadiunvuiki munkatshi muetu, anyi bantu badi ne tshiji nebakukuate, ne wewe neujimishe muoyo webe ne mioyo ya ba mu nsubu webe
Kulamakajabu bilamba abi, eku bitanu eku bisambombu
Nanku bena Merari bavua ne mudimu wa kulama bimpe bintu bionsu ebi
Mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Nuenu bana balume ba Seluya, ndi n enu bualu kai

Nzambi wakamba ne Mai adi muinshi mua diulu asangile kaba kamue, buloba bume bumueneke, bualu ebu buakenjibua: Nzambi wakidika buloba bûme ne, Buloba Mai masangile nunku yeye wakidika ne, Mai manene Nzambi wakabi mona ne, Mbimpe
Bu mudi bungi bua bidimu ku nyima kua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene wewe neusumbe bintu kudi mukuenu, ne yeye neakusumbishe bu mudi bungi bua bidimu biakamaneye kuhuola bintu
Muntu wandi wakasangala ha diba adi mene
Izake kuya mu Ngerare kua Abimeleke, mukalenga wa bena Peleshete

Nunku dî edi kadiakafundibua bua bualu buandi nkayandi ne, Ditabusha diandi diakabadibua kudiye, kadi diakafundibua bua bualu buetu kabidi kudibo bamba kubadila ditabusha, badi bitabusha wakabisha Yesu Mukelenge wetu ku bafue, wakafidibua ka lufu bua malu mabi etu, wakabishibua bua dibingishibua dietu

Palo enze biandi bualu ebu kabidi, asungule tuhita tua mu buloba, tusangishe tshintu tshitanu tshia bintu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba bua Ejipitu mu bidimu ebi muanda mutekete bidi buloba bulua ne bintu bia bungi
Kadi tshiadi atshi tshikale tshia Arone ne bana bende ba balume

Mu dituku adi Yehowa nealame bantu badi bashikame mu Yelushalema; ne muntu wa munkatshi muabo udi mutambe kuteketa neikale bu Davidi mu dituku adi, tshiota tshia Davidi netshikale bu Nzambi, bu muanjelo wa Nzambi ku mpala kuabo
Nanku, mu munya, Maweja Nangila uvua umuenekela bena Izrayele mu divuba divua dibuikila muaba wa tshijila
Biajidila mundi Yehowa nsubu wandi, muakuidi neatuangane n andi mushinga, bikala nsubu muimpe anyi mubi, nsubu neikale ne mushinga wakatueye ne muakuidi
Hashishe angata manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne ela manyi au ha mutu handi
Wewe neulue n au kudi tatu webe, yeye audie, akuvudishile disanka diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua
Kadi, wewe pebe ulekele kutulembakaja
Pashishe, ku mabaya onsu ne mitshi, ulamikaku tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Ndi ne ngombe, mpunde, mikoku, mbuji ne bapika balume ne bakaji
Nanku ku bidimu bisatu bisatu, numushe tshia dikumi tshia bia mu madimi enu bia tshidimu atshi, nutshiteke mu bimenga bienu

Bena Lewi neitabe, nebambile bantu bonso ba mu Isalele ne dî dikole ne: Muntu yonso udi usonga luhingu anyi udi wenza luhingu ne tshiamu tshiakatulabo kudi muntu udi ne lungenyi lule, udi kujadika mu musokoko, ntshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, udi ne mulau
Eyo, wewe ufuishibue bundu, ne itabusha bua kudituadila bundu buebe, bualu bua wakubingisha bana benu ba bakashi
Sila wakalela Tubalakana, yeye wakadi mutudi wa tshiamu tshia mitaku ne tshiamu tshifike, muakuny andi mukashi wakadi Nama

Bua bikala dî diakambibua kudi banjelo diakajadikibua, ne bikala bualu buonso bua dihambuka ne buhidia buonso biakahetela benji babi difutu diakanangane ne bubi, tuetu mene netuhanduke munyi, bituahetula luhandu bunene nunku, luakadianjila kuambibua kudi Mukelenge, luakajadika bua kutudi kudi bakalunvua kudiye
Uleshe kanemu kudi muntu udi ne nsuki yandi mitoke tô, unemeke muntu mununu, utshine Nzambi webe meme ndi Yehowa
Tshibilu tshia mampa kaayi mela buanga Maweja Nangila kuamba ne: Matuku malondangane muanda mutekete, nudie anu mampa kaayi mela buanga
Kadi kanuyi mutantshi mule to
Kukolaye, kushalaye tshilembi tshia buta bua mbale tshia kalanda musenga
Kabidi muntu yonsu udi wambula tshintu tshivua muena disama edi musombe, neasukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi
Oteniele, muana mulume wa Kenaza, muakunyi wa Kaleba, wakaunyenga; yeye wakamuha Akasa bu mukashi wandi

Nenukune bintu mu madimi enu bidimu bisambombo, nenulongolole mitshi ya tumuma, ne nuhuole tumuma tua mitshi bidimu bisambombo, kadi tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete buloba nebuikale mua kubandabu kudi Yehowa, kanukunyi bintu mu madimi, kanulongolodi mitshi ya tumuma
Hashishe mukelenge wa Ashû wakela mukenji ne, Hingisha umue wa bakuidi banuakumushaku, yeye aye, ashikame munkatshi muabo, abayishe mikenji ya nzambi wa buloba ahu
Davidi wakambila Nzambi ne, Nakuenza bibi hanakuenza bualu ebu; kadi katataka ndi nkusengelela ne, Ubuikidile bubi bua muntu webe; bualu bua nakuenza bualu buhote
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina, Abidana muana mulume wa Gideom
Badi ne bua kukosa nyama muminu, muaba udibu bashipela nyama ya milambu ya kuosha
Nunku Yehowa wakajadika bukelenge mu bianza biandi; Bena Yuda bonso bakalua ne milambu kudi Yehoshafata; yeye wakadi ne bubanji ne butumbi bua bungi
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Nudi nuenda nuyikidila tshinyi

Hashishe nakatahulula bakuidi banene dikumi ne babidi, Shelebaya ne Hashabaya ne bana babo dikumi bakadi n abo, nakidikisha n abo bujitu bua argent ne or ne malonga ne bintu bionso biakafilabo mu nsubu wa Nzambi wetu kudi mukelenge ne bena lungenyi bandi ne bantu bandi banene ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadiku
Tshimenga tshia Eshebone ntshikuate kapia
Bonso bakunvua dî diandi bakadi bakema, bakabanga kukonka ne, Eu kanyeye wakabutula bakadi batendelela dina edi mu Yelushalema, anyi
Matayo Hakashikisha Yesu kuamba mei â, wakumuka mu Galela, wakalua mu luseke lua Yudaya ludi dishia dia Yadene; bisumbu binene bia bantu biakamulonda, yeye wakabakolesha
Muena mudimu kuya ne benyi abu ku nzubu, bu muvua Yozefe muambe
Nuenu, ba mu nsubu wa Alona, nueyemene Yehowa
Nuyibenge, nuyimanshe
Nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mei akanuambileye ne malu andi akanumanyisheye
Nenudiangatshile mioyo yenu bualu bua dinanukila dienu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nebashihe muntu au bulelela bantu bonso nebamukume ne mabue ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Wambile bena Izrayele ne: Mafuta a tshijila aa, nga kujidila nawu bantu badi benzela Maweja Nangila mudimu ne ndelanganyi yabu yonsu
Ezekiel Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Wewe, muana wa muntu, neulumbuluishe, neulumbuluishe musoko eu wa bamatshishi ba mashi hanshi, anyi
Luse kaluena luenzela mukuabo bubi; nunku luse ludi tshiuwidi tshia mikenshi

Ulue biebe ne Bena Lewi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, usangishe tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, wewe neumueneshe Bena Lewi ku mpala kua Yehowa Bena Isalele nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha Bena Lewi: Alona neanyukule Bena Lewi ku mpala kua Yehowa bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Bena Isalele, bua bobo bikale bajidile bua kukuatshila Yehowa mudimu
Bua lumu lua ditumikila dienu luakafika kudi bantu bonso
Bijanu bidi bena Izrayele bakujana nabi nebijike
Tshiji tshiandi tshiakatamba kutema; yeye wakabanda ku nsubu wa tatu wandi
Badi ne tshia kumwambila diakamwe mapa ende

Hagai Mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete, mu dituku dia makumi abidi ne dimue dia ngondo, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi muprofete Hagai ne, Ambila Zelubabela, muana wa Shalatiele, gouverneur wa mu Yuda, ne Yoshua, muana wa Yehosadaka, muakuidi munene, ne bantu bonso badi bashale ne, Muntu kai udi mushale munkatshi muenu wakamona nsubu eu mu butumbi buandi diambedi
Benze bilamba bia lumu bia kuenza nabi mudimu muaba wa tshijila; bilamba bia tshijila bia mutuangaji munene Arone, ne bia bana bende ba balume
Kadi bana bakantombokela kabidi; kabakenda mu mei anyi, kabakatumikila mikenji yanyi bua kuyenza, idi ivuisha muntu muoyo hayenzeye; bakanyanga matuku anyi a mbingu
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona nebashikame hehi n andi Shelumiele muana mulume wa Sulishadai neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Shimeona
Bualu bua wewe, Nzambi wanyi, wakumanyisha muntu webe ne, Nenkuibakile nsubu; nunku muntu webe wakadi ne dianyisha bua kutendeleleye ku mpala kuebe
Bena lukuna betu kuamba ne: Netubalonde, tubapete
Mukelenge wa Babulona wakabakina, wakabashiha ku Libela mu buloba bua Hamata
Mukashi eu wakimita difu, wakalela muana wa balume ku tshikondo atshi hakakumbana ngondo yandi bu muakamuambila Elisha
Ne bualu bua kudia kua bintu bia kutendelelabo n abi mpingu, tudi bamanye ne, Kakuena luhingu ludi ne bualu ha buloba, ne kakuena Nzambi mukuabo anu umue
Bena Izrayele kuipata bena Amore, kubanyenga tshimenga atshi, kabidi ne misoku yonsu ivua mutumba natshi

Mukuabo wakadi ne tshinfuanyi tshia muana wa muntu wakalenga ku mishiku yanyi; nakabulula mukana muanyi, nakayikila ne wakadi wimana ku mpala kuanyi, nakamuambila ne, Mukelenge wanyi, bua tshikena kumona etshi kanyinganyinga kakunkuata, tshiena kabidi ne bukole
Wewe Nzambi, kuakutubenga, anyi
Bana aba bikale ne ndelanganyi ya bungi, buwuje ditunga edi
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nenjimishe bantu banakafuka ha buloba, ne bantu ne nyama ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ne nyunyu ya mulu, bualu bua mutshima wanyi udi munyingalale bua nakabifuka
Hakunvua Petelo ne, Mukelenge, wakadijingila tshivualu tshiandi bua wakadi mutshivule, wakadiela mu mai
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ditalala didiku
mona, meme ndi nkudiula ne misulu yebe, nenvuishe buloba bua Ejipitu tshihela tshia hatuhu ne tshikulu, ku Migedola tô ne ku Siene, ne ku butshika bua Atiopa kabidi
Matayo Ha diba adi bayidi bakalua kudi Yesu, bakamuebesha ne, Mu bukelenge bua mu diulu udi mutambe bakuabo nganyi

Bienzedi Muntu wakadiku, dina diandi Anania, ne mukashi wandi Sapila, wakahana tshintu tshiakadiye n atshi, wakasokoka tshituha tshia mushinga, mukashi wandi wakadi mumanye bualu ebu; Anania wakalua ne tshinga tshituha, wakatshiteka ku makasa a bapostolo
Bualu bua wewe, Nzambi wanyi, wakumanyisha muntu webe ne, Nenkuibakile nsubu; nunku muntu webe wakadi ne dianyisha bua kutendeleleye ku mpala kuebe
Nakamukudimuna ne, Ndiku
Muena Lewi wakadi ne disanka bua kushikameye ne muntu eu; nsongalume eu wakadi kudiye bu umue wa bana bandi balume

Yehezekele Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, tangisha mpala webe kudi Gogo wa buloba bua Magoga, mukokeshi wa mu Losha, Amba biebe ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ndi n ebe tshilumbu, wewe Gogo, mukokeshi wa Losha, Mesheke ne Tubala
Bualu mbadikebele lufu nkayabu
Bantu bakunvua lumu, bakutshina, mikemu yakukuata Bena Peleshete

Jeremiah Hakashikisha Yelemiya kuambila bantu aba mei onso a Yehowa Nzambi wabo, mei â onso mene akamutuma Yehowa Nzambi wabo n au bua kubambila, Azâya, muana wa Hoshaya, Yohanana, muana wa Kalea, ne bena dihetu bonso bakambila Yelemiya ne, Wewe udi wamba mei a mashimi
Wewe neulue ne bana bandi balume, ubaluatshishe bikowelu

Ebele kabidi wakalua ne ban a bute ba mikoko ne dianyi diai Yehowa wakitabusha Ebele ne mulambu wandi, kadi yeye wakahidia Kana ne mulambu wandi Kana wakadi ne tshiji, wakabungama Yehowa wakakonka Kana ne, Udi ne tshiji bua tshinyi
Pashishe, usuike kakanu kakese ka majita ku nkanu ya bijengu yonsu idi ku tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi
Tshiena bianyi muimpe kabidi bua kumbikilabo ne, Muan ebe, umbueshe mu mudimu bu bena mudimu bebe bakuabo
Maweja Nangila umvua nanku, kufikaye munda
Bua malu au onso Yesu wakulua mutambi wa banjelo buimpe, bualu bua wakahiana dina didi ditamba mena abo kutumba
Maweja Nangila kuandamuna Moshe ne: Nenkuleje buakane buanyi, nenkuambile kabidi dina dianyi dia Maweja Nangila
Katataka mutshima wanyi udi utata, nengambe tshinyi
Bakahingana ku malu mabi akenza bankambua babo, mbakabenga kunvua mei anyi; bakulonda nzambi mikuabo bua kuyikuatshilabo mudimu
Kadi meme udi munkatshi muenu bu muena mudimu
Kadi Hezikiya kakenzela Nzambi bimpe bu muakamuenzeleye bimpe, bualu bua yeye wakadisua mu mutshima wandi, nunku tshiji tshia Nzambi tshiakadi kudiye ne kudi Bena Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema
Hashishe nenulue bua kuimana mu nsubu eu udibo bambikila ku dina dianyi, nuamba ne, Tuakuhandishibua; nudi basungidibue anu bua kuenza malu â mabi, anyi
Balumbuluishi nebalondeshilule tshilumbu atshi bimpe
Hakamanya Petelo bualu ebu bimpe, wakamba ne, Bulelela, ndi mumanye katataka ne, Mukelenge wakutuma muanjelo wandi, wakunsungila mu bianza bia Helode ne mu malu onso akatekemena bantu ba Bena Yuda

Yeye wakabadimusha, wakabambila ne, Nkadi ha kudisangisha ne bankambua banyi, nunjike mu muaba wakajikabo batatu anyi mu lubuebue ludi mu budimi bua Efelona, Muena Hiti, mu lubuebue ludi mu budimi bua Makepela, ku mpala kua Mamale mu buloba bua Kanana, buakasumba Abalahama kudi Efelona, Muena Hiti, bu muaba wa kujikabo bantu bafue
Nanku bantu kulekela kufila, bualu bintu bivuabu bafile bivua bikumbane bua kujikija mudimu, bipite ne kupita kuine
Pashishe Maweja Nangila kukolesha Yoshuwa, muana wa Nune, ku muoyi, umuambila ne: Kutshinyi, kuzakadi

Mikenji ya bena Levi Dituku dinene dia kukobolola bantu Bana babidi ba Arone bamane kufua pavuabu balambula Maweja Nangila mulambu wa manananshi avua kaayi a tshijila, Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ambila muanenu Arone kabuedi tshibuelabuela muaba wa tshijila menemene, panyima pa tshilamba tshidi tshijika mushete wa tshijila ne tshibuikidiji tshiawu to
Hashishe mukashi wa lungenyi wa mu musoko, wakela dî diandi ne, Unvuai
Kumukabu mu Ngerare bua kuya kumonangana ne Izake
Hakahita matuku a bungi, Yehowa wakangambila ne, Juka biebe, uye ku musulu wa Pelata, wangateku mukaba unakakuambila bua kûsokokaku
Muntu udi ushipa mukuende, bamushipe pende
Pashishe kulejaye Maweja Nangila milambu ya bintu bia mu madimi
Yesu wakabambila ne, Nuhe Kaisa bintu bia Kaisa, nuhe Nzambi bintu bia Nzambi
Nzambi wa tatu ebe udi ukukuatshisha, Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso udi ukusankisha ne masanka adi afuma mu diulu, ne masanka adi afuma muinshi mua buloba, ne masanka adi afuma ku mabele ne mafu

Nansha biavudishabo bana munkatshi mua bana babo, Bena Samalea nebahishibue Hosea Nuenu, Bena Isalele, hinganai kudi Yehowa Nzambi wenu, Nuye ne mei makane, Bena Ashû kabena batusungila; Meme nengondahe, nenshikishe kutomboka kuabo; Nengikale bu mume kudi Bena Isalele, matamba abo neabaluluke; Nebahingane, nebashikame mu dileshi dianyi, Bena Efelayima, mpingu yenu idi ne mushinga kai kundi kabidi
Abalahama wakaya lubilu ku tshisumbu tshia ngombe, wakangata lukungulu lua ngombe luakadi lutekete ne luimpe, wakalufila kudi muntu wandi, ne yeye wakaluhandulula lubilu
Yeye wakamukudimuna dî ne, Nansha, muan etu mulume, kunkuatshi ku bukole nunku, bualu ebu kabuena mua kuenjibua mu Isalele; kuenji bualu ebu buhote
Nenfile ba mu Yuda bonso mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Babulona kabidi, ne yeye neaye n abo mu buhika mu Babulona, neabashihe ne muele wa nvita
Diba adi, mu matunga aa, nenukebe Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Nunku bakulu bonso ba mu Isalele bakalua kudi mukelenge mu Hebelone; mukelenge Davidi wakahunga n abo tshihungidi ku mesu kua Yehowa mu Hebelone; bakela Davidi manyi ha mutu bua kuikaleye mukelenge wa Bena Isalele
Ngasa ne ditalala bikale n enu

Bikala bantu ba mu nsubu banya banya, muena nsubu neatahulule muana wa mukoko ne muena nsubu udi hehi n andi ku bungi bua bantu badi mu nsubu, bobo babale bungi bua bantu badi mua kudia muana wa mukoko umue
Mukelenge wakambila Alauna ne, Nansha, nengule bintu ebi kûdi ku mushinga; tshiena nfila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, milangala hatuhu
Kanuena mua kuitaba bionsu ebi, nansha kuteleja mene bidibu banuambila to
Bualu bua nakasengelela bankambua benu bikole mu dituku dinakabaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu tô ne ku dituku edi, mbika ne lunkelu bua kubadimusha ne, Nutumikile dî dianyi
Bobu bavua basombe mu Edome

Dina dia muntu eu diakadi Nabala; dina dia mukashi wandi Abigayila; mukashi eu wakadi muena meji, wakadi ne mpala mulengele; kadi mulume wandi wakadi muena lukinu, wakadi ne bienzedi bibi; wakadi wa mu tshiota tshia Kaleba
Nunku ba bisamba ebi bikuabo bakatshina Yehowa, bakatendelela mpingu yakasongabo; nunku bana bakalelabo ne bana bakadi bana babo balele badi benza bu muakenza batatu babo tô ne ku dituku edi

Monai, mukashi wakalua ku nyima kua Yesu, wakadi ne disama dia mashi ahatuka bidimu dikumi ne bibidi, wakalenga tshianza tshiandi ku mubangu wa tshivualu tshia Yesu; mukashi wakadi wamba munda ne, Binalenga ku tshivualu tshiandi, nenkoleshibue
Palo wakelela bantu bandi bonso mukenji ne, Bialelabo muana mulume, nenumuele mu musulu, kadi nensungile bana bakashi

Nzambi wakamuladika ku mesu kua bantu bua kuikaleye mulambu wa kubuikila n au malu mabi a bantu, ku ditabusha dia mu mashi andi, bualu bua kulesha buakane buandi mu dihita diandi dia malu mabi akenzabo diambedi, bua lutulu lua Nzambi
Muntu yonsu udi ubenga kuitaba malu adi muambi awu umuambila mu dina dianyi, meme Maweja Nangila nkayanyi nemmunyoke
Kadi meme ndi nuambila ne, Udi mutambe ntempelo udi aha

Muanjelo wakambila Yoshua ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Biwenda mu nshila yanyi, ne biwenza mudimu wanyi bimpe, nunku neukokeshe nsubu wanyi ne neulame mbanza yanyi; neakuhe miaba ya kuendela munkatshi mua badi bimana kunoku
Uvua mubapatule mu Ejipitu anu bua bafuile mu tshipela
Baka muela mu lukanu bua kuindila mei a kudi Yehowa
Esetê Badi Bowa Hamana Mukelenge ne Hamana bakalua bua kudiabo ne Esetê mukelenge mukashi
Yoaba wakanyemena mu Ntenta wa Yehowa, wakakuata ku nsengu ya tshishihelu
Neanutshimuine mvita eyi
Hakatangila bantu bonso ne Alona wakafua, Bena Isalele bonso bakamujinga tô matuku makumi asatu
Muomumue, nuenu bansongalume, nukokele bakulumpe
Tshisumbu tshia ngulube ya bungi tshiakadiku idia mashinde ku mukuna; bakamutendekena ne, Itabusha bua tuetu kubuela munda muai
Kadi Bena Yuda ba ku Antiokia ne Ikonio bakalua ka Luseta, bakashikila bantu, bakakuma Paulo ne mabue, bakamukoka bamuimasha kukala kua musoko, bela meshi ne, Udi mufue

Luke Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne itanu tshia bunfumu bua Tibelio Kaisa, hakadi Ponto Pilato ngovena wa Yudaya, ne hakadi Helode muloho wa Galela, ne hakadi muan abo Filipo muloho wa luseke lua Itulaya ne Takoniti, ne hakadi Lusania muloho wa Abilene, ne hakadi Ana ne Kayafa bakuidi banene, dî dia Nzambi diakalua kudi Yone, muana wa Zakâya, mu tshihete
Kora ne bonsu bavuaye nabu kuitababu
Pashishe Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuambila mulume ne: Bua pawitabi diyi dia mukajebe, wewe kudia tshimuma tshimvua mukukandike, ndi ntshipa buloba bua tshilema tshiuvua muenze
Bakumukaku, bakayila ku mikuna ya Efelayima, bakalua ku nsubu wa Mika
Kenyeye udi udianyisha udi witabushibua, kadi yeye udi Mukelenge wanyisha
Abrahame ne Abimeleke badi batua ndondu Matuku awu, Abimeleke ne Pikole, mulombodi wa bena mvita bende, kufika kudi Abrahame, bamuambila ne: Mvidi Mukulu udi ukuambuluisha mu bionsu biudi wenza
Kabena banowa blé lelu, anyi
Bena Ejipitu bakamba kubihata, bakabalonda ku nyima kuabo mu bunene bua mai, tubalu tua Palô bionso ne makalu andi onso ne masalayi andi onso akadi enda ha tubalu
Tulala tua mu Edome tuakadi nunku: kalala Timena, kalala Alia, kalala Yetete, kalala Oholibama, kalala Ela, kalala Pinona, kalala Kenaza, kalala Temana, kalala Mi bezâ, kalala Magadiele, kalala Hama
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakatemena bualu bua Uza; Nzambi wakamushihelaku bua dihanga diandi; yeye wakafuaku hehi ne mushete wa Nzambi
Nunku mukelenge wa Isalele ne Yehoshafata bakaya ku Lamota gilada

Muakuidi kabaki mukashi wa mu lufuila wa hatuhu bu mukashi wandi, anyi mukashi mumusha kudi bayandi, kadi abake mushikankunde utshidi kamama wa munkatshi mua hana ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele, anyi mukashi wa mu lufuila wa munga muakuidi
Nanku kukuatshilaye kabidi Labane mudimu bidimu muanda mutekete bikuabu

Kadi dia mbedi bobo kabayi banze kulala bena musoko wa Sodoma, ne banso ngalume ne bantu banunu ba nseke yonso bakanyunguluka nsubu, ba kabikila Lota, bakamukonka ne Balume aba bakulua kudi butuku ebu badi hanyi
Binuasua kumuitabusha, eu udi Eliya, ukadi ha kulua biandi
Kadi binuikala balombodibua kudi Nyuma, kanuena munshi mua mikenshi
Mutuangaji ateke bintu bionsu abi pa nkunyi ya kapia idi pa tshilambuilu
Davidi wakabikila umue wa bansongalume bandi, wakamuambila ne, Semena ha buihi n andi, umushihe
Kanuena mua kushipa muena tshibawu awu kanuyi banji kujadika tshilumbu kudi bantu babidi nansha basatu
Wanyi munanga wakabuesha tshianza tshiandi ku dididishi, mutshima wanyi wakatabuluka bualu buandi
Anu bua bualu ebu bumue balume aba nebitabushe bua kushikama n etu tulue bantu bamue bua mulume yonso wa munkatshi muetu atengudibue bu mudibo batengula
Yeye wakafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia
Mutuangaji neangate nkunyi ya mutshi wa sedre, ditamba dia mutshi wa isope, ne buanda bua boya bukunze, abiele muiku, muaba udibu boshile ngombe awu
Nusanke, nuikale ne disanka dingi, bualu bua difutu dienu didi mu diulu ndinene; bakakengesha baprofete nunku bakadi ku mpala kuenu
Nunku meme hanyi tshiena mbalesha dinanga, tshiena mbafuila luse, kadi nempingashe dikenga bu difutu dia bienzedi biabo ha mitu babo
Mutshima wanyi, enda ne bukole
Bakokeshi ba mu Soana bakulua bahote, Yehowa wakusonsola nyuma wa tshibondakasha munkatshi muabo; Ne kakuena kushala mudimu mukuabo mu Ejipitu, Mu dituku adi Bena Ejipitu nebikale bu bakashi

Nkuasa makumi abidi ne inai yakanyunguluka nkuasa wawa wa butumbi; ne ha nkuasa ya butumbi hakadi bakulu makumi abidi ne banai bashikamahu, baluatshishibue ne bivualu bitoke; ne ha mitu habo hakadi bifulu bia butumbi bia ngolo
Ku nyima kuandi Abidona, muana wa Hilele, Muena Pilatona, wakalumbulula Bena Isalele
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Tshianza tshiebe tshikale kundi ne ku tshiota tshia tatu wanyi
Esawu kuandamuna ne: Bumuanabute kabuena bungambuluisha kabidi to
Yesu wakamukonka ne, Mukashi, udi udidila tshinyi
Pashishe Labane kuambila Yakobe ne: Mona mushiki wa mabue undi ngunguija pankatshi petu, ne dibue edi dindi muimanyike

Davidi wakangata tshibangu tshiandi mu tshianza tshiandi, wakasungula mabue atanu a busenu mu kasulu, wakaela mu mpaya wandi wa bulami bua mikoko wakadiye n andi, mu kabombi kandi mene; tshieledi tshiandi tshia mabue tshiakadi mu tshianza tshiandi; wakasemena ha buihi ne Muena Peleshete
Kadi katataka ndi nya kudi wakuntuma; kakuena umue wenu udi unkonka ne, Uyaya kudi kunyi
Kadi yeye wakamanya meshi abo, wakambila muntu wakadi ne tshianza tshiandi tshiume ne, Bika, Imana hankatshinkatshi
Bena Ai bonso ne balume ne bakashi bakafua dituku adi bakadi binunu dikumi ne bibidi, bantu bonso ba mu Ai mene
Musoko eu ne bintu bionso bidimu bikale bia tshijila kudi Yehowa
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nengenzele muaba eu ne bantu badimu nunku, nenvuishe musoko eu bu Tofete mene
Hakasabuka mukelenge Yadene, Shimei, muana wa Gela, wakamukukuila

Yeye udi bu nkashama kundi udi ungalamina, Yeye wakunsesuisha mu nshila wanyi, Wakunana buta buandi, waku nteka kulu Wakasa mutshima wanyi mikete Nakulua bu tshintu tshidibo baseka kudi bantu bonso, Wakungusha tente ne nyongangandu, Wakutshibula menu anyi ne nsoka mikese; Wakûmusha ditalala dia mu mutshima wanyi, wakuditeka kule; Nunku nakuamba hanyi ne, Bukole buanyi buakujimina, Uvuluke dikenga dianyi ne kanyinganyinga kanyi, Mutshima wanyi utshidi ubivuluka, Ndi nvuluka muanda eu, Malu makane a Yehowa kaena ashika tshiendelele, bidi bihia bihia ku dinda ku dinda, Mutshima wanyi udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi buhianyi buanyi, Yehowa udi ne luse kudi badi bamuindila, Bidi bimpe bua muntu atekemene ne indile biandi Bidi bimpe bua muntu ambule biandi mutshi wa tshikokedi Ashikame biandi nkayandi ahuwe talalâ, Atue mishiku yandi mu buloba, Afile ditama diandi kudi udi umututa; Bualu bua Mukelenge kena wihata Kadi hamukengesheye, Bualu bua kena usanka bua kubakengesha, Bualu bua badiatabo bena lukanu bonso ha buloba hasesukabo ku kulumbulula kuakane kua muntu hanyangabo tshilumbu tshia muntu ne kulumbulula kubi, Muntu kai udi mua kuela dî ne, Bualu buenjibue, Makenga ne masanka kabiena bifuma Nunku bualu kai muntu utshidi ne muoyo Tukebulule mu mitshima yetu, Tubandishe mitshima yetu ne bianza diatshimue Tuakushiha mikenji yebe ne tuakukutombokela; Wewe wakudibuikila ne tshiji, wakutuihata mu nshila, Wakudibuikila ne ditutu, Wakutuvuisha bu tshintu tshia hatuhu tshidibo bimasha Bena lukuna betu bonso bakubulula mukana muabo Buowa ne dijimba bidi ku mpala kuetu, Mesu anyi adi ahatula binsonshi bu misulu ya mai Mesu anyi adi uhuekesha binsonshi, tô ne hatangila Yehowa wa mu diulu hanshi, Mutshima wanyi udi unyingalala bua malu adi mesu anyi amone, Bena lukuna banyi bakunkina hatuhu, kahayi ne tshilumbu tshia kumbanda n atshi, Bakungela mu tshina bua kujimisha muoyo wanyi, Mai akahita ha mutu banyi; Yehowa, nakabikila dina diebe, Wewe wakunvua dî dianyi ne, Wewe wakasemena ha buihi n anyi mu dituku dinakukubikila; Wewe, Mukelenge, wakungakuila ku bilumbu bia mu mutshima wanyi; Wewe, Mukelenge, wakumona malu mabi akungenzelabo; Wewe wakumona disombuela diabo Yehowa, wakumpua bihendu biabo mei adi ahatuka mukana mua bambanda Tangila hashikamabo, hajukabo; Yehowa, wewe ne ubafute difutu Neubahe mitshima mikole, Yehowa, wewe ne ubihate ne tshiji, Lamentations Monai, tshiamu tshia or tshiakubuitshidila
Nunku mukelenge wa Isalele ne Yehoshafata ne mukelenge wa Edome bakaya kudiye

Mu tshidimu tshia kumudilu tshia Kolesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa, bua kushikishabo dî dia Yehowa diakambeye mukana mua Yelemiya, Yehowa wakatabulusha mutshima wa Kolesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa; nunku yeye wakela mukenji ku nseke yonso ya bukelenge buandi, wakaufunda kabidi ne, Kolesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa, udi Wamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mu diulu, wakumpa makelenge onso a ha buloba; nyeye wakungelela mukenji bua meme kumuashila nsubu mu Yelushalema, udi mu buloba bua Yuda
Bua kutangila disele didibo banyungisha kudi luhehele, anyi
Bikala Yehowa ne disanka bualu buetu, yeye nealue n etu mu buloba ebu, neatuhebu; buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nengitabushe bua nuenu nunsangane, nenkudimune buhika buenu, nennusangishe bua kunûmusha mu bisamba bionso ne mu miaba yonso inakunuihata; nendue n enu kabidi mu muaba unakanuangata hanakanutuma mu buhika
Diakamue kapia kufuma kudi Maweja Nangila, kutema, kuosha milambu ya kuosha yonsu, ne mafuta a ku milambu mikuabu bivua pa tshilambuilu
Muntu udi ne dikenga munkatshi muenu, anyi
Nenvuishe Laba bu tshikumbi tshia tumelo, ne misoko ya Bena Amona bu mpangu ya mikoko; hashishe nenumanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete nkama ne nkama ne binunu ne binunu bakahita mu nshila; Davidi ne bantu bandi bakalonda ku nyima ne Akisha
Anu Yoshuwa, muana wa Nune, muena mudimu webe, ke wafikamu

Mukokeshi ikale ne buloba budi bushala, bukuabo ku lunga luseke ne bukuabo ku luseke lukuabo lua muaba udi usangisha buloba bujidila Nzambi ne buloba bua musoko hohamue; bukuabo buikale ku mpala kua mukalu wa muaba au wa coudées binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu tô ne ku butshika bua buloba bua Isalele ku luseke lua esete, bukuabo buikale ku luseke lua wesete lua muaba au wa coudées binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu tô ne ku butshika bua buloba bua Isalele ku luseke lua wesete; buloba budi buludiludi ne mahianyi a bisamba bia Bena Isalele, buikale buloba bua mukokeshi, ne tshituha tshia buloba tshidibo bajidila Yehowa ne muaba wa tshitendelelu nebikale munkatshi muabu
Muhote udi utudisha mei, kadi muntu kena mumanye malu adi kâyi manze kulua; udi mumanye mua kumuambila malu adi amulonda nganyi

Bua ditabusha Ebele wakafila kudi Nzambi mulambu muhite wa Kana buimpe, bua bualu buau yeye wakadi ne bualu buandi buambibua ne, Yeye wakadi muakane, Nzambi wamba bua kuha kuandi, ne bua bualu buaku yeye mufue utshidi wakula
Bena mudimu bakenza mudimu wabo; mudimu wakenda bimpe mu bianza biabo, bakalongolola nsubu wa Nzambi bu muakadiye diambedi, bakamuakasha
Yeye wakambila tatu wandi kabidi ne, Bangenzele bualu ebu; bandekele ngondo ibidi bua meme kuya ne balunda banyi ku mikuna bua kujinga matuku antshidi kamama
Biwikala mutshiangate kadi mukuabo, munyi mûdi uditumbisha bu mûdi kui mutshiangate
Udi mua kuluangana n andi nganyi
Nanku Maweja Nangila neanukengeshe bikole
Lutatu lua ku dituku ne ku dituku ludi lukumbane
Hashishe Amasaya, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakebesha bantu lungenyi, wakatumina Yoasha, muana wa Yehoaza, muana wa Yehu, mukelenge wa Isalele, dî ne, Lua biebe, tumonangane ku mesu

Nebashihe ngombe webe ku mesu kuebe, ne wewe kuena udia munyinyi wandi; nebanyenge mpunda webe ku mesu kuebe ku bukole, ne kabena bakuhingishileye; nebahe badi n ebe lukuna mikoko yebe, kakuena muntu wa kunusungila
Tshisamba ne tshisamba tô ne bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele nebitume bantu tshinunu ku nvita
Tshihuhu tshikole tshiakaha, mavuala akabuela mu buatu, buatu buakadi bûla tente ne mai
Bualu bua katuena tudiamba, kadi tudi tuamba Kilisto Yesu bu Mukelenge; ne tuetu bu bahika benu bualu bua Yesu
Bakashîa buatu ne tatu wabo lukasa, bakamulonda
Wewe neusungile bantu badi mu dikenga; kadi mesu ebe adi kudi badi badisue anu bua wewe kubahuekesha
Nunku nulombe mukelenge wa bintu bia kunowa, atume bena mudimu mu kunowa kuandi
Bakabakuata ne muoyo, bakabashiha ku dina dia mai dia mu nsubu wa bakoshi ba miosa, bu bantu makumi anai ne babidi
Mu dituku dinudi nunyukula bintu, nenufile muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Ndi nkusakidila, ndi nkutumbisha, wewe Nzambi wa bankambua banyi, wakumpa meji ne bukole, ne mpindiu wakummanyisha bualu butuakulomba kûdi; bualu bua waku tumanyisha bualu abu bua mukelenge
Wakamba biandi ne, Nakaluhuka mu difu dia mamu anyi butaka, nempingane butaka
Bantu kabakadi ne mai a kunua, bakadisangisha kudi Mose ne kudi Alona
Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Nakalota tshiota ne kakuena muntu udi mua kutshinjinguluila, kadi nakunvua lumu hebe ne, Wewe haunvua tshiota tshia muntu, udi mua kumujinguluilatshi
Mu bualu ebu tudi bamanye nyuma wa bulelela, ne nyuma wa mashimi
Nuambile bantu lumu lua luhandu luandi ku dituku ku dituku
Yesu wakabika, biandi, wakamulonda ne bayidi bandi

Exodus Besalele Wakenza mushete wa acacia Buludi bua mushete buakadi coudées ibidi ne tshituha, ne butshiama buau buakadi coudée umue ne tshituha, ne bule buau bua mulu coudée Wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ku nyima ne munda mua mushete, wakateka tshiamu tshia or ku mibangu ya mushete
