Bu meme muenze nunku, nakadi kudinga muoyo wanyi kakuena bualu bubi busokoka kudi mukelenge , hashishe wewe nkayebe wakadi kuluangana n anyi
Malu enu onso enjibue mu luse
Bualu dituku edi, ke didibu banukobolola, bajikija mikiya yenu
Chronicles Hashishe bantu ba mu buloba bakangata Yehoaza, muana wa Yoshiya, bakamuhingisha mu bukelenge mu muaba wa tatu andi mu Yelushalema
Kuoshi musenga wa manananshi udi kauyi mujidila ha tshioshelu, nansha mulambu wa nyama idiho bosha, nansha mulambu wa bukula, nansha mulambu wa nvinyo idiho banua

Yeye wakitaba ne, Nakadi ne lukunukunu lua bungi bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wa misumba; bualu bua Bena Isalele bakashiha tshihungidi tshiebe, bakela bioshelu biebe hanshi, bakashiha baprofete bebe ku miele ya nvita; anu meme nkayanyi ndi mushale, ne badi bakeba muoyo wanyi bua kûnyenga
Neanupandishe ku baluishi bonsu badi nenu mutumba
Bualu ebu kabukutatshishi
Toma wakamuandamuna ne, Mukelenge wanyi ne Nzambi wanyi

Yehowa neanuvuisbe bu mitu, kena unuvuisha bu mikila; nuenu nenuikale anu ku mutu, kanuena nuikala hanshi, binuatumikila mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, indi nnuambila lelu, binuayenza; binuikala kanuyi nusesuka lelu ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi ku mei andi nnuambila, bua kuya kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu
Muena mudimu yonsu uvua ne tshiende tshisumbu
Nebakumbaje mikenji yende
Wewe neubuikile mibi idi ha tshioshelu matuku muanda mutekete, utshijidile, tshioshelu netshikale bu tshintu tshitambe tshia tshijila, muntu yonso udi ulenga tshioshelu neikale wa tshijila
Ngasa ne ditalala bia kudi Nzambi Tatu ne bia kudi Kilisto Yesu, Musungidi wetu, bikale n ebe

Disanka ne tuseku bidi biumushibua mu madimi Heshebona ne Eleale badi badila, tô ne ku Yahaza badi bunvuisha bantu di diabo, ku Soâ tô ne ku Holonayima ne ku Egelata sheleshiya; bualu bua mai a mu Nimelima kabidi neakame
Samuele Dî dia Samuele diakafika kudi Bena Isalele bonso
Bika ubatijibua, uvuibue ku mibi yebe, Ubikila dina diandi

Yeye wakambila mulume wandi mei onso ne, Muhika webe, Muena Ebelu, uwakulua n andi mu nsubu, wakabuela kundi bua kunfuisha bundu, ne hanakela di dianyi, yeye wakashiya tshivualu tshiandi kundi, wakanyema
Bienzedi bia Yoasha bikuabo ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Bualu bua mushete wa Nzambi wakadi ne Bena Isalele tshikondo atshi
Muakuidi neafue munu wandi mu mashi makuabo, neâlabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia kahia, neahongolole mashi onso makuabo ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu
Hakamoneye Petelo ne Yone bamba kubuela mu ntempelo, wakabalomba tshintu
Bakaluangana nvita bikole dituku adi; bantu ba Davidi bakahita Abinê ne Bena Isalele bukole
Monai mutudi katui mua kujingulula bilumbuluidi biandi, mutudi katui mua kulonda nshila yandi

Ishi boshete, muana wa Shaula, wakadi ne bantu bahidi bakadi tupitene tua masalayi andi; dina dia mukuabo diakadi Bana, ne dina dia mukuabo Lekaba, bana balume ba Limona, Muena Bêlota, wa mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina bualu bua Bêlota udi wa tshisamba tshia Benyamina; diambedi Bena Belota bakanyemena mu Gitayima, bakashikamamu kale tô ne katataka
Yeye wakalala n andi butuku abu
Bana balume ba Bela bakadi Ada ne Nâmana: ne meku a Bena Ada ne meku a Bena Nâmana
Bualu bua wakamana kubuela mu dikisha diandi, yeye muine wakikisha kabidi ku midimu yandi bu muakikisha Nzambi ku midima yandi yeye
Muaba wakadi mukese bua bobo kushikama hohamue, bualu bua bintu biabo biakadi bia bungi, kabakamanya mua kushikama hohamue
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Meme ndi bu wewe, bantu banyi badi bu bantu bebe; tuetu netuye n ebe mu nvita
Muomumue, biamulombeye dikela, neamuhe kaminyiminyi, anyi

Bakabika Davidi ne dinda dionso, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudiye kudi muprofete wandi Gada, mumonyi wa malu wa Davidî, ne, Ya, wambile Davidi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ndi nteka malu asatu ku mpala kuebe, udisunguile bumue buau bûdi musue meme kukuenzelabu
Misoko yabo yakadi Etama ne Ayina, Limona ne Tokene ne Ashana, misoko itanu; ne misoko yabo yonso yakadi ha buihi ne bimenga biobimue tô ne ku Bâla
Kusha wakalela Nimeloda, yeye wakabanga kuikala muntu mukole
Udi mumanye mua kuela muonshi wa mukudi wa ntuhu mu diulu diandi, Yeye neakutendekene ne mitendekenu ya bungi, anyi
Kutupatulaye mu Ejipitu bua kutufikisha mu ditunga edi, divuaye musue kutupa, bu nuwuaye mulaye bankambua betu

Chronicles Bualu bukuabo kabidi, Davidi ne tupitene tua masalayi bakasungula bana balume bakuabo ba Asafa ne ba Hemana ne ba Yedutuna, bua kuimbabo misambu ne nzenze ne bisanji ne biamu bia kukumakasha; bungi buabo bakenza mudimu eu mu milongo yabo buakadi nunku: ba bana ba Asafa: Zakû ne Yosefe ne Netanya ne Ashalela, bana ba Asafa, bakadi ku nyima kua Asafa, wakimba bu muakadi mukenji wa mukelenge

Bualu bua misoko mudi nubaha munkatshi mua Isalele, bantu badi ne misoko ya bungi, nebabahe misoko ya bungi, ne badi ne misoko mikese nebabahe misoko mikese, nebahe Bena Lewi misoko bu bungi bua buhianyi buabo
Yeye kubambila ne: Meme ndi muena mudimu wa Abrahame
Badipu kulambula mitshi ya ndunga ivuabu mua kuenza nayi mudimu awu
Nudi nutangila ne, Muntu udi ubingishibua ku kuenza kuandi, kena ubingishibua anu ku ditabusha

Bualu bua bu mudi bungi bua misoko yenu, nuenu Bena Yuda, mbu mudi bungi bua nzambi yenu; bu mudi bungi bua misesu ya mu Yelushalema, mbu mudi bioshelu binuakuashila tshintu etshi tshia bundu, bioshelu mene bia kuoshilahu Bâla musenga wa manananshi

Ulue ne bana bandi balume kabidi, ubaluatshishe bikowelu, ubele manyi bu muwakela tatu abo bua kukuatshilabo mudimu wa buakuidibualu ebu nebubajidile mu mudimu wa buakuidi bua tshiendelele mu bikondo biabo bionso
Neakuakuile bua kufu to
Nuenu bakumbaje mikenji ya Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, benze mudiye musue, nenuikale tshisamba tshia bantu bende, bu muvuaye mumane kunulaya
Nebashale pabu mu dikenga bua dintombokela dienu, too ne panuabutuka bonsu, nuenu baledi babu

Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bitanu tshia bukelenge bua Amasaya, muana wa Yoasha, mukelenge wa Yuda, Yalobama, muana wa Yoasha, mukelenge wa Isalele, wakabanga kukokesha mu Samalea, wakabakokesha tô bidimu makumi anai ne tshimue
Yehowa kakahunga tshihungidi etshi ne batatu betu, kadi wakatshihunga anu n etu buonso buetu badi ne muoyo lelu eu
Nunku nenumushe mashi adi kâyi ne tshilumbu munkatshi muenu hanuenza malu adi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa
Nushale mu nsubu amu mene, nudie nunue bidibo banuha; bualu bua muena mudimu udi muakanyine bua kuangateye difutu diandi
Yeye wakamuambila ne
Bayidi ba Yone bakamuambila malu â onso

Kadi tshiena nyenga bukelenge buonso mu bianza biandi: nemmuvuishe mukelenge matuku andi onso bualu bua Davidi, muntu wanyi unakasungula, nuakatumikila mikenji yanyi ne mei anyi; kadi nenyenge bukelenge mu bianza bia muan andi mulume, nembufile kûdi, mbisamba dikumi mene mene
Wewe neubatshibule ne dikombo dia tshiamu; neubasunsulule bu mudibo basunsula luesu lua mufumbi wa ngesu
Bakalala mu nshila; hakatshiabu, bakafika ku Kaisalia
Yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku, Mukelenge
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamueneka kudi mukashi, wakamuambila ne, Tangila, wewe udi nkumba, kuena muanze kulela; kadi wewe newimite difu, neulele muana wa balume
Kadi pikala unudi basombeshe awu mupele, yeye munueyeke tshinkutu tshiende, numupingajiletshi dituku dionsu, butuku kabuyi buanji kuila
Kusongaye mabaya abidi a mitshi ya ndunga, kualamikaye tshiamu tshia mpawungi ku nseke yonsu
Nunku ndi nkusengelela ne, Udie luhiku ne mukelenge wanyi, mukelenge wa Ashû: nenkuhe tubalu binunu bibidi, biwamanya biebe mua kushikika bahandi ha nyima hatu
Yeye wakalua kabidi, wakabasangana balale tulu, bualu bua mesu abo akadi maneme ne tulu
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubandamuna ne: Nuenu, nudi bena lulengu ba kalandamusenga
Banfumu basatu bakuabo nebabike mu buloba bua Pelasa; hashishe, muinai neahite bakuabo bonso bubanji
Buakabuluibua Ku nyima kua bualu ebu nakatangila banjelo banai bimana ku matengu anai a buloba, bakuate mpehele mai ya buloba, bua luhehele kaluhehi ha buloba, anyi ha mai manene, anyi ha mutshi
Mu Luhangu lua Tshitendelelu Ek

Bua kanuakuangata nyuma wa buhika tshiakabidi bua kutshina; kadi nuakuangata nyuma wa buhianyi bua bana utudi tubikila n andi Nzambi ne, Aba, Nyuma Muimpe muine udi mumanyishangane ne nyuma yetu ne, Tuetu tudi bana ba Nzambi

Hangambila muntu mubi ne, Wewe muntu mubi, neufue bulelela, ne wewe udi uhanga kuamba dî dimue bua kudimusha muntu mubi bua kulekeleye kuenda mu nshila wandi mubi, muntu eu mubi neafue bua bubi buandi, kadi nendombe mashi andi ku tshianza tshiebe
Bua bualu ebu nakambila Bena Isalele ne, Muntu wa munkatshi muenu kadi mashi nansha muenyi udi munkatshi muenu kadi mashi
Kabidi mukoku, mbuji, ngombe kayena mua kupitshilaku bua kudia to

Ezela Au mmena a bakadi ku mitu ya nsubu ya batatu babo, eku nkulondolola kua bakafuma n anyi ku Babulona, mu bukokeshi bua mukelenge Atashasete: wa bana balume ba Pinehasa, Gêshoma; wa bana ba Itamâ, Danyele; wa bana ba Davidi, Hatusha; wa bana ba Shekanya ne ba Palosha, Zekâya; bakamubalabo n abo bakadi balume lukama ne makumi atanu
Kulondabu njila wa mu tshipela bua kuya luseke ludi Mayi manene makunze
Kumuelaye bilengejilu bia mpawungi mu nshingu
Bana betu bananga, mimanye bienu bualu ebu

Munkatshi mua bantu aba bonso muakadi bantu nkama muanda mutekete hasungula bakadi ne luboko; muntu yonso wakadi mumanye mua kuela mabue mu disoka, kâyi eku ne eku bu ntanta wa bunene bua lusuki, kayi uhanga
Gala wakaya ku mpala kua bena Shekeme, wakaluangana ne Abimeleke
Bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa bakashala mu tshituha ne bu muakadi dî ba Yehowa bakaya ku luendu, bakatumikila dî dia Yehowa, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Men abo akadi Yishemaele, muana wa Netanya, Yohanana ne Yonatana, bana balume ba Kalea, Selaya, muana wa Tanehumeta, bana balume ba Efai, Muena Netofa, ne Yezanya, muana wa Muena Mâka, bobo mene ne bantu babo
Ntshidi ne bukole lelu, bu munakadi n abu dituku diakantuma Mose; bu muakadi Bukole buanyi dituku adi, mbu mutshidibu katataka, bua kuluangana nvita ne bua kuya ne bua kuhingana
Tuetu katuena batentekedi to
Muakuidi neatonde milau ei mu mukanda, neanumushe mu mai a bululu, neamushe mukashi mai a bululu adi elesha mulau, ne mai adi elesha mulau neabuele munda muandi, neikale mai a bululu
Kadi, uteleshile muanenu Arone bilamba bia tshijila bia lumu ne butumbi bia mudimu wende
Mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye bakalekela bantu
Muntu yonso wakangata dilonga diandi, wakatekamu kahia, wakatekahu musenga wa manananshi, bakimana ne Mose ne Alona ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Luke Yeye wakabanduluka, wakamona bantu babanshi bela diha diabo mu tshibutshilu

Hakumukabo kudiye bualu bua bakamushiya ne disama dikole , bantu bandi mene bakamuelela tshifufu, bualu bua mashi a bana balume ba Yehoyada muakuidi, bakamushiha mu bulalu buandi, wakafua; bakamujika mu musoko wa Davidi, kadi kabakamujika mu nkita ya bakelenge
Hashishe ba messager bakalua kudi Shaula ku Gibea, bakamba mei au onso mu matshu a bantu: bantu bonso bakabisha mei abo, bakadila
Yeye wakamba ne Monai, diba ditshidi mulu, kandiba dia kusangisha bimuna nansha, nuishai mikoko mai, yai bienu nuyidishe
Tubale Kayine uvua ne muanabu wa bakaji, dina diende Naama
Nunku Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu mundi meme ne muoyo, nenkulongoluele mashi ne mashi neakulonde, bualu bua wewe wakuhua hawakumatshisha mashi abo hanshi, mashi neakulonde
Abalama wakatshidi uya ku Sude
Kadi Ponto ne Bânaba bakabatutuila nsenga ya buloba yakadi mu makasa abo, kakalua ku Ikonio
Genesis Yakoba wakaya mu nshila wandi ne banjelo ba Nzambi bakasambakena n andi

Angata blé, orge, nkunde minene, nkunde ya kambula, mponda, ne êpeautre; ubiele mu luesu lumue, enza n abi bia kudia; ne mu matuku au onso audi ulala ku luseke luebe, matuku nkama isatu ne makumi tshitema, neubidie

Dituku dia kumudilu nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, kadi nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa bana babidi ba ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bintu bisatu bia dikumi ku ngombe ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko to ne ku bana bonso ba mikoko muanda mutekete, ne mulume wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi
Yeye wakabakonka bua malu abo ne, Tatu wenu, muntu au mununu unuakungambila, udi mukole, anyi
Nakalunuisha bakelenge bonso ba mu Tulo, bakelenge bonso ba mu Sidona ne bakelenge ba mu maloba a ku muelelu wa mai manene
Esau wakamuambila ne, Tuyai bietu, meme nenye ku mpala kuebe
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Eu Babulona mimene, tshiakuibaka musoko eu bu muaba wa mukelenge kushikameye ku bukole buanyi bunene bua mpete butumbi ne buneme, anyi
Kakadia tshintu matuku au; hakashikau, yeye wakadi ne nsala
Yoshua wakahita Amaleka ne bantu bandi bukole ne muele wa nvita
Munda mua nsubu muakadi mabaya a cèdre masonga ne maoshi ne bilongo, onso akadi a cèdre, nansha dibue dimue diakamueneka ku mesu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, Mukelenge, nakuitabusha ne, Wewe udi Kilisto, Muana wa Nzambi, nyeye ulualua ha buloba
Bakunvua di dia Yehowa Nzambi wendakana mu budimi dilolo, mulume ne mukashi bakasokoma munkatshi mua mitshi ya mu budimi ku mesu kua Yehowa Nzambi
Kakuakadi munga wakamanya mua kuhandisha tshimpanga ku bukole bua mpumbu
Hakatshiabu, tuakafika ku Sidona; Yulio wakenzela Paulo bimpe, wakitabusha bua yeye kuya kudi balunda bandi bamukuatshishe
Hashishe meme, Danyele, nakatangila, ekumona, bantu bakuabo babidi bakadi bimane ku musulu, mukuabo dia munemu, mukuabo dia muamua
Hakaluhukeye, bena mudimu ba mukelenge bakatua, bakatangila, ne monai, bibi bia ku nsubu wa kulu biakadi bihanga; Bakambilangana ne, Bulelela, yeye udi ubuikila makasa andi mu nsubu wa kulu

Wakafunda mei mu mikanda ei ne, Nuele mukenji bua bantu bajile bia kudia, nushikike Nabota munkatshi mua bantu banene; nushikike bantu babidi bena lukinu ku mpala kuandi, bobo bamudingile ne, Wewe wakuhenda Nzambi ne mukelenge kabidi
Bua muanda au mukelenge Beleshasâ wakakuatshika buowa bikole, mpala wandi wakandamuka, ne mitshima ya milono yandi yakalubakana
Pa tshilambuilu tshianyi kanuena mua kundambula mulambu wa kuosha wa tshimuna tshifue mesu, nansha tshitebuke, nansha tshikoseke tshidimba, nansha tshikale ne disama pambidi

Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo, wakananukila kubatumina bambi bandi; bualu bua wakadi ne bantu bandi ne muaba wandi luse; kadi bobo bakaseka bambi ba Nzambi; bakahetula mei andi, bakahenda baprofete bandi tô ne hakamueneka tshiji tshia Yehowa kudi bantu bandi tshidi katshiyi tshishika
Panuapeta bintu bia bungi, kadi kanuyi nuenzela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, mudimu ne disanka, ne muoyi wenu mujima, Maweja Nangila neanutumine baluishi, banukuate ku bupika
Bakelenge Ahaba ne Budimi bua Nabota Ku nyima kua malu â Nabota, Muena Yizelele, wakadi ne budimi bua tumuma tukese mu Yizelele ba buihi ne nsubu wa Ahaba, mukelenge wa mu Samalea
Bakamutandisha ne, Wewe udi muyidi wandi, tuetu tudi bayidi ba Mose

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu misoko ya ku mikuna, mu misoko ya mu Tshibanda, mu misoko ya ku luseke lua Sude, mu buloba bua Benyamina, mu miaba idi hehi ne Yelushalema ne mu misoko ya mu Yuda, mikoko neyihitshile muinshi mua maboko a badi bayibala
Ne, Abalahama wakitabusha Nzambi, ne ditabusha diandi diakabadibua bu buakane
Biashala bidimu bikese tô ne ku tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, bobo nebabibale, yeye neamuhingishile tshituha tshia kudihikula n atshi bu bungi bua bidimu biandi bidi bishala
Hakabuela Elisha mu nsubu, wakasangana muana mufue muladika ha bulalu buandi
Bena Efelayima, nennuenzele tshinyi
Bayidi bakenza bu muakabambila Yesu; bakalongolola Kuhita kua Yehowa
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakabakuata, yeye wakumuka
Uvuluke mua kuasa nzubu ewu anu mushindu umvua mukuleje ku mukuna eku
Nebapange bukole bua kuluangana mvita
Dina diandi diakadi Mefibosheta

Bobo bakashikama mu Bê sheba ne mu Molada ne mu Hasâ shuala ne mu Bileha ne mu Eseme ne mu Tolada ne mu Betuele ne Hôma ne mu Sikelaga, ne mu Bete makabota ne mu Hasâsu sima ne mu Bete bili ne mu Shâla yima

Muntu udi mûkute udi udiata dikatshi dia buitshi muinshi mua makasa, Bu mudi nyunyu udi uhambuka, umuka ku disua diandi, Manyi ne manananshi bidi bisankisha muntu; Kulekedi mulunda webe ne mulunda wa tatu webe; Muan anyi, wikale ne meji, usankishe mutshima wanyi, Muntu mudimuke udi utangila dikenga diamba kumukuata, udi usokoma; Angata tshivualu tshia muntu udi mueyeke muenyi tshieya; ukuate udi mueyeke ba tshisamba tshia bende Biavudishila muntu muena mutumba n andi disanka ne dî dikole ne dinda dionso, Kumatamata kua mai dituku dia nvula wa mudimbi Udi ukeba kumukanda udi bu udi ukanda luhehele, Bu mudi tshiamu tshisakisha tshinga tshiamu, Muntu udi ulama mutshi wa nfigi neadie mamuma au, Bu mudi mpala umueneka mu mai, Muaba wa Bafue ne wa Kubutuka Luesu ludiku lua kulengesha tshiamu tshia argent, Biwatua muhote ne muinshi mu tshinu Umanye bimpe mudi mushindu wa bisumbu bia mikoko yebe, Bualu bua biuma kabienaku tshiendelele; Hatahabo bisoso bia kudisha bana ba mikoko nebikaleku bua bivualu biebe, Newikale ne mabele a mbushi makumbane bua bia kudia biebe, Nsumuinu Bantu babi badi banyema kakuyi muntu udi ubihata, Bua ditomboka dia ba ha buloba bakokeshi babu badi ba bungi; Muntu muhele udi ukengesha bahele Badi balekela kulonda diyisha dia mikenji badi batumbisha bantu babi, Bantu babi kabena bajingulula kulumbulula kuakane, Muntu muhele udi wenda mu buakane bua mutshima udi utamba Udi utumikila diyisha dia mikenji udi muana mulume udi ne meji, Udi utudisha biuma biandi ku kasombela ne ku makasa Udi umusha matshu andi ku diyisha dia mikenji, Udi uhambuisha bantu bakane bua bobo bende mu nshila mubi Muntu mubanji udi wela meji ne, Ndi ne meji, Hatumba bantu bakane, butumbi bunene budiku; Udi usokoka matomboka andi kena wikala ne diakalengele, Disanka didi kudi muntu udi utshina malu mabi misangu yonso, Bu nyama wa ntambue udi udila, anyi bu nkashama udi ukeba nyama ya kudia, Mukokeshi udi kayi ne lungenyi udi mukengeshi mukole kabidi; Muntu udibo bahisha bualu bua mashi a munga muntu adi ham bidi handi aye mu dijimba; Muntu udi wenda mu buakane neahandishibue, Udi udima budimi buandi neikale ne bia kudia bia bungi, Muntu udi mua kueyemenyibua neavudishibue ne masanka a bungi, Kulesha kansungusungu kakuena kuimpe; Muena lukuka udi wenda lukasa bua kuheta biuma, Udi ubela muntu neahete diakalengele dihite Udi wiba bintu bia tatu andi anyi bia mamu andi, Udi ne mutshima wa lukuka udi usonsola matandu, Udi weyemena mutshima wandi udi muhote, Udi uha bahele bintu kena ukengela tshintu, Habuela bantu babi mu bukokeshi, banga bantu badi basokoma; Nsumuinu Muntu udi mubedibue misangu ya bungi, kadi udi wela mpala mulu, Hikala bantu bakane ne bukokeshi, bantu badi basanka; Muntu udi unanga meji udi usankisha tatu andi, Mukelenge udi ujadika buloba buandi ku kulumbulula kuakane, Udi ubomba muena mutumba n andi Mu ditomboka dia muntu mubi mudi buteyi, Muntu muakane udi mumanye ne, Bahele badi bakengela kulumbulula kuakane, Babuidi badi batemesha kahia mu musoko, Biatandangana muena meji ne muhote mu tshilumbu, Badi bakeba kumatshisha mashi badi bakina muntu muakane; Muhote udi uhatula tshiji tshionso tshidiye n atshi, Biunvua mukokeshi mei a mashimi, Muhele ne mukengeshi badi basangile hamue; Bialumbuluisha mukelenge bahele ne lulamatu lua bushuwa, Lukodi ne kubela bidi biyisha meji, Hikala bantu babi mu bukokeshi, ditomboka didi didiunda; Kengesha muan ebe bua kumuyisha, ne neakuhe dikisha; Bikalaku kakuyi tshikena kumona tshia muprofete, bantu badi balekela kudikanda; Kabena bamanye mua kuyisha muhika ne mei nkayau; Udi umona muntu udi wamba mei andi lukasa lukasa, anyi
Wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu bisatu; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Mâka, muana wa bakashi wa Abashaloma

Samuel Muntu mubi wakadiku, dina diandi Sheba, muana wa Bikili, Muena Benyamina; yeye wakela mpungi, Wamba ne, Nunku Bena Isalele bonso bakalekela kulonda Davidi, bakalonda Sheba, muana wa Bikili; kadi Bena Yuda ba ku Yadene tô ne ku Yelushalema bakalamata mukelenge wabo
Bualu bua wewe kuakamudimusha, yeye neafue mu bubi buandi, ne kabena bavuluka bienzedi biandi biakane biakenzeye; kadi nendombe mashi andi ku tshianza tshiebe
Wakimana biandi hankatshi ha bantu bafue ne bantu bakatshidi ne muoyo, ne disama diakashika

Mu tshikondo atshi hakadi Eli mulale mu muaba wandi mesu andi akavua bileshileshi, kakamanya mua kutangila bimpe ; muinda wa Nzambi kawakanji kujima ne Samuele wakadi mulale tulu mu ntempelo wa Yehowa kuakadi mushete wa Nzambi: Yehowa wakabikila Samuele, ne yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku

Davidi wakabikila Sadoka ne Ebeyatâ bakuidi, ne Bena Lewi ne miele ne Asaya ne Yoele ne Shemaya ne Eliele ne Aminadaba, wakabambila ne, Nuenu nudi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu ba mu nsubu ya Bena Lewi; nudijidile ne nuenu ne bana benu, bua nuenu nulue ne mushete wa Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ku muaba unakûlongoluela
Bualu uvua musue kumusha muntu mukuabu kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, uvua munupatula ku bupika mu Ejipitu
Mitshi ei yakatamba bule, bakamanya mua kumona nsongo yai mu muaba wa tshijila ku mpala kua mushete; kadi kabakamanya mua kuyitangila ha mbelu; udiku tô ne ku dituku edi
Tuetu bonso katuena ne tatu umue, anyi
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kubweja mianda ya mapa a muntu yônso mu ndongamu yônso idi itangila dilongesha dia beena bilwilu , bampulushi ne beena midimu ya bukubi bwa ditunga
Abashaloma wakebesha Hushai ne, Elu nduse luebe kudi mulunda webe, anyi
Yeye wakamutangila talalâ tô ne bakamukuata bundu
Bikala muenyi munkatshi muenu udi musue kuvuluka kuhita kua Yehowa, yeye nênze bu mudi mikenji ya kuhita kua Yehowa, nenuikale ne mukenji umue kudi muenyi ne kudi muntu mulela munkatshi muenu
Kadi muanabute wa balume wa nyama wa mpunde, numupikule ku muana wa mukoku
Nakuiba bintu bia nganyi
Wewe Bete saïda, mulau ulualua kûdi
Mu mikenshi ya Mose yeye wakutuambila ne, Nukume bantu badi benza nunku mabue; ahu wewe udi umuamba tshinyi
Yeye wakabambila ne, Bua bakuya ne Mukelenge wanyi, tshiena mumanye kuakumuladikabo
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Bantu nebalue kabidi, bafume mu misoko ya bungi

Bua muakuidi munene wa nunku wakadi mutukumbane, wa tshijila, kai ne bubi, kai mubiha, mutahuluke kudi bantu babi, muvuishibue ha mutu ha mulu; udi kai ne bualu, bu muakadi n abu bakuidi banene aba, bua kufila milambu ku dituku ne ku dituku, diambedi bua mibi yandi yeye, hashishe bua mibi ya bantu; bua yeye wakenza bualu ebu musangu umue tshiendelele hakadifileye
Ke bikulu ba Esawu bavuabu balele kudi Elifaze, muana wa mukajende Ada

Nehemiya Kutendelela kua Ezela bua Kutondabo Mibi kudi Bena Isalele Bena Isalele bakadisangishaku mu dituku dia makumi abidi ne anai dia ngondo eu, bakajila bia kudia, baluate bilulu bikayabala, bakadiela luhuishi ham bidi
Tudi tutendekena Nzambi bua nuenu kanuenji bualu bubi; kembua tuetu kumueneka bu bantu badibo bitabusha ne, Mbakane, kadi bua nuenu nuenze malu malengele; nasha tuetu bikala bu babengibue
Wakamena luhanza, wakasakidila Nzambi, wakabaha ne, Nuai buonso buenu; bualu bua elu ludi mashi anyi a dihungila, akamatshila bantu ba bungi bualu bua kubajimishila mibi yabo
Bidiye wamba, bidi bilelela
Bualu bua matu a ku Kitima nealue kudiye ne nvita, ne mutshima wandi neuneme bujitu
Kabobo bonso bakaluhuka mu Ejipitu ne Mose kabakenza nunku, anyi

Hakahita matuku asatu, Paulo wakabikila bakadi ku mutu kua Bena Yuda; hakunguilabo, wakabambila ne, Bana betu, tshiakenza bibi kudi bantu anyi ku bilele bia bankambua betu, kadi mu Yelushalema bakaufila musuika mu bianza bia Bena Lomo
Yeye wakalala n andi butuku abu
Kadi Hamana wakadikanda, wakaya kuandi; wakatuma dî, wakabikila balunda bandi ne mukashi wandi Zeleshe
Nunku yeye wakafunda mikanda mu dina dia Ahaba, wakatekahu tshimanyinu tshiandi; wakatumina bakulu ne bantu banene ba mu musoko muakadi Nabota mushikame mikanda ei
Tuetu bakamba ne, Kabena mua kuyaku, bikala muakuny etu kayi muye n etu, bualu bua katuena mua kumonangana ne muntu au ku mesu bikala muakuny etu kayi n etu

Bantu ba Davidi bakatshina kumuambila ne, Muana udi mufue; bualu bua bakamba ne, Monai, hakatshidi muana ne muoyo tuakayikila n andi ne yeye kakunyua dî dietu; monai, udi mua kutamba kunyingalala bituamuambila ne, Muana udi mufue
Deuteronomy Â mmei a tshihungidi akambila Yehowa Mose bua kuhanga ne Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Moaba, ku mutu kua tshihungidi tshiakahungeye n abo mu Holeba
Lota waka luhuka kudibo wakinshila tshibi ku nyima kuandi
Dî diakakudimuka muntu, diakuikala munkatshi muetu tshituha, diakadi diule tente ne ngasa ne bulelela; tuakumona butumbi buandi, buakadi bu bua muana umuehele udi mulela kudi Tatu wandi
Kadi Bena Lewi kabakenzesha bualu ebu lukasa
Nunku wewe Palô nebakutshibule munkatshi mua badi kabayi batengudibue, neulale hohamue ne badi bashihibue ku muele wa nvita
Kanuena ne diakalengele bishi
Kadi bantu badi bannange, batumikile mikenji yanyi, nembanange, mbenzele bimpe too ne ku ndelanganyi tshinunu
Kututangidi tuetu bu badi ne tshilumbu tshia lufu lua muntu ewu to
Bakalua n au kudiye
Bobo bakashikama mu miaba yabo tô ne hakayabo mu buhika
Hakaluangana Bena Amona ne Bena Isalele nunku, bakulu ba mu Gilada bakaya kuangata Yefeta ku buloba kua Tobo; bakambila Yefeta ne, Lua biebe, wikale kapitene ketu bua tuluangane nvita ne Bena Amona
Bantu kabakamuoshela bintu mu madilu andi bu muakenzelabo batatu bandi
Bakumuka mu Halada bakashikama mu Makehelota
Bana benu bonsu nebikale bapika bende
Nebatshinke difutu dia mudimu uvuaye mukuate bilondeshile difutu didi muena mudimu upeta ku dituku ku dituku
Nanku nelupatule mayi
Biwamona ne, Mbimpe bua kuya n anyi ku Babulona, lua n anyi, ne meme nenkuenzele bimpe
Batuangaji bamiamine mashi a mukoku awu ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Mu matunga awu, nenuikale nutendelela mvidie ya mabue, nansha ya mitshi misonga kudi bantu, idi kayiyi imona, kayiyi yumvua, kayiyi idia, nansha inunkila
Bena Izrayele kumbuka ku Kibrote Taawa, kuya kuasa mitanda yabu ku Asherote
Uhe bonso badi bakulomba; bianyenga muntu bintu biebe, kumulombibi kabidi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona mu mukuna wa Hô, hehi ne butshika bua buloba bua Edome ne, Alona neadisangishe kudi bankambua bandi, yeye kena ubuela mu buloba bunakalaya Bena Isalele, bualu bua nuenu nuakuhidia dî dianyi ku mai a Meliba
Bikala mulambu webe wa bukula budibo balamba mu dilonga, newikale wa bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene busangisha ne manyi
Nanku, mu ditunga didi Maweja Nangila munupe bua kusomba, neanutumine tshipupu tshia disama dia tshiambu bua kunubutula
Aba mbana ba balume ba Esau, aba mbakelenge babo, eu udi Edome
Ne ditekemena kadiena difuisha bundu, bualu bua luse lua Nzambi luakitshikila mu mitshima yetu kudi Nyuma Muimpe wakafukeye
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bikalabo kabai bunvua mei a Mose ne a baprofete, kabena bitabusha biabika muntu wa mu bafue
Eliya wakabanda ha mutu ha Kâmele; wakinama hanshi, wakateka mpala wandi hankatshi ha binu biandi
Dibika dia bantu bafue didi nunku kabidi
Ngasa kunudi ne ditalala bia kudi Nzambi Tatu wetu ne kudi Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto
Ku luseke luandi lukuabo Ezê, muana wa Yeshua, mukokeshi wa Misepa, wakalongolola tshituha tshikuabo, buludiludi ne nsubu wa bintu bia nvita ku ditumba dia lumbu
Petelo wakamukonka ne, Mukelenge, tuetu nkayetu mbûdi welela lusumuinu elu, anyi udi welela bantu bonso
Bidimu bia Enoshe bidi nkama tshitema ne bitanu
Bungi bua Bena Lewi bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona bu muakambila Yehowa, ku meku abo, balume bonso ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu, buakadi binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu mundi ne muoyo, muan enu wa bakashi Sodoma ne bana bandi ba bakashi kabakuenza malu audi wewe ne bana bebe ba bakashi nuenza
Bakakosa Sheba, muana wa Bikili, mutu, bakawela kudi Yoaba

Hakadiye wenda hehi ne dishiba dia Galela, wakamona balume babidi, bana ba muntu umue, Simona, udibo babikila ne, Petelo, ne muan abo Andele, bakadi bela kahamba mu dishiha; bualu bua bobo bakadi bilembi
Ne biasungidibua muntu muakane anu ne bualu bukole, muntu udi kai wa Nzambi ne udi mubi neamueneke kudi kunyi

Kadi bakuidi bakuabo ne Bena Lewi ne bakadi ku mutu kua biota bia batatu babo, bantu banunu bakadi batangile nsubu wa diambedi, hakatangilabo bishimikidi bia nsubu eu bijadikibue ku mesu kuabo, bakadila ne dî dikole; bakuabo bakela mbila bua disanka; nunku bantu kabakamanya mua kutahulula mbila ya disanka ku muadi wa bantu bakadi badila; bualu bua bantu bakabandisha mbila bikole, mbila yakunvuika kule
Tangilai, kabena balue ne mashi a mulambu mu nsubu munda mua tshitendelelu; nuakadi kûdia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bu munakamba
Kadi enze mudimu, apete difutu, bu mudi muena mudimu, nansha bu mudi muenyi udi ku nzubu kuenu, upeta
Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, Muena Efelayima wa mu Zeleda, wakadi muntu wa Solomo, ne mamu wandi wakadi Seluya, mukashi wa mu lufuila, wakatombokela mukelenge kabidi

Davidi wakasangisha bana balume ba Alona ne Bena Lewi: ba bana ba Kohata, Uliele mukelenge, ne bana babo lukama ne makumi abidi; ba bana ba Melali, Asaya mukelenge wabo, ne bana babo nkama ibidi ne makumi abidi; ba bana ne bana babo lukama ne makumi asatu; ba bana balume ba Elisafana, Shemaya mukelenge wabo, ne bana babo nkama ibidi; ba bana ba Hebelone, Eliele mukelenge wabo, ne bana babo makumi muanda mukulu; ba bana ba Uziele, Aminadaba mukelenge wabo, ne bana babo lukama ne dikumi ne babidi
Kadi nukumbaje bionsu binuvua balaye Maweja Nangila
Bu muakahidiabo kuikala ne Nzambi mu meshi abo, nunku Nzambi wakabafila ku meshi a hatuhu akahidleye, bua kuenzabo malu adi kâi makanangane ne lungenyi
Numuleje tshidiye ne bua kuenza, kabidi ne tshintu tshidiye mua kuambula
Biahidia mukashi kukulonda, hashishe, munda muebe nemu ikale mutoke ku kuditshiha eku
Ebu mbualu bunudi ne bua kuenza: nushihe mulume yonso ne mukashi yonso wakamana kulala ne mulume
Wakidikisha biluwa biatshi ne mbalanda watshi, wakabimona hikala ne luidi luolumue ne lua bibuelelu bikuabo
Hashishe hatula kalondo ka manyi, wahongoluela ha mutu handi, umuambile ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakukusungula mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele
Bankambua betu mbabo, kudibo nkudi Kilisto mufume mu buntu buandi, udi biandi ku mutu kua bonso, Nzambi mene, mutumbishibue tshiendelele
Yosefe wakabumusha hankatshi ha binu biandi, wakatua mpala wandi hanshi

Yesu wakabamona batata ne kuita, bualu bua tshihehele tshiakadi tshibahingisha; hakadi diba bu ha inai hatshiatshia, yeye wakalua kudibo, wenda ha mutu ha mai; yeye wakamba kubasesuka; kadi bobo, hakamumonabo wenda ha mutu ha mai, bakela meshi ne, Mukishi, bakahandalala ne mei makole, buonso buabo bakamumona, bakatshina
Wakaya tshiakabidi, wakatendelela Nzambi, wakamba ne, Tatu wanyi, bikala luhanza elu kalui lumanya mua kumuka kundi, bikala bualu bunkuata bua kulunua, bualu buenjibue bu mûdi musue
Hakashikisha Davidi kufila milambu ya kuosha ne ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, yeye wakavudishila bantu disanka mu dina dia Yehowa

Bena Ngilaade bavua basangile kabidi ne meku aa: diku dia bena Iyezere, ndelanganyi ya bena Iyezere; dia bena Eleke, ndelanganyi ya Eleke; dia bena Asriyele, ndelanganyi ya Asriyele; dia bena Shekeme, ndelanganyi ya Shekeme; dia bena Shemida, ndelanganyi ya Shemida; ne dia bena Efere, ndelanganyi ya Efere
Yakoba wakambila bantu bandi ne, Sangishai mabue, bobo bakangata mabue, bakunguisha mushiki wa mabue, bakadia bidia kukala kua mushiki
Bantu bonsu bavua bafue mu tshipupu etshi bavua
Hanakatangila ne nuenu kanuakansungila, nakateka muoyo wanyi mu tshianza tshianyi, nakasa buka kudi Bena Amona, ne Yehowa wakabafila mu tshianza tshianyi; nuakalua kundi bua kunduisha lelu munyi
Adisunguile muaba udiye musue munkatshi muenu
Mulombodi yonsu kuangata dikombu diende

Mose wakamba ne, Katuena mua kuenza nunku, bituashihela Yehowa Nzambi wetu nyama, netuenze bualu budi bufuisha Bena Ejipitu bundu, bituenza bualu budi bufuisha Bena Ejipitu bundu ku mesu, bobo kabena batukuma ne mabue, anyi
Nakukulengesha ne bilenga, nakakuela tukanu ku maboko, nakakujingila lukanu mu nshingu, nakakuela kakanu ku diulu ne tukanu tukuabo ku matshu, nakakuasa tshifulu tshia butumbi
Udilongolole dinda, Ulue biebe ne dinda ku mukuna wa Sinai; Ulue biebe kundi ku mutu kua mukuna

Yeye wakakudimuna dî ne, tô ne halua Yehowa kumusha bantu bua kubateka kule, Biashalamu tshia dikumi, Isaiah Mu matuku a Ahaza, muana wa Yotama, muana wa Uziya, mukelenge wa Yuda, Lesine, mukelenge wa Sulia, ne Peka, muana wa Lemalaya, mukelenge wa Isalele, bakabanda mu musoko wa Yelushalema bua kuluangana n abo, kadi kabakamanya mua kubatshimuna
Nunku nuenze bu munuakuditshiha, nushikishe mitshihu yenu
Yeye wakambila muendeshi wa dikalu diandi ne, Wahuke, umuke n anyi munkatshi mua masalayi bualu bua ndi mutaha mputa mukole
Ubulule mesu ebe, umone dibutuka dietu ne dia musoko udi muinyika dina diebe
Samuel Mushete wa Yehowa wakadi mu buloba bua Bena Peleshete ngondo muanda mutekete
Nunku mukelenge wa Ashû wakahingana kuabo, kakashikama mu buloba bua Isalele
Woshe bintu bionsu abi, bua bikale mulambu wa kuosha wa dipembu dimpe udi unsankisha meme Maweja Nangila
Nunku nuenu nudi bakane ku mesu kua bantu, kadi munda muenu mudi mûle tente ne lubombo ne tshishiku
Samuel Bena Zifa bakalua kudi Shaula mu Gibea, bakamuambila ne, Davidi kena usokoma mu mukuna wa Hakila udi ku mpala kua tshihela, anyi
Davidi wakelela baminyampala bonso ba mu Isalele mukenji bua kukuatshishabo Solomo muan andi, wamba ne, Yehowa Nzambi wenu kena n enu, anyi

Mu matuku au kabidi nakamona ne Bena Yuda bakadi babake bakashi ba Bena Ashedodo ne Bena Amona ne Bena Moaba; bana babo baledibue bakakula tshituha tshia muaku wa Bena Ashedodo, kabakamanya mua kuakula muaku wa Bena Yuda, kadi bakakula miaku ya bantu ne ya bantu

Bualu bua tubalu tua Palo ne makalu andi ne masalayi akadi enda ha nyima ha tubalu biakaya mu mai manene ne Yehowa wakahingasha mai ha mutu habo, kadi Bena Isalele bakenda ha buloba bûme munkatshi mua mai manene
Bakabika hatshiatshia, bakahanda ku mutu kua mukuna mule bakamba ne, Tudiku, netuye ku muaba wakatulaya Yehowa, bualu bua tuakenza bualu bubi

Tudi tusakidila Nzambi misangu yonso bua buonso buenu tutela mena enu mu milombu yetu, katui tulekela kuvuluka mudimu wenu wa ditabusha ne mudimu wenu mukole wa dinanga ne dinanukila dienu dia mu ditekemena dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto, ku mesu kua Nzambi udi kabidi Tatu wetu
Bulelela, yeye udi muakunyi wanyi, udi muana wa tatu wanyi, kadi kena muana wa mamu wanyi, ne yeye wakalua mukashi wanyi
Pilato wakakema ne, Ukadi mufue katataka; wakabikila kapitene ka masalayi lukama, wakamukonka ne, Ukadi mufue musangu mule, anyi
Nzambi wakamba ne, Etshi tshidi tshimanymu tshia tshihungidi tshindi nteka hankatshi hetu ne bintu bionso bidi n enu to ne tshiendelele
Davidi wakamba ne, Nzambi wakahatuka kudi bena lukuna banyi bu mudi mai ahatuka
Leya kuamba ne: Ndi ne dikasa dimpe be
Lea wakadi ne mesu a bulengu, kadi Lakele wakadi muimpe mubidi ne mpala wandi
Neumukume ne mabue, neumushihe; bualu bua yeye wakakeba mua kunusesuisha mu nshila wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu
Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakalua ham bidi hanyi mu muaba au, yeye wakangambila ne, Juka, ya biebe mu mpata, nenyikile n ebe aku
Hakashikishabo kudia, Yesu wakakonka Simona Petelo ne, Simona wa Yona, wewe udi mutambe aba bakuabo kunnanga, anyi
Yuda wakambila bana babo ne, Hatuashiha muan etu, ne hatuasokoka mashi andi, netushale ne tshintu kai
Kadi yeye wakabambila ne, Nansha, nuakuluila anu bua kutangila ne buloba budi hatuhu
Daniel Dayawesha wakamona ne, Mbimpe bua kuteka miloho lukama ne makumi abidi mu bukelenge buandi bua yoyo ikokeshe bukelenge buonso

Esetê Esetê Udi Ulaya Môdekai bua Kuakuila Bantu Bandi Hakamanya Môdekai malu onso akenzabo, Môdekai wakadihanda bilulu biandi, wakadiluatshisha bilulu bikayabala, wakadiela butue ham bidi, wakaya munkatshi mua musoko, wenda, udila bikole; wakalua ku mpala kua tshibi tshia mukelenge, bualu bua muntu kakamanya mua kubuela mu tshibi tshia mukelenge muluate bilulu bikayabala
Nealele bana

Obeda edome wakalela bana balume: Shemaya muanda bute, Yehozabada muibidi, Yoa muisatu, Sakâ muinai, Netanele muitanu, Amiele muisambombo, Yisakâ wa muanda mutekete, Peuletai wa muanda mukulu; bualu bua Nzambi wakamusankisha
Nzambi wakambila Mose ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Bakambila Davidi ne, Yehowa wakavudishila Obeda edome disanka bualu bua mushete wa Nzambi
Bualu bua nuakangata biamu bianyi bia argent ne bia or, ne nuakaya ne bintu bianyi bia mushinga mukole mu ntempelo yenu
Bafue Badi ne meji nebakenke bu bintu bia mu diulu, ne badi balombola bantu ba bungi ku buakane nebakenke bu mitoto kashidi ne kashidi
Bakaya ku musoko mukuabo
Misambu Nzambi wanyi, Nzambi wanyi, wakundekela tshinyi
Hakahita matuku abidi, wakumukamu, wakaya mu Galela
Udi usokoka mpala webe bua tshinyi
Wa bana ha Yoaba, Obadaya, muana wa Yehiele; bakadi n andi bakadi balume nkama ibidi ne dikumi ne muanda mukulu
Bana babo ba difu dimue bakamuambila ne, Umuka kunoko, ya mu Yudaya bua bayidi bebe kabidi bamone malu a kukema audi wenza
Bialua mukuenu muntu muhele, biahaneye tshituha tshia buloba buandi, ne bialua bana babo bua kubuhikula, badi mua kuhikula buloba buakahanabo kudi muan abo
Ba bungi bakamudingila, kadi mei abo kâkakanangana
Nebukadenesâ wakaya kabidi ne mpanza mikuabo yakadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, wakayiteka mu ntempelo wandi wa mu Babulona
Nuenu bana bakashi ba mu Yelushalema, meme ndi mufike kadi ndi mulengele bu nsubu ya ntenta ya mu Kedâ ne bu bilulu bikudika bia Solomo
Bakumuka mu Yotebata, bakashikama mu Abalona
Udi ne mikiya kabidi ke ngulube, bualu udi ne mikonu mipanduluke, kadi kena upingaja bintu mukana, ibidia kabidi
Bakamunyunguluka, bakalala butuku buonso ku tshibi tshia ku musoko, bamuindile balamine; bakalala talalâ butuku buonso bamba ne, Tuanji kumuindila ne hatshiabu, netumushihe
Au mmena a balume badi mua kuimana n enu
Ne bikala muntu kai ne Nyuma wa Kilisto, kena wa Kilisto nasha
Mose wakalua ne bana balume ba Alona, wakabaluatshisha tuzaku, wakabasuika ne mikaba, wakabasa bifulu ku mitu yabo, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Balume bonso bakadi ne lungenyi lule munkatshi mua bena mudimu bakenza nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bilulu dikumi bia lin muimpe ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû, bakenza bakeluba kudi bena mudimu bakadi ne lungenyi lule
Yone wakitabusha
Yakoba wakasemena ha buihi ne Isaka tatu andi, yeye wakamulengela tshianza tshiandi, wakamba ne, Dî ndia Yakoba kadi bianza mbia Esau
Shaula wakahingana kuandi, katu Davidi ne bantu bandi bakaya ku musoko wa lumbu
Yolama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi
Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Butoke buenzeke
Netusangishe minyinyi yonso ya mu mai manene bua kubadisha, anyi
Diabolo wakabanda n andi, wakamulesha makelenge onso a ha buloba tshikondo tshimue
Lufu, kalonda kebe kadi hanyi
Wampidia meme ne wahidia mei anyi udi ne mumulumbuluishi; dî diakamba nedimulumbuluishe dituku dia kunshikidilu
Nunemeke mukenji ewu wa dikisha, bituadije ku dilolu dia matuku tshitema a ngondu, too ne dilolu dia matuku dikumi a ngondu
Numubikile, alue biandi kudia bidia

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bikala mundi wa munkatshi muenu anyi wa munkatshi mua tunkanunuma dienu munyanguke ku dilenga dia mundi mufue, anyi bikaleye muye ku luendu kule yeye neavuluke kuhita kua Yehowa
Bena Lewi bakadi ku mutu kua biota bia batatu abo bakadi ne mena abo mafunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua bankambua tô ne ku matuku a Yohanana, muana wa Eleyashiba
Muntu wakuosha bintu ebi neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne ku nyima neuhingane mu tshitudilu

Wakangata kabidi diminu dia mu buloba ebu, waka dikuna mu budimi buakadi ne buloba buimpe; wakaditeka hehi ne mai a bungi, wakadikuma bu mutshi wa saule, diakatoloka, ne diakalua muonshi udi ulamba kauyi mutambe bule, matamba a muonshi atangilangana n andi, ne miji yau iya muinshi muakadiye
Yehowa wakasamisha mukelenge ne disama dia nsudi tô ne ku dituku dia lufu luandi; wakashikama mu nsubu ha buandi
Bienzedi Hakahita matuku atanu, muakuidi munene wa Nzambi, dina diandi Anania, wakahueka ne bakulu bakuabo ne mubakuidi, dina diandi Têtulo, bakabanda Paulo ku mesu kua ngovena

Nuenze malu onso kanui ne ditontolola ne dielangana dia mpata; bua nuenu nulue bantu badi kabai ne bualu ne badi ne mitshima mitoke, bu bana ba Nzambi badi kabai ne tshilema munkatshi mua bena tshikondo tshikonyangala ne tshia tshishiku; banudi numueneka munkatshi muabo du minda ya ha buloba, nuboluele dî dia muoyo; bua meme kuikala ne bua mua kutumbila n abu mu dituta dia Kilisto ne, Tshiakidikisha lubilu tshianana ne tshiakenza mudimu wanyi hatuhu
Kadi nsuki ya ku mutu kuandi yakahanga kumena kabidi, hakamubeyabo
Bualu bua tshianza tshia Mukelenge tshiakadi n andi
Binasua kuditumbisha, tshiena ntshimbakana; bualu bua nengambe anu mei malelela
Wewe neubafile mu bianza bianyi, anyi
Bualu bua munkatshi mua bantu nganyi udi mumanye malu a muntu
Yeye wakangambila ne, Muana wa muntu, mifuba ei idi bonso ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele
Mona, meme nengimane ku mpala kuebe ha mutu ha dibue dia Holeba, wewe neukume dibue ne mai neahatuke, bantu banue mai Mose wakenza nunku ku mesu kua bakulu ba Bena Isalele
Bualu bua Yehowa wakahangidisha bua kukudimuna mei mimpe akamba Ahitofele bua Yehowa enzele Abashaloma bualu bubi
Yakobe kuimanyika dibue pa lukita luende alu

Nakadi mu ngendu bihungu bia bungi; nakadi ne njû mu misulu, ne njû kudi banyengi, ne njû kudi bena tshisamba tshianyi, ne njû kudi bisamba bia bende, ne njû mu bimenga, ne njû mu tshihela, ne njû mu ma
Wakatuma muntu wandi mukuabo; bakamukuma yeye kabidi, bakamuenzela bibi, bakamuhingisha hatuhu
Ha mutu ha muntu yonso hakutuka dibala, ne bakubeya muevu wa muntu yonso; ha bianza bia muntu yonso hadi mputa yakuditaheye, mu tshifuka tshia muntu yonso mudi bilulu bikayabala

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nengitabushe kabidi bua Bena Isalele bandombe bua mbenzele muanda eu wa kubakumbashila bantu bua bikale ba bungi bu tshisumbu tshia mikoko, bu tshisumbu tshia mikoko yakajidilabo bu milambu ya kufila kudi Yehowa, bu tshisumbu tshia mikoko ya mu Yelushalema mu bikondo bia bidia biabo bia disanka, nunku misoko yakadi bikulu diambedi neyule tente ne bisumbu bia bantu; nunku nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Lehabama ne Yalobama bakaluangana nvita matuku onso a muoyo wabo

Hanakatekemena diakalengele, dikenga diakalua; Munda muanyi mudi mukungulu, kamuena muhuwa; Ndi ngendakana mufikishibue, kadi kembua munya; Nakulua muan abo ne nyama ya mibuabua, ne mulunda wa nyunyu ya nfiondo
Yesu wakamukonka ne, Wewe neunfuile, anyi

Hakatangila mukelenge mukashi wa mu Sheba lungenyi luonso lua Solomo, ne nsubu wakaseye, ne bia kudia ku mesa andi ne bu muakashikikeye bena mudimu bandi ne dikuatshisha dia miloho yandi ne bilulu biabo ne batuadi ba makoho andi ne tshibandilu tshiakadiye ubandila ku nsubu wa Yehowa, yeye kakadi ne mutshima wa kumukudimuna dî
Yeye wakadi ha buloba, buloba buakafukibua kudiye, kadi ba ha buloba kabakamumanya
Numuambile ne, Mukelenge udi n andi bualu
Meme hanyi nakela mashi a musoko ha dibue didi hatuhu, bua kâbuikidibu, ne bua ajule tshiji tshianyi bua kudisombuela
Kabidi, tshilambuilu tshijima tshikale tshilamike tshiamu tshikunze
Natana wakambila mukelenge ne, Ya wenze malu onso adi mu mutshima webe bualu bua Yehowa udi n ebe
Binuahidia kuitabusha malu a ha buloba anakunuambila, nudi bamanye mua kuitabusha binanuambila malu a mu diulu munyi
Haluhuka nyuma wa bukoya munda mua muntu, nyuma udi wendakana mu miaba idi kayi mai, ukeba ha kuikisha, kena ubamona
Yehowa, bua muntu webe, ne bua malu adi mu mutshima webe, wewe wakuenza malu â onso manene bua kumumanyisha malu â onso

Bialua tshiole nansha tshihuhu anyi biakuata bintu mamoma ne butu, nansha mikumbi nansha meshi, biatshintshimika bena lukuna misoko yabo; bialua makenga ne masama onso; biakutendelela ne biakutendekena muntu yonso, nansha Bena Isalele bonso, bualu bua muntu yonso udi mumanye disama diandi ne ntatu yandi, ne biololabo bianza biabo ku nsubu eu; unvue biebe mu muaba webe mu diulu; ubabuikidile mibi yabo, ufute muntu yonso bu muakadi bienzedi biandi, nguewe udi mumanye mutshima wandi bualu bua wewe nkayebe udi mumanye mitshima ya bantu ; bua bobo bakutshine, bende mu nshila yebe hatshidibo bashikame mu buloba buwakaha batatu betu
Bua misangu yonso inuadia bidia ebi ne inuanua luhanza elu, nudi nuambila bantu bua lufu lua Mukelenge tô ne halueye
Bena Isalele bakumuka mu Lamesese bakashikama mu Sukota
Genesis Sala wakadi ne bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete, ebi mbidimu bionso bia muoyo wa Sala
Numanye ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neanupe ditunga edi dimpe, kadi ki mbua buakane buenu to
Nemwulangane
Kapia kujima
Kora kubikila bena Izrayele bonsu muaba uvua Moshe ne Arone bimane, pabuipi ne mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Bua mei a mukelenge ne a miloho yandi, mukelenge mukashi, mamu muledi wa mukelenge, wakabuela mu nsubu wa bidia bia disanka
Muanjelo wakambila bakadi bimane ku mpala kuandi ne, Vulai bivualu ebi bia bukoya ham bidi handi
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu
Bualu ebu budi bukuatshisha kudi kunyi

Kanungu ka Mudimu wa tshipwita munwamfwanka wa ditunga anyi wa tshipwita mukulumpa udi ujika ne : a ndekeelu wa bukalenga; b lufu ; c didilekeela dia mudimu; d tshipumbishi tshia kashidi; e dipangila dinanuka; f dipumbisha kadiyi dimanyishibwa ne dianyishibwa ku mudimu mu tshia binaayi tshimwe tshia matuku a mudimu; g diumusha didibo balongolola kudi dîyi dia masungulangana; h ditabuuja dia mwânzu udi kawuyi umvwangana ne mudimu wa bu tshipwita munwamfwanka anyi wa bu tshipwita mukulumpa ; i dipiila kadiyi dia kutontolola dia dinyooka dinene dia lukanu bwa tshilema tshienza tshielela meeji
Kadi, tshidi ne mikiya too ne ku dilolu, pashishe mikiya idi ijika
Bakamuitaba ne, Tudi bana babo ne Ahazaya, tuyaya bua kuela bana ba mukelenge ne bana ba mukelenge mukashi muoyo
Buloba ebu buonso, tshituha tshia buloba tshijidila Yehowa tshisangisha ne tshituha tshia buloba tshia musoko, buikale ne coudées binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu ku nseke yabu yonso

Mabue a mai makuatakasha kudi mashika Wakalela dibungi Mai adi akuatakana bikole bu mabue, Wewe udi mumanye mua kusuika nkanu ya ku mitoto ya Tshidiminanzashi, anyi kusulula mukaba wa mitoto Udi mua kulombela mitoto ya mu Mazalota Udi mua kulombela mutoto wa Ourse Munene Wewe udi mumanye mikenji idi Nzambi welela bintu bia mu diulu, anyi
Bualu bantu aba mbamane kumona butumbi buanyi, ne malu a dikema andi mubenzele mu Ejipitu ne mu tshipela

Hakadi Yoshua hehi ne Yeleko, wakabanduluka, wakatangila ne, monai, muntu wakadi muimane hehi n andi ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza tshiandi, ne Yoshua wakaya kudiye, wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi ku luseke luetu anyi ku luseke lua badi n etu lukuna
Netubufuanyikishe ne lusumuinu kai
Balume nkama isambombo ba mu tshisamba tshia Dana, bakadi ne bintu bia nvita bisuika ham bidi habo, bakumuka ku Solea ne Eshetaola

Hanuahanga kuluangana, muakuidi neasemene ha buihi ne bantu, neabambile ne, Bena Isalele, unvuai, nuakusemena hehi ne bantu badi n enu lukuna bua kuluangana n abo lelu: kanuikadi ne mitshima mitekete, kanuikadi ne buowa, kanuzakadi, kanubatshinyi; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuluila, bua kuluangana ne badi n enu lukuna ne bua kunusungila
Yesu wakalenga ku tshianza tshia mukashi, kahia kakamulekela; yeye wakabika, wakamulongoluela bia kudia
Mose wakamba ne, Nenye kutangila bualu ebu bua kukema ne, Munyi katshi kakena kahia
Nembashihe ne disama dikole, nembahidie, nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshidi tshibahita bunene ne bukole
Bena Peleshete bakadi n andi mukau
Nakenzenza bualu ebu kabidi mu Yelushalema; hanakangata bukole kudi bakuidi banene ba Nzambi, nakabuesha basanto ba bungi mu nsubu ya lukanu; hakimbabo kubashiha, nakitabusha
Umanyishe Yoshuwa ne: meme nembutule bena Amaleke bonsu
Unvua kutendekena kua muntu webe ne kua bantu bebe Bena Isalele hadibo balomba mu muaba eu; ubunvuile mu diulu mu muaba webe ûdi mushikame; ne hau nvua, utubuikidile mibi yetu
Hakahita matuku a bungi, Yehowa wakangambila ne, Juka biebe, uye ku musulu wa Pelata, wangateku mukaba unakakuambila bua kûsokokaku
Nunku yeye wakankonka ne, Muana wa muntu, wakumona muanda eu, anyi
Mu ntenta amu, utekemu mesa a tshijila, mikale ne mampa a kundambula meme Mvidi Mukulu
Hakambeye dî edi, wakabalesha bianza biandi ne lubadi luandi
Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku dinai

Biafila muntu mulambu eu bua kubakidila Nzambi, yeye nealue kabidi ne mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene busangisha ne manyi, ne mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene miela manyi ha mutu, ne mikata ya bukula bubotesha budi busangisha ne manyi
Hashishe Davidi ne bakulu baluate bilulu bikayabala bakatua mpala yabo hanshi
Basatu badiku badi bamanyisha, Nyuma ne mai ne mashi: basatu aba badi bamanyisha bualu bumue
Moshe ne Elazare kuteka bintu bionsu bia tshiamu tshia mpawungi, bivuabu bafile kudi balombodi ba bena mvita abi, mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bua Maweja Nangila ikale uvuluka bena Izrayele

Bakasungula binunu makumi abidi ne binai bua kuikalabo tuhita tua bena mudimu ba mu nsubu wa Yehowa; bantu binunu bisambombo biabo bakadi balami ne balumbuluishi; bantu binunu binai bakadi balami ba ku bibi; bantu binunu binai bakatumbisha Yehowa ne bintu biakenza Davidi bia kumutumbisha n abi
Pikala muntu ujadikila mukuabu tshilumbu tshia dishima, bantu aba babidi nebaye natshi kudi batuangaji, ne kudi balumbuluishi badi balumbuluisha bilumbu dituku adi mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu
Bintu bionso bidi muntu udi kayi muakane ulenga bianza nebikale bu bintu bidi kabiyi biakane, ne muntu udi ubilenga tshianza neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo

Bikala bakuabo bamuangalake tô ne ku ditengu dia diulu, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neabasangisheku, neabahingisheku kabidi; ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nealue n enu mu buloba bua batatu benu, ne nuenu nenubuhiane; yeye neanuenzele bimpe, neanuvudishe ha mutu ha hatatu benu
Luhehele ne mai a dishiba bidi bimunvuila

Muntu mubi mu kudisua kuandi udi wihata bantu bahele bikole; Bualu bua muntu mubi udi ufunafuna bua malu adi mutshima wandi musue, Muntu mubi udi wamba mu diambu diandi ne, Nzambi kena ukengesha muntu
Bingikala ngumusha bademon mu dina dia Belezebula, bana benu badi babumusha mu dina dia nganyi
Kadi bua tatu wandi mene, bualu bua wakakengesha bakuabo bikole, wakanyenga bintu kudi bana babo ku bukole ne wakenza malu adi kâyi makane munkatshi mua bana babo; monai, neafue bua mihi yandi
Wakaya ne bantu baneme ba mu buloba ebu, bua bukelenge buikale buhuekele, bua kabudibandishi kabidi, kadi bumanye mua kujalama ku kutumikila kua tshihungidi
Hakalua Lumingu lukuabo lua Bayuda, yeye wakabuela mu nsunagoga, wakayisha bantu; muntu wakadiku ne tshianza tshiandi tshia balume tshiume
Muntu udi mua kueyemenyibua hadiye ne bintu bikese neikale mua kueyemenyibua kabidi hikaleye ne bintu bia bungi; muntu udi mubi hadiye ne bintu bikese neikale mubi kabidi hikaleye ne bintu bia bungi
Hashishe Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka bansentedi ba masalayi, wakaya ne bantu bakashala mu musoko mu buhika ku Babulona, ne bakadi badifila kudiye, ne bantu bonso bakadi bashala
Wakadi ne muana wa balume, dina diandi Shaula, wakadi nsongalume muakane; munkatshi mua Bena Isalele kamuakadi muntu mukuabo wakamuhita bulengele; wakahia bantu bakuabo bule ku makaya andi ne ku mutu
Hashishe, wewe umuambile ne, Mbintu bia muntu webe Yakoba
Bademon bakamutendekena ne, Biwatumusha, ututuma mu tshisumbu tshia ngulube
Muntu mupolangane dinu, bamupole diende

Nebangate tshilulu tshia bleu, nebabuikile hatshi bitekelu bia minda ne minda, ne bintu bidibo bajima habi minda, ne tuhanza tua mishila ya kahia, ne bihanza bia manyi adibo bakuatshisha n au minda nebateke minda ne malonga ne bintu ebi bionso mu tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebabiteke ha mitshi ibidi idi mikuatakasha

Davidi wakashikama ne Akisha mu Gata, yeye ne bantu bandi, muntu ne muntu ne ba mu nsubu wandi, ne Davidi ne bakashi bandi babidi, Abinoama, Muena Yizelele, ne Abigayila, muena Kâmele, wakadi mukashi wa Nabala
Nutabale biakane, nulekele kuenza malu mabi; bualu bua bakuabo kabena bamanye Nzambi

Yeye wakamba ne, Edi ndî dia Yehowa diakambeye kudi muntu wandi Eliya, Muena Tishebe, ne, Mbua neyidie Izebele mu muaba wa Yizelele; ne mubidi wa Izebele newikale bu tunvi ha mutu ha buloba bua Yizelele nunku kabena mua kuamba ne, Eu udi Izebele kabidi

Ônana wakambila Davidi ne, Utshiangate, mukelenge wanyi enze biandi malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuandi; mona, ndi nkuha ngombe ya mulambu wa kuosha ne mitshi ya mu tshihehuidi bua nkunyi ne blé bua mulambu wa bukula; ndi nkuha bionso
Pashishe neabiteke bionsu mu bianza bia muntu awu
Kapitene ka masalayi kakakuata Selaya, muakuidi munene, ne Sefanya, muakuidi muibidi, ne balami basatu bakadi balama mishiku ya mbelu ya nsubu
Bobo bakasangisha bana babo, bakadijidila, bakabuela bua kulengesha nsubu wa Yehowa bu muakadi mukenji wa mukelenge ku mei a Yehowa
Bualu bua Nzambi wakatamba kusua ba ha buloba, yeye wakabaha Muan andi umuehele mulela bua muntu yonso wamuitabusha kafu biandi, kadi ikale ne muoyo wa tshiendelele
Paulo wakamba ne, Nasha ne kalu kakese nasha ne bualu bunene, ndi ndomba Nzambi kambua wewe nkayebe kadi bua bonso badi bunvua mei anyi lelu kabidi, balue bu mundi emu, anu nkanu ei idishadile

Muntu mubanji wakadi ne bisumbu bia mikoko ne bia ngombe bia bungi; kadi muntu muhele kakadi ne tshintu, anu kana ka mukoko kamue, kakasumbeye, kakadisheye; bakadiunda kudiye ne bana bandi; kakadia bidia biandi, kakanua mai a mu luhanza luandi mene, kakalala mu tshiadi tshiandi, kakadi bu muana mukashi mulela kudiye
Bena Netinima bonso ne bana ba bahika ba Solomo bakadi nkama isatu ne makumi tshitema ne babidi
Bantu aba basatu, wewe udi wela meshi ne, Muena kuabo ne wakatukidila mu bianza bia banyengi nganyi

Bakulu basatu ba Davidi bakadi baya ku nyima kua Shaula bua kuluanganabo nvita: mena a bana balume basatu ba Yishai bakaya ku nvita akadi Eliaba, muan a bute, ne Abinadaba wakamulonda, ne muisatu Shama
Munyi muamutendekenabo kabai banze kumuitabusha
Kahia bakahatuka kudi Yehowa, kakosha mulambu ne dianyi biakadi ha tshioshelu, hakakatangila bantu bonso, bakela mbila, bakatua mpala hanshi
Muntu yonsu udi ne disama difuanangane ne dia nsudi, nebamufile kudi mutuangaji

Nunku Bena Isalele bonso bakalua ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa bela mbila ne tshiona tshikole tshia nshiba ne mpungi ne tshia biamu bia kukumakasha, bakadi bimba nzenze ne bisanji ne dî dikole
Kadi Mâta wakadi utata ne mudimu wa bungi wa mu nsubu; yeye wakalua kudi Yesu, wakamukonka ne, Mukelenge, kuena ubenga bua muakunyi anyi anshile mudimu nkayanyi, anyi

Hashishe mukelenge wakabikila bakulu bonso ba mu buloba, wakabambila ne, Tangilai bu mudi muntu eu ukeba diyoyo; wakantumina mukenji bua kuangateye bakashi banyi ne bana banyi ne argent yanyi ne or yanyi; tshiakabenga nansha
Yehowa neabafile mu bianza bienu, nuenu ne nubenzele bu mudi mikenji yonso inakanuambila
Bantu aba bakaya, bakatentekela Ai
Mutuangaji oshe bintu bionsu abi pa tshilambuilu, bualu mmulambu udibu boshila Maweja Nangila
Binuikala nusesuka bua kulekela kulonda ku nyima kuandi yeye neabashiye mu tshihela, yeye neashihe bantu aba bonso
Kutangidi panyima, kuimanyi pa muaba
Edene ne Miyamina ne Yeshua ne Shemaya ne Amalia ne Shekanya bakadi ku nyima kuandi mu misoko ya bakuidi ba mu midimu yabo, bua kuabanyangana ne bana babo bintu, ne banene ne bakese
Muntu ne muntu udibo babala neafile tshituha tshia nshekele Muntu ne muntu udibo babala wakabita bidimu makumi abidi neafile kuha kua Yehowa
Bakabakudimuna ne, Baye ne mushete wa Nzambi wa Isalele ku Gata
Bakulu bonso ne bantu bonso bakamuambila ne, Kunvu dî diandi nansha, kuitabushi nansha
Tshisumbu tshiabo tshionso tshiakabahungulukila, balumbuludi bakabavula bilulu biabo, bakamba ne, Bubakume ne nkodi
Hakadiye utendelela Nzambi ha nkayandi, bayidi bakadi ha buihi n andi; yeye wakabakonka ne, Bantu badi bangamba meme ne, Nganyi
Wakateka tshiowelu hankatshi ha ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshioshelu tshia mulambu ya kuosha, wakelamu mai a kuowa, akadi Mose ne Alona ne bana bandi balume bowesha n au bianza ne makasa
Kukonka Yakobe ne: Baudi muende nabu mbanganyi
Nebanufile mu dikenga, nebanushihe; bisamba bionso nebikale n enu lukuna bua dina dianyi
Tumue tuvua tusuma amu kusuma bantu ne nyama
Aba mbana ba tatu wa Etama: Yizelele ne Yishema ne Yidebasha; dina dia muan abo wa bakashi diakadi Haselele poni; Penuele, tatu wa Gedô, ne Ezê, tatu wa Husha
Pashishe bena Izrayele kubenda, kuyila njila wa ku Bashane
Bana betu batuakaya n abo bakatekesha mitshima ya bantu; kadi meme nakalonda Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi
Bualu bua meme nakamulelela muana mu bununu buandi
Muntu eu Mose wakadi ne kalolo be, wakatamba bantu bonso ba ha buloba ne kalolo
Nudi nudikolesha ku muele wenu wa nvita, nudi nuenza malu a bundu, ne buonso buenu nudi nunyanga bakashi ba bena mutumba n enu; nenuhiane buloba ebu munyi
Muana wa balume udi unemeka tatu andi, muhika udi unemeka nfumu wandi; kadi bingikala tatu, kunemekibua kuanyi kudi hanyi
Helode wakamukeba; hakahangeye kumumona, wakebesha balami, wakabalumbuluisha ne, Baye n abo bua kubashiha
Lufu nelubakuate bonsu, bansongalume ne bansongakaji, bakulumpe ne bana
Udi unowa udi wangata difutu, udi usangisha bintu bia ku muoyo wa tshiendelele; bua mukunyi ne munowi basanke hohamue

Palô wakakohola kakanu ka tshimanyinu tshiandi tshifundahu ku munu wandi, wakakela ku munu wa Yosefe, wakamuluatshisha bilulu bia lin, wakamuela lukanu lua or mu nshingu muandi, wakamuendesha mu dikalu dibidi dia bukelenge, wakela mbila ku mpala kuandi ne, Tuai binu hanshi, wakamuteka mu bukelenge bua buloba bua Ejipitu buonso Palo wakambila Yosefe ne, Meme ndi Palo, ne biwikala kuyi muambe di diebe, muntu kena mua kubisha tshianza tshiandi anyi dikasa diandi mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Zechariah Muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi wakalua kabidi, wakambisha bu mudibo babisha muntu ku tulu tuandi
Kadi bu wewe mua kupeta bantu bakane anu makumi anayi ne batanu, batanu bakuabu kabayiku, neubutule tshimenga tshijima bua batanu abu anyi
Kanungu ka Tshingenyingenyi tshiônso anyi bulongolodi bwa dîyi bônso badi babujooja bilondangana kudi bibambalu biônso bibidi bwa kwanyisha mukanda wa momumwe
Bena Yosefe Badi Banyanga Betele Bena Yosefe bakaya bua kuluisha Bena Betele; Yehowa wakadi n abo
Munyinyi wonso kawena muomumue nasha; kadi munyinyi wa bantu udiku, ne munyinyi mukuabo wa nyama, ne munyinyi mukuabo wa nyunyu, ne munyinyi mukuabo wa mishiha
Kanuena bamanye mua kukuatshila Nzambi mudimu ne Mamona diakamue
Biamubakisheye kudi muan andi wa balume, yeye neamuenzele bu mu tshilele tshia bana ba bakashi
Kayeu aha
Hashishe Labashake wakimana, wakela dî dikole mu muaku wa Bena Yuda, wakamba ne, Unvuai dî dia mukelenge munene, mukelenge wa Bena Ashû mene
Udi ne matshu unvue budi Nyuma wambila ekelesia
Kadi katataka udi ndua kûdi; udi ngamba malu â ha buloba bua disanka dianyi kukumbanadi munda muabo
Diabanyangana dia makookeshi pankatshi pa Mbulamatadi ne polovensa didi ne tshia kwenzeka mu bulongolodi bwa mutu wa mukanda IV bwa Dîyi ditudi nadi edi
Yesu wakabanda ku mukuna, wakashikamaku ne bayidi bandi
Wewe Kolazina, mulau ulualua kûdi
Moshe ne Arone kudiela mpala panshi
Wewe wambile Bena Isalele ne, Muntu yonso udi uhenda Nzambi wandi nendituadile bubi buandi
Hakahita matuku makuabo, Paulo wakambila Bânaba ne, Tuhingane bua kutangila bana betu ba mu Kilisto ba mu misoko yonso ituakadi tuambila dî dia Mukelenge, tumone ne badi munyi
Samuele wakakonka ne, Yehowa udi utamba kusanka bua milambu ya kuosha ne nyama mishiha bu mudiye usanka bua kutumikila kua dî dia Yehowa, anyi
Nzambi ya bisamba bia bantu biakubutula batatu banyi, Bena Gozana ne Bena Halana ne Bena Lesefe ne Bena Edene bakadi mu Telasâ, yakabasungila, anyi

Hakahita matuku asatu, bakamusangana mu ntempelo, mushikame munkatshi mua bayishi, unvua mei abo, ubakonka malu; bantu bonso bakadi bunvua mei andi bakakema bualu bua lungenyi luandi ne bualu bua mei akabandamuneye
Malu anuvua bangambile avua a meji
Mpunda wakatangila muanjelo wa Yehowa, wakalala hanshi muinshi mua Belâma, tshiji tshiakakuata Belâma, wakakuma mpunda ne mulangala wandi

Bua bikala mashi a mbushi ne a balume ba ngombe, ne butue bua muana wa ngombe mukashi bumiamina ha bantu bakunyanguka, bibajidile tô ne ku dilengesha dia mubidi wa ha buloba, mashi a Kilisto, wakadifila kudi Nzambi kai ne ditoba, bua Nyuma wa Tshiendelele, neatambe misangu bungi munyi kulengesha muoyomukese webe ku midimu mifue bua kukuatshila Nzambi udi ne muoyo mudimu
Muinshi wa manananshi awu, neubuikile mushete wa ndondu ne tshibuikidiji tshiawu
Ne banjelo muanda mutekete bakadi ne makenga muanda mutekete bakaluhuka mu ntempelo, baluatshishibue mabue a mushinga mukole, matoke ne makenka, banyungulule ne mikaba ya ngolo ha biadi biabo

Bualu bua Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakamana kumuela mu lukanu alu, umubanda ne, Bualu kai wewe udi wambila bantu dî, wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, nenfile musoko eu mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Babulona, ne yeye neaunyenge
Buloba budi buzakala bualu bua tshiona tshia kubutuka kuabo, muadi udiku ne tshiona tshiau tshidi tshiunvuika tô ne ku Mai Manene Makunze
Wewe Bete saîda, mulau ulualua kûdi
Bakaji banyi, umvuayi tshindi nnuambila: Eyowa ndi nshipa muntu padiye untapa mputa
Kadi Paulo wakamba ne, Ndi muimane ku tshilumbuluidi tshia Kaisa, bundi n abu bua kulumbuluishibuaku; tshiakuenzela Bena Yuda bibi, bu mûdi wewe mene mumanye bimpe kabidi
Bulelela, badi batatakana anu bua bualu bua hatuhu
Mu Luseta muakadi muyidi, dina diandi Timote, muana wa Muena Yuda mukashi wakadi muena kuitabusha, kadi tatu wandi wakadi Muena Gelika
Abalahama ne Sala bakadi ne bidimu bia bungi, bakadi bakoke, miloû ya bakashi yakashika kudi Sala
Kadi kunyingalashi mutshima bualu bua nyama ya mpunda yakadi mijimine matuku asatu ahitshi, bualu bua hakamana kuyisangana
Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala udibo bafila kudi Yehowa

Yeye wakangambila ne, Nyama eu muinai Bua nsengu ei dikumi, umanye ne Yeye neadiule Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu diulu ne mei mabi, Kadi mu diba adi nebakose tshilumbu, Nebafile bukelenge ne bukokeshi ba mu makokeshi onso makuabo nebabakuatshile mudimu ne nebatumikile mei abo

Nuakunyua dî diakambabo ne, Sua mukuenu, ikala ne udi n ebe lukuna tshishi; kadi meme ndi nuambila ne, Suai badi n enu lukuna, lombelai badi banukengesha Nzambi; nunku nenuikale bana ba Tatu wenu udi mu diulu; bualu bua yeye utu wabandishila bantu babi ne bantu bimpe diba, yeye kabidi utu watumina bantu bakane ne bantu babi nvula
bakuabo lukama lukama
Wakundinga nunku bua tshinyi

Mona, mukuabo wa Bena Isalele wakalua kudi bana babo ne mukashi wa Bena Midiyana ku mesu kua Mose ne ku mesu kua tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, hakadibo badila ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Bualu bua Ezela wakadi mujadike mu mutshima wandi bua kukeba mikenji ya Yehowa ne bua kuyenza ne bua kuyisheye Bena Isalele mikenji ne mei majalame
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu, uvua mutue netu ndondu mu mukuna wa Sinayi
Petelo wakamuambila ne, Nasha, tô ne tshiendelele wewe kungoweshi makasa
Mêyi a ditunga adi ne tshia kuleeja mushindu wa kusanka ne mapa aa
Bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; Yehowa wakanusungula munkatshi mua bantu bonso ba ha buloba bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi

Yosefe wakaya kujika tatu wandi, ne bena mudimu bonso ba mu nsubu wa Palô, ne bakulu ba mu nsubu wandi, ne bakulu bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa Yosefe ne bana babo bonso, ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi, bakaya n andi, anu bana bakese ne mikoko ne bimuna biakashala mu buloba bua Goshene
Udi ukulomba tshintu umuhetshi, udi musue kukusomba tshintu kumukomi nyima
Muntu wa Nzambi wakamuebesha ne, Tshiakahona kudi kunyi
Hakoweshabo tshitalu tshiandi, bakatshiteka mu nsubu wa ha mutu
Bidi bihita buakane munkatshi mua bintu binudi nuhuola diambedi, ne maha a munkatshi mua bintu bionso binudi nufila kudi Nzambi, bikale bintu bia bakuidi
Bia kudia bikole bidi bua bantu bakole, bia bobo mene badi ne meshi abo mibidila a kujingulula n au tshidi tshimpe ne tshidi tshibi, bualu bua bakalonda malu makane
Ikale anu muena Izrayele
Pavua bantu bajuka ne mushete wa ndondu, Moshe uvua wela diyi dikole, wamba ne: Maweja Nangila, juka, bua bena lukuna bebe bamuangalake, baluishi bebe banyeme
Bualu bu mudi Maweja Nangila mufike munda, kabutu nkamane kutuadija
Yeye neibakile dina dianyi nsubu; yeye neikale muan anyi, meme nengikale tatu wandi; nenjadike nkuasa wa bukelenge buandi mu Isalele tshiendelele
Bantu bakadi batamba kuhungila; bakaya bua kuhaula bintu bia Bena Peleshete, bakakuata mikoko ne ngombe ne bana ba ngombe, bakaushiha, bakayidia ne mashi ai
Bangate kabidi ngombe mulume, mukoku wa tshimpanga bua mulambu wa bobumue

Bakulu basatu ba Davidi bakadi baya ku nyima kua Shaula bua kuluanganabo nvita: mena a bana balume basatu ba Yishai bakaya ku nvita akadi Eliaba, muan a bute, ne Abinadaba wakamulonda, ne muisatu Shama
Yeye wakahunga dî ne Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, ne Ebeyatâ muakuidi; bobo bakalonda Adoniya, bakanutatshisha

Eu udi mudimu wa bana balume ba Kohata udibo benza ne bintu bia tshijila mu ntenta wa kusambakena, hayabo ku luendu Alona neabuelemu ne bana bandi balume nebatuhe tshilulu tshikudika, nebabituale hatshi mushete wa Nzambi, nebâteke tshibuikilu tshia biseba bia nkonge ha mutu hatshi, nebâteke tshilulu tshifike ha mutu hatshi kabidi, nebabueshemu mitshi ya mushete
Hakatshiabu Paulo tshisumbu tshia nkunyi, hakatshieleye mu kahia, nyoka wakahatukamu bualu bua luiya lua kahia, wakalamata ku tshianza tshiandi
Kadi mukalenga Sihone ewu kubenga bua tuetu kupitshila mu ditunga diende

Bualu bua bobo kabakadi batuala mukenshi wakabelelabo ne, Biadiata nyama mene mukuna, nebamushihe ne mabue; bumueneki ebu buakatamba kuikala ne buowa tô ne bakamba Mose ne, Ndi ntamba kutshina ne kuzakala
Tatuende uvua mfumu wa meku mashilangane a bena Madiyane
Kadi mu tshidimu tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene, budimi nebabuangate anu kudi mfumuabu wa kumpala uvua mubupiane awu
Mukashi wakabambila ne, Bakamana kuhita, bakasabuka musulu wa mai

Sengelelai mamu wenu, numusengelele; bua tshiadi bivualu biandi, Bulelela, tshiena nfuila bana bandi luse, Bualu bua mamu wabo wakulonda malu a masandi; Nunku nenjike nshila wandi ne luhangu lua meba, Yeye nealonde bamunangi, kadi kena ubaheta; Yeye kakamanya ne mmeme mene nakamuha manvua, Nunku nengangate kabidi manvua anyi mu tshidimu tshiau, Mpindiu nensokolole bundu buandi kudi bamunangi, Nendekeshe miloû yandi yonso, Nenkose mionshi yandi ya tumuma tua nvinyo, Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nendue kudiye ne makenga Nunku, mona, nemmuitabushishe, nemmulombole mu tshihela, Hashishe, nemmuhingashileku madimi andi a tumuma tua nvinyo, nemmuhe tshibanda tshia Akola Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu dituku adi yeye neambikile ne, Bayanyi; kena umbikila ne, Nfumu wanyi
Mesu a bubidi buabo akabuluka, bakamanya ne, Tudi butaka, bakatela mabeshi a nfigi, bakadienzela mbondia
Kena mua kubupesha muana wa mukaji udiye mupite kunanga to
Hashishe yeye wakasangila ne muntu mukuabo, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Untute
Bu mudi Tatu ubisha bafue, ubaha muoyo; nunku kabidi Muana udi uha badiye musue muoyo
Bena Yuda bakamba ne, Bakibaka ntempelo eu bidimu makumi anai ne bisambombo, wewe neumuibake kabidi matuku asatu, anyi

Ne bualu bukuabo, bantu aba dikumi ne muanda mukulu, bakuhukilabo kudi tshibunda tshia tushola mu Siloama, tshiakabashiha, nudi nuelangana meshi ne, Bobo bakadi batambe bonso ba mu Yelushalema bubi, anyi
Bobo bakambila Yoshua ne, Bulelela, Yehowa wakadia buloba buonso mu bianza bietu; ne bualu bukuabo kabidi, bena buloba bonso badi batekete teketê ku mpala kuetu
Ku tshibangidilu tshia dishikama diaboku kabakatshina Yehowa; nunku Yehowa wakatuma nyama ya ntambue munkatshi muabo, yakashiha bakuabo babo
Hakadiye mu Yelushalema ku Kuhita kua Yehowa, mu matuku a disanka, bantu ba bungi bakitabusha dina diandi, hakamonabo bimanyinu biandi biakenzeye

Mukashi wa Gilada wakamulelela bana ba balume; hakakola bana ba mukashi wandi mene, bobo bakihata Yefeta, bakamuambila ne, Wewe kuena ne buhianyi mu nsubu wa tatu wetu, bualu bua wewe udi muana wa mukashi wa bende
Nunku, ya biebe, meme nengikale ne mukana muebe, meme nenkuyishe mei andi musue wewe kuamba
Bua muanda eu ubabele bikole, bua bobo bikale balenge mu ditabusha; kabitabushi nsumuinu ya Bena Yuda ne mikenshi ya bantu badi bumuka ku bualu bulelela
Biamulombeye mushiha, neamuhe nyoka, anyi
Hakashika malu â, Paulo wakahangidisha bua kuhitshila mu Makedonia ne Akaya bua kuyeye ku Yelushalema, wamba ne, Hangikalaku, bundi n abu mbua kuya kumona Lomo kabidi
Wakamukudimuna ne, Aba mbana bakuha Nzambi muntu webe mu luse
Unvua dî dianyi, nenkuhe lungenyi, ne Nzambi neikale n ebe, wewe wikale muakuidi wa bantu kudi Nzambi, Ulue biebe ne malu onso kudi Nzambi
Bena Shekeme bakamutekela balaminyi ku mutu kua mikuna yonso, bakanyenga bintu bia bantu bonso bakahita mu nshila; bakambila Abimeleke bualu ebu
Bakamulambishila bidia bia butuku; Mata wakadi ubakuatshisha, kadi Lazalo wakadi mukuabo wa bakadi bashikame n andi ku mesa
Matthew Hakashikisha Yesu kuamba mei â, wakumuka mu Galela, wakalua mu luseke lua Yudaya ludi dishia dia Yadene; bisumbu binene bia bantu biakamulonda, yeye wakabakolesha
Bana ba balume ba Lewi, Geshona ne Kohata ne Melah

Mukelenge wandi wakamuambila ne, Bimpe, muana wanyi muimpe ne muntumikidi, wewe wakadi untumikila hawakadi ha mutu ha bintu bikese, nenkuteke ha mutu ha bintu bia bungi, buela mu disanka dia mukelenge webe

Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, biangenzelabo bibi kudi ba mu buloba bukuabo mu buhidia buabo bua mikenji yanyi, ne bingolola tshianza tshianyi kudibo bua kubakengesha, binashiha tshintu tshidibo beyemena bua kuangata bia kudia, binatuma tshiole mu buloba ebu bua kubutulamu bantu ne nyama kabidi, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nansha bu bantu aba basatu, Noa, Danyele ne Yobo, bikaminu, bakadi kuhandisha anu mioyo yabo nkayai ku buakane buabo
Ba messager bandi bakahingana kudiye, yeye wakabakonka ne, Nuakuhingana bua tshinyi
Dî edi nunku diakakemesha bayidi bandi
Yeye wa kamba ne, Tangila, ndi muntu mununu, tshiena mumanye dituku dia lufu luanyi
Hakatshidiye uyikila n abo, mukelenge wakamueneka kudiye; yeye wakamba ne, Bualu bubi ebu buakafuma kudi Yehowa
Nzambi wanyi, unvuluke bua kungenzela bimpe
Asayi muaba onsu unudi basue, nuende mushinga, nusumbe miaba ya nuenu kusomba kashidi
Tshiakadi ne tshibandilu tshia bidiatshilu muanda mutekete bua bantu babandilehu, ne mbalanda watshi wakatangilangana ne munda mua ntempelo
Nzambi wakamona munya ne Mmuimpe Nzambi wakatahulula munya ne midima
Yeye udi wela mpehele ne mai dî diandi, bidi bimunvuila

Ne mu ditekemena edi nakasua kulua kunudi diambedi bua nuenu kuikala ne ngasa tshiakabidi; nakasua kuhitshila munkatshi muenu ku Makedonia, ne kuhingana kunudi ku Makedonia kabidi, bua nuenu kuntuma ku mpala mu luendu luanyi lua ku Yudaya
Mukana mua bamanyi babidi anyi basatu dî dionso nedijadikibue

Abalama wakangata mukashi wandi Salai, ne Lota, muana wa muan abo, ne bintu biabo bionso, ne bantu bonso bakahetabo mu Halana, bakaya mu nshila wa ku buloba bua Kanâna, bakafika mu buloba bua Kanâna Abalama wakalala mu buloba, wakalua ku Shekeme, kuakadi mutshi wa telebinta wa mu Mole Bena Kanana bakadi mu buloba tshikondo atshi
Bulelela, bualu ebu buakumana kulua dihanga dinene munkatshi muenu ne, Nudi nuikalangana ne bilumbu
Nunku dî dindi nkuambila didi nunku ne, Usangishe Bena Isalele bonso ku Dana tô ne ku Bê sheba, bungi buabo nebuikale bu nsenga ya ku muelelu wa mai manene; wewe nkayebe uye n abo mu nvita
Kanushiyi tshintu tshikese tô ne ku dinda, kadi biashala bintu dinda nenubioshe mu kahia
Nebakutuadile wewe anu bilumbu binene
Nunku, tusemene ne dikima hehi ne nkuasa wa butumbi wa ngasa, bua tuetu tuhete luse ne bua tusangane ngasa bua kutukuatshisha mu tshikondo tshia dikengela dietu
Pashishe kufuaye
Hakunvua mukelenge wa Yosefe mei akamuambila mukashi wandi ne, Muntu webe wakungenzela nunku, tshiji tshikole tshiakamukuata
Bualu bua muntu yonso udi wiba neumushibue ku luseke elu bu mudiu wamba; ne muntu yonso udi uditshiha ne mashimi neumushibue ku luseke alu bu mudiu wamba
Pashishe kubikilaye bakulu ba bena Izrayele makumi muanda mutekete, kubimanyika ku ntenta wa kusambakena
Dî ditentekesha ha mutu didi difuma kudi bualu bubi
Nakatangila bonso hadi ne muoyo bendakana muinshi mua diba hohamue ne nsongalume wakahiana bukelenge buandi; bungi buabo kabuakadi mua kubadibua ne yeye wakadi ha mutu ha buonso buabo
Nanku, nennuvuluke
Miaba yonsu indi mumuambile bua nuenu kuntendelela, nengikale munkatshi muenu bua kunuela lupemba
Ke patudi tulambula Maweja Nangila milambu, bua atulame ne muoyi
Yeshua wakalela Yoyakima, ne Yoyakima wakalela Eleyashiba, ne Eleyashiba wakalela Yoyada, ne Yoyada wakalela Yonatana, ne Yonatana wakalela Yadua

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi, bua yeye angate malonga munkatshi mua kahia, ne wewe utangalashe kahia kuaka ebi mbintu bia tshijila, malonga a bantu aba babi bakadijinushila mioyo yabo, wenze n au tshibuikilu tshia tshioshelu bobo bakâfila ku mpala kua Yehowa, nunku adi bintu bia tshijila, neikale bu tshivulukidi kudi Bena Isalele
Bavua basombe pabuipi ne tshimenga tshia Ramsese, bu muvua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu muambe
Ku luseke lua Gada lua ku sude mukalu ubange ku Tama uye tô ne ku mai a Melebota kadeshe, ku kasulu ka Ejipitu, tô ne ku Mai Manene
Bobu kuandamuna ne: Tudi tulala anu pambelu muaba utudi ewu
Lusuki lumue lua ku mitu yenu kaluena lujimina
Dibaya dionsu divua ne bitaku bibidi
Maweja Nangila, bena Izrayele aba mbantu bebe, baudi mudisunguile, bauvua mupikule, mupatule mu Ejipitu ku bukole ne ku makanda ebe mapite
Yehoshafata wakadi ne bidimu makumi asatu ne bitanu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu
Bakamuambila kabidi ne, Katuena baledibue mu masandi; tudi ne Tatu umue, Nzambi mene
Udimuke ku mpala kuandi, unvue di diandi, kumufuishishi tshiji, yeye kena ukubuikidila bubi buebe bualu bua dina dianyi didi munda muandi
Bantu ba bende kabatu benza nunku, anyi
Mesu ebe neamone bualu ebu, kadi kuena uhidia nansha
Bana ba Ala, nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mutekete ne batanu
Mvidi Mukulu kumona ne butoke budi buimpe, kupandukaye butoke ne midima
Nudi bamanye ne, Bu muena nsubu mumanye diba dialua muibi butuku, wakadi kutabala, nsubu wandi kakadi kutubuka disoso
Nunku, yeye wakihata mulume, wakateka bakeluba ku esete kua budimi bua Edene ne muele wa nvita wa kalua wakadi utshinguluka ku nseke yonso, bua kulamabo nshila wa ku mutshi wa muoyo
Nanku Izake kumuambila ne: Wewe kuakusomba mu ditunga didi ne biakudia bia bungi, nansha mu buloba budi dibungi dipite kubolesha
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne binai tshia bukelenge bua Hezikiya, Saneheliba, mukelenge wa Ashû, wakalua, wakaluangana ne bena misoko yonso ya Yuda yakadi ne ngumbu, wakayinyenga
Hakadibo bashiha bantu bakuabo ne hanakashala nkayanyi, nakatua mpala wanyi hanshi, nakabandisha dî dianyi, nakamba ne, Aka, Mukelenge Yehowa
Tatu wandi Isaka wakamuambila ne, Semena ha buihi, muan anyi, utuangane n anyi mishiku
Monai bu muakafua bena bukitu munkatshi mua nvita
Bua bakafunda mu mikenshi ya Mose ne, Kusuiki nkata ku mishiku ya ngombe udi udiata ntete bua kuishihula

Nunku nakamba di dianyi bu muakangambileye; ne hanakadi ngamba mei anyi, tshiona tshiakadiku, ne monai, tshiona bu tshia nvunde tshiakadiku; ne mifuba yakasangakana mufuba mukuabo wakatuangana ne mufuba mukuabo
Nebamuidike dina mu Isalele ne, Nsubu wa udi ne tshisabata tshiandi tshisulula
Isaka wakebesha muan andi ne, Muan anyi, wakamona ntole lubilu nunku munyi
Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Nakunulesha malu mimpe a bungi a Tatu anakuenza, nudi nungelela mabue bua muanda kai unakuenza
Kubangabu kuakula bu bambi munkatshi mua mitanda

Mukelenge wa Isalele wakamba ne, Kuatai Mikaya, nuye n andi kudi Amona, gouverneur wa musoko ne kudi Yoasha, muenyampala; nuambile gouverneur ne, Mukelenge udi wamba ne, Buesha muntu eu mu nsubu wa lukanu, umudishe bidia bia dikenga ne mai a dikenga tô ne hanahingana ne ditalala
Demon udi mumanye mua kutabasha mesu a bafofo, anyi
John Bananga, kanuitabushi nyuma yonso, kadi nutete nyuma ne, Idi ya Nzambi, anyi; bualu bua baprofete ba bungi ba mashimi bakamuangalaka ha buloba
Nebafue ne bowa mu nzubu yabu
Bakakonka Yesu ne, Kuondaha bantu dituku dia Lumingu kudi kushiha mukenshi, anyi
Nanku anu muntu udi kayi ne mikiya ke udi mua kudia munyinyi wa mulambu ewu

Ekesode Besalele ne Oholiaba nebenze mudimu wa mu tshitendelelu, ne bantu bonso badi ne lungenyi mu mitshima yabo tente nebenze mudimu eu bu muakuamba Yehowa, bobo bakadi Yehowa uhesha lungenyi ne meji bua kumanyabo mua kuenza midimu yonso ya mu tshitendelelu

Nunku nakulua bua kuambila mukelenge dî edi, bualu bua bantu bakamba kuntshinyisha; nunku muntu webe mukashi wakamba ne, Nengambile mukelenge bualu ebu; bumue mukelenge neitabushe kuenza kulomba kua muntu wandi
Meme ne mamu ebe ne bana benu netulue bua kukukukuila hanshi, anyi

Dî dia Yehowa wa misumba diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Edi ndî didi Yehowa wa misumba wamba ne, Kujila kua bia kudia kua mu ngondo muinai, kua mu ngondo muitanu, kua mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete ne kua mu ngondo wa dikumi, nekuikale bu masanka ne musangelu, ne bu bikondo bia bia kudia bia disanka kudi Bena Yuda

Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Dituku adi buonso buenu, muntu ne muntu, neabikile muena mutumba n andi, neasombe n andi muinshi mua muonshi wandi wa tumuma tua nvinyo ne muinshi mua mutshi wandi wa nfigi
Halua bualu ebu bunakuamba, mu diba adi nenumanye ne, Meme ndi Mukelenge Yehowa

Bua bantu bakadianjileye kumanya diambedi yeye wakadianjila kubasungila kabidi, bua kuikalabo bafuanyikishibue ku tshifuanyikishi tshia Muana wandi, bua yeye ikale muan a bute munkatshi mua bana babo ba bungi
Tshisamba tshia Menashe, muana wa Yozefe:
Nunku musungule bantu dikumi ne babidi ba mu bisamba bia Bena Isalele, muntu umue wa mu tshisamba ne tshisamba
Mu tshikondo tshia diambedi kanuakadi bantu, kadi katataka nudi bantu ba Nzambi; kanuakafuidibua luse, kadi katataka nuakufuidibua luse
Muntu yonso udi wenza bubi udi ushiha mikenshi kabidi, bualu bua bubi budi kushiha kua mikenshi
Hezikiya wakadila bikole
Nebabuikile kabidi mushete ne tshiseba tshia nyama wa nkonga
Nunku Bena Amona bakateketa ku mpala kua Bena Isalele
Bikaleye muvuishe malu au bu malu a hatuhu, hakunvueye, nunku yeye neamutuadile bubi buandi
Yeye kakalenga tshianza tshiandi ha bantu banene ba Bena Isalele, bakamona Nzambi, bakadia bidia, bakanua
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kanuakutumikila dî dianyi bua kumanyishangana dî dia budishikaminyi, muntu yonso kudi muan abo, ne muntu yonso kudi muena mutumba n andi
Pashishe neushiye buloba

Neavudishile badi banemeka Yehowa disanka, Yehowa anuvudishe bua nukumbane ba bungi, Nusankishibue kudi Yehowa, Diulu ne diulu mbia Yehowa; Bafue kabena batumbisha Yehowa, Kadi tuetu netuvudishile Yehowa disanka ku dituku edi tô ne tshiendelele
Bintu bia argent bidi bianyi, bintu bia or bidi bianyi
Bualu bua wewe kuakatumikila dî dia Yehowa bua kushikisha tshiji tshiandi tshikole kudi Bena Amaleka; nunku Yehowa wakukuenzela bualu ebu lelu
Meme nenteke nyuma wanyi munda muandi, yeye neunvue ngumu, neahingane ku buloba buandi; meme nemmushiheshe ku muele wa nvita mu buloba buandi
Kadi Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Tatu wanyi udi ukuata mudimu tô ne katataka, ne meme kabidi ndi ngukuata
Nansha, nuenu bantu balume nudi mua kuya kutendelela Yehowa, bualu bua nudi basue kuenza nunku
