Ezra Hakunvua bena lukuna ba Bena Yuda ne Bena Benyamina lumu ne, Bantu bakahingana ku buhika badi bashila Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ntempelo, bakalua kudi Zelubabela ne kudi bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo, bakabambila ne, Tuase bietu n enu; bualu bua tuetu tudi tukeba Nzambi wenu bu nuenu, tuakufila milambu kudiye ku dituku diakalua Esâ hadona, mukelenge wa Ashû, n etu kunoko tô ne ku dituku edi
Bayidi dikumi ne umue bakaya mu Galela, ku mukuna wakabambila Yesu
Yeye wakalua n anyi ku tshibi tshia ku tshiendelu; ne hanakatangila, nakamona disoso mu tshimanu tshia nsubu
Nunku mpala wa muntu wakatangila dibue dia ngashi ku luseke lukuabo, ne mpala wa nyama wa ntambue wakatangila dibue dia ngashi ku lunga luseke

Ulekelele bantu bebe mahanga abo, ubabuikidile mibi yabo yakukuenzelabo; ubafuishe luse kudi bakababuesha mu buhika, bua bobo babafuile luse; bualu bua bobo badi bantu bebe ne buhianyi buebe buwakalua n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu munkatshi mua tshikutu tshia biamu bua mesu ebe ikale matabale ku kutendekena kua muntu webe ne kua bantu bebe Bena Isalele bua kubunvuila misangu yonso hadilabo kûdi
Kadi kabakatumikila dî diebe, bakakutombokela, bakakema mikenji yebe nyima, bakashiha baprofete bebe bakasua kubabela bua kukudimusha mitshima yabo kûdi kabidi; bakakutatshisha ne ntatu mikole
Tshintu tshionso tshidibo bajila mu Isalele netshikale tshiebe
Muntu udi ne Nyuma udi ujingulula malu onso, kadi muntu eu mene kabena bamujinguluila kudi mukuabo
Makuabo akamata ha buloba buakadi ha mutu ha mabue, kâkadihu ne buloba bua bungi; tshituha tshihi akatoloka bua kâkadi ne buloba bule; hakabanda diba, akababuka, akafubidila bualu bua kâkadi ne miji
Nunku badi bamba ne, Bafofo ne balema kabena habuela mu nsubu

Disanka didi kudi badi balonda kulumbulula kuakane, Yehowa, unvuluke hawalesha bantu bebe luse, bua utangile bianyi diakalengele dia bantu bawakusungula, Tuakuenza bibi bu muakenza batatu betu; Batatu betu bakadi mu Ejipitu kabakalama malu ebe a kukema mu mitshima yabo
Bidi bimpe bua muntu kadî munyinyi anyi kanu maluvu anyi kenji bualu luonso budi muan enu wa mu Kilisto ulenduka n abu

Mukelenge wakabakudimuna mei makole; mukelenge Lehabama wakalengulula dî diakamuambila bantu banunu, wakabambila anu mei akamuyisha bansongalume ne, Tatu wanyi wakavudisha mutshi wenu wa tshikokedi bujitu, kadi meme nenkumbashe bintu ha mutu hatshi; tatu wanyi wakanukengesha ne nsokotshi, kadi meme nennukengeshe ne tuminyiminyi
Mbualu buebe

Nunku, bu munuakitabusha Kilisto Yesu Mukelenge, nuikale nuende mu Kilisto; nuikale ne miji yenu miedibue munda muandi, nuikale nuashibue munda muandi, ne nuikale nujadikibue mu ditabusha dienu, bu munuakayishibua; nukumbane mu disakidila
Wakalengesha nsubu mujima ne mabue a mushinga mukole; or wakadi wa mu Pâwayima
Bobo bakendakana ku nseke yonso ya Yuda, bakasangisha Bena Lewi ba mu misoko yonso ya Yuda ne bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo mu Isalele, bakalua n abo ku Yelushalema

Tudi tuibakibua ha mutu ha bapostolo ne baprofete, bu bishimikidi bia nsubu; Kilisto Yesu nkayandi udi dibue dinene dia ku ditumba dia nsubu; bituha bionso bia nsubu bilungakasha bimpe bidi bidiundadiunda tô ne haluabi ntempelo wa tshijila mu Mukelenge; munudi bibakibue hohamue kabidi, munda muandi, bua kuikala nsubu wa Nzambi mu Nyuma
Muntu yonso wakangata dilonga diandi, wakatekamu kahia, wakatekahu musenga wa manananshi, bakimana ne Mose ne Alona ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Bakashikama ku mpala kuandi, muntu ku mulongo wandi muntu ku mulongo wandi, wakatuadishila ku muan a bute to ne ku muan a mukala, balume aba bakakemangana

Nakatangila lungenyi lua nunku muinshi mua diba, luakunkemesha, luakumueneka bu bualu bunene kundi: Musoko mukese wakadiku, anu bantu banya banya bakadimu; mukelenge munene wakalua kuluisha, wakautshintshimika ne wakasa bibumba; bakasanganamu muena meji muhele; bua lungenyi luandi yeye wakasungila musoko, kadi kakuakadi muntu wakavuluka muhele eu
Mesu a bubidi buabo akabuluka, bakamanya ne, Tudi butaka, bakatela mabeshi a nfigi, bakadienzela mbondia
Kadi bonsu badi bakutshipa, nembatshipe
Ku musangu umue eu nakambila bantu ne, Muntu ne muntu ashikame ne muena mudimu wandi mu Yelushalema bua bobo bamanye mua kutulama butuku ne bua kukuata mudimu mu munya
Musoko wa Hamona udiku kabidi Nunku nebalengeshe buloba
Maweja Nangila kuyukila ne Balaame, kumumanyisha malu a kuambila Balake, kumupingaja kudiye
Bua kukuatshisha badi ne muoyo, budibo n abu mbua kuya kudi bafue, anyi
Biakudia abi, nebiambuluishe bena Levi, badi kabayi ne muaba wa bumpianyi munkatshi muenu
Labana wakebesha Yakoba ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi tshinyi, wakunyema kundi mu musokoko, wakuya ne bana banyi bakashi bu bahika bakuata mu nvita, anyi

Muntu wakadiku, dina diandi Yosefe, bapostolo bakamuidika dinga dina ne, Bânaba kukudimuna kua muaku ne, Muana wa Busambi , Muena Lewi, mulela ku Kupulio; wakadi ne budimi, wakabuhana, wakalua ne mushinga, wakauteka ku makasa a bapostolo
Dikuatshisha dia buloba didi kudi bantu bonso; mukelenge muine udi ukuatshishibua ne bintu bia mu madimi
Mose wakadila kudi Yehowa, wakamba ne, Nengenzele bantu aba tshinyi
Kadi bua kuhona kuabo luhandu luakulua kudi bisamba bia bende bua kufuisha Bena Isalele mukau
Biashikameye ha tshiseba tshia ha nyima ha kabalu, netshikale ne bukoya
Yuda ne bana babo bakalua ku nsubu wa Yosefe, yeye wakadiku, bakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua ndi
Meshelemeya wakalela bana balume: Zekâya muan a bute, Yediele muibidi, Zebadaya muisatu, Yatamele muinai, Elama muitanu, Yehohanana muisambombo, Eleyahoenai wa muanda mutekete
Bionsu ebi nebimuambuluishe bua kaditambishi, bu mupite bantu bonsu ba mu tshisamba tshiende, kabidi bua kalenguludi mikenji, kadi ayikumbaje yonsu too ne mikese mene

Yoshua wakamba ne, Bungulushai mabue manene, nuateke ku mushiku wa lubuebue, ne bantu bimaneku bua kubalama; kadi kanushadiku, londai bena lukuna benu, shihai badi bashadile ha nyima; kanuitabushi bua babuele mu misoko yabo kabidi, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakabafila mu bianza bienu
Hakadi Isalele ushikama mu muaba eu, Lubena wakalala ne Bileha, mukashi mukuabo wa tatu wandi, Isalele wakunvua lumu elu
Kadi biwaditumbisha, uvuluke ne, Kenguewe udi ukolesha muji, kadi mmuji udi ukukolesha wewe
Walukile, ushikame ne mukelenge; bualu bua wewe udi muntu wa bende, wakihatabo kabidi; uhingane ku muaba webe
Nunku Davidi wakalombela muana eu Nzambi

Dutelonone Malu Adibo ne bualu bua Kuenza bua Kuheta Buhikudi ne Masanka Halua malu au onso kunudi ne disanka ne mulau, binakuteka ku mpala kuenu, ne hanuayuluka malu au munkatshi mua bisamba bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unutuma munkatshi muabi, ne hanuakudimuna mitshima yenu kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mei andi ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso, bu munakunuambila lelu, ne nuenu ne bana benu; hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neakudimune buluka buenu, neanuleshe luse, neahingane kunudi, neanusangishe ba munkatshi mua bantu bonso muakanumuangalasha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bakamuambila ne, Yesu wa ku Nazaleta udi uhita
Shaula wakakonka Mikala ne, Bualu kai wakundinga nunku, wakulekela muena lukuna wanyi ne yeye wakuhanduka
Bakuabo bakasua kumukuata, kadi muntu kakamulenga tshianza
Dî dibi kadihatuki mukana muenu; kadi ambai anu mei mimpe adi mua kudiundisha bantu bua kuvuidishila bantu badi baunvua disanka
Padi batuangaji mu madilu, kabena mua kubeya biketu mu nsuki, kabena mua kukungula miedi ku nseke, nansha kuditapisha nsalu pambidi
Nuenu bena lubombo, nudi bamanye mua kujingulula mpala wa buloba ne wa diulu, munyi kanuena bamanye mua kujingulula malu a tshikondo etshi
Bana bakuabu ba Yuda babidi, Ere ne Onane, bavua bafuile mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Muntu uvua muye kuosha bintu abi, neasukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi pambidi bua kupingana mu mitanda
Bena nvita ba mu diulu bakamulonda ba nyima ha tubalu tutoke, baluatshisha bilulu bia line bitoke ne bilengele

Nyuma wa Yehowa wakantulukila kabidi, yeye wakangambila ne, Amba biebe ne, Yehowa udi wamba dî edi ne, Nuenu ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele nuakuamba nunku, bualu bua ndi mumanye malu adi abuela mu mitshima yenu
Yehoshafata wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi, tatu wandi
Yeye udi uhenda Nzambi; muntu kai udi mumanye mua kujimisha mibi, anu Nzambi nkayandi

Tangilai, bantu bakuabo badi bafuma ku luseke lua nôde, Badi batubula buta ne difuma, Mukelenge wa Babulona wakunvua lumu luabo, Monai, bu mudi nyama wa ntambue uluhuka mu ditu dia ku Yadene bua kuhaula luhangu lua mikoko ludi ne ditalala, nunku nembihate ku muaba wabo lukasa, nenteke muntu yonso undi musue kusungula ha mutu hau
Yeye wakaya ku Nayota hehi ne Lama; ne Nyuma wa Nzambi wakamutulukila kabidi, yeye wakenda wamba dî dia Nzambi tô ne hakafikeye ku Nayota hehi ne Lama
Kabatangidi lue vene mu miaba yenu yonso tô matuku muanda mutekete; kanushiyi munyinyi unuakashiha wa milambu dilolo dia dituku dia ku mpala butuku buonso tô ne ku dinda
Davidi mene mene udi wamba mu Mukanda wa Misambu ne, Tô ne hanateka badi n ebe lukuna munshi mua makasa ebe
Luka Basangishi ba mulambu bonso ne bantu habi bakadi balua ha buihi n andi bua kunvua muakadiye wamba

Kolinto Meme Paulo, ndi nusengelela bua kalolo ne lutulu bia Kilisto, meme hangikala ku mesu kuenu, ndi muhuekele munkatshi muenu, hangikala tshi n enu, ndi ne dikima kunudi; bulelela, ndi nusengelela, bua meme, hangikala n enu, tshikadi ne bualu bua kunulesha dikima ne ditekemena dindi mbala bua kuikala n adi kudi bakuabo badi batubala bu bantu badi bendakana mu malu a mubidi
Hashishe mukashi wakahingana hatshiatshia, wakadishinda hanshi ku mbelu kua nsubu wa muntu kuakadi mukelenge wandi, to ne hakabanda diba
Mona, lelu mesu ebe adi amona bu mutu Yehowa mukufile mu tshianza tshianyi mu lubuebue; bakuabo bakungambila ne, Umushihe
Kutuminaye Balaame ne bavuaye nabu munyinyi wa milambu ayi

Bu mudiye muambe kabidi mu Hoshea ne, Bualu ebu nebuikaleku kabidi ne, Mu muaba muakadibo bamba ne, Yeshaya wakela dî dikole ne, Bikala bungi bua Bena Isalele bu nsenga ya kukala kua mai manene, difuka didi dishala nedisungidibue
Bikala nyama kayi muakane, yeye neamuhikule bu mudi mushinga webe, neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu, bikaleye kayi umuhikula, wewe neumuhane bu mudi mushinga webe

Wewe udi udituanya mu tshiji tshiebe, Bulelela, muinda wa bantu babi neujime, Munya neulue mîdima mu ntenta wandi, Biendedi bia bukole buandi nebibumbakane, Bualu bua makasa andi mene neamubueshe mu bukuondo, nênde ha mutu ha dijimba
Wakaya biandi, wakowa, wakahingana mutabale
Mikaya wakamuambila ne, Tangila, wewe neumone bualu ebu hawabuela mu tshisokomenu bua kusokoma
Ku tshitekelu tshia muendu aku, wenzaku kabidi makopu anayi mafuanangane ne bilongu bia mutshi wa amande, kabidi ne bilongu ne mapu a bilongu biawu
Mbu mudilu mu buloba buonso kabidi lukuama mamuma ne ludiundadiunda bu mudilu luenza munda muenu kabidi, katshia ku dituku dinuakunvua ne dinuakamanya ngasa wa Nzambi mu bushua
Mvula kuloka pa buloba matuku makumi anayi a munya ne a butuku

Bana ba Ashê ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Ashê binunu makumi anai ne tshimue ne nkama itanu
Kadi baminyampala ba Bena Amona bakambila Hanuna, mukelenge wabo, ne, Udi welangana meji ne, Davidi udi utumbisha tatu webe bualu bua yeye wakakutumina bakusambi, anyi

bualu bua yeye udi luhandu Misambu Nzambi, ukose nsambu yanyi biakane, Bualu bua wewe udi Nzambi wa tshieyemenu tshianyi; Utume munya webe ne bushuwa buebe ku mpala kuebe; Ka nenye ku tshioshelu tshia milambu tshia Nzambi, kudi Nzambi udi disanka Mutshima bualu bua yeye udi luhandu Misambu Nzambi, tuakunvua ku matshu etu, Wewe wakihata bisamba bia bantu ne tshianza tshiebe; Bualu bua kabakadinyengela buloba abu ku muele wabo wa nvita, Nzambi, wewe udi Mukelenge wanyi; Ku dikuatshisha diebe tudi mua kushindika badi n etu lukuna hanshi
Yesu wakabambila ne, Diba dianyi kadiena dianze kufika, kadi diba dienu didiku matuku onso
Palô wakambila Mose ne, Umuka kundi, udimuke biebe, kuntangidi kabidi, mu dituku diudi utangila mpala wanyi wewe neufue

Bualu bukuabo kabidi, ndi mulelela mukenji unudi ne bua kuenzela bakulu aba ba Bena Yuda badi basa nsubu eu wa Nzambi ne, Nuangate biuma bia mukelenge bia mu milambu ya mu buloba bua dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, nubifile kudi bantu aba lubilu bua kubakuatshisha; kabahumbishibu kabidi
Yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Biwamona bantu bakane makumi anai

Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, neabuikile bubi bua muntu udiye musue kulengesha ku bubi buandi ku nyima yeye neashihe mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bukula ha tshioshelu, muakuidi neamubuikidile bubi buandi, ne yeye neikale muakane
Bakamukonka ne, Tatu webe udi hanyi
Yesu wakendakana mu bimenga bionso ne mu misoko mikese, uyisha bantu mu nsunagoga yabo, ubambila bualu bua lumu luimpe lua bukelenge bua mu diulu, ukolesha bantu bakadi ne mabedi ne matekete onso
Nenuhikule ban a bute benu ba balume bonso
Ebu mbualu bunakunuambila ne, Nenufue mu mibi yenu; binuikala kanui nungitabusha, nenufue mu mibi yenu
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Davidi wakasangisha balume bonso hasungula ba mu Isalele, binunu makumi asatu
Bena Izrayele kumuangala ku mukuna wa Maweja Nangila, kuenda matuku asatu
Yakoba wakambila Lebeka mamu andi ne, Tangila, Esau, mukulu anyi udi ne miosa ya bungi ham bidi bandi kadi meme ndi ne mubidi mutuhu
Yeholama wakabanga kukokesha mu muaba wandi mu tshidimu tshibidi tshia bukelenge bua Yeholama, muana wa Yehoshafata, mukelenge wa Yuda, bualu bua yeye kakadi ne muana wa balume

Yehowa wakambila Gideona kabidi ne, Bantu batshidi batamba bungi; uhueke n abo ku mai, nenkutetshileboku; hashishe muntu wakuambila ne, Aye n ebe, neaye biandi n ebe; ne muntu wakuambila ne, Kayi n ebe, kayi n ebe nansha
Hashishe yeye wakahueka ne Pula, muena mudimu wandi, tô ne kunfudilu kua bena nvita bakadi mu tshitudilu
Nsubu wenu udi mushale hatuhu
Dî dia Kunshikidilu dia Elisha, ne Lufu Luandi Disama diakakuata Elisha, ne bua disama diandi wakafua
Kadi nyama wa mu Lebanona wakahitaku, wakadiata dieba munda mua dikama
Bua bualu ebu bantu bonso nebamanye ne, Nudi bayidi banyi, binuasuangana nunku
Mu malu ebe onso a tshinyangu ne a masandi kuakuvuluka matuku a buana buebe, hawakadi butaka kuyi ne tshivualu, udibonda mu mashi ebe
Nanku neanusankishe bulelela, mu ditunga didiye munupe

Kadi mukashi ne mukashi nealombe mukashi udi ushikama ha buihi n andi, ne mukashi udi ushikama mu nsubu wandi, bintu bia argent ne bia or ne bilulu, nuenu nenubiluatshishe bana benu ba balume ne bana benu ba bakashi, nunku nenuhaule Bena Ejipitu
Ndi nkutekela mukenshi eu, muan anyi Timote, bu mudi mei a baprofete akadianjilabo kuamba bua bualu buebe, bua wewe uluangane nvita mimpe ne dikuatshisha diau
Hashishe mukelenge wakakonka ne, Yeye udi ukeba kukuata mukelenge mukashi ku bukole ku mesu kuanyi mu nsubu wanyi, anyi
Netulonde amu njila munene buludi, katuyi tuapuka, too ne patuapita ditunga diebe
Yehezekele Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, muonshi udi uhita mitshi mikuabo ya muitu kudi kunyi, ditamba adi dia muonshi didi munkatshi mua mitshi ya muitu

Katataka binuitabusha kutua mpala yenu hanshi ne kutendelela luhingu lunakuenza, hanunvua tshiona tshia mpungi, tshia nshiba, tshia nzenze, tshia nkombe, tshia guitare, tshia bimama ne tshia biombelu bionso, mbimpe
Dina dia muntu eu diakadi Elimeleke, ne dina dia mukashi wandi diakadi Naomi, ne mena a bana bandi ba balume babidi akadi Malona ne Kiliona, bakadi Bena Efelata ba mu Beteleheme yuda
Bualu bua meme Yehowa nengambe dî dianyi, ne dî dindi ngamba nedijadikibue, kadiena dijanguluka kabidi

Nyama wa luonji wakakuatshibua, ne bakamukuata ne muprofete wa mashimi wakenza bimanyinu ku mpala kuandi biakadingeye n abi bantu bakangata tshimanyinu tshia nyama wa luonji ne bakakukuila tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, bubidi buabo bakedibua ne muoyo mu dishiba dia kahia kadi katema ne soufre
Biakuma ngombe mulume anyi mukashi ne nsengu yandi ne biafueye, nebakume ngombe mabue, kabadi munyinyi wandi nansha, kadi muena ngombe neabinge
Hakalueye kudi mamuen andi, yeye wakamukonka ne, Wewe nganyi muan anyi

Neafile dianyi dionso ne mukala udi ne dianyi ne dianyi didi dibuikila bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi diatu didi hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne lua tumuma yeye neanumushe, neabioshe ha tshioshelu bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia eu udi mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji
Tshisamba tshia Zebulone:
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Tshiena ne disanka bua malu enu, tshiena ngitabusha mulambu ku tshianza tshienu
Mose Wakabikila bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele, wakabambila ne, Nusungule bana ba mikoko bungi buai buikale bungi bua meku enu, nuyishihe bua kuhita kua Yehowa
Kubasemejaye tshiakabidi kudi Yakobe, kakuabu
Palo wakabakonka ne, Nudi benji ba mudimu kai
Bakadia mitanda nunku bakadi balume binunu bitanu

Bualu bua tuetu bakitabusha tudi tubuela mu dikisha, bu muakuambeye ne, Bua yeye wakuamba mu muaba mukuabo buala bua dituku dia muanda mutekete nunku ne, Nzambi wakikisha kabidi dituku dia muanda mutekete ku midimu yandi yonso, ne mu muaba au kabidi ne, Nunku kutshidi kushala bua bakuabo babuelemu, ne bua bantu bakadi ne lumu luimpe luambibua kudibo diambedi kabakabuelamu bua buhidia buabo, yeye udi Usungula dituku dikuabo ne, Lelu, Wamba mu Misambu ya Davidi musangu mumane kuleha mule nunku bu muakambibua diambedi ne, Bualu bua bu Yoshua mubahe dikisha, kakadi kuamba ku nyima bua dituku dikuabo
Pashishe nuashile Maweja Nangila wenu tshilambuilu pa mukuna apu ne mabue majima kaayi masonga ne tshiamu to
Hakunvuabo dî edi, mitshima yabo yakanyingalala, bakakonka Petelo ne bapostolo bakuabo ne, Bana betu, netuenze tshinyi
Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Mona, wewe udi ungambila ne, Uye ne bantu aba, ne wewe kuena muanze kummanyisha muntu udi musue kutuma n anyi
Tshisamba tshia Menashe ne tshia Efrayime, ke ndelanganyi yonsu ya Yozefe

Yehezekele Nunku wewe washile baminyampala ba mu Isalele madilu, wamba ne, Wakakolesha muan andi mukuabo, Ba mu bisamba bia bantu bakunvua lumu luandi, Hakatangila mamu andi ne, Nakumuindila Yeye wakendakana munkatshi mua ntambue mikuabo, Wakanyanga nsubu yabo minene, Hashishe ba mu bisamba bia bantu Bakamuteka mu tshikumbi, bamuela nkanu, Mamu webe wakadi bu muonshi, mufuanangane n ebe, Wakasa matamba makole, Kadi bakajula muonshi au ne tshifik a munda, Mpindiu bakamana kûkuna mu tshihela, Kahia kakahatuka mu matamba au, Yehezekele Mu tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete, mu ngondo muitanu ne mu dituku dia dikumi dia ngondo, bakuabo ba munkatshi mua bakulu ba Bena Isalele bakalua kulomba lungenyi kudi Yehowa, bakashikama ku mpala kuanyi
Yesu wakabika, biandi, wakamulonda ne bayidi bandi
Wewe neubafile mu bianza bia Bena Isalele, anyi
Mu munga muntu yonso kamuena luhandu, bualu bua kakuena dinga dina munshi mua diulu, diba bantu, didi dimanye mua kutusungila
Nunku Davidi wakamubikila ne, Mukelenge; yeye udi muan andi munyi
Hakashikishabo kubala mikenshi ya Mose ne mei a baprofete, bakelenge ba mu nsunagoga bakatumina Paulo ne bakadi n andi dî ne, Bana betu, binuikala ne dî dia kukolesha n adi mitshima ya bantu, ambai
Biadi katataka nudi nuditumbisha mu kufunafuna kuenu; kuditumbisha kuonso kua nunku kudi kubi
Wenze malu mimpe ne wewe newikale ne butumbi kudibu

Yehowa wakamana kujadika dî diandi diakambeye: bualu bua meme nakahingana mu muaba wa tatu wanyi Davidi bua kushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Isalele bu muakatulaya Yehowa; nakamana kuashila dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, nsubu
Hakamona Alona ne Bena Isalele bonso Mose, monai, musunyi wa ha mpala handi wakakonka, bobo bakatshina bua kulua n andi ha buihi
Nuvuluke Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, uvua munupatule ku bupika mu Ejipitu
Labane kukebulula mpingu bikole
Mukashi wa ku Tekoa wakambila mukelenge ne, Mukelenge, bualu ebu bubi buikale kundi ne ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi; mukelenge ne nkuasa wandi wa butumbi kabikadi ne bualu
Wewe, udi mutshima wanyi munange, ungambile kûdi udisha mikoko yebe ne kudiyi ilala munda munya
Abashaloma Udi Usombuela Amenona, Udi Unyema Abashaloma, muan abo mulume, wakamuebesha ne, Muan etu Amenona wakadi n ebe, anyi
Isaka wakalombela mukashi wa ndi Yehowa, bualu bua yeye wakadi nkumba, Yehowa wakamunvuila ne Lebeka wakimita difu
Ndi mmona malu adi ne bua kuenzeka
Dibaya dionsu divua ne mpoku ibidi mitangilangane

Mose wakangata bintu mu bianza biabo, wakabisha ha tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kahia, ebi mbintu bia kujidila n abi bakuidi bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa eu udi mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia

Pikalabio bienzeka mushindu wa momumwe luseka lukwabo, mwenyi yônso udi usanganyibwa mu njila mululame pa tshipaapu tshia ditunga udi ne tshia kusanka pende ne mapa ne budikadidi bwa momumwe ne bwa mweena Kongu, pa kumbusha mapa a tshidiidi

Nembahe mutshima muhia muhia, nenteke nyuma muhia muhia munda muabo, nengumushe mutshima wa dibue munda muabo, nembahe mutshima wa muntu; bua bobo balonde mikenji yanyi ne batumikile mei anyi ne babienze

Hashishe Amasaya wakatumina Yehoasha, muana wa Yehoaza, muana wa Yehu, mukelenge wa Isalele, ba messager bamba ne, Lua biebe, tutangilangane mpala ha mpala Yehoasha, mukelenge wa Isalele, wakatumina Amasaya, mukelenge wa Yuda, dî ne, Dieba diakadi mu Lebanona diakatumina mutshi wa cèdre wa mu Lebanona dî ne, Umpe muan ebe wa bakashi bu mukashi wa muan anyi wa balume

Katuena bamanye mua kujingulula malu onso a Wa Bukole Buonso; Bua muanda eu bantu badi bamutshina; Job Hashishe, Yehowa wakandamuna Yobo dî dihatuka mu nvunde ne, Eu nganyi udi usokoka meji mu mîdima Suika mukaba webe mu tshimono bu muntu mulume; Wewe wakadi kudi kunyi hanakujadika bishimikidi bia buloba
Kuvua kabidi makunji asatu, ne bitaku bisatu
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Neyimanye ne meme, Yehowa Nzambi wai, ndi n ai; ne yoyo Bena Isalele, mbantu banyi
Nyemenamu lubilu, bualu bua tshiena mua kuenza bualu wewe kuyi muanze kufikaku

Wakidikisha tshimanu tshia tshitendelelu, muhimbu watshi coudées isambombo; ne butshiama bua nsubu yonso yakadi minyunguluke bimanu buakadi coudées inai, nsubu ei mikale ku nseke yonso ya tshitendelelu
Bakasabuka Yadene, bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo ku Aloê, ku luseke lua tshianza tshia balume tshia musoko tshiakadi munkatshi mua tshibanda tshia Gada mu nshila wa ku Yasê
Mose wakangata umue wa makumi atanu wa bintu bia Bena Isalele, ne wa bantu ne wa bimuna wakabifila kudi Bena Lewi bakadi balama nsubu wa Yehowa, muakambila Yehowa Mose
Hakashikisha diabolo mateyi onso, wakamusha tô ne ku tshikondo tshikuabo
Dituku edi nedikale dituku dia lumingu dia kuikisha, ne nuenu nenujinge mu mitshima yenu, nuikishe bienu ku dilolo dia matuku tshitema a ngondo eu tô ne ku dilolo dia matuku dikumi
Luke Basangishi ba mulambu bonso ne bantu habi bakadi balua ha buihi n andi bua kunvua muakadiye wamba
Genese Mulayi wa Kuledibua kua Isaka Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Abalahama hehi ne mitshi ya telebinta ya Mamale hakadiye ushikama ku mbelu kua ntenta wandi munda munya
Hashishe Nyuma wakambandisha, wakalua n anyi mu tshikena kumona tshifume kudi Nyuma wa Nzambi tô ne ku buloba bua Bena Kasada, kudi bantu bakadi mu buhika
Tshisamba tshionsu tshidi tshipeta muaba wa kusomba Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Upeshe tshisamba tshionsu muaba wa kuasa, bilondeshile bungi bua bantu
Yesu wakaya n abo
Kanukunyi mutshi wa Ashela hehi ne tshishihelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshinudi badiashile
Meme, Yehowa, nakuamba dî edi, nendijadike kabidi
Nanku, muntu mukuabu kena mua kudia biakudia abi to, bualu mbia tshijila
Yeye, mumane kubandishibua ku tshianza tshia balume tshia Nzambi, mumane kuangata mulayi wa Nyuma Muimpe kudi Tatu, wakuitshikisha bualu ebu bunudi numona ne bunudi nunvua
Nunku bakadilongolola bua bantu badie
Bua ditengula didi dikukuatshisha biwikala wenza mikenshi; kadi biwikala mushihi wa mikenshi, ditengula diebe diakulua bu kadi ditengula
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Yotama ne nvita yandi yonso ne malu akenzeye bidi bifundibue mu mukanda wa bakelenge ba Isalele ne ba Yuda
Mpumbu wa mbushi Wakenza malu mahite bunene; kadi hakahiteye bukole, lusengu alu lunene luakatshibuka, mikuabo mai yakamena mu muaba walu, mitangilangane ne mpehele inai ya mu diulu

Kadi yeye kena ne bualu bua kudikumbashila tubalu tua bungi, anyi bua kuhingisha bantu mu Ejipitu bua kuheteye tubalu tua bungi; bualu bua Yehowa wakamana kunuambila ne, Kanuhinganyi mu nshila au kabidi
Petelo wakamukuata ne tshianza, wakamubisha

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Muntu udi ufila mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa nealue ne tshituha tshia mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, yeye nealue ne mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia mu bianza biandi, nealue ne dianyi ne tshiadi, nebatshinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa
Wewe kuena ne tshituha anyi luseke mu bualu ebu, bua mutshima webe kawena muimpe ku mesu kua Nzambi
Bualu ebu buakenza Yesu mu Kana wa Galela buakadi bua kumudilu bua bimanyinu biandi, wakalesha bantu butumbi buandi; bayidi bandi bakamuitabusha
Jeremiah Pashû, muana wa Imê muakuidi, wakadi kahita kanene ka bakuidi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, wakunvua mei a Yelemiya hakambeye malu â
Hawalalaku matuku asatu, hashishe uye biebe lubilu ku muaba kuwakasokoma didiku dikuabo, ushaleku hehi ne dibue dia Ezele
Hakunvuabo mei akamba Davidi, bakâmbila Shaula, ne yeye wakamubikila

Bana ba bena mudimu ba Solomo: Bana ba Sotai, bana ba Sofeleta, bana ba Pelida, bana ba Yâla, bana ba Dâkona, bana ba Gidele, bana ba Shefataya, bana ba Hatila, bana ba Pokeleta hasebayima, bana ba Amona
Bonso bakadi ha tshilumbuluidi bakamutangila talala, bakamona mpala wandi mukudimuke bu wa muanjelo

Isaiah Monai, Yehowa udi wamba kuvuisha buloba butuhu, Mu dituku adi, bu mudibo benzela bantu mbu mudibo benzela bakuidi; Buloba nebuvuishibue butuhu bushuwa, Buloba budi ne muadi ne budi bujimina, badi Buloba buakunyanguka Bua bualu ebu mulau wakunyanga buloba, Nvinyo muhia muhia udi ujinga, Disanka dia mazele didi dihuwa, Kabena banua nvinyo ne kuimba kua musambu, Musoko wa kabutu wakushimbuka hanshi; Muadi udi mu misesu bualu bua nvinyo kenaku; Mu musoko mudi mushala dibutuka, Bualu nebuikale nunku munkatshi mua buloba, Bantu aha nebabandishe mei abo, nebele mbila ya disanka; Bua malu â tumbishai bienu Yehowa mu maloba a ku esete, Tuakunvua misambu mufume kunfudilu kua buloba mimbe ne, Buowa ne dijimba ne buteyi bidi ku mpala kuetu, Wanyema ku diyoyo didi dimukuatshisha buowa Buloba buakutshibuka kuonso, Buloba nebuende bulenduke bu muntu mukuatshike maluvu, Mu dituku adi Yehowa neakengeshe Nebasangishibue hohamue, Hashishe ngondo neabuandakane, Isaiah Yehowa, wewe udi Nzambi wanyi; Bualu bua wakuyisha musoko munene dikolo, Nunku ba mu tshisamba tshia bantu bakole nebakutumbishe; Bualu bua wewe wakadi bu musoko wa ngumbu kudi bahele, bu mudi luya lua mu muaba mûme luenza
Padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila nyunyi bu mulambu wa kuosha, asungule kamanda nkutshi nansha nkudimba
Buloba budi bujimina ne lukuka luabu kabidi; kudi yeye udi wenza mudi disua dia Nzambi udi ushalaku tshiendelele
Kabidi bimuna bienu kabienji mudimu to
Bumuka mu Etame, kupinganabu ku Pi Ahirote, mutangilangane ne Baale Sefone
Kekate ke uvua tatuende wa Amrame

Bua udi ngela meshi ne, Nzambi wakatuteka tuetu bapostolo kunshikidilu kua bantu bonso bu bantu bakahishabo bua kufua; bua tuetu tuakavuishibua tshimuenenu kudi ba ha buloba, ne kudi banjelo ne kudi bantu
Nemmumanyishe kabidi ne: mudimu wenu ngwa kumuna bimuna
Diba mene adi, muena nazire neakunguile nsuki mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Mâko Hakahita matuku makese, yeye wakahingana ku Kapênuma; bakatangalasha lumu ne, Yeye udi mu nsubu
Abashaloma wakelela bantu bandi mukenji ne, Nutangile Amenona bimpe ne hasanka mutshima wandi mu kukuatshika kua maluvu
Tshikuatshi mudimu ku mesu kua muan andi mulume, anyi

Buonso buabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne bibidi ne nkama isatu ne makumi asambombo, ha mutu ha bena mudimu babo balume ne bena mudimu babo bakashi bakadi binunu muanda mutekete ne nkama isatu ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete; bakadi ne bimbi ba misambu ne balume ne bakashi nkama ibidi ne makumi anai ne batanu
Yefeta wakabambila ne, Meme ne bantu banyi tuakadi ne nvita mikole kudi Bena Amona, ne hanakanubikila, nuenu kanuakansungila mu bianza biabo
Nanku, lupangu luikale ne metre makumi atanu mu bule ne metre makumi abidi ne itanu mu butshiama
Nyoka kukonka mukaji ne: Mbulelela menemene Mvidi Mukulu mmunukandike ne: kanudi bimuma bia mitshi yonsu idi mu lupangu anyi
Wangate mukoku wa tshimpanga muibidi, Arone ne bana bende ba balume batenteka bianza pa mutu pawu kabidi
Wakitabusha, kakavila, wakitabusha ne, Meme tshiena Kilisto
Bialekela muntu mubi bubi buandi, ne bienzeye malu adi makanangane ne mikenji ne adi makane, neikale ne muoyo bualu buau
Muakuidi mimene wakakonka Yesu bua bayidi bandi ne bua diyisha diandi
Kadi nuenu nudi nuamba ne, Nshila wa Mukelenge kena mululame
Hashishe Sedekiya wakambila Yelemiya ne, Munga muntu kamanyi mei â, ne wewe kuena ufua nansha
Mu Gibeona Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Solomo mu tshilota butuku; Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Ulombe tshindi mua kukuha
Wewe mume udi mutu au wa or
Labashake wakahingana, wakasangana mukelenge wa Ashû uluangana ne Bena Libena; wakadianjila kunvua lumu ne, Yeye wakumuka ku Lakisha
tulasa twa bâna bateketa, tupwekela, tubandila, twa midimu ya bianza ne twa nsungansunga pamwe ne twa bakulumpa tulongayi bilondeshila mêyi mafila kudi bukalenga bunene;
Wa munkatshi mua bana ba Yosefe, wa mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima, Elishama muana mulume wa Amihuda
Kakuakadi dituku dikuabo bu dituku edi ku mpala kuadi anyi ku nyima kuadi, hakunvua Yehowa dî dia muntu nunku; bualu bua Yehowa wakadila Bena Isalele nvita
Buesha mitshi ei mu nkanu idi ku nseke ibidi ya tshioshelu bua kutshituala

Mu tshikondo atshi, hakalua muntu ku mushiki wa bihiminu makumi abidi bia bia kudia, anu dikumi biakadiku; ne hakalua muntu ku mulondo munene wa nvinyo bua kutunta bihiminu makumi atanu, wakasangana anu makumi abidi
Nenku nuenu bena Izrayele, kanuena mua kupisha kabidi ditunga mikiya nansha
Bualu bua muntu yonso udi ne bintu, nebamuhe binga, neikale ne bia bungi; kadi muntu yonso udi kai ne tshintu, nebamunyenge tshidiye n atshi
Kanuikadi bu batatu enu ne bu bana benu, bakenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo, bibi, nunku yeye wakabafila bua bobo batuishe bakuabo mikemu, bu munudi numone
Betuyele uvua muana wa Nahore, muanabu ne Abrahame

Bana balume ba Amalama: Alona ne Mose; Alona wakadi mujidibue bua yeye ajidile bintu bia tshijila, yeye ne bana bandi balume tshiendelele, bua kuoshelabo Yehowa musenga wa manananshi, ne bua kumukuatshilabo mudimu ne bua kuvudishilabo bantu disanka mu dina diandi tshiendelele
Mitu ya makunji, ivua milamika tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Bena Levi nkayabu ke badi mua kuenza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Kenkûdi ne kudi bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu webe, anyi
mianda ya matunga meenyi idi munda mwayi mwikala malanda pamwe ne diumvwangana ne ndondu ne matunga makwabo;

Nakatangila hakalamuneye tshimanyishilu tshisambombo, ne dikanka dinene dia buloba diakadiku; ne diba diakalua difike bu mudi tshilulu tshifike tshia miosa; ne ngondo mujima wakalua bu mashi; ne mitoto ya mu diulu yakahona hanshi ha buloba, bu mudi mutshi wa nfigi uhôka nfigi yau mibishi, haunyungushabo kudi tshihehele tshikole
Kadi wandingi bua tshinyi

Yehowa wakambila Hoshea ne, Umuidike dina ne, Udibo kabayi bafuila luse Kadi nenfuile Bena Yuda luse; nembahandishe ku bukole bua Yehowa Nzambi wabo, tshiena mbahandisha ku buta, anyi ku muele wa nvita, anyi ku nvita anyi ku tubalu anyi kudi bena tubalu
Bakamba ne, Tudi ne bualu bua bamanyi kabidi kudi kunyi
Nanku anu bantu balume ba ku ndelanganyi ya Arone, ke badi mua kudia bukula bua mulambu abu
Mitanda yabu neyinyungulukile ntenta wa kusambakena, kadi mikale mutantshi ne ntenta awu
Kabuena dikenga kudi bantu babi, anyi
Katataka nakufila makelenge â onso mu bianza bia Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, muntu wanyi; nakumuha nyama yonso ya mu mpata kabidi bua kumukuatshilayi mudimu
Nunyangakaje kabidi miaba yabu yonsu idibu batendelela

Bialekela muntu ngombe wandi mu budimi bua muntu mukuabo, ne biadieye mitshi yandi ya tumuma tukese, yeye neamuhingashile bintu bidi bitamba buimpe bia mu budimi buandi ne bia mu budimi buandi bua nvinyo
Muntu wakamuambila ne, Mamu ebe ne bana benu badi bimane ku mbelu, bakeba kukuambila dî

Kanulumbuluishi bantu ne dilumbuluisha didi kadiyi diakane; kanutangidi mpala ya bantu; kanuitabushi bintu bia kunubueshilabo n abi; bualu bua bintu bia kunubueshilabo n abi bidi bifofomesha mesu a muena lungenyi, bidi binyanga dilumbuluisha didi diakane
Muntu yonso wahesha umue wa mu bantu aba bahuekele nasha dikoho dia mai matalala a kunua mu dina dia muyidi, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Yeye kena uhanga difutu diandi
Ku musangu umue eu nakambila bantu ne, Muntu ne muntu ashikame ne muena mudimu wandi mu Yelushalema bua bobo bamanye mua kutulama butuku ne bua kukuata mudimu mu munya
Eu udi muena mashimi ne mufuilakanyi ne Kilisto
Hashishe Eleyakima, muana wa Hilekiya, ne Shebena secrétaire, ne Yoa, muana wa Asafa, mufundi wa malu a bukelenge, bakahingana kuai Hezikiya ne bilulu biabo bihanda, bakamuambila mei a Labashake
Nenushale bioshelu biabo, nutshibule mabue abo bituha, nuoshe Bashela babo ne kahia; nenutahe mpingu yakasongabo ne tshifuanyikishi tshia nzambi yabo; nenjimishe mena abo mu muaba au
Malu onso, habatuishabo bua malu â, adi amueneshibua ku munya; bualu bua bualu buonso budi bumueneshibua budi bulua munya
Davidi wakambila Abishai ne, Kumushihi nansha; udi mua kulenga muntu wakela Yehowa manyi ha mutu ne kubinga nganyi
Nebaye nende pabuipi ne musulu udi ne mayi apueka amu kupueka, ku mielelu yawu kudibu kabayi banji kudima, nansha kukuna biakudia
Kadi Oge, mukalenga wa mu Bashane, ne bena mvita bende, kuya kuluisha bena Izrayele mu Edreyi
Bakaya n andi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bana ba bakashi ba Selofehada badi bamba dî dilelela: Ubahe buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo ne tatu abo, buhianyi bua tatu abo nebulue kudibo
Hakadibo baya mu nshila, muntu wakamuambila ne, Nenkulonde kuonso kuwaya
Bakangata Yesu; yeye wakaluhuka mudituadile mutshi wandi mutshiamakane, wakaya ku muaba udibo babikila ne, Muaba wa Kabalubalu ka Mutu, mu Buena Yuda ne, Gologota
Nakabanduluka, nakatangila, ekumona, tshimpanga tshiakadi ne nsengu ibidi tshiakimana ku muelelu wa musulu
Yehoyakima wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi; Yehoyakina, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi

Nakafila Bena Lewi kudi Alona ne bana bandi balume bu kuha kuabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua kukuatshila Bena Isalele mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne bua kubuikidila Bena Isalele bubi buabo, bua bualu bubi kabukuatshi Bena Isalele haluabo ha buihi ne ntenta wa kusambakena
Nunku, bana betu, hanuadisangisha bua kudia, nuindilangane
Nemmuipate munkatshi mua bena Izrayele, bualu mmulambule mvidie wa Moleke muanende
Kakuena umue wabo washala, bualu bua nenvuishe ntatu kudi bantu ba ku Anatota, tshikondo tshia kubala malu mabi abo mene
Wakamba kabidi ne, Aba, Tatu, wewe udi mumanye mua kuenza malu onso; ungumushile luhanza elu; kadi bualu buenjibue bu mûdi musue, kabuenjibu bu mundi musue
Ne bantu bonso badi basue kuikala bena kanemu mu Kilisto Yesu nebakengeshibue
Bana balume ba Yawana badi nunku Elisha ne Tâshishi ne Kitima ne Dodamma
Bantu kabatambi kufunafuna: mei a dihetu kahatula mukana muabo: bualu bua Yehowa udi Nzambi wa lungenyi: utu widikisha bienzedi bia bantu
Nanku nempande pamue ne bena kasoku aka
Monai, bu mudi dima mu bianza bia mufumbi, mbu munudi mu bianza bianyi, nuenu Bena Isalele
Edi ndikonka dia Yehowa wa misumba kunudi, nuenu bakuidi, badi balengulula dina dianyi
Bakatula, tshituha tshihi kabakamanya mua kutukoka bualu bua bungi bua minyinyi

hakashindikeye matutu a mu diulu, hakahandileye mai manene mukalu wau, ha diba adi nakadi hehi n andi bu muena Nakadi nsanka mu buloba buandi Nunku, bana banyi ba balume nungunvuile: Unvuai diyisha, nuikale ne meji, kanudihetudi nansha
Bumuka mu Ritma, kuyabu ku Rimone Perese
Yeye wakabakudimuna ne, Monai, ndi ntangila bantu banai basuluke, bendakana mu kahia, kabayi ne bualu
Bualu bua Yoshua kakahingasha tshianza tshiandi tshiakadiye muolole ne difuma tô ne hakabutuleye Bena Ai bonso kabutu
Nunku suika mukaba mu tshimono tshiebe, juka, ubambile mei onso andi nkuambila
Eu udi mukenji wa hafuila mundi mu ntenta mundi yonso udi ubuela mu ntenta au, ne mundi yonso wakadi mu ntenta au neikale bu mundi udi kayi muakane tô matuku muanda mutekete
Ke muakadi tshilota nanku; netulonde dijingulula diatshi ku mpala kua mukelenge

Yeye wakambila bantu lumu luimpe ukoleshe mitshima yabo ne mei makuabo a bungi; kadi muloho Helode wakadiye mubele bualu bua Helodia, mukashi wa muan abo, ne bualu bua malu mabi onso akenza Helode; yeye wakatentekesha bualu ebu bukuabo ha mutu ha malu au onso: wakabuesha Yone mu nsubu wa lukanu
Bena Isalele bakabikila bidia abi ne, Mana Tshiakadi tshintu tshitoke tô bu ntete ya conandre, tshiakadi tshintu tshia kutua kuimpe bu mikata mienza ne bintshi
Kadi badi bamba ne, Ebu mbualu bua hatuhu; bua netulonde anu malu atudi basue kulonda, netuenze bietu, muntu ne muntu, bu mudi tshitshu tshia mu mutshima wandi mubi
Moaba neakuatshike bundu bualu bua Kemoshe, bu muakakuatshika Bena Isalele bundu bualu bua Betele, tshieyemenu tshiabo
Ne meme, biambishabo ha buloba, nenkoke bantu bonso kundi
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Wakungenzela tshinyi
Bakangula bihesa bia bidia biakashala bisaka dikumi ne bibidi biule tente, ne bia mishiha kabidi

Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Muana wa muntu, mona, ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele badi bamba ne, Tshikena kumona tshidiye umona ntshia matuku a bungi atshidi ku mpala, ne yeye udi wamba malu a bikondo bitshidi kule

Bintu bia kutempa n abi bia mu tshianza tshiandi tshia balume biakamulesha bua Yelushalema bantu kushikamamu, mua kuela mbila ya nvita, mua kujadika mitshi minene ku mpala kua bibi bua kubishimbula, mua kuela mishiki ya buloba ne kuasa bibumba bia kutshintshimika n abi musoko
Lua, tunuishe tatu wetu nvinyo, netulale n andi, bua tuetu tulelele tatu wetu bana
Kanuitabushi argent mikuabo kudi bana benu, kadi nuyifile bua kulongolola miaba ei idi mishimbuke mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Shamehuta, Muena Yisela, wakadi kapitene ka tshisumbu tshia mu ngondo muitanu; mu tshisumbu tshiandi muakadi bantu binunu makumi abidi ne binai
Bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila, uvua munusungule bua nuikale tshisamba tshia tshijila
Kadi Gala wakamuambila kabidi ne, Tangila, bantu badi bahueka munkatshi mua mikuna, ne tshisumbu tshimue tshidi tshiluila mu nshila wa ku mutshi wa telebinta wa Meonenima
Meme nakuluila bua kuhaula muaba eu Yehowa kayi n anyi, anyi

Nusungule buloba budi butuangane ne buloba abu bua tshijila, buikale ne butshiama bua coudées binunu bitanu ne bule bua coudées binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu, ne buobu nebuikale buloba bua bonso ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele
Disu diebe didi dibi bualu bua meme ndi muimpe, anyi
Moshe kuangata kabidi mashi avua mashale mu dilongu, kuamiamina bena Izrayele pambidi, wamba ne: Mashi aa, adi ajadika ndondu uvua Maweja Nangila mutue nenu pavuaye nnumanyisha meyi ende

Kings Yeholama, muana wa Ahaba, wakabanga kukokesha Bena Isalele mu Samalea mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia bukelenge bua Yehoshafata, mukelenge wa Yuda; yeye wakakokesha bidimu dikumi ne bibidi
Yeye wakabelela lusumuinu ne, Budimi bua muntu mubanshi buakakuama bintu bia bungi; wakelangana meshi munda ne, Ngenze tshinyi
Kadi kuedi dî diebe kabidi mu Betele tshiendelele; bualu bua eu mmuaba wa tshijila wa mukelenge, ne mbalasa wandi wa bukelenge udimu
Matu a Hilama akafuma ku Ofî ne or akalua ne mitshi ya sandal ne mabue a mushinga mukole bia ku Ofî kabidi

Pinehasa, muana wa Eleazâ, muakuidi, wakambila Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne Bena Manashe ne, Lelu tudi bamanye ne, Yehowa udi munkatshi muetu, bualu bua nuenu kanuakenzela Yehowa bualu bubi ebu: katataka nuakasungila Bena Isalele mu tshianza tshia Yehowa
Kuenji mudimu dituku adi, nansha wewe, nansha bana bebe ba balume nansha ba bakaji, too ne bapika ne benyi badi basombe mu ditunga dienu
Ecclesiastes Udi bu muena meji nganyi
Kadi muntu mukuabu mufike pabuipi ne nzubu wa tshijila awu, nebamushipe
Yoaba wakela mpungi ne bantu bakalekela kulonda Bena Isalele, bualu bua Yoaba wakakanda bantu
Mu matuku au, meme Danyele nakadi ndiladila mbingu isatu
Ayi ke milongo minene idi isunguluja Dîyi dikulu
Kadi bafundi bakuabo bakadi bashikamemu, bakadi badikonka munda munda ne, Muntu eu udi wakuila nunku, tshinyi
Bantu ba Davidi bakamuambila ne, Mona, dituku diakakuambila Yehowa ne, Mona neufile muena lukuna webe mu tshianza tshiebe, diakufika; wewe umuenzele bu mûdi umona ne mbimpe
Mutuangaji akobolole muena tshibawu awu anu mushindu ewu, bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Bakulu ba Bena Moaba ne bakulu ba Midiyana bakaya ne bintu bia kumubila n abi mu bianza biabo, bakatua kudi Belâma, bakamuambila mei onso a Balaka
Nenfunde ha mabue au mei akadi mafunda ha mabue awakashiha, wewe wabueshe mu mushete

Ya ye lele ya ye lele Nganji kubikila Maamù eh Mamyanyi mwa Mbuya kasasu eh Mambi wa Tumba ne Tshala eh Mwana mudikaya yampongo eh Moyi munda nganyi wa ngakwile eh Ngipata mukunda muya mukanka mwana we lekela we Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi e Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi e Bakulumpa bakudima kwěpì
Nunku nakenzela mushete wa mitshi ya acacia, nakasonga mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi, nakabanda ku mukuna ne mabue abidi mu tshianza tshianyi
Bakajadika makunshi a nsubu wa Yehowa mu tshidimu tshinai tshia bukelenge, mu ngondo wa Ziwa

Yeye neambile kabidi badi ku tshianza tshia bakashi ne, Umukai kundi, nudi ne mulau, nuye mu kahia ka tshiendelele kadi katemeshela diabolo ne banjelo bandi; nakadi ne nsala, kanuakampa tshia kudia; nakadi ne nyota, kanuakampa tshia kunua; nakadi bianyi muenyi, kanuakambuesha mu nsubu; nakadi butaka, kanuakanduatshisha; nakadi nsama, nakadi mu nsubu wa lukanu, kanuakalua kunsombesha
Dielulula Mukaji muipata ku dibaka Pikala muntu musele mukaji, mukaji awu katshiyi umulengelela, mulume umudiwula bua bualu kampande, amufundile mukanda wa dishipa nawu dibaka, amupewu, amuipate
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Hanuambila Palo ne, Nundeshe bualu bua kukema, hashishe, wewe wambile Alona ne, Angata mulangala webe, uwele hanshi ku mesu kua Palô ne mulangala neukudimuke nyoka
Nudisangishe bua kuntendelela
Bakabambila ne, Katuena mua kuenza bualu ebu bua kufila muan etu wa bakashi kudi muntu udi kayi mute ngula, bualu ebu budi butufuisha bundu

Malaki Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Monai, dituku nedilue didi diosha bu kahia ka mu tshikutu, ne bonso badi badisue ne benji ba malu mabi honso nebikale bu bisonsa; ne dituku adi didi dilua nedibashidishe, kadiena dibashila nansha muji nansha ditamba
Tuetu tudi bamanyi ba malu â, ne Nyuma Muimpe kabidi, udi Nzambi muhe badi batumikila mei andi

Biamueneka ditoba ditoke tô mu dikoba diandi, ne bikaladi kadiyi dibuela mu munyinyi wandi mene, ne bikala miosa kayiyi mianze kuandamuka mitoke tô, nunku muakuidi neabueshe muntu udi ne disama ha nkayandi mu nsubu tô matuku muanda mutekete
Nuakakenga mu malu a bungi nunku tshianana, anyi
Eyowa, ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bena mikanda bakaya lubilu bua mukenji wa mukelenge, ne mukenji wakaledibua mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa mu Shushana
Yehowa Nzambi wetu, bintu ebi bionso bituakulongolola bua kukuibakila n abi nsubu wa dina diebe dia tshijila biakafuma mu tshianza tshiebe, bionso bidi biebe mene
Nukoleshe mitshima, nuikale ne dikima
Pashishe kulondabu kudi bena tshisamba tshia Zebulone, babalombola kudi Eliyabe, muana wa Elone
Yeye wakelela bakuidi, bana ba Alona, mukenji bua kuyifila kudi Yehowa ha tshioshelu
Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, muana wa muena bukitu wa mu Kabesele, Wakenza biandi malu manene, wakashiha bana balume babidi ba Aliele wa mu Moaba
Bidimu bia Yozefe bionsu bivua lukama ne dikumi
Dituku diwafika kabidi apa, udi ufua

Azaya, muakuidi munene, wa mu nsubu wa Sadoka, wakamukudimuna ne, Katshia bantu bahanga kufila bintu mu nsubu wa Yehowa, tuetu tuakudia, tuakukuta, ne bintu ebi biakushala bia ha mutu; bualu bua Yehowa wakasankisha bantu bandi; bintu ebi bia bungi bidi bishala
Mpindiewu ndi musue kupingana
Wewe wakambila bantu bebe ne, Luai n andi kundi, bua meme kumonangana n andi ku mesu
Wakabuela mu nsubu, kakasua muntu amanye ne, Udimu; kadi yeye kakamanya mua kusokoma
Nehemiya Udi Ukolesha Mitshima ya Bantu bua Kuasabo Lumbu Tshiakabidi Nakafika ku Yelushalema, nakashikamamu matuku asatu
Nunku batuhe habo ngombe ibidi: bobo badisunguila ngombe umue, bamusaye, bamuteke ha nkunyi, kabateki kahia muinshi; meme nendongolole ngombe mukuabo, nemmuteke ha nkunyi, tshiena nteka kahia muinshi
Kadi Nzambi wakatamba kulesha luse luandi kutudi mu muanda eu ne, Hatutshivua bantu babi, Kilisto wakatufuka
Yeye wakambila Mose ne, Meme tatu ebe muenu, Yetelo, nakukuluila ne mukashi webe ne bana bandi ba balume babidi

Bana balume ba Alona bonso nebatshidie, bu tshituha tshiabo mu bikondo biabo bionso munkatshi mua mulambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, muntu yonso udi ulenga bintu ebi tshianza neikale muntu wa tshijila
Yeye wakaha muntu yonso wa mu Isalele ne balume ne bakashi mutanda wa bidia ne tshihesa tshia munyinyi ne tshisumbu tshia tumuma tûme
Nuenu kunudimuena bintu bibi bia tshianana bivua bantu batendelela: mpingu ya mvidie ya mabue, ya mitshi misonga, ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi, nansha ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Yalobama kakaheta bukole kabidi mu matuku a Abiya; Yehowa wakamushiha, wakafua
Anyi bikaleye mumukume ne mutshi mu tshianza, ne biafileye, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu, nebashihe mushihi wa muntu
Hashishe bakahanda bilulu biabo, bakahingasha majitu ha nyima ha mpunda yabo, bakahingana mu musoko
Ndimba kupatuka kubuela mu ditunga dionsu dia Ejipitu
Ndi mukumanye, wewe udi Wa Tshijila wa Nzambi
Yeye wakalesha Bena Isalele, yeye wakaluangana n abo, anyi
Nunku bantu ba bungi bakadisangisha hamue, bakajibika mishimi ya mai yonso ne musulu mukese wakadi muhitshile mu buloba, bamba ne, Bakelenge ba Ashû badi ne bua kulua kusangana mai a bungi bishi
Ku tshikondo atshi Lesinyi, mukelenge wa Sulia, wakahingisha Elata ku Sulia; wakihata Bena Yuda mu Elata; Bena Sulia bakalua ku Elata, bakashikamamu tô ne ku dituku edi
Bana ba Sibeyone: ke Aya ne Ana
Nenuikale ne disanka hanuabuela mu nsubu, nenuikale ne disanka hanualuhukamu

Bikala muntu ne muana mulume udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, katu watumikila dî dia tatu wandi anyi dia mamu wandi, ne yeye katu wabahvuila biamukengeshaho, hashishe tatu wandi ne mamu wandi nebamukuate, nebaluhuke n andi kudi bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne ku tshibi tshia musoko; nebambile bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne, Muana wetu eu udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, kena utumikila mei etu; udi muena lumpukusu ne mukuatshiki wa maluvu
Mvidi Mukulu kubiela lupemba, wamba ne: Nuluangane, nuwuje mayi manene, nyunyi ivulangane pa buloba bujima
Disanka dia Kuhita kua Yehowa dia Bena Yuda diakadi ha buihi; ba bungi bakumuka mu nseke yabo, bakaya ku Yelushalema diambedi Kuhita kua Yehowa kakui buanze kufika, bua kudiuvuabo

Bua muanda eu, tuetu kabidi, katshia ku dituku dituakunvua lumu etu, katuena tulekela kutendelela Nzambi bua bualu buenu, ne kumulomba bua nuenu nûshibue tente ne kumanya kua disua diandi mu meshi onso ne dijingulula bia mu Nyuma; ne bua nuenu nuende mu bienzedi bidi biakanangane ne Mukelenge ku dimusankisha dionso, ne bua nuenu nukuame mamuma mu mudimu wonso muimpe, ne bua nuenu nudiundadiunde mu kumanya kuenu kua Nzambi; ne bua nuenu mikoleshibue ne bukole buonso, bu mudi bukole bua butumbi buandi, tô ne ku dinanukila dionso ne ku lutulu lusangisha ne disanka
Nanku kusemenabu kudi muena mudimu wa Yozefe uvua mu mushiku wa mbelu, bamuambila ne: Mukalenga, utufuile luse, tuetu aba tuvua bafike munemu musangu wa kumpala bua kusumba biakudia
Ndi mukumanye, wewe udi Wa Tshijila wa Nzambi
Hakatangila bantu difutu dimana ku mbelu kua Ntenta, bantu bonso bakabika, bakatendelela muntu ne mu ntu ku ntenta wandi
Udi mumanye mua kuitabusha dî adi aditabushe
Bungi bua bana ba balume ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu buakadi binunu muanda mukulu ne nkama isambombo, bakadi balama bintu bia nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Bualu bua muntu ne muntu neadianjile bujitu buandi

Samuele wakakudimuna Shaula dî ne, Meme ndi mumonyi wa malu; ya ku mpala kuanyi ku mukuna bualu bua bûdi n abu mbua kudia n anyi bidia lelu; kadi hatshiabu nenkutume, nenkuambile malu onso adi mu mutshima webe
Ke mikenji iwaye munumanyishe munkatshi mua kapia, panuvua kuinshi kua mukuna
Shaula wakadi ne difuma mu tshianza tshiandi
Maweja Nangila uvua munuambile bua kulambula mashi pa tshilambuilu bua amone mua kunufuila luse

Yeye wakabelela lusumuinu elu ne, Muntu kai wa munkatshi muenu, bikaleye ne lukama lua mikoko, hajimisheye mukuabo, kena ushîa minga makumi tshitema ne tshitema mu tshihela wenda ukeba udi mujimine tô ne haumoneye
Mbimpe anyi
Bavua bengulule kilo
bintu biabo bilondeshila Kanungu ka Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kujadika ne kwenza mushindu wa se bisamba biônso bia ditunga bikala bisomba pamwe mu ditalala ne mu bulongame
Bu munuakaheta bintu bimpe bionso biakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku Yehowa neanutumine malu mabi onso tô ne hanubutuleye mu buloba ebu buimpe buakanuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Ne bantu bonso bakuabo bakashala kabai bashihibue mu bihuhu ebi, kabakakudimuna mitshima yabo bua midimu ya bianza biabo, bua kabakukuidi bademon, ne mpingu ya ngolo ne ya argent ne ya tshiamu tshia mitaku ne ya dibue ne ya mitshi, idi kayi mimanye mua kutangila, anyi kunvua, anyi kuenda; ne kabakakudimuna mitshima yabo bua mashihangana abo, nasha bua muhongo wabo, nasha bua masandi abo, nasha bua buibi buabo

Nakabatuma kudi Ido, muntu munene, ku muaba wa Kasifaya; nakabambila mei a kuambilabo Ido ne bana babo, Bena Netinima, ku muaba wa Kasifaya, bua bobo balue kutudi ne benji ba mudimu wa nsubu wa Nzambi wetu
Luta, Muena Moaba, wakambila Naomi ne, Anji kuitabusha bua meme kuya mu budimi bua undi mua kusangana luse ku mesu kuandi bua meme kuhumbululaku mpumbuluila Yeye wakamuambila ne, Yaku, muan anyi
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi, diamba ne, Diambedi tshiyi muanji kukufuanyikisha munda mua mamu webe nakakumanya, Mu diba adi nakamba hanyi ne, Aka, Mukelenge Yehowa
Hanakadi tshi mumanye mua kutangila bualu bua bukole hua munya au, bakadi n anyi bakankuata ku tshianza balombola, nunku nakafika ku Damaseke
Davidi wakamuambila ne, Mashi ebe ikale ha mutu hebe bualu bua mukana muebe muakukuhisha, muamba ne, Nakashiha muntu wakela Yehowa manyi ha mutu
Bualu bua mu meshi a Nzambi hakahanga ba ha buloba kumanya Nzambi mu meshi abo, Nzambi wakasanka bua kusungila badi bamuitabusha ku buhote bua kuamba kua dî diandi
Zakâya wakakonka muanjelo ne, Nemanye bualu ebu munyi

Yehowa wakambila muntu wakadi muluate bivualu bia lin ne, Buela munkatshi mua nkata idi inyunguluka muinshi mua bakeluba, ûsha bianza biebe tente ne makala a kahia matema adi hankatshi ha bakeluba, wamuangalashe ha mutu ha musoko
Bobo nebashikame mu misoko ei, ne bimuna ne bintu biabo ne nyama yabo mikuabo nebikale mu buloba budi bunyunguluka misoko
Kadi mesu a Nzambi wabo akadi kudi bakulu ba Bena Yuda, kabakabakandisha mu mudimu tô ne hakayabo ne bualu ebu kudi Dayawesha, ne hakabafundileye mukanda bua bualu ebu
Bualu bua buakane bua Nzambi buakubuluibuamu ku ditabusha ne ku ditabusha; bu muakafundabo ne, Muntu muakane neikale ne muoyo ku ditabusha
Bituanua ne, Netubuele mu musoko, ka tshiole tshidiku, netufuileku; bituashikama kunoko tshianana, netufuile kabidi
Diampa adi badikose mu bitupa, bela kabidi mafuta pa bitupa abi, bualu mmulambu wa bintu bia mu budimi
Baprofete bonso badi bamba bualu buandi ne, Muntu yonso wamuitabusha neangate dijimisha dia dibi mu dina diandi

Bakajadika bitekelu bia makunshi abu ha binganyi, bakimba mitoto ya nkesha misambu diatshimue, Nganyi wakinshidila mai manene bibi, hanakavuisha matutu bu tshivualu tshiau, hanakâjadikila mukulu wanyi unakausunguila diambedi, ne hanakamba bianyi ne, Nuemanye mua kufika aku, kadi kuhitshi nansha; Katshia wabanga matuku ebe wewe wakuelela lunkelu mukenji, anyi

Kadi bualu bua bantu ba bisamba bia bende bakamana kuitabusha, tuakabatumina mukanda, bahunge dî dietu ne, Nulekele bintu bidi bishihela mpingu, nulekele kabidi mashi, ne nyama mifiekela mu nshingu ha kuishiha, ne masandi
Mukelenge wa Babulona wakashiha bana ba Sedekiya ku mpala kuandi
Yeye wakitabusha ne ba mu nsubu wandi bonso
Pashishe muntu udi ufila bintu abi, neambe kabidi kumpala kua Maweja Nangila ne: Nkambua wanyi uvua muena Arame, kayi ne muaba wa kusomba
Newambile Arone malu onsu andi mukuambile, bua aye kumanyisha mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, bua anyishe bena Izrayele bumuke mu ditunga diende

Bana ba Muena Kena, tatu andi muenu wa Mose, bakumuka ku musoko wakadi ne mabue a ngashi, bakaya ne Bena Yuda ku tshihela tshia Yuda, tshidi ku luseke lua ku sude wa Alada; bakaya, bakashikama ne bantu aba
Abalahama wakangata nkunyi ya kalua ka ha tshioshelu, wakayiteka ha diaha dia muan andi Isaka, yeye wakangata kalua ne kele mu tshianza tshiandi, bubidi buabo bakaya hohamue
Hashishe, Yobo wakandamuna Mona, ndi muntu muhuekele; nenkukudimune wewe dî kai
Nansha tshintu tshikuabo tshiakadi mu mushete eu anu mabue abidi akadi ne mikenji mifundahu akatekamu Mose ku Holeba kuakahunga Yehowa tshihungidi ne Bena Isalele hakumukabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mulambu wa bobumue Padi muena Izrayele ulambula ngombe bu mulambu wa bobumue, ngombe awu ikale mulume nansha mukaji, kayi bulema
Kadi ku dikombu dia bena Levi ufundeku dina dia Arone
Yeye wakaya ku tshishihuidi wakenza malu onso akamuambila mamuen andi
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Muan anyi, ditabusha diebe diakukuhandisha, ya biebe talalâ
Wakela dî diandi bikole ne, Yesu, muana wa Davidi, unfue luse
Bakashi bakimba, bambilangane ne, Shaula wakashiha binunu bia bantu, Davidi wakashiha binunu makumi bia bantu
Daniel Mu tshidimu tshibidi tshia bukokeshi bua Nebukadenesâ, yeye Nebukadenesâ wakalota bilota; mutshima wandi wakahampakana, kakadi ne tulu ku mesu
Badi balambula pa tshilambuilu tshiebe milambu ya manananshi, ne ya kuosha
Esawu ukonka amu kukonka tatuende ne: Udi mua kuela amu muntu umue lupemba anyi

Bualu bua Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakaha bantu balume ba ngombe tshinunu ne mikoko binunu muanda mutekete bua kufilabo bu milambu; ne bantu banene bakaha bantu balume ba ngombe tshinunu ne mikoko binunu dikumi; bakuidi ba bungi bakadijidila
Kuinshi kuonsu aku, kuvua kulembeleja kabidi ndibu ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi menemene, pankatshi pa bimuma bia grenade

Halua dituku dia matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondo wa muanda mutekete hanuashikisha kuhuola bintu, nenudie bidia bia Yehowa matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia kuikisha, ne dituku dia muanda mukulu nedikale dituku dia kuikisha
Hashishe Amenona wakatamba kumukina ne lukinu lukole, lukinu luakamukineye n alu tuakahita dinanga diakadiye n adi kudiye bukole
Yakobe udi uluangana ne Mvidi Mukulu Butuku abu, Yakobe ubika, kuangataye bakaji bende babidi, ne bana bende dikumi ne umue
Muakuidi neabuoshe bu tshivulukidi, tshituha tshia miehu nu tua ne tshia manyi ne musenga wonso wa manananshi tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Muntu umue kena mua kujadika bualu to
Bobo bakakebakeba, kabakabasa ngana, nunku bakahingana ku Yelushalema
Mulume neikale mubingishibue ku bubi, ne mukashi eu neadituadile bubi buandi
Bakunangi kabena babika lukasa, anyi

Yehowa wakamba ne, Mona, ndi mbikila ba mu meku onso a mu makelenge a ku node; nebalue, buonso buabo nebajadike nkuasa yabo ya bunfumu ku bibuelelu bia ku bibi bia mu Yelushalema, bua kushimbulabo ngumbu idi inyungulula musoko ku nseke yonso, ne bua kuluishabo bena misoko yonso ya mu Yuda
Mutondo wa difuma wakadi bu mbungu wa mukumi wa bilulu; lusongo lua difuma luakadi ne bujitu bua nshekele ya tshiamu tshifike nkama isambombo; mutuadi wa ngabu wandi wakaya ku mpala kuandi
Nakanuambila ku tshikondo atshi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuha buloba abu bu buhianyi: bena nvita nebasabuke ne bintu bia nvita ku mpala kua bana benu ba Bena Isalele
Yeye wakabambila ne, Bikololo bitu biadisangisha hadi tshintu tshibole

Nembihate ne muele wa nvita, tshiole ne tshihuhu, ne nembafile bua kuikalabo bu tshidi tshikuatshisha buowa munkatshi mua makelenge onso a ha buloba, nebikale bu tshintu tshiela mulau, tshidi tshibakemesha, tshidibo babingila ne tshidibo bahenda kudi ba munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia bantu kunabatuma
Kadi Yesu wakamanya budimu buabo, wakabakonka ne, Nuenu bena lubombo, nudi nuntetshila munda tshinyi

Bikala muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadihamu dina diandi, udi kule, hashishe nenushale ngombe wa mu ngombe yenu ne mukoko wa mu mikoko biakanuha Yehowa, bu munakanuambila; nudi mua kudia ku mbelu kuenu bintu bionso bidi mitshima yenu misue
Ke muudi mua kupatula mayi mu lubuebue, bua kunuisha bantu bonsu ne bimuna biabu
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudi Bena Isalele, yeye wakabahana mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete ne bia Bena Amona
Bidimenene abi, nebabidie kabidi kudi bimuna bienu, ne kudi nyama ya tshisuku idi mu ditunga dienu

Kadi, pikala Maweja Nangila mubenzele bualu budi kabuyi buanji kuenzeka, pikala buloba bumine, bujibikile bantu abu ne bena meku abu, ne bintu biabu, baye mu kandondu ka bafue, batshikale ne muoyi, nanku nenujadike ne: mbasendeke Maweja Nangila
Yeye wakambila bantu ne, Nudilongolole ku dituku disatu, kanuyi ha buihi ne bakashi nansha
Neatumbishe nzambi wakadi hatatu bandi kabayi bamanye, neafile biamu bia or ne bia argent, mabue a mushinga mukole ne bintu bilengele kudiye
Mukelenge wakunvua mei abo
Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Tô ne hajimina diulu ne buloba, kaleta kamue kakese ka mikenshi ya Mose kakena kajimina ne katoba kamue kakese tô ne hashika malu onso akafundabo
Satana wakimana ku mpala kua Bena Isalele, wakasonsola mutshima wa Davidi bua kubaleye Bena Isalele
Kadi bushuwa tatu wanyi utshidi ne muoyi anyi
Ke Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ubikile bena Izrayele bonsu, bua mbapeshe mayi a kunua
Hakashika malu â, Yesu ne bayidi bandi bakalua mu luseke lua Yudaya; wakashalaku tshituha ubatiza bantu

Wakela mukenji ne wakelesha dî mu nseke yonso ya Ninewe, wamba bu muakamba mukenji wa mukelenge ne bantu bandi banene ne, Kabalabudi tshintu kudi muntu anyi kudi nyama, kudi ngombe anyi kudi mikoko; kabidi tshia kudia, kabinu mai
Bakatuma mikanda ei ya kumanyisha n abi bantu bonso ba mu nseke yonso ne, Budi Bena Yuda n abu mbua kudilongolola bua dituku adi bua kudisombuelabo kudi bena lukuna babo
Yeye wakabakudimuna ne, Monai, ndi ntangila bantu banai basuluke, bendakana mu kahia, kabayi ne bualu
Baledi ba Rebeka kuanyisha bua Rebeka ne ndeji wende, uvua mumukoleshe, baye ne muena mudimu wa Abrahame, kabidi ne bonsu bavuaye muende nabu
Yetelo wakasanka bua malu mimpe onso akenzela Yehowa Bena Isalele, bualu bua yeye wakabasungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu
Yesu wakabambila ne, Meme kabidi tshiena nuambila bua bukokeshi bundi ngenza n abu malu â
Bualu bua tuetu katuena ne bukole bua kuluangana ne tshisumbu etshi tshinene tshilualua kutuluisha, katuena bamanye mua kuenza; kadi mesu etu adi kûdi
Tuye n ebe, tuhunge tshihungidi, wewe ne meme, tshihungidi etshi tshikale bu kuditshiha kua bualu munkatshi muetu
Leviticus Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele bua bobo balue kûdi ne manyi akatuabo bua kutemesha n au minda ku dituku ku dituku
Tshiakutangila Yesu, Mukelenge wetu, anyi
Nunku, ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ku mpala kua tshibuelelu tô ne ku mushiku wa mbelu wakadi ku mpala kua mbalanda eu kuakadi coudées makumi atanu
Kadi pikala mupika awu mufue kunyima kua dituku dimue nansha kua matuku abidi, nebalekele mututshianganyi, bualu mbintu biende
Bienzedi bia Shaluma bikuabo ne tshifufu tshiakeleye bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele
Mpindiewu udi ne difu
Pashishe muenji wa manananshi kuenza mafuta a tshijila a kujidila nawu bantu ne bintu
Yosefe wakamba ne, Numpe bimuna bienu, nennuhe bia kudia ku bimuna bienu bikale argent yenu mishike
Ndi mumanye ne: pambafua, bena Izrayele nebenze bibi, nebabenge bionsu bimvua mubambile
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Yoshiya ne malu mimpe akenzeye bu muakadi mikenji ya Yehowa, ne malu andi a kumudilu ne a kunshikidilu, monai, bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa bakelenge ba Isalele ne ba Yuda
Munyinyi wa nyama unu vua balambula Maweja Nangila dilolu dia dituku dia kumpala, nuudie, ujika anu dituku adi
Mukelenge Helode wakunvua lumu lua Yesu, bualu bua dina diandi diakamanyibua; wakamba biandi ne, Yone Mubatiji wakubika ku lufu, bua bualu ebu malu a kukema adi enjibua kudiye
Wakaya kuakenzeye tshioshelu diambedi, ne Abalama wakahitaku dina dia Yehowa
Bana ba Arone abu, ubalabe mafuta mushindu uuvua mulabe tatuabu, ubajidile bua bangenzele mudimu wa butuangaji

Nenunyange tshiamu tshia argent tshinudi balamike ku mpingu yebe misonga, ne tshiamu tshia or tshinudi balamike ku mpingu yebe mifudibue; nenubimashe bu tshilulu tshinyanguke ne bukoya; nenubambile ne, Umukai kutudi
Meme hanyi nakela mashi a musoko ha dibue didi hatuhu, bua kâbuikidibu, ne bua ajule tshiji tshianyi bua kudisombuela
Bualu bua udi bu meme nganyi
Nunku nuabanyangane buloba munkatshi muenu bu mudi bisamba bia Bena Isalele
Ne udi ne ditantamana, ne wakatuala majitu bua dina dianyi, ne kuakuhungila
Ditalala dikale kûdi
Ndi mumanye ne, Mukelenge wa Ejipitu kena witabusha bua nuenu kuya, neitabushe anu ne tshianza tshikole
Ke Arone ne bana bende ba balume ne bilamba biabu kushala bia tshijila
Hashishe mukelenge wakambila Siba ne, Mona, bintu bionso bia Mefibosheta mbiebe

Kadi nuenu nuakulua ku mukuna wa Siona ne ku musoko wa Nzambi udi ne muoyo, Yelushalema wa mu diulu, ne ku misumba ya banjelo idi kayi mua kubadibua, ne ku disangisha dinene ne ekelesia bia ban a bute badi ne mena abo mafunda mu diulu, ne kudi Nzambi, Mulumbuludi wa bonso, ne ku nyuma ya bantu bakane bakvuishabo bakane tshishiki, ne kudi Yesu, mutuanganyi wa tshihungidi tshihia tshihia, ne ku mashi adibo bamiamina adi atamba mashi a Ebele kuakula bimpe
Misangu yonsu ivuabu babuele mu ntenta wa kusambakena, nansha bafike pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, bavua bowa mayi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Dane neikale mfumu wa tshisamba tshiende, netshikale bu bisamba bikuabu bia Izrayele
Monai mutudi katui mua kujingulula bilumbuluidi biandi, mutudi katui mua kulonda nshila yandi
Nenulele bana balume ne bana bakashi, kadi bobo kabena benu, bualu bua bobo nebaye mu buluka

Samalea kabidi kena muenze malu mabi bu muwakuenza, nansha tshituha tshiau mene; kadi wewe wakubatamba kuvudisha malu mabi a bundu, ne wakubingisha bana benu ba bakashi ku malu mabi ebe a bundu awakuenza
Kulondolola Bukokeshi bua Abiya Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia mu bukelenge bua Yalobama, Abiya wakabanga kukokesha mu Yuda
Ku dituku dinakasungula nempingane kûdi, hakumbana ngondo yandi, Sala nealele muana mulume
Bobo badi Bena Isalele, anyi
Davidi wakatuma bantu bakamuangata, yeye wakabuela kudiye, wakalala n andi bualu bua yeye wakamana kuhatuka ku bukoya buandi
Mose ne Alona bakaya kudi Palô, bakamuambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu, udi Wamba ne
Buloba buakashala talalâ, kakuyi nvita
Deuteronomy Nuenze mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo, nukumbane, nubuelemu bua kuhiana buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Yehowa wakamutumina disama dia mu mala andi diakadibo kabayi bamanye mua kuondaha
Nakakula kabidi ne muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi, nakamukonka ne, Ebi mbinganyi, mukelenge wanyi
Bualu bua Bena Kanâna ne bena buloba bonso nebulue lumu elu, nebatunyunguluke, nebajimishe dina dietu ha buloba; ne wewe newenze tshinyi bua dina diebe dinene

Ku nyima wakabuela mu nsubu wa munda mua tshitendelelu, wakidikisha makunshi a ku mbelu; dikunshi ne dikunshi diakadi bunene bua coudées ibidi; mushiku wa mbelu wakadi ne butshiama bua coudées isambombo, ne bule bua tshimanu tshia ku luseke elu lua mushiku buakadi coudées muanda mutekete, bule bua tshimanu tshia ku luseke lukuabo buakadi coudées muanda mutekete
Hezikiya kena unuitabushisha bua kunuluisha ne tshiole ne nyota, wamba ne, Yehowa Nzambi wetu neatuhandishe mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Ashû, anyi
Bualu bua nuenu, bana betu, nuakabikidibua bua budishikaminyi; kadi nudimuke ne budishikaminyi buenu kabulu tshia kusankisha n atshi mubidi, kadi bualu bua dinanga dienu nukuatshilangane mudimu
Yeye wakamba kabidi ne
Ne bua bualu buebe wewe newikale bu umue wa bahote mu Isalele

Mu dituku dia Lumingu neufue bana balume ba mikoko babidi badi kabayi ne tshilema ba tshidimu tshimue, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi bia tshihiminu eu udi mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ku matuku a Lumingu, ku mutu kua mulambu udibo bafila buatshia buatshia

Kadi mu manga malu ndi nufundila mei anyi ne dikima dihita, bua kunvuluisha tshiakabidi, bualu bua ngasa wakampabo kudi Nzambi, bua meme kuikala mukuatshishi wa mudimu wa Kilisto Yesu mutumibue kudi bisamba bia bende, ngenza mudimu wa muakuidi wa mu lumu luimpe lua Nzambi, bua kufila kuanyi kua bisamba bia bende kuvuishibue mulambu udi Nzambi musue, mujidibue kudi Nyuma Muimpe

Bualu bua bualu ebu buakenza mukelenge mukashi nebufike kudi bakashi bonso, nebufuishe balume babo bundu ku mesu kuabo hamanyabo ne, Mukelenge Ahashawelosha wakatumina Washeti, mukelenge mukashi, mukenji bua kulueye ku mesu kuandi, kadi yeye kakalua
Hakamona Yesu bantu ba bungi bunguila lukasa, wakabela nyuma wa bukoya, wakamuambila ne, Wewe nyuma wa kamama ne wa mahaha, ndi nku buluila ne, Umuka munda muandi, kubuedimu kabidi
Bena Isalele bakateka balaminyi banyunguluke Gibea

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nudi bantu ba buhidia bukole, binaya bianyi munkatshi muenu anu tshituha tshikese, nennushihe, nunku nuvule bintu bia kudilengesha n abi, bua meme mmanye tshindi mua kunuenzela

Yeye wakasa bibumba mu tshihela kabidi, wakimba mena a mai, bualu bua yeye wakadi ne bimuna bia bungi; Wakenza nunku mu bibanda ne mu mpata kabidi; yeye wakadi ne bidime ne balami ba mionshi ya tumuma tukese mu mikuna ne mu maloba mimpe; bualu bua yeye wakananga mudimu wa budimi, Uziya wakadi ne bena nvita ba bungi, bakaya bua kuluangana mu bisumbu biabo bu muakabatahulula Yeiele mufundi ne Mâseya kahita, bakadi mu bianza bia Hananya, kapitene kakuabo ka mukelenge
Kulondolola Kujidila kua Ntempelo Bak
Bena Rubene ne bena Ngade kuambila Moshe ne: Kabiena muudi wamba amu to

Ezekiel Wewe kabidi, muana wa muntu, angata muele wa nvita mutue bu nteula bua kuenza n au mudimu wa kubeya, ne beya n au nsuki ya ku mutu ne ya ku muedi; hashishe, angata tshiamu tshia kuidikisha n atshi bujitu, ne idikisha n atshi nsuki
Meme ndi nutumbisha bualu bua nudi nunvuluka mu malu onso, ne nudi nulamata bilele bu munakanuheshabi

Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi ufikisha bamweenampala ne batumibwa ba pabwabo ku matunga a beenyi ne ku malongolodi a bukwa matunga, bamwena mpala ne batumibwa ba pabwabo ba matunga makwabo padibo banyishibwa kudiye
Mu matuku au nebasungile Bena Yuda, ne Bena Yelushalema nebashikame talalâ; ne edi ndina didibo bamuidika ne, Yehowa mBuakane Buetu
Yeye kakitabusha bua muntu mukuabo amulonde, anu Petelo ne Yakobo ne Yone muan abo ne Yakobo
Yeye wakamuitaba ne, Ndiku
Nuikale ne ditalala
Bakadi babadibua mu kulondolola kuabo, mu bikondo biabo, bu ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo bena nvita ba dikima bakadi binunu makumi abidi ne nkama ibidi
Kadi monai, meme ndi anu mu bianza bienu, nungenzele malu onso adi mimpe ku mesu kuenu
Nunku Davidi wakaya, wakumusha mushete wa Nzambi mu nsubu wa Obeda edome, wakalua n au ku musoko wa Davidi ne disanka

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubale bungi bua bana balume ba Gêshona kabidi ku nsubu ya batatu abo ne ku meku abo; ba bidimu makumi asatu tô ne ku bidimu makumi atanu wewe neubabale, buonso buabo badi bakuata mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne binai ne nkama mai
Bakelenge aba bonso bakadisangisha hamue; bakalua, bakasa tshitudilu ku mai a Meloma bua kuluangana ne Bena Isalele
Solomo wakenza matu a bungi mu Esione gebê, hehi ne Elota, mu buloba bua Edome ku muelelu wa Dishiba Dikunze

Dinda yeye wakalua mu ntempelo kabidi, bantu bonso bakalua kudiye; wakashikama, wakabayisha: Bafundi ne Bafalese bakalua ne mukashi mukuata wenda masandi; hakamutekabo munkatshi, bakambila Yesu ne, Muyishi, bakukuata mukashi eu wenda masandi, mpa bualu mene

Wakatuma mukanda hakumukabo mu Yelushalema kudi Yekoniya mukelenge, mukelenge mukashi mamu andi mumuledi, bantu bandi batungula, baminyampala ba mu Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema, bena mabaya ne batudi ba biamu
Yone Hakashika malu â, Yesu wakaya dishia dia dishiba dia Galela, didi dishiba dia Tibelia
Neyishale anu mu musulu wa Nile
Mutshima wa Palo wakakoleshibua, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Bamfumu badi bafuma ku ndelanganyi ya Esawu badi nunku: Elifaze, muanabute, udi nkambua wa bamfumu basambombu: Temane, Omare, Sefo, Kenaze, Ngatame ne Amaleke
Shela wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu, wakalela Ebê
Nudilongolole ku nsubu ya batatu enu mu milongo yenu, bu muakafunda Davidi, mukelenge wa Isalele, ne bu muakafunda Solomo muan andi
Hazaele, mukelenge wa Sulia, wakakengesha Bena Isalele matuku onso a Yehoaza
Kutupatulaye mu Ejipitu ku bukole
Bafalese ne bafundi babo bakajiana bayidi ba Yesu, bakabakonka ne, Nudi nudila, nudi nunuina ne basangishi ba mulambu ne bantu babi tshinyi
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu kutuambuluisha
Bua ditabusha wakumuka mu Ejipitu kai utshina tshishi tshia mukelenge; bua yeye wakatantamana bu muakadiye utangila yeye udi kai umueneka ku mesu
Kadi padi mutuangaji utshikenketa, umona ne: dikeji adi kadiena ditampakane tshintu tshijima, udi utuma diyi bua basukule tshintu atshi
Yeye wakaya, wakalua n ai kudi mamu andi, ne mamu andi wakalamba munyinyi muimpe wa dihembu bu muakasua tatu andi
Ndi nuambila ne, Endai mu Nyuma Muimpe, nunku kanuena nulonda lukuka lua mubidi
Wakabanda ha nyima ha mukeluba, wakahahala; e, bakamutangila wenda ha mahuahua a luhehele
Maweja Nangila mmumupeshe kabidi yeye ne Okoliyabe, muana wa Akisamaka, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dane, lungenyi lua kulongesha bakuabu midimu ayi
Basangishi ba mulambu mene kabatu benza nunku, anyi
Kadi bantu bakaya n andi bakamba ne, Katuena bamanye mua baluangana ne bantu aba, bualu bua badi batutamba bukole
Hakakatamuteye, wakadikonka munda ne, Bena mudimu ba tatu wanyi hadi bungi munyi badi ne bia kudia bia bungi ne bintu bikuabo bisambuke ha mutu kabidi, kadi meme ndi nfua ne nsala kunoko
Nualukishile bantu bonso mabanza abo: mulambu kudi muenu mulambu, mpunga kudi unudi mua kuhunga, buowa kudi unudi mua kutekela buowa, buneme kudi unudi mua kunemeka
Kadi binuananukila kuenza bibi, neanubutule ne mukelenge wenu kabidi
Bualu bua difutu dia bubi ndufu, kadi diha dia luse dia Nzambi mmuoyo wa tshiendelele mu Kilisto Yesu Mukelenge wetu
Hashishe, mukelenge wandi wakamubikila ne, Wewe udi muhika mubi, nakukulekela dibanza adi dionso, bualu bua wewe wakuntendekena; munyi wewe kabidi kufu muhika n ebe luse bu munakukufua wewe luse
Bakadianjileye kusungula, yeye wakababikila kabidi; ne bakabikileye, yeye wakababingisha kabidi; ne bakabingisheye, yeye wakabatumbisha kabidi
Bakabandisha mei abo, bakadila kabidi, Ôpa wakatuangana ne mamuen andi mishiku, kadi Luta wakamulamata
Bualu ebu kabuena bufunda mu mulunda wa Yashâ, anyi
Mukelenge wakabambila ne, Nakulota tshilota, mutshima wanyi udi utata bua kumanya tshilota etshi
Bena Lewi bakadilengesha ku bubi buabo, bakuvuwa bilulu biabo, Alona wakabanyukula bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, Alona wakadia mulambu wa kubabuikidila n au bubi, bualu bua kubalengesha
Biamukuatabo mu munya, nebamusombuele, yeye neahingashe bintu, ne bikaleye kayi ne bintu, nebamuhane bua buibi buandi
Kadi ndi nuambila bulelela ne, Meme muye mbimpe bienu; bingikala tshî nya, Musambi kena ulua kunudi; kadi binaya, nenutumineye
Bua malu â ambila ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kudimunai mitshima yenu, nukome mpingu yenu nyima, umushai mesu ku malu enu a bundu
Muntu yonso udi Nzambi muhe bintu ne bubanji ne bukole bua kubidia, bua kuangateye difutu diandi ne kusankeye mu midimu yandi amanye ne, Edi ndiha dia Nzambi

Haumuka kundi lelu, wewe neusungile ne balume babidi ha majambu a Lakele ku Selesa ku mukata wa buloba bua Benyamina; bobo nebakuambile ne, Nyama ya mpunda îwakaya kukeba yakamueneka; mona, tatu webe wakalekela kunyingalasha mutshima bua nyama ya mpunda, udi unyingalasha mutshima bualu buebe, wamba ne, Nengenze tshinyi bua muan anyi wa balume
Mibidi ya nkata ya mukulu yakadi bu ya dibue dia chrysolithe; buonso buai inai yakadi ne tshinfuanyi tshimue, ne dilamakashibua mai diakadi dimueneka bu mudi nkata muela munda mua mukuabo
Danyele wakandamuna mukelenge ne, Mukelenge, wikale ne muoyo tshiendelele
Yehowa, dî diwakamba bua mundi webe ne bua nsubu wandi, dijadikibue tshiendelele; wenze bu muwakuamba
Yehoaza wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne bisatu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema ngondo isatu

Dishina dia dî diebe mbushuwa, Baminyampala bakunkengesha kakuyi bualu, Ndi nsanka bua di diebe, Ndi nkina mashimi, ndi ngalengulula, Ndi nkutumbisha misangu muanda mutekete ku dituku ku dituku, Badi bananga mikenji yebe badi ne ditalala dinene; Ndi ntekemena luhandu luebe, Yehowa, Muoyo wanyi udi ulamata mikenji yebe idi ilesha bu mûdi; Ndi ndama mei ebe ne mikenji yebe; Kudila kuanyi kufike ku mesu kuebe, Yehowa; Kutendekena kuanyi kufike ku mesu kuebe; Mishiku yanyi ikutumbishe, Ludimi luanyi luimbe bua dî diebe, Tshianza tshiebe tshikaleku bua kunkuatshisha, Ndi njinga luhandu luebe, Yehowa, Mutshima Nakuhambuka bu mukoko mujimine; ukebe muena mudimu webe, Psalms Mu dikenga dianyi ndi ndila kudi Yehowa, Yehowa, uhandishe muoyo wanyi ku mishiku ya mashimi, Nebakuhe tshinyi, nebakutentekele bualu bukuabo kai ha mutu, Nebakuase mikete misakisha ya muena bukitu, Mulau udi mikuata bua ndi ndala mu Mesheke, Muoyo wanyi wakumana kushikama musangu muhite bule Ndi nnanga ditalala; Psalms Ndi mbandisha mesu anyi ku mikuna mile
Philippians Tshiashadidi mpindiu, bana betu, nusanke mu Mukelenge
Mêyi ne mikandu idi ileeja mishindu ya kulonda

Akana wakambila Yoshua ne, Bulelela, nakenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, bubi; bualu bunakuenza budi nunku: hanakatangila tshilulu tshimpe tshia Bena Babulona ne nshekele Yoshua wakatuma ba messager, ne bobo bakaya lubilu ku ntenta; monai, biakadi bisokoka mu ntenta wandi, ne tshiamu tshia argent muinshi muabi

Mikuna yaya ya kale yakulua buhianyi buetu; nunku uyambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi Wamba ne, Bualu bua bakunubutula, bakununyanga ku nseke yonso, bua nuenu nuikale buhianyi bua bisamba bikuabo bia bantu, ne bualu bua bakutela mena enu kudi bena musoko, ne bakunsonguela munkatshi mua bantu; bua malu â, nuenu mikuna ya mu Isalele, unvuai dî dia Mukelenge Yehowa

Monai, bualu bundi mmona buimpe ne bukumbanyine muntu: adie biandi, anue biandi ne asanke mu midimu yandi yonso idiye wenza muinshi mua diba, matuku onso a muoyo wandi adi Nzambi mumuhe; edi ndifutu diandi
Kadi nudimuke bua bukole buenu kabuikadi tshilenduishi kudi badi batekete
Bana balume ba bakelenge banene ba mu Yisakâ bakadi ne Debola; bu muakadi Yisakâ, nunku bu muakadi Balaka; bakamulonda mu makasa andi mu bibanda lubilu
Bena Yuda bakakema ne, Muntu eu udi mumanye mikanda, kai muanze kuiyila, munyi
Wakashiha Bena Moaba; wakahandika hanshi ha buloba, wakabidikisha ne luidi; wakasungula mulongo ibidi bua kuyishiha, wakasungula mulongo mukuabo bua kushala ne muoyo
Nebanuenzele bu munakuenza, nenuye mu buloba bua bende, mu buhika mene
Yeye neasakidile muhika wandi bua yeye wakuenza malu akumuambileye, anyi
Bakabiangata munda mua ntenta, bakalua n abi kudi Yoshua ne Bena Isalele bonso; bakahueka hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa
Kanuedianganyi meshi ne, Meme nakuluila bua kutuma ditalala ha buloba, tshiakuluila bua kutuma ditalala, nakuluila bua kutuma muele wa nvita
Bena Izrayele bavua benza midimu ayi anu bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Matayo Bukelenge bua mu diulu budi bu muena budimi, wakaya dinda bua kukeba bena mudimu bua kumudimina budimi buandi bua mamuma a nvinyo
Muntu eu wakabalombola, mumane kuenza malu a kukema ne bimanyinu mu Ejipitu, ne mu Mai Makunze, ne mu tshihela bidimu makumi anai

Kadi dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Wewe wakamatshisha mashi a bungi hanshi, wakaluangana nvita ya bungi; wewe kuena ungibakila nsubu bua meme kutekamu dina dianyi nansha, bualu bua wewe wakamatshisha mashi a bungi hanshi ha buloba ku mesu kuanyi
Hashishe, Bena Kasada bakandamuna mukelenge mu muaku wa Bena Alama ne, Mukelenge, wikale ne muoyo tshiendelele

Hakadibo badia, yeye wakamema mutanda wa bidia; hakatendeleleye Nzambi, wakautshibula, wakabaha, wakamba ne, Angatai bienu, etshi tshidi mubidi wanyi Wakamema luhanza; hakasakidileye Nzambi, wakabahalu; buonso buabo bakanua
Yeye wakadi ne mpala lukunjila kunjila, wakadi ne mesu mimpe, wakadi muakane kumona
Yeye wakabuela mu nsubu wa Mufalese, wakashikama ku mesa
Bakelenge Bukokeshi bua Ahaza Kul

Bualu bua bobo kabakadi batuala mukenshi wakabelelabo ne, Biadiata nyama mene mukuna, nebamushihe ne mabue; bumueneki ebu buakatamba kuikala ne buowa tô ne bakamba Mose ne, Ndi ntamba kutshina ne kuzakala
Hakadiye utendelela Nzambi, mpala wandi wakakudimuka, bilulu biandi biakalua bitoke, biakengelela

Hebrews Nzambi, mumane kuambila batatu mei andi kudi baprofete bandi kale mu bituha bia bungi ne mu biambidi bia bungi, kunshikidilu kua matuku â wakatuambila bietu dî kudi Muana wakatekeye muhianyi wa bintu bionso, wakafukeye n andi buloba kabidi
Ku luseke luandi lukuabo bakalongolola kudi Shaluma, muana wa Halohesha, mukokeshi wa tshituha tshia luseke lua Yelushalema, yeye ne bana bandi ba bakashi

Yelemiya Hashishe, mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete Yishemaele, muana wa Netanya, muana wa Elishama, muena tshiota tshia mukelenge, kapitene ka masalayi a mukelenge, wakalua ne bantu dikumi kudi Gedaliya, muana wa Ahikama, ku Misepa
Bana betu bananga, kanudingibu
Nuikale ne mitshima mikole, Yehowa ikale ne bantu bimpe
Monai nyunyu ya mu diulu, kaitu yakuna maminu, kaitu yahuola, kaitu yasangisha bintu mu mayeba, kadi Tatu wenu udi mu diulu utu waidisha
Nenkuvudishangane ba bungi, nenkuvuishe bisamba bia bungi, bakelenge nebaledibue munda muebe
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bidia bianyi binakakuha, bukula bubotesha bimpe, manyi ne buitshi, binakakudisha n abi, wakabiteka ku mpala kuabi bu bintu bidi bitua dihembu dimpe; bualu buakadi nunku
Ba bungi nebadilengeshe, nebaditokeshe, nebavuishibue balengele; kadi bantu babi nebananukile kuenza malu mabi; kakuena umue wa mu bantu babi wajingulula malu, kadi bantu badi ne meji nebâjinguile
Ndimba neyipatuke mu nzubu muebe, mua balombodi ba mu bukalenga buebe ne mua bantu bebe bonsu

Kulondolola Hakashika malu â, Bena Isalele bonso bakadiku bakamuangalaka ku misoko yonso ya Yuda, bakashimbula makunshi onso a bitendelelu bia mpingu, bakataha mitshi ya Bashela, bakashimbula bioshelu bionso biakadi ha mutu ha mikuna ya mu Yuda ne mu Benyamina, ne ya mu Efelayima ne mu Manashe kabidi, tô ne hakabishimbulabo bionso
Mubundayi, nukuate ditunga diende
Mukelenge, nengambe tshinyi, hela Bena Isalele bena lukuna babo nyima
Wewe Yelushalema, Yelushalema, utu washiha baprofete, utu wakuma bakukutuminabo mabue

Mukashi wakadiku, dina diandi Ludia, wakadi biandi musumbishi wa bilulu bikunze wa ku musoko wa Tuatila, yeye wakadi mutendeledi wa Nzambi, wakunvua dî dietu; Nzambi wakabulula mutshima wandi bua kutumikileye malu akambabo kudi Paulo
Bantu bakadi bahungile
