Yeye neashikame hanshi ukunjisha ne ulengesha tshiamu tshia argent, nealengeshe bana ba Lewi
Tatu wabo wakalua kudi wa ku nyima, wakamuambila muomumue
Muntu udi uheta tshinyi ku midimu yandi yonso yakenzeye ne yakanyingalasheye n ai mutshima wandi muinshi mua diba
Wewe neusaye tshimpanga, uvuwa mala atshi ne mikolo, uteke bituha biatshi hamue ne mutu watshi
Yehowa wakalongolola munyinyi munene wa mu mai bua kuminau Yona; ne Yona wakadi munda mua munyinyi wa mu mai minya isatu ne mafuku asatu
Wakajingulula butshiama bua buloba, anyi
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Ba mu bisamba bionso nebanubikile ne, Basankishibue; bualu bua nenuikale bena buloba budi ne disanka dimpe
Udi kai utuhidia udi n etu
Tshilema tshia mushindu ewu katshiena ne bua kuenzeka mu Izrayele to
Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Tangila, nakukuteka ha mutu ha buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Udimuke biebe bua kuenza bintu bionso bu tshidikishilu tshinakukulesha mu mukuna
Mu muaba wa milambu ei yeye neateke tshinyangu tshia dibutuka, tô ne halua dibutuka diakasungula Nzambi ham bidi ha muena tshinyangu
Nebamanye ne, Ndi Yehowa, hanabamuangalasha munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabo ne hanabatangadisha mu maloba a bende
Hashishe Zebula wakamukonka ne, Mukana muebe muakamba ne, Abimeleke udi nganyi, bua tuetu aba kumukuatshia mudimu, mudi kudi kunyi

Bua badi benza nunku kabena bakuatshila Mukelenge wetu Kilisto mudimu, kadi badi bakuatshila anu mafu abo mudimu; ne bua mei abo a lubombo ne a kutumbisha n au bantu hatuhu badi badinga mitshima ya badi kabai badimuke
Nunku ndi nusengelela bua nuenu nûjadike luse luenu kudiye

Bia kudia bia Solomo bia dituku dimue biakadi nunku: bihiminu bia bukula bua blé makumi asatu, ne bua manvua makumi asambombo, ne ngombe ya manyi dikumi, ne ngombe ya mu madimi makumi abidi, ne lukama lua mikoko ha mutu ha ngulungu ne tubuluku ne ntole ne nyunyu ya manyi
Wakadi mufue wakaluhuka, munyengela bilulu ku bianza ne ku makasa
Nebanyenge biuma biebe bionso, nebahaule luhetu luebe; nebashimbule ngumbu yebe, nebasasule nsubu yebe idi isankisha bantu; nebele mabue ebe ne mabaya ebe ne luhuishi luebe munkatshi mua mai manene

Nakunufundila mei makese mu bianza bia Siluano, undi mbala bu muan etu wa mu Kilisto udi mua kueyemenyibua, bua kunusengelela ne bua kunumanyisha ne, Eu udi ngasa mulelela wa Nzambi; nujalamemu bikole
Ke muvua Moshe mumanyishe bena Izrayele bibilu bishilangane bivuabu ne bua kutendelela Maweja Nangila nabi
Genesis Bakaya ne Yosefe mu Ejipitu, ne Potifa, kamanda ka masalayi a Palo, Muena Ejipitu, wakamusumba ku bianza bia Bena Yishemaele, bakalua n andi
Mukaji wa Potifare umona mushindu uvua Yozefe, kumualakanaye bua kulala nende
Lumu lua Davidi tuakamuangalaka ku maloba onso; Yehowa wakavuisha ba mu bisamba bionso ditshina bua bualu buandi
Kuolola kua mahuahua au nekûshe nseke yonso ya buloba buebe, Imanuele
Hakuvuluka Petelo, wakambila Yesu ne, Labi, ahu mutshi wa nfigi, uwakuela mulau wakufuba
Bakelenge Tshiamu tshia Tshisui Tshidi Tshilelemuka Bana balume ba baprofete bakambila Elisha ne, Muaba utudi bashikame ku mpala kuebe udi mutambe kubumbakana
; Mfumu wa bena Shimeyone: ke Shelumiyele, muana wa Surishadayi, ne bantu bende

Tuakulua lumu lua ditabusha dienu dia mu Kilisto Yesu ne bua dinanga dinudi n adi kudi basanto bonso, bualu bua ditekemena didi dinutekedibue mu diulu, dinuakadianjila kunyua lumu luadi mu di dia bushua dia lumu luimpe ludi lulua kunudi
Bena Yuda bakamukudimuna ne, Katuena tukuelela mabue bua muanda muimpe uwakuenza, anu bua bihendu biudi uhenda n abi Nzambi, ne bua wewe muntu udi udivuisha Nzambi
Yonatana wakambila Davidi ne
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bua bobo bavuluke kuhita kua Yehowa
Kadi ku nyima Danyele, udibo babikila ne Beleteshasâ, bu mudi dina diandi dia nzambi wanyi, ne udi ne nyuma wa nzambi ya tshijila munda muandi, wakalua ku mpala kuanyi
Yehowa wakungambila dî edi bua bualu buenu, nuenu ba mu Yuda badi bashala ne muoyo, ne, Kanuyi mu Ejipitu
Kuakaya ne mulunda webe bua tshinyi
Hakunvia Balaka lumu ne, Belâma wakalua, wakaya kusangakena n andi ku tshimenga tshia Moaba, tshidi ku muelelu wa mai a Amona, ku butshika bua buloba buandi mene
Mukelenge wa Isalele udi ukeba nganyi
Nyama kubuela mu buatu pamue ne Nowa, mulume umue ne mukaji umue ku nyama yonsu
Mose wakafunda ne, Muntu udi wenza buakane bua ku mikenshi neikale ne muoyo bualu buabu

Yeye udi mua kudia bidia bia Nzambi wandi ne bidia bidi bitambe tshijila ne bia tshijila, kadi yeye kena mua kubuela mu muaba wa tshijila anyi mua kulua ha buihi ne tshioshelu, bualu bua yeye udi ne tshilema, kanyangishi nsubu wanyi nansha, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa wakabajidila
Aba mbakelenge bakakokesha mu buloba bua Edome diambedi mukelenge kayi muanze kukokesha Bena Isalele: Bela, muana mulume wa Beô; dina dia musoko wandi diakadi Dinehaba

Ku tshikondo atshi tshituha tshia bantu banyi bakenza mudimu ne tshituha tshikuabo tshiakakuata mafuma ne ngabu ne mata ne bikowelu bia nvita; bakokeshi bakashala ku nyima kua tshisamba tshionso tshia Bena Yuda
Wakalua, wakawangata mu tshianza tshia balume tshia yeye wakadi ushikama ha nkuasa wa butumbi
Nanku Mvidi Mukulu kukonka Balaame ne: Bantu baudi muladike kuebe mbanganyi
Bakadi bakonkangana nunku ne, Edi ndî kai ne, Haleha tshituha tshihi
Monai bilongo bia mu mpata mudibi bileha; kabitu biakuata mudimu, kabitu biasala buanda; kadi ndi nuambila ne, Solomo wakadi ne butumbi buandi bunene, kadi kabakamuluatshisha bu tshilongo etshi
Pajikija balombodi ba bena mvita abu mayuki awu, nebasungule muntu ku tshisumbu tshionsu bua kulombolaye bakuabu
Bakulu bamane kupeta Mueyelu wa Mvidi Mukulu, kutuadijabu kuakula bu bambi

Wakumusha tubalu tuakajidila bakelenge ba Yuda kudi diba, tuakadi ku tshibuelelu tshia nsubu wa Yehowa, hehi ne nsubu wa Natana meleke, mulami wa nsubu, wakadi mu luhangu lua nsubu; wakosha makalu a diba mu kahia
Balaminyi bakabika, bakaya ku Gibea lubilu; balaminyi bakela mualu wa nvita, bakashiha bena musoko bonso ku miele ya nvita

Mikenji ya Kusombangana Talalâ Kanuhingashi muhika wakunyemena kunudi munyeme mu bianza bia mukelenge wandi; yeye ashikame n enu mu muaba udiye usungula mu umue wa misoko yenu udi utamba kumusankisha; kanumuenzedi bibi
Kadi ndi munumanye ne, Kanuena ne luse lua Nzambi munda muenu
Dutelonone Lufu lua Mose Mose wakaya ku mpata ya Moaba ku mukuna wa Nebo, ku mutu kua Pisega, kuakadi kutangilangana ne Yeleko

Bualu bua tudi bahika; kadi Nzambi kakutulekela mu buhika buetu, wakutuvuisha ne luse ku mesu kua bakelenge ba Pelasa bua kutusangashabo ne bua kutuashilabo nsubu wa Nzambi wetu, ne bua kulongololabo miaba idi mihaula ne bua kutahabo lumbu mu Yuda ne mu Yelushalema
Yeye wakangambila ne, Muana wa muntu, wakumona muanda eu, anyi
Matuku onsu atshidi bantu pa buloba, tshikondu tshia kukuna ne tshia kunowa, tshia mashika ne tshia luya, tshia mvula ne tshia mushipu, tshia munya ne tshia midima kabiena bijika kabidi to
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakaya ku mpala, wakimana mu nshila mukese, kakadi ne muaba wa mua kuya ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Kola wakabikila tshisumbu tshonso tshia batomboki ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka kudi tshisumbu tshonso

Davidi wakangata tshibangu tshiandi mu tshianza tshiandi, wakasungula mabue atanu a busenu mu kasulu, wakaela mu mpaya wandi wa bulami bua mikoko wakadiye n andi, mu kabombi kandi mene; tshieledi tshiandi tshia mabue tshiakadi mu tshianza tshiandi; wakasemena ha buihi ne Muena Peleshete
Mukuabo wakalua, wakamba ne, Mukelenge, mpalata webe kayeu, unakadi musuike mu dituaya; nakukutshina, bua wewe udi amena tshinyangu, utu wambula tshiudi kui muteke, utu wahuola biudi kui mukune
Kanuena bavuluke mitanda muanda mutekete ya bantu binunu binai ne bungi bua bisaka binuakuangula
Kadi bantu bakuabo balembakane bakakonkangana ne, Muntu eu neatusungile munyi
Abrahame kuya lukasa ku ntenta kuvua Sara, umuambila ne: Kolesha, angata bukula buimpe, usope mikata isatu
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kuandamuna ne: Wewe Moshe ne Arone, lekelayi kupumbisha bantu bua kuenzabu mudimu
Bena Yelushalema bakahingisha Ahazaya, muan a mukala wa mukelenge, mu bukelenge mu muaba wandi; bualu bua bantu bakalua ne Bena Alabâ mu tshitudilu, bakashiha bakulu bandi bonso
Enza mitshi ya acacia ibidi, ulamike or ku nseke yonso
Hakumukabo mu musoko, kabayi banze kuya kule, Yosefe wakambila mulami wandi ne, Bika biebe, ulonde balume aba ne hawabaheta, ubakonke ne, Bualu kai nuakashintakasha malu mabi ku malu mimpe
Nuenu bena Izrayele, nudi bena diakalenga, bualu Maweja Nangila mmunupandishe amu nuenu nkayenu
Simona wakamuandamuna ne, Ndi ngela meshi ne, Muena dibanza dinene wakalekeleleye
Hakaluabo ne matu abo ku mpata, bakâshla, bakamulonda
Nunku Yehowa wakangambila ne, Umuidike dina ne, Kuhaula kua bintu kudi kulua lubilu, Kunyenga kua bintu kudi kudiendesha lukasa
Bualu bua wewe neutangile buloba budi ku mpala kuebe; kadi kuena ubuela mu buloba bundi mpa Bena Isalele
Bituajingakana tô ne hatshiabu, dikenga neditukuate; nunku tuye bietu kumanyisha ba mu nsubu wa mukelenge
Esau wakashikama mu mukuna wa Sei Esau udi Edome
Muntu mukuabu muenze mudimu awu kayi mutuangaji, nebamushipe

Hashishe bena buloba bakatekesha maboko a Bena Yuda, bakatatshisha mu mudimu wabo, bakatatshisha bantu anu bua kubahumbishabo matuku onso a Kolesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa, tô ne ku bukokeshi bua Dayawesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa
Yehowa udi dibue dianyi, musoko wanyi wa ngumbu ya nvita, ne Nembikile Yehowa, udi muakanangane ne butumbi bua bantu bamutumbisha
Nzambi wakamba ne, Monai, nakanuha midioko yonso ya ha buloba idi yela ntete, ne mitshi yonso idi ikuama mamuma adi ne ntete munda, bua kuikalabi bia kudia bienu
Hayabo n enu ku tshilumbuluidi, hanufilabo, kanutambi kuelangana meshi diambedi ne, Netuambe tshinyi
Yeye wakatendelelaku Yehowa
Kabidi nembutule mvidie idi bena Ejipitu batendelela
Monai, nentekeshe maboko enu, nendabe tunvi ha mpala henu, tunvi tua nyama mifila bu milambu mu bidia bienu bia disanka; nebaye n enu ku muaba udibo batuimasha
Davidi wakanyema, wakahanduka, wakaya kudi Samuele mu Lama, wakamuambila malu onso akamuenzela Shaula

Nulombe Nzambi ne, Kunyema kuetu kakulu mu tshidimu tshia mashika ne mu dituku dia Lumingu; hualu bua ku tshikondo etshi dikenga dinene nedilue; ku tshibangidilu tshia buloba tô ne katataka kakuakadi dikenga bu adi nunku, kadiena dilua kabidi tshiendelele
Bualu bua bonso ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba nebafue; nenshihe bana balume bonso ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba, ne badishikamine ne bahika, badi mu Isalele
Hashishe Bena Yuda bonso bakalua ne tshia dikumi tshia blé ne tshia nyinyo mihia mihia ne tshia manyi mu nsubu ya bibutshilu
Yeye wakamuambula, wakaya mu musoko, mamuen andi wakatangila biakahumbululeye yeye wakahatula, wakamuha biaka shiyeye hakukuteye
Ndi nkutendekena ne, Witabushe matabisha anakulua n au kudi, bualu bua Nzambi wakungenzela bimpe ne meme ndi ne bintu bikumbane kabidi
Yeye wakabihata ha tshilumbuluidi
Yeye wakadi n abo musokome mu nsubu wa Nzambi bidimu bisambombo; Atalaya wakadi ukokesha mu buloba
Bakayifila ku nshobo kudi bana ba balume ba Melali, ku meku abo, misoko dikumi ne ibidi mu tshisamba tshia Lubena ne tshia Gada ne tshia Zebuluna
Bakafika ku muaba wakamua mbila Nzambi, ne Abalahama wake nza tshioshelu, wakalongolola nkunyi, wakasuika muan andi Isaka, wakamuladika ha tshioshelu ha mutu ha nkunyi
Nenubutuke mu ditunga edi dimpe, didiye unupesha
Yozefe uvua mushale mu Ejipitu ne bena diku dia tatuende bonsu

Hakaluabo ne bakelenge aba batanu kudi Yoshua, Yoshua wakabikila balume bonso ba mu Isalele, wakambila tuhita tua bena nvita tuakadi n andi ne, Luai bienu ha buihi, diatai makasa enu ha nshingu ya bakelenge aba batanu
Bakatuma mikanda ei ku nseke yonso, bakamanyisha bantu bonso bua bikale bamane kudilongolola bua dituku adi
Nunku Davidi ne Bena Isalele bonso bakatua ne mushete wa Yehowa, benda bela mbila ne tshiona tshia mpungi
Wenze miendu muanda mutekete

Shimishona wakalalamu tô ne mundankulu, wakabika mundankulu, wakakuata bibi bia ku musoko, ne makunshi abi abidi, wakabitula ne biamu bionso, wakabiteka ha maha andi, wakaya n abi tô ne ku mutu kua mukuna munene udi ku mpala kua Hebelone

Yehowa tshiendelele, Bualu bua yeye wakahuekesha bakadi bashikame kulu, Dikasa nediudiate muinshi muadi; Nshila wa bantu bakane udi mululame; Bulelela, Yehowa, mu nshila wa kulumbulula kuebe, Nakukujinga mu mutshima wanyi butuku; Bialeshabo muntu mubi diakalengele, Yehowa, tshianza tshiebe tshidi tshibishibua kulu, Yehowa, neutujadikile ditalala; Yehowa Nzambi wetu, Bafue kabena hikala ne muoyo kabidi, Wewe wakuvudisha ba mu tshisamba tshietu, Yehowa, Yehowa, hakadibo mu makenga, bakakukeba; Bu mudi mukashi udi ne difu wenza, tuakadi ne mafu, tuakadi tudinyenga, Bafue bebe nebikale ne muoyo; mibidi yabo mifue neyibike
Miloho yakumuka, yakahingana kudiye kabidi ne ditaba edi
Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kubumbusha mu njila wabo bwa kumwenzelabo yêye nkayende mudimu to

Yelemiya Edi ndî dia Yehowa diakambeye bualu bua Babulona ne bua buloba bua Bena Kasada, mukana mua Yelemiya muprofete: Ambai dî edi munkatshi mua bisamba bionso, nubamanyishe lumu elu, Bualu bua tshisamba tshidi tshifume ku luseke lua node tshidi tshilua bua kumuluisha, tshilualua kuvuisha buloba buandi tshikisu, kakuena muntu washikamamu; ne bantu ne nyama nebinyeme, nebiye
Bintu bionso bia kudia bidi bituangana ne mai akadi mu bintu ebi nebikale ne bukoya, ne mai a kunua onso akadi mu bintu ebi neikale ne bukoya
Maweja Nangila kungambila ne: Bituadije ku lelu, ndi mumane kufila mukalenga Sihone ne bantu bende mu bianza bienu
Bualu bua bu mudi mubidi umue, ne udi ne bituha bia bungi, ne bituha bionso bia mu mubidi bidi bia bungi kadi bidi mu mubidi umue; nunku mudi Kilisto kabidi
Tshiena nkulekela to
Nakubaha dî diebe, ba ha buloba badi n abo lukuna, bualu bua bobo kabena ba ha buloba, bu mundi meme tshî wa ba buloba
Nzambi wakamueneka kudi Yakoba tshiakabidi hakafumeye ku Padana alama, wakamusankisha
Kadi Yesu wakabambila ne, Kabena ne bualu bua kuya, nuenu nubahe bia kudia
Udi Mvidi Mukulu wabu, musombe munkatshi muabu
Nunku mpindiu Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Ndi mmona tshinyi kunoko, bualu bua bakuya ne bantu banyi mu buhika tshianana

Nunku Adoni sedeke, mukelenge wa Yelushalema, wakatumina Hohama, mukelenge wa Hebelone, ne Pilama, mukelenge wa Yâmuta, ne Yafia, mukelenge wa Lakisha, ne Debî, mukelenge wa Egelona, dî, Wamba ne, Luai bienu kundi, nunkuatshishe, tushihai Gibeona; bualu bua bobo bakaheta budishikaminyi kudi Yoshua ne kudi Bena Isalele
Yehowa nea nuvudishile disanka mu bisasa bienu, ne mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu; neanuvudishile disanka mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nnuha
Kadi wewudi nganyi bua wewe udi ulumbuluisha mukuenu
Bualu bua bukelenge bua Nzambi kabuena mu dî, kadi budi mu bukole
Bobo bine bakambila muanjelo wa Yehowa wakadi muimane munkatshi mua mitshi ya myrtres ne, Tuakuendakana bua kutentekela buloba; mona, buloba buonso budi anu holâ, budi talalâ
Hakayabo musangu muibidi, Yosefe wakadimanyisha kudi bana babo, ne tshisamba tshia Yosefe tshiakamanyibua kudi Palô
Diambedi tshiakadi mbungama ku mesu kuandi
Bukokeshi bua Sedekiya Bak
Dituku adi diakadi dia Lumingu lua Bayuda
Nuenu nutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, bienza muntu nunku, neikale ne muoyo
Hashishe Abashaloma wakamba ne, Bikilai Hushai, Muena Aka, kabidi, tunvue tshidiye Wamba kabidi
Muntu udi utantamana mu mateyi udi ne disanka; bualu bua hakamanabo kumujadika, neangate tshifulu tshia butumbi tshia muoyo tshiakalaya Mukelenge badi bamunanga

Nunku uhingashe mukashi kudi mulume wandi, bualu bua yeye udi muprofete, neakulombele Nzambi bua wewe wikale ne muoyo, kadi biwahidia kumuhingasha, umanye biebe ne wewe ne bantu bonso baudi n abo nenufue bulelela
Miaba yonsu inudi basombe, nudie anu mampa kaayi mela buanga

Kanuikadi ne luevene mu nsubu yenu to matuku muanda mutekete, ne muntu yonso udi udia bintu bia luevene, nebamumushe munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele; nansha bikaleye muenyi anyi muntu muledibue mu buloba
Hakamona Yoaba ne, Bakasa mualu wa nvita ku mpala kuandi ne ku nyima kuandi, yeye wakasungula bena bukitu ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele bonso, wakasa mualu wa nvita kudi Bena Sulia

Unvuai, nuenu bantu, buonso buenu; Monai, Yehowa udi uhatuka mu muaba wandi, Mikuna neyivingutuke muinshi mua makasa andi, Bua kutomboka kua Bena Yakoba malu â onso adi alua, Bua malu â nenvuishe Samalea bu mushiki wa mabue mu budimi, Nebatshibule mpingu yabo yonso misonga bituha, neboshe bintu biabo bionso biakafilabo kudi mpingu mu kahia, Bua muanda eu nengase muadi, nendile, nendile ne kudila bu kua nyunyu wa nfiondo
Kakuakadi muena Anaka wakashala mu buloba bua Bena Isalele; anu mu Gaza ne mu Gata ne mu Ashedodo bakuabo bakashalamu
Yerede mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama makumi asambombu ne bibidi, kulelaye Enoke

Bena Isalele bakenza mu musokoko malu akadi kâyi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wabo; bakadiashila bitendelelu mu misoko yabo yonso ku tshibumba tshia batentekedi tô ne ku misoko yakadi ne ngumbu; bakadijadikila makunshi ne Bashela ku mutu kua mikuna yonso ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi yonso

Nkuasa wa bukelenge wakadi ne tshibandilu tshia bidiatshilu bisambombo; nyima wa mutu wa nkuasa wakadi tshijengu; bitekelu bibidi bia maboko biakadi ku luseke ne luseke lua nkuasa; tshifuanyikishi tshia nyama wa ntambue tshiakadi tshilamata ku tshitekelu ne tshitekelu tshia maboko

Bualu bua matuku nealue adi badi n ebe lukuna babuelela luhangu, nebatunyunguluke, nebakutshintshimike ku nseke yonso, nebakukume hanshi ne bana badi n ebe; kabena bashîa dibue dimue ha mutu ha dikuabo, bualu bua wewe kuakumanya dituku diakalua Nzambi kûdi
Kadi hakahita bidimu makumi abidi ne bisatu bia bukelenge bua Yoasha, bakuidi kabakanza kulongolola miaba ei
Nunku Gehazi wakalonda Nâmana
Yeye kakungambila ne, Yeye udi muan etu mukashi, anyi
Yeye wakamuladika tulu ha bibelu biandi; yeye wakabikila mulume, wakamubeya bisumbu bia nsuki muanda mutekete yakadi ku mutu kuandi; yeye wakabanga kumukengesha ne bukole buandi buakumuka kudiye
Mukelenge wakambila umue wa ba tuhita tuandi ne, Umuhingishile bintu bionso biakadiye n abi diambedi ne bintu bionso biakadiunda mu madimi andi katshia umukamu tô ne katataka

Tshiji tshikole tshiakakuata Davidi bua muntu au; yeye wakambila Natana ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo, muntu wakenza bualu ebu udi ne bua kufua; budiye n abu mbua kumuhingishila mikoko mai bua bualu ebu buakenzeye, bualu bua yeye kakadi ne luse
Kena ku mesu kuenu bu tshintu tshia hatuhu, anyi
Padibio bienzeka Bia kumanyishangana nabi mianda Bienji ne bisumbu Mpwila mambu , tshimenga tshia ku mutu kwa ditunga
Delila wakambila Shimishona ne, Diambedi wewe wakunseka, wakungambila anu mashimi, ungambile mudibo mua kukusuika
Nzala idi imusuma, bukole buandi budi buhanga; kena unua mai, udi ubanga kuhungila
Nunku ba kunshikidilu nebikale ba diambedi, ba diambedi nebikale ba kunshikidilu
Muanjelo wa Mukelenge wakamukuma lukasa, bualu bua yeye kakadi utumbisha Nzambi; tuishi tuakamudia, wakahuola muoyo wandi

Nakambila mukelenge kabidi ne, Bitabusha mukelenge, bampe mikanda kudi ba gouverneur badi dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, bua bobo bitabushe bua meme kuhitshila mu maloba abo tô ne hanafika ku buloba bua Yuda, ne mukanda mukuabo kudi Asafa, mulami wa metu a mukelenge, bua yeye ampe mabaya a kuenza n au mikamba ya bibi bia nsubu wa mukelenge udi hehi ne nsubu wa Nzambi, ne a lumbu lua musoko, ne a nsubu undi mua kulalamu
Muan abo ne Tapenese wakamulelela muana mulume dina diandi Genubata; Tapenese wakamujidike mabele mu nsubu wa Palô; Genubata wakadi mu nsubu wa Palô munkatshi mua bana bandi ba balume
Maweja Nangila kumanyisha Balaame malu a kuambila Balake, kumupingaja kabidi kudiye
Muntu yonso udi uhidia dî diebe, kayi unvua mei audi umuambila, nebamushihe; anji kuikala ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima

Biajidila muntu Yehowa tshituha tshia budimi bua buhianyi buandi, wewe neutuangane n andi mushinga ku bungi bua bintu bidiye mukunemu, biakuneye homer wa orge, mushinga wai newikale nshekele ya argent makumi atanu
Hashishe mukelenge wakandamuna ne, Bahe mukashi wa ku mpala muana udi ne muoyo, kabanushihi, bualu bua yeye udi muledi wandi
Umusha mesu ebe kundi, bua adi atshinyisha

Uvuluke ne wewe wakadi muhika mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatulamu ne tshianza tshia bukole ne diboko diandi diolola: nunku Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakalelela mukenji bua wewe uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu
E, ndi nuambila ne, Yeye udi mutambe muprofete
Bena Lewi bonso nebanyunguluke mukelenge, muntu ne muntu ne bintu bia nvita mu bianza biandi; muntu yonso udi ubuela mu nsubu bamushihe; nuenu nuikale ne mukelenge habueleye mu nsubu ne humukeye
Nunku mukelenge kakunvua dî dia bantu; bua bualu ebu buakafuma kudi Nzambi bua kujadika dî dia Yehowa diakambileye Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, mukana mua Ahiya, Muena Shiloa
Nunku mukelenge wakela mukenji, bakalongolola mushete; bakauteka ha mbelu ku tshibi tshia ku nsubu wa Yehowa
Ufuafua, ufue; udi ujimina, ujimine; yashala ne muoyo idiangane
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Mukelenge wetu udi wamba mei au munyi
Hashishe, kunshikidilu kulualua, hafileye bukelenge kudi Nzambi, Tatu mene, hajimisheye makelenge onso makuabo ne bukokeshi buonso ne bukole
Yeye wakabatuma bua kuambilabo bantu bualu bua bukelenge bua Nzambi, ne bua kukoleshabo bena mabedi
Yeye neakutumine nvula bua maminu ebe audi ukuna mu buloba, ne bidia bia ku matete adi buloba budiundisha nebikale ne manyi, nebikale bia bungi

Nsongalume wakamuambila ne, Meme nakalua ku mukuna wa Gileboa ku mpukahuka, ne mona, Shaula wakadi mushindamine ku difuma diandi; ne mona, bena makalu ne bantu bakadi benda ha nyima ha tubalu bakadi bamutshintshimike ha buihi
Kadi mu matunga ikalaye munutume awu, nenuikale anu bakese
Bantu ba tshisamba tshienu ne bakuidi banene bakukufila mu bianza bianyi, wakuenza tshinyi
Mu dituku adi nemmeneshile ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele lusengu; nenkuhe hukole bua kubulula mukana muebe munkatshi muabo bua wewe kuakula bimpe; nunku nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Wakaya kuluangana ne Bena Debî: dina dia Debî diambedi diakadi Kîyata sefe
Nuenu badi badila katataka nudi ne disanka, bua nuenu nenuseke
Monai, meme Paulo ndi nuambila ne, Binuitabusha ditengula, Kilisto kena unukuatshisha
Bua bualu ebu ba bungi ba munkatshi muenu badi batekete, badi ne mabedi, ne bakuabo bakumbana badi balala tulu mu lufu

Nzambi Udi Ubalaya Muprofete Mufuanangane ne Mose Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanubishile muprofete munkatshi mua bana benu bu meme, nenunvue dî diandi: bu munuakalomba Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu Holeba mu dituku dituakasambakena n enu ne, Katunvu dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, kabidi, katutangidi kahia aka kanene kabidi, bua katufu

Nebalue ne bana benu bakuhatulabo mu bisamba bionso bia bantu bua kubafila bu mulambu kudi Yehowa, babendesha ha nyima ha tubalu, mu makalu, mu bihoyi, ha nyima ha nyama ya mpunda, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Neadiangatshile bamue babo bua kuikalabo bakuidi ne bua kuikalabo Bena Lewi
Yehezekele Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, tangisha mpata webe ku Yelushalema, ela dî diebe ku miaba ya tshijila, bela buloba bua Isalele
Asa ne Bâsha, mukelenge wa Isalele, bakaluangana nvita matuku abo onso
Nanku ndi nnuvuluija lelu ne: panudi nutendelela mvidie mikuabu, nuyenzela mudimu, kanuyi nuvuluka Maweja Nangila, nenubutuke bonsu
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuenu nutu nuadibingisha ku mesu kua bantu, kadi Nzambi udi mumanye mitshima yenu; tshintu tshidi tshitumba ku mesu kua bantu tshidi tshinyanguka ku mesu kua Nzambi
Bena Amona bakaluhuka, bakasa mualu wa nvita ku tshibuelelu tshia musoko; ne bakelenge bakalua kudibo bakadi ha buabo mu tshisuku
Nunku kapitene ka bansentedi kakamuha bia kudia ne matabisha, kakamulekela
Yeye wakamba ne, Wewe muntu munangibue bikole, kutshinyi nansha
Neangate mbushi ibidi, neayiteke ku mpala kua Yehowa ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Muntu wakadimu, dina diandi Zakayo; wakadi muntu munene wa basangishi ba mulambu, wakadi mubanshi
Hezikiya wakamuambila ne, Bakafuma ku buloba budi kule, ku Babulona mene
Nunku helabo mpungi bikole, hanunvua muadi wa mpungi, bantu bonso nebele mbila; ne lumbu lua musoko neludishimbukile hanshi mu muaba walu, ne muntu yonso neabuele mu muaba udi buludiludi n andi
Mutu wa luhingu alu wakadi wa tshiamu tshia or muimpe, tshiadi tshialu ne maboko alu biakadi bia tshiamu tshia argent, dilu dialu ne bibelu bialu biakadi bia tshiamu tshia mitaku
Nunku Abinê Wakafika kudi Davidi mu Hebelone ne bantu makumi abidi bakadi n andi
Yeye wakamba ne, Yai bienu, tambakanai ha buloba
Neubambile mei â onso, kedi kabena bunvua dî diebe; neubabikile, kadi kabena bitaba kûdi
Nuakuhisha, nuakushiha muntu muakane; yeye kena ufuilangana n enu
Mu malu onso nuakadimuenesha bu badi ne mitshima mitoke mu bualu ebu
Yetu wakuolola tshianza tshiandi, wakamulenga ne, Ndi musue, wikale mulengeshibue
Bakabuelamu, bakabuangata bu buloha buabo
Nunku Balaka wakahueka mufume ku mukuna wa Tabô, ne bantu binunu dikumi bakamulonda ku nyima
Neanyoke baluishi ba bena Izrayele bonsu
Nembutule bintu bionsu bidi ne muoyi, bindi mufuke pa buloba
Nebafume ku esete ne ku wesete ne ku node ne ku sude, nebashikame ku mesa mu bukelenge bua Nzambi

Kadi umue wenu kakengeshibu bu mushihianganyi, anyi bu muibi, anyi bu muenji wa malu mabi, anyi bu mudibueshi wa mu malu a bantu bakuabo; kadi biakenga muntu bu umena Kilisto, kikadi biandi ne bundu, kadi atumbisha biandi Nzambi bua dina edi
Mu dituku disambombo nebalongolole bidibo bangate, bikale tshituha ha mutu ha tshituha tshidibo basangisha ku dituku ku dituku
Udi ne ngikadilu wa Polovensa
Nuenu nuakangambila ne, Bualu buwakuamba budi buimpe bua tuetu tuenze
Tulekele kuditumbishatumbisha hatuhu ne kufikishangana munda ne kuvuishangana mukau

Tshinga tshituha tshia buloba ebu bua tshijila tshikale luhangu lua kuasamu ntempelo, bule bualu coudées nkama itanu ne butshiama bualu coudées nkama itanu, nseke yalu ikale muomumue; bashiye muaba mutuhu numunyunguluke, coudées makumi atanu ku nseke yau yonso
Izake uvua ne bidimu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu, kufuaye, mumane kulala panu nuboboke
Nunku nakamba ne, Ka meme eu, untume meme
Genesis Nzambi wakavuluka Noa ne nyama yonso ne bimuna bionso biakadi n andi mu buatu, Nzambi wakahehesha luhehele ha buloba ne mai akahueka
Dituku mene adi, kanuenji mudimu to
Bumuka mu Mitka, kuyabu ku Ashemona
Kabalambi tshituha atshi ne luevene
Nenuikale ne disanka mu bisaka bienu ne mu malonga anudi nuenzelamu mampa
Bulelela, henda muhote mu nshila, mutshima wandi udi umuhangisha, yeye udi umanyisha bantu bonso ne, Ndi muhote
Lumu luakafika kudi Yoaba; bualu bua Yoaba wakalonda Adoniya, kadi yeye kakalonda Abashaloma
Bualu bua yeye wakadi muntu muimpe, wakadi mûle tente ne Nyuma Muimpe ne ditabusha; ba bungi bakasangishibua kudi Mukelenge
Yakoba wakatangila mpala wa Labana, kakadi bu muvueye dia mbedi
Ndelanganyi ya Yakobe yonsu ivua bantu makumi muanda mutekete
Balaame uvua mubande pa nyama wa mpunde
Yosefe wakatuma bana babo nunku, bakaya yeye wakabambila ne, Nudimuke, kanutandanganyi mu nshila
Ndi nkupeshabi, bana betu bonsu batangile, bua ujikemu muena kuebe

Nenvudishe bantu ne bimuna bia bungi; nebivulangane, nebilele bana ba bungi; nenjadike ba bungi munkatshi muenu bu muakadi bualu buenu diambedi, nennuenzele bienzedi bimpe bihite bia mu matuku enu a ku tshibangidilu; nunku nenumanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Ne bulelela, yeye wakadi usama, hehi ne lufu; kudi Nzambi wakamufua luse, kakamufuilalu yeye nkayandi kadi wakanfuilalu meme kabidi, bua meme tshikadi ne kanyinganyinga ha mutu ha kanyinganyinga
Dituku dia muanda mukulu, muena nsudi awu, afile bana ba mikoku babidi badi kabayi ne bulema, ne lukungulu lua mukoku lua tshidimu tshimue kaluyi bulema
Samuele Mu matuku au Bena Peleshete bakasangisha masalayi abo bua kuluanganabo ne Bena Isalele
Nakayimona kabidi, ekumona
Bena bilengulengu bakenza nunku ne manga abo bua kutuma nkusu, kadi kabakamanya mua kuenza, nkusu yakadi kudi bantu ne kudi nyama
Muhika wakaya lubilu kudiye, wakamuakidila, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Umpeku tuima tukese bia meme kunua
Bana ba Gibeona makumi tshitema ne batanu
Mukelenge wakakonka Siba ne, Udi wenza tshinyi ne bintu ebi
Mushikankunde utshidi kamama udi mua kuhua bilenga biau muoyo, Ke bu mûdi wewe ulongolola nshila yebe ne budimu bua kudikebela dinanga

Bena Lewi nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha balume ba ngombe wewe neufile umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa, bua kubuikidila Bena Lewi bubi buabo
Muena tshibawu yonsu, kanumufuidi luse to
Kadi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Olola tshianza, ukuate nyoka awu ku mukila
Nsongalume wakamba ne, Nakenzenza malu â onso, hanakadi muana mukese tô ne katataka
Wakuvuwa bintu bia munda ne bioku, wakabisha ha tshioshelu ha mutu ha mulambu wa kuosha
Nunku Solomo wakasa Gezê kabidi ne Bete holona, ne Bâlata ne Tama wa mu tshihela mu buloba bua Yuda
Ikala ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima; kutshinyi, kukuatshiki buowa, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, udi n ebe kuonso kuwaya
Bakamumona Yehowa uya kutangila bualu ebu
Wasua muoyo wandi neaujimishe; wikala ne muoyo wandi udiye n au ha buloba lukuna neaulame tô ne ku muoyo wa tshiendelele
Maweja Nangila kuitaba bivua Moshe umulomba
Bakambila mukelenge wa Yeleko ne, Mona, balume ba Bena Isalele bakafika munemu butuku bua kutentekela buloba
Ukande muntu webe kabidi bua kenji malu mabi mu tshitshu tshiandi; Mei a mukana muanyi ne meji andi ngela mu mutshima wanyi Psalms Yehowa itabe kudi mu dituku dia dikenga diebe
Danyele wakakudimuna mukelenge ne, Bualu busokoka budi mukelenge muebeshe mbualu budi bena meji, bamanyi ba malu a mitoto, bena buloshi ne batempi ba mbuku kabayi bamanye mua kumujinguluilabo
Hakashikameye n abo ku mesa, wakamema mutanda wa bidia, wakatendelela Nzambi: hakautshibuleye bituha, wakabahabi

Kadi bikala mulume usangakena ne mushikankunde udi mubangila kudi mulume mukuabo mu budimi, udi umuakuata ku bukole, udi ulala n andi, anu mulume wakalala n andi neafue biandi; kadi kanuenji mushikankunde bualu; yeye kena muenze bualu bubi budibo mua kumushihela; bualu ebu budi bu muntu udi uhika ku mpala kua muena mutumba n andi udi umushiha; bualu bua yeye wakasangakena n andi mu budimi; ne mushikankunde mubangila kudi mukuabo wakadila, ne kakuakadi muntu bua kumusungila
Mukelenge ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi n andi bakafila milambu kudi Yehowa
Bualu kai yeye udi ukeba kukushiha, bua Bena Yuda badi badisangisha kudi batangadishibue, ne bua ba mu Yuda badi bashala bafue
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakakumbana kudi Bena Yelushalema ne kudi Bena Yuda tô ne hakumusheye bonso ku mesu kuandi
Katshiakadi kudi bantu aba bakenza bibi, bena mibidi yabo yakahona hanshi mu tshihela, anyi
Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Nakuhita bana benu, nakubanga; Nuenu ba mu tshikondo etshi, unvuai dî dia Yehowa
Tshibangidilu Kayine ne Ebele Adame kubuelela mukajende Eva mu nzubu
Kembua tudi ne bukokeshi ku ditabusha dienu, kadi tudi bakuatshishanganyi n enu mu disanka dienu; bualu bua nudi nujalama mu ditabusha
Bakumona bikena kumona bia mashimi ne kutempa kua mbuku kudi kubadinga; badi bamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba dî edi, kadi Yehowa kakubatuma
Yeye wakela di diandi nunku kudi muntu muibidi ne muisatu ne kudi bonso bakadi balonda ne bisumbu bia bintu ne, Nuambile Esau nunku hanuasangakena n andi
Bakaya ne ntalanta dikumi ya argent ne nshekele ya or binunu bisambombo ne bilulu dikumi bitambe buimpe
Bantu kabatu batelelula tshihesa tshia tshilulu tshidi katshi tshifuatalale ha tshivualu tshikulukulu; nunku tshihesa tshiakamba kubuikila disoso netshidibalulule, nunku netshidivundishe

Ebu mbungi buabo bu muakadi nsubu ya batatu abo: bua Bena Yuda, tupitene tua binunu bia bantu: Adena wakadi kapitene ne bena bukitu binunu nkama isatu bakadi n andi; ku nyima kuandi Yehohanana wakadi kapitene ne bantu binunu nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mukulu bakadi n andi; ku nyima kuandi Amasaya, muana wa Zikeli, wakadifila kudi Yehowa; bena bukitu binunu nkama ibidi bakadi n andi
Bu nuenu bikale ba ha buloba, ba ha buloba bakadi kusua bantu babo; kadi bualu bua nuenu kanuena ba ha buloba, nakunusungulula mu ba ha buloba, nunku ba ha buloba badi n enu lukuna
Tuetu tuakadi tuiba argent anyi or mu nsubu wa mukelenge webe munyi
Bialua muntu kunudi kai ulua ne diyisha edi, kanumuitabushi mu nsubu, kanumuedi muoyo; bualu bua udi umuela muoyo udi muabanyanganyi n andi wa midimu yandi mibi
Bena musoko bakambila Elisha ne, Mona, tudi tukusengelela ne
Nenubandamune ne: Tuvua ku bupika kua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Nakuenza tshinyi

Hahileye bua bualu bubi, yeye neatonde bualu bubi buakenzeye yeye neafile mulambu kudi Yehowa wa disambuka dia mikenji, nansha muana mukashi wa mukoko nansha muana mukashi wa mbushi, bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne muakuidi neafile mulambu bua kumubuikidila n au bubi buandi
Bumuka mu Refidime, kuyabu mu tshipela tshia Sinayi
Tela wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi muanda mutekete, wakalela Abalama ne Nahô ne Halana
Gala, muana wa Ebede, wakalua ne ba mu tshiota tshiandi, Wakafika ku Shekeme; bena Shekeme bakamueyemena
Wakamukudimuna ne, Mitendelelu yebe ne bintu biebe bia luse Mutu wahangana diakabanda ku mesu kua Nzambi bu tshivulukidi
Neulue kuluisha bantu banyi Bena Isalele, bu ditutu didi dibuikila buloba

Ndi nkusengelela ne, Uvuluke, utuambile ne, Bu munakamana kutangila, badi bihila malu mabi, Badi bafua ku muhuya udi uhatuka mukana mua Nzambi, Muadi wa nyama wa ntambue ne dî dia nyama wa ntambue udi ne luonji biakuhuwa; Nyama wa ntambue mukulukashi udi ufua bualu bua kena ukuata tshia kudieye, Dî diakafika kundi mu busokoko, Mu meji a ku bikena kumona bufuku, buowa buakankuata ne muzakalu, biakanyungisha mifuba yanyi yonso
Diulu ne buloba nebijimine, kadi mei anyi kêna ajimina
Uvua nkambua wa bimbi ba bisanji ne bedi ba nshiba
Bu muakadi Yona munda mua munyinyi mimene wa mu mai minya isatu ne mafuku asatu, nunku Muana wa muntu neikale munda mua buloba minya isatu ne mafuku asatu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nulue ne milambu, ne bintu binudi nuosha ha kahia, bidi bitua dihembu kundi, mu matuku anakasungula
Nunku bakasa misoko, bakadi ne diakalengele
Neulale munkatshi mua badi kabayi batengudibue ne badi bashihibue ku muele wa nvita
Bualu budi butamba kukutonda muakuambeye ne, Wowe mai, wikale muakane, munyi
Hakamona Yesu ditabusha diabo, yeye wakambila umena kaneke ne, Muan anyi, mibi yebe yakujimishibua
Kadi butuku abu mene dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Natana ne, Ya, Wambile muntu wanyi Davidi ne, Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Wewe udi musue kungibakila nsubu wa meme kushikamamu, anyi
Hashishe, kahita ka bena maluvu wakambila Palo ne, Ndi muvuluke dihanga dianyi lelu
Nakumanya ne, Wewe udi unvua mei anyi matuku onso; kadi nakuamba dî edi bualu bua bantu badi bimane banyunguluke bitabushe ne, Wewe udi muntume
Yeye wakadi umue wa bana ba Pelese, wakadi ku mutu kua tupitene tuonso tua mu ngondo wa kumudilu
Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nya, nempingane kuetu kudi bana betu
Bianuambilabo ne, Yeye udi mu tshihela, kanuyi; anyi ne, Yeye udi mu tusubu tua tshisokomenu, kanuitabushi

Mose wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso, wakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa Palo mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku mesu kuenu, ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buonso; mateta makole anuakatangila ne mesu, ne bimanyinu ne malu a kukema
Kunupitshishaye mu tshipela tshinene tshidi tshikuata bowa, tshiena ne nyoka ya lulengu, ne tuminyiminyi, kamuyi mayi
Netuambule bia mvita bua kuluangana ne bena Kenaane, badi dishiya dia musulu wa Yardene
Ndi ntshijadika ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo ne nyunyu ne bimuna ne nyama yonso bidi n enu bintu bionso bia ha buloba biakaluhuka mu buatu

Biaya bantu bebe bua kuluanganabo ne bena lukuna babo mu nshila yonso iudi ubatuma; hatangilabo mesu abo ku musoko eu uwakusungula ne ku nsubu eu unakuashila dina diebe bua kutendelelabo Yehowa, unvua kulomba kuabo ne kutendekena kuabo mu diulu, ujadike bualu buabo
Mu dituku adi misoko yabo yakadi ne bukole neyikale bu bikulu Bualu bua wewe wakuhua Nzambi wa luhandu luebe muoyo Mu dituku diudi wikuna nansha Aka
Padibu bamane kushinguila nzubu awu, mutuangaji usangana butu kabuyi bumueneka tshiakabidi, neambe ne: nzubu ewu kena mupie mikiya to, bualu butu mbujike buonsu

Davidi wakajuka, wakalua ku muaba wakadi Shaula mutule; Davidi wakatangila muaba wakadi Shaula mulale ne Abinê, muana wa Ne, kapitene ka masalayi andi, Shaula wakadi mulale munkatshi mua makalu ne bantu bandi bakadi bamunyunguluka
Labana wakambila Yakoba ne, Bualu bua wewe udi muan etu wa balume, bidi bimpe wewe unkuatshile mudimu tshianana, anyi
Yeye wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi mua kuamba ne, Ndi mukusue munyi, hadi mutshima webe kauyi kundi
Yeye wakabatuma ku Beteleheme, wakamba ne, Yai bienu, nulonde bualu bua muana bitulu bitulu; hanuamusangana, nulue kundi ne dî, nunku meme kabidi nendue kumukukuila
Bualu bubi budiku budi bua lufu; tshiena ngamba ne, Yeye amulombele Nzambi bua bualu abu
Samuele Davidî wakumukaku, wakaya ku lubuebue lua Adulama; hakunvua bana babo ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu andi lumu elu, bakaya kudiye
Bantu aba bakalamata kudi mukelenge, ha mutu ha bantu bakateka mukelenge mu misoko yakadi ne ngumbu kuonso mu Yuda
Meme Paulo, udi nutumina muoyo, mufunde ne tshianza tshianyi
Kanuena bamanye ne, Tuetu bonso bakabatijibua mu Kilisto Yesu, tuakabatijibua mu lufu luandi
Genesis Ei idi ndelanganyi ya bana balumeba Noa Sheme ne Hama ne Yafete, bobo bakalela bana balume ku nyima kua nvula munene
Bienzedi bia Yoasha bikuabo ne malu onso akenzeye ne bukole buakaluanganeye n abu ne Amasaya, mukelenge wa Yuda, kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele, anyi
Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Mona, nakamana kulua kudi
Nebakudike bujitu buonso bua tshiota tshia tatu andi ham bidi handi, bana bakalelabo ne bantu ba hatuhu baledibue kudi bana aba, dilonga dionso dia tshianana mene, ku makoho tô ne ku mbidiki yonso
Bana ba balume ba Ulama: Bedana
Ku nyima kua lufu lua Yehoyada bantu banene ba mu Yuda bakalua, bakakukuila mukelenge

Bakabika mulume bua kuyeye ne mukashi wandi ne muena mudimu wandi, tatu andi muenu, tatu wa mukashi, wakamuambila ne, Monai, diba diakuamba kubuela, ndi nnusengelela ne, Lalai bienu butuku buonso; butuku buakuamba kuila, lalai bienu kunoko, bua mitshima yenu isanke; makelela nenubike ne dinda dionso, bua nuye bienu kuenu

Kuhungi tshihungidi ne bena buloba; hendabo masandi ne mpingu yabo, ne hashihelabo nzambi yabo nyama, hakubikilabo bua kudia n abo munyinyi wa nyama mishiha; bua nuenu kanubikidi bana babo ba bakashi kudi bana benu ba balume; ne bana babo ba bakashi badi benda masandi ku mpingu yabo ka benzeshi bana benu ba balume masandi kudi mpingu yabo
Dielulula Bibidilu bibi bia mu madilu Nuenu bena Izrayele, panudi mu madilu, kanuena mua kuditapa nsalu, nansha kukungula pa lubombu to
Ba bungi bakamuitabushaku
Katataka, Yehowa Nzambi, witabushe bua mulayi webe kudi Davidi tatu wanyi ujadikibue; bualu bua wewe wakumpingisha mu bukelenge ku mutu kua bantu badi bungi bua dinfuenkenya dia buloba

Hakuholesha mufundi wa musoko musumba wa bantu, wakabambila ne, Nuenu Bena Efeso, muntu kai udiku udi kai mumanye ne, Musoko wa Bena Efeso udi mulami wa tshitendelelu tshia Atemise munene, ne wa tshifuanyikishi tshiandi tshiakahona tshifume kudi Yupita
James Bana betu, kanulu bayishi ba bungi, bualu bua nudi bamanye ne, Netuangate dihila ditamba bunene
Hakadiye uhingana mu musoko dinda, wakadi ne nsala
Nanku muntu uvua ne disama, neasukule anu bilamba biende bua kikadi ne mikiya to
Gideona wakamukudimuna dî ne, Mukelenge wanyi, bikala Yehowa n etu, malu â onso akatukuata bualu kai
Bakakudimuna Yesu di ne, Katuena bamanye
Tuetu bakafua ku bubi, munyi mutuikalemu kabidi
Bobo nebalumbuluile bantu bilumbu matuku onso bobo nebalue kûdi ne bilumbu binene, kadi bobo nebakose bilumbu bikese; nunku badi mua kukumatshisha
Muntu ne muntu wakahingana kuandi
Pashishe neangate budimi buende
Hashishe, bakulu ba mu disangisha diabo bakamba ne, Munyi mutuangatshila badi bashala bakashi, bualu bua bakashi ba mu Benyamina bakabutudibua
Samuele wakamba ne, Nenye munyi
Hakadibo baya mu nshila, bakajika ku mai; muntu mutungula wakamba ne, Ahu ka mai â tshidi tshimpumbisha bua kubatijibua ntshinyi
Bena musoko bakambila Elisha ne, Mona, tudi tukusengelela ne
Ne muanjelo mukuabo wakaluhuka mu ntempelo udi mu diulu, yeye kabidi, muikale ne muele mutuisha wa kunowa n au
Bena Lewi bakimana ne bintu bia misambu bia Davidi, ne bakuidi bakadi ne mpungi
Kadi Davidi wakanyenga musoko wa lumbu wa Siona; eu udi musoko wa Davidi
Hashishe kahita ka bulami ba ntempelo ne tuhalai bakaya, bakalua n abo, kabai babakoka ku bukole, bua bakadi batshina bantu ne, Nebatukume mabue
Bayanyi ukadi muntu mukulumpe
Mabue a makunshi akadi manene a mushinga mukole, bunene bua makuabo buakadi coudées dikumi, ne bua makuabo buakadi coudées muanda mukulu
Kadi nusungule muana wa mukoku nansha muana wa mbuji udi mukumbane bua muntu yonsu kupetaye munyinyi wonsu udiye mua kudia
Hakamûmusheye mu nshila, bantu bonso bakaya ne Yoaba bua kulondabo Sheba, muana wa Bikili
Diabolo wakamuambila ne, Biwikala Muana wa Nzambi, amba dibue edi diandamuke mutanda wa bidia
Yakoba wakimanyika dibue dinene bu tshibumba ha muaba wakayikidileye n andi, wakahongolola mai a kutendelela n au ha mutu hadi wakelahu manyi kabidi
Ndi nditshiha, bana betu, kudi butumbi buadi n abu kunudi mu Kilisto Yesu Mukelenge wetu ne, Ndi munangile ku lufu ku dituku ne ku dituku
Bualu bua ba bungi bakadi munkatshi muabo bakadi kabayi badidila; nunku Bena Lewi bakadi ne bua kushihela muntu ne muntu wakadi kayi muakane mulambu bua kubajidila kudi Yehowa
Nunku halua bantu babi kundi bakashiha muntu muakane mulale mu nsubu muandi ha bulalu, bualu kabuena butambe kunkuata bua kusombuela mashi andi adi ha bianza bienu bua kunûmusha ha buloba, anyi
Luka Kadi hakatshia butuku dituku dia kumudilu dia lumingu, bakashi bakalua ku lukita ne bintu bia muhuya muimpe biakalongololabo
Mufundi udi hanyi
Tubakilangane n enu, nuenu nufîle bana benu ba bakashi kutudi ne nuangate bana betu ba bakashi kunudi

Amos Mulau wikale kudi badi bashikame talalâ mu Siona bu badi kabayi ne bualu, Hitai tô ne ku Kalene, nutangile; Nuenu badi bakeba kusemesha dituku adi dibi kule, Badi balala ha malalu a mibanga, Badi bimba misambu ya tshimbimba ne lunzenze, Badi banuina nvinyo mu malonga, Bua mianda ai nebadianjile kubuela mu buhika, Mukelenge Yehowa wakuditshiha, yeye muine; Halua tshikondo atshi, bikala bantu dikumi mu nsubu umue, nebafue biabo
Ezekiel Hashishe nakatangila, ekumona
Bana ba Pashû, tshinunu tshimue ne nkama ibidi ne makumi anai ne muanda mutekete
Bakimana ku tshibi tshia nsubu wa Yehowa tshia ku luseke lua esete; butumbi bua Nzambi wa Isalele buakadi ba mitu habo

Dibikidibua dia Elisha Wakumukaku, wakasangila ne Elisha, muana wa Shafata, wakadi wihila budimi ne bikokedi bia ngombe dikumi ne bibidi: yeye wakadi wenda ku tshikokedi tshia dikumi ne tshibidi; Eliya wakafika kudiye, wakela tshikowelu tshiandi ham bidi n andi
Ngombe mulume ne mbuji bivuabu balambula bua kudikobolola, biena mashi avuabu bangate bua kujikija mikiya ya miaba ya tshijila, nebapatuke nabi mu mitanda bua kuosha tshiseba, munyinyi ne bia munda

Hakamba matuku au muanda mutekete kushika, Bena Yuda ba mu Asia, hakamumonabo mu ntempelo, bakashikila tshisumbu tshionso tshia bantu, bakamukuata, bela mbila ne, Bena Isalele, nutukuatshishe, kayeu muntu udi uyisha bantu bonso kuonso bua kuhidiabo tshisamba tshietu ne mikenshi ya Mose ne muaba eu; bualu bukuabo, yeye wakulua ne Bena Gelika mu ntempelo, wakona muaba eu wa tshijila
Bakamuseka
Kupinganaye kuende
Tshimuangi Muaba wa kulambuila milambu Pashishe, wenze tshilambuilu tshia mabaya a mitshi ya ndunga tshia kuoshila milambu
Wele musenga wa kamonya muimpe pa mulongu onsu
Ngasa wa Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto ikale ne nyuma wenu
Mêyi ne mikandu adi aleeja mishindu ya kusanka ne budiikadidi ebu
Bena Ejipitu bonso bakumbula mena hehi ne musulu, bakakeba mai a kunua, bualu bua kabakamanya mua kunua mai a mu musulu
Bena Gibea bakadisangisha kundi, bakanyunguluka nsubu unakadi butuku; bakasua kushiha meme, bakakuata mukashi wanyi muhika ku bukole, ne yeye wakafua
Yakoba wakatangila mpala wa Labana, kakadi bu muvueye dia mbedi
Shaula wakambila bena mudimu bandi ne, Nunkebele muntu udi mumanye mua kuimba bimpe, nulue n andi kundi
Mukaji awu kulela Pinhase
Bua bualu ebu nudi nulambula kabidi; bua bobo badi bakuatshi ba mudimu ba Nzambi balamata ku muanda eu mene
Nunku Samuele wakaya, wakalala mu muaba wandi kabidi
Aba mbantu bakadi kabai banyanguka ne bakashi, bualu bua bobo badi mishikankunde ya tumama
Padiye kayi umupikula tshidimu atshi, nzubu awu neashale kashidi kudi uvua mumusumbe, kabidi ne kudi ndelanganyi yende
Mu tshikosu, mmumanye mua kuenza midimu yonsu
Ahaba wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi
Tatu wakuimpa udi mutambe bonso bukole, kakuena wainyenga mu tshianza tshia Tatu
Hakatangila Bena Amona ne, Bena Sulia bakanyema, bobo kabidi bakanyema ku mpala kua Abishai, bakabuela mu musoko
Nunku yeye wakambila miloho ya Bene hadada ne, Nuambile mukelenge wanyi ne, Nengenze malu onso awakambila muntu webe diambedi, kadi tshiena ngenza bualu ebu
Hadada wakafua ne Samala wa mu Maseleka wakakokesha mu muaba wandi

Mu dituku adi mene Yehowa wakahunga ne Abalama tshihungidi ne, Ndi mpa tunkanunuina biebe buloba abu ku musulu wa mu Ejipitu to ne ku musulu munene wa Pelata, buloba bua Bena Kene ne bua Bena Keneze ne bua Bena Kadamona ne bua Bena Hiti ne bua Bena Pelese ne bua Bena Lefa, ne bua Bena Amole ne bua Bena Kanâna ne bua Bena Gîgashi ne bua Bena Yebuse
Etu ntukanunuina tuabo: muan a bute wa Yishemaele wakadi Nebayota; hashishe Kedâ ne Adabele ne Mibesama, Mishema ne Duma, Masa, Hadada ne Tema, Yetû, Nafisha ne Kedema
Miaba yonsu ivua mayi apatukila muinshi mua buloba ne mulu kudikangayi, mela kukama

Hakalueye kutudi, wakangata mukaba wa Paulo, wakadisuika n au ku makasa ne ku bianza, wakamba ne, Nyuma Muimpe udi wamba ne, Bena Yuda ba mu Yelushalema nebasuike muena mukaba eu nunku, nebamufile mu bianza bia bantu ba bende
Wakateka tshiowelu hankatshi ha ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshioshelu tshia mulambu ya kuosha, wakelamu mai a kuowa, akadi Mose ne Alona ne bana bandi balume bowesha n au bianza ne makasa

Milambu yonso ya bintu bia tshijila bidibo banyukula bidi Bena Isalele bafila kudi Yehowa, nakunuhabi ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi, bu tshintu tshienu tshiendelele: etshi ntshihungidi tshia luehu tshia tshiendelele ku mesu kua Yehowa kûdi wewe ne kudi bana bebe badi n ebe
Ebe wakalela bana balume babidi; dina dia mukuabo Pelege; mu matuku andi bakabanyangana buloba; dina dia muan abo mulume diakadi Yoketana
Kanumvuanganyi ne bena matunga abu
Wakambula makunshi ne wakashimbula mpingu bia Bashela; wakanyanga miaba ei ne mifuba ya bantu bafue
Nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nuende mu nshila yandi, numutshine

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bua Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda bakuenza anu malu adi mabi ku mesu kuanyi ku buana buabo tô ne katataka; Bena Isalele kabena benza bunga bualu, anu buobu budi bunkuatshisha tshiji bua mudimu wa bianza biabo
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Biakuambila muntu dî dimue, alue n andi kundi, ne yeye kena ukulenga tshianza kabidi
Yeye Mose eu mene wakambila bana ba Isalele ne, Nzambi neanubishile muprofete wa munkatshi mua bana benu, bu muakambisheye meme
Nenujadike ne: meme Maweja Nangila ndi Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Kadi mpindiu ndi nufundila ne, Kanubuelakanyi ne muntu udi ne dina dia muan enu wa ma Kilisto bikaleye muena masandi, anyi muena lukuka lua bintu, anyi muena mpingu, anyi muhendanganyi, anyi mukuatshiki wa maluvu, anyi munyengi wa bintu; kanudî mene ne muntu wa nunku
Hashishe Abinê wakamuambila ne, Ya, alukila; nunku yeye wakalukila

Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe bakasabuka bavuale bintu biabo bia nvita ku mpala kua Bena Isalele, bu muakabambila Mose; bantu bu binunu makumi anai bakadi ne bintu biabo bia nvita bilongolola bakasabuka ku mpala kua Yehowa, bua kuluangana ku mpata ya Yeleko
Yehowa wakamuebesha ne, Bishi

Nunku Davidi wakaha Ônana nshekele Davidi wakashilahu Yehowa tshioshelu, wakafilahu milambu ya kuosha ne ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, wakabikila dina dia Yehowa; yeye wakitaba ne kahia ka mu diulu ha mutu ha tshioshelu

Mukelenge Yehowa, Nzambi wa misumba, udi wamba ne, mu dituku dinatumina Bena Isalele makenga bua malu mabi abo, Nenshihe nsubu udibo balala mu tshikondo tshia mashika, Amosa Unvuai dî edi, nuenu bakashi ba ngombe ba ku Bashana, Mukelenge Yehowa wakaditshiha ku buimpe bua tshijila tshiandi ne, Nenuhatukile mu miaba idi ngumbu mishimbuke, Luai ku Betele, enzai malu mabi enu; Oshilai Nzambi mulambu wa kumusakidila wa bidia biela luevene, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Meme kabidi nakakanda nvula bua kanulokedi, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nunku nennuenzele muanda eu, Bena Isalele; Monai, yeye udi wimanyika mikuna ne udi utuma luhehele, Amosa Unvuai dî edi dia muadi dindi Muana mukashi utshidi kamama, Bualu bua Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bua Yehowa udi wambila Bena Isalele dî edi ne, kadi kanukebi Betele, Kebai Yehowa, nenuikale ne muoyo; nuenu mbadi bakudimuna kulumbulula kuakane bua kuluaku anu bululu, Yeye wakafuka mitoto ya Tshidiminanzashi ne ya Nyama ne Mbua ne Muntu, Yeye udi utuma dibutuka kudi bena bukitu, Badi ne muntu udi ubabela ku tshibuelelu tshia musoko lukuna, Nudi nudiata muntu muhele muinshi mua makasa enu, Bualu bua ndi mumanye ne malu mabi enu adi mavule, Nunku muntu udi ne budimu neahuwe mu tshikondo atshi, Kebai malu makane, kanukebi malu mabi, Kinai malu mabi, nangai malu mimpe, Nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wa misumba, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu madimi onso a tumuma tua nvinyo nemuikale muadi; Mulau unukuate nuenu badi ba sue dituku dia Yehowa dimuenekele

Malaki Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Monai, ndi ntuma messager wanyi, yeye nealongolole nshila ku mpala kuanyi; Mukelenge unudi nukeba nealue lubilu mu ntempelo wandi, messager wa dihungila, unudi n andi disanka, monai mudiye ulua

Wakazola bilongo bia amande ne tuhanza tusatu tuakadi ku mutu kua mahu a tshitekelu, ne tshihunga tshia or ne tshilongo, wakazola bilongo bia amande ha tuhanza tuakadi ku luseke lukuabo, ne tshihunga ne tshilongo, wakenza matu asambombo nunku

Nunku Bena Isalele bonso bakalua ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa bela mbila ne tshiona tshikole tshia nshiba ne mpungi ne tshia biamu bia kukumakasha, bakadi bimba nzenze ne bisanji ne dî dikole
Kadi kabakabala Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bakadi ne Yone bu mubakuatshishi
Nunku Davidi wakahanda bantu bandi ne mei â; kakitabusha bua bobo kuluangana ne Shaula
Bana ba Gibâ, makumi tshitema ne batanu
Kanuena banze kunvua dî diandi tshikondo tshimue, kanuena banze kutangila mubidi wandi

Mukelenge wakambila Ebeyatâ muakuidi ne, Hingane ku Anatota ku madimi ebe bualu bua udi ne bualu bua kufua: tshiena nkushiha katataka, bualu bua wewe waka tua la mushete wa Mukelenge Yehowa ku mpala kua Davidi, tatu wanyi, ne bualu bua wewe wakakenga ne tatu wanyi mu makenga onso akadiye n au
Yeye neafile bakelenge babo mu bianza bienu, nuenu nenjimishe mena abo hanshi ha buloba; kakuena muntu umue udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuenu tô ne hanuabashiha bonso
Nenudie mafuta tô ne hula mafu enu tente, nentume mashi tô ne hanuâkuatshika, ku minyinyi ya milambu inakunushihela
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne mukashi muhika, udi mubangila kudi mulume, udi kayi muanze kuhikudibua, nebabakengeshe bubidi buabo, kabena babashiha bualu bua yeye kakadi muhikudibue
Ke mudi bena Levi mua kungenzela mudimu nanku
Hashishe Yosefe wakambila ba ntu bandi ne, Nubushile bibombi biabo tente ne bia kudia, nuhingashe argent wa muntu ne muntu mu tshibombi tshiandi, nubahe bintu bia kudiabo mu nshila, bakenza nunku

Bakashi ba bungi bakadiku, bakadi batangidile ha bule, bobo bakadi Bena Galela, bakalua balonda Yesu bua kumukuatshisha; munkatshi mua bakashi aba muakadi Maha wa ku Magadala, ne Malia mamu wa Yakobo ne Yose, ne mamu wa bana ba Zebedayo
Mukelenge ikale ne buonso buenu
Kadi tshintu tshidi tshilua tshia hale ne tshidi tshikulukasha tshidi ha buihi ne kujimina
Mukashi wakamba ne, Bulelela, Mukelenge, kadi mbua itu yadia nkototo idi imata munshi mua mesa a banfumu bai
Nanku bantu bonsu nebikale banunyema, baye kusokoma
Nuenu nenuikale kundi bu bukelenge bua bakuidi, bu tshisamba tshia tshijila
Bajadiki ba bualu abu ke badi badianjila kumuasa mabue
Tudi ne tshioshelu, tshidi badi bakuata mudimu mu tshitendelelu kabai bamanye mua kudiaku
Kadi nuadile pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, bualu adi biakudia bia tshijila menemene

Mu matuku au muanda mutekete a disanka edi dia bidia bidi kabiyi biela luevene yeye alongolole mulambu wa kuoshela Yehowa, balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete badi kabayi ne tshilema ne bimpanga muanda mutekete bidi kabiyi ne tshilema, bua kuhifileye buatshia buatshia tô matuku muanda mutekete; afile mpumbu wa mbushi buatshia buatshia bu mulambu wa kujimisha n au bubi
Monai, mukashi Muena Kanâna wakaluhuka mu luseke elu, wakela dî bikole ne, Mukelenge, muana wa Davidi, unfue luse, muana wanyi wa bakashi udi ukenga bikole bualu bua demon udi munda
Yeye wakamukonka ne, Bakutangila tshinyi mu nsubu muebe
Muntu udi ushiha mukuabo nebamushihe
Asatu ku luseke, asatu ku luseke lukuabu
Binuikala munda muanyi, bikala mei anyi munda muenu, nulombe tshionso tshinuasua, nebanuenzeletshi
Hakafikeye, wakatamba kukuatshisha bantu bakadi bamane kuitabusha bua ngasa wa Nzambi; bualu bua wakadi utuisha Bena Yuda bikole ku mesu kua bantu, ubalesha mu Mukanda wa Nzambi ne, Yesu udi Kilisto
Umue wa bana ba Ahimeleke, muana wa Ahituba, dina diandi Ebeyatâ, wakahanduka, wakalonda Davidi
Dipembu diayi nedinsankishe

Tshiena ne mukenshi wa kudi Mukelenge bualu bua bakashi batshidi tumama; kadi meme nkayanyi nakahangidisha bualu ebu bu muntu wakamana kuangata luse kudi Mukelenge bua kuikala muntu unudi mua kutekemena
Wakamuambila ne, Wewe

Bua bituenza malu mabi bua disungula dia mutshima hatuakamana kuangata dimanya dia bushua, kakuena kushala kabidi munga mulambu bua kubuikidila n au mibi, kadi kudi kushala kuindila kukuabo kua dilumbulula kudi kukuatshisha buowa, ne kahia kakole nekoshe bahitshi bandi
Balaka wakaya ne Belâma ku mutu kua mukuna wa Peô, kuakatangileye ku tshihela
Bisamba ebi bibidi ne tshitupa, nebisombe dishiya dia musulu wa Yardene, luseke luawu ludi diba dipatukila, batangilangane ne Yeriko
Pashishe neatume diyi bua bakone ku bimana bionsu bia munda mua nzubu, baye kuimansha bionsu bidibu bakone abi ku mpenga kua tshimenga, muaba wa bintu bibi
Nyama ya mpunda yakadi binunu makumi asatu ne nkama itanu, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi makumi asambombo ne umue
Kadi bakuabo bakamba ne, Yeye udi Eliya
Kadi dî dia mukelenge diakahita dî dia Yoaba bukole
Usungile muoyo wanyi musûke bua kaufu ku muele wa nvita, Unsungile mukana mua nyama wa ntambue, usungile muoyo Nengambile Nuenu badi batshina Yehowa, numutumbishe
Kadi nensunguluje bimuna bia bena Izrayele ne bia bena Ejipitu
Pashishe muntu awu udi mua kutuadija kunua maluvu

Yoasha, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakangata bintu bia tshijila wakafila Yehoshafata ne Yeholama ne Ahazaya batatu bandi, bakelenge ba Yuda, mu nsubu wa Yehowa, ne bintu bionso biakajidileye ne biamu bia or bionso biakadi mu bibutshilu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne bia mu nsubu wa mukelenge, wakabituma kudi Hazaele, mukelenge wa Sulia; nunku yeye wakumuka ku Yelushalema
Tuetu netununvuile bua nuenu nuenze bualu ebu bubi bunene buonso ku mesu kua Nzambi wetu bua kubaka bakashi ba bende, anyi
Bavua bashale kabidi pa buloba pashishe
Acts Mu matuku au mukelenge Helode wakakuata bena ekelesia bakuabo bua kubakengesha

Hakaya Mose mu ntenta wa kusambakena bua kusomba ne Yehowa, hashishe yeye wakunvua Di diakadi diakula n andi ha mutu ha tshibuikidi tshia ha mutu ha mushete wa Nzambi hankatshi ha bakeluba babidi ne yeye wakasomba ne Yehowa

Mukelenge wa nsunagoga wakadi ne tshishi bualu bua Yesu wakondaha muntu dituku dia Lumingu, wakambila bantu ne, Matuku asambombo adiku adibo ne bua kukuata mudimu wabo; mu matuku au nulue bua kuondahibua, kanulu dituku dia Lumingu
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Nakukusangana bualu bua wewe wakadihanyisha bua kuenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Seluga wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu, wakalela Nahô
Munyinyi wa mafuta onsu udi mushale, mutuangaji awoshe pa tshilambuilu, bu mudibu benza bua mulambu wa bobumue

Nensunguile bantu banyi Bena Isalele muaba, nembajadike bimpe, bua bobo bashikame mu muaba wabo, kabena bumushibue kabidi; bena tshimbambila kabena babahaula kabidi bu muakenzabo diambedi; bu munakenza ku dituku dinakela mukenji wanyi bua balumbuluishi bikale ku mutu kua bantu banyi Bena Isalele, ne nempite bantu bonso bakadi n ebe lukuna bukole
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bua ndi mumanye meji andi nnuelela, adi meji a kunuvuisha ditalala, kaena a kunuvuisha diyoyo; adi bua kunuha ditekemena mu matuku atshidi ku mpala
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Tshiena ne bualu bua kudimuka bua kuamba dî diakuteka Yehowa mukana muanyi, anyi
Hakakenzakana Yesu, wakambila bayidi bandi ne, Ha kubuela kua bantu badi ne bintu bia bungi mu bukelenge bua Nzambi mbualu bukole
Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Nuitabushe Nzambi mene
Hakadiye wamba nunku, muntu wakafuma ku nsubu wa mukelenge wa nsunagoga, wakamba ne, Muan ebe udi mufue, kutatshishi Muyishi
Filipo wakaya, wakambila Andele; Andele ne Filipo bakaya, bakambila Yesu

Bakadi ku mutu kua bantu: Palosha, Pahata moaba, Elama, Zatu, Bani, Buni, Azagada, Bebai, Adoniya, Bigewai, Adina, Atê, Hezikiya, Azû, Hodiya, Hashuma, Bezai, Halifa, Anatota, Nobai, Magapiasha, Meshulama, Hezi, Meshezabele, Zadoka, Yadua, Pelataya, Hanana, Anaya, Hoshea, Hananya, Hashuba, Halohesha, Pileha, Shobeka, Lehuma, Hashabena, Mâseya, Ahia, Hanana, Anana, Maluki, Halima ne Bâna

Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza, ne mu kukumbasha kua bana ne mu kukumbasha kua bimuna bienu ne mu bintu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba; bualu bua Yehowa neikale ne disanka bualu buenu, bu muakasankeye bualu bua batatu benu; binuatumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi ne mei andi bidi bifunda mu mukanda eu wa mikenji: binuakudimuka kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso
Nunku bakadia bidia abi matuku muanda mutekete, bafile milambu ya kuosha ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, batonde mibi yabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo
Yeye wakamba ne, Bulelela, udi nuambila ne, Kabatu bitabusha muprofete kudi ba ku luseke luabo
Mbalanda watshi wakadi ne bule bua coudées makumi abidi ne butshiama bua coudées itanu; ne mbalanda wakatangilangana ne tshiendelu tshia mu lubanza
Bankambua betu bakadi batendelela Tatu ku mukuna eu; kadi nuenu nudi nuamba ne, Mu Yelushalema mudi muaba udi bantu ne bua kutendelelamu Tatu
Kulondabu ne bintu abi
Tshintu tshionso tshia dikumi tshia ngombe anyi tshia mikoko bidibo babala netshikale tshintu tshia tshijila kudi Yehowa

Yeye wakabambila ne, Nenunue luhanza luanyi bulelela; kadi kushikama ku tshianza tshianyi tshia balume ne ku tshianza tshianyi tshia bakashi kambualu buanyi bua kuha muntu; kushikama nunku kudi bualu bua bantu bakabulongoluelabo kudi Tatu wanyi
Nenumanye nsumuinu yonso munyi
Nyuma wa Nzambi wakabanga kumuenzesha mu Mahane dana, hankatshi ha Solea ne Eshetaola
Yeye wakasua kûsha difu diandi tente ne bihusu biakadi ngulube idia

Hebrews Nunku, bana betu ba tshijila, babanyanganyi ba dibikila dia mu diulu, nuelangane meshi bua Mupostolo ne Muakuidi Munene wa dijukula dia ditabusha dietu, Yesu mene; wakadi wa kueyemenyibua kudi wakamuteka mu mudimu, bu muakadi Mose kabidi mu nsubu mua Nzambi muonso
Yoshiya wakumusha nsubu yonso ya bitendelelu bia ku mikuna bia mu misoko ya Samalea biakenza bakelenge ba Isalele bia kufuisha n abi Yehowa tshiji, wakatuenzela bu muakenzeleye bintu bia mu Betele

Bikala lumu luimpe luetu ne tshilulu tshikudika, ludi n atshi anu kudi batshidi bajimina; bakafofomishabo mesu a meshi a badi kabai bitabusha kudi nzambi wa tshikondo etshi, bua dinkenka dia lumu luimpe lua butumbi bua Kilisto, udi tshifuanyikishi tshia Nzambi, kaditemi kudibo
Yeye wakafidibua mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Isalele; bakashiha bantu bandi ba bungi
Bakumuka mu Bene yâkana, bakashikama mu Ho hadidegada Bakumuka mu Ho hadidegada, bakashikama mu Yotebata
Kadi hakamoneye tshihehele, wakatshina; hakabangeye kudina mu mai, wakadila ne, Mukelenge, unsungile
Kadi uhidie nsumuinu ya malu a hatuhu a bakashi bakulukashi
Davidi wakebesha nsongalume wakamuambila bualu ebu ne, Wewe wakafuma kudi kunyi
Samuele wakakonka Yishai ne, Bana bebe bonso badiku, anyi
Bikala mulume anyi mukashi ne matoba matoke mu dikoba, muakuidi neamutangile, ne bi kala matoba au kâyi matambe kutoka tô, ei idi bu mpusu yakumueneka mu dikoba, muntu eu udi muakane
Umiamine kabidi ne bana bende ba balume ne ku bilamba biabu bionsu, nebikale bia tshijila

Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kufila mpala ku masungula a Mulombodi wa Ditunga padiye kêna mukumbaja makanyika adi alonda aa: kwikala ne bweena Kongu bwa bangabanga; kwikala ne mvula ya tshileledi kayiyi mishadile ku ; kwikala ne bujima bwa makookeshi a bumuntu ne a tshidiidi; kubenga kubwelakana mu maalu adibo babenga kudi dîyi dia masungulangana
Nyoka wakakonka mukashi ne, Nzambi wakamba ne, Kanudi mamuma a nu tshi yonso idi mu budimi, anyi
Wakenza makunshi mazole a tshiamu tshia mitaku, bule buau bua mulu buakadi coudées dikumi ne muanda mukulu; dibulungu dia tshibumba diakadi coudées dikumi ne ibidi

Kanungu ka Kabeena mwa kuteekela mweena Kongu nansha umwe kansungansunga pa bidi bitangila mianda ya tulasa ne dienza dia midimu ya mbulamatadi anyi mianda mikwabo, kansungansunga kamwenekela mu mêyi ne mikandu anyi mu dipangadika dia Bukalenga bunene, pa kutangila tshisumbu tshia ditabwija tshia muntu, dîku didiye mufumina, mulongo weende mu musoko, mwaba udiye usombela, ngelelu wende wa meji ne bidiye pende mumona bîmpe mu mianda ya tshidiidi, dikala dieende dia mweena dikoba kampanda, dia tshisamba kampanda, mweena lukongu, mweena tshisamba kampanda, bûngi bwa bantu bukesa mu bunkambwa anyi mu mwakulu umwe
Hakatangila Yesu bisumbu bia bantu bamunguile, yeye wakamba ne, Tuyai dishia dia dishiba
Efelayima, tatu wabo, wakasa muadi matuku a bungi, ne bana babo bakatua bua kumusambabo
Bakashi bakimba, bambilangane ne, Shaula wakadi ne tshiji tshikole; bualu ebu biuakanyingalasha mutshima wandi
Kuenzabu kabidi bitaku bia makunji binayi, bia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Kadi bua bualu buandi nuenu nudi mu Kilisto Yesu, wakayuishibua meshi a kudi Nzambi kutudi: ne buakane ne bujidibu ne buhikudi
Muhi ka wakateka tshianza tshiandi muinshi mua tshibelu tshia Abalahama, mukelenge wandi, wakaditshiha bua bualu ebu
Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Nakuenza bualu bumue bua kukema, buonso buenu nudi nukema bualu ebu

Wewe neutusumbishe bia kudia ku argent bua tuetu kudia; Utuhe mai a kunua ku argent, bua tuetu kunua, anji kuitabusha bua tuetu tuhite ku makasa; bu muakatuenzela bana ba Esau ne Bena Moaba badi bashikama mu Ala, tô ne hatuasabuka Yadene mu buloba buakatuha Yehowa, Nzambi wetu

Shimishona wakalalamu tô ne mundankulu, wakabika mundankulu, wakakuata bibi bia ku musoko, ne makunshi abi abidi, wakabitula ne biamu bionso, wakabiteka ha maha andi, wakaya n abi tô ne ku mutu kua mukuna munene udi ku mpala kua Hebelone
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Yuda, muananyi, udi bu muana wa ntambue
Lekelai kutontolola, bu muakatontolola bakuabo babo, bakashihibua kudi mushihi
Muishi wakahatuka mu diulu diandi, kahia ka mukana muandi kakosha bintu; makala a kahia akatemeshibue kudiku
Biwahidia, utuambile dî diebe

Yoshua Yoshua Udi Udimusha Bantu Hakahita matuku a bungi, ne hakamana Yehowa kuha Bena Isalele dikisha kudi bena lukuna babo bonso bakadi babanyunguluka, ne hakalua Yoshua muntu mununu ne bidimu biandi biakakumbana, Yoshua wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso ne bakulu babo ne bakadi ku mutu kua bisamba biabo ne balumbuluishi babo ne tuhita tuabo, wakabambila ne, Meme ndi muntu mununu, ne bidimu bianyi biakukumbana: nuenu nuakatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba ebi bionso bua bualu buenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, yeye mene wakanuluila nvita
Adi ndiyoyo dinuakunvua
Maweja Nangila mmuitabe anu bua bisamba bikuabu bitendelele bintu abi
Lutatu lua ku dituku ne ku dituku ludi lukumbane

Unteke mu mutshima webe bu tshimanyinu ne bu tshimanyinu ha diboko diebe; bualu bua dinanga didi ne bukole bua lufu; mukau udi ne bukole bua Muaba wa Bafue; udi utema bu ndimi ya kahia, bu kahia ka Yehowa mene

Badi Basangula Bena Lewi bua Kulamabo Mushete Yeye wakashiya Asafa ne bana babo ku mpala kua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, bua kuenzelabo mudimu ku mpala kua mushete bikondo bionso bu muakadi mudimu wa buatshia buatshia, ne Obeda edome ne bana babo makumi asambombo ne muanda mukulu, ne Obeda edome, muana wa Yedutuna, ne Hosa bua kuikalabo balami ba bibi
Wakidikisha bujitu bua mpanza ya or, ne bua mpanza ya mishindu yonso; ne bua mpanza ya argent, ne bua mpanza ya mishindu yonso
Tangila musoko eu udi ha buihi bua kunyemenamu, udi mukese, witabushe bua mpandilemu musoko eu udi mukese nansha
Tshiotshi tshimpe tshîakatekibua utshilame bimpe ne dikuatshisha dia Nyuma Muimpe udi muikale munda muetu
Kanulu ne mashi a nyama mishiha ne mampa adi ne luevene hohamue; kanushihi nansha tshintu tshikese tshia mulambu wa disanka dia kuhita kua Yehowa tô ne ku dinda
Yeye wakambila Bena Yuda bonso ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne ba mu Yuda bonso bakamushiha, anyi

Bualu bua diba didi dibanda hohamue ne luhehele lua luiya lukole ne bidi bifubisha bisosa; ne tshilongo tshiabi tshidi tshimata hanshi ne bulengele bua mu mpala muatshi budi bujimina; muomumue kabidi, muntu mubanshi neajimisbibue mu nshila yandi
Kadi tshianza tshia Ahikama, muana wa Shafana, tshiakadi tshikuatshisha Yelemiya, bua kabamufidi mu bianza bia bantu bua bobo bamushihe
Gehazi wakamuambila ne, Yeye kena ne muana wa balume ne bayandi udi muntu mununu
Kadi kapia kadi pa tshilambuilu kadi ne bua kutema anu kutema

Nakulua mutshimbakanyi; nuenu nuakungenzeshaku ku bukole; nakadi ne bualu bua kuanyishibua kunudi, bua tshiakadi ku nyima kua bapostolo bakatamba bunene nasha kaba kakese: nasha meme bianyi ngikala tshianana
Waditshiha mutshihu kudi tshishihelu udi uditshiha mutshihu kudi tshishihelu ne kudi bintu bionso bidihu
Katuena ne makuta kabidi to
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakamukudimuna ne, Mukelenge wanyi, bualu ebu nebuikale anu bu mu dî diebe; ndi webe ne bintu bionso bindi n abi
Bakasonga bakeluba ne mabue a ngashi ne bilongo ku bimanu bionso bia nsubu munda ne ha nyima

Ukenge hebe, tantamana, ulele, wewe muana mukashi wa Siona, Katataka bisamba bia bungi bia bantu Kadi kabena bamanye meji adi mu mutshima wa Yehowa, Bika biebe, ubashihule, Micah Mpindiu udisangishe mu misumba, wewe muana mukashi, muena misumba; Kadi wewe, Betelehema Efelata, Nunku yeye neabafile mu bianza bia badi n abo lukuna Yeye neajalame, neadishe mikoko yandi mu bukole bua Yehowa, Yeye eu neikale ditalala dietu
Mesa a kulambuila Mvidi Mukulu mampa Pashishe, wenze mesa a mutshi wa ndunga
Izake kumunanga bikole
Mukalu wenu wa luseke lua ku wesete neutuangane ne muelelu wa mai manene, eu newikale mukalu wenu wa ku wesete

Hashika dikenga dia matuku au, diba nedifikuluke, ngondo kena ukenka, mitoto neituke mûlu, neihone, nebanyukule bukole buakadi buendesha bintu ebi mu diulu; hashishe, tshimanyinu tshia Muana wa muntu netshimueneke mu diulu; bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebidile, nebimone Muana wa muntu ulua ha matutu a mu diulu ne bukole buandi ne butumbi buandi bunene

Bana ba balume ba Elepâla: Ebê ne Mishama ne Shemede, wakasa Ono ne Lodo ne misoko yakadi ha buihi; Belia ne Shema, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo ba Bena Ayalona, bakihata Bena Gata mu nvita; ne Ahio ne Shashaka ne Yelemota ne Zebadaya ne Alada ne Edê ne Mikaele ne Yisepa ne Yoha, bana ba balume ba Belia; Zebadaya ne Meshulama ne Hiziki ne Hebê ne Yishemelai ne Yizela ne Yobaba, bana ba balume ba Elepâla; ne Yakima ne Zikeli ne Zabedi ne Elienai ne Ziletai ne Ebele ne Adaya ne Belaya ne Shimelata, bana ba balume ba Shimei; Yishe pana ne Ebê ne Ebele ne Abidona ne Zikeli ne Hanana ne Hananya ne Elama ne Anetotiya ne Yifedeya ne Penuele, bana ba balume ba Shashaka; ne Shameshelai ne Shemaya ne Atalaya ne Yalesheya ne Eliya ne Zikeli, bana ba balume ba Yelohama
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Nuenu kanuakubala bualu buakenza Davidi, hakadiye utata ne hakadiye ne nsala, yeye ne bakuabo bakadi n andi, anyi
Monai, ndi mbatangila bua kubenzela bibi, kembua kubenzela bimpe
Bayanyi neannemeke, bualu ndi mumulelele bana ba balume basambombu
Nunku bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bakangata bujitu bua argent ne or ne malonga onso bua kuya n abi ku Yelushalema ku nsubu wa Nzambi wetu
Nenjadike tshihungidi tshianyi hankatshi hetu hebe ne tunkanunuina tuebe to ne bikondo biatu bionso bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele, bua meme kuikala Nzambi webe ne wa tunkanunuina tuebe

Alona muakuidi wakabanda ku mukuna wa Hô bu muakamuambila Yehowa, wakafua biandi mu tshidimu tshia makumi anai ku nyima kua kuhatuka kua Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo muitanu
Kadi Yehowa akuhe lungenyi ne meji a kujingulula n au malu, akuteke ku mutu kua Bena Isalele; bua wewe kutumikila mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi webe
Bualu bua nakumana kukulongoluela nsubu ne muaba wa tumelo tuebe
Meme nendue n enu mu buloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, nennuhebu bu buhianyi ndi Yehowa

Nebateke tshilulu tshia bleu ha mutu ha mesa a mampa, nebâteke ha mutu hatshi malonga ne nkutu ne mpanza ne makoho adibo balongolola n au, ne mampa neikalehu, nebatekehu tshilulu tshikunze, nebâteke tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge ha mutu hatshi, nebabueshemu mitshi ya mesa
Kulondakajaye muena Izrayele awu, ne mukaji uvuaye nende wa bena Madiyane, mu ntenta, kubashipa bonsu babidi, kubasompola ne difuma
Hakashika matuku â, tuakalongolola bintu bietu, tuakabanda ku Yelushalema

Dibadika Dibaka dia bakaji badi mua kupiana Bamfumu ba ku ndelanganyi ya Yozefe ba mu diku dia Ngilaade, muana wa Makire, uvua kabidi muikulu wa Menashe, kuya kudi Moshe ne bamfumu bakuabu ba bisamba bia bena Izrayele
Bantu betu bayile kabidi mua kunanukila mu midimu mimpe bua kuhetabo bintu bidibo n abi bualu; bua kabikadi bu bantu badi kabai bakuama mamuma
Bituikala tuditantamika, netukokeshe n andi kabidi; bituamuvila, yeye neatuvile kabidi; bituikala katui bena lulamatu, yeye udi ushala muena lulamatu, yeye kena mumanye mua kudivila
Bantu bonso bakadi mu tshitudilu ne mu madimi kabidi bakazakala; ne masalayi ne bambudi ba bintu bakazakala; buloba buakakanka kabidi, nunku kukanka kunene kua buloba kuakadiku
Davidi wakasamba Beta sheba mukashi wandi; wakabuela kudiye, wakalala n andi; yeye wakamulelela muana mulume, wakamuidika dina diandi ne, Solomo

Bualu bua benji ba malu mabi nebabutudibue; Tshituha tshihi katshiyi tshianji kuleha, muntu mubi kena wikalaku kabidi; Kadi badi ne mitshima mihuekele nebahiane buloba, Muntu mubi udi welela muntu muakane tshifufu, Mukelenge udi umuseka, bualu bua udi umona ne, Bantu babi badi bahatula muele wa nvita, badi banana buta buabo, Muele wabo wa nvita neutubule mitshima yabo, Bintu bikese bidi muntu muakane n abi bidi bitamba bintu bia bungi Bualu bua maboko a bantu babi neatshibudibue, Yehowa udi mumanye matuku a bantu badi ne mitshima miakane, Kabena bafuishibua bundu bikondo bia diakabi; Kadi bantu babi nebajimine, ne badi ne Yehowa lukuna nebikale Muntu mubi udi usomba bintu, kena ubifuta kabidi; Bualu bua badi Yehowa uvudishila disanka nebahiane buloba, Biendedi bia muntu bidi bijadikibua kudi Yehowa, Biatankukeye, kena udishinda tshiula, Nakadi nsongalume, katataka nakulua muntu mukole; Dinda tô ne ku dilolo yeye udi ulesha bantu luse, udi ubasombesha bintu; Umuka ku malu mabi, enza malu mimpe; Bualu bua Yehowa udi unanga kulumbulula kuakane, Bantu bakane nebahiane buloba, Mukana mua muntu muakane mudi muamba mei a lungenyi, Mukenji wa Nzambi wandi udi mu mutshima wandi; Muntu mubi udi utentekela muntu muakane, Yehowa kena umushiya mu tshianza tshiandi, Windile Yehowa, ulamate nshila wandi, Nakumona muntu mubi muikale ne bukole buandi bua bungi, kadi nakahitshilaku, ne mona, yeye kakadiku; Tangila muntu udi ne mutshima mutoke bimpe, mona muntu udi Kadi batomboki nebabutudibue, buonso buabo mene
Newende ku mpala tô ne habuelau mu Yuda, neuhasalale ne neuhitshilemu, neufike tô ne ku nshingu ya bantu

Kadi butudi n abu mbua kusakidila Nzambi misangu yonso bua bualu buenu, bana betu banangibua kudi Mukelenge, bualu bua Nzambi wakadianjila kunusungula ku tshibangidilu bua kunuha luhandu mu kujidila kua Nyuma Muimpe ne mu kuitabusha kua malu a bushua; wakanubikilamu bua lumu luimpe lutuakunuambila, bua nuenu nuhete butumbi bua Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto
Hashishe Ahimasa, muana wa Sadoka, wakamba ne, Nye lubilu bua kumanyisha mukelenge ne, Yehowa wakakusombuela kudi bena lukuna bebe
Undambile mushindu undi munange
Bua Zebuluna yeye wakamba ne, Usanke mu kuluhuka kuebe; ne Yisakâ, usanke mu ntenta yebe
NKilisto Yesu mene wakafua, E, bulelela, wakabishibua ku lufu, udi ku tshianza tshikole tshia Nzambi, udi utuakuila kabidi

Hashishe bakahitshila mu tshihela, bakanyunguluka buloba bua Edome ne buloba bua Moaba kabidi, bakayila ku esete kua buloba bua Moaba, bakashikama dishiya dia musulu wa Ânona; kadi kabakabuela mu mu kalu wa Moaba, bualu bua Ânona wakadi mukalu wa Moaba
Bua bidia bia Nzambi mbiobio bîdi bifuma mu diulu, bidi biha ba ha buloba muoyo
Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena bakamba ne Netuenze bu mudi Yehowa wambila bantu bandi
Bantu bonso bakahunga dî diabo bua kudiabo bidia tô matuku muanda mutekete makuabo; bakenza nunku ne disanka

Wakumukaku, wakasangila ne Elisha, muana wa Shafata, wakadi wihila budimi ne bikokedi bia ngombe dikumi ne bibidi: yeye wakadi wenda ku tshikokedi tshia dikumi ne tshibidi; Eliya wakafika kudiye, wakela tshikowelu tshiandi ham bidi n andi
Ezekiel Hashishe yeye wakalukila n anyi mu nshila wa ku tshibuelelu tshia ha bule tshia tshitendelelu, tshibuelelu tshidi tshitangila ku luseke lua esete, ne tshiakadi tshinshila
Hashishe muntu webe mukashi wakamba ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Dî dia mukelenge wanyi dinsambe; bualu bua mukelenge udi bu muanjelo wa Nzambi bua kujingululeye malu mimpe ne malu mabi
Pashishe mutuangaji neangate muana wa mukoku ne mafuta

Hashika matuku au, ku dituku dia muanda mukulu tô ne tshiendelele bakuidi bafile milambu yenu ha tshioshelu, milambu yenu ya kuoshela Yehowa, milambu yenu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala kabidi; Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Meme nenuitabushe
Yeye wakamba ne, Bena Yuda bakasangisha dî diabo bua kukuebesha bua wewe kulua ne Paulo makelela ha tshilumbuluidi, bu wewe udi musue kumuebesha bualu buandi kabidi bimpe

Hakafika munda munya, Eliya wakabaseka ne, Elai dî dikole, bualu bua yeye udi nzambi: yeye udi welangana meji, anyi wakuya kuntu, anyi wakuya ku luendu, anyi yeye udi ulala tulu ne bunudi n abu mbua kumuhisha
Wakalua kudi bintu biandi, kadi bantu bandi mene kabakamuitabusha
Bena Lubena bakasa Heshebona ne Eleale ne Kiyatayima, ne Nebo ne Bâla meona bakidika misoko ei mena mahia mahia ne Sibema; bakidika misoko mikuabo yakasabo mena mahia mahia
Ndualua lubilu, ukuate bikole tshiudi n atshi, bua muntu kanyengi tshifulu tshiebe tshia butumbi
Wewe newangate tshimpanga tshia tshijila, ulambe munyinyi watshi ne mai a kahia mu muaba wa tshijila
Bualu bua bobo nebakudimune mutshima wa muan enu mulume, bua yeye kandondi meme bua kukuatshileye nzambi mikuabo mudimu: nunku Yehowa neanukuatshile tshiji, neanujimishe lubilu
Timothy Kadi umanye bualu ebu ne, Halua matuku a kunshikidilu, malu makole nealue
Ke mudi mutuangaji mua kukobolola muena tshibawu amu mushindu ewu
Nunku, bu munudi bantu basungula kudi Nzambi, ba tshijila ne bananga, luatai mutshima wa luse, ne wa dikuatshisha, ne wa kudihuekesha, ne wa kalolo, ne wa lutulu

Davidi wakalongolola biamu bifike bia bungi bua kufulabo n abi misamadi ya kuenzabo n ai bibi ne mabaya makuabo; wakasangisha biamu bia mitaku biakadibo kabayi bamanye mua kubala bujitu buabi; ne mitshi ya cèdre yakadi bungi buakadibo kabayi bamanye; bualu bua Bena Sidona ne Bena Tulo bakalua kudi Davidi ne mitshi ya cèdre ya bungi
Yeye wakambila bantu bandi ne, Tangilai, Bena Isalele badi batuhita bungi ne bukole
Bienzedi bia Abiya bikuabo ne midimu yandi ne mei andi bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola wa Ido muprofete
Kadi, Maweja Nangila, wewe kutuma lupepele
Anu Lahaba, mukashi wa tshiendenda, ikale ne muoyo ne bantu bonso badi n andi mu nsubu muandi, bualu bua yeye wakasokoka batentekedi batuakatuma
Mabue a makunshi akadi manene a mushinga mukole, bunene bua makuabo buakadi coudées dikumi, ne bua makuabo buakadi coudées muanda mukulu
Tshisamba kai tshidi ne mikenji ne mei majalame bu mikenji ei yonso inakateka ku mpala kuenu lelu
Udi usunsula nyama, unua mashi ende
Moshe umvua miaku eyi, kuitabaye
Mbu mudiye usengelela Nzambi bua kukengesheye Isalele ne, Mukelenge, bakashiha baprofete bebe, bakabutula bioshelu biebe, ne meme ndi mushale nkayanyi, ne badi bakeba muoyo wanyi
Dîyi, meyi ne mikandu Bukalenga Mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga Bia kwenza nabi mudimu Bimwangalaji bia mianda, bia ngumu

Nakasua kumanya kabidi bualu bua nsengu ai dikumi yakadi ha mutu handi, ne be lusengu alu lukuabo luakamenabu, bakatulabo nsengu mikuabo isatu ku mpala kualu, lusengu alu mene luakadi ne mesu, ne mukana muamba mei a diambu, luakadi luhite mikuabo bunene
Tshiena muhunge n enu nuenu nkayenu tshihungidi etshi ne kuditshiha eku, kadi ne muntu yonso udi muimane ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, lelu, ne muntu yonso udi kayi muimane n etu lelu
Muntu ne muntu udibo babala neafile tshituha tshia nshekele bu mudibo bafila mu nsubu wa tshiendelele tshituha tshia nshekele bu kuha kuabo kudi Yehowa
Yesu wakambila kapitene ka masalayi ne, Ya biebe; bualu bua wewe wakuitabusha, nebakuenzele tshiwakulomba

Nanku mu ditunga dia Mowabe, luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene, Moshe kutuadija kulongesha bena Izrayele mikenji ya Mvidi Mukulu, ubambila ne: Mvidi Mukulu udi umusha bena Izrayele ku mukuna wa Sinayi Patuvua ku mukuna wa Sinayi
Bulelela, nakadi musue bua nuenu nuikale bakokeshi, bua tuetu tuikale bakokeshi n enu
Bobo nebalame mushete wa Nzambi ne mesa ne minda ne bioshelu ne malonga adibo benza n au mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne tshilulu tshidibo bateka ku mpala kua muaba wa tshijila
Balami ba tshibi bakela dî, bakambila ba mu nsubu wa mukelenge lumu alu
Tudi tukulomba ne: wanyishe bua tuye mu tshipela, tuende luendu lua matuku asatu bua kulambula Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu milambu

Yeye wakolola tshinfuanyi tshia tshianza, wakankuata ku tshisuba tshia nsuki ya ku mutu kuanyi; Nyuma wakambisha mulu hankatshi ha buloba ne diulu, wakaya n anyi mu bikena kumona bia Nzambi to ne ku Yelushalema, ku tshibi tshia ku tshibuelelu tshia ku luseke lua node tshidi tshibuela mu tshiendelu tshia munda mua ntempelo, kuakadi luhingu lua mukau, ludi lusonsola mukau
Bobu kudila miadi bikole
Nunku numanye bienu ne, Nansha dî dimue dia mei onso akambila Yehowa bualu bua nsubu wa Ahaba nedihone hanshi hatuhu; bualu bua Yehowa wakenza malu onso akambeye mukana mua muntu wandi Eliya
Misangu mikuabu tatu udi mua kumbabata pambidi, kunsangana ne: ndi muena dishima

Bualu bua Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Monai, nendekeshe di dia tuseku ne di dia disanka, dî dia mubaki wa mukashi ne dia mukashi udiye ubaka mu muaba eu, ku mesu kuebe ne mu matuku ebe
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ndi mpidia mikaba yenu mudi nukeba n ai mioyo ya bantu, nenyitule ku maboko enu, ne nempikule mioyo ya bantu inudi nukeba bua kujimisha
