Bakumuka mu Iyima, bakashikama mu Dibona gada
Bakumuka mu tshihela tshia Sina, bakashikama mu Dofaka
Nakabihishisha kuha kuabo, bualu bua bakela ban a bute babo mu kahia bu milambu ya kuosha, bua meme mmanye mua kubabutula, ne bua bobo bamanye ne, Ndi Yehowa

Bualu bua meshi mabi ne kushiha kua bantu ne masandi ne tshiendenda ne buibi ne mashimi ne kuhenda Nzambi bidi biluhuka mu mutshima; malu â adi abihisha muntu; kudi kudia bidia ne bianza bidi kabi biowa kakuena kubihisha muntu

Nembahe mutshima muhia muhia, nenteke nyuma muhia muhia munda muabo, nengumushe mutshima wa dibue munda muabo, nembahe mutshima wa muntu; bua bobo balonde mikenji yanyi ne batumikile mei anyi ne babienze
Yeye wakangebesha ne, Udi umona tshinyi
Wakela dî diandi bikole ne, Tatu Abalahama, unfue luse, utume Lazalo, atue lusongo lua munu mu mai, antalashe ludimi luanyi, bualu bua meme ndi ne dikenga mu kahia aka
Samuel Hakamana Davidi kuyikilangana ne Shaula, mutshima wa Yonatana wakakuatakana ne mutshima wa Davidi; Yonatana wakamunanga bu mutshima wandi mene
Bakashikama mu Gilada mu Bashana ne mu misoko yai ne mu miaba yonso ya ku matshika a Shalona tô ne ku mpenge yabo
Mukashi wa Yalobama wakenza nunku, wakajuka, wakaya ku Shilo, wakafika ku nsubu wa Ahiya

Hamana wakambila mukelenge Ahashawelosha ne, Kudi bantu bakuabo bakamuangalaka munkatshi mua bantu ba mu nseke yonso ya bukelenge buebe; mikenji yabo idi mitahuluke ku ya bantu bonso; kabena batumikila mikenji ya mukelenge; nunku kambimpe bua mukelenge abitabushe

Yeye wakabandisha mesu andi, wakatangila balume basatu bimane ku mpala kuandi, hakabatangileye, wakabika ku mbelu kuandi, wakaya lubilu bua kubakidila, wakabakukuila, wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, biwikala ne luse kundi, ndi nkutendekena ne, Kuhitshi muntu webe
Umue wa bantu bandi wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge wetu, kakuena muntu; kadi Elisha, muprofete wa mu Isalele, udi wamhila mukelenge wa Isalele mei audi wamba mu nsubu webe wa bulalu
Nunku biwambala bu mukuatshishanganyi n ebe, umuitabushe bu mûdi ungitabusha meme
Hatula bintu biebe bia luendu mu munya ku mesu kuabo, bu mudi bintu bia kuya n abi mu buhika; mu diba dia dilolo wewe muine uhatuke mu nsubu ku mesu kuabo, bu mudi bantu benza hadibo baya mu buhika
Nanku anu bantu balume ba mu meku a batuangaji ke badi mua kudia munyinyi wa mulambu awu
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Mulunda wanyi, enza bualu buwakuluila
Pikala muivi katshiyi ne bintu bivuaye muibe abi, nebamupane, ashale mupika bua buivi buende
Netutshimune bantu bonsu abu
Mu diba edi mukelenge wakambila Danyele ne, Nzambi webe ûdi utendelela ku dituku ku dituku akusungile
Hakumukeye kudiye, nyama wa ntambue wakasangila n andi, wakamushiha
Tangila biebe, nenkusuike ne mionshi ham bidi hebe, bua wewe kuandamuki ku luseke ne ku luseke anu hakumbana matuku audi utshintshimika musoko
Bualu bua Davidi kakabanda mu diulu, hadi yeye mene wakamba ne, Tô ne hanavuisha badi n ebe lukuna tshitekelu tshia munshi mua makasa ebe
Bobo babikila dina dia nzambi wabo, meme nembikile dina dia Yehowa: ne Nzambi udi witaba ne kahia ikale Nzambi malelela
Nzambi wakenzela baleleshi bimpe, bantu bakakumbana ba bungi, bakalua bakole be, Bualu bua baleleshi bakatshina Nzambi, yeye wakabaha bana
bienu, nuambile bayidi bandi ne Petelo ne, Yeye neadianjile ku mpala kuenu mu Galela, nenumumoneku bu muakunuambileye

Bua, bu mutudi ne bituha bia bungi mu mubidi umue, ne bituha bionso kabiena ne mudimu muomumue, nunku, tuetu, bantu ba bungi, tudi mubidi umue musangila mu Kilisto, ne kudi muntu ne muntu, tudi tuikalangana bu bituha bia bakuabo
Hana wakamukudimuna ne, Nansha, mukelenge wanyi, ndi mukashi udi ne mutshima munyingalala; tshiakanua nvinyo anyi maluvu makole; kadi nakuambila Yehowa malu onso adi mu mutshima wanyi
Bonsu abu, bisumbu bisatu, ke badi ne bua kubanga luendu, benza tshiluilu tshia kumpala
Ngasa ikale ne buonso buenu
Tshikondu tshionsu tshikale ne bidimu muanda mutekete
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuhingane hahita matuku asatu
Hakabikilabo mukelenge, Eleyakima, muana wa Hilekiya, wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu wa mukelenge, ne Shebena secrétaire, ne Yoa, muana wa Asafa, mufundi wa malu a bukelenge, bakaluhuka kudiye
Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua mundi wakenza bualu ku mpukahuka ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue

Bilondeshila bulongolodi ebu, pikalabo kabayi bapatula dîyi ditangila lupetu lwa tshidimu mu dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu wa lwîshi wa tshikondu tshia ndongamu wa lupetu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga, mu dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene dikala dishintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, udi upeesha tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia lupetu bukola, kayi upwa mooyi makumbaja meelela tukanda kudi Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu

Nensunguile bantu banyi Bena Isalele muaba, nembajadike bimpe, bua bobo bashikame mu muaba wabo, kabena bumushibue kabidi; bena tshimbambila kabena babahaula kabidi bu muakenzabo diambedi; bu munakenza ku dituku dinakela mukenji wanyi bua balumbuluishi bikale ku mutu kua bantu banyi Bena Isalele, ne nempite bantu bonso bakadi n ebe lukuna bukole
Hanunvua bualu bua nvita ne ngumu ya nvita, kanuhampakanyi; malu au nealue, kadi nshikidilu kena muanze kulua
Bantu bonso ba mu luseke lua Bena Gelasa bakamuambila ne, Umuka kutudi; bualu bua buowa bunene buakabakuata; wakabuela mu buatu, wakahingana
Yelemiya wakatshidi utambakana munkatshi mua bantu, bualu bua kabakanji kumubuesha mu lukanu
Nunku bobo bakatuma mushete wa Nzambi ku Ekelona
Munyinyi udi mushale ne mampa adi mashale nubioshe mu kahia
Bakamuhesha bukole bua kuluanganeye ne basanto ne bua kubatambeye; bakamuhesha bukokeshi ha mutu ha tshisamba tshionso, bantu bonso, muaku wonso, ne ditunga dionso
Wakalua n andi kudi Yesu
Bakamukonka ne, Wewe kabidi udi muena Galela, anyi
Tshiashadidi mpindiu, bana betu muoyo wen au

Bienzela muntu mukuandi bibi, ne biamukuata bualu bua kuditshiheye n abu, biabueleye mu nsubu webe bua kuditshiheye ku tshioshelu tshiebe, unvue biebe mu diulu bua kulumbuluila bantu bebe; uhishe muntu mubi bua kuhingisha bualu buandi ha mutu n andi; uhingishe muntu udi kayi ne bualu, bua kumuhita ku buimpe buandi
Kadi diba nedilue, didiku katataka mene, ditendelela batendeledi balelela Nzambi mu nyuma ne mu bulelela; Tatu udi ukeba bantu ba nunku bamutendelela
Budiye n abu mbua kukokesha tô ne hatekeye bena lukuna n andi bonso munshi mua makasa andi
Exodus Ei idi mikenji ludi mua kuteka ku mpala kuabo
Hashishe, Elifaza, Muena Temana, Biledada, Muena Shuhi, ne Sofa, Muena Namata, bakaya kuenza bu muakabambila Yehowa; ne Yehowa wakitabusha disengelela dia Yobo
Maweja Nangila kufika munda bikole
Kadi bantu aba kabakatshina, kabakahanda bilulu biabo, nansha mukelenge nansha mukuabo wa bantu banai bonso bakunvua mei a onso
Moshe kufika munda bikole bua diandamuna diabu adi
Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi wa nzambi mikuabo, udi Mukelenge wa bakelenge, Nzambi munene ne mukole, udibo batshina, yeye katu watangila bantu ne kansungusungu, kena witabusha matutu
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nendekeshe kabidi mundi wa mu Moaba udi ubanda ku tshioshelu tshidi ha mutu ha mukuna, udi ufilahu mulambu wa musenga wa manananshi kudi nzambi yandi
Maweja Nangila neende kumpala kuebe, neikale nebe, kayi ukulekela

Nuenze bienu nunku Kola ne bantu hadiye habo bangate malonga a kahia, batekemu kahia, batekehu musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kua Yehowa makelela, ne muntu udi musungudibue kudi Yehowa neikale muntu wa tshijila, nuenu bana balume ba Lewi nudi nutamba kudienzela malu
Kanukengeshi bakashi ba mu lufuila, anyi bana ba nshiya, anyi muenyi, anyi bahele; muntu kahangidishi bualu mu mutshima wandi bua kuenzela muan abo bibi
Kadi nuenu nudi nunkonka ne, Tuakukunyoka munyi
Bua kakuena muntu munkatshi muetu udi ne muoyo ha nkayandi, ne kakuena muntu udi udifuila ha nkayandi
Hakalelabo kuakua musangu, bana babo ba mu Kilisto bakabahingisha talalâ kudi bakabatuma

Anu dituku adi, Abrahame kuteka muanende Ismayele panshi, kabidi ne bana ba balume bonsu bavua mu diku diende, too ne bapika bavuabu balele mu nzubu muende, ne bonsu bavuaye musumbe, bu muvua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile
Muaba awu kamuvua mayi a kunua to
Nutumikile, nuenze malu onso ne mei onso anakuteka ku mpala kuenu lelu
Kadi Yehoyada wakalua muntu mununu, wakadi ne matuku a bungi; wakafua; wakadi ne bidimu lukama ne makumi asatu hakafueye
Mukelenge wakadi uyikila ne Gehazi, muena mudimu wa muntu wa Nzambi, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ungambileku malu manene onso akenza Elisha

Jonah Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yona, muana wa Amitai, diamba ne, Bika, ya ku Ninewe, musoko au muneme, ûbele; bualu bua bubi buabo buakubanda ku mesu kuanyi, Kadi Yona wakabika bua kunyemeneye ku Tâshishi bua kumuka ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kakadila Bena Isalele kudi Yehowa, Yehowa wakabisha Bena Isalele musunyi di, nguakabasungila, Oteniele mene, muana wa Kenaza, muakunyi wa Kaleba
Netunue tshinyi
Muanda eu neulue nunku, binuananukila kutumikila dî dia Yehowa Nzambi wenu
Pamonabu tulambula nyama ayi, nebatuase mabue batushipa
Nuikale ne mitshima mikole, Yehowa ikale ne bantu bimpe

Yakoba wakambila Yosefe ne, Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso wakamueneka kundi ku Luze mu buloba bua Kanâna wakansankisha, wakangambila ne, Mona, nenkuvuishe tshisamba tshinene, nenkukumbashe, neulue tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu, nempe tunkanunuina tuebe buloba ebu tshiendelele
Bualu bua nuakuntuma kudi Yehowa Nzambi wenu ne, Utulombele Yehowa Nzambi wetu; utuambile dî dionso didi Yehowa wamba, ne tuetu netudienze
Kabundi ka mputu kakena kakane kunudi, bualu bua kadi kahingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kakena ne mikono mihanduluke
Bena Efelayima kabakihata Bena Kanâna bakadi bashikama mu Gezê; kadi Bena Kanâna bakashikama mu Gezê munkatshi muabo
Ndi nuambila dî, nuenu ba bisamba bia bende
Buonso buabo bakabanga kumulayidila bu dî dimana kuhunga
Bantu ba mu Anatota, lukama ne makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu
Samuel Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Davidi wakaluangana ne Bena Peleshete, wakabahita bukole; Davidi wakanyenga Metega hama mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Mikumbi yakamuangalaka buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, yakatamba bungi, kakuakadi mikumbi bu ei diambedi, ne mikuabo bu ei kayena ilua kabidi
Bobo bakelangana meshi munda munda ne, Bituamba ne, Mu diulu, yeye neatuebeshe ne, Munyi kanuakamuitabusha
Malaba nuele makala a kapia ne musenga wa kamonya mu mbabula amu
Tuyai, tuangate mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ku Shilo, ulue munkatshi muetu bua kutusungilau ku tshianza tshia badi n etu lukuna

Aba mbantu bakafuma mu Tele mela, Tele hâsha, Keluba, Adona ne Imê, bobo kabakadi mua kujadika biota biabo ne bankambua babo ne tunkanuniuna tuabo ne, Tudi Bena Isalele: Bana ba Delaya, bana ba Tobiya, bana ba Nekoda nkama isambombo ne makumi anai ne babidi
Hakalua dituku dia Lumingu lua Bayuda, wakabanga kuyisha bantu mu nsunagoga; bantu ba bungi bakakema, hakunvuabo mei andi, bakakonka ne, Muntu eu wakuangata malu â kudi kunyi

Yeye wakabambila ne, Tshisamba tshikuabo netshiluangane ne tshinga, bukelenge bukuabo nebuluangane ne bunga, buloba nebutambe kutaka, biole ne bihuhu nebikale ku nseke ne ku nseke, malu a buowa ne bimanyinu binene nebifume mulu
Au mmena a bana ba balume ba Gêshoma: Libeni ne Shimei
Kadi yeye wakakuha nyoka mu kahia, kakunvua disama

Hosa wa bana balume ba Melali wakadi ne bana balume: Shimeli wakadi kahita yeye kakadi muan a bute kadi tatu wandi wakamuhingisha kahita , Hilekiya muibidi, Tebalaya muisatu, Zekâya muinai; bana balume bonso ba Hosa ne bana babo bakadi dikumi ne basatu
Aba bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo: Efê ne Ishi ne Ebele ne Azeliele ne Yelemiya ne Hodaweya ne Yadiele, bena bukitu ne ba butumbi ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo
Arone kukumbaja bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe

Butuku abu mene muanjelo wa Yehowa wakaya munkatshi mua tshitudilu tshia Bena Ashû, wakashiha bantu binunu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu ne bitanu; hakabika bantu ne dinda dionso, bakasangana bitalu bia bantu bamane kufua bonso

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula; ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi; ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Pagiele, muana mulume wa Okelana
kwepuka matandu ;
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuntangile meme, nuenze bu mungenza; ne monai, hanalua ku butshika bua tshitudilu, hashishe nenuenze bu mungenza
Nunku, ndi nkusengelela, Yehowa Nzambi wetu, utusungile mu tshianza tshiandi, bua ba mu makelenge onso a ha buloba bamanye ne wewe Yehowa udi Nzambi nkayebe

Balaame udi umanyisha malu atshivuavua Balaame kuandamuna Balake ne: Mvua mumane kuandamuna bantu bauvua muntumine ne: Balake, nansha yeye mumpeshe tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, ne mpawungi, bionsu bidi mu nzubu muende mua bukalenga, tshiena mua kubenga diyi dia Maweja Nangila wanyi to
Kanuena mua kundambula tshimuna tshia mupaku: tshikale ne mipesa mibozeka, misunsuka, mitula, nansha mikosa

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Hashishe, hakumbana bidimu ebi makumi muanda mutekete, nenkengeshe mukelenge wa Babulona ne tshisamba atshi bualu bua bubi buabo, ne buloba bua Bena Kasada; nembuvuishe bu tshikulu tô ne tshiendelele

Muntu udi kayi muakane neangate butue bua mulambu wakoshabo bua kubuikila n au bubi, neangate mai adi ahueka mu dilonga: mundi utshidi muakane neangate mabeshi a hysope, neâtue mu mai, neamiamine ha ntenta, ne ha malonga onso, ne ha bantu bonso bakadimu, ne mundi wakalenga mifuba tshianza, anyi mundi wakafua ku muele wa nvita, anyi mundi mufue, anyi lukita, mundi utshidi muakane neamiamine mai ha mundi udi kayi muakane dî diku disatu ne dituku dia muanda mutekete, ne halua dituku dia muanda mutekete neamulengeshe, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne mai, neikale muakane ku dilolo
Biahuoleye dinu dia muhika wandi mulume anyi muhika wandi mukashi, yeye neamumushe ku buhika buandi bualu bua dinu diandi
Kanulambi muana wa mukoko mu mabele a mamu wandi

Wakahingisha mukalu wa Isalele ku tshibi tshia ku Hamata tô ne ku dishiha dia mu Alabâ, bu mu dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, diakambeye mukana mua muntu wandi Yona muprofete, muana wa Ambai wa mu Gata hefê

Petelo Nunku ndi nsengelela bakulu badi munkatshi muenu, ndi bianyi mukulu n abo, ne mumanyi wa makenga a Kilisto, ne muangatshi wa butumbi budi buamba kubuluibua, ne, Nulame tshisumbu tshia mikoko ya Nzambi tshidi munkatshi muenu, nubalame, kanui benzeshibue ku bukole, kadi ne mitshima ya disanka bu mu disua dia Nzambi; kambualu bua kukeba biuma, kadi nuikale ne mutshima mulongolola bimpe; kanuikadi bu bakokeshi ba badi ku nyima kuenu, kadi nudivuishe bifuanyikishi bimpe kudi mikoko
Nanku bana betu, bakaji betu ne bimuna bietu, nebishale munu mu Ngilaade
Bayidi ba Yone bakadi ne Muena Yuda mpata bua kudiuvua
Abimeleke kakadi muanze kulua kudiye, ne yeye wakakonka ne, Mukelenge, wewe neushihe tshisamba tshiakane, anyi
Muanjelo wakangandamuna ne, Ebi bidi makalu adi aya ku mpehele mai ya diulu mimane kudimuenesha ku mpala kua Mukelenge wa buloba bujima
Ndi nnusengelela ne, Nubingambile
Mihote yakambila yakadi ne meshi ne, Nutuheku manyi bualu bua minda yetu ikadi ijima
Buludi buatshi nebuikale coudée umue, ne butshiama buatshi nebuikale coudée umue, utshidikishe ne luidi lumue, bule buatshi bua mulu nebuikale coudées ibidi; wenze nsengu yatshi ne mutshi au umue
Hakamoneye ditabusha diabo, wakamba ne, Mulumiana, mibi yebe idi mijimishibue
Yehowa wakambila Yoshua ne, Mona, nakulala Yeleko ne mukelenge wa musoko ne bena nvita bonso ba dikima mu tshianza tshiebe

Nzambi wakabisankisha, wakabambila ne, Nulelangane, nukumbane ba bungi, nûshe buloba tente, nubukokeshe, nuikale ne bukokeshi ku mutu kua minyinyi ya mu mai, ne nyunyu ya mulu, ne tshintu tshionso tshidi ne muoyo tshidi tshiendakana ha buloba
Halua umena budimi, nenzele ba bidime aba tshinyi
Abalahama wakamba ne, Tangila, nakukuata bualu bua kusomba ne Yehowa, meme ndi bu luhuishi ne butue

Bua bualu ebu tudi tunulombela kabidi misangu yonso bua Nzambi wetu anubale bakanangane ne dibikidibua dienu, ne bua yeye akumbashe ne bukole buandi disua dienu dionso dia buimpe ne mudimu wenu wa ditabusha; bua dina dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu ditumbishibue munda muenu, ne nuenu nutumbishibue munda muandi, bu mudi ngasa wa Nzambi wetu ne wa Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto
Yabale ke nkambua wa badi basomba mu nzubu ya ntenta bikale ne bimuna
Diba adi, muntu wa kunudi udi ne muoyi muimpe, wa kanemu, newoshe muanabu, nansha bana badiye mushale nabu, nansha mukajende, disu dia lonji
Dutelonone Bunene bua Yehowa Nunku suai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numunemeke, nutumikile malu andi ne mei andi ne mikenji yandi matuku onso

Bakahatuka mu musoko bua kutangila bualu buakalua; bakalua kudi Yesu, bakasangana muntu wakahatuka bademon munda muandi mushikame ku makasa a Yesu, muluate bilulu, muikale ne lungenyi luimpe; bakatshina
Bakenza bintu ebi bionso ne ntalanta wa or nkayandi
Hashishe haunvua tshiona mu mitu ya mitshi ya mûrier, uluangane n abo; bualu bua Nzambi wakadianjila ku mpala kuebe bua kushiheye musumba wa Bena Peleshete
Hakunvua Mose mei au, bualu ebu buakadi buimpe ku mesu kuandi
Muntu wakenzela bibi, nebamusombuele misangu muanda mutekete

Bana betu banangibue kudi Nzambi, tudi bamanye kusungudibua kuenu; bualu bua lumu luimpe lutudi tuamba kaluakalua kunudi anu mu dî nkayadi, kadi luakalua mu bukole ne mu Nyuma Muimpe ne mu kumanya kujalama; bu munudi bamanye mushindu wa bantu utuakadivuisha munkatshi muenu bua bualu buenu
Yehowa wakamukudimuna dî ne, Juka, uye ku Kila, bualu bua meme nenfile Bena Peleshete mu tshianza tshiebe
Yeye wakebesha Yehoshafata ne, Wewe neuye n anyi bua kuluangana ne Bena Lamota gilada, anyi
Difutu diakadi hankatshi ha Bena Ejipitu ne Bena Isalele, difutu ne midima biakadiku kadi diakadi ne dinkenke butuku Kabikadianganyi ha buihi to butuku buonso
Yeye wakamuitaba ne, Malu mimpe
Anu Mvidi Mukulu ke udi munteke bu diboku dia bukole dia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, bua meme kutangila bintu bionsu bia mu nzubu muende ne kushala mulombodi wa ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu

Jeremiah Mu tshidimu tshinai tshia bukelenge bua Yehoyakima, muana wa Yoshiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, dî edi dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Wangate mabeshi a mukanda muvungulula, ufundemu mei onso anakukuambila bua kuhisha n au Bena Isalele, Bena Yuda ne bisamba bionso bia bantu, ku dituku dinakudianjila kukuambila mu matuku a Yoshiya tô ne ku lelu eu
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Bena nvita badi munkatshi muenu bangate bintu bia nvita bualu bua kushikisha dikenga didi Yehowa musue kusombuela n adi Bena Midiyana

Hashishe hanuakunvua dî diakadi munkatshi mua midima, hakadi mukuna mutema kahia, nuenu nuakalua kundi, ne ba ku mutu kua bisamba bienu ne bakulu benu; nuakamba ne, Tangila, Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafuisha butumbi buandi ne bunene buandi, tuakulua dî diandi munkatshi mua kahia: tuakatangila lelu ne Nzambi udi usomba ne muntu, ne yeye udi wikala ne muoyo
Meme, Yehowa, nakuamba dî edi, nendijadike kabidi
Yeye wakamba ne, Bualu buikale bu mudi mei enu
Nunku bakumusha Bena Yuda mu buloba buabo, bakaya n abo mu buhika
Pashishe bonsu babidi kulambula Maweja Nangila ngombe mulume umue, ne mukoku wa tshimpanga umue, pa tshilambuilu tshionsu
Bavua benda batangile mu tshimenga muvua Nahore musombe mu tshitupa tshia ku mutu kua misulu mu ditunga dia Mezopotamiya
Balume babidi bafofo bakadi bashikame kukala kua nshila; hakunvuabo ne, Udi uhita nYesu, bakela mbila ne, Mukelenge, muana wa Davidi, utufue luse

Mishiku ya mbelu ya nsubu yakadi minyunguluke bimanu bia tshitendelelu yakatangila ku tshituha tshia tshibumba tshiakadi tshishala hatuhu, mushiku mukuabo mutangile ku luseke lua nôde, mukuabo mutangile ku luseke lua sude
Batuangaji bakumbaje muabu muonsu bindi mubambile

Mukelenge wakamba ne, nunku, tangilai, nengenze kabidi malu munkatshi mua bantu aba adi abakemesha, Mulau wikale kudi bantu badi bafundika bifufu biabo muinshi mule bua kubisokoka ku mesu kua Yehowa, Monai tshitshu tshienu

Melekisedeke Udi Uvudishila Abalama Disanka Mukelenge wa Sodoma wakaluhuka bua kumuakidila hakahinganeye ku dishiha dia Kedolaome ne bakelenge bakadi n andi, mu tshibanda tshia Shawe etshi ntshibanda tshia Bakelenge
Hakumukeye ku muaba au, wakasangila ne Yehonadaba, muana wa Lekaba, wakadi ulua kusangakena n andi
Kena mua kulengesha ne mitu ya bantu aba, anyi
Kadi bikaladi bualu bua ngasa, kendia kuenza kua mikenshi kabidi; bua bikaladi nunku, ngasa kena kabidi ngasa
Bayidi bakadi bûle tente ne disanka ne Nyuma Muimpe
Malu onso alualua adi hatuhu
Muprofete udi udiambila mei mu dina dianyi ne dikamakama andi tshiyi mumuambile anyi udi wamba mei mu dina dia nzambi mukuabo, muprofete au neafue biandi
Bakuidi banene ba Nzambi ne bafundi ne bakulu bakamuseka nunku, bakamba ne, Yeye wakadi usungila bakuabo, kena mumanye mua kudisungila
Nunku bakadisangisha mu Yelushalema mu ngondo muisatu wa mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bitanu tshia mu bukelenge bua Asa
Bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ndi nsanka mu malu â

Mu tshikondo atshi nebabikile Yelushalema ne, Nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Yehowa; bantu ba mu bisamba bionso nebadisangisheku bua kutumbisha dina dia Yehowa mu Yelushalema; kabena benda kabidi bu muakadi tshitshu tshia mu mitshima yabo mibi

Bene hadada wakunvua dî dia mukelenge Asa; wakatuma tupitene tua masalayi andi bua kuluanganabo ne misoko ya Bena Isalele; yeye wakahana Iyona ne Dana ne Abele bete mâka, ne buloba buonso bua Kinelota ne buloba buonso bua Nafatale
Nunku hakendakanabo ku buloba buonso, bakalua ku Yelushalema hakahita ngondo tshitema ne matuku makumi abidi

Diha didi muntu ufila mu musokoko didi diholesha tshiji; Kulumbulula biakane kudi disanka kudi muntu muakane, Muntu udi uhambuka mu nshila wa dijingulula dia mianda Udi unanga disanka neikale muhele; Muntu mubi udi tshia kuhikula n atshi Kushikama mu tshihela tshia lusenga Mu nsubu wa muena meji mudi biuma bia mushinga mukole ne manyi kabidi, Udi ulonda buakane ne luse lujalame Muena meji udi ubanda mu mu soko wa bena bukitu, Udi ulama mukana muandi ne ludimi luandi Mubuidi ndina didibo binyika muntu udi ne dihetu ne didibandisha, Disua dia mufuba didi dimushiha, Muntu mubi udi usamina bintu muoyo dinda tô ne ku dilolo, Mulambu udi bantu babi bafila udi utondesha Yehowa; Mumonyi udi ne mashimi nea jimine, Muntu mubi udi unyenga mpala wandi, Kakuena meji, anyi dijingulula dia mianda, anyi kuhunga kua mei, Badi basakila kabalu bintu bia nvita difuku dia kuluangana, Proverbs Kuikala ne lumu Babanji ne bahele badi basangila hamue; Muntu mudimuke udi utangila dikenga diamba kumukuata, udi usokoma; Difutu dia kudihuekesha ne dia ditshina dietu dia Yehowa Mingonge ya meba ne mateyi bidi mu nshila wa muena tshitshu; Yisha muana mu nshila udiye ne bua kuendela; Mubanji udi ukokesha bahele; Udi ukuna malu mabi neahuole dikenga, Udi ufuila bakuabo luse neavudishibue disanka, Biwihata mubuidi, difuilangana nediumuke; Udi munange butoke bua mu tshima, Mesu a Yehowa adi alama lungenyi, Mufuba udi wamba ne, Nyama wa ntambue udi ha mbelu
Masalayi akambila Yonatana ne muambudi wa ngabu wandi ne, Luai kunoko, neanuleshe bualu
Kadi pikalabu kabayi bakumbaje bionsu ebi, nenusombe nabu amu mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Nsongalume Muena Ebelu, mukuatshishi wa kapitene ka masalayi, wakadi n etu mu nsubu wa lukanu, bakamuambila bilota bietu, ne yeye wakatujinguluila muntu tshilota tshiandi muntu tshiota tshiandi
Hakenzabo nunku, tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakalesha bena musoko au, ne tshiakabahita bikole; yeye wakashiha bantu ba mu musoko ne bakese ne banene, masungu akabakuata kabidi
Nakunvua kabidi dî diakungambila ne, Petelo, bika, shiha, udie
Muena buenzayi ke muena tshibawu Kanuena mua kushipa batedi bua buenzayi bua bana babu
Bavua bela mbila bamukonka ne: Bantu balume bavua bafika kuebe dilolu edi badi penyi
Ebere mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi asatu ne binayi, kulelaye Pelega

Kabena badinyanga kabidi ne mpingu yabo ne bintu biabo bidi bibahihisha, anyi ne malu mabi abo makuabo; ne nembasungile ku matomboka abo onso akadibo bantombokela n au, nembalengeshe; nunku nebikale bantu banyi, ne meme nengikale Nzambi wabo

Bena Peleshete Badi Banyenga Mushete wa Tshihungidi Bena Isalele bakaya bua kuluangana mata ne Bena Peleshete, bakatula tshitudilu tshiabo hehi ne Ebene ezê; Bena Peleshete bakatula tshitudilu tshiabo mu Afeka
Katuakalondangana mu makasa, anyi
Nunku Yona wakatamba kusanka bua mudiantondo

Buonso buenu nudi nuimana ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, lelu; ne ba ku mutu kuenu, bisamba bienu, bakulu benu, tuhita tuenu, ne balume bonso ba mu Isalele, ne bana benu bakese ne bakashi benu, ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, ne batatu ba nkunyi ne basunyi ba mai; bua nuenu nubuele mu tshihungidi tshidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muhunge n enu ne mu kuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muditshihe n enu lelu, bua yeye anuitabushe lelu bu bantu bandi, ne bua yeye kuikala Nzambi wenu, bu muakanuambileye, ne bu muakalayeye bankambua benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudi Bena Isalele, yeye wakabafila mu bianza bia Hazaele, mukelenge wa Sulia, ne mu bianza bia Bene hadada, muana wa Hazaele, tô matuku abo onso
Muhuya wakahita ha mpala hanyi, Tshintu atshi tshiakimana, Muntu wa ha buloba udi mua kuikala muakane ku mesu kua Nzambi, anyi
Balume bakamuambila ne, Tuetu netubinge ku mutshihu uwakututshihisha n au
Nudi nutupa ku diyi dia Maweja Nangila

Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Mukelenge wanyi wakaditshiha kudi muntu wandi mukashi ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ne, Bulelela, Solomo, muan ebe wa balume, neakokeshe bantu ku nyima kuanyi, ne yeye neashikame mu nkuasa wanyi wa bukelenge
Kadi hangakula n ebe, nembulule mukana muebe, ne wewe neubambile dî edi ne, Yehowa Nzambi udi wamba nunku
Buonso buabo bakadi batamba kukema, mitshima yabo yakalubakana, bakakonkangana ne, Bualu ebu budi munyi

Nunku wewe wakabafila mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo, bakabakengesha; mu tshikondo tshia dikenga diabo hakadilabo kûdi, wewe wakabunvuila mu diulu; bu mudi bunene bua luse luebe wewe wakabaha basungidi bakabasungila mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo

Yeye wakitaba ne, Nakadi ne lukunukunu lua bungi bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wa misumba; bualu bua Bena Isalele bakashiha tshihungidi tshiebe, bakela bioshelu biebe hanshi, bakashiha baprofete bebe ku miele ya nvita; anu meme nkayanyi ndi mushale, ne badi bakeba muoyo wanyi bua kûnyenga
Bisamba bia ha buloba bidi bikeba bintu ebi bionso; kadi Tatu wenu udi mumanye ne, Nuenu nudi ne bintu ebi bionso bualu

Muntu udi ne tatu wandi anyi baba wandi dinanga ditambe didiye n adi kundi meme kena ukumbana bua kuikaleye muyidi wanyi; muntu udi ne muan andi mulume anyi muan andi mukashi dinanga ditambe didiye n adi kundi meme kena ukumbana bua kuikaleye muyidi wanyi
Badi bankambua ba bisamba binayi
Ke bana muanda mukulu bavua Milka mulelele Nahore, muanabu ne Abrahame
Nakamba ne, Nenjuke, nengendakane mu musoko; nenkebe udi mutshima wanyi munange mu misesu ne mu miaba minene; nakamukeba, kadi tshiakamuheta
Helode wakamana kukuata Yone, wakamusuika, wakamubuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu bualu bua Helodia, mukashi wa muan abo Filipo
Hakashikishabo kudia, yeye wakamema luhanza muomumue kabidi, wakamba ne, Luhanza elu ludi dihungila dihia dihia dia mu mashi anyi akunumatshishilabo hanshi
Ha bualu ebu mpala wa mukelenge wakandamuka, ne mutshima wandi wakahampakana ne buowa

Ku dinda ne ku dinda longolola mulambu wa bia kudia, tshituha tshisambombo tshia épha umue, tshituha tshisatu tshia hin wa manyi bua kusangisha n au bukula; eu mmulambu wa bia kudia udibo ne bua kufila kudi Yehowa ku dituku ku dituku bu mukenji wandi wa tshiendelele

Lewitiki Milambu ya Bukula Halua muntu ne mulambu wa bukula kudi Yehowa, neafile bukula bubotesha, newelehu manyi ne musenga wa manananshi, nealue n abu kudi bana balume ba Alona bakuidi, neambulule dianza tente ne bukula ne manyi abu ne manananshi abu onso, ne muakuidi neabuoshile ha tshioshelu, bu tshivilukidi, bu tshintu tshidi tshi tua dihembu kudi Yehowa, ne tshituha tshia bukula tshidi tshishale netshikale tshia Alona ne bana bandi balume ntshintu tshidi tshitambe tshia tshijila tshia mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Hashishe, yeye wakatuela dî ne, Tangila, tudi tuya ku buloba bua ku nôde tuakuholesha mutshima wanyi mu buloba bua ku nôde
Bualu bua nenusabuke Yadene bua kubuelamu ne bua kuhiana buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha; nenubuhiane, nenushikamemu

Kadi dî dia Nzambi diakalua kudi Shemaya, muntu wa Nzambi, ne, Wambile Lehabama, muana wa Solomo, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Benyamina bonso ne bantu badi bashala ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kanuyi bua kuluangana ne bana benu, Bena Isalele: muntu ne muntu ahingane ku nsubu kuandi, bualu ebu buakufuma anu kundi meme
Hashishe bakakuata mukelenge, bakaya n andi kudi mukelenge wa Babulona ku Libela; yeye wakamulumbuluishaku
Hashishe wakebesha ne, Atshi ntshivulukidi tshia nganyi tshindi ntangila
Nunku Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Monai, nenkengeshe mukelenge wa Babulona ne buloba buandi, bu munakukengesha mukelenge wa Ashû

Bakabaha misoko ya kunyemena, Shekeme wa ku mikuna ya Efelayima ne miaba ya ku mpenge; Gezê kabidi ne miaba ya ku mpenge, Yokemama ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Bete holona ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Ayalona ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Gata limona ne miaba ya ku mpenge; ne mu tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe, Anê ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Bilama ne miaba ya ku mpenge, kudi bakuabo ba mu meku a Bena Kohata
Nuvua badimuene nkayenu, muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, mubutule bantu, bavua batendelela mvidie Baale Peyore
Abigayila wakalela Amasa; tatu wa Amasa wakadi Yete, Muena Yishemaele
Bakamunyenga bintu biandi; bakatuma mutu wandi ne bintu biandi bia nvita mu buloba buonso bua Bena Peleshete bua kumanyishabo nzambi yabo ne bantu babo bonso lumu elu
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Muana wa muntu, ambila Yelushalema ne, Wewe udi buloba budi kabuyi bulengeshibue, budi nvula kayi mulokelehu mu dituku dia tshiji tshikole
Kuta mukanda wa dî dianyi dia tshimanyishilu mu muvungu, jadika diyisha dianyi mu mitshima ya bayidi banyi

Kings Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yehu, muana wa Hanani, bualu bua Bâsha ne, Bualu bua meme nakakubisha ha buloba, nakakusungula mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu banyi Bena Isalele, ne bua wewe wakalonda anu mu nshila wa Yalobama, wakenzesha bantu banyi Bena Isalele malu mabi, bua kunfuisha tshiji ne malu mabi abo; nunku meme nembutule Bâsha ne bonso ba mu nsubu wandi: nenvuishe ba mu nsubu webe bu munakenzela ba mu nsubu wa Yalobama, muana wa Nebata
Daniel Mu tshidimu tshisatu tshia bukokeshi bua Yehoyakima, mukelenge wa Yuda, Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakafika ku Yelushalema, wakautshintshimika
Mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne bisambombo tshia bukelenge bua Asa, mukelenge wa Yuda, Ela, muana wa Bâsha, wakabanga kukokesha Bena Isalele mu Tîsa; wakabakokesha bidimu bibidi

kwikala anyi bwa bangabanga, anyi bupeta Udi mweena Kongu, mmuntu yônso mweena bisamba bieena bantu ne maloba avwa mênza tshidi tshilwa Kongu mpindiewu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata mu tshikondo tshiakapeteka budikadidi
Bantu babidi badi bahita umue, bua bobo badi baheta difutu dimpe ku mudimu wabo

Minyinyi ya mu mai yakadi mu musulu bakafua, musulu wakamuha muhuya mubi, ne Bena Ejipitu kabakamanya mua kunua mai a mu musulu, mashi akadi mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, Bena bilengulengu ba mu Ejipitu bakenza muomumue ne manga abo, mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Abiyama, muan andi wa balume, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi

Bukokeshi bua Ahaba Mu tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne muanda mukulu tshia bukelenge bua Asa, mukelenge wa Yuda, Ahaba, muana wa Omeli, wakabanga kukokesha Bena Isalele; Ahaba, muana wa Omeli, wakakokesha Bena Isalele mu Samalea bidimu makumi abidi ne bibidi
Bualu bua Yehowa wakamona dikenga dia Bena Isalele ne diakadi dikole; kabakashala ne bantu mu nsubu anyi ku mbelu, kabakashila Bena Isalele mukuatshishi nansha
Pashishe bena Levi nebumuke, bambule ntenta wa kusambakena
Bikala bantu bakane makumi atanu mu musoko, wewe neûshihe, kuena usungila musoko bualu bua bantu bakane makumi atanu badimu, anyi
Yesu wakabakonka ne, Nuenu kanuakubala bualu buakenza Davidi, hakadiye ne nsala, yeye ne bakuabo bakadi n andi, anyi
Bualu bakaji abu, badi mua kumufikisha ku ditombokela Maweja Nangila
Simona wakakudimuna dî ne, Nundombele Mukelenge bua nasha bumue bua malu anuakuamba kabufiki kundi
Bualu bua bakakudimuka buakuidi, buakadiku mbua kukudimuna mikenshi kabidi
Kadi uleshe bana balume ba Bâzilai, Muena Gilada, luse: bobo bikale munkatshi mua badi badia ku mesa ebe; bualu bua bobo bakankuatshisha hanakanyema ku mpala kua muan enu Abashaloma
Bavua baluisha Kedorlayomere, mukalenga wa bena Elame, Tidale, mukalenga wa bena Ngoyime, Amrafele, mukalenga wa bena Babilone, ne Ariyoke, mukalenga wa bena Elazare
Mukelenge wa Sodoma wakambila Abalama ne, Umpe bantu, wewe wangate biuma
Bualu bua wakuanza kufunyina Nzambi ku disua diandi nganyi
Nunku Alona wakalua ha buihi ne tshioshelu, wakashihela kana ka ngombe ka mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi
Wakangambila kabidi ne, Muana wa muntu, itabusha mu mutshima webe mei anyi onso andualua kukuambila, ûnvua bimpe mu matshu ebe
Muntu yonsu asombe ku mbelu kuende
Nenukune biakudia mu madimi enu, kadi nebabidie amu kudi baluishi benu

Ne muanjelo muibidi wakela mpungi, ne kuakadi bu mukuna mimene mutemeshibue ne kahia wakedibua mu mai manene, ne tshituha tshisatu tshia mai manene tshiakalua mashi; ne tshituha tshisatu tshia bifukibue biakadi mu mai manene, biakadi ne muoyo mene, biakafua; ne tshituha tshisatu tshia matu tshiakabutudibua
Pashishe bena Levi nebafile ngombe mulume pamue ne mulambu wa bukula, busambakaja ne mafuta

Mu mukuna eu Yehowa wa misumba nealongoluele bantu bonso bidia bia disanka bia manyi, bidia bia disanka bia nvinyo muladike ndala, bia kudia bia manyi bisangisha ne buongo bua mu mifuba, bia nvinyo muladike ndala mulengeshibue bimpe
Yehowa wakahueka mu ditutu, wakimanahu n andi
Wakashiha mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne bana balume ba Alona bakamulesha mashi ne yeye wakâmiamina ku tshioshelu
Yeye wakakudimuna di ne, Wakamufua luse

Nuenu nuakunvua dî diakane Habo bantu ba kale ne, Kushihi muntu mukuabo; washiha muntu mukuabo nebamubande ku tshilumbuluidi; kadi meme ndi nuambila ne, Muntu yonso udi ne muan abo tshishi nebamubande ku tshilumbuluidi; muntu yonso wamhila muan abo ne, Laka, nebamubande kudi balumbuludi banene; muntu yonso wambila munga muntu ne, Wewe udi muhote, udi mua kukengeshibua mu Ngena wa kahia
Mu diba adi Danyele wakatumbisha Nzambi wa mu diulu
Muana wakakola, mamu andi wakalua n andi kudi muana wa bakashi wa Palo, yeye wakalua bu muana wandi mene
Mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye bakalekela bantu
Hashishe Yosefe wakambila bantu ne, Monai, nakunusumbila Palo lelu, nuenu ne buloba buenu ka maminu adi aha bua bualu buenu, nuakune mu buloba
Tumunuishe kabidi maluvu lelu
Bobo nebalonde ku nyima kua bonso ku mabendele abo
Biakuma muntu muhika wandi mulume anyi muhika wandi mukashi ne mulangala, ne biafueye mu tshianza tshiandi, nebamukengeshe bulelela
Dikenga disatu: tumue Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ambila Arone ne: tuuta dikombu panshi bua lupuishi luandamuke tumue mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu
Nudi bamanye nuwuaye muenze mu Ejipitu, ne mu tshipela
Hashishe kamanda wakasemena hehi, wakamukuata, wakamba bua kumusuikabo ne nkanu ibidi, wakabanga kubebesha ne, Udi nganyi
Hashishe Siba wakambila mukelenge ne, Muntu webe nênze malu onso akamuambila mukelenge wandi

Misambu Bakankengesha ku buana buanyi tô ne mpindiu Bakankengesha ku buana buanyi tô ne mpindiu, Bakadi badima ne lukasu lukoka kudi nyama bakendeshila lukasu ha nyima hanyi; Yehowa udi muakane; Bonso badi bakina Siona bafuishibue bundu, Bikale bu bisosa bibishe bidi bimena ha misaka ya nsubu, bidi munowi kayi ubiusha mu tshianza tshiandi, Badi bahita mu nshila kabidi kabena bamba ne, Misambu Ndi ndila kûdi, Yehowa, mu dijimba dia kanyinganyinga mundi mushikame
Nkanu ayi ivua ya kubueja mutshi bua kuambula tshilambuilu
Mbalanda watshi wakadi ne bule bua coudées makumi abidi ne butshiama bua coudées itanu; ne mbalanda wakatangilangana ne tshiendelu tshia mu lubanza
Bikalabo kabayi bitabusha bimanyinu ebi bibidi, kabayi bunvue dî diebe, wewe newangate mai a mu musulu, wele ha buloba bûme, ne mai awakangata mu musulu neakudimuke mashi ha buloba bûme
Binuahidia kunvua mei anyi bua malu a onso, binuampidia, meme nennuhidie kabidi, nengikale n enu tshiji nennukengeshe misangu muanda mutekete bualu bua mibi yenu
Bualu bua wewe neutangile buloba budi ku mpala kuebe; kadi kuena ubuela mu buloba bundi mpa Bena Isalele

Nunku newambile muntu wanyi Davidi ne, Yehowa wa mu diulu udi wamba ne, Nakakubikila mu mpangu ya mikoko hawakadi ulama mikoko, nakakuvuisha mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu banyi Bena Isalele; nakadi n ebe kuonso kuwakaya, nakashiha bena lukuna bebe bonso ku mpala kuebe; nenkuvuishe dina dinene bu mena a badi ne butumbi hanshi ha buloba
Meme nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe bu mitotu ya kulu

Tshisamba tshia bena Naftali tshivua ne meku aa: diku dia bena Yashiyele, ndelanganyi ya Yashiyele; dia bena Nguni, ndelanganyi ya Nguni; dia bena Yeshere, ndelanganyi ya Yeshere; dia bena Shileme, ndelanganyi ya Shileme
Hashishe, mukelenge wandi wakamubikila ne, Wewe udi muhika mubi, nakukulekela dibanza adi dionso, bualu bua wewe wakuntendekena; munyi wewe kabidi kufu muhika n ebe luse bu munakukufua wewe luse
Nakakubikila bua kungelela bantu badi n anyi lukuna mulau, ne mona, wewe wakubavudishila disanka
Bualu nuenu benze nanku, bintu bionsu binudi nunowa mu budimi abu, tumuma tua mvinyo ne bikunyibua bikuabu, nebishale bia tshijila bia Maweja Nangila
Wakajuka, wakadia, wakanua, wakaya mu bukole bua bidia abi tô minya ne matuku makumi anai tô ne ku Holeba, mukuna wa Nzambi
Mukalenga kuambila kabidi Yozefe ne: Meme ndi nshala mukalenga wa ditunga
Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Kanuikadi ne tshimanu munkatshi muenu

Eleazâ, muana wa Dodai, Muena Ahoa, wakamulonda, umue wa bena bukitu basatu bakadi n abo Davidi, hakafuna Bena Peleshete bulobo bakadi badisangisha bua kuluangana nvita, hakumuka Bena Isalele; yeye wakajuka, wakashiha Bena Peleshete tô ne bakateketa diboko diandi, ne tshianza tshiandi tshiakala mata tshilabi tshia muele wandi wa nvita: Yehowa wakabayuisha luhandu lunene dituku adi; bantu bakalonda ku nyima kuandi anu bua kuhaula bintu

Nebanutete mu ditunga dilaya Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, neanufikishe mu ditunga dimpe, didi ne tshitalela tshia mayi a misulu ne a mpokolu mivule, adi apatuka mu tshibandabanda, nansha mu mukuna
Hashishe, bayidi bandi bonso bakamushia, bakanyema
Meku onsu a bena Ngade aa avua ne bantu balume
Yeye udi musue kubuesha Bena Isalele mu bualu bubi bishi
Bakambilangana ne, Monai, muena bilota njowa ulua
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne
Mutuangaji alambule nyunyi umue bua mulambu wa kukobolola nawu muntu, nyunyi mukuabu bua mulambu wa kuosha
Nakanuambila nunku, kanuakangunvuila; kadi nuakadi ne budisu, nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, nuakadiyila ku mikuna
Nudi nukoleshe mitshima yenu bu muakakolesha Bena Ejipitu ne Palô mitshima yabo bualu kai

Nebashale ku mpala kua diba ne kua ngondo ne kua bintu bionso bia mu diulu, bintu biakanangabo ne biakakuatshilabo mudimu, ne biakalondabo ku nyima kuabi, ne biakatempabo n abi ne biakatendelelabo; kayena isangishibua kabidi, kabena bayijika kabidi, kadi nebayishiye hanshi ha buloba bu tunvi
Yeye wakenda mu nshila ya bakadi mu nsubu wa Ahaba; bualu bua mamu wandi wakamulombola mua kuenza malu mabi
Mu dituku dinudi nunyukula bintu, nenufile muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia

Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Hagai tshiakabidi mu dituku dia makumi abidi ne anai dia ngondo ne, Ambila Zelubabela, gouverneur wa mu Yuda, dî edi ne, Nkadi ha kuzakasha diulu ne buloba; nkadi ha kutokola nkuasa wa bunfumu, nkadi ha kubutula bukole bua makelenge a bisamba bia bantu, ne ha kutokola makalu a nvita ne badi bendamu; tubalu ne badi babanda ha nyima hatu nebikumibue hanshi, muntu ne muntu wa munkatshi muabo neahone hanshi ku muele wa nvita wa muan abo

Kadi munkatshi mua bisamba bia bungi bia bantu kamuakadi muikale mukelenge bu yeye, wakadi munangibue kudi Nzambi wandi, ne Nzambi wakamuvuisha mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele bonso; kadi bakashi ba bende bakamuenzesha yeye mene malu mabi
Ubapeshe buloba buvua tatuabu ne bua kupeta
Nebamanye ne, Ndi Mukelenge Yehowa
Wakenza ngabu ya or yakatulabo nkama isatu; bujitu bua or ya mu ngabu umue buakadi mines isatu; mukelenge wakayiteka nsubu wa ditu dia Lebanona
Tshidimu atshi, numulekele, aye ne bana bende kuabu

Hashishe Asa wakangata bintu bionso bia argent ne bia or biakadi bishale mu bibutshilu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne mu nsubu wa mukelenge, wakabifila mu bianza bia bantu bandi; mukelenge Asa wakabatuma kudi Bene hadada, muana wa Tabelimona, muana wa Hezeyona, mukelenge wa Sulia, wakadi ushikama mu Damaseke, bamba ne, Tshihungidi tshikale hankatshi hetu n ebe bu muakaditshi hankatshi ha tatu wanyi ne tatu webe; ndi nkutumina argent ne or; ya biebe, ushihe tshihungidi tshiwakahunga ne Bâsha, mukelenge wa Isalele, bua yeye Umuke kundi
Yozefe kuangata bana ba muikuluende Makire, muana wa Menashe, bu bende
Bu mu dî dia Alona ne bana bandi balume Bena Gêshona nebenze mudimu wabo, nebatuale majitu abo; nuenu nenubaleshe majitu abo
Bualu bua Bena Isalele bonso hakamana kuhunga dî bua kuhingisha mukelenge ku nsubu wandi
Ekesode Kujidila kua Ban a Bute Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Unjidile ban a bute bonso ba Bena Isalele, bonso badianjile kuledibua, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, bobo mbanyi

Bakakumibua mabue, bakakoshibua hankatshi ne nsele, bakateyibua, bakashihibua ne muele wa nvita, bakendakana baluate biseba bia mikoko ne biseba bia mbushi, bakengela bintu, bakengeshibua, benjibue bibi, bakadi ba ha buloba kabai babakanyine bendakana mu bihela ne mu mikuna ne mu nyongola ne mu mena a mu buloba
Yeye wakateka ngabu ne mafuma mu misoko yonso, wakayidika bikole
Nenuamue bualu bua nvita ne ngumu ya nvita; dimukai, kanuhampakanyi: malu au nealue bulelela, kadi nshikidilu kena muanze kulua

Wenze biebe bualu ebu: umushe bakelenge, muntu ne muntu mu muaba wandi, teka tupitene mu miaba yabo; usangishe masalayi bu muwakadi n au diambedi awakajimisha, tubalu bungi bumue, makalu bungi bumue; netuluangane n abo mu mpata, nembahite bukole bulelela
Nenufundehu mikenji ei hanuasabuka; nunku nenubuele mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, munulaye
Hashikisheye kulengesha muaba wa tshijila ne ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshioshelu, nealue ne mbushi udi ne muoyo
Kanulumbuluishi muntu tshilumbu ku bimuenu biandi, nulumbulule ne kulumbulula kuakane
Sara, mukaji wa mfumuanyi Abrahame, mmumulelele muana wa balume wa ku bukunda

Davidi ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi bimba ku mpala kua Yehowa biombelu bia mishindu yonso bienza bia mabaya a mitshi ya cyprès, bisanji ne nzenze ya nshinga dikumi ne mbau ne makasa ne biamu bia kukumangana
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne Mona, nenkûmushe ha buloba; tshidimu etshi neufue biebe, bualu bua wakuamba mei a kutombokela n au Yehowa
Nunku bakambila Yelemiya ne, Yehowa ikale mumanyi wa bushuwa ne utudi mua kueyemena, bua atuhishe bituikala katuyi benze dî dionso didi Yehowa Nzambi webe ututumina mukana muebe

Hashishe Abishai wakambila Davidi ne, Nzambi wakafila muena lukuna webe mu tshianza tshiebe lelu; ndi nkusengelela ne, Witabushe bua meme kumudia ne difuma diandi, dimusompoke kabidi anu tshikondo tshimue, tshiena mmutua tshikondo tshibidi
Biangata mulume mukashi wa muan abo mulume, ebu mbualu bubi, yeye wakavula muan abo mulume bilulu, bobo kabena balela bana tshiendelele
Bena Isalele bakakuatshila Egelona, mukelenge wa Moaba, mudimu bidimu dikumi ne muanda mukulu

Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, wakabikila bakuidi, wakabambila ne, Ambulai mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei; bakuidi muanda mutekete baye ne mpungi muanda mutekete ya nsengu ya bimpanga ku mpala kua mushete wa tshihungidi wa Yehowa
Bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila

Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Ebu mbualu buakamba Yehowa ne, Usangishe kuha kua Yehowa munkatshi muenu; muntu yonso udi witabusha mu mutshima wandi, alue biandi ne kuha kua Yehowa: ne or ne argent ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin ne miosa ya mbushi ne biseba bia bimpanga bitua mu mai makunze kunzû, ne biseba bia nkonge wa mu mai, ne mitshi ya acacia, ne manyi a mu muinda ne manananshi a kulengesha n au manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne manananshu adi atua dihembu dimpe, ne mabue a onyx, ne mabue makuabo adibo bateka mu efoda ne mu tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi
Ungambile, difutu diebe nedikale tshinyi
Nanku, utusumbe, usumbe kabidi ne madimi etu

Samuele Shaula Udi Utamba Bena Amona Bukole Nahasha, Muena Amona, wakalua, wakasa tshitudilu bua kuluangana ne musoko wa Yabesha gilada: bantu bonso ba mu Yabesha bakatumina Nahasha dî ne, Uhunge n etu tshihungidi, neakukuatshile mudimu
Bakamujika ku mukalu wa buhianyi buandi mu Timenatahelese, ku mikuna ya mu Efelayima, ku nôde kua mukuna wa Gasha
Bakelenge ba bantu ba mu bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele bakamueneka ku disangisha dia bantu ba Nzambi, bena nvita ba miele bakadi benda ku makasa binunu nkama inai
Kulelaye kabidi bankambua ba bena Yebusa, bena Amore, bena Ngirgashi, bena Ivi, bena Arki, bena Sini, bena Arvadi, bena Semari ne bena Amati
Yesu wakatshinguluka, wakamba ne, Bana bakashi ba Yelushalema, kanunjingi, nudijinge, nujinge bana benu
Kadi bana benu bena Levi nebanulamate, banuambuluisha

Halua muan abo ne muntu mufue bua kumuambula, yeye mene ngudi ne bua kuosha tshitalu tshiandi, ne hambeye kuhatula mifuba yandi ha mbelu, neakose munga muntu udi munda mua nsubu ne, Muntu mukuabo udi n ebe, anyi
Dielulula Mushindu wa kuluangana mvita Nuenu baye kuluangana mvita ne bantu badi ne tubalu, kabidi ne matempu a mvita, nansha ne baluishi bapite bena mvita benu ku bungi, kanubatshinyi to

Mukelenge wa Ashû wakaya ne Bena Isalele mu Ashû; wakabateka mu Halaha ne kukala kua musulu wa Habo mu Gozana ne mu misoko ya Bena Madai, bualu bua kabakatumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, kadi bakashiha tshihungidi tshiandi; bakabenga mikenji yonso yakabambila Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, kabakayunvua, kabakayenza
Diambedi Bena Sulia bakamuangalaka mu matunga, bakafuma ku buloba bua Isalele ne nsongakashi mukese bu muhika; yeye wakakuatshila mukashi wa Nâmana mudimu
Kusumayi bena Izrayele
Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Tentekashai milambu yenu ya kuosha ha kahia ha mutu ha milambu yenu mikuabo, nudie munyinyi wai
Nennanukile kukuata buakane buanyi ne tshiena mkulekela nansha
Yehowa neanumuangalashe munkatshi mua bantu bakuabo, nenuikale bantu bakehe munkatshi mua bisamba mudi Yehowa unutuma
Bikala mulambu wandi wa kuosha wa muana wa ngombe, neafile mulume udi kayi ne tshilema, neamushihele ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, ne Yehowa neamuitabushe
Bobo badi bakanda bantu dibaka, badi babelela mukenshi ne, Jilai bia kudia bikuabo, biakafuka Nzambi bua bantu badi ne ditabusha ne badi bamanye bualu bulelela badie ne kusakidila

Nengumushe difuka dia buhianyi buanyi didi dishale, nendifile mu bianza bia bantu badi n adi lukuna; bobo nebalue bambudibue ne bahaudibue kudi bena lukuna bonso; bualu bua bobo bakuenza malu mabi ku mesu kuanyi, bakunfuisha tshiji ku difuku dinakafuma ne bankambua babo mu Ejipitu tô ne ku dituku edi
Tshituha tshia buhianyi bua Yehowa mbantu bandi; Yakoba udi buhianyi buandi

Mukana mua bakashi ba bende mudi dijimba dile; Buhote budi busuikibue mu mutshima wa muana; Udi ukengesha muhele hua kuvudisha luhetu luandi, Teleja matshu ebe, unvue mei a bena meji, Bualu bua newikale ne disanka, biwâlama munda muebe, Bua dieyemena diebe dikale mu Yehowa, Tshiena muanze kukuindila bua kukujadikila mei a bushuwa, Kunyengi bintu bia muhele bualu bua buhele buandi, Bualu bua Yehowa neabalumbuluile tshilumbu tshiabo, Kukuatshi bulunda ne muntu utu wakuata tshiji, bua wewe kuibididi mu nshila idiye wenda, Kuikadi munkatshi mua badi batutangana bianza bua kuhunga dî, Bualu bua biwikala kuyi ne tshintu tshia kumufuta n atshi, Kumushi mukalu wa kale Udi utangila muntu udi wenza mudimu wandi ne lungenyi, anyi
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Yotama ne nvita yandi yonso ne malu akenzeye bidi bifundibue mu mukanda wa bakelenge ba Isalele ne ba Yuda
Bualu bua Bena Edome bakadi balue kabidi, bakadi babutule Bena Yuda, bakadi baye ne bakuabo babo mu buhika
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanutengule mu mitshima yenu ne ya bana benu, bua nuenu kunanga Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso, bua nuenu kuikala ne muoyo
Bana balume ba Elifaza: Temana ne Omâ, Sefi ne Gatama, Kenaza ne Timena ne Amaleka

Tshiji tshiebe tshikole tshiakuhita ha mutu hanyi; Biakunyunguluka bu mai mavulangane dinda tô ne ku dilolo, Wewe wakumusha muntu udi unnanga ne mulunda wanyi kundi, Psalms Nengimbe bua luse lujalame lua Yehowa kashidi; Bualu bua nakuamba ne, Luse luebe lujalame neluibakibue tshiendelele; Nakuhunga tshihungidi ne muntu unakusungula, Nenjadike tunkanunuma tuebe tshiendelele, Yehowa, bia mu diulu nebitumbishe malu ebe a kukema; Nganyi udi mu diulu udi mua kuelekeshibua ne Yehowa
Wakakuma tshilulu tshikudika ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunzu kunzû ne bua lin muimpe; bakenzamu bifuanyikishi bia bakeluba
Chronicles Amasaya wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi abidi ne tshitema; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Yehoadana wa mu Yelushalema
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Yehoyakima ne malu a bundu akenzeye ne akadi munda muandi bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa bakelenge ba Isalele ne ba Yuda; Yehoyakina muan andi wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Nudi bamanye mua kunua luhanza lundi nua, anyi
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mulau ha mutu ha mulau
Ne tshimue tshia bifukibue binai bidi ne muoyo tshiakahesha banjelo muanda mutekete mpanza ya ngolo muanda mutekete miûle tente ne tshishi tshia Nzambi udi ne muoyo tshiendelele

Ishi boshete, muana wa Shaula, wakadi ne bantu bahidi bakadi tupitene tua masalayi andi; dina dia mukuabo diakadi Bana, ne dina dia mukuabo Lekaba, bana balume ba Limona, Muena Bêlota, wa mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina bualu bua Bêlota udi wa tshisamba tshia Benyamina; diambedi Bena Belota bakanyemena mu Gitayima, bakashikamamu kale tô ne katataka
Monai, bualu ebu mene bua kunyingalashibua kuenu bu mudi Nzambi musue, buakenzesha disuminyina munda muenu, ne didibingisha, ne difika munda, ne ditshina, ne dijinga, ne lukunukunu, ne disombuela
Muoyo wakabahua bua kuangata mitanda ya bidia; bakadi mu buatu anu ne mutanda umue
Nansha, bana banyi, mutshima wanyi udi utamba kunyingalala bualu buenu, bualu bua Yehowa wakateka tshianza tshiandi kundi
Nuoshe mpingu ya mvidie yabu yonsu
Hashikisheye kubambila nunku, bantu bakane nebamukonke ne, Mukelenge, dituku kai dituakakutangila ne nsala, tuakudisha
Hatshidibo ne mubaki wa mukashi, kabena bamanye mua kujila bia kudia
Ke milambu ivua bamfumu ba bena Izrayele bafile bua kujidila tshilambuilu, batuangaji bamane kutshilaba manyi
Ahimasa wakakudimuna ne, Hakatuma Yoaba muntu webe kûdi, nakunvua diyoyo dinene, kadi tshiakamanya muakadi bualu

Yonatana ne Ahimasa bakadi bashikama mu Ene logela, ne muena mudimu mukashi wakaya kubambila, ne bobo bakaya, bakambila mukelenge Davidi; bualu bua bobo kabakamanya mua kubuela mu musoko ku mesu kua bantu
Yeye wakasa bioshelu mu nsubu wa Yehowa, muakadi Yehowa wamba ne, Dina dianyi nedikale mu Yelushalema tshiendelele
Nakunyenga nyama wa mpunda wa nganyi
Meme nengumushe mesu anyi kunudi, nenuhone ku mpala kua bantu badi n enu lukuna, bantu badi n enu lukuna nebanukokeshe, nenunyeme tshianana, bantu kabayi banze ku nuihata
Nanku, ku batentekedi bonsu bavua Moshe mutume, anu Yoshuwa ne Kalebe ke bavua bashale ne muoyi
Nuhehe mu tshibunda tshianyi bua muhuya wa manananshi anyi uhatuke
Buatu abu buikale ne mushiku ku luseka
Bakashiha bakadi badianjila kuamba diambedi ne, Muakane ulualua; katataka nuenu nuakulua bamutungidi bandi ne bamushihi; nuenu bakangata mikenshi ya Mose mihebue kudi banjelo, kanuakatumikila
Kadi Nzambi wakabalombola mu nshila wa ku tshihela hehi ne Dishiba Dikunze Bena Isalele bakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne bintu bia nvita
Muanjelo wakamuandamuna ne, Ndi bianyi Gabaliele, ntu ngimana ku mesu kua Nzambi; nakutumibua bua kuakula n ebe ne bua kukuluila ne lumu luimpe
Mu bualu ebu tudi bamanye nyuma wa bulelela, ne nyuma wa mashimi

Mukelenge wakamuandamuna ne, Mâta, Mâta, wewe udi utamba kuela meshi a malu a bungi adi akutatshisha; tudi anu ne tshintu tshimue bualu; Malia wakusungula luseke ludi luimpe, kabena bamanye mua kumunyengalu
Bana balume ba Dishana: Usa ne Alana
Nanku, usengelele Maweja Nangila
Nunku tuetu tudi tuamba kudivuishila dikenga dinene
Kumunyengabu ditunga diende dijima, bituadije ku musulu wa Amone kuinshi, too ne ku musulu wa Yaboke ku mutu, too ne ku mikalu mikolesha ya bena Amone, luseke ludi diba dipatukila
Bakamukuata ku tshianza, bakamulombola ku Aleopago, bakamukonka ne, Tumanye bietu diyisha edi dihia dihia diudi wamba, anyi

Yeye nealue n ai kudi muakuidi, neafile mulambu wa kubindila n au bubi diambedi, neanyengabashe nshingu wandi kadi kena umuhandulula nansha, neamiamine mashi makuabo a mulambu wa kubuikala n au bubi ku luseke lua tshioshelu, ne mashi makuabo yeye neahongolole ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu, tshintu etshi mmulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi

Bana ba Benyamina ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita; bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina binunu makumi asatu ne bitanu ne nkama mai

Nunku Mukelenge, Yehowa wa misumba mene, Munya wa Bena Isalele newandamuke kahia, Yeye neavingutule butumbi bua ditu diandi Mitshi itshidi ishala ne muoyo mu ditu diandi neyikale anu Mu dituku adi difuka dikese dia ba mu Isalele ne ba mu bana ba Yakoba badi bahanduka ku lufu, kabena beyemena muntu wakabakuma, kadi nebeyemene Yehowa, Wa Tshijila wa Isalele, mu bushuwa
Nkata yakadi ne tukanu, ne hanakayimona, ekumona, nkata yonso inai yakadi ne mesu nseke yonso
Acts Bapostolo ne bana babo ba mu Kilisto bakadi mu Yudaya bakunvua ne, Bisamba bia bende kabidi biakuangata dî dia Nzambi
Mu matuku au hanuakonkangana ne, Yehowa Nzambi wetu wakutuenzela malu â onso bua tshinyi
Meme nakadiangatshila bana benu, Bena Lewi, munkatshi mua Bena Isalele badi bu kuha kuebe kuwakuha Yehowa bua kuenza mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Bena tshisamba tshia Binyamine kulonda, babalombola kudi Abidane, muana wa Ngideyoni
Biamu bikunze bivua bena Izrayele balambule bivua kilo
Yeye wakabambila ne, Kanukemi; nudi nukeba Yesu Muena Nazaleta, wakashihabo ku mutshi mutshiamakane; yeye wakubika ku lufu; kena munemu; monai muaba wakadibo bamuladike
Nutshienzele anu muaba wikalaye musungule
Bulelela, meme ndi bu muena tshiota tshienu, kadi mukuabo udiku udi untamba meme kuikala wa ha buihi ne tshiota mene

Muntu wakuhetula mikenshi ya Mose udi ufua, kai mufuidibue luse, ku dî dia bamanyi babidi anyi basatu; nudi nuela meshi ne muntu neabadibue muakanyine dikenga ditambe misangu bungi munyi, nyeye wakudiata Muana wa Nzambi munshi mua makasa andi, ne wakubala mashi a tshihungidi akadiye ujidibua n au bu tshintu tshia tshianana ne wakuhenda Nyuma wa ngasa
Bana ba Halima tshinunu ne dikumi ne muanda mutekete
Nakunvua lumu luebe ne, Nyuma wa nzambi udi munda muebe, ne munya, ne dijingulula dia malu ne meji mahite bulengele bidi bimueneka munda muebe
Tuakahaula bintu ku luseke lua Sude lua Bena Kelete ne lua Bena Yuda ne lua Kaleba; luakosha Sikelaga ne kahia

Bantu bakabalabo bakadi ku kulondolola kuabo kua bakuidi ba mu nsubu ya batatu babo ne Bena Lewi ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu ha bidimu ebi mu midimu yabo; ne bantu bakuabo bakabalabo bakadi ku kulondolola kuabo, bana bakese bonso, ne bakashi, ne bana balume ne bana bakashi, ba mu tshisumbu tshiabo tshionso; bualu bua bobo bakadijidila mu mudimu wabo wa tshijila
Lelu nenujadike ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, udi wenda kumpala kuenu

Diambedi mikuna kayiyi mianze kumueneka, Wewe udi uhingasha bantu mu dinfuenkenya kabidi, Bualu bua bidimu tshinunu bidi ku mesu kuebe Wewe udi ubumusha bu muakadi mai mûla ahueka n abo; Adi adiunda bimpe ne dinda, adi akola; Bualu bua tuakushidishibua mu tshiji tshiebe, Wewe wakuteka malu mabi etu ku mpala kuebe, Bualu bua matuku etu onso adi ajimina bualu bua tshiji tshiebe; Matuku a mu bidimu bietu adi akumbana bu bidimu makumi muanda mutekete; Udi mumanye bukole bua tshiji tshiebe nganyi
Bakela mukenji bua bantu bajile bia kudia, bakashikika Nabota munkatshi mua bantu banene
Unvua dî dia muadi wanyi, Yehowa, mu dinda neunvue di dianyi; Bualu bua wewe kuena Nzambi udi usanka mu malu mabi; Bantu badi bafunafuna kabena bamanye mua kuimana ku mesu kuebe
Nunku Simona Petelo wakamuloba, wakamuambila ne, Utuambile udiye wamba

Hakamanabo kufila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, Yehu wakambila balami ne tupitene ne, Buelai, nubashihe, nansha umue kahatuki, Bakabashiha ku miele ya nvita; balami ne tupitene bakabimasha ha mbelu, bakabuela mu musoko muakadi nsubu wa Bâla
Wakafunda ha mabue â mikenji ya Mose, yakafundeye ku mpala kua Bena Isalele
Bakuabo nebele nkila ku mutu kua Tshibanda tshia Abalima bua kutshijibika, ne mu muaba wawa nebajike Gogo ne tshisumbu tshiandi tshionso tshia bantu; nebaubikile ne, Tshibanda tshia Hamona Gogo

Yehowa wakamba ne, Umuidike dina ne, Kambantu banyi Kadi bungi bua Bena Isalele nebuikale bu nsenga ya ku mai manene, idibo kabayi mua kuidikisha anyi kubala; ne mu muaba wakadibo bamba ne, Kanuena bantu banyi, nebabambile ne, Nudi bana balume ba Nzambi wa muoyo
Wakuasa tshibunda tshile ku mbangilu wa nshila yonso, wakuvuisha bulengele buebe bu tshintu tshia bundu, wakufila mubidi webe kudi muntu yonso wakadi uhita mu nshila ne wakuvudisha masandi ebe
Kanuedianganyi meshi ne, Nakuluila bua kushiha mikenshi ya Mose ne mei a baprofete; tshiakuluila bua kubishiha, nakuluila bua kubishikisha
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Tangilai, nennutumine makenga bua bienzedi bienu

Kadi mu malu onso tudi tudimanyisha bu bena mudimu ba Nzambi, mu ditantamana dia bungi, ne mu makenga, ne mu malu adi atukolela, ne mu tunyinganyinga; ne mu mibundabunda, ne mu nsubu ya lukanu, ne mu mayoyo, ne mu midimu mikole, ne mu kutentekela, ne mu kujila kua bia kudia; ne mu butoke bua mitshima, ne mu lungenyi, ne mu lutulu, ne mu luse, ne mu Nyuma Muimpe, ne mu dinanga didi kadi ne lubombo; ne mu dî dia bushua, ne mu bukole bua Nzambi; ne ku bintu bia nvita bia buakane bikuata ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku tshianza tshia bakashi, ku butumbi ne mu dihetula, ku lumu lubi ne ku lumu luimpe; bu bena mashimi, kadi tudi bena mei malelela; bu bantu badi kabai bamanyibua, kadi tudi bamanyibua bimpe; bu bantu bafuafua, kadi monai, tudi ne muoyo; bu bakengeshibua, kadi katuena tushihibua; bu badi ne kanyinganyinga ka mutshima, kadi tutu tuasanka misangu yonso; bu bahele, kadi tudi tuvuisha ba bungi babanshi; bu badi kabai ne bintu, kadi tudi ne bintu bionso
Bakuidi ne baprofete ne bantu bonso bakunvua Yelemiya wamba mei â mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Kakuena muntu udi mua kujadika bishimikidi bikuabo, anu biobio biakamana kujadikibua, bidi Yesu Kilisto mene
Wewe wakahandulula mai ku mpala kuabo, nunku bakahita munkatshi mua mai manene ha buloba bume; wakela bakadi babalonda mu bunene bua mai bu mudibo bela dibue mu mai manene
Nunku ndi nkankamana mu malu makole onso bua muanda wa bantu basungula, bua bobo bangate luhandu lua mu Kilisto Yesu ne butumbi bua tshiendelele
Milonda yonso ya mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne mu luhangu lua muaba wa kutendelela yakadi ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Nennuele mikete mihi ya tshiole, ya dibutula mene, indi ntuma bua kunubutula
Butumbi buenu, Bena Isalele, buakashihibua ha mutu ha mikuna
Kadi buakane bua ku ditabusha budi buamba nunku ne, Kudiambi munda muebe ne, Wabanda mu diulu nganyi
Hakashikisha Yehowa kusangana ne Abalahama yeye wakaya biandi ne Abalahama wakahingana kuandi
Nennumushe ku midimu mikole inudi nuenzela bena Ejipitu
Kuedi manyi au ham bidi ha bantu, kabena manyi mafuanangane n au, wowo adi a tshijima, neikale a tshijila kunudi
Musambu wa Solomo Wewe muana wa mukelenge, makasa ebe adi atamba bulengele mu bisabata
Bakaya kudi Yoshua mu tshitudilu ku Gilegala, bakamuambila ne Bena Isalele bonso ne, Tuetu tuakufuma kule ku buloba bukuabo, nunku nuhunge n etu tshihungidi
Basatu badiku badi bamanyisha, Nyuma ne mai ne mashi: basatu aba badi bamanyisha bualu bumue
Unkoke; netukulonde lukasa
Kadi bakuabo bakamba ne, Yeye udi umusha bademon mu dina dia Belezebula, mukelenge wa bademon
Tshiakadi ne madidishi nseke yonso ya munda muatshi
Gideona, muana wa Yoasha, wakalua mufume ku nvita ku mukuna wa Helese
Meme kushala muaba awu matuku makuabu makumi anayi a munya ne butuku, tshiyi mua kudia nansha kunua

Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu, uvua mutuambuluishe bua kukuata bimenga bionsu bivua pankatshi pa tshimenga tshia Aroyere, tshidi pabuipi ne musulu wa Amone, ne tshimenga tshikuabu tshidi mu tshibandabanda tshine atshi, too ne ku ditunga dia Ngilaade
Nunku tuakalamba muan anyi wa balume mu mai a kahia, tuakamudia; hakatshiabu, nakamuambila ne, Ufile muan ebe wa balume, tumudie; kadi yeye wakasokoka muan andi wa balume
Nanku padi bena Izrayele balambula Maweja Nangila milambu ya bobumue ya ngombe, mikoku nansha mbuji, batuangaji nebapete diboku, mbanga ne tshifu
Wakasaku ne mifuba ya Shaula ne ya Yonatana muan andi mulume; bakayisangisha ne mifuba ya bantu bakowabo

Biakulenduisha disu diebe, wadimasha; bua wewe kubuela mu bukelenge bua Nzambi ne disu dimue kudi kutamba bua wewe kuimashibua mu Ngena ne mesu abidi; amu tshikusu tshiabo katshiena tshitua, kahia kakena kajima
Hakashikisha Yelemiya kuamba mei onso akamuambila Yehowa bua kuambileye bonso, bakuidi ne baprofete ne bantu bonso bakamukuata, bamba ne, Wewe neufue bulelela
Udi mumanye ne, Yeye neikale muena meji anyi muhote nganyi
Ebi bidi mei mafunda ne mei majalame ne mikenji biakela Yehowa hankatshi handi ne Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai
Hamana wakambila mukashi wandi Zeleshe ne balunda bandi bualu buonso buakamukuata
Ndi nkuambila ne, Kuena uluhukamu tô ne hawafuta dibanza dionso, nasha kakuta kakese kushala
Bualu ebu buwakatuenzela budi tshinyi
Hakasangana Yesu muana wa mpunda, wakashikama ha nyima handi, bu muakafundabo ne, Muana mukashi wa Siona, kutshinyi; mona, Mukelenge webe ulualua mushikame ha nyima ha muana wa mpunda
Dina dia muana muibidi divua Yoktana
Bienzedi bia Uziya bikuabo ne malu onso biakenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ha Yuda, anyi
Bobo bakaya, bakambila bakuabo bualu ebu; kudi kabakitabusha dî diabo
Ya biebe, ubambile ne, Hinganai bienu ku ntenta yenu
Kadi, tangilai, tshianza tshia udi untungila tshitungu tshidi n anyi ha mesa
Mukelenge, luse luebe lujalame luwakadi n alu diambedi, Mukelenge, uvuluke bihendu bidibo bahenda n abi bantu bebe

Bualu bua wakadi ne anu bintu bikese tshiyi muanze kulua kunoko mpindiu biakuvulangana tshisumbu tshinene, Yehowa wakukusankisha wewe bua malu onso anakukuenzela, ne katataka meme nengenze mudimu tshikondo kai bua kukumbasha bia ba mu nsubu wanyi kabidi

Hakumuka bakuidi mu muaba wa tshijila, ditutu diakûsha nsubu wa Yehowa tente, nunku bakuidi kabakamanya mua kuenza midimu yabo bualu bua ditutu edi; bualu bua butumbi bua Yehowa buakûsha nsubu wa Yehowa tente
Hakadi Yesu ubambila mei â, mukelenge wa nsunagoga wakalua, wakamukukuila ne, Muan anyi mukashi ukadi mufue; kadi ulue biebe, umulenge tshianza tshiebe, neikale ne muoyo
Nenufile tshituha tshia bintu bienu bionso bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa nenufile bintu bidi bitamba buimpe, bintu bia tshijila mene
Bakalua kudiye, bakamukuata ku makasa, bakamukukuila
Mvidi Mukulu kuambila Abrahame kabidi ne: Wewe ne ndelanganyi yebe yonsu nulame ndondu ewu
Biamanyeye mua kuluangana n anyi ne bua kunshiha, nunku tuetu netuikale bahika benu; kadi binamuhita bukole, binamushiha, nunku nuenu nenuikale bahika betu, nenutukuatshile mudimu
Hakatshidiye wambila bisumbu bia bantu mei andi, mamu andi ne bana babo bakadi bimane ha mbelu, bakeba kumuambila dî
Ukavua musue kunubutula
Hashishe Hezikiya wakambila Yeshaya ne, Dî edi dia Yehowa diwakungambila didi dimpe
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba dî edi
Yeye wakanyema ne bintu bionso biaka diye n abi, wakabika, wakasabuka musulu wa Pelata, wakabisha luendu bua kuya ku mukuna wa Gilada
Mose mene wakamba ne, Mukelenge Nzambi neanubishile muprofete wa munkatshi mua bana benu, bu muakambisheye meme; nenutumikile mei andi onso anuambileye

Bua muanda eu baminyampala bonso bakatuma Yehuda, muana wa Netaniya, muana wa Shelemeya, muana wa Kushi, kudi Baluka, bamba ne, Angata mukanda uwakubala mu matshu a bantu mu tshianza tshiebe, ulue kutudi

Bakudima kuyaya dîba Kuyaya kumpengelela kwadi Bilumbu ni bya salala bya ya Ngondu wa kubanda mulundingu Mukàjì mufwà bintu bibombe Maman Ndimi Ngoyi Maman Colonel Yaye lele yaye lele Ngimba ne Mulume Mutombo ee Ngimba ne Ange Kayembe ee Ngimba ne Ngalula Waba Milolo ee Ngimba ne Yaya Sangye e Ngimba ne Mputu wa ba Ntumba ee Tangila Kabeya Ndombie Twayi lona, lekelayi mwadi Balongeshi bakalukanyia Simon Kabila lekela we Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi ee Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi ee Bakulumpa bakadima kwěpì Bakadima kuyaya dîba Kuyaya kumpengelela kwànyì Bulumbu ni byà salala bya ya Ngondu wa kubanda mulundingu Mukàjì mufwa bintu bibombe Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Maestro
Shama, muana wa Age, Muena Halala, wakamulonda
Bualu ebu buakenjibua
Gala, muana wa Ebede, wakamba ne, Abimeleke udi nganyi, ne Shekeme udi nganyi, bua tuetu kumukuatshia mudimu

Tuteke tshilejilu tshikuabu: Padi muntu ulenga tshintu kampande tshidi ne mikiya kayi mumanye, bu mudi nyama wa tshisuku mufue, tshimuna nansha tshilandadi tshifue, muntu awu mmuena tshibawu, udi ne mikiya

Nakunvua dî dikuabo difuma mu diulu diamba ne, Bantu banyi, nuluhuke munkatshi muandi, bua nuenu kanuikadi ne buobumue n andi mu malu mabi andi, bua kanuangatshi makenga andi, bualu bua malu andi mabi akalungakana tô ne mu diulu, ne Nzambi wakuvuluka bienzedi biandi bibi
Amona, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Hakamoneye mutshi wa nfigi kukala kua nshila, wakaluaku, wakasangana mutshi mutuhu, anu mabeshi; yeye wakambila mutshi ne, Wewe kukuami mamuma tshiendelele

Yehowa wakambila Yehu ne, Bualu bua wewe wakuenza malu akadi mimpe ku mesu kuanyi, wakuenzela ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba malu anakasungula mu mutshima wanyi, nunku bana bebe ba balume nebashikame mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Isalele tô ne ku bikondo binai
Esau wakamba ne, Abu akadi ha kufua, ne bintu bia buan a bute nebinsankishe kudi kunyi
Dituku dikuabo hakadisangisha bana balume ba Nzambi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Satana kabidi wakamueneka munkatshi muabo, Yehowa wakakonka Satana ne, Udi ufuma kudi kunyi
Yeye wakela mpungi, bantu bonso bakumuka ku musoko, bakaya muntu ne muntu ku ntenta wandi
Manoa wakambila mukashi wandi ne, Netufue bulelela, bualu bua tuakumona Nzambi
Wewe udi wamba ne, Kanuibi, udi wiba, anyi

Yeye wakavungulula mukanda, wakamona muaba wakafundabo ne, Nyuma wa Nzambi udi ham bidi hanyi, Bualu bua yeye wakangela manyi ha mutu ne, Ambila bantu bahele lumu luimpe; Ambila bantu bualu bua tshidimu tshiakitabusha Mukelenge
Maweja Nangila uvua wakula ne Moshe bitangilangane bu muntu wakula ne mulunda wende
Badi baluata bilulu binefuke batu bikala mu nsubu ya banfumu
Udi ne bintu nebamuhe binga bintu, neikale ne bia bungi; udi kai ne tshintu nebamunyenge tshidiye n atshi
Yeye wakabatendekena bikole, bobo bakaya n andi bakabuela mu nsubu wandi, yeye wakabalambishila bintu bia bungi ne bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene ne bobo bakabidia
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakufuma hanshi, meme nakufuma mulu; nuenu nudi ba ha buloba ebu, meme tshiena wa ha buloba ebu
Tuetu netununvuile bua nuenu nuenze bualu ebu bubi bunene buonso ku mesu kua Nzambi wetu bua kubaka bakashi ba bende, anyi
Mukuabo wakamba ne, Nakûla ngombe dikumi, ibidi ku mutshi wa tshikokedi ibidi ku mutshi wa tshikokedi, nenye kuiteta
Solomo wakadi ne budimi bua tumuma tukese mu Bâla hamona, yeye wakafila budimi ebu mu bianza bia balami; muntu ne muntu wakadi ne bua kumufila tshinunu tshia biamu bia argent ku mamuma abu
Dinanga diabo ne lukinu luabo ne mukau wabo biakajimina kale; kabena ne bualu bukuabo tshiendelele mu malu onso adi enjibua muinshi mua diba

Mukalu wabo wakadi ku Yizelele ne Kesulota ne Shunema, ne Hafa layima ne Sidona ne Anahalata, ne Labita ne Kishiona ne Ebese ne Lemeta ne Ene ganima ne Ene hada ne Bete pasesa, ne mukalu wakafika ku Tabô ne Shahasuma ne Bete shemeshe; mukalu wakahatukila ku Yadene; bimenga dikumi ne bisambombo ne misoko yabi
Palo wakambila Yosefe ne, Mu tshiota tshanyi nakamona meme muimane kukala kuamusulu, nakamona ngombe muanda mutekete yakadi ne manyi a bungi, yakabanda mu mai, yakadia mashinde malehe

Hahatukabo bua kubuela mu tshiendelu tshia ha bule, bua kusangakena ne bantu bakuabo, bavule bivualu bidibo baluata bakuatabo mudimu mu ntempelo, babiteke mu nsubu yaya ya tshijila; baluate bivualu bikuabo, bua kabavuishi bantu bakuabo bu ba tshijila ku bivualu biabo
Nunku bakatahulula buloba munkatshi muabo, bobo bakayamu
Bana ba balume ba Hela bakadi Selete, Yisheâ ne Etenana

Wakabambila ne, Nuenu nudi bamanye ne, Bualu bua Muena Yuda kusomba ne muntu wa tshisamba tshikuabo anyi kulueye ha buihi n andi budi tshijila; kadi Nzambi wakundesha ne, Kubikidi muntu mukuabo ne, Ngua tshianana, anyi ngua tshijila; ebu mbualu bunakuluila; hakumbikilabo, tshiakuela mpata
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi biafileye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neabake mukashi au
Rakele ulela, kushala ukengakana ne lufu
Makenga onsu aa neanuenzekele bua kunubela, nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu

Mukelenge wakabuela mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne bantu bonso ba mu Yuda ne bonso ba mu Yelushalema bakadi n andi, ne bakuidi ne baprofete ne bantu bonso, ne bakese ne banene; yeye wakababadila mei onso a mu mukanda wa tshihungidi wakasanganabo mu nsubu wa Yehowa mu matshu abo

Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi tshipeepeja bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene anyi bwa umwe wa ku beena Bukalenga bunene pa disungula dia mukanda wa dianyisha anyi dia mukanda wa didiombola
Nenku bidimu bionsu binudi mu bupika mu ditunga dia baluishi benu, ditunga dienu dinuvua bashiye nedipete dikisha, bilondeshile bungi bua bikondu binuvua kanuyi bikishisha buloba
Hakamona Bena Amona ne, Bena Sulia badi banyema, bobo kabidi bakanyema ku mpala kua Abishai, muan abo ne Yoaba, bakabuela mu musoko
Ngasa wa Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto ikale ne buonso buenu
Nenuendakane munda munya, nubabata bintu bu mpofu
Hakafikeye kudi mukelenge, yeye wakamuebesha ne, Mikaya, tuye kuluangana ne Bena Lamota gilada, anyi tushale
Nunku Yehowa wakadi ne Bena Isalele tshiji tshikole, wakabumusha ku mesu kuandi; anu tshisamba tshia Yuda nkayatshi tshiakashala
Menahema wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi; Pekaya, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi

Kanuena mua kudia nyunyi eyi to: tshiminyi, mukanku, kabemba ka mvulu, ntuba, nansha nyunyi idi mifuane mukanku, tshikololu, kasonga nyunyi, mfiondu, mukuekue, nansha nyunyi idi mifuane kabemba, tshipungulu, tshiowa, kakutukutu, mukute, kakololu, nkumbikumbi, kalama ngomba, kasongu mule, miena kasuba, nansha mudima
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamueneka kudiye, wakamuambila ne, Yehowa udi n ebe, wewe muntu mukole wa bukitu

Yehowa wakambila Ahiya ne, Tangila, mukashi wa Yalobama ulualua kukuebesha bualu bua muan andi; bualu bua yeye udi usama; nunku umuambile mei kampanda; bualu bua habueleye kudi, yeye neadifuanyikishe bu mukashi mukuabo
Bansongalume dikumi bakadi batuala bintu bia nvita bia Yoaba, bakela Abashaloma munkatshi, bakamuasa, bakamushiha
Dina dia mukashi wa Abishû diakadi Abihayila; yeye wakamulelela Abana ne Moliya
Nunku nakela mukenji ne, Balue ne bena meji bonso ba mu Babulona ku mpala kuanyi, bua bobo bamanye mua kummanyisha dijingulula dia tshilota tshianyi
Nunku bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bakadijidila bua kuluabo ne mushete wa Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele

Ba mu Mademana bakumana kunyema; Dituku edi mene neatule ku Nobo, Monai, Mukelenge, Yehowa wa misumba, Yeye neatahe bihuka ne tshisui tshia tshiamu tshifike, Isaiah Lutonga nelutoloke ku tshikuku tshia Yishai, Nyuma wa Yehowa neashikame ham bidi handi, Disanka diandi nedikale mu dinemeka diandi dia Yehowa
Kadi bikala muntu kai usubula badi bandi ne ba mu nsubu muandi mene, yeye wakadiula ditabusha diandi ne udi mutambe muntu udi uhidia kuitabusha bubi
Bakumuka mu Alusha bakashikama mu Lefidima, ne bantu kabakadi ne mai a kunua
Yelemiya wakakonka mukelenge Sedekiya kabidi ne, Nakukuenzela bualu bubi kai, nakuenzela bena mudimu bebe anyi bantu aba bubi kai, bua nuakumbuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu
Bantu bonso bakadisangisha kudi Shaula mu Gilegala
Bukole buanyi budi bu bua mabue, anyi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ulue biebe ne tshisamba tshia Lewi, ubateke ku mpala kua Alona muakuidi, bua bobo bamuenzele mudimu
Kadi buakane bua ka ditabusha budi buamba tshinyi
Binuitabusha, nenuangate bintu bionso binualomba mu kutendelela kuenu
Nunku Yoaba wakajuka, wakaya ku Geshû, wakahingana ne Abashaloma ku Yelushalema
Ku nyima kuandi Hananya, muana wa Shelemeya, ne Hanuna, muana muisambombo wa Salafa, bakalongolola tshituha tshikuabo
Ira kupingana kudi Yuda, umuambila ne: Tshiena musangane mukaji awu to
Nenushikame munkatshi muetu, buloba nebuikale ku mpala kuenu, nuikalemu, nuendulukemu mushinga, nuangatemu bintu
Yoshua wakambila balume babidi bakaya kutentekela buloba ne, Yai bienu mu nsubu wa mukashi au muena tshiendenda, nulue ne mukashi ne bintu bionso bidiye n abi, bu munu akadi tshiha kudiye
Yehowa wakabenga bonso ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele, wakabakengesha, wakabafila mu bianza bia bahaudi, tô ne hakabumusheye ku mesu kuandi

Mukenji wa Mikau Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bikala mukashi wa muntu usesuka, bikaleye umuenzela bibi, bikala mulume mukuabo ulala n andi, bikala bualu ebu busokoma ku mesu kua mulume wandi, kabuyi bumanyibue, bikala mukashi muonyibue ne kakuyi mumonyi wa bualu, kabayi bamukuata hakadiye wenda n andi, ne bikala mukau mumukuate bualu bua mukashi wandi udi muonyibue anyi bikala mukau umukuata bualu bua mukashi wandi udi kayi muonyibue, hashishe mulume alue biandi ne mukashi wandi kudi muakuidi, nealue ne mulambu wandi, tshituha tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu tshia bukula bua orge, kedihu nansha manyi, katekihu nansha musenga wa manananshi, bualu bua eu udi mulambu wa mukau, mulambu wa bukula wa tshivulukidi, bua kuvuluishangana bualu bubi
Messager wakambila Davidi ne, Bantu aba bakamba kutuhita bakole; bakaluhuka kutudi mu madimi; tuakaluangana n abo tô ne ku mbelu kua tshibi tshia ku musoko
Nanku, bena Izrayele ne ndelanganyi yabu yonsu, bavuluke dituku dia Dikisha, bualu ke diumvuangana dietu nabu dia kashidi
Mose wakitabusha di dia tatu andi muenu, wakenza mei onso akambeye
Kanungu ka Dîyi dikulu edi, didibo banyisha mu dieebeja dia beena ditunga, didi dipeta bwenzeji padibo badipatula kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga
Kanumufikishi munda to, bualu udi mua kunubutula, kunumusha panu
Yehowa wakunsokoka bualu ebu, kena muanze kubungambila
Wewe newenze manyi a tshijila adibo bela ha mutu ne bintu ebi, manyi adi atua dihembu bu mudibo benza kudi benyi ba manananshi, manyi au neikale manyi a tshijila adibo bela ha mutu

Hakahingana Abinê ku Hebelone, Yoaba wakaya n andi ku tshibi tshia musoko ha nkayandi bua kuyikileye n andi talalâ; wakamutua muele muinshi mua mbale yandi bualu bua lukuna lua mashi a Asahele, muakuny andi; yeye wakafua
Nsongalume awu kuluangana ne muena Izrayele mukuabu
Dituku dia muanda muteketa kushala diende dia tshijila, bualu ndituku divuaye muikishe kunyima kua midimu yende ya Mufuki
Matayo Mu matuku au muloho Helede wakunvua lumu lua Yesu, wakambila bantu bandi ne, Au nYone Mubanji, wakubika ku lufu, bua bualu ebu malu a kukema adi enjibua kudiye
Musulu wa Yaboke udi wenza mukalu wadi ne ditunga dia bena Amone
Davidi wakadi ne diakalengele kudi Nzambi, wakamulomba ne, Nkebele Nzambi wa Yakoba nsubu; kadi Solomo wakamuibakila nsubu
Kubuelakanyi ne bantu babi bualu bua kuikala bu mumanyi wa malu adi kayi malelela
Tshiena mfika munda lukasa
Hashishe Yelemiya muprofete wakakudimuna Hananya muprofete dî ku mpala kua bakuidi ne kua bantu bonso bakadi bimana mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Yisakâ ikale ne tshituha tshimue tshituangane ne mukalu wa Shimeona, ku luseke lua esete tô ne ku luseke lua wesete

Bualu bua mpingu ya telafima idi yamba mei a hatuhu, Tshiji tshianyi tshidi kudi balami, Dibue dia mu ditumba dia nsubu nedifume kudi Bena Yuda, Nebikale bu bena bukitu mu nvita Nenkoleshe Bena Yuda, Bena Efelayima nehikale bu bena bukitu; Nembele muoso, nembasangishe hamue; Nansha bingikala mubatangalashe munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu, Nendue n abo kabidi bafume mu buloba bua Ejipitu, Yehowa neahite mu mai manene a ntatu, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nembakoleshe mu Yehowa, Zekâya Lebanona, unzulule bibi biebe, Asa muadi, wewe mutshi wa cyprès, Unvuai muadi wa balami ba mikoko Yehowa Nzambi wanyi wakangambila ne, Disha mikoko idibo hamba kushiha
Miloho yakahingana kudi Yakoba, yakamuambila ne, Tuakuya kudi mukulu ebe Esau, ne yeye ulualua kusangakena n ebe mu nshila, udi ne balume nkama mai ku nyima kuandi
Yesu wakumukaku, wakaya mu nseke ya Tulo ne Sidona

Yehowa neunvuishe bantu dî diandi dia butumbi, neamueneshe dihueka dia diboko diandi hanshi mu kuvulangana kua tshiji, mu ludimi lua kahia kadi kashidisha, mu kuhumuka kua nvula, mu tshihuhu ne mu mabue a nvula
Bena Dana hakadimanyisha luhingu lusonga Yonatana, muana wa Gêshoma, muana wa Mose, yeye ne bana bandi balume, bakadi bakuidi ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Dana tô ne hakayabo mu buluka
Aba mbakuidi banene ne bana babo ba mu matuku a Yeshua
Bikala muana mukashi wa muakuidi mubaka kudi muenyi, yeye kena mua kudia tshintu tshia tshijila tshifila kudi Yehowa
Bakalua n andi
Mukelenge wa Yosefe wakamukuata, wakamubuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu muakadi bena buloko ba mukelenge basuikila, yeye wakadi mu nsubu wa lukanu nunku
Kadi bingambila nsongalume ne, Mona, mikete idi ku mpala kuebe, hashishe ya mu nshila webe, bualu bua Yehowa wakakumina kule
Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa bukula bana balume ba Alona nebaufile ku mesu kua Yehowa ku mpala kua tshioshelu
Bana ba balume ba Etana: Azâya
Nunku Hanuna wakakuata bantu ba Davidi, wakababeya nsuki, wakabakosa bilulu biabo hankatshi ku mataku abo mene, wakabihata
Udi ulombola Kapangu ka ku mutu ka bilwilu
Yeye udi bu ngabu wa dikuatshisha dienu; udi bu muele wa nvita unudi nutamba n au bakuabo
Yuda udi bu muana wa nyama wa ntambue, wakalekela tshintu tshiandi tshia kudia, wakalamina ne binu biandi bu nyama wa ntambue udi bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, mundi kai wamubisha ku tulu
Bikaleye muana wa balume wa ngondo umue tô ne ku bidimu bitanu, neubale nshekele itanu, ne bikaleye muana wa bakashi, nshekele isatu
Muana mukashi muenzesha kudi mamu andi wakambila Helode ne, Umpe mutu wa Yone Mubanji ha dilonga
Mbu muakamba Yeshaya diambedi ne, Ahu, netuambe tshinyi
