Yotama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika hohamue ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi, tatu wandi; Ahaza, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Wakamba ne, Bûshe milondo inai ne mai tente, bâhongolole ha mulambu wa kuosha ne ha nkunyi
Bana betu, katuena basue nuenu nuhange kumanya bua makenga akatukuata mu Asia, bu muakatamba bujitu kutunemena, buhita bukole buetu, tô ne hatuakamanya ne
Mu muanda eu dinanga dia Nzambi diakamueneshibua bua bualu buetu, bualu bua Nzambi wakatuma Muana wandi umuehele ha buloba bua tuetu tuikale ne muoyo bua bualu buandi

Kadi tudi tunulomba, bana betu, bua nuenu mimanye badi benza mudimu munkatshi muenu ne badi ku mutu kuenu mu Mukelenge ne badi banudimusha; bua nuenu nubabale bu banudi nutamba kutumbisha mu dinanga bua mudimu wabo
Yeye udi ungambila kabidi ne, Â adi mei malelela a Nzambi

Nakadiangatshila bamonyi bakadi mua kueyemenyibua bua kujadikabo tshifundu, Uliya muakuidi, Hashishe, nakabuela kudi mukashi wanyi wakadi muprofete mukashi wa Nzambi, ne yeye wakimita difu, wakalela muana wa balume
Kadi nuenu nudi nutamba kumuenesha tshiji kudi Bena Isalele hanuanyanga dituku dia lumingu
Balami ba tshibi bakela dî, bakambila ba mu nsubu wa mukelenge lumu alu
Wakahingana kudi bana babo, wakamba ne, Nsongalume kenaku, ne meme nenye kudi kunyi
Hakadiye uya ku mpala, wakamona banga balume babidi, bana ba muntu umue, Yakobo muana wa Zebedayo, ne muan abo Yone, bakadi mu buatu ne tatu wabo Zebedayo, balukulula tuhamba tuabo; yeye wakababikila
Umue wenu neihate tshinunu tshia bantu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuluila nvita bu muakanuambileye
Nanku Sheme ne Yefete kuangata tshilamba tshia Nowa, kutshibuikila pa makaya abu
Yoshua wakamba ne, Wewe wakatukengesha bualu kai
Petelo wakaha londa ha bule ha bule
Bantu bonso nebamanye ne, Meme Yehowa nakuhatula muele wanyi wa nvita mu tshimanga tshiau; kawena uhinganamu kabidi
Mitshihu yebe ne munyinyi wa tshijila nebimanye mua kukûmushila mulau ne mua kukuhandisha ku bintu ebi, anyi
Biakulenduisha dikasa diebe, wadikosa; bua wewe kubuela mu muoyo uzobela kudi kutamba bua wewe kuedibua mu Ngena ne makasa ebe abidi
Bûdi n abu mbua kumuambila ne, Yehowa udi ukuebesha ne, Wewe wakumushiha bua kubunyenga ku bukole, anyi
Nsongakashi eu wakadi mulengele be; yeye wakakuba mukelenge, wakamuenzela mudimu; kadi mukelenge kakamumanya
Nanku, nuenu nenufuile bonsu amu mu tshipela emu
Mmutuadije kabidi ku Sodome ne Ngomore, too ne ku Adma ne Seboyime pabuipi ne Lesha

Shaula wakamuebesha ne, Wewe wakungelela tshifufu ne muana wa Yishai bua kumuha bintu bia kudia ne muele wa nvita, wakuebesha Nzambi bualu buandi, bua yeye antombokele, andadile bu mualaminyi bu mudiye wenza lelu bualu kai

Bakasangana mukandu ku Akemeta mu nsubu wa mukelenge udi mu buloba bua Bena Madai, wakadi mufunda nunku: Mu tshidimu tshia kumudilu tshia bukelenge bua mukelenge Kolesha mene, mukelenge Kolesha wakela mukenji eu bua nsubu wa Nzambi wa mu Yelushalema ne: Base nsubu au mu muaba wakadibo bafila milambu, bajadike bishimikidi biandi bikole; bule buabi nebuikale coudées makumi asambombo ne butshiama buabi nebuikale coudées makumi asambombo; base ne milongo ya mabue manene isatu ne mulongo wa mabaya mahia mahia; difutu dia mudimu eu difume mu nsubu wa mukelenge
Bituikala bamane kufua ne Kilisto, tudi tuitabusha ne, Netuikale n andi ne muoyo kabidi
Wewe kabidi, muana wa muntu, lesha Bena Isalele ntempelo eu, tshifundu tshiandi ne tshidikishilu tshiandi, bua bundu bubakuate bua malu onso akenzabo
Bakumuka mu Kibelota hatawa bakashikama mu Haselota
Mu Yelushalema nuakashikama bana ba Yuda ne ba Benyamina ne ba Efelayima ne ba Manashe: Utai, muana wa Amihuda, muana wa Omeli, muana wa Imeli, muana wa Bani, wa bana ba Pelese, muana wa Yuda
Tshiena nkeba kuangata butumbi kudi bantu
Petelo wakabambila ne, Kudimunai mitshima yenu, nubatijibue buonso buenu mu dina dia Yesu Kilisto bualu bua kunujimishilabo mibi yenu; nunku nenuangate kuha kua Nyuma Muimpe
Nshila wanyi kena mululame, anyi
Gedaliya wakaditshiha kudibo ne kudi bantu babo ne, Kanutshinyi bantu ba Bena Kasada; nushikame mu buloba, nukuatshile mukelenge wa Babulona mudimu, hashishe malu enu neikale makane
Lomo Nunku netuimbe ne, Abalahama, nkambua wetu, wakasangana tshinyi bua mubidi wandi
Bualu matuku adibu bamutshintshimike awu, mukaji awu kena ne tshintu tshikuabu tshia kudia to
Nuakuyila bua kutangila tshinyi
Mai manene enze tshiona, ne bionso bidimu bibile; budimi bua mu mpata busanke, ne bionso bidimu bisanke kabidi

Nakuvuluka dî dia Mukelenge diakambeye ne, Bulelela, Yone wakabatiza bantu ne mai, kadi nuenu nenubatijibue mu Bikala Nzambi mubahe kuha kuakutuheye hatuakuitabusha Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto, ahu meme nakadi nganyi wa kufuilangana ne Nzambi
Unvuai, nuenu ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele

Kadi hakubikilabo, ya biebe ushikame ha muaba udi mutambe bukese; hashishe halua wakukubikila, neakuambile ne, Mulunda, bandila biebe; wewe newikale ne butumbi ku mesu kua bantu bonso badi bashikame n ebe ku mesa
Wakamiamina tshitendelelu kabidi ne mashi muomumue, ne bintu bionso biakakuatabo n abi mudimu wa kutendelela

Yeye wakasungula milongo ya bakuidi mu midimu yabo, ne Bena Lewi mu midimu yabo bu muakadi mikenji ya Davidi, bua kuimbabo misambu, ne bua kuenzabo midimu ya bakuidi buatshia buatshia; ne balami ba bibi ku milongo yabo ku tshibi ne ku tshibi; bualu bua Davidi, muntu wa Nzambi, wakela mikenji nunku
Genese Nzambi Udi Ulaya Abalama Muana Hakashika malu a, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Abalama mu tshilota ne, Abalama kutshinyi, meme ndi ngabu webe ne difutu diebe ditambe bunene
Nenulongolole nshila, nenutahulule mikalu ya buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi bituha bisatu, bua mushihianganyi yonso anyemenemu

Aba mbantu bakenza mudimu au ne bana babo ba balume: Bana ba balume ba Bena Kohata: Hemana, muimbi wa misambu, muana wa Yoele, muana wa Samuele, muana wa Elekana, muana wa Yelohama, muana wa Eliele, muana wa Toa, muana wa Sufa, muana wa Elekana, muana wa Mahata, muana wa Amasai, muana wa Elekana, muana wa Yoele, muana wa Azaya, muana wa Sefanya, muana wa Tahata, muana wa Asî, muana wa Ebiyasafa, muana wa Kola, muana wa Yisehâ, muana wa Kohata, muana wa Lewi, muana wa Isalele
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Bienzedi Mu Ikonio bakabuela diakamue mu nsunagoga wa Bena Yuda, bakambila bantu dî diakitabushisha ba bungi, Bena Yuda ne Bena Gelika
Muena Peleshete wakambila Davidi ne, Meme ndi mbua bua wewe udi ulua kundi ne bibangu, anyi
Dibaka dikale dinemekibua munkatshi mua bantu bonso, bulalu kabunyanguki; Nzambi nealumbuluishe bena masandi bajike ne bena masandi babake
Katuena benze malu a kukema a bungi mu dina diebe, anyi
Mu tshikondo atshi tshimue Bena Libena bakatomboka kabidi
Bualu budi butamba kukutonda muakuambeye ne, Wowe mai, wikale muakane, munyi

Noa wakaluhuka ne bana bandi balume ne mukashi andi ne bakashi ba bana bandi, ne nyama yonso ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi ne nyunyu yonso ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshiendakana ha buloba, bu mudi mishindu yabi, biakaluhuka mu buatu
Bua bikala Nzambi kai mubange kuahula matamba malelela, kena ubenga kuahula wewe kabidi
Moshe kutuma bantu bua kutentekela tshimenga tshia Yazere
Bobo bakamuela tshifufu, bakamuela mabue ku mukenji wa mukelenge mene mu tshiendedi tshia mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Hakamumoneye, wakamukonka ne, Udi witabusha Muana wa Nzambi, anyi
Kadi Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Bana banyi, ha kubuela kua bantu badi beyemene biuma mu bukelenge bua Nzambi mbualu bukole
Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo, meme nemmuambile anu mei adi Yehowa ungambila
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita, badi bangata dîyi bu diumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu
Shaula wakelesha mpungi ku nseke yonso ya buloba, wamba ne, Bena Ebelu bonso, unvuai
Kulambi muana wa mukoko ne mabele a mamu wandi

Davidi wakamunyenga tshinunu tshia makalu ne bena nvita binunu muanda mutekete bakadi benda ha nyima ha tubalu ne bena nvita binunu makumi abidi bakadi benda hanshi; Davidi wakakosa tubalu tuabo tua makalu mijilu yatu ya bikono, kadi wakasungula tukuabo tuakakumbana ku makalu andi lukama

Mose wakadi ushimika ntenta ku butshika bua tshitudilu, wakamubikila ne, Ntenta wa kusambakena Muntu yonso wakasua kukeba Yehowa wakaluhuka mu tshitudilu bua kuya ku ntenta wa kusambakena, wakadi ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Kadi hakunvueye mei â, mutshima wandi wakatamba kunyingalala, bualu bua yeye wakadi ne bubanshi buhite

Hakadilabo kudi Yehowa, yeye wakateka midima hankatshi habo ne Bena Ejipitu; wakatuma mai manene ha mutu habo, wakababuikila; mesu enu akatangila malu anakenza mu Ejipitu; nuakashikama mu tshihela matuku a bungi
Kena mua kusela mukaji mukamba, nansha mukaji udi bayende mubenge, nansha ndumba
Mose wakasaya tshimpanga, wakosha mutu ne bituha bia munyinyi ne dianyi
Dituku dia kumpala dia tshibilu atshi, nungoshile ngombe milume dikumi ne isatu, mikoku ya tshimpanga ibidi, ne bana ba mikoku dikumi ne banayi, badi bamane kukumbaja tshidimu tshijima, bishile
Muntu nansha umwe, tshianana udi upeta dinyooka dia dipangila dia ditunga, kêna mwa kubiumbusha mu njila wabi bwa kumwenzelabio yêye nkayenda mudimu to
Bakatuma bantu makumi atanu, bakakebakeba tô matuku asatu, kadi kabakamusangana

Bana ba balume ba Elepâla: Ebê ne Mishama ne Shemede, wakasa Ono ne Lodo ne misoko yakadi ha buihi; Belia ne Shema, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo ba Bena Ayalona, bakihata Bena Gata mu nvita; ne Ahio ne Shashaka ne Yelemota ne Zebadaya ne Alada ne Edê ne Mikaele ne Yisepa ne Yoha, bana ba balume ba Belia; Zebadaya ne Meshulama ne Hiziki ne Hebê ne Yishemelai ne Yizela ne Yobaba, bana ba balume ba Elepâla; ne Yakima ne Zikeli ne Zabedi ne Elienai ne Ziletai ne Ebele ne Adaya ne Belaya ne Shimelata, bana ba balume ba Shimei; Yishe pana ne Ebê ne Ebele ne Abidona ne Zikeli ne Hanana ne Hananya ne Elama ne Anetotiya ne Yifedeya ne Penuele, bana ba balume ba Shashaka; ne Shameshelai ne Shemaya ne Atalaya ne Yalesheya ne Eliya ne Zikeli, bana ba balume ba Yelohama
Kuambaye ne: Mvidi Mukulu wangumushi bundu ku mesu
Kadi Labashake wakabambila ne, Mukelenge wanyi wakuntuma anu kudi mukelenge wenu ne kunudi kabidi bua kunuambila mei au nkayenu

Bakafila bua mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi ntalanta ya or binunu bitanu ne dariques Bakadi ne mabue a mushinga mukole, bakafila mu bibutshilu bia nsubu wa Yehowa mu tshianza tshia Yehiele, Muena Gêshona

Mu dituku disatu bana balume ba ngombe dikumi ne umue ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema; ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila hau bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Hakunvua bantu lumu alu lubi, bakadila nansha mundi umue wa kaluata bintu bia kudilengesha n abi

Esetê Bena Yuda Badi Babutula Bena Lukuna Babo Mu ngondo wa dikumi ne ibidi, ngondo wa Adâ mene, mu dituku dia dikumi ne asatu dia ngondo eu, bakamba diba dia kumana mukenji wa mukelenge kufika, mu dituku diakatekemenabo kudi bena lukuna ba Bena Yuda bua kubakokeshabo kadi bualu buakakudimuka, ne Bena Yuda bakakokesha bena lukuna babo , Bena Yuda bakadisangisha mu misoko yabo mu nseke yonso ya mukelenge Ahashawelosha bua kukuatabo honso bakasua kubenzela bibi; nansha muntu wakamanya mua kuimana ku mpala kuabo, bualu bua ditshina diabo diakakuata bantu bonso
Bakashiyaku mpingu yabo; Davidi ne bantu bandi bakaya n ai
Mukenshi muibidi udi nunku: Sua mukuenu bu mûdi mudisue
Yeye wakamba ne, Kanubatumi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Etshi ntshimanyinu tshindi nnulesha ne nennukengeshe mu muaba eu, bua nuenu numanye ne mei anakuamba ne, Nennuenzele bibi, neajalame bulelela
Lehabama ne Yalobama bakadi baluangana nvita misangu yonso, Lehabama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika mu musoko wa Davidi; Abiya, muana wandi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Bakuabo ba mu tshisumbu bakela mbila, mukuabo dî dikuabo mukuabo dî dikuabo; hakahangeye kujingulula bimpe bualu bua diyoyo, wakamba bua kuluabo n andi mu nsubu wa masalayi

Kadi hanuabuela mu musoko, biabenga bena musoko kunuitabusha, yai mu misesu yau, nuambe ne, Nsenga ya musoko wenu idi milamate mu makasa etu, tudi tunukuhuilai; kadi numanye bienu ne, Bukelenge bua Nzambi buakulua ha buihi
Shekeme wakambila tatu wandi Hamo ne, Ungangatshile nsongakashi eu bu mukashi wanyi
Mpoloto yakambila balumbuludi mei â; bakatshina, hakunvuabo ne, Badi Bena Lomo; bakalua, bakabatendekena; hakabaluhulabo, bakabasengelela bua kumukabo mu musoko
Kakuena mushindu wa kumiaminamu nansha wa kukunamu biakudia
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Tshiakakubikila, ya ulale biebe kabidi
Esawu uvua tshilembi wa kalanda musenga, musue kukeba nyama mu tshisuku
Yesu wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi udikonkela dî edi, anyi bakuabo bakungamba kûdi
Bituenza mikenji ei ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bu muakabambileye, netubadibue ne mbakane
Muntu kai udi ukuna mionshi ya nvinyo ne kena udia mamuma ai
Kadi buatu buakadi mu bunene bua dishiba, butatshisha kudi mavuala, bualu bua tshihehele tshiakadi tshibuhingisha

Paudi usumba budimi, nansha ubusumbisha, mushinga wabu ulondeshile bungi bua bidimu bidi nabi budimi abu, bituadije ku tshidimu tshia ndekelu tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene, ne bua bungi bua bidimu bia kunowa bitshidi bishale bua tuetu kufika ku Mufikilu mukuabu
Kadi bantu dikumi bakadi munkatshi muabo bakambila Yishemaele ne, Kutushihi, bualu bua tuetu tudi ne bintu bisokoka mu madimi etu: blé, erge, manyi ne buitshi
Nzambi wakatabasha mesu andi, yeye wakamona mushimi wa mai, yeye wakaya, wakasuna mai mulondo tente, wakanuisha nsongalume mai
Nentate n enu musangu bule munyi
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Nuenu nuikale balamate kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Kadi yeye kakashiha bana ba bashihi aba, bu muakamba Yehowa mu mukanda wa mikenji ya Mose ne, Kabashihi batatu bualu bua malu a bana bakalelabo; kabashihi bana bua malu a batatu abo, kadi muntu yonso neafue anu bua bubi buandi
Kudielabu panshi kumpala kuende
Bakafila bintu ebi kabidi tshidimu tshibidi ne tshisatu
Ashale anu ku nzubu kuende tshidimu tshijima bua kusankisha mukajende
Kadi muntu ne muntu adijadikile mudimu wandi, nunku neamanye mua kuditumbisha bua bualu buandi, kembualu bua mukuabo
Kuena ne bua kubuelela mukaji wa muanenu mu nzubu to, bualu udi umuluisha bundu
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Nudi nutshinyina tshinyi
Bua meme nakuamba dî
Kadi neashale ne mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Nzambi wakambila Mose ne, Nenfuile bantu luse bandi musue kufuila luse, nendeshe bantu dinanga bandi musue kulesha dinanga
Yeye wakamba ne, E

Nunku Yehowa udi Wamba bualu bua mukelenge wa Ashû ne, Yeye kena ufika ha buihi ne musoko eu, kena welaku mukete umue, kena umueneka ku mpala kuau ne ngabu wandi, kena wela mushiki wa buloba ku musoko eu
Kanutendeledi mvidie ya bisamba bikuabu
Kadi bena Izrayele kutshimuna Sihone ne tshiluilu tshiende
Hashishe, Danyele wakahingisha ditaba dia meji ne dia budimu kudi Aliyoka, kapitene ka masalayi akadi alama mukelenge, kakadi kaya bua kushiha bena meji ba mu Babulona
Hakadi Paulo ne Bânaba n abo mpata ne dikonka musangu mule, bana babo ba mu Kilisto bakasungula Paulo ne Bânaba ne bakuabo babo bua kuyabo ku Yelushalema kudi bapostolo ne bakulu bua dikonka edi
Muntu udi wenza bibi nyeye muine udi ufua; muana wa balume kena ne bua kuhila bua mibi ya tatu, ne tatu kena ne bua kuhila bua mihi ya muan andi wa balume
Bana bandi badi banua mashi; Job Yehowa wakakudimuna Yobo dî ne, Muntu udi udiula mei andi neasue kubambakasha mei ne Wa Bukole Buonso, anyi
Lufu ne Kujikibua bia Abalahama Â adi matuku a bidimu bia Abalahama, biakadi lukama ne makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu
Neuhueke n anyi tô ne ku bibi Yobo Hashishe, Biledada, Muena Shuhi, wakakudimuna Yobo ne, Neukebe mei a kuamba musangu bule bishi
Ku ndekelu, nudikoleshe mu Mukelenge ne mu bukole buandi bunene
Mose wakashila tshioshelu, wakidika dina dia tshi ne, Yehowa nisi, wakamba ne, Yehowa wakaditshiha, Yehowa neuhingane ne Bena Amaleka nvita ku tshikondo ku tshikondo
Bana aba bonsu dikumi ne basambombu ke ndelanganyi ivua Yakobe mulele ne Zilpa, mukaji mupika uvua Labane mupeshe muanende wa bakaji Leya
Bakimanyika babidi, Yosefe wakadibo babikila ne, Bâsaba, wakadi biandi ne dinga dina ne, Yusto, ne Matia
Udi musue kuangata kabidi bimuma bia mutshi wa dinanga, bidi muananyi muntuadile bua tshinyi
Bakamukonka ne, Udi wenza tshimanyinu kai bua tuetu tumone, tuitabushe dî diebe
Alesandelo wakabahoha tshianza, wakamba kudividila ku mesu kua bantu

Wakidikisha tshiendelu tshia munda, bule buatshi coudées lukama, butshiama buatshi coudées lukama, nseke yatshi yonso yakadi luidi lumue; ne tshioshelu tshia milambu tshiakadi ku mpala kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Ku dî dia Yehowa Bena Isalele bakaya ku luendu, ne ku dî dia Yehowa bakalongolola tshitudilu, hakatshidi ditutu dimana ku mutu kua nsubu, bobo bakashala mu tshitudilu
Butshiama bua tshitendelelu ku mpala kuatshi ku luseke lua esete ne bua muaba wa coudées makumi abidi busangisha buakadi coudées lukama
Udi uhita bukole kena ukengeshibua ku lufu luibidi
Bakamba nunku ku mpala kua mukelenge
Bonso ba mu Yuda batshidi bashala bakaya mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kushikamamu nebamanye dî didi dijalame bushuwa, ne ndî dianyi, anyi ndî diabo
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu dituku adi meji neabuele mu mutshima webe, ne wewe neuhangidishe kuenza bualu bubi
Abalahama Udi Wihata Hagâ ne Yishemaele Muana wakadiunda, wakalekela mabele, mu dituku diakalekeleye mabele Abalahama wakalambishila Isaka bidia bia bungi
Wakutuenzela nunku tshinyi, bua kutuhatula mu Ejipitu

Tuakunvua lumu bu muakumisha Yehowa mai a Dishiba Dikunze ku mpala kuenu, hanuakaluhuka mu Ejipitu; ne bu munuakenzela bakelenge babidi ba Bena Amole, Sihona ne Oga, bakadi dishiya dia Yadene, banuakashiha
Bualu bua lufu luakalua bualu bua muntu, nunku dibika dia bantu bafue diakalua bua muntu kabidi
Yeye wakamulelela kabidi Shâfa, tatu wa Mademana, ne Shewa tatu wa Makebena ne tatu wa Gibea; muana wa bakashi wa Kaleba wakadi Akasa
Muntu yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku adi nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Malu kai
Aba mbakuidi banene ne bana babo ba mu matuku a Yeshua
Nunku nebikale bantu banyi ne meme nengikale Nzambi wabo

Nshila wa bantu bakane nkuehuka ku malu mabi, Kudisua kudi kuya ku mpala kua dibutuka, Kuikala ne mutshima muhuekele diatshimue ne badihuekeshi kudi kutamba Udi unvua dî ne ntema neahete diakalengele; Badi babikila muena meji ne, Mujinguludi wa mianda; Lungenyi ludi bu mushimi wa mai a muoyo kudi muntu udi n alu, Mutshima wa muena meji udi uyisha mukana muandi lungenyi, Mei malengele adi bu dikatshi dia buitshi, Nshila udiku udi mululame ku mesu kua muntu, Muoyo wa muena mudimu udi usamina bia kudia udi umuenzesha mudimu, Muntu mulembakana Muena mashimi udi utudisha matandu; Muena tshimbambila udi uteya muena mutumba n andi, Udi ubuikila mesu andi bua kuhangidisha malu a bunsonge, Nsuki mitoke tô idi tshifulu tshia butumbi, Udi kayi ukuata tshiji lubilu udi uhita muena bukitu buimpe, Badi belela nshobo ha bibelu, Nsumuinu Kuikala ne diampa diume ne ditalala nkutamba kuikala ne nsubu mule tente ne Muhika udi wenza mudimu wandi ne meji neakokeshe muana mulume wa mu tshiota Luesu ludiku lua kulengesha tshiamu tshia argent, tshikutu tshidiku tshia Muenji wa malu mabi udi uteleja matshu andi ku mishiku idi ihatula mei mabi; Muntu udi useka muhele udi uhenda Mufuki wandi, Bikulu badi tshifulu tshia butumbi tshia bantu banunu; butumbi bua bana mbatatu babo
Neumushe bitambala bia ku mitu ne biamu bilengele bia ku mikolo ne mikaba ya tshilulu, tushete tua kuelamu manananshi, ne manga
Bakanyenga musoko dituku adi, bakashiha ku muele wa nvita; wakabutula bantu bonso bakadimu dituku adi, bu muakenzeleye Lakisha
Nakatangila mu bikena kumona butuku kabidi, Bakamuha bukokeshi, Meme, Danyele, mutshima wanyi wakalubakana munda muanyi, bikena kumona bia ku mutu wanyi biakankuatshisha buowa

Yeye wakamema mitanda itanu ne mishiha ibidi, wakatangila mulu, wakatendelela Nzambi, wakatshibula mitanda, wakaifila mu bianza bia bayidi bua kubitekabo ku mpala kua bantu; yeye wakababanyina buonso buabo mishiha ibidi
Bua bukole bua tshiyole atshi, mu Ejipitu bantu kabakumanya kabidi ne: kuikala ne biakudia bivule nkuikala munyi
Yeye wakambila kapitene bua kumutumeye ne bila kumulesheye luse ne bua kahidishi balunda bandi bua kuluabo kumukuatshisha
Nunemeke nfumu munene
Nebasangishe Bena Yuda ne Bena Isalele hohamue, ne bobo bine nebadisunguile muntu umue bua kuikaleye ha mutu habo; nebumuke mu buloba ebu, bua dituku dia Yizelele nedikale dinene
Mvidi Mukulu wa bukole buonsu akuele lupemba mu dibaka diebe
Tangilai mudi kahia kakese katemesha nkunyi ya bungi be
Lemeke wakabaka bakashi babidi, dina dia muadi diakadi Ada, ne dina dia tshilondi ne, Sila
Dia Arone divua munkatshi mua makombu dikumi ne abidi aa

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bakuabo ba munkatshi muenu bakuitabusha mbueshilu bua kumatshisha mashi a bakuabo hanshi; wewe wakulomba bia kasombela ne bia makasa, wakunyenga bintu kudi bena mutumba n ebe ku bukole; wakumpua muoyo
Aba mbana balume ba Melali bakabalabo ku meku abo, bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Hakumbanyina Babulona bidimu makumi muanda mutekete, nendue kunudi, nenshikishe dî dianyi dimpe dinakunuambila, nennuhingashe mu muabu eu
Nennuambuluishe wewe ne muanenu Arone bua nuakule bimpe
Mutuangaji awoshe pa tshilambuilu pamue ne milambu mikuabu idibu boshila Maweja Nangila
Mushipianganyi neanyemene mu tshimenga atshi, bua kabamusombuedi, too ne pamulumbuluishabu kudi bena Izrayele
Udi ne matshu unvue budi Nyuma wambila ekelesia

Nsongalume wakamuambila ne, Meme nakalua ku mukuna wa Gileboa ku mpukahuka, ne mona, Shaula wakadi mushindamine ku difuma diandi; ne mona, bena makalu ne bantu bakadi benda ha nyima ha tubalu bakadi bamutshintshimike ha buihi
Kadi kabakabala Bena Lewi ne Bena Benyamina, bualu bua dî dia mukelenge diakatondesha Yoaba
midimu ya mbulamatadi mu polovensa ne mu misoko;
Yeye wakamba ne, Makelela Mose wakamba ne, Bualu buikale bu mu dî diebe, bua kukumanyisha ne, Kakuena nzambi mukuabo bu Yehowa Nzambi wetu
Kabidi nebase mitanda yabu minyungulule nzubu awu
Hashishe, bakashikama n andi mu buloba tô minya muanda mutekete ne mafuku muanda mutekete
Kadi Nzambi wakangambila ne, Wewe kuena wibakila dina dianyi nsubu nansha, bualu bua wewe udi muena nvita, wakamatshisha mashi hanshi
Luhula dihunda ne dihunda, kudieledi nshobo bua kudisungula
Bipupu abi, nebikuate anu bantu badi banukina
Hakatangila Shaula tshisumbu tshia masalayi a Bena Peleshete, wakatamba kutshina, mutshima wandi wakakanka bikole
Samuele wakabikila bantu bua kudisangishabo kudi Yehowa ku Misepa

Davidi wakambila bantu bonso bakadi n andi mu Yelushalema ne, Jukai, tunyemai; bituashala, nansha umue wetu neahanduke mu bianza bia Abashaloma; tuyai lubilu, yeye katshetshi; biatuheteye neabenzele bibi, neabutule musoko ne miele ya nvita
Hakunvua Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, lumu elu bualu bua yeye wakadi munyemene mu Ejipitu ku mesu kua Solomo , Yalobama wakahingana mufume mu Ejipitu

Nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ushikishe dî diwakalaya muntu webe Davidi tatu wanyi ne, Kuena uhanga muntu mulume wa kushikama ku mpala kuanyi mu nkuasa wa bukelenge bua Isalele, biadimuke bana bebe mu nshila yabo bua kuendabo mu mikenji yanyi bu muwakuenda ku mpala kuanyi
Yesu wakabakudimuna ne, Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Muntu yonso utu wenza bubi udi muhika wa bubi
Ne diabolo wakadi ubadinga wakedibua mu dishiba dia kahia ne soufre, kudi nyama wa luonji ne muprofete wa mashimi kabidi, nebakengeshibue munya ne bufuku tshiendelele

Bualu bua yeye udi ujidila ne bobo badi bajidibua kabidi, bonso badi ba Tatu umue: bua bualu ebu kena ufua bundu bua kubabikila ne, Bana betu, wamba ne, Ne udi wamba kabidi ne, Bualu bua bana bakuabanyangana mubidi ne mashi, yeye muine kabidi wakadiangatshila bintu bin ebe muomumue; bua ku lufu luandi yeye amuvuishe tshianana udi ne bukole bua lufu, ndiabolo mene; ne bua yeye ahikule bonso aba bakadi bakuatshibue mu buhika matuku onso a muoyo wabo bua ditshina diabo dia lufu
Bialenga muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi munga muntu tshianza diambedi yeye kayi muanze kuowa bianza biandi, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Nomba Milambu ya Buatshia buatshia Ek
Yehowa Nzambi, Nzambi wa Isalele, avudishibue disanka, Dina diandi dia butumbi divudishibue disanka tshiendelele; Mitendelelu ya Davidi, muana wa Yishai, yakuhua
Yeye wakabakonka tshiakasatu ne, Bualu kai
Mukelenge Wakenza ngabu ya or yakatulabo nkama ibidi: bujitu bua or ya mu ngabu umue buakadi nshekele nkama isambombo

Nebâbuluke; tatu neikale ne muan andi mulume mpata, muana mulume neikale ne tatu andi mpata; mamu neikale ne muan andi mukashi mpata, muana mukashi neikale ne mamu andi mpata; mamu andi muenu neikale ne mukashi a muan andi mpata, mukashi a muana neikale ne mamu andi muenu mpata

Nunku Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Tangila, ndi ne Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, tshilumbu, nentshibule maboko andi, ne diboko diandi ditshidi ne bukole buadi ne diboko diandi diakutshibuka diambedi, nemponeshe muele wa nvita udi mu tshianza tshiandi
Nennumiamine mai matoke tô, nenuikale bakane; nennulengeshe ku bukoya buenu buonso ne ku mpingu yenu yonso
Wakangata muana mukuabo wa mu diku dia mukelenge, wakahunga n andi tshihungidi, wakamutshihisha mutshihu ku bukole
Kabena bakesha bantu bebe bisonsa, ne badi bamba ne Enzai tushola, mona, badi bakulua bantu bebe, kadi dihila didi kudi Bena Ejipitu bebe

Wewe newenze tshitekelu tshia minda tshia or mutambe buimpe, nebenze tshitekelu etshi ne or muhite, ne tshishikaminu tshiatshi ne mukolo watshi, tukoho tuatshi ne mahu atshi ne bilongo biatshi nebenze ne tshituha tshimue tshia or mene tshiakenzabo n atshi tshitekelu

Ahaba wakambila Obadaya ne, Hitshila mu buloba buonso ku mishimi ya mai yonso ne ku tusulu tuonso, bumue neuheteku mashinde a kudisha n au tubalu ne nyama ya mpunda Nunku bakatahulula buloba munkatshi muabo, bobo bakayamu
